CHAPTER.VERSE: A kipat cil-in Pasian in vantung leh leitung a piangsak hi. Leitung in lim leh meel nei loin a awngthawlpi ahi hi. A thuk tuipi tung tengah khuamialna om a, tua tuitung teng ah Pasian’ Kha a gamtang hi. Pasian in, “Khuavak om ta hen,” ci hi; tua ciangin khuavak om pah hi. Pasian in khuavak hoih hi ci-in mu hi; Pasian in khuamial panin khuavak khenkhia hi. Pasian in khuavak pen Sun ci a, khuamial pen Zan ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni khat ni ahi hi. Pasian in, “Tuite’ laizang-ah van kuumpi om hen la, tua van kuumpi in tui leh tui kikhensak hen,” ci hi. Pasian in van kuumpi bawl a, van kuumpi tunga om tuite leh van kuumpi nuai-a om tuite khen hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Pasian in van kuumpi pen Vantung ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni nihna ahi hi. Pasian in, “Vantung nuai-a om tuite mun khatah kikhawm hen la, lei keu kidawk hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Pasian in lei keu pen Leitung ci a, a kikaikhawm tuite pen Tuipite ci hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi ci-in mu hi. Pasian in “Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak hen la, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau’ nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangkhiasak a, kungnote in amau’ nam ciatin tang piangsakin, singkung in a sungah tang a om gahte piangsakin, amau’ nam ciatciat-in piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in mu hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni thumna ahi hi. Pasian in, “Sun leh zan a khen dingin vantungah khuavakte om hen; tuate pen pawi hun leh khua hun, ni leh kumte khen nading limte hi hen la, leitung khua a vaksak dingin vantungah khuavak hi uh hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Pasian in khuavak lian nih bawl a, khuavak lianzaw pen sun a uk ding, khuavak neuzaw pen zan a uk dingin bawl hi; amah in aksite zong a bawl hi. 17-18 Leitungah khua a vaksak ding, sun leh zan a uk ding, khuamial panin khuavak a khenkhia dingin Pasian in tuate vangtungah koih hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in mu hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni lina ahi hi. Pasian in, “Tuite in a nungta ganhing honpite piangsak hen la, vantung kan tanin huih lakah vasate leeng ta hen,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in tuipi ganhing golpite leh amau nam ciatin tuipi sungah tampi a pha, nuntakna a nei a gamtang thei ganhing namkim leh kha a nei vasate khempeuh amau nam ciatin piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in mu hi. Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, “Ci pha-in tampi pha-in, tuipi tuisung dim un la, leitungah vasate tampi pha un,” ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni nga-na ahi hi. Pasian in, “Nuntakna a nei ganhingte amau nam ciatin leitung in piangsak hen: innsa, gamsa, leh a bokvak ganhingte amau nam ciatin piang hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Innsa, gamsa, leh a bokvak ganhing khempeuh amau’ nam ciatin Pasian in piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in mu hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima' lim, eimah hong suunin mihing bawl ni; tuipi ngasate' tung, huih lak vasate' tung, ganhingte' tung, leitung khempeuh' tung, leitunga a bokvakte khempeuh' tungah ukna neisak ni,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama' lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah piangsak hi; amah in pasal leh numei piangsak hi. Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute' tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha un la, leitung dimin zo un; tuipi ngasate' tung, huih lak vasate' tung, leitungah a gamtaang, a nungtate khempeuh' tungah ukna nei ta un,” ci hi. Pasian in, “En un, leitung maitang khempeuh ah a om, tang a piangsak kungnote khempeuh leh a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note' tungah kong pia khin ta hi; tuate an-in na nei ding uh hi. Leitung ganhing khempeuhte' tung, huih lak vasate khempeuh'tung, leitungah a bokvakte khempeuh' tung, nuntakna hu a neite khempeuh' tungah an dingin kung hing khempeuh ka pia khin ta hi,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin piang pah hi. Pasian in a bawlsate khempeuh mu hi, en un, hoih mahmah hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tung a, ni gukna ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin vantung leh leitung leh a sunga omte khempeuh kiman khin hi. Ni sagih ni-in ama' sep khitsate Pasian in zo a, ama' hihsa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh pian’sak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian tawlnga hi. Hihte pen, a kipian’sak lai-a vantung leh leitung tangthu ahi hi. Topa Pasian in leitung leh vantung a bawlin, Topa Pasian in leitungah guah zusak loin, leitang a kho ding mi om lo ahih manin gamsung kungnote lei tungah om nai loin, lo sung ankungte a po khiat ma hun, leitung panin meiilum kaaito-in lei maitang khempeuh a buah hunin Topa Pasian in leilak pan-a leivui tawh mihing bawl a, a nak sungah nuntakna hu sangsuk hi; mi in nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak pah hi. Topa Pasian in nisuahna lam, Eden-ah huan khat bawl hi; tua lai munah ama' bawlsa mipa koih hi. A deihhuai, nek dinga a hoih singkung nam khempeuh lei sung panin Topa Pasian in khangsak hi. Huan laizangah zong nuntakna singkung leh a pha leh a sia theihna singkung a om hi. Huan sung a kawtsak dingin Eden panin gun khat luang khia a, tua mun panin gun hong kikhenin lii hong pha hi. A masa pen gun a min in Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkot-a luang pen ahi hi; tua gam-a khamte hoih hi; tua munah bedolak singnai leh onik suang om hi. A nihna gun min in Gihon hi a Kush gam kimkot-a luang pen ahi hi. Assiria gam nisuahna lama a luang a thumna gun min in Tigris ahi hi. A lina gun in Eufrates gun ahi hi. Topa Pasian in mipa la-in Eden huan kho-a a kem dingin koih hi. Topa Pasian in mipa thu pia a, “Na ut utin huan sung singkung khempeuh na nethei ding hi; ahih hangin a pha leh a sia theihna singkung pen na ne kei ding hi; bang hang hiam na cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si taktak ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi; ama adinga kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in gamsung ganhing khempeuh leh huih lak vasate khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theih nadingin mipa' kiangah tuate paipih hi; nuntakna a nei ganhing khempeuhte pen mipa’ cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi. Mipa in ganhing namte khempeuh, huih lak vasate khempeuh gamsung ganhing khempeuh min vawh hi; ahih hangin mipa’ adinga a kilawm, a huh ding kimu lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in mipa ihmut suak mahmah sak a, ama' ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh dimsak hi; Topa Pasian in mipa’ tung panin a lakkhiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tua nu paipih hi. Tua ciangin mipa in,“Tu pet petin hih in keima guhte leh keima sate ahi hi; amah pen mipa' sung panin a kilakhia ahih manin Numei kici ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mipa in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi beel a, amaute in sakhat suak uh hi. Mipa leh a zi guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uh hi.

Tu-in gulpi pen, Topa Pasian’ bawlsa gamlak ganhing dangte khempeuh sangin ngiansiam zaw hi. Amah in numei kiangah, “Pasian in, ‘Huan sung sing khatpeuh peuh ne lo ding,’ hong ci ahi hiam?” ci hi. Numei in gulpi' kiangah, “Huan sung singgahte ka ne thei ding uh hi; ahih hangin Pasian in, ‘Huan laizang-a om singgah na ne kei ding uh hi, zong na lawng kei ding uh hi, tua bang hih le uhcin na si ding uh hi’ hong ci hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, “Na si taktak kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh tua singgah na nek ciangun na mitte uh kihong ding a, a pha leh a sia thei-in Pasian tawh na kibat ding lamtak uh Pasian in thei hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua singkung a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah lo-in a ne hi; amah in zong singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong ne hi. A nek khit phetun amaute gel in khua phawk uh a, a guaktangun a om lam uh kithei uh hi; amaute in thei tehte khuituah-in puansilh dingin bawl uh hi. Khuavot hunin huan sungah Topa Pasian a paina ging amaute in za uh a, Topa Pasian’ muhna panin mipa leh a zi, huan sung singte' lakah bu uh hi. Ahih hangin Topa Pasian in mipa samin ama kiangah, “Koi lai-ah om na hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Nangma' gin’na, huan sungah ka za a, ka lau hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ka guaktangin ka om hi; keimahmah ka butawm hi,” ci hi. Amah in, “Na guaktanga na omna kua in hong gen ahi hiam? Na nek loh dinga kong thupiak singgah ne na hi hiam?” ci hi. Mipa in, “Kei tawh a om dinga nong piak numei in singgah hong pia a, ke’n ka ne hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in numei kiangah, “Bangcia hici gamtat na hi hiam?” ci hi. Numei in, Gulpi in kei hong khem a, ka ne hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in gulpi kiangah, “Nang in hih bangin gamta khin na hih manin, ganhing khempeuhte leh gamlak ganhing khempeuhte sangin ciamsiatna na ngah zaw hi; na gilpi-in lam na pai ding a, na nuntak sung tawntungin leivui na ne ding hi. Nang leh numei' kikal, na suan-le-khakte leh ama’ suan-le-khakte' kikalah kilangneihna ka koih ding hi; amah in na lutang hong tuankham ding a, nang in ama' khetul na tu ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin numei' kiangah, “Naupaina-ah na gimna nakpi takin ka khangsak ding a, gimna tawh nau na suak ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih ding a, amah in nang' tungah hong uk ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin mipa’ kiangah, “Nangmah in na zi’ thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-a nang’ tungah kong thupiak singgah ne khin na hih ciangin, nangma’ hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi; na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in nasemin, na annek ding na zong ding hi. Leitang inling leh kiakte nang’ adingin hong pokhiasak ding a, nang in gamlak kungte na ne ding hi. Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin na maitang-ah khua-ul tawh an na ne ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang in leivui na hi hi, leivui-ah na ciahkik ding hi,” ci hi. Adam in a zi’ min pen Evua ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihing khempeuh’ nu ahi hi. Topa Pasian in mipa leh a zi’ adingin savun puan bawl a, amaute silhsak hi. Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “En un, mipa pen eite khat tawh kibang a, apha leh asia thei hi; amah in nuntakna singgah ne-in, hin’ tawntungna ngah kha lo ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in amah a kipiansakna leitang a kho dingin Eden huan panin amah sawlkhia hi. Amah in mipa hawlkhia hi; kherubte leh mun khempeuh a nga thei meikuang namsau pen Eden huan nisuahna lamah nuntakna singkung lampi a cing dingin koih hi.

Tu-in Adam in ama’ zi Evua luppih a, amah gai-in Kain nei a, “Topa’ huhna tawh mi khat ka ngah khin hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abel nei leuleu hi. Tu-in Abel in tuu kempa hi a, Kain in lo khopa ahi hi. Tua hun sungin Kain in lei pan-a piang gah piakna Topa tungah paipih a, Abel in a tuuhon tacilte leh a sa limcite paipih hi. Topa in Abel leh ama piakna thusim a, ahih hangin Kain leh ama piakna thusim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kain heh mahmah a, a mai sia hi. Topa in Kain tungah, “Bang hangin nang heh a, bang hangin na mai sia ahi hiam? Lim takin hih lecin, nang hong kisang lo ding ahi hiam? Lim takin na hih kei leh nang hong hih nuamin mawhna in na kongah hong buk a, nang hong uk nuam hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua mawhna na zawh ding ahi hi,” ci hi. Kain in a sanggampa Abel kiangah, “Gamlakah vak ni,” ci hi. Amaute gamlakah a om ciangun Kain in a sanggampa Abel gal bawlin that hi. Tua ciangin Topa in Kain tungah, “Na sanggampa Abel koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Ka thei kei hi; keimah in ka sanggam a kempa ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Topa in, “Nang’ bang hih na hi hiam? Na sanggampa’ sisan, leilak panin keitungah hong kiko hi. Na khut sung panin na sanggampa’ sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tung panin tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi. Lo na khawh ciangin leitang in nang’ adingin an hong piangsak nawn lo ding hi; nang pen a galtai, leitunga a vakvai na hi ding hi,” ci hi. Kain in Topa’ tungah, “Keimah hong kidantahna in ka thuak zawh ding hi lo hi. En in, tu ni-in nangmah in leitung panin kei nong notkhia a, nang’ kiang panin kei nong notkhia hi; kei pen a galtai, leitungah a vakvai ka hi ding a, kei hong mu peuhmah in hong that ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tua bang hi lo ding hi. Khatpeuh in Kain a thah leh tuapa' tungah a zah sagihin kithuk ding hi,” ci hi. Amah a tuak peuh in a thah khak loh nadingin Topa in Kain tungah ciamtehna khat koih hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ omna panin Kain pai khia a, Eden nisuahna lam Nod gamsungah teng hi. Kain in ama’ zi luppih a, amah gai-in Enok nei hi; amah in khuapi khat sat a, tua khuapi min dingin ama' tapa' min Enok phuak hi. Enok sung panin Irad suak hi; Irad in Mehujael’ pa hi, Mehujael in Methushael’ pa hi, Methushael in Lamek’ pa hi. Lamek in zi nih nei hi; a khat’ min in Adah hi a, a dang khat’ min in Zillah ahi hi. Adah in tapa Jabal nei hi; amah pen puanbukte' sungah tengin ganhing a neite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. A sanggampa’ min in Jubal hi; amah in laiza la sakna leh tamngai tumte khempeuh’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. Zillah in Tubal-kain nei hi; amah in sumngo leh sik na-zat khempeuh a bawlte’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. Tubal-kain’ sanggamnu in Na-amah ahi hi. Lamek in a zite' kiangah: “Adah leh Zillah aw, ka aw ngai un; Lamek’ zite aw, ka thugen ngai un: Kei hong liamsak manin mi khat, kei hong sat manin khanglai mi khat ka that khin hi. Kain a kithah manin a sagih vei-in a kithukkik leh, Lamek a kithah manin sawmsagih mun sagih vei-in kithukkik taktak ding hi,” ci hi. Adam in a zi luppih leuleu hi. Amah in tapa khat nei a, ama' min Seth ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh, “Kain in amah that ahih manin Abel’ tangin naupang khat Pasian in kei’ adingin hong sehsak hi,” amah in ci hi. Seth in zong tapa khat nei a, ama min Enosh ci hi. Tua hun-a kipanin mite in Topa bia-in a min lawh ding kipan uh hi.

Hih in Adam’ suan-le-khakte’ tangthute ahi hi. Pasian in mi a piansakin, amah tawh a kisunin a bawl hi. Amah in pasal leh numei piangsak hi, amaute a kipian’ sak khit ciangin amah in amaute Mi ci a, thupha a pia hi. Adam kum za leh kum sawmthum a nuntak khit ciangin, ama' lim tawh a kibang, amah a sun tapa khat’ pa suak a, amah pen Seth ci-in a min phuak hi. Seth a suah khit cianga Adam’ khan’ sung in kum zagiat ahi hi; amah in tapa leh tanu dang nei hi. Tua ahih ciangin Adam’ nuntak khan sung teng in kum zakua leh kum sawmthum ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Seth kum za leh kum nga a nuntak khit ciangin Enosh kici tapa khat nei hi. Enosh a suah khit ciangin Seth kum zagiat leh kum sagih nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Seth’ khan sung teng in kum zakua leh kum sawm-le-nih ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Enosh kum sawmkua a nuntak khit ciangin, amah in Kenan kici tapa khat nei hi. Kenan a suah khit ciangin Enosh kum zagiat leh kum sawm-le-nga nungta hi; tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Enosh’ khan’ sung teng in kum zakua leh kum nga ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Kenan kum sawmsagih a nuntak khit ciangin, Mahalalel kici tapa khat nei hi. Mahalalel’ suah khit ciangin Kenan kum zagiat leh kum sawmli nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kenan’ khan sung teng in kum zakua leh kum sawm ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Mahalalel kum sawmguk-le-nga a nuntak khit ciangin Jared kici tapa khat nei hi. Jared’ suah khit ciangin Mahalelel kum zagiat leh kum sawmthum nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Mahalalel’ khan’ sung teng in kum zagiat leh kum sawmkua-le-nga ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Jared kum za leh kum sawmguk-le-nih a nuntak khit ciangin Enok kici tapa khat nei hi. Enok’ suah khit ciangin Jared kum zagiat nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jared’ khan’ sung teng in kum zakua leh kum sawmguk-le-nih ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Enok kum sawmguk-le-nga a nuntak khit ciangin, Methuselah kici tapa khat nei hi. Methuselah’ suah khit ciangin Enok in kum zathum sung Pasian tawh lam paikhawm a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Enok’ khan’ sung teng in kum zathum leh kum sawmguk-le-nga ahi hi. Enok in Pasian tawh lam paikhawm hi; Enok kimu nawn lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah la hi. Methuselah kum za leh kum sawmgiat-le-sagih a nuntak khit ciangin Lamek kici tapa khat nei hi. Lamek’ suah khit ciangin Methuselah kum zasagih leh kum sawmgiat-le-nih nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Methuselah’ khan’ sung teng in kum za kua leh kum sawmguk-le-kua ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Lamek kum za leh kum sawmgiat-le-nih a nuntak khit ciangin, tapa khat nei a, ama min Noah phuakin, “Topa in a ciamsiatsa leitang panin hihpa in i nasepna leh i gimnate panin eite hong khahkhia ding hi,” ci hi. Noah’ suah khit ciangin Lamek kum zanga leh kum sawmkua-le-nga nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Lamek’ khan’ sung teng in kum za sagih leh kum sawmsagih-le-sagih ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Noah kum za nga a phak khit ciangin, amah in Shem, Ham, leh Jafeth-te, tapa thum nei hi.

Lei maitang tungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau’ sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin, Pasian’ tapate in mite’ tanute hoih hi, ci-in mu uh hi; amaute in a deih bangun tuate zi-in la uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ka Kha inmi tawh buai paisuak lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mihing pumpi in a si thei ci-le-sa hi a, a khan’ in kum za leh kum sawmnih hi ding hi,” ci hi. Pasian’ tapate in mihing' tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hita leh tua khit hita leh, amau’ suan-le-khak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite in tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uh hi. Leitungah mihing’ gitlohna a liatna leh mihing' lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia a hih ngitngetna thu Topa in mu hi. Leitungah mihing a bawl pen Topa khial kisa a, tua thu in ama' lungsim dahsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in, “Ka piansaksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte leh huih lak vasate, lei maitang panin ka phiatkhia ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute ka bawl ka khial hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Noah in Topa’ maipha mu hi. Hihte in Noah’ suan-le-khakte tangthu ahi hi. Noah in a thuman mi khat hi a, ama' khang-ah paubang lo hi; Noah in Pasian tawh lam paikhawm hi. Noah in tapa thum, Shem, Ham, leh Jafeth nei hi. Tu-in Pasian’ muhna-ah leitung sia a, leitung in ngongtatna tawh kidim hi. Pasian in leitung mu hi, en un, kisia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah mi khempeuh a sia-in a gamta lo kuamah om lo hi. Pasian in Noah’ kiangah, “Mi khempeuh beisak ding ka khentat zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ hangin leitung in ngongtatna tawh kidim hi; en in, leitung tawh amaute ka susia khawm ding hi. Nang adingin noah-taaksing tawh teembaw khat bawl in; teembaw sungah a deite bawl in la, a sung leh a pua kultal tui tawh zut in. Na bawl nading dan in hih bang ahi hi: teembaw a sauna tong zathum, a zaina tong sawmnga, a san’na tong sawmthum hi ding hi. Teembaw adingin kongvangneu khat bawl in la, tua tung tong khat ciangah zawl bawl in; a pang-ah teembaw kongkhak bulh in; a dawl nuainung, a dawl nihna leh a dawl thumnate bawl in. Bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, vantung nuai-a om nuntak husan’na a nei khempeuh susia dingin leitungah tuiciin ka tungsak ding hi; leitunga om khempeuh si ding hi. Ahih hangin nang tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi; teembaw sungah nang na hong pai ding hi, nang, na tapate, na zi leh na natapate' zite tawh na paikhawm ding hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuh nang tawh a nungta dingin nam khatah nih ciat teembaw sungah na paipih ding hi; tuate pen a nu leh a pa hi ding hi. Vasate amau’ nam ciatin, ganhingte amau’ nam ciatin, lei lak-a a bokvak ganhingte peuhmah amau' nam ciatin, a suakta dingin nam khatah nih ciat nang' kiangah hong pai ding uh hi. A kine an nam khempeuh zong la in la, khol in; tuate pen nang leh amaute’ adingin an ding ahi hi,” ci hi. Noah in tua mah bangin hih hi; amah in Pasian’ thupiak khempeuh hih hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Noah kiangah, “Nang leh na innkuanpihte khempeuh teembaw sungah pai un, bang hang hiam cih leh nang in hih khang mite' sung panin a thuman na hihna ka mu khin hi. Ganhing siangtho kop sagih, a nu leh a pa, ganhing a siang lote kop khat, a nu leh a pa; huih lak vasate zong kop sagih, a nu leh a pa, lei maitang tung khempeuh ah amau’ nam a man’than’ loh nadingin la in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ni sagih sungin sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi; ka bawlsa nuntakna a nei peuhmah lei maitang panin ka phiatkhia ding hi,” ci hi. Noah in Topa’ thupiak khempeuh hih hi. Leitungah tuiciin a tun’in, Noah kum zaguk pha hi. Tuiciin pelh dingin Noah, a tapate, a zi leh a tapate’ zite teembaw sungah pai uh hi. Ganhing siangthote, a siangtho lo ganhingte, vasate, leitunga a bokvak peuhmah, nih nih-in, a nu leh a pa, Pasian in Noah a thu piaksa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uh hi. Ni sagih khit cianginleitungah tuiciin tung hi. Noah’ nuntak kum zaguk kum, a kha nihna, tua kha ni sawm-le-sagih ni-in van-a om a thuk mahmah tuikhukte puakkhamin, vantung kongvangneute kihong hi. Sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung leitungah guah zu hi. Tua ni teekteekin Noah leh a tapate, Shem, Ham, Jafeth leh Noah’ zi leh a tapate’ zi thumte, amaute tawh teembaw sungah tum uh hi. Amaute leh gamsa peuhmah ama' nam ciat, leitungah a bokvak peuhmah ama' nam ciat, leh vasa peuhmah, ama' nam ciat, vasa namkim ama' nam ciatin tum uh hi. Nuntak husan’na a nei khempeuh nih nihin Noah tawh teembaw sungah pai uh hi. Pasian’ thupiaksa bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh teembaw sungah a lut khit ciangin Topa in amah kong khaknelh hi. Leitungah tuiciin ni sawmli sung om den hi; tui tam semsem a, teembaw laamto-in, leitung' tungah khangin sang to hi. Tui khang to-in leitungah tam mahmah hi; tui tungah teembaw laam hi. Leitungah tui khangkhang ahih manin van buppi nuai-a mual lian a sangte khempeuh tuumcip hi; mual liante tungah tui om a, amau tungah tong sawm-le-nga thukin tuam hi. Leitunga a nungta khempeuh, vasate, innsate, gamsate, a hon honin leitungah a hon om ganhingte khempeuh leh mi khempeuh si uh hi; leikeu tunga a om, a nak sungah nuntakna hu a om peuhmah si hi. Mihing, ganhing, a bokvakte leh huih lak vasate, lei maitang tunga om nuntakna a nei peuhmah amah in phiatkhia hi; leitung panin amaute kiphiatkhia hi. Noah leh amah tawh teembaw sunga a om teng bek suakta hi. Ni za leh ni sawmnga sung leitungah tui om hi.

Ahih hangin Pasian in Noah leh amah tawh teembaw sungah a om gamsate leh innsate khempeuh phawk hi. Pasian in leitungah huih nungsak a, tui kiam hi; tui thukte leh vantung kongvangneute kikhak a, vantung pan-a guahte kikhawlsak hi. leitung panin tuite kiamkiam hi. Ni za leh ni sawmnga a phak ciangin tuite kiam khinta hi; kha sagihna, tua kha ni sawm-le-sagih ni-in Ararat mual tungah teembaw kinga hi. A kha sawmna ciang dong tuite kiamkiam lai hi; kha sawmna, tua kha ni khat ni-in mual dawnte kidawk hi. Ni sawmli a cin’ ni ciangin Noah in ama bawlsa teembaw kongvangneu hong a, va-ak khat khah hi; leitung pan in tuite a keu mateng leeng kawikawi hi. Tua ciangin, lei maitang panin tuite a kiam khin nai hiam cih a theihna dingin amah in vakhu khat khah hi; ahih hangin, leitung maitang khempeuhah tuite om lai-in a khawl nading mu lo ahih manin teembaw-ahhong ciahkik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zan-in vakhu man a, teembaw sungah paipih hi. Amah in ni sagih sung ngakin, teembaw panin vakhu khah leuleu hi; nitak ciangin ama kiangah vakhu hong ciahkik a, en in, oliv teh a tukkhiat thak khat a kam sungah hong tunpih hi; tua ahih ciangin leitung panin tuite kiam khinta hi ci-in Noah in thei hi. Tua ciangin ni sagih sung ngak leuleu-in vakhu khah hi; tua vakhu pen ama kiangah hong ciahkik nawn lo hi. Noah a khan’ kum zaguk leh a kum khatna, a kha masa, tua kha ni masa ni-in leitung panin tuite keu hi; Noah in teembaw khuhna lakhia a, khuadak hi, en in, lei maitang keu hi. A kha nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih-le-sagih ni-in leitung keu hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah’ kiangah, “Nang leh na zi, na tapate leh na tapate’ zite teembaw sung panin paikhia un, Nang tawh a omkhawm nuntakna a nei khempeuh vasate, ganhingte leh leitunga a bokvak peuhmah –leitungah tampi suakin, pungin leitungah a tam theih nadingin nuntakna a nei peuhmah paikhiatpih in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Noah pai khia a, a tapate leh ama zi leh a tapate’ zite amah tawh paikhia khawm hi. Ganhing khempeuh, a bokvak khempeuh, vasa khempeuh, leitunga a gamtang khempeuh a innkuan kuanin teembaw panin paikhia uh hi. Tua ciangin Noah in Topa’ adingin biakna tau khat lam a, a siangtho ganhing khempeuh leh a siangtho vasa khempeuh lak pan khat ciat la-in, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna pia hi. Topa in a namtui gimnam a nap ciangin, a lungsim sungah, “Mi’ hangin leitang ka samsiat kik ngei nawn kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mi’ lungsim ngaihsutna pen a neucil panin gilo hi; tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a neite khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi. Leitung a om lai tengin, lo pawi hun leh anlak hun, a vot leh a sa, khuakhal leh phalbi, sun leh zan bei lo ding hi,” ci hi.

Pasian in Noah leh a tapate thupha pia a, amaute' tungah, “Pung un la, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un. Note hong kizahtakna leh note hong kikihtakna pen leitung ganhing khempeuh huih lak vasa khempeuh, lei lak-a a bokvak khempeuh leh tuipi ngasa khempeuh tungah om ding hi; na khut sungah amaute hong kipia hi. A nungta a gamtang peuhmah nang adingin an hi ding hi; kung hing khempeuh nang kong piak bangin na khempeuh nang kong pia hi. A nuntakna, a sisan pen, a sa tawh na ne khawm kei bek ding hi. Mi khatpeuh in nang hong thah leh ama' tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. Nang a hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah daan ka pia ding hi. Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama' lim bangin mi bawl hi. Note, pung-in khang un la; leitungah tampi tak piangkhia un la, tampi pha-in khang un,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah leh amah tawh a om a tapate’ kiangah, “En un, note leh note’ khit-a na suan-le-khakte uh leh, note tawh a om nuntakna a neite peuhmah, vasate, innsate, note tawh a om leitung gamsa peuhmah, teembaw sung pan-a a paikhia zahzah peuhmah tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi. Tuiciin tawh nuntakna a nei khempeuh susia kik ngei nawn loin, leitung asusia dingin tuiciin a om kik ngei nawn loh nadingin note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi,” ci hi. Pasian in, “Hih in, kei leh note leh note tawh a om nuntakna a neite khempeuh kikal-ah mai lam khang tawntung adingin thuciamna lim ahi hi. Meii sungah ka sakhituihup ka kaisak a, tua in kei leh leitung kikal-ah thuciamna lim hi ding hi. Leitung’ tungah meii kong kaisak ciangin meii sungah sakhituihup a kimuh leh, kei leh note leh nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikal-ah a om ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi; tuite pen, nuntakna a nei khempeuh a susia ding tuiciin suak kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Meii sungah sakhituihup a om ciangin keimah in ka en ding a, Pasian leh leitunga a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikal-ah tawntung thuciamna ka phawk ding hi,” ci hi. Pasian in Noah’ kiangah, “Hih in, kei leh leitunga a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikal-ah ka kipsaksa thuciamna lim ahi hi,” ci hi. Teembaw sung panin a paikhia Noah’ tapate in Shem, Ham leh Jafeth ahi hi. Ham in Kanaan’ pa ahi hi. Hih thumte in Noah’ tapate ahi uh hi; hihte panin leitung buppi ah a kithehthang mite hong piang hi. Noah in lokho masa pa ahi hi. Amah in leenggui lo khat bawl hi; amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin lum hi. Kanaan’ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pua lam-a om a sanggam nihte kiangah gen hi. Tua ciangin Shem leh Jafeth in puan khat la-in amaute gel’ liangko tuak-ah baang uh a, a nung leh lam-un pai-in a pa uh’ guaktang omna khuh uh hi; amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh’ guaktang omna mu lo uh hi. Noah a zukhamna pan a pilvan’ ciangin ama' tunga a tapa tum pen’ gamtatna thei a, amah in, “Kanaan in ciamsiatna ngah ta hen la, a sanggamte' tungah silate’ sila hita hen,” ci hi. Amah in, “Topa ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia hen la, Kanaan pen Shem’ sila hisak hen. Pasian in Jafeth tamsak hen la, Shem’ puanbukte sungah amah teengsak hen; Kanaan ama' sila hisak hen,” zong ci hi. Tuiciin tun’ khit ciangin Noah kum zathum leh kum sawmnga nungta hi. Noah’ khan sung teng in kum zakua leh kum sawmnga ahi hi; tua ciangin amah si hi.

Hihte in, Noah’ tapate Shem, Ham leh Jafethte’ suan-le-khakte’ tangthu ahi hi; tuiciin khit ciangin amau' sung panin tapate hong piang hi. Jefeth’ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek, leh Tiras ahi hi. Gomer’ tapate: Ashkenaz, Rifath, leh Togarmah ahi hi. Javan’ tapate: Eilishah, Tarshish, Kittim, leh Rodanim ahi hi. Hihte pen tuipi gei-a teeng mite’ pu leh pa ahi uh hi. Amaute’ leitang-ah amau’ kampau ciat zangin, a beh, a minamin om uh hi. Ham’ tapate: Kush, Izipt, Put, leh Kanaan ahi hi. Kush’ tapate: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah, leh Sabteka ahi hi. Raamah' tapate: Sheba leh Dedan ahi hi. Kush in Nimrod’ pa hi a, Nimrod in leitungah a vanglian masa mi ahi hi. Amah in Topa’ mai-ah a vanglian sabengpa zong ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin, “Nimrod bangin Topa’ mai-ah a vanglian sabengpa,” ki ci hi. Ama' kumpi gam kipatna in Babilon, Erek, Akkad leh Kalneh hi a, tuate khempeuh Shinar gamsungah om hi. Tua gam panin Assiria gamsungah amah pai a, Nineveh, Rehoboth-Ir, Kalah leh Nineveh leh Kalah kikal-a om Resen khuapite sat hi; tua in khuapi lian ahi hi. Izipt in Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite, Pathru mite, Kasluh mite, (Filistia mite’ pian’na), leh Kaftor mite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. Kanaan in ama' sung pan a suak masa Sidon, Heth leh Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite, Hiv mite, Arki mite, Sin mite, Arvad mite, Zamari mite leh Hamath mite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Kanaan mite kizelthang hi. Kanaan mite’ gam in Sidon panin kipanin Gerar lam manawhin Gaza ciang dong ban a, Sodom lam panin, Gomorrah, Admah, Zeboi-im, Lasha ciang dong ban hi. Hihte in, a innkuan, a kam pau, a leitang, a minamin Ham’ suan-le-khakte ahi uh hi. Eber mi khempeuh’ pian’na pupi, Jafeth’ u, Shem’ sung panin zong tate hong piang hi. Shem’ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud, leh Aram ahi hi. Aram’ tapate: Uz, Hul, Gether leh Mash ahi hi. Arpakshad in Shelah kici tapa nei hi; Shelah in Eber kici tapa nei hi. Eber’ sung panin tapa nih suak hi: khat’ min in Peleg ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ama' hunin leitung kikhen hi, a sanggampa’ min in Joktan ahi hi. Joktan in Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmaveth, Jerah, Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah, Obal, Abimael, Sheba, Ofir, Havilah, leh Jobab’ pian’na pa ahi hi; hihte khempeuh in Joktan’ tapate ahi uh hi. Amau’ ten’na gamsung in Mesha panin kipanin Sefar lamah nisuahna gam mual tung dong ban hi. Hihte in, a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Shem’ suan-le-khakte ahi uh hi. Hihte in Noah’ tapate’ innkuan, a khangsimna tawh kizui-in amau’ minam ahi uh hi; tuiciin khit ciangin hihte’ tung panin leitungah minamte kizelthang hi.

Tu-in leitung buppi in kampau khat leh kammal tawm nei hi. Amaute nisuahna lamah lal uh a, Shinar gamsungah zanglei mun khat mu uh a, tua lai-ah teng uh hi. Amaute khat leh khat kiangah, “Hong pai un, leiseek seekin lim takin hal ni,” kici uh hi. Amaute in suang taangin leiseek nei uh a, a buan dingin kultal tui nei uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, leitung buppi maitang-ah eite i kithehthang gawp loh nadingin ei’ adingin khuapi khat bawlin, a dawn in vantung a ban ding tausangpi khat lamin, eite’ min ding khat bawl ni,” ci uh hi. Mihingte’ lamsa khuapi leh tausangpi a en dingin Topa hong paisuk hi. Topa in, “En un, amaute in mikhat hi uh a, amaute khempeuh in kampau khat nei uh hi; hih in amau’ sep ding a kipatna bek ahi hi; tu-in sep dinga amau vaihawmte amau’ adingin hi thei nawn lo ding hi. Hong pai un, amaute khat leh khat’ thugen a kitheih loh nadingun eite paisukin amau’ kampau va kitukalhsak ni,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua lai panin leitung maitang khempeuhah amaute thehthang a, amaute in akhuapi bawl uh tawp uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin a min Babel kici hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tua munah leitung khempeuh kampau kitukalhsak hi; tua lai mun panin Topa in leitung maitang khempeuh' tungah amaute thehthang hi. Hihte in Shem’ suan-le-khakte' tangthu ahi hi. Shem kum zakhat a phak, tuiciin khit kum nih ciangin, amah in Arpakshad kici tapa khat nei hi; Arpakshad a suah khit ciangin Shem kum zanga nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Arpakshad kum sawmthum-le-nga a nuntak khit ciangin, amah in Shelah kici tapa khat nei hi; Shelah a suah khit ciangin Arpakshad kum zali leh kum thum nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Shelah kum sawmthum a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Eber kici tapa khat nei hi; Eber’ suah khit ciangin Shelah kum zali leh kum thum nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Eber kum sawmthum-le-li a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Peleg kici tapa khat nei hi; Peleg suah khit ciangin Eber kum zali leh kum sawmthum nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Peleg kum sawmthum a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Re-u kici tapa khat nei hi; Re-u a suah khit ciangin Peleg kum zanih leh kum kua nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Re-u kum sawmthum-le-nih a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Serug kici tapa khat nei hi; Serug’ suah khit ciangin Re-u kum zanih leh kum sagih nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Serug kum sawmthum a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Nahor kici tapa khat nei hi; Nahor’ suah khit ciangin Serug kum zanih nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Nahor kum sawmnih-le-kua a nuntak khit ciangin amah in Terah kici tapa khat nei hi; Terah’ suah khit ciangin Nahor kum za leh kum sawm-le-kua nungta a, tapa leh tanu dang nei lai hi. Terah kum sawmsagih a nuntak khit ciangin amah in tapa Abram, Nahor, leh Haran nei hi. Tu-in hihte in Terah’ suan-le-khakte tangthu ahi hi. Terah in Abram, Nahor leh Haran’ pa ahi hi; Haran in Lot’ pa ahi hi. Ama' pa Terah’ a sih ma-in ama suahna gam ahi Khaldea gam Ur khua-ah Haran si hi. Abram leh Nahor in zi nei uh hi; Abram’ zi’ min in Sarai hi a, Nahor’ zi’ min in Milkah hi-in Haran’ tanu ahi hi. Haran in Milkah leh Iskah-te’ pa ahi hi. Tu-in Sarai ciing hi; amah in ta nei lo hi. Terah in ama' tapa Abram leh Haran’ tapa Lot, ama' tupa leh a tapa Abram’ zi ahi a monu Sarai la-in, Kanaan gamsungah pai dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin amaute paikhia khawm uh hi; ahih hangin amaute Haran a tun’ uh ciangin tua munah teng uh hi. Terah’ khan’ sung in kum zanih leh kum nga ahi hi; Haran-ah Terah si hi.

Tu-in Topa in Abram’ kiangah, “Na gam leh na beh leh na pa’ inn panin nang kong lah ding gamah pai in. Thupha a ngah dingin minam lian khatin nang hong bawlin, thupha hong pia-in, na min kong liansak ding a, nang in thupha na hi ding hi. Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia ding a, nang hong samsia mi ka samsia ding hi; nang’ tung tawnin leitung innkuan khempeuh in thupha ngah ding uh hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ gensa bangin Abram pai hi; Lot in zong amah zui hi. Haran panin a paikhiat-in Abram kum sawmsagih-le-nga pha hi. Abram in ama’ zi Sarai, a sanggampa’ tapa Lot, amau’ kaihkhopsa neihsa khempeuh leh Haran-a amau’ neih mi khempeuh sam a, Kanaan gamah pai dingin amaute dingkhia uh hi. Amaute Kanaan gam a tun’ uh ciangin, Abram in tua gam nawkin Shekhem mun, Moreth tawsaw phung tung hi. Tua hunin tua gamah Kanaan mite teng lai hi. Tua ciangin Abram’ tungah Topa kilang a, “Na suan-le-khakte' tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in ama' tunga kilang Topa adingin biakna tau khat bawl hi. Tua ciangin Beth-el panin nisuahna lam mual-ah amah kin kikin, a puanbuk lam a, nitumna lamah Beth-el, nisuahna lamah Ai om hi; tua lai munah zong amah in Topa’ adingin biaknatau khat bawl a, Topa’ tungah thungen hi. Abram in a khualzin zom lai a, Negeb gam lam manawhin pai lai hi. Tu-in gamsungah kialpi tung hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua gamah kialpi nasia ahih manin Abram tawlkhat sung a om dingin Izipt-ah paisuk hi. Izipt gam a tum ding ciangin amah in a zi Sarai’ kiangah, “Nang pen, a melhoih numei khat na hihna ka thei hi; Izipt mite in nang hong muh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih nu in ama zi ahi hi,’ ci ding uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in kei hong that ding uh a, ahi zongin amaute in nang hong nungtasak ding uh hi. Nang pen ka sanggamnu ci lehang, nangma’ hangin kei’ adingin thu hong hoihzaw ding a, nangma’ hangin ka suakta thei kha ding hi,” ci hi. Izipt gamsungah Abram a tun ciangin Izipt mite in tua nu pen melhoih mahmah hi ci-in mu uh hi. Faro’ uliante in amah a muh uh ciangin Faro’ kiangah amah phat uh hi. Faro’ inn sungah tua nu kila hi. Tua nu’ hangin amah in Abram limbawl mahmah hi; amah in tuu, bawngtal, la-tal, pasal-nasem, numei-nasem, la-nu, leh kalaohte pia hi. Ahih hangin Topa in Abram’ zi Sarai’ huhau-in Faro leh a innkuanpihte gimna lianpi thuaksak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Abram samin, “Kei tunga nong bawlna hih thu in bang ahi hiam? Amah na zi a hihna bang hang in kei kiangah hong gen lo na hi hiam? Ka zi dingin amah ka lak theih nadingin, ‘Amah in ka sanggamnu hi,’ bang hangin ci na hi hiam? Tu-in hih lai-ah na zi om hi, amah la in la pai un,” ci hi. Faro in amah tawh kisai-in a mite' tungah thupia hi; amaute in a zi leh ama' neih khempeuh tawh lampi-ah amah kha uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Abram, Izipt panin amah leh a zi, ama’ neih khempeuh leh Lot tawh zong Negeb gam lamah paito hi. Tu-in Abram in ganhing, ngun, leh kham hau mahmah hi. Amah Negeb gam pan kipanin Beth-el ciang dong, a kipat cil-a ama’ puanbuk a omna-sa mun Beth-el leh Ai kikal, a masa-a biakna tau khat a bawlnasa munah khualzinin paisuak hi; tua lai munah Abram in Topa’ tungah thungen hi. Abram tawh a pai khawm Lot in zong tuuhon leh ganhon leh puanbukte nei a, tua ahih manin mun khat-a teng khawm dingin leitang in amaute gel vak zo lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ neihsate tam mahmah ahih manin amaute teng khawm thei lo uh a, Abram’ gancingte leh Lot’ gancingte kitawng zel hi. Tua hun lai takin Kanaan mite leh Perez mite tua gamah teng uh hi. Tua ciangin Abram in Lot kiangah, “Nang leh kei’ kikal, nang’ gancingte leh kei’ gancingte’ kikal-ah kitotna omsak kei ni; bang hang hiam cih leh eite a kibeh i hi hi. Na mai-ah gam buppi om hilo ahi hiam? Kei’ kiang panin nangmah paikhia tawm in. Nang in veilam na lak leh, kei taklam-ah ka pai ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong, nang in taklam na lak leh, kei veilam-ah ka pai ding hi,” ci hi. Lot zong khuadak a, Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh in lim takin tui ngahin, Topa’ huan hita leh, Zoar lam-a Izipt gam tawh hita leh kibang hi ci-in mu hi; hih pen Topa in Sodom leh Gomorrah a suksiat hun ma ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin Lot in ama adingin Jordan kuam khempeuh teel a, Lot nisuahna lamah pai hi; tua ahih manin amaute kikhen tuak uh hi. Kuam sunga khuapite' lakah Lot tengin a puanbukte Sodom ciang dongah khinin a om laitakin Kanaan gamsungah Abram teng hi. Tu-in Sodom mite mi gilo uh a, Topa’ tungah nakpi tak-a a khialte ahi uh hi. Ama’ kiang panin Lot a paikhiat khit ciangin Topa in Abram’ kiangah, “Khuadak to in la, nangma' omna panin leilu lam, leitaw lam, nisuahna lam leh nitumna lam en in; bang hang hiam cih leh na muh gam khempeuh nang leh na suan-le-khakte’ tungah kong pia paisuak ding hi. Na suan-le-khakte leitung leivui zahin ka bawl ding hi; mi khatpeuh in leitung leivui a sim theih leh na suan-le-khakte zong kisim thei ding hi. Tho in la, gam dung gam vai kan tanin pai in, bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah kong pia ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abram in a puanbuk khinin, Hebron gamsung, Mamre tawsawte’ gei-ah hong pai-in teng hi; tua lai munah Topa adingin biakna tau khat a bawl hi.

Shinar kumpipa Amrafel, Ellasar kumpipa Ariok, Elam kumpipa Khedorla-omer, Goi-im kumpipa Tidalte’ hun lai-in, hih kumpite in Sodom kumpipa Bera, Gomorrah kumpipa Birsha, Admah kumpipa Shinab, Zeboi-im kumpipa Shemeber leh Bela (Zoar) kumpipa ahi kumpi ngate va sim uh hi. Hih kumpi ngate in kipawlna bawlin Siddim Kuam (Ci Tuipi)—ah a thahatna uh gawm hi. Amaute in kum sawm-le-nih sung Khedorla-omer’ khut nuai-ah om uh a, ahih hangin a kum sawm-le-thumna ciangin amaute in lehdo uh hi. A kum sawm-le-li-na ciangin Khedorla-omer leh amah tawh a kipawl kumpite hong pai-in gamlak gamgi Elparan ciang dongah Ashteroth-Karnaim gam-a Refaim, Hamgam-a Zuzim, Shavehkiriathain gam-a Emin, leh amau’ gam Seir Mual tunga Hori mite sehnel gamgei a, om El-paran dong hong zo uh hi; tua ciangin amaute kihei kikin Enmishpat (Kadesh) ah hong pai uh a, Amalek mite’ gam khempeuhleh Hazazontamar gam-a a teng Amor mite zong zo uh hi. Tua ciangin Sodom kumpipa, Gomorrah kumpipa, Admah kumpipa, Zeboi-im kumpipa leh Bela (Zoar) kumpipa kuankhia uh a, amaute kipawlin Siddim Kuam-ah Elam kumpipa Khedorla-omer, Goi-im kumpipa Tidal, Shinar kumpipa Amrafel leh Ellaser kumpipa Ariok tawh kido uh hi, kumpi li kigawm leh kumpi nga kigawm kido uh hi. Tu-in Siddim Kuam in kultal khukte tawh kidim hi; Sodom leh Gomorrah kumpite a tai uh ciangin pawl khat tua khukte sungah kia uh a, a om lai teng mual tungah tai uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin galte in Sodom leh Gommorahte’ na khempeuh leh a an khempeuh uh la-in ciah uh hi; amaute in Sodom-a a teng Abram’ sanggampa’ tapa Lot leh ama na khempeuh zong la uh a, pai khia uh hi. Tua ciangin a suakta mi khat hong pai-in, Hebru mi Abram’ kiangah hong gen hi. Amah pen Eshkol leh Aner’ sanggampa ahi hi. Amor mi hi a, Mamre’ tawsawte gei-ah teng hi; hih mite pen Abram’ kipawlpihte ahi hi. Ama’ behpa sal-in a kimatna Abram in a zak ciangin, ama inn sunga a suak, a kihilhsa ama' mi zathum leh sawm-le-giatte makaihin Dan ciang dong a delhin pai uh hi. Amah in amaute do dingin zan hunin ama' pawlte, amah leh a nasemte khenin amaute zo a, Damaskas leilu lam Hobah ciang dong delh uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in na khempeuh, Lot leh ama na khempeuh, numeite leh mihingte ngahkikin ciahpih hi. Abram in Khedorla-omer kumpipa leh a pawlte a zawhna panin a ciahkik ciangin Sodom kumpipa in amah dawn dingin Shaveh Kuam (Kumpipa’ Kuam)-ah na pai hi. Tua ciangin Salem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi; amah in Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi. Amah in Abram thupha pia a, “Vantung leh leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen; na galte na khut sungah a hong pia, Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen!” ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat ama' tungah pia hi. Sodom kumpipa in Abram kiangah, “A mite hong pia in la, ahih hangin a nate nang adingin la in,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Abram in Sodom kumpipa' kiangah, “Vantung leh leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Topa Pasian' tungah ka kiciam khin zo hi, nangmah in, ‘Abram ka hausak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manin mimkhau ahi a, khedap khau ahi a, nangma’ aa ahi na khatpeuh peuh ahi zongin ka la kei ding hi. Tangvalte’ neksakte leh kei tawh hong kuan mite’ tanh dingte lo buang bangmah ka la kei ding hi; Aner, Eshkol leh Mamre-te amau’ tanh ding la sak in,” ci hi.

Hih thute khit ciangin mang sungah Topa’ thu Abram’ tungah hong tung a, Abram aw, lau kei in, keimah in nangma' lum ka hi hi; na thaman lian mahmah ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Abram in, “Topa PASIAN aw, bang hong pia ding na hi hiam? Ta nei loin ka om lai hi, ka inn a luah dingpa in Damaskas mi Eliezer ahi hi. Ta nong pia kei a, ka inn sunga a suak sila in keima gamhluah hi ding hi,” ci hi. En in, ama tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a, “Hih mipa in nangma gamhluahpa hilo ding hi; nangma' tapa mahmah na gamhluahpa hi ding hi,” ci hi. Amah in a pua lamah paipih a, “Vantung lam enin aksite sim in, na sim zo hiam?” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na suan-le-khakte tua mah bang ding hi,” ci hi. Amah in Topa um hi; tua ahih manin ahi ding bangin Abram gamta hi, ci-in Topa in ciamteh hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Hih leitang na neih nadinga nangma’ tungah a hong pia dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin a hong paikhiatpihpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa PASIAN aw, keimah in tua ka neih nading bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Kum thum a pha bawngla khat, kum thum a pha keelnu khat, kum thum a pha tuutal khat, vakhu khat leh kawl vakhu khang lai khat hong paipih in,” ci hi. Amah in ama' kiangah hihte khempeuh paipih a, tuate phel nih suahin, phel khat pen a phel khat tungah koih ciat hi; ahih hangin vasate phel nih suah lo hi. Sasialne vasate tua sate' tungah hong tuksuk ciangin Abram in tuate hawlkhia hi. Ni a tum ciangin Abram a ihmut nak suah mahmah hi; en in, ama' tungah a kihtakhuai khuamial sahpi om hi. Tua ciangin Topa in Abram kiangah, “Na suan-le-khakte amau’ leitang ahi lo munah tawl khat omin, tua lai-ah amaute sila hi ding uh a, amaute kum zali sung kinengniam ding a hihna thu a kitel theihna thei in; ahih hangin na a sepsak uh minam’ tungah thukhenna ka tungsak ding a, tua khit ciangin neihsa tampi tawh amaute paikhia ding uh hi. Nangma pumpi ading ahih leh, nuamtakin na pate’ kiang na zuan ding hi; nang pen khan’ kicingin hong kivui ding hi. Khang lina ciangin hih lai munah amaute hong paikik ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Amor mite’ mawhna kicing nai lo hi,” ci hi. Ni tumin khua a mial khit ciangin, en in, hih sate kikal-ah mei beel khu leh a kuang meivak pai hi. Tua ni-in Topa in Abram tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, “Na suan-le-khakte tungah hih leitang, Izipt gun panin a lian gunpi ahi Eufrates gun ciang dong, Ken mite, Kenaz mite, Kadmon mite Hit mite, Perez mite, Refaim mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Girgash mite leh Jebus mite’ leitang ka pia hi,” ci hi.

Tu-in Abram’ zi Sarai in ta nei lo hi. Amah in Hagar min nei Izipt mi numei- nasem khat nei hi; Sarai in Abram’ kiangah, “Tu-in en in, Topa in ka ta neih ding hong khaktan hi; ka numei-nasem nu’ kiangah lum in; ama' sung panin keimah in ta a nei ding ka hi kha ding hi,” ci hi. Abram in Sarai’ thu mang hi. Tua ahih ciangin, Kanaan leitangah Abram kum sawm a ten’ khit ciangin Abram’ zi Sarai in Izipt mi a numei-nasem Hagar la-in a pasal Abram’ tungah zi-in pia hi. Amah in Hagar luppih a, Hagar gai hi; amah a gai lam a kitheih ciangin kiphasakin a tonu simmawh bawl hi. Sarai in Abram’ kiangah, “Keimatungah a man lo-a hong kibawlna nangma' tungah hong tung ta hen! Nangma’ kawi dingin ka numei-nasem kong pia a, amah a gai khitna a kitheih ciangin kei hong simmawh bawlin, Topa in nang leh kei’ kikalah thu hong khen ta hen!” ci hi. Ahih hangin Abram in Sarai’ kiangah, “En in, na numei-nasemnangma’ khut sungah om hi; na ut bangin ama' tungah bawl in,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Sarai in amah gawt bawl a, Hagar zong taikhia hi. Topa’ vantungmi in Shur paina lampi-a cik ahi, gamlak-a ciktui gei khatah amah mu hi. Amah in, “Sarai’ numei-nasem Hagar aw, koi pan hong pai a, koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Ka tonu Sarai’ kiang panin a taikhia ka hi hi,” ci hi. Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Na tonu' kiangah ciahkik in la, ama' tungah ki-ap in,” ci hi. Topa’ vantungmi in ama' kiangah, “Na suan-le-khakte nakpi takin tamsak ding ka hih manin amaute kisim zo lo ding hi,” zong ci lai hi. Topa’ vantungmi in ama' kiangah, “En in, nau na paai a, tapa khat na nei ding hi; ama' min Ishmael na phuak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nangma' thuakna hong mu khin hi. Amah in mipa’ laa zual nai lo bang hi ding a, amah in mi khempeuh langpang-in mi khempeuh in ama' langpang ding hi; ama' behte khempeuh a langkhat lamah amah om ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama' tungah thu a gen Topa pen, “Nang in a mu thei Pasian khat na hi hi,” ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keimah in Pasian mu khin taktakin amah ka muh khit ciangin hing lai hilo ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua tuikhuk pen Be-erlahairoi kici hi; Kadesh leh Bered kikal-ah om hi. Hagar in Abram tawh tapa khat nei hi; Abram in Hagar’ sung pan-a a suak ama’ tapa min Ishmael ci hi. Hagar in Abram tawh a neih Ishmael a suah ciangin Abram kum sawmgiat-le-guk pha ta hi.

Abram kum sawmkua-le-kua a phak ciangin ama’ tungah Topa kilang a, “Keimah in Vanglian Pasian ka hi hi; hoih takin gamta in la, paubaang kei in. Kei leh nang' kikal-ah ka thuciamna ka bawl ding a, nang tampi tak kong phasak ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Abram mai kun suk hi; Pasian in ama' kiangah, “En in, nang' tungah hih thuciamna kong bawl hi: Nang in minam honpite’ pa na hi ding hi. Na min in Abram hi nawn lo ding a, Abraham hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh minam honpite’ pa-in nang kong bawl khin hi. Keimah in suan-le-khak tampi kong neisak ding hi; nang' sung panin minamte ka piangsak ding a, nang' sung panin kumpite hong piangkhia ding hi. Nang leh nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte' tungah Pasian ka hihna ding tawntung thuciam nadingin kei leh nang leh nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte’ kikal-ah amau' khang tawntungin ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi. Nangma' tung leh nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte’ tungah tawlkhat na omna Kanaan leitang khempeuh na neih tawntung dingun kong pia ding hi; keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi,” ci hi. Pasian in Abraham’ kiangah, “Nang leh nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte in zong ka thuciamna na zuih ding uh nong thukim ding uh ahi hi. Hih in kei leh nang leh nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte’ kikalah note’ zuih ding keima thuciamna ahi hi: Note’ lak panin pasal peuhmah vun ki-at ding hi. Note’ vun dawn ki-at ding a, tua in kei leh note’ kikalah thuciamna lim khat hi ding hi. Note' lak panin ni giat a pha peuhmahpa’ vun ki-at ding hi; note’ khang tawntungin pasal peuhmah, note’ inn sunga suak hita leh, note’ ta ahi lo, gamdang mi khatpeuh kiang panin na sum uh tawh na lei uh hita leh, na inn sunga suak hita leh, na sum tawh a kileipa hita leh vun ki-at tuak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tawntung thuciamna ahi keima thuciamna in nomau’ satak sungah om ding hi. Ama vun dawn a ki-at lo, vun a ki-at lo pasal peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi; amah in keima thuciamna palsat hi,” ci hi. Pasian in Abraham’ kiangah, “Na zi Sarai ahih leh, ama' min Sarai na ci nawn kei ding a, ama' min Sarah hi ding hi. Amah thupha ka pia ding a, amah tawh tapa khat kong pia ding hi; amah thupha ka pia ding a, amah in minamte’ nu hi ding hi; mihingte’ kumpite ama' sung pan hong piangkhia ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Abraham mai kun sukin nui a, amahmah' tungah, “Kum za a pha pasal khat in ta nei ding ahi hiam? Kum sawmkua a pha Sarah in ta nei ding ahi hiam?” kici hi. Abraham in Pasian’ kiangah, “Ishmael hong nungtasak peuh lecin,” ci hi. Pasian in, “Hi lo hi, na zi Sarah in nang’ adingin tapa khat nei ding a, ama' min Isaak na ci ding hi. Ama' khit cianga a suan-le-khakte adingin tawntung thuciamna dingin ka thuciamna amah tawh ka kipsak ding hi. Ishmael’ ading na ngetna ahih leh ka za khin hi; en in, amah thupha pia-in ka pungsak ding a, tampi tak ka phasak ding hi; amah in ulian sawm-le-nihte’ pa hi ding a, minam lian khatin amah ka bawl ding hi. Ahih hangin, kum kik tu hun ciangin Sarah sung panin nang adinga hong suak ding Isaak tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi,” ci hi. Amah tawh a kiho a man khit ciangin Abraham' kiang panin Pasian paikhia to hi. Tua ciangin Abraham in a tapa Ishmael leh ama' sum tawh a lei hita leh ama' inn sunga suak hita leh a sila khempeuh, ama' inn sunga om mite' lak panin pasal khempeuh samin, Pasian in ama' tunga a gensa bangin tua ni mahmahin amaute’ vun dawn atsak hi. Ama' vun dawn a ki-atin Abraham kum sawmkua-le-kua pha hi; ama' vun dawn a ki-at hunin a tapa Ishmael kum sawm-le-thum pha hi. Tua ni mahmahin Abraham leh a tapa Ishmaelte a vun uh ki-at hi; ama' inn sunga pasal khempeuh, inn sunga suak hita leh gamdang mite’ tung pan-a sum tawh a kilei mite hita leh, amah tawh a vun uh ki-at khawm hi.

Abraham a puanbuk kongkhak-ah sun nisat laitak, tu-in a om lai takin Mamre tawsawte' gei-ah ama' tungah Topa kilang hi. Amah khuadak to hi, en in, mi thum ama' mai-ah na ding hi. Amah in amaute a muh ciangin amaute' dawn dingin puanbuk kongkhak panin va tai a, lei lakah kun sukin, “Ka Topa aw, nong hehpihna-in na nasempa hong kheng kei in. 4-5 Na nasempa' kiang hong tung khin na hih buangun—na thahat kik nadingun an tawm khat ka va lak kikal sungin tui tawmkhat la sakin na khe uh sil un la, sing nuai-ah khawl un, tua khit ciangin paisuak un,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “Na cihbangin hong hih in,” ci uh hi. Puanbuk sunga Sarah’ kiangah Abraham pai mengmeng a, “Annel hoihte lawh thum hong bawl mengmeng in la, meek manin mohin hong bawl in,” ci hi. Abraham bawnghon lakah tai-in bawngno a dawng a hoih khat la a, a nasempa' tungah manlang tak-a a na bawl pah dingin pia hi. Tua ciangin, amah in bawngnawi-thaukhal, bawngnawi, a minsa bawngno sa la-in amau’ mai-ah lui hi; amaute in a nek lai takun sing nuai-a amau' kiangah amah ding hi. Amaute in ama' kiangah, “Na zi Sarah koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci uh hi. Amah in, “Puanbuk sungah om hi,” ci hi. Topa in, “Tu zawh kum khat, kumkik ciangin kong pai kik taktak ding a, na zi Sarah in tapa khat nei ding hi,” ci hi. Sarah in ama' nung puanbuk kong-ah na ngai hi. Tu-in Abraham leh Sarah teek uh a, a kum uh ham hi; Sarah a numei ngeina teng tawpta hi. Tua ahih ciangin Sarah amahmah nui-in, “Kei ka teek khit, ka topa zong a teek khitin nopsakna nei ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Topa in Abraham' tungah, “Bang hangin Sarah nui-in, ‘Tu-in kei teek ka hih ciangin ta nei takpi ding ka hi hiam,’ ci ahi hiam? Na khatpeuh peuh Topa’ adingin haksa lua ahi hiam? A kisehsa kumkik ciangin nang' kiangah kong pai kik ding a, Sarah in tapa khat nei ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Sarah in nialin, “Ka nui kei hi,” ci hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau hi. Amah in, “Hi lo hi, na nui mah hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin tua mun panin mite paikhia a, amaute in Sodom lam en uh hi; amau’ pai nading lampi-ah a kha dingin Abraham in amaute va zui hi. 17-19 Topa in a lungsimah, “Abraham a lian a thahat minam suakin, leitung minam khempeuh in ama' tung tawnin thupha ngah ahih manin, tu-a ka hih ding thu Abraham’ tungah im ding ka hi hiam? Im kei ning. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Abraham’ tunga a ciamsa thu a tun’sak theih nadingin ama' khit-a a tate leh a innkuanpihte in thuman leh thutang-a nasepna tawh Topa’ thupiakte a zuih theih nadingun a hilh dingin amah ka teel khin hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Sodom leh Gomorrah a kimawhsakna lianin amaute’ khialhna nasia mahmah hi, kici ahih manin, kei' tunga hong kigen bangin amaute gamta takpi uh hiam ci-in a thei dingin ka paisuk ding hi; tua bang ahih kei leh, ke’n ka thei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua panin mite kihei-in Sodom lamah pai uh hi; ahih hangin Topa’ mai-ah Abraham ding lai hi. Tua ciangin Abraham in hong naihin, “Thuman mite mi gilote tawh susia khawm takpi ding na hi hiam? Gentehna-in, khuapi sungah thuman mi sawmnga om leh; tua sunga om thuman mi sawmngate’ hangin khah loin tua mun susia teitei ding na hi hiam? Thuman mite in mi gilote tawh a kibat nadingin mi gilote tawh thuman mite thah khawm ding, hi thei ahi hiam? Tua pen hi thei lo ding hi. Leitung khempeuh Thukhenpa a manin gamta lo ding ahi hiam?” ci hi. Topa in, “Sodom khuapi sungah thuman mi sawmnga ka muh leh, amaute’ hangin tua mun buppi ka khah ding hi,” ci hi. Abraham in thu gen a, “En in, leivui leh vut ahi lel keimah in Topa’ tungah thu kong gen ngamna hong maisak in. Gentehna-in, thuman mi sawmnga sung panin nga om kei leh? Tua nga a om loh manin khuapi buppi na susia veve ding hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Tua sungah sawmli-le-nga ka muh nak leh ka susia kei ding hi,” ci hi. Ama' kiangah thu gen kikin, “Gentehna-in, tua sungah sawmli kimu leh,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmlite’ hangin ka hih kei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa heh kei in, thu kong gen ding hi. Gentehna-in, tua lai-ah sawmthum kimu leh,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmthum ka muh leh ka hih kei ding hi,” ci hi. Amah in, “En in, Topa tungah thu kong gen ngam lailaina hong maisak in. Gentehna-in, tua lai-ah sawmnih kimu leh,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmnihte’ hangin ka susia kei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa heh kei in, hih khat vei bek thu hong gensak lai in. Gentehna-in, tua lai-ah sawm kimu leh,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmte’ hangin ka susia kei ding hi,” ci hi. Abraham' tungah a thugen ding a man khit ciangin ama' paina dingah Topa pai a, Abraham zong ama' innah ciahkik hi.

Vantungmi nihte Sodom-ah nitakin hong tung uh hi; Sodom khua kulh kongpi-ah Lot na tu hi. Lot in amaute a muh ciangin, amaute dawn dingin ding a, lei lakah a mai ngatin kunin, “Ka tote aw, kong thum hi, na nasempa’ inn lamah hong kihei un la, hong giak un, na khete uh sil un; tua ciangin zingsangin tho baihin na pai nading lam uhah pai pan un,” ci hi. Amaute in, “Hi lo hi; khua sung tualpi-ah ka giak ding uh hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in amaute nakpi takin kun hi; tua ahihciangin amaute ama' lamah kihei a, ama' innah lut uh hi; amah in amaute adingin an bawl a, silngo sawh loh anlum em hi, amaute in ne uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute’ lup ma-in khua sung mi, Sodom khuamite, a moi a ham-in mi khempeuh in a inn umcih uh hi; amaute in Lot sam a, “Tu nitak-a nang’ kianga hong tung mite koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amau’ taw ka luk theih nadingun ko kiangah amaute hong paikhiatpih in,” ci uh hi. Kongkhak pualam-a mite' kiangah Lot pai-in kong lehkhak a, “Ka sanggamte aw, tua banga na gitloh gamtat loh nading uh kong thum hi. En un, ta nungak nih ka nei hi; no' kiangah amaute hong paikhiat pihsak un la, na ut bangun amaute' tungah bawl un; hih mite' tungah bangmah bawl kei bek un, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute keima' inn sung hong tung khin uh hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “Taikhia in!” ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Kote’ kiangah hong peem pak a, tu-in nang thukhen hong kineih! Tu-in amaute' sangin nang kong siatbawl zaw ding uh hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in nakpi takin Lot’ lam hong neh uh a, kongkhak a phukham zah dongin hong neh uh hi. Ahih hangin mi nihte in amau’ khut hong zan-in inn sung amau' kiangah Lot paipih uh a, kong khak uh hi. Inn kongkhak-a om mi a neu a liante amaute in a mit uh tawsak a, tua ahih ciangin kongkhak a zawt zawt hangun mu zo lo uh hi. Tua ciangin mi nihte in Lot kiangah, “Hih lai-ah tanau dang na nei hiam? Makte, tapate, tanute, ahih kei leh khua sunga nang’ mi peuhpeuh hih mun panin paikhiatpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite a kimawhsakna thu lianpi Topa’ tungah tung khin a, a susia dingin Topa in kote hong sawl khin ahih ciangin hih mun a susia ta ding ka hi uh hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Lot paikhia-in a tanute a ten’pih ding a mak dingte' kiangah, “Tho un, hih mun panin paikhia un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in khuapi a susia ding hi ta hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah a mak dingte tungah a ciamnui bang lel hi. Zingsang khua vak ciangin vantungmite in, “Khuapi dan piakna sungah kangtum kha ding na hih uh ciangin tho in la, hih lai-a om na zi leh na tanute la in,” ci-in Lot sawl hamtang uh hi. Ahih hangin amah lungka-in om lai veve hi; tua ahih ciangin, Topa in ama' tungah hehpihna nei ahih manin, mite in amah leh a zi leh a tanu nihte a khut uh tawh manin, amaute in amah paikhiatpih-in khua pua lamah koih uh hi. Amaute in a paikhiatpih khit uh ciangin, “Na nuntak nadingin tai un; nunghei kei un la, kuam sungah zong khawl kei un; note hong kangtum kha ding ahih manin mual tungah tai to un,” ci uh hi. Lot in amaute' tungah, “Hi lo hi, ka tote aw; en un, note’ muhna-ah na nasempa in maipha mu zo a, ka nuntakna nong hutna uhah migitna lianpi kei' tungah nong lak khin uh hi; ahih hangin mualtung gamla ahih manin ka tun’ ma-in siatna in kei hong pha-in ka si ding hi. En un, gal-a om khuapi tai nadingin nai a, a neu khuapi khat ahi hi. Tua lai-ah hong taisak un—a neu khat hilo ahi hiam?—tua hi leh ka suakta ding hi,” ci hi. Amah in ama' kiangah, “En in, na gensa khuapi ka lumlet loh nading, hih ngetna zong nang kong pia hi. Kinawh in la, tua lai-ah tai in; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah nang na tun’ mateng ke’n bangmah ka hih thei kei hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min Zoar kici hi. Zoar-ah Lot a tun ciangin tua lai-ah ni suak khin ta hi. Tua ciangin Topa in vantung panin Sodom leh Gomorrah tungah kaat leh meikuang zusak hi; amah in tua khuapite, kuamte khempeuh, khuapite sunga mi tengte khempeuh leh leitunga a po khempeuh susia hi. Ahih hangin a nunga om Lot’ zi nunghei a, amah cikhuam suak hi. Topa mai-ah a dinnasa munah zingsang tungin Abraham va pai hi; amah in Sodom leh Gomorrah leh kuamte khempeuh lam nga sukin khuadak hi, en in, leitang khu pen meiphualpi khu bangin kahto hi. Pasian in kuam sunga khuapite a suksiat lai-in, Pasian in Abraham phawk a, amah in Lot’ ten’na khuapite a suksiat ciangin tua bang a suksiatna sung panin Lot sawlkhia a, tua bangin a piang ahi hi. Tu-in Zoar panin Lot paikhia to-in a tanu nihte tawh mual tungah teng hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Zoar-ah a ten’ ding lau hi; tua ahih ciangin a tanu nihte tawh suanghawm sung khatah teng uh hi. A u pen in a nau' tungah, “I pa teek a, leitung khempeuh ngeina bangin eite hong luppih ding pasal khat zong om lo hi. Hong pai in, i pa leenggahzu khamsak ni, i pa tawh suan-le-khak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lum khawm ni,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi; a u nu pai-in a pa tawh lum hi; a tanu a lup lam hita leh a thawh lam hita leh amah in thei lo hi. A zing ciangin a u in a nau tungah, “En in, zan zan-in i pa tawh ka lum hi; tu nitakin zong amah leenggahzu khamsak ni; tua ciangin nang pai in la, i pa tawh suan-le-khak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lum khawm in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin zong a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi; a nau pai-in amah tawh lum hi; a tanu a lup lam hita leh a thawh lam hita leh amah in thei lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Lot’ tanute gel in a pa uh tawh ta nei uh hi. A u in tapa khat nei-in ama min Moab phuak hi; amah in tu hun-a Moab mite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi. A nau in zong tapa khat nei a, a min Ben-ammi phuak hi; amah in tu donga Ammon mite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi.

Tua mun panin Negeb gamah Abraham paisuk a, Kadesh leh Shur kikal Gerar-ah tawl khat sung teng hi. Abraham in a zi Sarah pen, “Ka sanggamnu hi,” ci hi. Gerar kumpipa Abimelek in mi sawl-in Sarah samsak hi. Ahih hangin zan-in mang sungah Abimelek kiangah Pasian pai a, ama' kiangah, “En in, na laksa numei’ hangin nang in a si ding na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mi khat’ zi ahi hi,” ci hi. Tu-in Abimelek in amah zuan nai lo hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang in mi dikpa that ding na hi hiam? Amahmah in kei kiangah, ‘Amah in ka sanggamnu ahi hi,’ hong ci hilo ahi hiam? A numei mahmah in zong, ‘Amah in ka sanggampa ahi hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin lungsim kisuang het loin a gamta ka hi a, khial ka kisa kei hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in mang sungah ama' kiangah, “Hi hi, lungsim kisuan’na om loin hih bangin na gamtatna thu ka thei a, kei' tungah na khialh loh nadinga hong kempa in keimah ka hi hi; tua ahih ciangin nangmah kong lawngsak kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mipa’ zi pia kik in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kamsangpa khat hi a, amah in nang’ adingin thu hong ngetsak ding a, nang na nungta ding hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua numei na piak kik kei leh nang leh na neih khempeuh na sih taktak ding uh thei in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abimelek tho baih a, a nasemte samin hih thute khempeuh amaute' kiangah gen hi; amaute nak lau mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Abimelek in Abraham samin ama' kiangah, “Kote tungah bang hong bawl na hi hiam? Kei leh ka kumpigamsungah khialhna lianpi khat nong tut nadingin nang' tungah bang hong ci khialh ka hi hiam? Hih dinga kilawm lo nate kei’ tungah nong hih hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Abimelek in Abraham kiangah, “Hih banga na gamtat nadingin bang ngaihsun na hi hiam?” ci hi. Abraham in, “Hih lai munah Pasian zahtakna om het lo hi, ka zi’ hangin amaute in kei hong that ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun kha ka hih manin hih bangin ka gamta hi. Tua tham loin a taktakin amah in ka sanggamnu mah ahi hi, pa kikhat, nu tuam ka hi uh hi; amah ka tenpih hi. Pasian in ka pa’ inn panin hong paikhiatsak ciangin ama' kiangah, ‘Hih in kei tunga nong hih ding na migitna ahi hi: I paina peuhpeuh-ah kei pen, ka sanggampa hi,’ hong ci-in, ka ci hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Abimelek in tuu leh bawngtalte, pasal-sila leh numei-silate la-in Abraham pia a, ama' tungah a zi Sarah piakik hi. Abimelek in, “En in, ka leitang in na mai-ah om hi; nangmah in hoih nasakna munah teng in,” ci hi. Sarah’ kiangah, “En in, na sanggampa’ tungah ngun shekel tul khat ka pia khin hi; nang tawh a om mite khempeuh’ mai-ah nangma' dikna a kilatna ahi hi; mi khempeuh’ mai-ah nang a manin hong kibawl hi,” amah in ci hi. Tua ciangin Abraham in Pasian' tungah thungen a, Pasian in Abimelek damsak hi. Amaute in ta a neih theih nadingin a zi leh a numei-silate zong damsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Abraham’ zi Sarah’ hangin Abimelek’ innkuan’ naubu khempeuh khakcipsak khin hi.

A gensa bangin Topa in Sarah' tungah thupha pia a, a gensa bangin Sarah’ tungah Topa in hih hi. Sarah gai hi, ama' tunga Pasian in a gensa hunin a teek zawhin Abraham tawh tapa khat nei hi. Abraham in Sarah tawh a neih ama' tapa’ min Isaak phuak hi. Pasian in ama' tunga a thu piaksa bangin amah in ni giat a phak ciangin Abraham in a tapa Isaak a vun at hi. A tapa Isaak a suah ciangin Abraham kum za pha hi. Sarah in, “Pasian in kei’ adingin nuam-a nuihzak nading hong bawlsak khin hi; a za peuhmah in nuamin hong nuihpih ding uh hi,” ci hi. Amah in, “Sarah in nau nawi pia ding ci-in kua in Abraham’ tungah gen ngei ding ahi hiam? Ahi zongin a teek khitin amah tawh tapa khat ka nei hi,” ci hi. Naupang khang a, nawi tawh hong kikhen ta hi; Isaak nawi tawh a kikhen ni ciangin Abraham in pawi lianpi khat bawl hi. Ahih hangin, Abraham tawh a neih Izipt-nu Hagar’ tapa in ama' tapa Isaak a simmawh bawlna Sarah in mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Abraham’ kiangah, “Hih sila-numei a tapa tawh lawnkhia in; bang hang hiam cih leh sila-numei’ tapa in ka tapa Isaak tawh gamhluah lo ding uh hi,” ci hi. Ama' tapa’ hangin Abraham’ tungah thu nuam het lo hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in Abraham tungah, “Tangvalpa leh na sila-numei hangin lungkim loin om kei in; Sarah in nang' tunga hong gen peuhmah ama' hong gen bangin gamta in, bang hang hiam cih leh Isaak tawh na suan-le-khakte’ min kilo ding hi. Amah pen nangma' ta ahih manin, sila-numei’ tapa zong minam khat in ka bawl ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baihin an leh tuithawl la-in Hagar pia a, ama' liangko tungah naupang tawh suanin amah sawl khia hi. Amah pai khia a, Be-ersheba gam sungah vak kawikawi hi. Thawl sunga tui a bei ciangin amah in sawlbawk nuai khatah naupang lawn hi. Tua ciangin amah pai-in a hoih khop khat a gamla, thal lot khat tan bangah a ta nungngatin tusuk hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Naupang’ sih hong musak kei in,” ci hi. Amah nungngatin a tut lai takin naupang in a aw sangsakin kap hi. Pasian in tangvalpa’ aw za hi; Pasian’ vantungmi in vantung panin Hagar sam a, ama kiangah, “Hagar aw, bang in hong lungkhamsak hiam? Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalpa a omna mun-a a kahna awging Pasian in za hi. Ding in, tangvalpa la in la, na khut tawh kip takin len in; bang hang hiam cih leh minam lian khatin amah ka bawl ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in ama' mit haksak a, amah in tuikhuk khat mu hi; amah pai-in tui tawh tuithawl dimin tangvalpa dawnsak hi. Pasian in tangvalpa ompih a, amah khangto hi; amah gamlakah teng a, thal lot siampa khat hong suak hi. Amah Paran gamsungah teng hi; a nu in Izipt gam panin ama ading zi khat la hi. Tua hun lai takin Abimelek leh a galkap mangpa Fikol in Abraham’ kiangah, “Na’ sepna khempeuhah Pasian in nang hong ompih hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in kei hita leh ka tate hita leh ka suan-le-khakte hita leh tungah a man lopi-in hong bawl loin, nang' tungah thuman tak tawh kong gamtat bangin keima' tung leh tawl khat na omna leitang tungah nong gamtat nadingin Pasian tawh kei tungah hong kiciam in,” ci hi. Abraham in, “Ka kiciam ding hi,” ci hi. Abimelek’ nasemte in a suhsa tuikhuk tawh kisai thu Abraham in a lungkim lohna Abimelek' kiangah a gen ciangin, Abimelek in, “Kua in hih hiam ka thei kei hi; nang nong gen kei a, keimah in tu ni dong ka za nai kei hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abraham in tuu leh bawngtalte la-in Abimelek pia a, tua mi nihte in thuciamna khat bawl uh hi. Abraham in a tuuhon sung panin tuu-nu-no sagih tuam koih hi. Abimelek in Abraham' kiangah, “Hih na koih tuam tuu-nu-no sagihte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Keimah in hih tuikhuk ka tawhna thu-ah nang in keima adingin teci na hih theih nadingin nangmah in ka khut sung panin hih tuu-nu-no sagihte na la ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun Be-ersheba kici hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute gel in tua munah thu kiciam uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Be-ersheba-ah thuciamna khat bawl uh hi. Tua khit ciangin Abimelek leh a galkap mangpa Fikol, Filistia mite’ leitang-ah ciahkik uh hi. Abraham in Be-ersheba-ah makeng kung khat suan a, tua lai munah Tawntung Pasian, Topa’ tungah thungen hi. Filistia mite’ leitangah Abraham, sau veipi sung peemta-in om hi.

Hih thute khit ciangin Pasian in Abraham ze-et a, ama kiangah, “Abraham!” ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi. Amah in, “Na it, na tapa khat bek ahi Isaak, la in la Moriah gamah pai in, tua lai mun-a nang' kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biak piakna-in amah hong pia in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baih a, a la tutphah vawhin, ama' mihingte tangval nih leh a tapa Isaak paipih hi; amah in meihal biak piak nadingin sing ek a, ama' tunga Pasian’ gen sa munah pai hi. A ni thum ni ciangin Abraham khuadak to-in a gamla-ah tua mun mu hi. Tua ciangin Abraham in a tangvalte' kiangah, “Hi lai-ah la tawh na om un; kei leh tangvalpa hua lamah pai-in ka va bia ding uh a, note kiangah ka hong paikik ding uh hi,” ci hi. Abraham in meihal biakna sing la-in a tapa Isaak’ tungah suan hi; amah in a khut sungah mei leh temta tawi hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute gel paikhawm uh hi. Isaak in a pa Abraham kiangah, “Pa aw,” ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing, ka ta,” ci hi. Amah in, “En in, mei leh sing om hi; ahih hangin meihal biakpiak nadingin tuuno koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci hi. Abraham in, “Pasian in meihal biakpiak nadingin ama ading tuuno hong pia ding hi, ka ta aw,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute gel paikhawm uh hi. Ama' kiangah Pasian’ gennasa mun amaute a tun’ uh ciangin, Abraham in tua lai-ah biakna tau khat bawlin, a ngei nading bangin sing koihin, a tapa x Isaak henin biakna tau tunga sing tungah amah koih hi. Tua ciangin Abraham in a tapa that dingin tem la hi. Ahih hangin Topa’ vantungmi in vantung panin, “Abraham, Abraham!” ci-in amah sam hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi. Amah in, “Tangvalpa su kei in, ama' tungah bangmah hih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in Pasian na zahtakna tu-in ka thei a, na tapa, na tapa khat bek ahi, keima adingin na humcip lohna ka mu hi,” ci hi. Abraham in a lu phongto-in khuadak hi, en in, khaumang lakah a ki-a a awk tuutal khat a nungah om hi; Abraham pai-in tuutal kai a, ama tapa, tangin meihal biak piakna-in pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abraham in tua mun pen, tu ni dongin, “Topa’ mual tungah hong kisikh ding hi,” a kicih mah bangin, Topa in hong sikh ding, ci hi. Topa’ vantungmi in vantung panin Abraham a nih veina sam a, “Keimahmah ka kiciam hi, Topa in ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh nang in hih thu na bawl khin a, na tapa, na tapa khat bek na humcip kei hi, nang thupha kong pia taktak ding hi, na suan-le-khakte van-a aksite leh tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suan-le-khakte in amau’ galte’ khuapite luah ding uh a, na suan-le-khakte thupha ka piak bangin, leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh nang in ka thu na mang hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tangvalte’ kiangah Abraham ciahkik a, Be-ersheba-ah paikhawm uh hi; Abraham Be-ersheba-ah teng hi. Hih thute khit ciangin Abraham kiangah, “En in, Milkah in zong na sanggampa Nahor tawh tate nei hi: Uz in a u pen hi, a sanggamte in Buz, Aram’ pa Kemuel, Khesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaf leh Bethuel ahi hi,” kici hi. Bethuel in Rebekah’ pa ahi hi. Milkah in Abraham’ sanggam Nahor tawh hih mihing giatte nei hi. Tua tham loin Reumah min nei a zi-neu in ta Tebah, Gaham, Tahash leh Ma-akah nei hi.

Sarah kum za leh kum sawmnih-le-sagih nungta a, Kanaan mite’ gamsung Kiriatharba (Hebron) ah Sarah si hi. Abraham dahin kap a, a vui nading vaihawm hi. Abraham in a misi nusia-in Hit mite' kiangah va pai a, “Keimah in note’ lakah khual mi hi-in peemta ka hi hi; ka zi ka vui theih nadingin note’ lakah vuina ding mun leitang hong pia un,” ci hi. Hit mite in Abraham dawngin, “Topa aw, kote’ thu hong ngai in; nang in kote’ lakah a vanglian ulian khat na hi hi. Kote’ han na deih pen munah na zi vui in; kote kuamah in nang’ adingin a han it lo ding a, na zi vui ding hong khaktan lo ding hi,” ci uh hi. Abraham dingin tua gam mi ahi Hit mite' lamah kun hi. Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Hih gamah ka zi ka vui ding nong deih uh leh, ka thu hong ngai un, Zohar, tapa Efron in ama' neih Makpelah leihawm kei' tungah hong piak theih nadingin hong thumsak un; tua pen ama' lo nawl-ah om hi. Vuina ding munin ka neih dingin a man ding cing tak-a piakna tawh note’ muhna-ah kei' tungah amah hong piasak un,” ci hi. Tu-in Hit mite' lakah Efron tu hi; khuapi kulh kongpi-ah a hong pai Hit mite khempeuh’ zakna-ah Hit mi Efron in Abraham dawng a, “Hilo hi, ka Topa aw, hong ngai in; nang' tungah lo kong pia hi, tua sunga leihawm nang' tungah kong pia hi; ka mipihte’ muhna-ah nang' tungah kong pia hi; na misi vui in,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Abraham tua gam mite’ maiah kun hi. Tua gam mite’ zakna-ah amah in Efron’ kiangah, “Lungsim takpi tawh na cih ahih leh hong ngai in; lo man ding kong pia ding hi; tua lai-ah ka misi ka vui theih nadingin kei' tung panin a man hong sang in,” ci hi. Efron in Abraham dawngin, “Ka Topa aw, ka thu hong ngai in; leitang bek khat in ngun shekel zali man hi, nang leh kei' kikal-ah bang thudang om nawn ahi hiam? Na misi vui in,” ci hi. Efron’ cih bangin Abraham thukim hi; Abraham in Efron’ adingin, Hit mite’ zakna-ah a min lawh zah, tua hun lai tak-a sumbukte lak-a kizang a gik zah tawh kizui-in ngun shekel zali teh khia hi. Tua ahih ciangin Makpelah-a Efron’ lo, Mamre nisuahna lam-a a om, a sunga om leihawm leh a lo, leh tua mun khempeuh-a a om lo sunga singte pen khuapi kulh kongpi-ah a pai mite khempeuh' mai, Hit mite’ omna-ah Abraham’ neih dingin kipia hi. Hih bangin a kihih khit ciangin, Kanaan gamsunga om Mamre (Hebron) nisuahna lam-a a om Makpelah lo sunga leihawm sungah Abraham in a zi Sarah vui hi. Lo leh a sunga om leihawmte si vui nading munin neih dingin Abraham tungah Hit mite in pia uh hi.

Tu-in Abraham teek a, a kum tam mahmah ta hi; Topa in na khempeuhah Abraham thupha pia hi. Abraham in ama' neih khempeuh a uk, a inn sungah a lianpen a nasempa' kiangah, “Ka phei nuai-ah na khut koih in, 3-4 nangmah in amau' lakah ka ten’na Kanaan mite’ tanute’ lak panin ka tapa’ zi ding la loin, keima' gam leh ka behte' kiangah va pai-in ka tapa Isaak zi ding na lak nadingin vantung leh leitung Pasian ahi Topa tawh nang kong kiciamsak ding hi,” a ci hi. Nasempa in ama' kiangah, “A numei in hih gamah kei hong zui nuam kei kha leh nangma' hong paikhiatna gamah na tapa ka paipih kik ding hiam?” ci hi. Abraham in ama' kiangah, “Tua lai-ah ka tapa na paipih kik loh ding thei in. Ka pa’ inn leh ka suahna leitang panin kei hong la-in, kei' kiangah thu hong genin kei' tungah hong kiciam a, ‘Na suan-le-khakte' tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,’ a hong ci vantung Pasian, Topa in nangma' mai-ah a vantungmi sawl ding a, tua lai mun panin nangmah in ka tapa ading zi khat na la ding hi. Ahih hangin a numei in nang hong zuih nop kei leh keima' thuciamna panin nang na suakta ding hi; bangbang hi leh tua lai-ah ka tapa na paipih kik kei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin nasempa in a topa Abraham’ phei nuai-ah a khut koih a, hih thu tawh kisai-in ama' tungah kiciam hi. Tua ciangin nasempa in a topa’ kalaohte sawm la-in paikhia a, a topa' tung panin letsong hoih nono a namkim la hi; amah ding-in Mesopotamia gam Nahor’ khuapi-ah pai hi. Numeite in tui a tawi nitak hun lai takin khuapi pua lam tuikhuk gei-ah amah in a kalohte boksak hi. Amah in, “Ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa aw, tu ni-in ka ma hong vangsak in, Nang' tungah thu kong ngen hi, ka topa Abraham’ tungah itna kip hong lak in. En in, tuikhuk gei-ah kei ka ding a, khuapi nungakte tuitawi dingin hong pai uh hi. Keimah in, ‘Tui ka dawn theih nadingin na beel hong ngasuk in,’ ka cih ciangin, ‘Dawn in, na kalaohte zong tui ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci nu na nasempa Isaak’ adingin na sehsa numei hisak in. Nangmah in ka topa' tungah itna kip na lahna hih thu tawh ka thei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua banga a thunget a khit ma-in, en in, Abraham’ sanggampa Nahor leh a zi Milkah tawh a neih a tapa Bethuel’ tanu Rebekah a liangko tungah a tuibeel pua-in hong paikhia hi. Tua nu pen kuamah tawh a lumkhawm nai lo, nungak, a ngaihbaang mahmah khat ahi hi. Amah tuikhuk-ah paisukin a beel dim a, hong paito hi. Tua ciangin amah dawntuah dingin nasempa tai a, “Dawn ding tui tawm khat na beel sung panin hong pia dih in,” ci hi. Amah in, ‘Dawn in, ka topa aw,” ci hi; tua nu in a khut tungah a beel niamsuksakin amah dawnsak hi. Amah in tua mipa' tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, “Amaute in a kham matengun na kalaohte ading zong tui kong tawisak ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tuikuang sungah a tui bung pak a, tui tawi dingin tui khuk-ah tai-in a kalaohte khempeuh adingin tui tawi hi. Topa in ama' khualzinna ma vangsak ding hiam vangsak lo ding hiam cih theih dingin mipa in dap takin tua nu en hi. Kalaohte in tui a dawn khit ciangin mipa in shekel lang a gik kham nakbah khat leh shekel sawm a gik kham tau nih tua nu’ khut adingin la a, “Kua’ tanu na hi hiam hong gen in. Na pa’ innah kote’ giah nading a awng ding hiam?” ci hi. Tua nu in ama' kiangah, “Nahor leh a zi Milkah’ tapa Bethuel’ tanu ka hi hi,” ci hi. Amah in, “Buhkung leh gan-an a kicing ka nei uh a, giah nading mun zong ka nei uh hi,” ci thuah lai hi. Mipa in a lu kunin Topa bia a, “Ka topa’ tungah a itna kip leh a thumanna a pelh lo, ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah ta hen. Kei ka hih leh, ka topa’ behte’ inn zuatna lampi-ah Topa in hong paipih hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin nungaknu a innah tai-in hih thute khempeuh a innkuanpihte' tungah gen hi. Rebekah in Laban min nei sanggam pasal khat nei hi; Laban zong tuikhuk-a mipa' kiangah tai hi. Amah in nakbah leh a sanggamnu’ khut tunga taute a muh ciang leh, “Mipa in kei tungah hih bangin hong gen,” ci-a a sanggamnu Rebekah’ kam gen a zak ciangin, mipa' kiangah amah pai hi; en in, tuikhuk-a kalaohte' kiangah amah na ding hi. Amah in, “Hong pai in, Topa’ thupha piakpa aw; bang hangin a pua-ah ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh inn leh kalaohte’ ading mun ka bawl khin zo hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mipa inn sungah hong pai hi; Laban in kalaoh vante suah a, kalaohte adingin buhkung leh gan-an pia a, amah leh a kikholhpih mite’ khe sil nadingin tui pia hi. Tua ciangin nek dingin a mai-ah an kilui hi; ahih hangin amah in, “Ka thu ka gen khit matengin an ka ne kei ding hi,” ci hi, Amah in, “Gen in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Keimah in Abraham’ nasem ka hi hi. Topa in ka topa nakpi takin thupha pia a, amah a lian mahmah suak khin hi; amah in ama tungah tuuhon, bawnghon, ngun leh kham, pasal-nasem leh numei-nasem, kalaoh leh late pia khin hi. Ka topa’ zi Sarah in a teek khitin ka topa tawh tapa khat nei hi; amah in a neihsa khempeuh ama' tungah pia hi. Ka topa in kei hong kiciamsak a, ‘Nangmah in amau’ gamah ka ten’na Kanaan x numeite' lak panin ka tapa’ zi ding la loin; ka pa’ inn leh ka behte' kiangah pai-in ka tapa’ ading zi khat na la ding hi,’ hong cisak hi. Keimah in ka topa' kiangah, ‘A numei in kei hong zui nuam kei kha leh,’ ka ci hi.
