Ahih hangin amah in kei' tungah, ‘A thu ka man’ Topa in nang tawh a vantungmi hong sawlin na lampi hong vangsak ding hi; nang in ka behte leh ka pa’ inn panin ka tapa’ ading zi khat na la ding hi; ka behte' kiangah na pai ciangin ka thuciamna panin nang na suakta ding hi; amaute in nang hong piak kei leh ka thuciamna panin nang na suakta ding hi,’ hong ci hi. “'Tu ni-in tuikhuk-ah pai-in, "Ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa aw, tu-a ka paina lampi nong van’ sak ding leh, en in, tuikhuk gei-ah kei ka ding hi; tui tawi dinga hong paikhia nungak' tungah, 'Na beel panin tui dawn ding tawm khat hong pia in,' ka cih ciangin, 'Dawn in, na kalaohte’ ading zong kong tawisak ding hi,' hong ci nu pen, ka topa’ tapa’ adingin Topa in a sehsa numei hisak in," ka ci hi. “Ka lungsim sungah thu ka nget khit ma-in, en in, a liangko tungah a tui beel pua-in Rebekah hong paikhia hi; amah tui khuk-ah paisukin tuitawi hi. Keimah in ama' kiangah, ‘Tui hong dawnsak in,’ ka ci hi. Amah in a liangko panin a beel hong khia-suk pahin, ‘Dawn in, na kalohte zong tui ka dawnsak ding hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin keimah in ka dawn a, amah in kalaohte zong tui pia hi. Tua ciangin, ‘Kua’ tanu na hi hiam?’ ci-in amah ka dong hi. Amah in, ‘Nahor leh a zi Milkah’ tapa Bethuel, tanu ka hi hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nak tungah nakbah ka batsak a, a khut tungah taute ka butsak hi. Tua ciangin ka lu kunin Topa ka bia a, a tapa’ adingin ka topa’ behpa’ tanu la dingin lampi man-ah kei a hong paipih, ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa ka phat hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, tak lamah ahi zongin vei lamah ahi zongin ka kihei theih nadingin ka topa' tungah hoih tak leh thuman takin na gamtat ding uh leh hong gen un; tua ahih kei leh zong hong gen un,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Laban leh Bethuel in dawng a, “Hih pen Topa’ kiang panin hong pai ahi hi; a sia ahi zongin a pha ahi zongin nang' tungah kong gen thei kei uh hi, En in, Rebekah na mai-ah om hi, amah la in la pai un, Topa’ gensa bangin na topa’ tapa’ zi hisak un,” ci uh hi. Abraham’ nasempa in amau’ kammalte a zak ciangin Topa’ mai lei lakah kun suk hi. Nasempa in ngun leh kham kizepnate leh puante hong suahkhia-in Rebekah pia hi; a sanggampa leh a nu zong a manpha kizepnate pia hi. Amah leh amah tawh a omkhawmte in ne-in dawnin, tua lai-ah tua zan giak uh hi. Amaute zingsangin a thawh uh ciangin amah in, “Ka topa' kiangah hong ciahsak kik un,” ci hi. A sanggampa leh a nu in,” A tawm penin ni sawm bang, ko tawh numei hong omsak lai in; tua khit ciangin amah hong pai thei ding hi,” ci uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in amaute' kiangah, “Topa in ka lampi ma-vangsak khin ahih nungsang kei hong zekaisak nawn kei un; ka topa' kiangah ka ciah theih nadingin hong paisak un,” ci hi. Amaute in, “A numei sam-in amah i dong ding hi,” ci uh hi. Amaute in Rebekah sam uh a, ama' kiangah, “Hih mipa tawh na pai ding hiam?” ci uh hi. Amah in, “Ka pai ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a sanggamnu uh Rebekah leh a cingnu, Abraham’ nasempa leh a mihingte ciah khiasak uh hi. Amaute in Rebekah thupha pia-in ama' kiangah, “Kote’ sanggamnu aw, a tul-tul a then-thente’ nu hi ta in; na suan-le-khakte in amau a mudahte’ khuapite luah ta uh hen!” ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Rebekah leh a numeite dingin, kalaohte' tungah tuangin mipa zui uh hi; tua ahih manin nasempa in Rebekah la-in a pai nading lam-ah pai hi. Tua kikalin, Isaak, Be-erlahairoi panin hong pai-in Negeb gamah na teng hi. Isaak in thu a lungngai dingin nitakin gam lakah paikhia hi; amah in a lu sangsakin khuadak hi, en in, kalaohte hong pai hi. Rebekah in a lu sangsakin Isaak a muh ciangin, kalaoh tung panin amah kumin, nasempa' kiangah, “Hua lai-a mipa, eite hong dawn dinga gam lak-a hong pai kua ahi hiam?” ci hi. Nasempa in, “Ka topa hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kikhuhna puan la-in kikhuh hi. Nasempa in Isaak' kiangah a gamtatnasa khempeuh gen hi. Tua ciangin Isaak in a nu Sarah’ puanbuk sungah tua nu paipihin, Rebekah la a, amah pen a zi suak hi; amah in tua nu it hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nu’ sih khit ciangin Isaak in hehnepna ngah hi.

Abraham in Keturah min nei zi dang khat la hi. Amah in tua nu tawh ta Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak leh Shuah nei hi. Jokshan in Sheba leh Dedan’ pa ahi hi. Dedan’ tate in Asshurim, Letushim leh Leummim ahi hi. Midian’ tate in Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida, leh Elda-ah ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh in Keturah’ suan-le-khakte ahi hi. Abraham in a neih khempeuh Isaak pia hi. Ahih hangin Abraham in a zi-neu tawh a tate' tungah letsong pia a, ama' nuntak lai mahin nisuahna gam lamah ama' tapa Isaak kiang panin amaute sawlkhia hi. Abraham, kum za leh kum sawm-sagih-le-nga a phak ciangin, a nunung pen ama' hu sang a, a teek, kum tampi a pha, a khangham-in si a, ama' mite tawh kivui khawm hi. 9-10 Ama' tapate Isaak leh Ishmael in, Abraham in Hit mite' tung pan-a a lei lo, Mamre nisuahna lam-a om, Hit mi Zohar’ tapa Efron’ lo sung, Makpelah leihawm sungah amah vui uh hi. Tua lai mun-ah a zi Sarah tawh Abraham kivui hi. Abraham’ sih khit ciangin Pasian in a tapa Isaak thupha pia hi. Be-erlahairoi-ah Isaak teng hi. Hihte in, Abraham in Sarah’ numei-sila ahi, Izipt mi Hagar tawh a neih, Abraham’ tapa Ishmael’ suan-le-khakte' tangthu ahi hi. Hihte in a suahna tawh kizui-in Ishmael’ tate’ min ahi hi; Ishmael’ ta upa in Nebaioth ahi hi; tua ciangin Kedar, Adbe-el, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Haddad, Tema, Jetur, Nafith leh Kademah ahi hi. Hihte in a khua, a phual, a beh-in ulian sawn-le-nihte ahi Ishmael’ tate leh amaute’ min ahi hi. (Ishmael, kum za leh kum sawmthum-le-sagih a phak ciangin a nunung pen ama' hu sangin si a, a behte tawh kivui khawm hi.) Amaute Izipt nisuahna, Assiri lam Havilah panin Shur dongah teng uh hi; ama sanggamte khempeuh panin amah tuam ten’ hi. Hihte in Abraham’ tapa Isaak’ suan-le-khakte tangthu ahi hi. Abraham in Isaak’ pa hi a, Aram mi Laban’ Sanggamnu, Paddanaram gam-a Aram mi Bethuel’ tanu Rebekah zi-in a lak lai-in Isaak kum sawmli pha hi. Isaak in Topa’ tungah a zi adingin thungen hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah ciing hi; Topa in ama' thungetna pia a, a zi Rebekah gai hi. Ama' sungah a naute kilaigawp hi; amah in, ‘Hih bang ahih leh bang hangin nungta se ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ kiangah thu kan dingin amah pai hi. Topa in ama kiangah, “Na gil sungah minam nih om hi, Nang’ sung pan a suak mihing nihte kikhen ding hi; khat in a dang khat sangin hatzaw ding hi, a u-zaw in a nauzaw’na sem ding hi,” ci hi. Ama' suah ni hun a tun’ ciangin, en in, a gil sungah tapeeng om hi. A masa pen a san-in hong suak a, a pumpi khempeuh mul a nei puan tawh kibang hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Esau phuak uh hi. Tua khit ciangin a sanggampa hong suakkhia a, ama' khut in Esau’ khetul len hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Jakob kiphuak hi. Amau’ suah ciangin Isaak kum sawmguk pha hi. Tua naupangte a khan’ ciangin, Esau in gamsung mi sabet siam khat hi a, Jakob in puanbuk sunga a teng a cingkam khat ahi hi. Isaak in Esau it hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ama' sa matsa ne hi; ahih hangin Rebekah in Jakob it hi. Khat vei Jakob in meh huan hi, Esau gamlak panin hong ciahin phukhong vei hi. Esau in Jakob kiangah, “Tua meh san tawm khat hong nesak in, bang hang hiam cih leh phukhong vei ing!” ci hi. (Tua ahih ciangin ama' min Edom kici hi.) Jakob in, “Na innluahza hong pia lecin, tua meh kong pia ding hi,” ci hi. Esau in, “A si ding ka hi ta hi; kei’ adingin innluahza bang-a kimang ahi hiam?” ci hi. Jakob in, “Kei' tungah hong kiciam masa in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama' tungah amah kiciamin, Jakob' tungah a innluahza zuak hi. Tua ciangin Jakob in an leh bemeh Esau pia hi, amah in ne-in dawn a, dingin a pai nadingah pai hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluahza tua bang ciang bekin ngaihsun hi.

Abraham’ hun lai-a kialpi ban-ah, tu-in gamsungah kialpi tung hi. Filistia mite’ kumpipa Abimelek omna Gerar-ah Isaak pai hi. Ama' tungah Topa kilang a, “Izipt-ah paisuk kei in;kong gen ding leitangah teng in. Hih leitang-ah tawl khat om in, nang tawh kong omkhawm ding a, thupha kong pia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang leh na suan-le-khakte' tungah hih leitangte kong pia ding a, na pa Abraham’ tungah ka thuciam ka tungsak ding hi. Na suan-le-khakte van-a aksi bangin tampi ka phasak ding a, na suan-le-khakte' tungah hih leitang khempeuh ka pia ding hi; na suan-le-khakte thupha ka piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi: Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham in ka thu mangin, ka sawlna, ka thupiakna, ka ngeina kip leh ka thu zui hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Gerar-ah Isaak teng hi. Tua mun a mite in ama' zi tawh kisai thu a dot uh ciangin amah in, “Ka sanggamnu hi,” ci hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, “Rebekah’ hangin tua mun mite in hong that kha ding ahih ciangin,” ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin, “Ka zi,” a cih ding lau hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah ngaihbaang hi. Tua lai-ah amah sau veipi a om khit ciangin, Filistia mite’ kumpipa Abimelek kongvangneu panin khuadak a, Isaak in a zi Rebekah a noh laitak mu kha hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abimelek in Isaak samin, “En in, amah na zi hi; tua ahih ciangin bangci-in nang in, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ ci thei na hi hiam? ci hi. Isaak in ama' kiangah, “Ama hangin si kha ding ka hih ciangin,’ ci-in ngaihsun ka hihna hang hi,” ci hi. Abimelek in, “Ko’ tungah bang ci-a hih bang hong hih na hi hiam? Mite khatpeuh peuh na zi tawh lum khawm pak thei ding a, kote’ tungah mawhna hong tun’na hi ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abimelek in mi khempeuh thu zasak a, “Hih mipa ahi zongin a zi ahi zongin a su-kha peuhmah kithat ding hi,” ci hi. Isaak in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah zakhat la hi. Topa in amah thupha pia a, tua mipa a hau suakin, a hau mahmah a suah matengin ngah behbeh hi. Amah in tuuhon leh bawnghon, innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uh hi. (Ama' pa Abraham’ hun lai-a a pa’ nasemte in a tawh tuikhuk khempeuh tu-in Filistia mite in hucipin lei vuk uh hi.) Abimelek in Isaak’ kiangah, “Kote’ kiang panin paikhia in; bang hang hiam cih leh kote sangin nang na vanglian zaw hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun panin Isaak paikhia a, Gerar kuam sungah phual satin tua mun-ah teng hi. Isaak in a pa Abraham’ hun lai-a a kitosa tuikhukte to kik hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham’ sih khit ciangin Filistia mite in tuate vukcip uh hi; amah in a pa’ phuahsa minte mah phuak hi. Ahih hangin Isaak’ nasemte in tua kuam sung to-in tuikhuk a muh uh ciangin, Gerar gancingte leh Isaak’ gancingte kitawng uh a, “Tui, ko aa hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua tuikhuk Esek ci-in min phuak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute leh amah kitawng uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuikhuk dang khat to uh a, tua tungtang-ah zong amaute kitawng uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in tua pen Sitnah ci-in min phuak hi. Tua mun panin amah kiin-in tuikhuk dang khat to hi, tua tungtangah amaute kitawng lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Rehboth ci-in phuak hi, “Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in Topa in eite’ adingin omna hong bawlsak khin a, eite hih gamah i pung ding hi,” ci hi. Tua lai mun panin amah Be-ersheba-ah paito hi. Tua zan mahin ama' tungah Topa kilang a, “Keimah in na pa Abraham’ Pasian ka hi hi; lau kei in, bang hang hiam cih leh ka nasempa Abraham’ huhau-in nang tawh kong om a, nang leh na suan-le-khakte thupha hong pia-in kong pungsak ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua lai mun-ah biakna tau khat lamin Topa' tungah thungen a, tua munah a puanbuk lam hi. Tua lai-ah Isaak’ nasemte in tuikhuk khat to uh hi. Tua ciangin Isaak' kiangah Gerar panin Abimelek, amah thu lamlakpa Ahuzzath leh a galkap mangpa Fikol tawh pai hi. Isaak in amaute' kiangah, “Note in kei hong mudahin note' kiang panin hong hawlkhia na hih uh ciangin bang hangin kei' kiangah hong hawh na hi uh hiam?” ci hi. 28-29 Amaute in, “Nang tawh Topa a omna tel takin ka mu uh hi; tua ahih ciangin, kote in nang hong sukha loin, nang' tungah bangmah hong hih loin, a hoihin gamta-in lungnuam takin kong sawlkhiat mah bangun kote' tungah nang in siatna nong bawl loh nadingin nang leh kote' kikal-ah kiciamna khat om hen la,nang tawh thuciamna khat bawl ni, a ci hi ung. Nang in tu-in Topa’ thupha piak na hi hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute’ adingin pawi khat bawl a, amaute in ne-in dawn uh hi. Zingsangin amaute thobaih uh a, khat leh khat kiciamna bawl uh hi; Isaak in amaute a lampi ding uhah kha a, ama' kiang panin amaute lungnuam takin pai khia uh hi. Tua ni mahin Isaak’ nasemte hong pai-in amau’ tawhsa tuikhuk thu ama' kiangah hong gen uh a, ama' kiangah, “Tui ka mu zo uh hi,” ci uh hi. Amah in tua pen Shibah ci-in min phuak hi; tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min pen tu ni dongin Be-ersheba kici hi. Esau kum sawmli a phak ciangin, Hit mi Be-eri’ tanu Judith leh Hit mi Elon’ tanu Basemath zi-in la hi; amaute in Isaak leh Rebekah’ nuntakna haksasak uh hi.

Isaak teek-in a mitte mang-in khua a muh theih loh ciangin a tapa upa zaw Esau samin ama' kiangah, “Ka tapa aw,” ci hi; amah in dawngin, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi. Amah in, “En in, kei ka teek hi; ka sih ni ding hun ka thei kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, na hiamte ahi na thallawng leh na thal la in la, gam lakah pai-in kei adingin sa va beng in, ka sih ma-in nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin kei’ duh bangin an lim hong bawl in la, ka nek dingin hong paipih in,” ci hi. Isaak in a tapa Esau a hopih lai takin Rebekah in na ngai sim hi. Sa beng-in a ciahpih dingin Esau gam lakah a kuan ciangin, Rebekah in a tapa Jakob kiangah, “Na sanggampa Esau tungah na pa’ thugen ka za a, ‘Ka sih ma-in Topa’ mai-ah nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka nek dingin sa matsa hong paipih in la, kei’ adingin an lim hong bawl in,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, kong thupiak bangin ka thu hong mang in. Ama' duh bangin na pa adingin an lim ka bawl theih nadingin keelhon lakah va pai in la, keelno a hoih nih hong paipih in; a sih ma-in amah in nang thupha hong piak theih nadingin nek dingin na pa' kiangah, na va paipih ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Jakob in a nu Rebekah' kiangah, “En in, ka sanggampa Esau in mul nei mi hi a, keimah in ci neel mi ka hi hi. Ka pa in kei hong lawng kha leh, amah ka khemna hong thei ding a, kei' tungah thupha hi loin samsiatna hong tung zawsop ding hi,” ci hi. A nu in ama' kiangah, “Nangma' thuak ding samsiatna kei' tungah hong tung ta hen, ka ta aw; ka thu hong mang peuh in la, pai-in tuate kei' kiangahhong puak in,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in tuate va la-in a nu' kiangah paipih hi; a pa’ duh bangin a nu in an lim bawl hi. Tua ciangin Rebekah in inn-a a kep, ama' ta upa zaw Esau’ puan hoih pente la-in, a ta nauzaw Jakob silhsak hi; amah in keelnote’ vun ama' khut tung leh a neelna mun a ngawng san-ah silhsak hi; amah in a bawlsa meh lim leh an a tapa Jakob pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin a pa kiangah amah pai a, “Ka pa aw,” ci hi; amah in “Hiah om ing; ka ta aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci hi. Jakob in a pa' kiangah, “Keimah in na ta upa Esau ka hi hi. Nong gen bangin ka hih khin hi; kei thupha nong piak theih nadingin tu-in tu to in la ka sa matsa ne in,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Isaak in a tapa' kiangah, “Ka ta aw, bang ci-a hong hici manlan’ pak na hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Topa nangma' Pasian in kei hong tuahphasak hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Isaak in Jakob' kiangah, “Ka ta aw, nang in ka ta Esau taktak na hi hiam, na hi kei hiam kong lawn’ theih nadingin ka nai-ah hong pai in,” ci hi. Tua ciangin a pa Isaak' kiangah Jakob pai a, amah in lawngin, “A aw in Jakob’ aw hi, ahih hangin a khutte in Esau’ khut hi,” ci hi. A khutte in a sanggampa Esau’ khut bangin mul nei ahih manin amah in thei lo hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in thupha pia hi. Amah in, “Ka ta Esau taktak na hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Ka hi hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka tapa’ sa matsa ne-in nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka kiangah hong paipih in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kiangah paipih-in, amah in ne hi; amah in leenggahzu paipih-in, amah in dawn hi. Tua ciangin a pa Isaak in ama' kiangah, “Ka kiangah hong pai in la hong nam in, ka ta aw,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah a nai-ah pai-in a pa nam hi; amah in a puan gimnamte nam a, amah thupha pia-in, “En in, ka tapa’ gimnam in Topa in thupha a piak-sa gam lak gimnam tawh kibang! Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak ta hen. An leh leenggahzu tampi hong pia ta hen. Mite in nangma' na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte' tungah topa hi in la, na sanggamte’ suan-le-khakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsia peuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, nang thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen!” ci hi. Isaak in Jakob a thupha piak a man khit, a pa Isaak' omna panin Jakob a paikhiat khit phetin, a sa betna panin a sanggampa Esau hong tung hi. Amah in zong an lim bawlin a pa’ kiangah hong paipih hi. Amah in a pa’ kiangah, “Nang in kei thupha nong piak theih nadingin na tapa’ sa matsa ne dingin ka pa tho in,” ci hi. A pa Isaak in ama kiangah, “Kua na hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Keimah in na tapa, a suak masa Esau ka hi hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Isaak nakpi takin liingin, “Tua ahih leh, nang’ hong pai ma-in sa matsa hong paipihin, a vekin ka nek khit phetin, amah thupha ka piakpa kua ahi hiam?—hi hi, amah in thupha ngah ding hi,” ci hi. Esau in a pa’ kammalte a zak ciangin nakpi takin, nasia takin amah kiko khia a, a pa' kiangah, “Kei thupha hong pia in, kei zong, aw ka pa!” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Na sanggampa in khemna tawh hong pai-in amah in na thupha lakhia khin ta hi,” ci hi. Esau in, “Amah Jakob kici mah hilo ahi hiam? Amah in kei nih vei hong suankhia khin hi. Amah in ka innluahza hong sut hi; en in, tu-in amah in ka thupha hong sut leuleu hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei adingin thupha siit lo na hi hiam?” ci hi. Isaak in Esau dawngin, “En in, amah nangma' topa-in, ka bawl khin a, a sanggamte khempeuh ama' tungah nasem-in ka pia khin a, an leh leenggahzu tawh amah ka hingsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka ta aw, nang’ adingin bang hih thei nawn ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Esau in a pa' kiangah, “Pa aw, thupha khat beek nei lo na hi hiam? Kei thupha hong pia in, kei zong, ka pa aw,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Esau a kap hi. Tua ciangin a pa Isaak in: “En in, leitung pan-a piang an leh leenggahzu na nei kei ding a, na lo adingin vantung pan vandaituite na ngah kei ding hi. Na namsau tawh nang na nungta ding a, na sanggampa’ na na sem ding hi; ahih hangin nangmah in na langpan’ ciangin na ngawng panin ama' hakkol na sutan ding hi,” ci hi. A pa in amah thupha pia khin ahih amnin tua thupha hangin tu-in Esau in Jakob mudah a, Esau in “Ka pa’ sihna hangin dah nading hun hong nai ta hi; tua khit ciangin ka sanggampa Jakob ka that ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin a ta upa zaw Esau’ ngimna, Rebekah tungah kigen hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a ta nauzaw Jakob sam a, ama' kiangah, “En in, na sanggampa Esau in nangmah thah ding vaihawmna tawh amah kihehnem hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, ka thu hong mang in; Haran-a ka sanggampa Laban' kiangah va tai in la, na sanggampa’ hehna a bei mateng tua lai-ah amah tawh tawl khat sung va om in; na sanggampa’ sinsona a daih mateng, ama tunga na gamtatna a mangngilh mateng va om in; tua ciangin mi hong sawlin hih lai munah nang kong lasak ding hi. Bang hangin note gel tawh ni khat thu-in kei kikhen ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ciangin Rebekah in Isaak kiangah, “Esau’ zi Hit numeite’ hangin ka lunggim a, ka cimtak hi. Jakob in hih gam numeite khat ahi, Hit numeite khat ten’pih leh kei adingin bang nuntak tham nawn ding ahi hiam?” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Isaak in Jakob samin amah thupha pia-in thuhilh a, “Nang in Kanaan numeite na ten’pih kei ding hi. Ding in la, na nu’ pa Bethuel’ inn, Paddan-aram-ah pai in; tua lai munah na nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tanute khat na zi dingin la in. Nang in mi honpi khat na suah theih nadingin Vanglian Pasian in nang thupha hong pia-in hong pungsakin, tampi hong phasak hen. Pasian in Abraham’ tunga a piak, tawl khat sung na omna leitang na neih theih nadingin nang leh na suan-le-khakte' tungah amah in Abraham’ thupha hong pia ta hen!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Isaak in Jakob sawlkhia hi; Jakob leh Esau’ nu Rebekah’ sanggampa, Aram mi Bethuel’ tapa Laban’ omna Paddan-aram-ah amah pai hi. Isaak in Jakob thupha pia-in, zi la dingin Paddan-aram-ah sawl a, thupha a piak kawmin amah thuhilhin, “Kanaan numeite na ten’pih kei ding hi,” a cihna leh, Jakob in a nu leh a pa’ thu mangin Paddan-aram-ah a paina thu tu-in Esau in thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kanaan numeite in a pa Isaak lungkimsak lo cih Esau in a theih ciangin, Ishmael kiangah Esau pai-in, ama' zi neihsa banah, Nebaioth’ sanggamnu, Abraham’ tapa Isahmael’ tanu Mahalath zi-in la hi. Jakob in Be-ersheba khua nusia-in, Haran lamah pai hi. Amah mun khat tungin, ni tum khin ahih manin tua lai-ah tua zan giak hi. Tua mun-a suangte khat la-in, amah in lukhamin zang a, ihmu dingin tua munah lum suk hi. Amah in mang man a, leitungah kahlei khat kiphutin, kahlei dawn in van ban hi; en in, Pasian’ vantungmite tua kahlei tungah kahto-in kumsuk uh hi. En in, tua tung san-ah Topa ding a, “Keimah in na pa Abraham’ Pasian leh Isaak’ Pasian, Topa ka hi hi; nang leh na suan-le-khakte' tungah tu-a na lupna leitang kong pia ding hi; na suan-le-khakte lei lak leivui bang ding a, nitumna lam leh nisuahna lam, leilu lam leh leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uh hi; nang leh na suan-le-khakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung innkuan khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi. En in, keimah in nang tawh omin na paina peuhah kong kem ding a, hih leitangah nang kong paipih kik ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang' tunga kong gensa thute ka hih khit matengin nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin a ihmutna panin Jakob khanglo a, “Hih lai munah Topa om taktak hi; keimah in tua thu ka thei kei hi,” ci hi. Amah lau a, “Hih mun bangzahin lamdang! Hih in Pasian’ inn lo a dang hilo a, hih in vantung kongpi ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Jakob tho baih a, amah in lukham-a a zat suang la-in khuam-in phut a, a tungah sathau sung hi. Amah in tua mun Beth-el ci hi; ahih hangin a masa-in tua khuamin pen Luz ahi hi. Tua ciangin Jakob in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Pasian in kei tawh hong om khop a, hih ka paina lampi-ah kei hong kep a, nek ding an leh silh ding puan hong piak a, lungnuam takin ka pa’ innah ka ciahkik leh, Topa in keima' Pasian hi ding a, khuam ka phuhsa hih suang in Pasian’ inn hi ding hi; keima' tungah nangmah in nong piak khempeuh seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat nang' tungah kong pia ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jakob in a khualzinna zom a, nisuahna lam mite’ gam tung hi. A khuadak leh gam lakah tuikhuk khat mu hi, en in, tua gei-ah tuuhon thum lum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua tuikhuk panin tuuhonte tui kipia hi. Tuikhuk gong-a suang lian hi, tua lai munah tuuhonte khempeuh a kikaihkhop khit ciangin, tuucingte in tuikhuk kong panin suang khukkhia uh a, tuute tui pia-in, tuikhuk kong ama' omna ngei-ah suang koih kik uh hi. Jakob in amaute' kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, koi pan-a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” ci hi. Amaute in, “Haran pan hi ung,” ci hi. Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Nahor’ tapa Laban na thei uh hiam?” ci hi. Amaute in, “Thei mah ung,” ci hi. Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Amah a cidam hiam?” ci hi. Amaute in, “Dam hi; en in, a tanu Rachael zong tuu tawh hong pai!” ci uh hi. Amah in, “En un, ni sang lai hi, gan kaihkhop hun hi lo hi; tuute tui pia un la, pai-in an nesak un,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “Tuute kikaikhawm a, tuikhuk gong panin suang a kikhuk mateng ka hih thei kei uh hi; tua ciangin tuute tui ka pia thei pan uh hi,” ci uh hi. Amah in amaute tawh a kiho lai takin a pa’ tuute tawh Rachel hong tung hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tuate kem hi. Tu-in Jakob in a nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tanu Rachel leh a nu' sanggampa Laban’ tuute a muh ciangin, Jakob paito-in tuikhuk gong panin suang khukkhia a, a nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tuuhonte tui pia hi. Tua ciangin Jakob in Rachel nam a, a gingin kapkhia hi. Jakob in Rachel’ kiangah amah in a pa’ behte hi a, amah in Rebekah’ tapa a hihna kigen hi; tua ciangin Rachel tai-in a pa’ kiangah gen hi. Laban in a sanggamnu’ tapa Jakob’ thu a zak ciangin amah dawn dingin hong tai a, amah kawi-in nam a, a innah ciahpih hi. Jakob in Laban’ tungah hih thute khempeuh gen a, Laban in ama' kiangah, “Nang in keima si keima sa na hi takpi hi,” ci hi. Tua hi a, amah tawh kha khat om hi. Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob kiangah, “Nang in keimah' beh na hih ciangin, man nei lopi-in kei’ na hong sem ding na hi hiam? Hong gen in, na thaman ding bang hi ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tu-in Laban in tanu nih nei hi; a u-zaw min Leah hi a, a nauzaw’ min Rachel ahi hi. Leah’ mit-hah neem a, ahih hangin Rachel mel hoih-in deihhuai hi. Jakob in Rachel ngai hi; amah in, “Na tanu a nauzaw Rachel thalawh nadingin nangma' na kum sagih kong sem ding hi,” ci hi. Laban in, “Mi dang' tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nang' tungah amah kong piak ding hoih zaw hi; kei tawh om in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel ngah nadingin kum sagih na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang sa hi. Tua ciangin Jakob in Laban' kiangah, “Ka hun cingta ahih ciangin amah tawh ka lupkhawm theih nadingin ka zi hong pia in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Laban in tua mun-a mi khempeuh kaikhawmin pawi khat bawl hi. Ahih hangin a nitak ciangin amah in a tanu Leah la-in Jakob' kiangah paipih hi; amah in tua nu luppih hi. (Laban in ama' numei-nasem Zilpah a tanu Leah tungah a numei-nasem dingin pia hi.) A zingsang ciangin, en in, Leah na hi mawk hi; Jakob in Laban’ kiangah, “Kei' tungah bang hong bawl na hi hiam? Rachel ngah nadingin na na hong sem hilo ka hi hiam? Tua ahih leh bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam?” ci hi. Laban in, “A u’ ma-in a nauzaw piak ding ko’ gamah kizang lo hi. Hih nu’ adingin nipi khat sung pawi beisak phot in la, a dang kum sagih ka na nong sepsak thaman-in a khat pen zong kong pia ding uh hi,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin Jakob gamta a, tua nu’ pawi hun sung beisak phot hi; tua ciangin Laban in a tanu Rachel a zi dingin pia hi. (Laban in ama' numei-nasem Bilhah a tanu Rachel' tungah a numei-nasem dingin pia hi.) Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel zong luppih a, amah in Leah sangin Rachel it zaw hi; Laban’ na a dang kum sagih sung sem hi. Topa in Leah a kimuhdahna a theih ciangin, amah in a naubu hon’ sak hi; ahih hangin Rachel ciing hi. Leah gai-in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Reuben ci hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topa in ka thuakna hong en zo hi; tu-in ka pasal in kei hong it taktak ding hi,” ci hi. Amah gai kikin tapa khat nei a, amah in, “Keimah hong kimuhdahna thu Topa in za khin ahih manin, amah in hih tapa zong hong pia hi,” ci hi; amah in a min Simeon ci hi. Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “Amah tawh tapa thum nei ta ka hih manin tu-in ka pasal in kei hong pawl ding hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Levi kici hi. Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “Tu hunin Topa ka phat ding hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Judah phuak hi; tua ciangin ta neih tawp hi.

Rachel in Jakob tawh ta a neih lohna a kimuh ciangin, amah in a sanggamnu eng hi; amah in Jakob' kiangah, “Ta hong pia in, tua ahih kei leh si ning!” ci hi. Rachel’ tungah Jakob heh mahmah a, amah in, “Nang' tungah ta hong pia lo Pasian’ munah om ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hih lai-ah ka numei-nasem Bilhah om hi; ka khuk tungah ka tawi ding ta hong neih nading, leh ama sung panin suan-le-khak ka neih theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a numei-nasem Bilhahtungah zi-in pia hi; Jakob in tua nu luppih hi. Bilhah gai-in Jakob tawh tapa khat nei hi. Tua ciangin Rachel in, “Pasian in kei' tungah thu hong khen zo a, amah in ka aw zong za zo-in tapa khat hong pia hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Dan phuak hi. Rachel’ numei-nasem Bilhah gai kikin Jakob tawh a nihna tapa nei hi. Tua ciangin Rachel in, “Nakpi tak-a hanciamna tawh ka sanggamnu ka zo hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama in Naftali phuak hi. Leah in ta neih a tawp lam a kimuh ciangin, amah in a numei-nasem Zilpah la-in Jakob tungah zi-in pia hi. Tua ciangin Leah’ numei-nasem Zilpah’ in Jakob tawh tapa khat nei hi, Leah in, “Kaam pha!” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Gad phuak hi. Leah’ numei-nasem Zilpah in Jakob tawh a nihna tapa nei hi. Leah in, “Kei lungdam ing! Bang hang hiam cih leh numeite in kei a lungdam hong ci ding hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama min' Asher phuak hi. Mangbuh lak hun lai takin Reuben pai-in gam lakah zawl-ai kungte va mu a, tuate a nu Leah’ kiangah ciahpih hi. Tua ciangin Rachel in Leah’ kiangah, “Na tapa’ zawl-aikungte kimkhat kei hong pia in, hong thum ing,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Leah in, “Ka pasal nong suh thuneu sa na hi hiam? Ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte zong hong sut lai ding na hi hiam?” ci hi. Rachel in, “Tua ahih leh na tapa’ zawl-ai man dingin tu zan-in amah in nang tawh hong lumkhawm thei ding hi,” ci hi. Nitakin lo panin Jakob hong ciah ciangin, amah dawn dingin Leah paikhia a, “Kei kiangah hong lum in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte tawh nang kong cial zo hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua zan amah tawh lum khawm hi. Pasian in Leah thu ngai a, amah gai-in Jakob tawh tapa a ngana nei hi. Leah in, “Ka pasal' tungah ka numei-nasem pia ka hih manin Pasian in ka thacial hong pia hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Issakhar phuak hi. Leah gai kik a, Jakob tawh a gukna tapa nei hi. Tua ciangin Leah in, “Pasian in mo-ken hoih kei hong guan hi; tu-in ka pasal in kei hong pahtawi ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh tapa guk ka nei khin hi,” ci hi; tua ahih ciangin ama' min Zebulun phuak hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in tanu khat nei a, a min Dinah phuak hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in Rachel phawk a, Pasian in ama' thu ngai-in a naubu hon’sak hi. Amah gai-in tapa khata nei a, “Pasian in kei hong kikona teng lakhia khin ta hi,” ci hi; amah in a min Josef phuak a, “Topa in tapa khat hong pia beh hen!” ci hi. Rachel in Josef a neih khit ciangin Jakob in Laban' kiangah, “Keima' inn leh ka gamah ka ciah theih nadingin kei hong sawl in. Nang' tunga kong thalawhsa ka zite leh ka tate hong pia in la, hong paisak in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma' na kong sepsaksa na thei hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Laban in ama' kiangah, “Na maipha ka ngah leh hehpihna tawh om dih in. Topa in nangma' hangin kei thupha hong piakna ka thei hi; na thamante a min hong lo in la, nang kong pia ding hi,” ci hi. Jakob in ama' kiangah, “Nangma' na kong sepsak khitna leh keima' kep sungin na ganhingte tampi a phakna nangmahmah in na thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong pai ma-in nang in tawm bek na nei a, tu-in tampi takin khang hi; ka kiheina peuhah Topa in nang thupha hong pia hi. Ahih hangin tu-in keima' innkuan ading cik ciangin ke’n vaihawm ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Nang bang hong pia ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Jakob in, “Bangmah nong pia kei ding hi; hih bangin nong hih nak leh na tuuhonte vak kikin ka kem ding hi: tu ni-in na tuuhonte khempeuh lakah hong paisak in la, tua sung panin tuu a puang leh a gial khempeuh leh tuuno a vom khempeuh leh keel lak panin a gial leh a puang khempeuh hong khen khiasak in; tuate in keima thaman hi ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin nang' tung pan-a ka thaman en dinga nong pai ciangin ka thumanna in kei adingin hong kinung latsak ding hi. Keel lakah a puang lo leh a gial lo khempeuh leh tuuno lakah a vom lo khempeuh, kei' kiangah a kimuh zenzen leh, guk-in kiseh pah ding hi,” ci hi. Laban in, “Hoih hi! Na cihsa bangin hisak in,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Laban in tua ni-in keeltal a dung gial leh a bem gialte, keelpi a puang leh a gialte, a tungah a kang mun a om khempeuh leh tuuno a vom khempeuh lakhia-in, ama' tapate’ kep dingin tuate koih hi; Jakob kiang panin ni thum paina a gamlapi-ah tuute paipih hi. Jakob in Laban’ tuuhon a om lai teng an vak hi. Tua ciangin Jakob in poplar kung, almond kung leh hiangpa kungte' tung pan ciangkhut ding a thak satin la a, a ciangkhutte a kang mun a om dingin kheh a, a ciangkang kaangte kidawksak hi. Amah in a khehsa ciangkangte tui luang, tui piakna tuikuang, tuuhonte tui dawn dinga hong paina mun, tuuhonte' mai-ah koih hi. Amaute nisa nuai-ah om-in tuidawn dingin hong pai uh ciangin a nu leh a pa omkhawm uh ahih manin, tuuhonte tua ciangkangte' mai-ah omkhawm uh a, tua ahih ciangin tuuhonte in a dung gial, a puang leh a gial tuuno ta nei uh hi. Jakob in tuunote khenkhia a, tuuhon a dung gialte leh Laban’ tuuhon sunga a vom khempeuhte’ kimai ngatsak hi; amah in ama aa honte a tuamin koih khia-in, Laban’ tuuhonte tawh koihkhawm lo hi. Tuuhon sung panin a thahatzawte a huk ciangin, amaute tua ciangkangte lakah a gai theih nadingin Jakob in tuuhonte’ mit mai, tui luang sungah a ciangkangte koih hi, ahih hangin tuuhon a gina lote’ mai-ah tua ciangkangte koih lo hi; tua ahih ciangin a gina lo zawte Laban’ aa hi a, a thahat zawte Jakob’ aa ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin a hauhna nakpi takin khang a, tuuhon lianpi, numei-nasem, kalaoh leh late nei hi.

CHAPTER.VERS: Laban’ tapate in, “Jakob in i pa’ aa khempeuh la khin hi; i pa’ neihsa tung panin amah in hih hauhna ngah hi,” a cihna tu-in Jakob in za hi.
Laban in nidang bangin maipha tawh amah a don lohna Jakob in mu hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jakob' kiangah, “Na pate leh na behte’ gamah ciahkik in, keimah in nang tawh kong om ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in mi sawlin ama' tuuhon a omna gam lakah Rachel leh Leah samsak a,
amaute' kiangah, “Na pa un nidang bangin maipha tawh kei hong don lohna ka mu hi. Ahih hangin ka pa’ Pasian in kei tawh om hi.
Ka tha neih khempeuh tawh na pa’ na ka sepna na thei uh hi;
ahi zongin na pa un kei hong khemin, ka thaman sawm vei khel khin a, ahih hangin kei hong gimsak ding Pasian in amah phal lo hi.

Amah in, ‘A gialte na thaman hi ding hi,’ ci leh tua ciangin tuuhon khempeuh in a gial ta nei hi; amah in, ‘A dung gialte na thaman hi ding hi,’ ci leh tua ciangin tuuhon khempeuh in a dung gial ta nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in na pa’ ganhing khempeuh lakhia-in tuate keima' tungah hong pia zo hi.
Ganhonte ta nei dingin a kikholh hunin ka khuadak to a, a honte tunga a diang keeltal khempeuh dung gial, bem gial, puangin a omna ka mangin ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi in ka mang sungah, ‘Jakob,’ hong ci a, ke’n ‘Hiah om ing!’ ka ci hi.
Amah in, ‘Khuadak to in la en in, a honte tunga a diang keelte khempeuh dung gial, bem gial-in puang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Laban in nang' tunga hong bawlna ka mu khin hi.
Keimah in nang in khuam khat sathau nuhin kei' tungah thuciamna nong bawlna mun Beth-el Pasian ka hi hi. Tu-in tho in la, hih gam panin paikhia-in, na suahna gam-ah ciahkik in,’ hong ci hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Rachel leh Leah in amah dawngin, “I pa’ inn sungah ei tanh ding ahi a, ei luah ding ahi zongin om ahi hiam?
Amah in eite gamdang mi bangin hong ngaihsun hilo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite hong zuak khin a, eite adinga hong kipia sum amah in zang mang khin hi.
I pa’ tung panin Pasian in a lakkhiatsa neihsa khempeuh eite leh i tate’ aa ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin tu- in, nang' tunga Pasian’ hong cih peuhpeuh hih in,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob ding-in a tapate leh a zite kalaohte' tungah tuangsak hi;
amah in a ganhing khempeuh, a ngahsa khempeuh, Paddanaram gamsunga a ngah ama neihsa ganhing khempeuh, a pa Isaak’ omna Kanaan gamah pai dingin hawl khia hi.
Laban a tuu mul met dingin pai khia a, Rachel in a pa’ inn sung pasiante gu hi.
Jakob in Aram mi Laban khem a, tai ding a sawmna amah in gen lo hi.
Amah a neihsa khempeuh tawh tai-in, Eufrates gun kantan a, Gilead gam mualtung lam ma-nawh hi.
Jakob tai hi, ci-in a ni thum ni-in Laban’ tungah a kigen ciangin,
amah in a behte zawnin ni sagih sung amah delh a, Gilead gam mualtungah amah pha dekdek uh hi.
Ahih hangin Aram mi Laban' kiangah zan-in mang sungah Pasian hong pai a, ama' kiangah, Jakob' tungah a pha hita leh a sia hita leh kam khat beek na pau loh nadingin kidawm in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob pha hi. Tu-in Jakob in Gilead mualtung gamah a puanbuk lam a, Laban leh a behte in Gilead gam mual tungah phual sat uh hi,
Laban in Jakob' kiangah, “Nang bangci tat na hi hiam? Kei hong khemin, gal mat bangin ka tanute bang hangin paikhiatpih na hi hiam?
Bang hangin tai simin kei hong khem a, hong gen lo na hi hiam? Tua ci kei lecin, lungdamna leh lasakna, khuang leh laiza tawh kong kha ding hi.
Bang hangin ka tapate leh ka tanute mangpha khakna hong namsak lo na hi hiam? Tu-in na hai gamtat khin hi.
Nang kong siatsak ding keima' thu ahi hi; ahih hangin na pa’ Pasian in zan zan-in kei' kiangah thu hong gen a, ‘Jakob' tungah a pha hita leh a sia hita leh na gen ding kidawm in,’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in nang in na pa’ inn nakpi takin lunggulh na hih manin na paikhia khin ta hi, ahih hangin bang hangin ka pasiante gu na hi hiam?” ci hi.
Jakob in Laban dawngin, “Kei' kiang panin na tanute thakhat thu-in nong suh khak ding ka launa hang ahi hi.
Na pasiante na muhna mi peuhpeuh nungta lo ding hi. I behte’ muhna-ah nang aa ahi, kei' neih a om leh kawkkhia in la, la in,” ci hi. Tu-in Rachel in tuate a na guk lam Jakob in thei kha lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Laban in Jakob’ puanbuk, Leah’ puanbuk, numei-nasem nihte’ puanbuk sungah pai a, ahih hangin amah in tuate mu lo hi. Leah’ puanbuk panin amah paikhia a, Rachel’ puanbuk sungah lut hi.
Tu-in Rachel in innsung pasiante la khin a, kalaoh tutphah sungah koihin, tuate' tungah tu hi. Laban in puanbuk sung teng khempeuh zawt a, ahih hangin tuate mu lo hi.

Amah in a pa' kiangah, “Nang' mai-ah hong ding thei lo ka hih manin ka topa heh kei in, bang hang hiam cih leh numei ngeina ka nei hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in mun dang khempeuh zong a, ahih hangin inn sung pasiante mu lo hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob a heh suak a, Laban mawhsak hi; Jakob in Laban' kiangah, “Ka mawhna bang ahi hiam? Nasia tak-a kei nong delh nadingin ka khialhna bang ahi hiam?
Ka na khempeuh na zawt kim khit hangin na innsung nate khempeuh bang mu na hi hiam? Eite gel' kikal-ah amaute in a khen theih nadingin keima' behte leh nangma' behte' mai-ah koih khia in.
Hih kum sawmnih sung nang tawh ka om khin hi; na tuupi leh na keelpite ta-tolh nai lo a, na tuuhonte' sung pan tuutalte ka ne kei hi.
Gamlak ganhingte’ balzante nang' kiangah kong puak kei hi; tua supna keimahmah in ka thuak hi; sun-a kigu hita leh zan-a kigu hita leh kei nong lohsak hi.
Keimah in tua bang ka hi hi; sun-in a sa in hong kang a, zan-in a vot in hong tawp a, ka ihmu ngei kei hi.
Hih kum sawmnih sung na inn sungah kong om khin hi; na tanu nihte kum sawm-le-li sung kong thalawh a, na tuuhonte kum guk sung kong thalawh a, nangmah in ka thaman sawm vei na kheel hi.

Ka pa’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian leh Isaak’ Zahtakpa in kei hong ompih lo hi leh, tu-in nangmah in khuthawm guakin kei nong sawlkhia taktak ding hi. Pasian in ka thuakna leh ka khutte’ nasepna mu a, zan zan-in nang hong thuhilh hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Laban in dawngin Jakob kiangah, “Tanute in keima' tanu hi, naupangte in keima' naupang hi, tuuhonte in keima' tuuhon hi, na muh khempeuh keima aa ahi hi. Ahih hangin tu ni-in hih ka tanute hita leh amau' sung pan-a piang naupangte' tung hita leh ke’n bang hihsak thei ding ka hi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai in, nang leh kei in thuciamna khat bawl ni; nang leh kei’ kikal-ah teci hisak ni,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in suang khat la-in khuamin phut hi.
Jakob in a behte' kiangah, “Suang khawm un,” ci a, amaute in suang la-in suangcian khat bawl uh hi; tua suangcian' gei-ah amaute in an ne khawm uh hi.
Laban in Jegarsahadutha ci hi; ahih hangin Jakob in Galeed ci hi.
Laban in, “Hih suangcian in tu ni-in nang leh kei' kikal-ah teci ahi hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Galeed ci-in min phuak a,
a khuam pen Mizpah ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Eite khat leh khat i tuam om ciangin Topa in nang leh kei’ kikal hong encik hen.
Ka tanute na bawlsiat a, ka tanute’ ban-ah zi na lak beh leh, eite tawh kuamah a om loh hangin nang leh kei' kikal-ah Pasian in teci a hihna phawk in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob' kiangah, “Nang leh kei’ kikal-ah ka phuhsa hih suangcian leh khuam mu in.

Siatna bawl dingin keimah in hih suangcian kheng-in nang' kiangah kong pai loh nading, nang in hih suangcian leh khuam kheng-in kei' kiangah nong pai loh nadingin hih suangcian in teci khat ahi hi, khuam in teci khat ahi hi.
Abraham’ Pasian leh Nahor’ Pasian, amau pate’ Pasian in eite' kikal-ah thu khen ta hen,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in ama' pa Isaak' Zahtakpa tawh kiciam hi,
Jakob in mualtungah biak piakna pia-in an ne dingin a behte sam hi; amaute in an ne-in zan tawntung mualtungah om uh hi.
Zingsang tungin Laban tho-in, a tute leh a tanute namin amaute thupha pia hi; tua ciangin amah pai khia-in innah ciahkik hi.
Jakob ama' lampi-ah paisuak a, Pasian’ vantungmite in amah dawn hi;
Jakob in amaute a muh ciangin amah in, “Hih in Pasian’ galkapte hi!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Mahanaim ci-in min phuak hi.
Jakob in Edom gam, Seir leitangah a om a sanggampa Esau' kiangah kamtaite ma sawl a,
amaute hilhin, “Note in ka topa Esau' kiangah hih bangin na ci ding uh hi: Na nasempa Jakob in, 'Laban' kiangah peemta-in ka om a, tu ciang dong ka om hi;
keimah in bawng-tal, la, tuuhon, pasal-nasem leh numei-nasemte ka nei hi; na mai-ah maipha ka muh theih nadingin ka topa’ tungah a gen dingin kong sawl hi,’ ci un,” ci hi.
Kamtaite Jakob kiangah hong ciahkik uh a, “Na sanggampa Esau' kiangah ka va pai uh hi, nangmah dawn dingin amah hong pai a, amah tawh mihing za li om hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob nakpi takin lau-in lungkham hi; amah in ama' kianga om mite, tuuhonte, bawnghonte leh kalaohte pawl nih-in khen hi,
“Pawl khatah Esau pai-in a suksiat leh a pawl khat suakta ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Jakob in, “Ka pa Abraham’ Pasian leh ka pa Isaak’ Pasian, keimah' kiangah, ‘Na gam leh na behte' kiangah ciahkik in, nang' tungah hoihna kong bawl ding hi,’ hong ci Topa aw,

Keimah in na itna kip khempeuh lak pan a neu pen leh na nasempa' tunga nong lahsa na thumannate khempeuh tawh ka kilawm kei hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ka ciangkhut guak tawh hih Jordan ka kantan hi; tu-in pawl nih ka cing khin ta hi.
Ka sanggampa Esau’ khut sung pan, kei hong khahkhia in, kong thum hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai-in kei leh, nute, naupangte tawh hong thah khit khak ding ka lau hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah in, ‘Nang' tungah hoihna kong bawl ding a, a honpi a kisim thei loin na suan-le-khakte tuipi sehnel zahin ka bawl ding hi,’ na ci hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah tua zan-in tua lai-ah giak a, ama' neih sung panin a sanggampa Esau’ ading letsong
keelpi za nih leh keeltal sawmnih, tuupi za nih leh tuutal sawmnih,
kalaoh nawi-suk sawmthum leh a note, bawngpi sawmli leh bawngtal sawm, lapi sawmnih leh latal sawm la hi.
Amah in hihte a nasemte’ khut sungah amau’ hon ciatin pia a, ama' nasemte' kiangah, “Ka mai-ah na paisuak un la, hon khat leh hon khat kikal kihalsak un,” ci hi.
Amah in a masa pente' tungah thuhilh a, “Ka sanggampa Esau in note hong dawnin, ‘Kua’ aa na hi uh hiam? Koi-a pai ding na hi uh hiam? Na mai uh-a om hihte kua aa ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot ciangin,
note in, ‘Na nasempa Jakob aa ahi hi; hihte in ka topa Esau’ tungah letsong a hong kipuak ahi hi; tua tham loin amah ka nung uhah om hi,’ ci un,” ci hi.
Amah in tua mah bangin a nihna, a thumna leh ganhing honte a zuite khempeuh' kiangah, “Amah tawh na kituah uh ciangin Esau' kiangah a kibangmah-in na gen ding uh hi,

note in, ‘Tua tham loin na nasempa Jakob ka nung uhah om hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka mai-a pai letsong tawh amah ka lungdamsak zo kha ding a, tua khit ciangin ama' mai ka mu ding hi; amah in kei hong sang kha ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama' mai-ah letsong paisak hi; amahmah tua zan-in giahphual-ah giak lai hi.
Tua zan mahin amah tho-in a zi nihte, a numei-nasem nihte, leh a ta sawm-le-khatte la-in, Jabbok ngahmun kantan hi.
Amah in amaute la-in lui gal khatah puak hi, tua mah bangin a neih khempeuh zong galkahsak hi.
Jakob amah guak bek om lai hi; zingsang khuavak dong mi khat in amah lai hi.
Tua mipa in Jakob a zawh lohna a muh ciangin amah in a khelkom sung suksak hi; tua banga amah tawh a kilaina-in Jakob’ khelguh kilawi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Khuavak ta ahih ciangin hong khah in,” ci hi. Ahih hangin Jakob in, “Kei thupha nong piak kei leh kong khah kei ding hi,” ci hi.
Amah in ama' kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Jakob,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Na min Jakob kici nawn loin Israel kici ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian leh mite tawh na kilai khin a, na zo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in amah dongin, “Na min hong gen in, hong thum ing,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Bang hanga ka min hong dong na hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua lai-ah amah in thupha pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in tua mun Peniel ci-in phuak hi, “Bang hang hiam cih leh maitang kituahin Pasian ka mu khin a, ahi zongin kei hong kihing khawi lai hi,” ci hi.
A khelpi’ hangin amah bai kawm-in Peniel a kantan lai takin ni hong suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Israel mite in khelkom tunga a om khel thagui ne lo uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Jakob’ khelkom, a khel thagui tung a sukna hang ahi hi.
Jakob khuadak a, en in, Esau hong pai a, amah tawh mihing zali hong pai mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Leah leh Rachel leh numei-nasem nihte lakah naupangte khen hi.
Amah in numei-nasemte leh a tate a masa penin, tua ciangin Leah leh a tate leh Rachel leh Josef a nunung penin koih hi.
Amahmah pen amaute' mai-ah pai-in, a sanggampa' kiang nai a tun’ matengin lei lak lamah sagih vei kun hi.
Ahih hangin amah dawn dingin Esau hong tai-in, amah ngawng kawi a, pom cipin nam a, amaute kap uh hi.
Esau khuadak to-in nupite leh naupangte a muh ciangin, amah in, “Nang tawh a om hihte kuate ahi hiam?” ci hi. Jakob in, “Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei-nasemte hong nai uh a, amau leh a tate hong kun uh hi;
Leah leh a tate zong tua bangmahin hong nai a, kun uh hi; a nunung penin Josef leh Rachel hong nai uh a, amaute kun uh hi.
Esau in, “Ka kituahpih hih a honte khempeuh bang na cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci hi. Jakob in dawngin, “Ka topa’ muhna-ah maipha zon’ nading,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Esau in, “A kicing nei ing, sanggam aw; nang’ neihte nangma adingin kem in,” ci hi.

Jakob in, “Hilo hi, nang' tungah hong thum ing, na muhna-ah maipha ngah ka hih leh ka khut sung panin ka letsongte hong sang in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih banga maipha tawh kei nong san’na, na maitang ka muh ding pen, Pasian’ maitang muh tawh kibang taktak hi.

Nang' kianga hong kipaipih ka letsong nong san’ nadingin hong thum ing, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kei' tungah hehpih mahmahna tawh hong gamta a, a kicing ka nei hi,” ci hi. Tua bangin amah in kun teitei ahih manin amah in zong sang hi.
Tua ciangin Esau in, “I lampi-ah pai ni, na mai-ah kei ka pai ding hi,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin Jakob in ama kiangah, “Naupangte a hat lohna ka topa in na thei hi, tuuhonte leh bawnghonte a no ngek neite ka lung phamawh hi; ni khat sung kinak hawl lua leh gan honte khempeuh si ding uh hi.

Ama' nasempa’ mai-ah ka topa na pai in la, Seir-ah ka topa kiang kong tun matengin ka mai-a om ganhingte’ thahatna tawh kituak leh, naupangte’ hatna tawh kituakin dam damin kong makaih ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Esau in, “Kei tawh a om mite pawl khat nang' kiangah hong nusia ning,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “A kisapna bang om ahi hiam? Ka topa’ muhna-ah kei maipha hong musak in,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Esau in tua ni-in ama' lampi zui-in Seir-ah ciahkik hi.
Ahih hangin Sukkot lamah Jakob pai a, ama ading inn leh a ganhingte’ ading hampheng lam hi; tua ahih ciangin tua mun min Sukkot kici hi.
Paddan-aram panin hong paina lampi, Kanaan gamsunga om, Shekhem khuapi-ah lungmuang takin Jakob hong tung hi; khuapi mai-ah amah in phual sat hi.
Amah in Shekhem’ pa Hamor’ tapate tung panin a puanbuk lamnasa leitang dangka zakhat tawh lei hi.
Tua lai-ah amah in biakna tau khat phut a, El-Elohe-Israel ci-in min phuak hi.
Tu-in Jakob leh Leah’ tanu Dinah tua gam numeite' kiangah hawh dingin paikhia hi;
Hiv mi Hamor’ tapa Shekhem,tua gam ulianpa in amah a muh ciangin, amah in manin luppih a, siasak hi.
Ama' lungsim Jakob’ tanu Dinah’ lamah pai hi; amah in tua numei itin ama' tungah kamkhum takin pau hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Shekhem in a pa Hamor kiangah, “Hih numei ka zi dingin hong laksak in,” ci hi.
Tu-in Jakob in amah in a tanu Dinah a siatsakna za hi; ahih hangin a tate a ganhingte tawh gam lakah om ahih manin amaute hong tun’ matengin Jakob in bangmah gen loin om hi.
Shekhem’ pa Hamor amah tawh kimu dingin Jakob kiangah va pai hi.

Jakob’ tapate in tua thu a zak uh ciangin gam lak panin hong ciah uh hi; amaute lungkim loin heh mahmah uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob’ tanu tawh a lup khop manin amah in Israel sungah haigamtatna hong tun’ hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang hih ding a kilawm lo na ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Hamor in amaute tawh thu gen a, “Ka tapa Shekhem in na tanu ngai mahmah hi; a ten’pih dingin ama' tungah pia in, kong thum hi.
Kote tawh kiten’na hong bawl un; na tanute kote' tungah hong pia un la, no’ adingin ka tanute uh la un.
Kote' lakah nong teeng ding uh hi; no adingin leitang hong kipia ding hi; tua sungah teengin sum bawl un la, tua sungah neihsa lam un,” ci hi.
Shekhem in a numei’ pa leh a numei’ sanggamte kiangah, “Note’ mit-ah maipha hong musak un la, kei' tunga nong cih peuhpeuh uh kong pia ding hi.
Kei' kiang panin mo-man leh letsong tampi hong ngen un, kei' tunga nong cih zah uh kong pia ding hi; ka zi dingin a numei hong pia hoh un,” ci thuah lai hi.
Amah in a sanggamnu uh Dinah siasak khin ahih manin Jakob’ tapate in Shekhem leh a pa Hamor khemna tawh dawng uh hi.
Amaute in amau' kiangah, “Vun ki-at lopa' tungah ka sanggamnu uh ka piak ding uh ka ngaihsun thei kei uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang hihna in ko adingin mindaina hi ding hi.
Hih bangin nong gamtat uh leh ka thukim bek ding uh hi: note' sung pan pasal khempeuh vun ki-at le uh cin kote mah bang na suak ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka tanute uh note' tungah hong pia-in, na tanute uh kote’ adingin kong la ding uh a, note tawh kote hong tengin mikhat i suak ding hi.
Ahih hangin note in ka thu uh hong ngai loin vun na ki-at kei uh leh, ka sanggamnu uh ka la ding uh a, kote ka paikhia ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Amau’ thugennate in Hamor leh Hamor’ tapa Shekhem lungdamsak hi.
Tangvalpa tua banga a gamtat ding zekai lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Jakob’ tanu deih hi. Tu-in amah in a innkuan khempeuh sung panin a kipahtawi pen ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hamor leh a tapa Shekhem amau’ khuapi kulhpi kongpi-ah hong pai-in a khuapih mite uh kiangah thu gen a,

“Hih mite in eite' tungah nop mahmah uh hi; i gamsungah tengsakin sum bawlsak ni, bang hang hiam cih leh en un, amau’ ading a kicing dingin leitang zai hi; amau’ tanute zi-in ten’pih ni, eite’ tanute zong amau pia ni.
Hih thu khat bek tawh eite tawh ten’ khop ding, mikhat suah ding amau thukim uh hi: amaute vun a ki-at bangin eite' lakah pasal khempeuh vun ki-at ding hi.
Amau’ bawngte, amau, neihsate leh amau’ ganhingte khempeuh ei ading hi lo ahi hiam? Amaute tawh eite thukim hoh ni, tua hi leh amaute in eite tawh hong teng khawm ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Khuapi kulh kongpi-ah a pai mi khempeuh in Hamor leh a tapa Shekhem’ thu mang uh hi; khuapi kulh kongpi-ah a paikhia pasal khempeuh vun ki-at uh hi.
A ni thum ni, amaute meima vei-in a om ciangun, Jakob’ tapa nihte, Dinah’ sanggamte Simeon leh Levi in amau’ namsau la-in theih kholh lohin khuapi va sim uh a, pasal khempeuh that uh hi.
Amaute in Hamor leh a tapa Shekhem namsau tawh that uh a, Shekhem’ inn sung panin Dinah lakhia-in, paikhia uh hi.
Jakob’ tapa dangte in a kithat mite’ tung tawnin khuapi susia uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggamnu uh kisiasak hi;
amaute in a tuuhonte leh a bawnghonte, a late leh khuapi sunga om peuhmah leh lo sunga om peuhmah laksak uh hi;
amau’ hauhna khempeuh, a naupangte khempeuh leh a zite khempeuh, inn sunga om na khempeuh, matsak uh a, amau' neihsa suaksak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jakob in Simeon leh Levi kiangah, “Hih leitang-a teng, Kanaan mite leh Perez mite' tungah kei a muhdahhuai-in nong bawlna uh tawh kei' tungah haksatna nong tun’ uh hi; kei’ pawl mite tawm hi, amaute kei langah kikaikhawmin kei hong sim leh, kei leh ka innkuanpihte hong susia ding hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Amah in ka sanggamnu uh numei paktat bangin a bawl ding kilawm ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.

Pasian in Jakob' kiangah, “Tho in, Beth-el-ah paito in la, tua lai-ah teng in; na sanggampa Esau kiang panin na tai hun lai-a nang' tungah a hong kilang Pasian adingin biakna tau khat bawl in,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in a innkuanpihte leh amah tawh a omte khempeuh' kiangah, “Note' lakah a om gamdang pasiante koih khia un la, nomau kisian’suahin, na puante uh kheek un;
tua ciangin ka lungkham hunin hong huhin, ka paina khempeuhah a hong ompih Pasian’ adingin biakna tau khat ka bawl theihna dingin eite kipanin Beth-el-ah paito ni,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jakob’ tungah amau’ neih gamdang pasian khempeuh leh a bil-uh a, om bilbahte pia uh hi; Jakob in Shekhem khua gei-a tawsaw nuai-ah tuate seel hi.
Amaute khualzinin a pai lai takun amau’ kiim-a om khuapite' tungah Pasian' kiang panin lauhuaina lianpi khat tung ahih manin amaute in Jakob’ tapate delh lo uh hi.
Kanaan gam sunga om Luz (Beth-el)-ah amah leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tawh Jakob tung a,
tua lai-ah amah in biakna tau khat lamin, tua mun Elbethel ci-in min phuak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggampa' kiang panin a tai lai-in tua munah ama' tungah Pasian mahmah kilang hi.
Tua ciangin Rebekah a cingnu Deborah si a, Beth-el khang tawsaw nuai-ah amah kivui hi; tua ahih ciangin tua mun min in Allon-bakuth kici hi.
Paddan-aram panin amah hong pai ciangin Jakob' tungah Pasian kilang kik a, amah thupha pia hi.
Pasian in ama' kiangah, “Na min in Jakob ahi hi; ahi zongin tu-a kipanin nangma min in Jakob kici nawn lo ding a, Israel in nangma' min hi ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Israel kici hi.
Pasian in ama kiangah, “Keimah in Vanglian Pasian ka hi hi: pung in la, tampi pha in; minam khat leh minamte honkhat nang' sung panin piang ding a, nang' sung panin kumpite piang ding hi.
Abraham leh Isaak tunga ka piak leitang nangma' tungah kong pia ding a, nang' khit cianga na suan-le-khakte' tungah tua leitang ka pia ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a kihona mun ama' kiang panin Pasian paito hi.
Jakob in amah tawh a kihona munah suang khuam khat phut hi; amah in tua tungah leenggahzu tawh biak piakna sungkhia hi, tua tungah sathau zong sung hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Pasian in amah a hopihna mun a min Beth-el ci hi.
Tua ciangin Beth-el panin amaute khualzin hi; amaute Efrat panin a gamla sim lai mun a tun’ lai takun Rachel a nausuah hun tung a, amah nakpi takin gim hi.
Amah a gim mahmah lai takin naudomnu in ama' kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in tapa dang khat na nei ding hi,” ci hi.
Amah a bei lai takin amah in a min Ben-om ci hi; ahih hangin a pa in ama' min Benjamin ci-in phuak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Rachael si-in, Efrat (Bethlehem) paina lampi-ah kivui a,
Jakob in ama' han tungah khuam khat phut hi; tua in tu ni dongin tua lai-a a om Rachel’ han khuam ahi hi.
Israel in a khualzin zom lai a, Eder tausang gal khatah a puanbuk lam hi.
Tua gamah Israel a ten’ lai takin Reuben in a pa’ zi-neu Bilhah luppih hi; Israel in tua thu za hi. Tu-in Jakob’ tapate in sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Leah’ tapate: Reuben (Jakob’ ta u pen), Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar leh Zebulun ahi hi.
Rachel’ tapate: Josef leh Benjamin ahi hi.
Rachel’ numei-nasem Bilhah’ tapate: Dan leh Naftali ahi hi.
Leah' numei-nasem Zilpah’ tapate: Gad leh Asher ahi hi. Hihte in Paddan-aram gamah ama' sunga suak Jakob’ tapa sawm-le-nihte ahi hi.
Abraham leh Isaak tawl khat a omna Mamre ahih kei leh Kiriatharba (Hebron) a, a pa Isaak a omna-ah Jakob hong pai hi.
Tu-in Isaak’ khan’ sung in kum za leh kum sawmgiat ahi hi.
Isaak in a nunung pen a hu sang hi; amah a teek, kum tampi pha-in si a, ama' mite kiangah kigawm hi; ama' tapa Esau leh Jakob in amah vui hi.
Hihte in Esau' (Edom) tangthu ahi hi.
Esau in Kanaan mite zi-in la hi; Hit mi Elon’ tanu Adah, Hiv mi Zibeon’ tapa Anah’ tanu Oholibamah,
leh Nebaioth’ sanggamnu, Ishmael’ tanu Basemath ahi hi.
Adah in Esau tawh Efifaz nei hi; Basemath in Re-u-el nei hi;
Oholibamah in Jeush Jalam leh Korah nei hi. Hihte in Kanaan gamsunga ama' neih Esau’ tapate ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Esau in a zite, a tapate, a tanute, leh ama' innkuan sunga mi khempeuh, a bawngte, a ganhingte khempeuh, leh Kanaan gamsunga a lam a neihsa khempeuh la hi; a sanggampa Jakob' kiang panin gam khatah paikhia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ten’ khop theih dingin amau’ neihsate tam lua hi; a ganhingte uh hangin tawl khat a omna uh leitang in amaute vaak zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Seir mual tung gamah Esau teng hi; Esau in Edom ahi hi.
Hihte in Seir mual tung gam-a Edom mite’ pa Esau’ tangthu ahi hi.
Esau’ tapate’ min in: Esau’ zi Adah’ tapa Elifaz, Esau’ zi Basemath’ tapa Re-u-el
Elifaz’ tapate in Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, leh Kenaz ahi hi.
(Timna in Esau’ tapa Elifaz’ zi-neu ahi hi; amah in Elifaz tawh Amalek nei hi.) Hihte in Esau’ zi Adah’ tapate ahi hi.
Re-u-el’ tapate in: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, leh Mizzah ahi hi. Hihte in Esau’ zi Basemath’ tapate ahi hi.
Esau’ zi, Zibeon’ tapa Anah’ tanu Oholibamah’ tapate in: amah in Esau tawh Jeush, Jalam leh Korah nei hi.
Hih-te in Esau’ tapate' sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi. Esau’ ta masa Elifaz’ tapate in: ukpite Teman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz,
Korah, Gatam leh Amalek ahi uh hi; hihte in Edom gamsungah Elifaz’ suan ukpite ahi uh hi; amaute in Adah’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Esau’ tapa ahi Re-u-el’ tapate in: ukpite Nahath, Zerah, Shamah, leh Mizzah ahi uh hi: hihte in Edom gamsungah Re-u-el’ sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi; amaute in Esau’ zi, Basemath’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Esau’ zi, Oholibamah’ tapate in: ukpite Jeush, Jalam, leh Korah ahi uh hi; hihte in Esau’ zi, Anah’ tanu Oholibamah sung panin a suak ukpite ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Esau’ (Edom) tapate hi a, hihte in amaute’ sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi.
Tua gam-a teng Hori mi Seir’ tapate in: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
Dishon, Ezer leh Dishan ahi hi; hihte in Edom gamsunga Seir’ tapate ahi Hori mite’ sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi.
Lotan’ tapate in Hori leh Homan ahi uh hi; Lotan’ sanggamnu in Timna ahi hi.
Shobal’ tapate in: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shefo, leh Onam ahi uh hi.
Zibeon’ tapate in: Ai-ah leh Anah ahi hi; amah in a pa Zibeon’ late a cin’ lai takin gam lakah a sa ciktui a mupa Anah ahi hi.
Anah’ tate in: Dishon leh Anah’ tanu Oholimah ahi hi.
Dishon’ tapate in: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran leh Kheran ahi hi;
Ezer’ tapate in: Bilhan, Za-avan leh Akan ahi uh hi.
Dishan’ tapate in: Uz leh Aran ahi uh hi.
Hori mite’ ukpite in: ukpite Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
Dishon, Ezer, leh Dishan ahi uh hi; hihte in Seir gamsungah amau’ beh ciatin Hori mite’ sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Israel mite' tungah kumpi khat beek in a uk ma-in Edom gamsunga kumpite ahi uh hi.
Beor’ tapa Bela in Edom gamsung uk hi, ama' khuapi min in Dinhabah ahi hi.
Bela si a, Bozrah khuami Zerah’ tapa Jobab in ama' tangin uk hi.
Jobab si a, Teman mite’ gam mi Husham in ama' tangin uk hi.
Husham si a, Moab gam sungah Midian mite a zo Bedad’ tapa Hadad in ama' tangin uk hi, ama' khuapi min in Avith ahi hi.
Hadad si a, Masrakah khuami Samlah in ama' tangin uk hi.
Samlah si a, Eufrates gun gei-a Rehoboth khuami Shaul in ama' tangin uk hi.
Shaul si a, Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan in ama' tangin uk hi.
Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan si a, Hadad in ama' tangin uk hi, ama' khuapi min in Pau ahi hi; ama zi’ min in Mehetabel hi a, Mezahab’ tanu Matred, Matred’ tanu Mehetabel ahi hi.
Amau’ innkuan leh a ten’na, amau’ min tawh kizui-in, Esau’ sung pan ukpite’ min in: ukpite Timna, Alvah, Jethheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar
Magdiel leh Iram ahi uh hi; hihte in amau’ neih leitang tungah amau’ ten’na tawh kizui-in Edom’ (Edom’ pa Esau’) sung pan ukpite ahi uh hi.
Kanaan gam, a pa tawl khat a omna gamah Jakob teng hi.

Hih in Jakob' innkuante’ tangthu ahi hi. Josef kum sawm-le-sagih pha ahih manin a sanggamte tawh tuuhon cing hi; a pa’ zite Bilhah leh Zilpahte’ tapate tawh amah tangval ahi hi; Josef in a pa uh kiangah amaute siat gen hi.
Tu-in Israel in a ta dangte khatpeuh peuh sangin Josef it zaw hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a teek khit-a a neih a tapa ahi hi; amah in ama' adingin puantualpi bansau khat bawlsak hi.
Ahih hangin a pa un a sanggamte khempeuh sangin amah a it zawkna a sanggamte in a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Josef mudah uh a, nuamtakin amah hopih thei lo uh hi.
Tu-in Josef in mang khat man a, amah in a sanggamte' kiangah a gen ciangin amaute in amah muhdah semsem na-in nei uh hi.
Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Keima' mat hih mang ngai un:
en un, eite in lo lai-ah buhlom i hen a, en un, keima' buhlom tho-in ding tang hi; en un, tua kiim-ah note’ buhlomte kikhawm a, keima' buhlom mai-ah kun uh hi,” ci hi.

A sanggamte in ama' kiangah, “Kote' tungah nang in hong uk ding na hi hiam?” Kote’ tungah ukna nei ding na hi hiam?” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a mangte leh a thugente hangin amah mudah kan uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mang dang khat man a, tua mang a sanggamte' kiangah genin, “En un, mang dang khat ka man hi; en un, ni, kha, leh aksi sawm-le-khatte kei' mai-ah hong kun uh hi,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in a pa leh a sanggamte' kiangah a gen ciangin, a pa in amah tai-in, ama' kiangah, “Nangma' mat hih mang in bang ahi hiam? Kei leh na nu leh na sanggamte in nangma' mai lei lakah a kun dingin hong pai ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci hi.
A sanggamte in amah haza uh a, ahih hangin a pa in hi thugenna ciamteh hi.
Tu-in a pa uh’ tuuhonte cing dingin Shekhem gei-ah a sanggamte pai hi.
Israel in Josef kiangah, “Na sanggamte in Shekhem-ah tuuhon cing hilo ahi hiam? Hong pai in, amau' kiangah hong sawl ning,” ci hi. Amah in a kiangah, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kiangah, “Tu-in va pai in la, na sanggamte leh tuuhonte a cidam hiam va thei in; kei' kiangah thu hong zasak kik in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Hebron kuam panin amah sawl a, Shekhem-ah amah tung hi.
Gam lakah a vak kawi kawina mi khat in mu hi; mipa in amah dongin, “Bang zong na hi hiam?” ci hi.
“Ka sanggamte a zong ka hi hi, amaute in koi lai-ah tuuhon cing uh hiam, hong gen in, hong thum ing,” amah in ci hi.
Mipa in, “Amaute paikhia zo uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh, ‘Dothan-ah pai ni,’ a cih uh ka za hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte’ nungah Josef pai a, Dothan-ah amaute mu hi.
Amaute in gamlapi-ah amah na mu uh a, amaute' nai-ah amah hong tun’ma-in amaute in amah thah ding na vaihawm uh hi.
Amaute khat leh khat in “Hih lai-ah mangmanpa hong pai hi.
Tu-in hong pai un, amah that-in dum sung khatah lawn ni; tua ciangin gamsa khat in amah netum khin hi, i ci ding hi, a mangte bang a suak hiam i mu ding hi,” kici uh hi.
Ahih hangin Reuben in tua thu a zak ciangin, “Ama' nuntakna la kei ni,” ci-in, amau’ khut sung panin amah honkhia hi.

A pa’ kiang a tun’pih kik theih nadingin amau' khut sung panin hotkhiat theih nading—Reuben in amaute' kiangah, “Amah that kei un; hih gamlak dum sungah amah lawn un, ahih hangin ama' tungah khut nga kei un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte' kiangah Josef hong tun’ ciangin, puantualpi bansau ama' silh lai ahi a puanpi hawkkhiatsak uh hi;
amaute in amah la-in dum sung khatah lawn uh hi. A dum pen a hawm hi a, a sungah tui om lo hi.
Tua ciangin amaute an ne dingin tu uh hi; a khuadak toh uh leh Gilead panin Ishmael mite a kalaohte uh tawh singnai, lingsi, Mirrah paknamtui pua-in Izipt-ah puak suk dinga a pai mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in a sanggamte' kiangah, “I sanggampa that-in amah i thahna iim lehang bang metna om ahi hiam?
Hong pai un, Ishmael mite' kiangah amah zuak ni, ama' tungah eite’ khut kinga kei hen, bang hang hiam cih leh a mah in i sanggampa, eima ci-le-sa ahi hi,” ci hi. A sanggamte in ama' thu mang hi.

Tua ciangin Midian mi sum bawlte in hong nawk hi; amaute in Josef kai to-in dum sung panin domkhia to uh a, Ishmael mite' tungah ngun shekel sawmnih-in amah zuak uh hi; amaute in Izipt-ah Josef paipih uh hi.
Reuben dum-ah pai kikin dum sungah Josef a om lohna a muh ciangin, amah in a puan balkeek a,
a sanggamte' kiangah ciahkik-in, “Tangvalpa om lo hi; kei bangci ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Josef' puan la-in, keel khat go uh a, a sisan sungah a puan diah uh hi;
amaute in puantualpi bansau puakin a pa uh’ kiangah paipih uh a, “Hih ka mu uh hi; na tapa’ puan hi hiam hilo hiam tu-in thei in,” ci uh hi.
Amah in a hih lam thei a, “Ka tapa’ puan ahi hi; gamsa khat in amah netum khin zo hi; Josef kibalnen gawp a hihna up lohna ding om lo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob' in ama' puan balkeekin, a kawng-ah puanhampi teng a, a tapa' hangin ni tampi sung kap hi.

A tapate leh a tanute khempeuh in amah hehnem dingin kipan uh hi; ahih hangin amah in hehnep ding nial a, “Hi lo hi, a kapsa-in ka tapa' kiang Leinuai-ah ka pai ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama' hangin a pa kap hi.
Tua kikal sungin Midian mite in Izipt gamsunga inncing mang, Faro’ nuai-ah ulian ahi Potifar' tungah Josef zuak uh hi.
ua hun lai takin Judah a sanggamte' kiang panin paisukin, Adullam mi Hirah min nei mi khat tawh omkhawm hi.
Tua lai-ah Judah in Kanaan mi Shua’ tanu mu hi; amah in tua nu ten’pihin luppih a,
tua nu gai-in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Er phuak hi.
Tua nu gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, tua nu in a min Onan phuak hi.
Tua nu in tapa khat nei leuleu-in a min Shelah phuak hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Shelah a neih lai takin Khezib-ah amah om hi.
Judah in a ta masa Er’ adingin zi khat la a, tua nu’ min in Tamar ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Judah’ ta masa Er pen Topa’ muhna-ah gilo hi; Topa in amah that hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in Onan' kiangah, “Na sanggampa’ zi tawh lumkhawm in la, tua nu’ tungah pasal’ sanggamte’ tavuan sem in la, na sanggampa adingin ta nei in,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Onan in a tate pen ama aa a hih loh ding thei hi; tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhawm ciangin a sanggampa tungah ta pia kha ding ahih manin a na tui lei lakah buasak hi.
Ama' gamtatna in Topa’ muhna-ah lungkimhuai lo a, Amah in amah zong that hi.

Tua ciangin Judah in a monu Tamar’ tungah, “Ka tapa Shelah a gol mateng na pa’ innah meigongnu-in va om in,” ci hi—bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggamte mah bangin amah si kha ding ci-in lau hi. Tua ahih ciangin Tamar pai-in a pa’ innah om hi.
Tua hun sungin Judah’ zi, Shua’ tanu si hi; Judah a dahna hun a ven’ ciangin, amah leh Adullam mi a lawm Hirah tawh Timnah-a ama' tuumul a mette kiangah paito hi.
“Na teekpa a tuute mul met dingin Timnah-ah paito hi,” ci-in Tamar' kiangah a kigen ciangin,

a meigong numei puan suahkhia-in, a kituamna silhin amah kituam a, Timnah paina lampi gei-a Enaim paina munah na tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Shelah a khang cing khin a hihna amah in mu a, ahi zongin amah tawh kitengsak nai lo hi.
Judah in tua nu a muh ciangin amah in a mai tuam ahih manin numei paktat dingin ngaihsun hi.

Lampi gei-a tua nu kiangah amah pai a, “Hong pai in, lumkhawm ni,” ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu pen a monu a hih lam thei lo hi. Tua nu in, “I lup khop man dingin kei bang hong pia ding na hi hiam?” ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Keelhon panin keelno khat hong puak ning,” ci hi. Tua nu in, “Nong puak mateng khapna khat nong pia ding hiam?” ci hi.

Amah in, “Bang khapna nang hong pia ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua nu in dawngin, “Na min gelhna leh na khauhual leh na khut sunga om na ciangkhut,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua nu' tungah tuate pia-in, amah luppih a, amah tawh tua nu gai hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingin paikhia a, a kikhuhna puan suahkhia-in meigong numei hihna puansilh hi.
Numei’ khut tung panin a khapna a lakik dingin Judah in Adullam mi a lawmpa a ganno tawh a sawl ciangin, amah in tua nu mu zo lo hi.
Amah in tua lai mun mite dong a, “Lam gei Enaim-a om numei paktat nu koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amaute in, “Hih lai-ah numei paktat om ngei lo hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kiangah amah ciah kikin, “Amah ka mu kei hi; tua lai mun mite in, ‘Hih lai-ah numei paktat om ngei lo hi,’ zong hong ci uh hi,” ci hi.
Judah in dawngin, “Eite hong kinuihsan kha ding ahih ciangin a nate ama adingin kem mai hen; hih ganno ka puak a, nang in tua nu na muh lohna na thei hi,” ci hi.
Tua zawh kha thum ciangin Judah tungah, “Na monu Tamar paktat-in gamta hi; tua tham loin paktatna tawh nau nei hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Judah in, “Amah paikhiatpih un la, amah kihaltum hen,” ci hi.

Amah a kipaikhiatpih lai takin amah in a teekpa kiangah kam vaikhak a, “Hih nate a neipa tawh nau ka nei hi,” ci hi. Tua nu in, “Ciamteh in, hong thum ing, min gelhna leh khauhual leh ciangkhut, hih nate kua’ aa ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in tua nate thei a, “Ka tapa Shelah tawh gawm lo ka hih ciangin, tua numei in kei sangin thuman zaw hi,” ci hi. Tua nu tawh amah lumkhawm kik nawn lo hi.
Tua nu a suah hun a tun’ ciangin a naubu sungah nih om hi.
Nausuak dingin a nat ciangin, khat in a khut dawksak hi; naudomnu in khausan khat la-in a khut tungah khih a, “Hih pen hong pai masa,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin a khut a dawh tum kik lai takin, en in, a sanggampa hong paikhia hi; amah in, “Nang’ adingin a vang nangmahmah in bawl tawm!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Perez kiphuak hi.
Tua khit ciangin a khut tunga khausan tawh a sanggampa hong paikhia hi; ama min Zerah kiphuak hi.
Tu-in Izipt-ah Josef kipaipih suk a, tua lai-a a paipih suk Ishmael mite' tung panin Izipt mi, inncing mangpa, Faro’ nuai-a mangpa Potifar in amah lei hi.
Topa in Josef tawh om a, amah nasep a zo mi khat suak hi; amah in Izipt mi a topa’ inn sungah om a,
Topa in amah a ompihna leh Topa in ama khut sungah a hih khempeuh a ma-van’sakna a topa in mu hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in ama' mai-ah maipha ngahin ama na sem a, amah in a inn sung ukpa-in bawlin a neih khempeuh a uk dingin koih hi.
Amah in a inn sung uk leh a neih khempeuh a uk-in a bawla kipan Topa in Josef hangin Izipt mipa’ innkuan thupha pia hi; inn sung hita leh lo sung hita leh a neih khempeuh tungah Topa’ thupha om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a neih khempeuh Josef khut sungah ap hi; Josef nei khin ahih manin amau nupa' sung thu lo buang lung hihmawh dingin ngaihsun lo hi. Tu-in Josef ngaih baangin a mel hoih hi.
Tawl khat khit ciangin a topa’ zi in Josef zawl mit a, “Kei tawh hong lumkhawm in,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in nialin a topa’ zi’ kiangah, “En in, kei hong nei ahih manin ka topa in inn sungah bangmah lungphatmawhna nei lo hi, ama' neih khempeuh ka khut sungah hong koih khin hi;

hih inn sungah kei sangin amah lianzaw lo hi; nang in ama' zi na hih manin, nang lo buang kei kiang panin amah in a keptuam bangmah om lo hi; tua ahih ciangin bangci-in hih gitlohna lianpi bawlin Pasian’ tungah khial ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Amah in ni khat khit ni khat Josef a zol hangin, amah tawh lupkhop ding hita leh omkhop ding hita leh amah in tua nu’ thu ngai lo hi.
Ahih hangin ni khat, amah a nasep sem dingin inn sungah pai a, inn sungah inn sung mite khat zong a om loh lai takin,
tua nu in a puan-in amah man a, “Kei tawh hong lumkhawm in,” ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua nu' khut sungah a puan nusia-in, tai-in inn panin paikhia hi.
Tua nu in amah in a khut sungah puan nusia-in inn panin a tai khiatna a muh ciangin,
ama' inn sung mite samin amaute' kiangah, “En un, amah in eite hong no dingin Hebru mi khat eite' lakah hong paipih hi; kei tawh lumkhawm dingin amah hong sungtang a, nakpi takin kei ka kiko hi;
ka aw sangsakin ka kikona amah in a zak ciangin amah in ka kiangah a puan nusia a, tai-in inn panin paikhia hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a topa innah hong ciah mateng a kiangah a puan koih hi.
tua nu in ama' kiangah tua thu mah gen a, “Kote' kianga nong paipih Hebru mi nasempa keimah no dingin hong sungtang hi;
ahih hangin ka aw sangsakin ka kiko phetin amah in a puan kei' kiangah nusia-in inn panin taikhia hi,” ci hi.
“Nasempa in kei hong bawlna dan hih bang hi,” ci-in a zi in ama' kianga a genna a topa in a zak ciangin nak heh mahmah hi.
Josef' topa in amah manin, kumpipa’ thongkiate a kikhumna thong sungah amah koih a, tua thong sungah amah om hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Josef ompihin ama' tungah itna kip lak a, thong kempa’ muhna-ah amah maipha pia hi.
Thong kempa in thong sunga thongkia mi khempeuh Josef' et dingin ap hi; tua lai-a a kisem khempeuh ama' hih ahi hi;
Topa in amah tawh om ahih manin Josef' etna sunga om peuhmah thong kempa in don lo hi; ama' hih peuhmah Topa in daupaisak hi.
Hih hun khit tawl khat ciangin, Izipt kumpipa’ an piapa leh a an huanpa in Izipt kumpipa ahi amau’ topa hehsak uh hi.
An piapipa leh an huanpipa ahi, ama' nuai-a mangte nih' tungah Faro heh a,
Josef a kikhumna thong sung, inncing mangpa’ inn sungah amah in amaute koih hi.
Inncing mangpa in amaute Josef kemsak a, amah in amaute’ na sem hi; kikhumna sungah amaute tawl khat om uh hi.
Zan khat amaute gel in mang man uh hi—thong sunga a om an piapa leh an huanpa—amau’ mang a tuam tuak, a mang khiatna a tuam tuak ahi hi.
Zingsangin amaute' kiangah Josef pai-in amaute a muh ciangin amaute lungkham uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a topa’ inn sunga amah tawh a kikhuma om Faro’ nuai-a mangte amah in dong a, “Bang hangin tu ni-in mai mial na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.
Amaute in ama' kiangah, “Mang ka man uh a, tuate a khia ding om lo hi,’ ci uh hi. Josef in amaute' kiangah, “Khiatnate Pasian’ gen hilo ahi hiam? Kei' kiangah hong gen un, hong thum ing,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin an piapipa in Josef' kiangah a mang genin, ama' kiangah, “Ka mangin ka mai-ah leenggui khat om a,
leenggui tungah hiang thum om hi; a sel phetin pak khia pah a, a bomte leenggah suakin min pah hi.
Ka khut sungah Faro’ hai om hi; keimah in leenggahte lo-in Faro’ hai sungah ka suk a, Faro’ khut tungah a hai ka pia hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in ama kiangah, “Hih in a khiatna ahi hi: hiang thumte in ni thum ahi hi;
ni thum sungin Faro in nang hong khah ding a, na za-ah nang hong koih kik ding hi; ama' an piapa na hih lai-a mah bangin ama' khut tungah Faro’ hai na pia ding hi.
Ahih hangin kei hong phawk in, nang' tungah thu hong hoih ciangin kei tungah hehpihna hong bawl in, kong thum hi, Faro’ tungah kei’ thu genin, hih inn panin kei hong lakhia in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Hebru mite’ gam panin kei hong kigu-khia hi; hih lai-ah zong amaute in thong mial sungah kei hong koihna dingin bangmah mawhna ka bawl kei hi,” ci hi.
An huanpipa in a khiatna a hoih lam hi ci-in a muh ciangin, amah in Josef kiangah, “Kei zong mang khat ka man hi; ka lu tungah moh-lawh thum om a,
a lawh tungnung pen sungah an huansa namkim Faro’ adingin om hi, ahih hangin ka lu tunga lawh sung panin vasate in ne uh hi,” ci hi.
Josef in dawngin, “Hih in a khiatna ahi hi: lawh thumte in ni thum ahi hi;
ni thum sungin Faro in nang hong la khia-in na lu hong tan ding a, sing tung khatah nang hong khai ding hi; vasate in na sa ne ding uh hi,” ci hi.
A ni thum ni, Faro’ suah ni hunin, amah in a nasemte khempeuh’ adingin pawi khat kham a, an piapipa leh an huanpipa la khia hi.
Amah in an piapipa anpiak nasep-ah koih kik a, amah in Faro’ khut tungah hai pia hi;
ahih hangin Josef khiat mah bangin an huanpipa khailum hi.
Ahi zongin an piapipa in Josef phawk nawn loin, amah mangngilh hi.
Tua zawh kumnih bit khit ciangin Faro in mang manin amah Nail gun gei-ah ding hi,
en in, Nail gun sung panin bawngpi a zol a thau sagih hong paikhia a, amaute in phai lopate ne uh hi.
En in, amaute’ khit ciangin Nail gun sung panin a gulhgawng a gawng bawngpi dang sagih hong paikhia a, Nail gun gei-a bawngpi dangte' kiangah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a gulhgawng bawngpi sagihte in a zol a thau bawngpi sagihte netum uh hi. Tua ciangin Faro khanglo hi.
Tua ciangin ihmu-in a nih veina mang man hi; en in, a taksa a hoih buhvui sagih kung khat tungah vui hi.
En in, tuate’ khit ciangin nisuahna huih in theemsakin a hawm vui sagih hong po khia hi.
A vui hawmte in a taksa a dim vui sagihte valh tum uh hi. Tua ciangin Faro khanglo a, en in, tua pen a mang na hi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin a lungkham hi; amah in mi sawlin Izipt mitphial siamte khempeuh leh a mi pil khempeuh samsak hi; Faro in amaute kiangah a mang gen a, ahih hangin Faro tungah a khiatna a gen thei kuamah om lo hi.
Tua ciangin an piapipa in Faro' kiangah, “Tu ni-in ka khialhnate ka phawk hi.
Faro ama' nasemte' tungah heh a, kei leh an huanpipa inncing mangpa’ inn sungah hong khum lai-in,
amah leh keimah in zan khat sungin mang ka man uh a, a mangte in a khiatna tuam ciat nei hi.
Inncing mangpa’ nasem ahi Hebru mi tangval khat tua lai-ah kote tawh om hi; ama' kiangah ka gen uh ciangin, amah in ka mangte uh hong khiatsak a, ka mang uh tawh a kizui tuakin a khiatna hong gen hi.
Amah in kote' tungah a khiatna hong gen bangin hong tung hi; kei pen ka za-ah hong kikoih kik a, an huanpa kikhai lum hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in mi sawlin Josef samsak a, amaute in manlang takin thongmial sung panin amah paikhiatpih uh hi; amah in a mul kiatin a puan a khek khit ciangin, Faro' mai-ah hong pai hi.
Faro in Josef' kiangah, “Mang khat ka man a, a khiatna a gen thei kuamah om lo hi; nang in mang na zak ciangin a khiatna gen thei ci-in hong kigenna ka za hi,” ci hi.
Josef in Faro dawngin, “Tua in kei' sungah om lo hi; Pasian in Faro' tungah a hoih lamin dawn’na hong pia ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Josef' kiangah, “En in, ka mangin Nail gun gei-ah ka ding hi;
a thau a zol bawngpi sagih Nail gun panin hong paikhia a, phai lopate ne uh hi;
tuate’ khit ciangin a hehpihhuai a gulhgawng Izipt gamsung khempeuh-a tua bang ka muh ngei loh bawngpi dang sagih hong pai hi.
A gawng a gulhgawng bawngpite in a masa a thau bawngpi sagihte netum hi,
ahih hangin amaute in tuate a nek khit ciangun, a nek khit lam uh kuamah in thei lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen a tunga mah bangin gulhgawng lai uh hi. Tua ciangin ka khanglo hi.
Ka mang-in kung khat tungah a dim a hoih buhvui sagih a vuikhia zong ka mu hi:
tuate khit ciangin nisuahna huihpi in a keusak, a hawm, a theem vui sagihte hong po a,
a vui hawm in a vui hoih sagihte valh tum hi. Mitphial siamte' kiangah ka gen a, ahih hangin kei' kiangah hong gentel thei khat beek om lo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in Faro’ kiangah, “Faro’ mang in khat ahi hi; Pasian in ama' bawl ding Faro’ tungah hong kilangsak khin hi.
A hoih bawngpi sagihte in kum sagih hi a, a hoih buhvui sagihte in zong kum sagih mah ahi hi; a mang pen khat ahi hi.
Tuate khit ciangin a hong paikhia a gawng a gulhgawng bawngpi sagihte in kum sagih hi a, nisuahna huihpi in a theemsak buhvui hawm sagihte in zong kialpi kum sagih ahi hi.
Faro' kianga kong gen bangin Pasian in Ama' hih ding Faro' tungah hong lak khin ahi hi.
Izipt gamsung khempeuhah kum sagih sung hauhna hong tung ding a,
ahih hangin tua khit ciangin kialpi kum sagih sung hong tungin, hauhna ngeisa khempeuh Izipt gamsungah kimangngilh ding hi; kialpi in gamsung netum ding a,
nasia mahmah ding ahih manin, tua hong tung ding kialpi’ huhau-in gamsungah hauhna kithei lo ding hi.
Faro’ mang nih a phakna pen tua thu in Pasian’ sehsa hi, a cih nopna hi a, Pasian in tomno sungin hong tungsak ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Faro in thu ngaihsut siam mipil khat tengkhia in la, Izipt gamsung uk dingin amah koih in.
Faro in gamsungah vaihawm ulian seh in la, a kihauh kum sagih sungin Izipt gam leitang pan-a piang seh-nga-suah-seh-khat la in.
Hong tung ding kum hoih sunga an khempeuh amaute khawmsak in la, khuapite' sungah annek dingin Faro’ ukna nuai-ah antangte kholin, amaute kemsak in.
Kialpi hangin gamsung a siat loh nadingin Izipt gamsungah a hong tung ding kum sagih kialpi dal nadingin a kikoihcing an hi ding hi,” ci hi.
Hih a thugen pen Faro leh a nasem khempeuhte in hoih sa uh hi.
Faro in a nasemte' kiangah, “Ama' sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho a omna, hih bang mi mu ding i hi hiam?” ci hi.
