Nangmah in nilh sathau la-in, ama'lu tungah sungin amah na nilh ding hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in ama' tapate paipihin, amaute puantungsilh na silhsak ding a,
kawnggakte tawh amaute gakin amau' tungah a lukhute uh na gak ding hi; siampi nasepna in a kip tawntung ngeina ahih manin amau aa hi ding hi. Tua bangin Aaron leh a tapate na koih ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna buk mai-ah bawngtal na paipih ding hi. Aaron leh a tapate in bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,
Topa’ mai, kikhopna buk kongkhak-ah nangmah in bawngtal na go ding hi,
bawngtal sisan tawmkhat la-in biakna tau kite na khutme tawh na nuh ding a, a om lai si teng biakna tau bul-ah na sung khia ding hi.
A gilpi tuam a thau khempeuh leh a sin tunga autok leh a kal nihte a tuam a thau tawh na la ding a, biakna tau tungah tuate na hal ding hi.
Ahih hangin bawngtal sa leh a vun leh a ekte, giahphual pua lam-ah mei tawh na hal ding hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
“Tua ciangin nangmah in tuutalte khat la-in, Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal' lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,
nangmah in tuutal go-in, a si la-in biaknatau kimkotah na theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in tuutal sem nenin, a sungkua leh a khete silin, a sa-bakte leh a lu tawh tuate koihin,
biakna tau tungah tuutal a bup-in na hal ding hi; tua in Topa’ tungah meihal biakna ahi hi; tua in a gim namtui, Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.
“Nangmah in tuutal a dang khat na la ding hi; Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal' lu tungah amau khut nga ding uh a,

nangmah in tuutal go-in, a si tawmkhat la-in Aaron’ taklam bil dawn leh ama' tapate’ taklam bil dawnte leh amau' taklam khutpi dawnte leh amau’ taklam khepi dawnte nuhin, a om lai si teng biakna tau kimah na theh ding hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in biakna tau tunga a om si tawmkhat leh nilh sathau la-in Aaron leh ama' puante' tung leh amah tawh a om ama' tapate' tung leh ama' tapate’ puante' tungah na theh ding hi; amah leh a puante leh amah tawh a om a tapate leh ama' tapate’ puante siangtho ding hi.
“Nangmah in tuutal thau, a mei, a gilpi tuam a thau, a sin pan a utok, a kal nihte leh a tuam leh a taklam phei (bang hang hiam cih leh tua inkipsakna tuutal ahi hi),
leh Topa' mai-ah a om silngo sawhloh anlum lawh sung panin anlum lum khat, sathau tawh a kibawl anlumbek khat, mohpheng khat, zong na la ding hi;
nangmah in hihte khempeuh Aaron' khut sung leh a tapate’ khut sungah na koih ding a, Topa' mai-ah veii-a piak nadingin na veii ding hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in amau' khut sung panin tuate na la ding a, Topa' mai-ah a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah meihal tawh kihal biakna ban-ah na hal ding hi; tua in Topa' tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.
“Nangmah in Aaron a kikipsakna tuutal sa-iik la-in Topa’ mai-ah veii-a piak nadingin na veii ding hi; tua in nangma' tanh hi ding hi.
Tua in Aaron leh ama' tapate ading ahih ciangin, kipsakna tuutal pan-a a kipia, a kiveii, siampite’ tanh a phei leh veii-a piakna sa-iikte na siangthosak ding hi.

Tua in Aaron leh ama' tapate adingin Israel mite’ tung panin a kaih tawntung ding uh ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh thunuam-a amau biakna panin Israel mite in a piak ding siampite’ tanh ahi hi; tua in Topa’ tungah amau’ piakna ahi hi.
“Aaron’ biakna puan siangthote pen ama' sih khit ciangin a tapate’ tungah kipia ding a, amaute kinilhin a kikipsak nading ahi hi.
Ama' za luahin siampi a sem a tapa in siangtho munah nasem dingin kikhopna buk-ah a pai ciangin ni sagih sung tuate silh ding hi.
“Nangmah in kipsakna tuutal la-in a siangtho mun khatah a sa na huan ding hi;
Aaron leh a tapate in kikhopna buk kongkhak-ah tuutal sa leh lawh sunga om anlum ne ding uh hi.
Amaute in amaute kipsak ding leh a siangthosak dingin kilemna a kibawlna tua ante ne ding uh hi, ahih hangin a pualam mi in tuate ne thei lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tuate a siangtho ahi hi.

Kipsakna sate khat peuhpeuh ahi a, anlum ahi zongin, zingsang ciang dong a om lai leh nangmah in a om laite mei tawh na hal ding hi; tuate kine lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tuate a siangtho ahi hi.
“Tua bangin nang kong thupiakte khempeuh tawh kituakin Aaron leh ama' tapate' tungah na hih ding hi; ni sagih sung tawntung amaute kipsakna na bawl ding hi,

kilem nadingin mawhna hanga biakna-in ni simin bawngtal khat na pia ding hi. Siangthosak dingin sathau na nilh ciang leh kilemna na bawl ciangin biakna tau adingin khialhna hanga biakna khat zong na pia ding hi.
Biakna tau adingin ni sagih sung kilemna bawlin, na siangthosak ding hi, biakna tau in a siangthopen hi ding hi; biakna tau a lawng peuhpeuh a siangtho suak ding hi.
“Tu-in hih in biakna tau tungah na piak ding ahi hi; ni simin a kizomin kum khat a pha tuuno nihta hi ding hi.
Tuuno khat zingsang lamin na pia ding a, adang tuuno khat nitak lamin na pia ding hi;
tuuno a masa tawh an nel seu seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat leh a kisatzan singgah thau bung seh-li-suah-seh-khat tawh a kihel leh tui-buah dingin leenggahzu bung seh-li-suah-seh-khat hi ding hi.
Tuuno a dang khat nitakin na pia ding a, zingsang-a mah bangin a gim namtui ding, Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in an tawh biakna leh tuibuah tawh na pia ding hi.
Nang' tunga thu kong genna ding, nang tawh ka kituahna ding mun, Topa’ mai kikhopna buk kongkhak-ah na khang tawntungun a om tawntung ding tawh meihal biakna hi ding hi.
Tua lai-ah Israel mite tawh ka kituah ding a, keima' minthan’na in tua mun siangthosak ding hi;
keimah in kikhopna buk leh biakna tau ka siangthosak ding hi; keima' tungah siampi na a sem dingin Aaron leh a tapate zong ka siangthosak ding hi.
Israel mite' lakah keimah teengin amau’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.
Keimah in amaute’ lakah ka ten’na hangin Izipt leitang panin amaute a paikhiatpih Topa amau’ Pasian ka hihna amaute in thei ding uh hi; keimah in Topa amau' Pasian ka hi hi.
“Nangmah in a tungah paknamtui hal nading biakna tau khat na bawl ding hi; singkha sing tawh na bawl ding hi.
A dung tong khat, a vai tong khat hi ding hi; a kikim sikli nei hi ding a, a san’na tong nih hi ding hi; a kite a tak tawh sakhat hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak tawh zut-in, a tung leh a pang kimkot leh a kite na zut ding hi; a kimkot-ah kham tawh a geihual na bawl ding hi.
Tua adingin kham kual nih na bawl ding hi; a geihual nuai a kigalsai a pang tuakah tuate na bawl ding a, a puak nading zawlte a len dingte hi ding uh hi.
Nangmah in singkha sing tawh a zawlte na bawl ding a, kham tawh tuate na zut ding hi.
Nangmah tawh ka kituah nading mun, tecipan’na tunga a om hehpihna tokhom mai, tecipan’na singkuang kiangah a om dalna puan mai-ah biakna tau na koih ding hi.
Aaron in tua tungah a namtui paknamtui hal ding hi; amah in zingsang simin meivakte a puah ciangin hal ding hi,
Aaron in nitakin zong meivakte a koih ciangin tuate hal ding a, na khang tawntungun Topa’ mai-ah a namtui hi tawntung ding hi.
Tua tungah a siangtho lo a dang paknamtui hita leh, meihal biakna hita leh, an tawh biakna hita leh na pia kei ding hi; tua tungah tui-buah na sung kei ding hi.

Aaron in a kite' tungah kum khatin khatvei kilemna bawl ding hi; amah in kilem nading khialhna hanga biakna si tawh na khang tawntungun kum khatin khatvei kilemna bawl ding hi; tua in Topa' tungah a siangtho pen ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“Israel mite misimna bawl-a, amaute na sim ciangin amau' lakah gimna a tun’ loh nadingin, amaute na sim ciangin a milip in a kitatkhiatna uh Topa' tungah pia ding uh hi.
Misimna-ah a kisim mi peuhmah in a piak ding in: biakinn shekel tawh kituakin shekel lang (shekel khatah gerah sawmnih om), Topa’ tungah biakna-in shekel lang hi ding hi.
Misimna-a akisim, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah in Topa biakna pia ding hi.
Note’ ading kilemna bawl nadingin Topa biakna na piak uh ciangin a haute in shekel lang sangin tamzaw pia lo, a zawngte in tawmzaw pia lo ding hi.
Nomau adingin kilemna bawl nading, Topa’ mai-ah Israel mite phawkna a hisak dingin Israel mite tung panin kilemna sum na la ding a, kikhopna buk nasep nadingin na seh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Kisil nadingin sumngo kuang khat, a ngakna sumngo tawh akibawl khat zong bawl in. Nangmah in kikhopna buk leh biakna tau kikal-ah na koih ding a, tua sungah tui na koih ding hi.
Aaron leh a tapate in a khut uh leh a khe uh tua tui tawh sil ding uh hi.

Amaute kikhopna buk-ah a pai ciangin ahi a, Topa' tungah mei tawh kihal biakna hal ding a nasem dingin biakna tau nai-ah a pai ciang uh ahi zongin, amaute a sih loh nadingun amaute tui tawh kisil ding uh hi.
A sih khak loh nadingun a khut uh leh a khe uh sil ding uh hi; tua in na khang tawntungun amaute'tung, ama' tung nangawn leh ama' suan-le-khakte' tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua tham loin, Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“A hoih pen a namtui nate la in: mirrah paknamtui shekel za nga leh a namtui thaksing tua zah lang, shekel zanih leh sawmnga gik, leh a khum a namtui paknamtui zanih leh sawmnga,
biakinn shekel tawh kituakin thaksing nam khat za nga, leh oliv thau bung khat;
nangmah in paknamtui bawlte’ bawl mah bangin a siangtho sathau nilh dingin hihte na gawm ding hi; tua in a siangtho sathau nilh hi ding hi.
Nangmah in tua tawh kikhopna buk leh tecipan’na singkuang,
sabuai leh a nazat khempeuh, meivakkhuam leh a nazatte leh paknamtui biakna tau,
meihal biakna tau a nazat khempeuh tawh, kuang leh a ngakna na zut ding hi;
tuate a siangtho pen ahih theih nadingin na siangthosak ding hi; tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi.
Amaute in keima' tungah siampi na hong sep theih nadingun Aaron leh a tapate nangmah in sathau nilhin, amaute na siangthosak ding hi.
Nangmah in Israel mite' kiangah, ‘Hih in na khang tawntungun a siangtho keima' sathau nilh hi ding hi.
Mi mawkmawkte’ pumpi tungah tua sathau kisung lo ding a, tua banga a kigawm sathau dang na bawl kei ding uh hi; tua in a siangtho hi a, note' tungah a siangtho hi ding hi.
Tua tawh a kibangin a bawl mi peuhmah ahi a, a pualam mi khat peuh tuate a nilhsak mi peuhmah ahi zongin ama' mite' kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “A namtui nate, stakte, onikh leh galbanum, paknamtui citak tawh a namtui nate (a tamna a kikim ciatin) la in la,
paknamtui bawlte’ hih bangin ci sawhin a nin bang lo, biakna paknamtui bawl in;
nangmah in kimkhat a neu mahmahin na satnen ding a, nang tawh ka kituah nading mun kikhopna buk sunga tecipan’na mai-ah pawl khat na koih ding hi; tua in nangma adingin a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
A kigawmpih ngei teng tawh na bawl ding paknamtui pen note' adingin na bawl kei ding hi; tua in note’ adingin Topa' tungah a siangtho hi ding hi.
Tua tawh a kibangin paknamtui a bawl mi peuhmah ama' mite' kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“Thei in, Judah minam, Hur’ tapa ahi Uri’ tapa Bezalel a min-in ka sam khin hi;

3-5 lim hoihte a geel ding, kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding, siamna nam khempeuhah nasep nading, bulh ding suangte seekna leh sing zep nasep a sem dingin Pasian’ Kha, siamna, pilna, theihna leh khut siam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi.
En in, amah tawh, Dan minam, Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab ka seh khin zo hi; amaute in nang kong thupiak khempeuh a bawl theih nadingun a hih thei mi khempeuh' tungah siamna ka pia khin zo hi.
Amau sep dingte in; kikhopna buk, leh tecipan’na singkuang, leh a tunga om hehpihna tokhom leh buk sung na khempeuh,
sabuai leh a nazatte leh a siangtho meivakkhuam leh a nazatte khempeuh, paknamtui biakna tau,
leh meihal biakna tau a nazatte khempeuh tawh, kuang leh a ngakna,
leh amau’ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaron’ puan siangthote leh ama' tapate’ puante ahi, hoih tak-a kigan puante,
leh siangtho mun adingin nilh sathau leh a namtui paknamtui ahi hi. Ka thupiakte khempeuh tawh kituakin nangmah in na bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,

“Israel mite' tungah gen in, ‘Note in keima' sabbathte na tang ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh hih in keimah, Topa in note a hong siangthosak ka hihna na theih nadingun na khang tawntungun keimah leh note' kikal-ah lim khat ahi hi.

Note in sabbath na tang ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin siangtho hi; tua ni a ninsak mi peuhmah kithat ding hi; tua ni-in na a sem mi peuhmah ama' mite' kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi.
Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni in thupi-a tawlngakna sabbath ni hi a, Topa' tungah siangtho hi; sabbath ni-in nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a tawntungin thuciamna-in amau’ khang tawntungin sabbath tangin, Israel mite in sabbath kem ding uh hi.
Ni guk sungin Topa in van leh lei bawlin, a ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga a, a tha dimkiksak hi; keimah leh Israel mite' kikal-ah hih sabbath in lim khat hi tawntung hi, ci hi,’ci in,” a ci hi.
Sinai Mual tungah thugenna a man khit ciangin, Pasian’ khutme tawh a kigelh suangpeek ahi tecipan’na suangpeek nihte, amah in Moses pia hi.

Mual tung panin Moses hong tun’suk hakna mite in a theih uh ciangin, Aaron kiangah mite amau mah kikaikhawm tawmin, ama' kiangah, “Kithawi in, kote’ mai-ah a pai ding pasiante hong bawlsak in; Izipt leitang panin eite hong paikhiatpih to mite hih Moses ahih leh, amah bang suak khin cih i thei kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Aaron in amaute' kiangah, “Na zite, na tapate leh na tanute uh’ bil tungah a om kham bilbahte sutkhia un la, kei' kiangah tuate hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ bil-a om kham bilbahte sutkhia-in Aaron’ kiangah tuate paipih uh hi.

Amah in amaute’ tung panin kham saangin, sumtui sun’na sungah sungin, a kisung milim bawngno khat bawlsak hi; tua ciangin mite in, “Israel mite aw, hihte in Izipt leitang panin note hong paikhiatpih to na pasiante uh a hi hi!” ci uh hi.
Aaron in hih thu a muh ciangin, amah in tua mai-ah biakna tau khat lam hi; “Zing ciang pen Topa ading pawibawl ni hi ding hi,” ci-in Aaron in zaksakna bawl hi.
Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, meihal biakna pia-in thu-nuam-a biakna paipih uh hi; a ne a dawn dingin mite tu suk uh a, gualnuam mahmah uh hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Pai suk in; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt leitang panin nangmah in na paikhiatpih toh mite amau leh amau kisiasak uh hi;

amaute ka thupiakna lampi panin kiheikhia pak uh hi; amau’ adingin amaute in a kisung milim bawngno khat bawlin, tua bia-in a tungah biakna pia uh a, ‘Israel mite aw, hihte in Izipt leitang panin note hong paikhiatpih to na pasiante uh ahi hi!’ ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Hih mite ka mu zo hi, en in, a lungkhauh mite ahi uh hi;
tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute'tungah ka hehna so-in amaute ka beisak theih nadingin kei guak hong omsak in; ahih hangin minam lian khatin nang kong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Moses in Topa ama' Pasian' tungah thuum a, “Topa aw, a vanglian leh a thahat khut tawh Izipt leitang panin na paikhiatpih ahi nangma' mihingte' tungah bang hangin na hehna so ding ahi hiam?

Bang hangin Izipt in, ‘Mual tungah amaute a that ding leh leitung panin amaute a beisak dingin siatna ngaihsutna tawh amah in amaute paikhiatpih hi,’ ci ding ahi uh hiam? A kihtak-huai na hehna daaisak in la, na lungsim khelin na mite' tungah hih siatna tungsak kei in.

Amaute' tungah nangmahmah kiciamin amaute' tungah, ‘Na suan-le-khakte uh vantung aksi bangin tamsakin, keimah in ka ciamsa hih leitang khempeuh na suan-le-khakte uh' tungah ka pia ding a, amaute in luah tawntung ding uh hi,’ na cihna na nasemte Abraham, Isaak leh Israel phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua hi a, Topa in a lungsim khel a, ama' mite' tungah a tun’sak ding siatna tungsak nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Moses kihei-in, a khut sungah tecipan’na suangpeek nih, a pang lang nih tuak-a kigelh suangpeekte tawh mual tung panin paisuk hi.
A peekte in Pasian’ bawl hi a, a kigelhte in Pasian’gelh, a peekte' tungah a gelh ahi hi.
Joshua in amaute’ kikona gamlumna a zak ciangin Moses' kiangah, “Giahphual-ah kidona gamlumna om hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Tua in zawhna kikona aw ahi a, lelhna kikona aw ahi zongin hi lo hi, ahih hangin tua ka zak pen la sakna aw-ging ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Giahphual nai-ah amah tungin bawngno leh lamna a muh phetin, Moses’ hehna so a, amah in ama' khut sung panin suangpeekte lawn a, mual bul-ah tuate sukham hi.
Amah in amaute’ bawlsa bawngno la-in, mei tawh hal a, gawi vui-in, tui tungah theh a, Israel mite a tui dawnsak hi.
Moses in Aaron' kiangah, “Amaute' tungah khialhna lianpi khat na tun’pih nadingin hih mite in nang' tungah bang hong hih ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Aaron in, “Ka Topa’ hehna sosak kei in; nangmah in mite na thei hi, amaute in siatna ngaihsun uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in keima' kiangah, “Kote' mai-ah a pai ding pasiante hong bawl sak in; Izipt leitang panin eite hong paikhiatpih to mipa hih Moses ahih leh, amah bang suak khin cih i thei kei hi,’ ci uh hi.

Keimah in amaute' kiangah, ‘Kham a nei peuhpeuh sutkhiasak un,’ ka ci hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in kei' tungah hong pia uh a, keimah in mei sungah tuate ka lawn a, hih bawngno hong suak hi,” a ci hi.
Mite a tatkhialhna Moses in a muh ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh Aaron in amau’ maizum nadingin amau’ galte lakah amaute takhialsak hi),
giahphual kongpi sungah Moses ding a, “Topa’ lamah kua om hiam? Kei kiangah hong pai un,” a ci hi. Levi mite khempeuh ama' kiangah kikaikhawm uh hi.

Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Israelte’ Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ‘A milip in a namsau a pangah tawi-in, kongpi khat pan kongpi khat giahphual khempeuhah pai kawi kawi-in, a milip in a sang-gampa, a milip in a kikholhpihpa, a milip in a vengpa that hen,’ ci-in a gen hi.
Levi mite in Moses’ thugen bangin hih uh hi; tua ni-in mihing tul thum bang si hi.
Moses in, “Tu ni-in note' tungah thu pha hong tun’ theih nadingin ama' tapa leh a sanggamte ciat supna thuakin Topa’ na sep nadingin note na kikipsak tawm uh hi,” a ci hi.
A zing ciangin Moses in mite kiangah, “Note in khialhna lianpi khat na bawl khin uh hi. Tu-in Topa' kiangah kei ka pai ding hi; note’ khialhna thu-ah kilemna ka va bawl thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa' kiangah Moses pai kikin, “Ala, hih mite in khialhna lianpi khat bawl khin uh hi; amaute in amau’ adingin kham pasiante bawl khin uh hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in nangmah in amau' khialhna maisak in; tua ahih kei leh, hong thum ing, nangma' gelhsa laibu panin keimah hong phiat in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Moses' kiangah,“Kei' tungah hong khial peuhmah, ka laibu panin ka phiat ding hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in pai in, nang' tunga kong gensa mun-ah mite paipih in; en in, na mai-ah ka vantungmi pai ding hi. Ahi zongin ka thukkik ni ciangin amau' khialhna amau' tungah ka thuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Aaron in a bawlsa bawngno amaute in bia uh ahih manin Topa in mite' tungah gimna tungsak hi.

Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Pai khia un la, Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakob' tungah ‘Na suan-le-khakte uh tungah ka pia ding hi,’ ci a ka ciam leitangah nangmah leh Izipt leitang panin na paikhiatpih toh mite tawh hih lai panin paito un.
Note’ mai-ah vantungmi khat ka sawl ding a, Kanaan mite, Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite ka hawlkhia ding hi.

Bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luanna leitangah paito un; ahih hangin lampi-ah note hong sisak kha ding ka hih ciangin note' lakah kei kong paito kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in lungkhauh mi na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in hih thusiate a zak uh ciangin amaute thuum uh hi; kuamah kizem lo uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Israel mite' tungah gen in, ‘Note in lungkhauh mi na hi uh hi; note' lakah tomno khat sung hong paito leng note kong beisak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin note kong bawl nading ka theih nadingin note'tung panin na kizepnate uh suahkhia un,’ ci in,” ci-in gen khinzo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in Horeb Mual pan-a kipanin amau’ kizepnate suahkhia uh hi.

Tu-in Moses in puanbuk la-in giahphual pualam, giahphual panin a gamla pekah lam thei zel hi; amah in tua pen kikhopna buk ci hi. Topa' tungah thu a dong nuam mi peuhmah giahphual pua lam-a om kikhopna buk-ah paikhia uh hi.
Puanbuk-ah Moses a pai peuhpeuh ciangin mi khempeuh ding to-in, a milip-in a puanbuk kong-ah ding a, puanbuk sungah a paikhit mateng Moses’ nung en uh hi.
Puanbuk-ah Moses a tum ciangin meii khuam hong kumsukin puanbuk kongkhak-ah ding a, Topa in Moses tawh kiho hi.
Mi khempeuhte in a puanbuk kongkhak ah meii khuam a ding a muh ciangin a milip-in a puanbuk kongkhak ah mi khempeuh ding to-in bia uh hi.

Tua bangin, mi khat in a lawmpa a hopih bangin maitang kituahin Topa in Moses hopih zel hi. Giahphual-ah Moses a ciahkik ciangin, Nun’ tapa, ama' nasem tangval Joshua, puanbuk panin hong ciahkik lo hi.

Moses in Topa' kiangah, “Thei in, nangmah in keima' kiangah, ‘Hih mite paipih to in,’ nong ci hi; ahih hangin kei tawh nong sawl khop ding mi kei nong theisak nai kei hi. Ahi zongin nangmah in, ‘Na min-in nang kong thei a, ka mai-ah maipha zong na mu khin hi,’ nong ci khin hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang' tungah kong thum hi, na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh keimah in nang hong thei-in na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah theih nadingin tu-in nangma' geelnate kei hong lak in. Hih minam in nangma' mite ahihna zong ngaihsun in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nang tawh kong pai ding a, lungsim tawlngakna hun nang kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in ama' kiangah, “Nang nong paipih kei ding leh, hih lai panin kote hong paikhia tosak kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah leh nangma' mite, keimah in nangma' muhna-ah maipha ka ngahna bang ci-in kithei ding ahi hiam? Leitung maitang tunga om mite khempeuh panin keimah leh nangma' mite, kote ka tungnun’na uh in kote tawh nang nong paikhopna hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Nangma gensa hih thu mahmah keimah in ka hih ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka muhna-ah nang in maipha na ngah zo a, na min-in nang kong thei hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in, “Kong thum hi, na minthan’na kei hong lak in,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Keima' hoihna khempeuh na mai-ah ka paisak ding a, na mai-ah keima' min ‘Topa’ cihna ka pulak ding hi; ka diknopna mi' tungah ka dik ding a, hehpihna ka lahnopmi' tungah hehpihna ka lak ding hi.
Ahih hangin, amah in, “Nang in ka maitang na mu thei kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi in kei hong mu leh tua mi nungta lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “En in, suang tungah na din’ nading keima' kiangah mun khat om hi;
keima' minthan’na a pai laitakin suanghawm sungah nang kong koih ding a, kei ka paikhit mateng ka khut tawh nang kong hum ding hi;
tua ciangin keimah in ka khut ka lakhia ding a, nangmah in ka nung na mu ding hi; ahih hangin ka maitang kimu lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “A masa tawh a kibangin suangpeek nih sui in; nangmah in na sukkhap a masa peekte' sunga om thute tua a peekte' tungah ka gelh ding hi.
Zingsangin kithawi-in Sinai Mual tungah zingsangin hong paito in la, mualdawn tua mun-ah keima' kiangah nangmah hong kilak in.
Nang tawh kuamah hong paito khawm lo ding hi, mual tung tengah kuamah omsak kei in; tua mual mai-ah tuuhon ahi a, bawnghon ahi zongin gamta sak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a masa bangin suangpeek nih sui hi; zingsang ciangin amah tho baihin Topa in amah a thupiaksa bangin Sinai Mual tungah paito a, a khut sungah suangpeek nih tawi hi.
Meii sungah Topa kum sukin tua lai-ah amah tawh Moses ding a, Topa’ min pulak hi.
Ama' mai-ah Topa pai-in, “Topa, Topa, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian, lungduai-in itna kip leh thutakna tawh a dim,

mi tul tampite adingin itna kip a nei, mawhna, thupalsatna leh khialhna maisakin, ahih hangin bang bang hita leh mawhna a siangsak ngei lo, pate’ mawhna tate tung leh tute tung, khang thum, khang lina dongin a thukpa,” ci-in pulak hi.
Moses in lei lak lamah a lu kunsuk pak a, bia hi.

Amah in, “Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka muh leh, Topa aw, kong thum hi, lungkhauh mite ka hita zongun kote' kiangah Topa hong pai in; kote’ mawhna leh kote’ khialhna hong maisak in la, nangma' luah dingin kote hong la in,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “En in, keimah in thuciamna khat ka bawl hi. Nangma' mite khempeuh' mai-ah, leitung khempeuh hita leh minam khat peuh sungah hita leh cik mah-a tua bang a kibawl ngei lo nalamdangte ka bawl ding hi; note’ lakah a om mite khempeuh in Topa’ nasepna mu ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note' tungah kong bawl dingin a kihtakhuai na ahi hi.
“Tu ni-a nang kong thupiak zui in. En in, na mai-ah Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite ka hawlkhia ding hi.
Na paina leitanga a teng mite tawh thuciamna bawl kha loin, tua pen note’ laizangah thangzak a suah khak loh nadingin nangmahmah kidawm in.
Nangmah in amau’ biakna taute phelin, amau’ khuamte kuaitanin, amau’ Asherah milimte na phukpai ding hi.
(bang hang hiam cih leh pasian dang na bia kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ama' min Aam a hipa in a aam Pasian ahi hi),

nangmah in leitanga a teng mite tawh thuciamna bawlin, amaute in amau’ pasiante’ nungah paktatna bawlin amau’ pasiante' tungah biakna pia-in khat peuh in note hong sap ciangin, note in ama' biak piakna ne-in,
note in amau’ tanute na tapate uh zi dingin la in, amau’ tanute in amau’ pasiante’ nungah paktatna bawlin, amau’ pasiante’ nungah na tapate uh paktatna bawlsak kha ding uh hi.
“A kisung pasiante note’ adingin na bawl kei ding uh hi.

“Silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Abib kha, a kisehsa hun sung teng, nang kong thupiak mah bangin ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sungin Izipt panin note na paikhia uh hi.
Naubu a hong khempeuh, na ganhing a pa khempeuh, bawng leh tuu a tacilte keima aa ahi hi.

La a tacilte tuuno khat tawh na tanh ding hi, tua bang hi loin na tat kei leh a ngawng na kuaitan ding hi. Na tapa cilte khempeuh uh na tanh ding uh hi. Keima' mai-ah a guakin kuamah hong kilaak lo ding hi.
“Ni guk sung na na sem ding uh hi, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding uh hi; lo khawh hun leh anlak hunin na tawlnga ding uh hi.
Nipi kalte’ pawi, mangbuh a tung masa leh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
Pasal khempeuh Israel Pasian, Topa Pasian' mai-ah kum khatin thum vei kilaak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note' mai-ah minamte ka hawlkhia ding a, na gamgite uh nomau’ adingin ka keek ding hi; Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah kum khatin thum vei a kilaak dingin na paitoh sungun na leitang uh mi khat peuhpeuh in hong deih gawh khak ding lunghihmawhna om lo ding hi.
“Note in silngo tawh keimah biakpiakna si na piakhawm kei ding uh hi; paisan pawi biakpiakna zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uh hi.
Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen Topa na Pasian uh’ inn-ah na paipih ding uh hi. Note in keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Hih thute gelh in; hih thute tawh kizui-in nang leh Israel tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai-ah Topa tawh amah sun sawmli leh za sawmli sung om hi; amah in an ne lo, tui zong dawn lo hi. Amah in suangpeek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiakna sawmte a gelh hi.
A khut sungah tecipan’na suangpeek nih tawh Sinai Mual tung panin Moses hong paisuk ciangin, Pasian tawh amah kiho khin ahih manin a maitang vun a taan’ lamtak Moses in thei lo hi.
Aaron leh Israel mite khempeuh in Moses a muh ciangin, en in, ama' maitang vun taang a, ama' mai-ah a pai ding uh amaute lau uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute' kiangah Moses pai hi; Aaron leh mihon makaite khempeuh ama' kiangah hong paikik uh a, Moses in amaute hopih hi.
Tua khit ciangin Israel mite khempeuh a nai-ah hong pai uh a, Topa in Sinai Mual-ah ama' tunga a gen thupiakna khempeuh amaute' tungah pia hi.
Moses in amaute tawh thugen a man khit ciangin, amah in a maitang-ah kiliahna puan khat koih hi;

ahih hangin amah tawh kiho dingin Topa’ mai-ah Moses a tum peuhpeuh ciangin, amah a pusuah kik mateng a kiliahna puan lakhia hi; amah hong paikhia-in ama' tunga thu kipiaknate Israel mite' kiangah a gen ciangin,
Israel mite in Moses’ maitang, vun a taang mu uh hi; amah tawh kiho dingin a pai matengin Moses in kiliahna puan tawh a maitang khuhkik hi.
Moses in Israel mi honpi khempeuh khawmin amaute' tungah, “Hihte in note in na hih ding uh Topa’ hong thupiak ahi hi.
Ni guk sungin nasep kiman ding hi, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in thupi-a tawlngakna sabbath siangtho Topa’ tungah na nei ding uh hi; tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem peuhmah kithat ding hi;
sabbath ni-in na ten’na khempeuh uh-ah mei na cih kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Israel mi honpite khempeuh' tungah, “Hih in Topa’ hong thupiak ahi hi.
Note' lak panin Topa ading piakna la un; lungsim citna a nei peuhmah Topa' tungah piakna paipihsak un. Tuate in: kham, ngun leh sumngo;
a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk puan hoihte, keelmul,
a kisansak tuutal vunte leh keelvunte; singkha sing,
meivak ading sathau, nilh sathau leh a paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
siampi puan leh awmdal-ah bulh dingin onik suang leh suangte ahi hi.
“Note' lak panin siamna a nei mi peuhmah hong paisak un la, Topa’ thupiaksa khempeuh bawlsak un: biakbuk,
a puan-buk leh a khuhna, a vankhainate leh a khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, a bullente;
singkuang a zawlte tawh, hehpihna tokhom leh kongkhak dalna puan;
sabuai a zawlte leh a nazatte khempeuh tawh, Ompihna Anlum;
khuavak dingin meivakkhuam zong, a nazatte leh a meivakte tawh, meivak dingin sathau’
paknamtui biakna tau, a zawlte tawh, nilh sathau leh a namtui paknamtui leh biakbuk kongah, kongkhak ading kongpuankhai;
meihal biakna tau, a sumngo siklen, a zawlte, a nazatte khempeuh, kuang leh a ngakna tawh;
buk tual-a a kikhaite, a khuampite leh a bullente tawh, tual kongpi ading puankhai;
biakbuk khetphimte leh huang khetphimte, leh amau’ khaute;
siangtho mun-ah zat dingin lim takin a kigan puante, amaute’ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaron ading puan siangtho leh ama' tapate’ puante bawlsak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi honpi khempeuh Moses’ omna panin paikhia uh hi.
A lungsim-ah piaknopna a nei mi khempeuh hong paitawm uh a, kikhopna buk leh a nasep nading khempeuh leh puan siangthote-a zat dingin Topa ading a piakte uh hong puak uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin pasalte leh numeite, amaute hong pai uh hi; utna lungsim a neite khempeuh in tukkilhte, bilbahte, min gelhna zungbuhte, leh banbuhte ahi kham tawh a kibawl na namkim hong paipih uh a, a milip in Topa' tungah kham tawh piakna ap uh hi.
A dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute, puan hoih, keelmul, a kisansak tuutal vunte, savunte ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah in tuate paipih hi.
Ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin piakna a bawl thei mi peuhmah in Topa’ tungah a kipia nate paipih uh hi; nasep nadinga kimang thei ding singkha sing a nei mi peuhmah in hong paipih hi.
A hih thei numei khempeuh in a khut uh tawh khau khuk uh a, amau’ khuksate a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a a kikhuk khaute hong paipih uh hi;
hih theih siamna in a phut lungsim a nei numei khempeuh in keelmul khuk uh hi.
Makaite in siampi puan leh awmdal-a bulh dingin onik suang leh suangte,
meivak ding leh nilh sathau ding leh paknamtui dingin a namtui nate leh sathau hong paipih uh hi.
Israel mi, pasal leh numei, Topa in Moses' tunga a thupiaksa nasep nadingin na khat peuhpeuh paipih ding lungsim in a phut mi khempeuh in ut thu-a biakna-in Topa' tungah paipih hi.
Moses in Israel mite' kiangah, “Thei un, Topa in a min-in Judah minam, Hur’ tapa ahi Uri tapa Bezalel sam khin hi;

31-33 lim koihte a geel ding, kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding, siamna nam khempeuhah nasep nading, bulh ding suangte seekna leh sing zep nasep a sem dingin amah in Pasian’ Kha, siamna, pilna, theihna leh khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah kidimsak hi.
Amah in a hilh dingin amah leh Dan minam Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab hilh khin hi.

Amah in, khutsiamte' nasep, a geel siamte' hih, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk puanzep siamte'sep, siam gante' gat—nasep nam khat peuhpeuh a semte, a geel siamte’ septe ahi zongin, nasep namkim a sem dingin siamna tawh amaute kidimsak hi.

Bezalel leh Oholiab leh biakinn lamna-ah nasep khat peuhpeuh sep nading zia a thei dingin Topa in siamna leh pilna a guat mi peuhmah in Topa' thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Bezalel leh Oholiab leh Topa in amau’ ngaihsutna-ah siamna a guat mi, nasem-a pai dingin a lungsim in a phut mi peuhmah sam hi;
amaute in Moses'tung panin Israel mite in biakinn sep nadinga ut thu-a a piak uh piakna a paipih khempeuh uh sang hi. Amaute in zingsang simin ut thu-a piakna ama' tungah paipih uh ahih manin,
biakinn nasep a namkim a sem mi khempeuh amau’ nasepna ciat panun hong pai uh a,
Moses' kiangah, “Topa in eite sep dinga hong sawl nasep nadingin a kicing ding zah val tampi mite in hong paipih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in thupia-in giahphual khempeuhah thu kizasakin, “Pasal hita leh numei hita leh kuamah in biakinn adingin piathuah nawn kei un,” kici hi. Tua ahih ciangin a piak ding uh mite kikho hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ piaksa nate in nasepna khempeuh hih nadingin kicing a, val zaw lai hi.

Nasem mite' lak panin a hih thei mi khempeuh in puan dal sawm tawh biakbuk bawl uh hi; tuate pen a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih leh a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh kibawlin hoih taka a kibawl kherubte tawh bawl uh hi.
Tua puan a dung tong sawmnih-le-giat, a vai tong li ciat ahi hi; a puan khempeuh kikim hi.
Amah in puan dal ngate khat leh khat khuituahin, puan a dang ngate zong khat leh khat khuituah hi.

Amah in a kikhuituah masa puan a nawlnung pen nawl dung suk-ah khuadum tawh a bilvangte bawl hi; tua mah bangin amah in a kikhui tuah a nihna puan a nawlnung pen nawl dung suk-ah zong tuate mah bawl hi;
amah in puan khat tungah bilvang sawmnga bawlin, amah in a kikhuituah a nihna puan nawlah bilvang sawmnga mah bawl hi; a bilvangte khat leh khat kitang hi.
Amah in kham kilhna sawmnga bawlin, kilhnate tawh puante khat leh khat kimatsak hi; tua ahih ciangin biakbuk in bup khat ahi hi.
Amah in biakbuk tungah puanbuk dingin keelmul tawh kibawl puante zong bawl hi; amah in puan dal sawm-le-khat bawl hi.
Tua puan a dung tong sawmthum, a vai tong li ciat ahi hi; tua puan sawm-le-khatte kikim hi.
Amah in puan dal ngate khat leh khat khuituahin, a puan gukte zong khat leh khat mah khuituah hi.
Amah in a kikhuituah puan khat a nawlnung pen nawl-ah a bilvang sawmnga bawlin, puan dal a zom nawlah a bilvang sawmnga mah bawl hi.
Tua pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin puanbuk a kimatsak dingin amah in kilhna sawmnga sumngo tawh bawl hi.
Amah in puanbuk adingin a kisansak tuutal vunte leh keelvunte tawh khuhna khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakbuk adingin singkha sing tawh a po to khawm ding khuampeekte bawl hi.
A khuampeek khat a tun’ tong sawm hi a, a vai tong khat leh khap ciat ahi hi.
A bulh nadingin khuampeek khat in zang nih ciat nei hi; amah in biakbuk khuam khempeuh adingin hih bawl hi.
Amah in biakbuk adingin hih bangin khuampeekte bawl hi: leitaw lam pang adingin khuam sawmnih;
amah in a khuampeek sawmnihte bul-ah bullen sawmli ngun tawh, a zang nihte’ adingin khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih, leh a khuampeek dang khat bul-ah a zang nihte’ adingin bullen nih mah bawl hi.
Biakbuk a pang nihna lam, leilu lam pang adingin amah in khuampeek sawmnih
leh ngun tawh kibawl a bullen sawmli, khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih mah bawl hi.
Nitumna lam biakbuk nunglam adingin amah in khuampeek guk bawl hi.
Amah in biakbuk nung lam kiute’ adingin a khuampeek nih bawl hi.
Tuate a bul lam-ah kikak a, ahih hangin a kual masa-ah a dawn kimat hi; amah in a kiu nihte’ adingin tua bangin nih bawl hi.
Ngun tawh kibawl amau’ bullente tawh khuampeek giat om hi: bullen sawm-le-guk om-in, khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih ciat om hi.
Amah in singkha sing zawl, biakbuk pang khat-a khuampeekte’ adingin nga,
biakbuk a pang lang khat-a khuampeekte’ ading zawl nga, nitumna lam biakbuk nung lam panga a khuampeekte’ ading zawl nga bawl hi.
Amah in a khuampeekte kim ciang takah mong khat panin mong khat dongin a zawl laita paisuaksak hi.
Amah in khuampeekte kham tawh zutin, zawlte a len dingin a kualte kham tawh bawlin, zawlte kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kopa-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh dalna puan bawl hi; hoih taka a kibawl kherubte tawh amah in tua dalna puan bawl hi.
Tua adingin amah in singkha khuampi li bawl a, tua khuampite kham tawh zut hi, a vankhainate in kham hi a, amah in tuate’ adingin ngun bullen li sung hi.
Amah in puanbuk kongkhak adingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem, a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh kongpuankhai khat leh;
a khuampi ngate a vankhainate tawh bawl hi. Amah in tuate’ luzepnate zutin, a gaknate kham hi a, ahih hangin a bullen ngate in sumngo ahi hi.
Bezalel in singkha sing tawh singkuang bawl hi; a dung tong nih leh khap, a vai tong khat leh khap, a san’na tong khat leh khap ahi hi.
Amah in kham citak tawh a sung leh a pua zutin a kimkotah kham geihual khat bawl hi.
Amah in a kiu lite’ adingin kham kual li, a pang khatah kual nih, a pang lang khat adingin kual nih sung hi.
Amah in singkha sing zawlte bawl a, tuate kham tawh zutin,
singkuang puak nadingin singkuang pang-a kualte' sungah zawlte khum hi.
Amah in kham citak tawh hehpihna tokhom khat bawl hi; a dung tong nih leh khap, a vai tong khat leh khap ahi hi.
Amah in sek tawh a kiseek kham tawh kherub nih bawl hi; hehpihna tokhom mong tuak-ah tuate bawl hi,
kherub khat mong khatah, kherub khat a mong lang khatah om hi; amah in a mong nihte-ah hehpihna tokhom tawh sakhatin kherubte bawl hi.
Kherubte in a khate uh a tungah zalin, amau’ khate tawh hehpihna tokhom liim sunin, amaute khat leh khat kimaingat uh hi; hehpihna tokhom lamah kherubte’ mai nga hi.
Amah in singkha sing tawh sabuai zong bawl hi; a dung tong nih, a vai tong khat, a san’na tong khat leh khap ahi hi;
amah in kham citak tawh zut a, a kimkotah kham tawh a geihual khat bawl hi.
Amah in khut peek cia a pha zawl khat a kimkotah bawl a, a zawl kimkotah kham geihual khat bawl hi.
Amah in tua sabuai adingin kham kual li sungin, a kiu li, a khe lite-ah a kualte gak hi.
Sabuai puak nading zawlte a len dingin a zawl gei-ah a kualte om hi.
Amah in sabuai puak nadingin singkha sing zawlte bawl a, tuate kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in sabuai tunga om ding beel leh kuangte, paknamtui’ adingin kuangdaite leh pakante, tui-buah nadingin kuang-ukte leh thawl gongbakte kham citak tawh bawl hi.
Amah in kham citak tawh meivakkhuam zong bawl hi. Meivakkhuam a bul leh a kungte in a kiseek nate tawh kibawl hi; a haite, a nunte leh a pakte in tua tawh sakhat ahi hi.
A pangte panin hiang guk meengkhia a, a pang khatah meivakkhuam hiang thumte omin a pang lang khatah meivakkhuam hiang thumte om hi;

hiang khat ciat tungah a nun leh a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum leh a dang hiang khat ciat tungah a nun leh a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum mah kibawl hi—tua ahih ciangin a hiang gukte meivakkhuam panin meengkhia hi.
A meivakkhuam tung mahmah-ah a nun leh a pak tawh a om, almond gah bangin a kibawl hai li omin,
meivakkhuam panin hiang guk a kopte’ bul-ah tua tawh sakhat ahi mun khat om hi.
Amau’ nunte leh a hiangte in tua tawh sakhat ahi hi; a buppi-in kham citak a kiseek sakhat ahi hi.
Amah in a meivak sagihte leh a taitehte leh a kuangte kham citak bawl hi.
Amah in kham citak talen khat tawh tua leh a nazatte khempeuh bawl hi.
Amah in singkha sing tawh paknamtui biakna tau bawl hi; a dung tong khat, a vai tong khat ahi hi; tua pen a ning kikim a, a san’na tong nih ahi hi; a kite in tua tawh sakhat ahi hi.
Amah in a tung zang, a kimkotah a pangte leh a kite kham citak tawh zut hi; amah in a kimkotah kham geihual khat
leh a puak nadingin zawlte a len dingin a pang lang tuak, a geihual nuai tak-ah kham kual nih bawl hi.
Amah in singkha sing tawh zawlte bawlin, tuate kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in paknamtui bawlte’ gawm bangin a siangtho nilh sathau leh a siangtho a namtui paknamtui zong bawl hi.
Amah in meihal biakna tau zong singkha sing tawh bawl hi; a dung tong nga, a vai tong nga ahi hi, a ning kikim a, a san’na tong thum ahi hi.
Amah in tua tau adingin a kiu lite-ah kite bawl hi; a kite in a tau tawh sakhat hi a, amah in sumngo tawh zut hi.
Amah in biakna tau nazat khempeuh, beelte, kawbiate, kuangte, sikkate leh vut luahna peekte bawl hi: a nazat khempeuh amah in sumngo tawh bawl hi.
Amah in biakna tau adingin a zawl nuai-ah, a kim ciang a ban suk, a vang simsiam, sumngo siklen khat bawl hi.
Amah in zawlte a len dingin sumngo siklen kiu lite tung ading kual li sung hi;
amah in singkha sing tawh zawlte bawl a, tuate sumngo tawh zut hi.
Amah in puak nadingin biakna tau pangte-a om kualte sungah zawlte khum hi; amah in singpekte tawh a kuak-in biakna tau bawl hi.
Amah in kikhopna buk kongkhakah na a sem numeite’ limlangte panin sumngo tawh kisilna kuang leh a ngakna bawl hi.
Amah in buk tual bawl hi; leitaw lam pang buk tual-a kikhaite in a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih hi a, tong za khat sau hi;
a khuampite sawmnih hi a, a bullente zong sawmnih hi, sumngo tawh kibawl hi, ahih hangin a vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun ahi hi.
Leilu lam pang ading tong za khat, a khuampite sawmnih, a bullente sawmnih, sumngo tawh kibawl hi, ahih hangin a vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun ahi hi.
Nitumna lam pang adingin a kikhaisukte tong sawmnga hi a, a khuampite sawm hi-in, a bullente in sawm ahi hi; a vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun ahi hi.
A mai lam, nisuahna lam adingin tong sawmnga ahi hi.
Kongpi pang khat ading a kikhaisukte in tong sawm-le-nga hi a, khuampi thum leh bullen thum tawh ahi hi.
A pang khat ading tua bangmah ahi hi; buk tual kongpi hih lam leh hua lam-ah khuampi thum leh bullen thum tawh a kikhaisukte tong sawm-le-nga om hi.
Buk tual kimkot-a a kikhaisukte khempeuh in a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih ahi hi.

Khuampite’ ading a bullente in sumngo ahi hi, ahih hangin a vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun ahi hi; a khuamlu zepnate a kizutna zong ngun hi a, buk tual-a khuamte khempeuh ngun tawh kibawl gakna tawh kigak hi.

Buk tual kongpi kongpuankhai pen a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem ahi hi; buk tual-a kikhaisukte tawh kizui-in tong sawmnih sau-in, a vai lam tong nga sang hi.
A khuampite in li ahi hi; a bullen lite in sumngo hi a, a vankhainate ngun hi a, a khuamlu zepnate leh a gaknate a kizutna in ngun ahi hi.
Biakbuk leh buk tual kimkot ading khetphimte khempeuh in sumngo ahi hi.
Hih in siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ vaihawmna nuai-ah Levi mite’ sep ding tecipan’na biakbuk ahi biakbuk adingin Moses’ thupiakna tawh a kisim ciangin a kigawmna nate ahi hi.
Judah minam Hur’ tapa ahi Uri’ tapa Bezalel in Topa in Moses a thupiak khempeuh bawl hi;
a khut siam, a geel siam, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte a zem, Dan minam, Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab zong amah tawh om hi.
Nasep nadinga a kizang kham khempeuh, biakinn lamna-a a kizang khempeuh, a kipia khamte in, biakinn shekel-in talen sawmnih-le-kua leh shekel za sagih sawmthum ahi hi.
A kisim mihonte tung panin ngunte in biakinn shekel-in talen za khat leh shekel tul khat za sagih sawmsagihnga ahi hi:
mi khat ciangin beka khat pai pia a, (biakinn shekel-in shekel lang), a pia mi, kum sawmnih a pha panin a tungsiah mi kisimna-a a kisim peuhmah tul zaguk leh tul thum leh zanga leh sawmnga ahi hi.
Ngun talen za khatte in biakinn khuam bullente leh dalna puan khuam bullente dingin sun’ ding ahi hi; talen za khatte bullen za khat, bullen khat ciangin talen khat ahi hi.
Amah in shekel tul khat za sagih sawmsagihnga pen khuampi tunga vankhai nadingin bawlin, a khuamlu zepnate zut-in tuate’ ading gakna bawl hi.
A kipia sumngote in talen sawmsagih leh shekel tul nih leh za li ahi hi;
amah in tua tawh kikhopna buk kongkhakte’ adingin khuam bullente, sumngo biakna tau leh a sumngo siklen leh biakna tau nazat khempeuh,
buk tual kimkot-a khuam bullente buk tual kongpi khuam bullente, biakbuk khetphimte khempeuh leh buk tual kimkot-a khetphim khempeuh bawl hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, siangtho mun-ah nasep nadingin amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh limtak-a kigan puan bawl uh hi; amaute in Aaron’ adingin biakna puan siangthote bawl uh hi.
Amah in siampi puan pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh bawl hi.
Hoih taka a kigeel, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte-ah zat dingin kham peek kiseekin khau-in kizem hi.
Amaute in siampi puan’ adingin liangkaih puan bawl uh a, a mong nihte gel-ah zom uh hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah a gak dinga hoih taka a kigan tua tunga puan om pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh kibawlin, a nate leh a sepna zia a kibang ahi hi.
Israel tapate’ minte tawh kizui-in onik suangte kitaat a, kham tawh a kizepna sungah kikoihin, min gelhna a kibawl bangin kibawl hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin Israel tapate phawkna suang dingin amah in siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tungah bulh hi.
Amah in kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh, siampi puan a kibawl bangin hoih takin awmdal bawl hi.
Tua in a ning kikim hi; thuap nih-in awmdal kibawl a, a kikhep ciangin a dung khap khat, a vai khap khat ahi hi.
Amah in tua sungah suang gual li bulh hi. Sardis suang, topaz suang, leh kabankel suang gual khat in a gual masa ahi hi;
a gual nihna in, emerald suang, sapfeiros suang leh diamond suang ahi hi;
a gual thumna in, Jakinth suang, agate suang leh amethist suang ahi hi;
a gual lina in, beril suang, onik suang leh jasper suang ahi hi; kham tawh zepna suangah tuate kikoih hi.
Israel tapate’ min tawh kituakin amaute’ min a omna suang sawmlenih om hi; tuate in min gelhnate tawh kibang a, minam sawmlenihte amau’ min ciat kigelh hi.
Amaute in awmdal tungah khau tawh a kibang, a kihual kham citak khainiang bawl uh hi;
amaute in kham tawh a kibawl zepna nih leh kham kual nih bawl uh a, awmdal mong nihte-ah kham kual nihte koih uh hi;
amaute in awmdal mongte-ah a om kual nihte' sungah kham khau nihte koih uh hi.
Amaute in zepna nihte' tungah khau mong nihte zom uh hi; tua bangin amaute in siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tung a mai lamah bulh uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puan tawh a kizom a sung lam nawl, awmdal mong nihte-ah koih uh hi.
Amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puan’ liangkaih puan nihte’ nuai a mai lam, hoih taka a kigan siampi puante’ puankhau a kizopna tung tak-ah bulh uh hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, hoih taka a kigan siampi puan khau tungah a om theih nading leh siampi puan tung panin awmdal a kol theih loh nadingin amaute in siampi puan’ kualte-ah khau dum khat-in a kualte tawh awmdal gak uh hi.
Amah in khau dum bek tawh a kigan siampi puantualpi zong bawl hi;
a kikeek loh nadingin puantualpi ngawng pen puan ngawng vang bangin a ngawng kimkot-ah a zimna om hi.
Puantualpi mongte-ah amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh mang kawlsing gahte bawl uh hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in kham citak siklongte zong bawl uh a, mang kawlsing gahte’ kikal, puantualpi mong kimkot tunga mang kawlsing gahte' kikal-ah siklongte koih uh hi;
biak nasep nadinga puantualpi mong kimkot tungah siklong khat, mang kawlsing gah khat, cih bangin om hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in Aaron leh a tapate’ adingin khau hoih tawh a kigan puantungsilhte
leh khau hoih tawh a kigan dialpi leh khau hoih tawh a kigan lukhute, a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puah hoihte tawh a kibawl pheituam hoihte,
leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a kibawl puan kawnggak leh phim tawh kikkhui-in a kizem a dum, a dupsan, a ausan puante zong bawl uh hi.
Amaute in kham citak tawh a siangtho kizepna peek khat bawl uh a, min gelhna a kibawl mah bangin tua tungah thu gelhin, “Topa’ tungah siangtho,” ci uh hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in a tunga dialpi tungah a gak dingin tua tungah khau dum khat vawh uh hi.
Tua bangin kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasep khempeuh kiman hi; Topa in Moses a thupiaksa khempeuh bangin Israel mite in sem khin hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute mankhin hi.
Amaute in Moses' kiangah biakbuk, a puanbuk leh a nazat khempeuh, a vankhainate, khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite leh a bullente;
a kisansak tuutal vunte leh savunte tawh a kibawl khuhna leh kongpuankhai dalna puan’
tecipan’na singkuang a zawlte leh hehpihna tokhom tawh;
sabuai leh a nazat khempeuhte leh Ompihna Anlum;
kham citak meivakkhuam leh meivak a kibulhsa tawh a meivakte leh a nazatte khempeuh leh meivak ading sathau;
kham biakna tau, nilh sathau leh a namtui paknamtui leh puanbuk kongkhak ading kongpuankhai;
sumngo biakna tau leh a sumngo siklen, a zawlte leh a nazat khempeuh; kisilna kuang leh a ngakna;
buk tual-a a kikhaite, a khuampite, a bullente lehbuk tual kongpi adinga kongpuankhai, a khaute leh a khetphimte; leh kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasaepna-a a nazat khempeuh;
siampi nasep nadingin siangtho mun-a zat ding hoih taka a kibawl puante, siampi Aaron ading biakna puan siangthote leh ama' tapate’ puante paipih uh hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin Israel mite in nasep khempeuh hih uh hi.
Moses in nasep khempeuh mu a, en in, amaute in sem khin hi; Topa’ thupiaksa bangin amaute in sem khin hi. Moses in amaute thupha pia hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“Kha masa a ni masa ni-in nangmah in kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk na lam ding hi.
Nangmah in tua sungah tecipan’na singkuang na koih ding a, nangmah in dalna puan tawh singkuang na dal ding hi.
Nangmah in sabuai na tumpih ding a, a om ding bangin na koih ding hi; nangmah in meivakkhuam na tumpih ding a, a meivakte na bulh ding hi.
Nangmah in tecipan’na singkuang mai-ah paknamtui adingin kham biakna tau na koih ding a, biakbuk kongkhak dingin kongpuankhai na khai ding hi.
Nangmah in kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk kongkhak mai-ah meihal biaknatau koihin,
kikhopna buk leh biakna tau kikal-ah kisilna kuang na koih ding a, tua sungah tui na koih ding hi.
Nangmah in a kimkotah buk tual na bawl ding a, buk tual kongpi dingin kongpuankhai na khai to ding hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk leh a sunga om khempeuh na nuh ding a, biakbuk leh a innsung van khempeuh na ap ding hi; tua in a siangtho suak ding hi.
Nangmah in meihal biakna tau leh a nazat khempeuh zong sathau nuh-in biakna tau na ap ding hi; biakna tau in a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kisilna kuang leh a ngakna zong sathau nuh-in na ap ding hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in kikhopna buk kongkhak-ah Aaron leh ama' tapate paipihin, amaute tui tawh na sil ding a,
amah in keima' tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingin puan siangthote Aaron silh sakin, amah sathau nilhin na ap ding hi.
Nangmah in ama' tapate zong paipihin amaute puantungsilhte na silhsak ding a,

amaute in keima' tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun amaute’ pa sathau na nilh bangin amaute sathau na nilh ding hi: amau’ sathau kinilhna in amau’ khang tawntungin siampi hih tawntungna piangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin Moses in hih hi; Topa in amah a thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin amah in hih hi.
A kum nihna a kha masa, tua kha a ni masa ni-in biakbuk kilam hi.
Moses in biakbuk lam hi; amah in a bulllente koihin, a khuampeekte phut a, a zawlte khumin, a khuampite phut hi;
amah in biakbuk tungah puanbuk zal a, Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin a tungah puanbuk khuh hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin amah in tecipan’na la-in singkuang sungah koih a, singkuang tungah zawlte koihin, singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom nga hi;
amah in biakbuk sungah singkuang paipihin, kongpuankhai dalna puan khai a, Topa’ thupiak bangin tecipan’na singkuang dal hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in biakbuk leilu lam pang, dalna puan pua lam, kikhopna buk sungah sabuai koih a,
Topa’ mai tua sabuai tungah a om ding bangin anlum koih hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in biakbuk leitaw lam pang, sabuai tawh a kigalsai-in, kikhopna buk sungah meivakkhuam koih a,
Topa’ mai-ah meivak koih hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in kikhopna buk sung, dalna puan mai-ah kham biakna tau koih a,
tua tungah a namtui paknamtui hal hi.
Amah in biakbuk kongkhak ding kongpuankhai a mun-ah khai hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin amah in kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk kongkhak-ah meihal biakna tau koih a, tua tungah meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna pia hi.
Amah in kikhopna buk leh biakna tau kikal-ah kisilna kuang koih a, tua sungah kisil nading tui koih hi.
Moses leh Aaron leh a tapate in amau’ khut leh a khete uh tua tui tawh sil uh hi;
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin amaute kikhopna bukah a pai ciang leh biakna tau nai-ah a pai uh ciangin amaute kisil uh hi.
Amah in biakbuk leh biakna tau kiim-ah a buk tual bawl a, buk tual kongpi kongpuankhai khai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moses in nasep man ta hi.
Tua ciangin meii in kikhopna buk tuam a, Topa’ minthan’na in biakbuk dim hi.
A tungah meii a omna hangin kikhopna buk sungah Moses tum thei lo a, Topa’ minthan’na in a biakbuk dim hi.
A khualzin sung tawntung uh biakbuk tung panin meii a kilakkhiat toh peuhpeuh ciangin Israel mite mai lam nawtin pai uh hi;
ahih hangin meii a kilakkhiat kei leh a kilakkhiat ni mateng amaute paikhia lo uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a khualzin sung tawntung uh Israel mi khempeuh' muhna-ah biakbuk tungah sunin Topa’ meii omin, zan-in tua sungah mei om hi.
Topa in Moses samin, kikhopna buk panin amah hopih-in hih bangin ci hi.

“Israel mite tungah gen in la, amaute tungah hih bangin ci in: Note khatpeuh in Topa tungah biakna na paipih uh ciangin, ganhing tawh na biakna pen bawnghon panin hi taleh tuuhon panin hi taleh na paipih ding uh hi.
“Ama biakna in bawnghon panin meihal biakna ahih leh, amah in a sitbang lo a pa khat pia ding hi; Topa’ mai-ah a kisan’ theih nadingin kikhopna buk kong-ah pia ding hi;
amah in meihal biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga ding a, a ma adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kisang ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Topa’ mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi; Aaron’ suan siampite in a si hong paipihin, kikhopna buk kong-a om biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna ganhing a vun hawk-in semnen ding hi;
tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tungah mei koihin, mei tungah a ngeina bangin sing koih ding hi;
tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in a sanente, a lutang leh a thaute, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin koih ding hi;
ahih hangin a sungkuate leh a khete tui tawh sil ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tawh kihal biakna, Topa adingin a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah tuate a vekpi-in hal ding hi
“Meihal biak nadingin ama letsong in tuu hita leh keel hita leh a hon lak panin ahih leh, amah in a sitbang lo a pa khat pia ding hi;
tua ciangin amah in Topa’ mai biakna tau tung leilu lam pangah go ding a, Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in semnen ding a, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin siampipa in a lutang leh a thau tawh koihkhawm ding hi;

ahih hangin a sungkuate leh a khete amah in tui tawh sil ding hi. Siampipa in a vekpi-in pia-in, biakna tau tungah tuate hal ding hi; tua pen Topa adingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakpiakna ahi hi.
“Topa tungah ama biakna in vasa tawh meihal biakna ahih leh, amah in vakhu tawh ahi zongin kawl vakhuno tawh a hi zongin a biakna hong paipih ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in biakna tau-ah paipihin a lu heektat ding a, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi; biakna tau pangah a si taakkhia sak ding hi;
amah in a tangkhai leh a multe botkhia-in, vut koihna, biakna tau pang nisuahna lamah paaikhia ding hi;

amah in a khate-in balkeek ding a, ahih hangin baltat lo ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tunga om sing tung, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi; tua pen Topa adingin a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna, meihal biakna ahi hi.
“Mi khatpeuh in Topa tungah biakna-in an tawh biakna hong paipih leh, ama biakpiakna in annel hi ding hi; amah in tua tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui koihin,

tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite kiangah paipih ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in annel khut dim khat leh sathau, a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la ding hi; siampipa in hih pen Topa’ adingin a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron leh a tapate ading hi ding hi; tua in Topa’ tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangthopen ahi hi.
“Nangmah in biak nadingin meibung sunga ki-em an tawh biakna na paipih ciangin, tua in silngo sawh loh sathau tawh a kizut mohpheng hi ding hi.
Na biakna in belpei dai tunga ki-em an tawh biakna ahih leh, silngo sawhloh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi;
nang in bal nenin a tungah sathau na sung ding hi; tua in an tawh biakna ahi hi.
Na biakna in sikbel dai sunga kihuan an tawh biakna ahih leh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi.
Nangmah in hih nate tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna Topa kiangah na paipih ding hi; tua pen siampipa kiangah a kipaipih ciangin amah in biakna tau-ah paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in an tawh biakna panin a phawkna biakna teng la-in, Topa tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron leh a tapate ading hi ding hi; tua in Topa tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangtho pen ahi hi.
“Topa’ tungah na paipih an tawh biakna in silngo tawh kibawl lo ding hi; bang hang hiam na cih leh silngo hita leh khuaizu khatpeuh peuh hita leh Topa’ tungah meihal biakna-in na hal kei ding hi.
Anpal tawh biakna ahih leh Topa’ kiangah na paipih thei ding hi; ahih hangin a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah kipia lo ding hi.
An tawh na biaknate khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi; an tawh na biakna-ah na Pasian tawh na thuciamna ci hel loin na om kei ding hi; na biakna khempeuh ci tawh na pia ding hi.
“Anpal tawh Topa tungah biakna na piak leh, anpal tawh na biakna dingin a vui thak panin kila-in a kigawivui, mei tawh a kihangkeu na pia ding hi.
Nang in a tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui na buak ding hi; tua in an tawh biakna ahi hi.
Siampipa in phawk nadingin a kigawivui an pawlkhat leh a sathau leh a paknamtui khempeuh hal ding hi; tua in Topa tungah meihal biakna ahi hi.
“Mi khat’ biakna in thunuam-a biakna ahih a, amah in a nu hita leh a pa hita leh bawnghon lak panin ganhing khat a piak leh, amah in Topa mai-ah a sitbang lo pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk kongah go ding hi; tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding hi.
Thunuam-a biakna panin Topa tungah mei tawh biakna-in amah in a gilpi tuam a thaute leh asungkuate tunga a om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawng-a om a kal nihte athau leh a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in singkuang tunga om meihal biakpiakna tau tung mah ah hal ding uh hi; tua in Topa adingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.
“Topa tungah thunuam-a a piak ding ama biakna in tuu leh keelhonte sung panin anu hita leh apa hita leh ganhing khat ahi leh, amah in a sitbang lo pia ding hi.
Amah in a biak nadingin tuuno khat a piak leh, Topa mai-ah pia-in,
a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah tua ganhing go ding hi; tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin thunuam-a biakna panin Topa tungah meihal biakna in amah in a thau, a nungguh ciangah a ki-attan a mei thau buppi leh a gilpi tuam a thaute leh a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawng-a om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
“Ama biakna in keel ahih leh, amah in Topa’ mai-ah pia ding a,
a lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah go ding hi; tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua sung panin Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in a piak dingin a gilpi tuam a thau leh a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawng-a om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a gim namtui dingin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. A thau khempeuh Topa’ aa ahi hi.
Tua in na khang tawntungun na ten’na khempeuh uhah note in a thau leh a si na nek loh nadingun a tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih lo ding ci-in Topa in a thupiakte khatpeuh peuh mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin khial a, tuate khatpeuh a hih a,

a khialpa pen sathau a kinilh siampipa ahih a, mihingte tungah tua bangin mawhna hong tut leh, ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a sitbang lo bawngtalno khat Topa mai-ah khialhna biakna-in amah pia sak un.
Amah in Topa mai kikhopna buk kongah bawngtal paipihin, bawngtal lu tungah a khut nga-in, Topa’ mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi.
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, kikhopna bukah paipih ding hi;
tua ciangin siampipa in si sungah a khutme diahin, biakinn dalna puan mai Topa mai-ah a si kimkhat sagih vei theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in kikhopna buk sung Topa mai-a om paknamtui biakna tau kite, a si kimkhat nuhin kikhopna buk kongah a om meihal biakna tau bul-ah bawngtal’ si a om lai teng sungkhia ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal thau khempeuh a gilpi tuam a thau leh a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawng-a om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte
(thunuam biakna bawngtal panin hihte a kilak mah bangin) la ding a, siampipa in meihal biakna tau tungah tuate hal ding hi.
Ahih hangin bawngtal vun leh a sa khempeuh, a lutang, a khete, a sungkuate, leh a ek tawh,
a bawngtal buppi puakhia-in vut kibuakna, giahphual pua lam mun siangtho khat-a sing a kicih mei tungah amah in hal ding hi; vut a kibuakna-ah kihal ding hi.
“Israel mihonte khempeuh in theih lohna hangin khialhna khat gamta-in tua pen mihonte in a phawk kei a, hih lo ding ci-in Topa in a thupiakte khatpeuh peuh amaute in hihin a mawh uh leh;
amau’ gamtatnasa khialhna a kitheih ciangin, khialhna hanga biak nadingin mihonte in bawngtalno khat pia-in kikhopna buk mai-ah paipih ding uh hi;
tua ciangin mihonte’ upate in Topa mai, bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a, Topa mai-ah bawngtal kigo ding hi.
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in kikhopna bukah bawngtal sisan kimkhat paipihin,
tua ciangin siampipa in a sisan sungah a khutme diahin dalna puan mai Topa mai-ah sagih vei theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa mai kikhopna buk sunga om biakna tau kite tungah a sisan kimkhat nuh ding hi; amah in kikhopna buk kongah a om meihal biakna tau bulah sisan a om lai teng sung ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a thau khempeuh la-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
Tua bangin a bawngtal hih ding hi; amah in khialna hanga biakna bawngtal a hihsa mah bangin hih zong hih ding hi; siampipa in amau adingin kilemna bawl sak ding hi; amaute kimaisak ding hi.
Amah in giahphual pua-ah bawngtal puakhia ding a, a masa bawngtal a hal mah bangin a hal ding hi; tua in mihonpi adingin khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
“Ukpa khat khialin, hih lo ding ci-in Topa ama Pasian in a thupiakte khempeuh lakah khatpeuh peuh theihlohna hangin hih kha a, a mawh ciangin,
ama gamtatnasa khialhna ama tungah a va kihilh leh, amah in biakna-in a sitbang lo keel pa khat paipih ding a,
keel lu tungah a khut nga-in, amaute in Topa mai, meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah a go ding hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a khutme tawh khialhna hanga biakna si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh-in, meihal biakna tau bulah si a om lai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuam-a biakna sathaute mah bangin amah in biakna tau tungah a thau khempeuh hal ding hi; tua ahih ciangin siampipa in ama khialhna hangin ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Hih lo ding ci-in Topa’ thupiakte khatpeuh peuh mi mawkmawk khat in theih lohna hangin hihin a khialh leh a mawh ahi hi.~
Ama gamtatnasa a khialhna ama tungah a va kihilh ciangin amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin biak nading a sitbang lo keel a nu khat paipih ding hi.
Amah in khialhna hanga biakna lu tungah a khut nga-in, meihal biakna munah khialhna biakna pen go ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutme tawh a si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh ding a, biakna tau bulah a si a om laiteng sung ding hi.

Thunuam-a biakna panin a thaute a kilakkhiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh lakhia ding a, Topa ading a gim namtui dingin siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi; siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Amah in khialhna hanga biakna-in a piak dingin tuuno khat a paipih leh, a sitbang lo a nu khat paipih ding a,
khialhna hanga biakna lu tungah a khut nga-in, amaute in meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah khialhna hanga biak nadingin go ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat a khutme tawh la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh ding a, biakna tau bulah si a om lai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuam-a biakpiakna panin tuuno thau a kilak khiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh lakhia ding a, Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah siampipa in hal ding hi; siampipa in ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh in teci pang dingin kiciamna za-in, amah teci hi napi-in a muhsa a theihsa na hita leh gen loin a ip leh, amah in tua mawhna pua ding hi.

Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in gamlak ganhing nin a sisa hita leh inn ganhing nin a sisa hita leh a bokvak a nin ganhing a sisa hita leh, a muh loh a nin khatpeuh peuh lawngkha leh amah a nin suakin a mawh hi ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh amah in mihing nitna hita leh, amah a ninsak ding na khatpeuh mu loin a lawn’ khak leh, a theih ciangin a mawh hi ding hi.

Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in asia bawl ding hita leh a pha bawl ding hita leh mite a kiciam theih ngei kiciamna nam khatpeuh peuh ama kam tawh a theih lohin a kiciam pak khak leh, a theih ciangin hihte khatpeuh peuhah a mawh hi ding hi.
Hihte khatpeuh peuhah mi khat a mawh ciangin, amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna pulak ding a,

amah in mawhna biakna-in tuuhon pan ahi a, keelhon pan ahi zongin a nu khatpeuh peuh tuuno hita leh keel hita leh, a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin Topa tungah a khialhna hanga biakna paipih ding hi; siampipa in a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah in tuuno khat a piak zawh kei leh, a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin Topa’ tungah mawhna biakna-in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhu no nih ahi zongin, khat khialhna hanga biakna, a khat meihal biak nadingin paipih ding hi.
Amah in siampipa tungah tuate paipih ding a, siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nading pen pia masa ding hi; amah in a ngawng panin a lu heek ding a, ahih hangin heeksat lo ding hi;
amah in khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat biakna tau pangah theh ding a, biakna tau bulah si a om lai teng taak sak ding hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ngeina kip om bangin meihal biak nadingin a khat pia ding hi; siampipa in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhu no nih ahi zongin a piak zawh kei leh, amah in a gamtatnasa khialhna hangin a biakna-in an nel seu khat sehsawm suah sehkhat khialhna hanga biak nadingin paipih ding hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna ahih manin amah in tua tungah sathau sawh loin, paknamtui zong hel lo ding hi.
Amah in siampipa kiangah paipih ding a, siampipa in phawkna-in khut dim khat la-in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Tua bangin siampipa in hihte khatpeuh peuh a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi. An tawh biakna-a mah bangin a om lai teng siampipa’ ading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin thu palsatin Topa’ na a siangtho khatpeuh peuhah a khialh leh, a mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuhon sung panin a sitbang lo tuutal khat, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in ngun shekel-in nangmah in a man sehin, amah in Topa’ kiangah paipih ding hi; tua in mawhna biakna ahi hi.

Amah in a siangtho na a hih khialhna-ah lohkikna zong bawl ding a, sehnga suah sehkhat gawm behin siampipa tungah pia ding hi; siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh peuh in hih lo ding ci-in Topa’ thupiakte khatpeuh peuh hihin a khialh leh, a theih lohna hang hita leh zong, amah a mawh hi veve-in ama mawhna mah pua ding hi.

Tuuhon lak panin a sitbang lo tuutal khat, mawhna hanga biakna man zah ding nangmah in seh in la, amah in siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi; theih lohna hanga ama gamtatnasa khialhna hangin siampipa in ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
Tua in mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi; amah in Topa’ mai-ah a mawh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Mi khatpeuh khialin, Topa’ thu palsatin na kepsakna thu-ah ahi zongin khapna nate thu ah ahi zongin a vengpa khemin, ahih kei leh a na sutin, a vengpa nenniamin,
tua ahih kei leh a mang na khat mu-in tua thu-ah zuau-in, a man loin kiciam a– mite a khialh theih ngei na khatpeuh peuh ah
mi khat khialin a mawh ciangin amah in a suhte hita leh, a nenniamna tawh a ngahte hita leh, amah a kikemsak na hita leh, a mang na a muh hita leh,

a man loin a kiciamnasa na khatpeuh peuh hita leh loh ding hi; amah in a cingin lohin sehnga suah sehkhat piak beh ding a, a mawhna hanga biakna piak beh ding a, a mawhna hanga biakna a piak ni-in a neipa tungah pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa tungah a mawhna hanga biakna tuuhon lak panin a sitbang lo tuutal khat, mawhna hanga biakna man ding nangma seh zah siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in Topa mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding a, mi khat a mawh theih ngeina khatpeuh peuhte ah amah kimaisak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Aaron leh a tapate thu pia in la, hih bangin ci in: Hihte in meihal biaknate ngeina ahi hi. Meihal biakna in biakna tau tunga meikhuk tungah zingsang mateng zan tawntung om ding a, tua tungah biakna tau, mei kikuangsak den ding hi.
Siampipa in a saihadial puan silhin, pum tungah a saihadial pheituam tengin, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna mei in a kattum vutte la-in biakna tau pangah koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a puante suahin puan dang silh ding a, gialphual pua lam a siangtho mun khatah vutte puakhia ding hi.

Biakna tau tunga mei kikuangsak den ding hi; kimitsak lo ding hi; siampipa in zingsang simin a tungah sing cihin, meihal biakna a ngeina bangin a tungah koihin, thunuam-a biakna thau a tungah hal ding hi.
Biakna tau tungah mei kikuangsak tawntung ding hi; kimitsak lo ding hi.
“Tua ciangin hihte in an tawh biakna ngeinate ahi hi. Aaron’ suante in biakna tau mai, Topa’ mai-ah pia ding uh hi.
Siampipa in, an tawh biakna tungah a om an tawh biakna annel khut dim khat, a sathau leh a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la-in, Topa’ adingin a gim namtui, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
Aaron leh a tapate in a om lai teng ne ding uh hi; a siangtho mun khatah silngo sawh loh kine ding hi; kikhopna buk tual ah ne ding uh hi.

Tua pen silngo sawh-a ki-em hilo ding hi. Meihal biakna hong kipiakna sung panin amau’ tanh dingin ka piaksa ahi hi; tua in khialhna hanga biakna leh mawhna hanga biakna bangin a siangthopen na ahi hi.

Na khang tawntung uh adingin thu hong kipiak mah bangin, Topa tungah meihal biakna a kipiakna panin Aaron’ suante lakah pasal peuhmah in tuate ne thei ding hi; tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Hih in amah sathau a kinilh ni-in Aaron leh a suante in Topa tungah a piak ding biakna ahi hi; an tawh biakna ngeina bangin annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehkhat, a lang zingsangin a lang nitakin pia ding hi.
Tua pen belpei tung khatah sathau tawh kibawl ding hi; an tawh biakna mah bangin lim takin helsa leh balnensa-in na paipih ding a, Topa ading a gim namtui dingin na pia ding hi.
Aaron’ suante sung panin amah a laih dingin sathau a kinilh siampipa in, a tawntung dingin thu a kipiaksa mah bangin Topa tungah pia ding hi; a vekpi-in kihal ding hi.
Siampipa in an tawh a biakna peuhmah a vekpi-in kihal ding hi; kine lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron leh a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih in khialhna hanga biakna ngeina ahi hi. Meihal biakna a kigawhna mun Topa mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna kigo ding hi; tua in a siangthopen ahi hi.
Khialhna hanga biakna a pia siampipa in ne ding hi; kikhopna buktual sung a siangtho mun khatah kine ding hi.
A sa a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi; puan tungah a si a kitheh khak ciangin, a siangtho mun khatah tua si a kitheh kha pen na sawp ding hi.
Tua ciangin a kihuanna leibeel kisukham ding hi; ahih hangin tau beel tawh a kihuan ahih leh a beel kikiatin tui sungah kisawp siang sitset ding hi.
Siampite lak panin pasal peuhmah in ne thei ding uh hi; tua in a siangthopen ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin kikhopna buk sungah a kipaipih si a kilak khiatna khialhna hanga biakna sa kine lo ding hi: tua pen mei tawh kihal ding hi.
“Hih in mawhna hanga biakna ngeina ahi hi. A siangthopen ahi hi;
amaute in meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah mawhna hanga biakna go ding uh a, biakna tau tung kimkotah a si kitheh ding hi.
Tua ciangin a thau khempeuh a mei thau, a gilpi tuam a thau,
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte kipia ding hi:
Topa tungah meihal biakna-in siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi; tua in mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Siampite lakah pasal peuhmah in ne thei ding hi; a siangtho mun khatah kine ding hi; tua in a siangthopen ahi hi.
Mawhna hanga biakna in khialhna hanga biakna tawh kibang a, tuate ading a ngeina a kibang ahi hi; kilemna a bawlsak siampipa in tua biakna sa ngah ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh’ meihal biakna a piaksak siampipa in ama piaksak tua meihal biakna sa a vun ngah ding hi.
Meibung sunga a ki-em an tawh biakna peuhmah leh sikbel dai ahi a, belpei tung ahi zongin a kibawl khempeuhte a pia siampipa in ngah ding hi.
An tawh biakna khempeuh, sathau a kihel hita leh a kihel lo hita leh, Aaron’ suan khempeuh in a kikim-in hawm ding uh hi.
“Hih in, mi khatpeuh in Topa tungah a piak theih ding thunuam-a biakna ngeina ahi hi.
Amah in lungdam kohna-in a piak leh, silngo sawh loh sathau tawh a kihel moh, silngo sawhloh mohpheng sathau tawh a kizut, an nel moh sathau lim tak-a kihelte lungdam biakna tawh piakhawm ding hi.
Amah in lungdamkoh nadingin thunuam-a ama biakpiakna tawh silngo kisawh anlum mohte ama biakna-in paipih khawm ding hi.
Amah in Topa biak nadingin tua biakna sung panin moh khat ciat pia ding hi; thunuam-a biakna si a theh siampipa in tua moh ngah ding hi.
Lungdam kohna-in thunuam-a ama biakpiakna a sa pen a piak ni-in kine ding hi; amah in a zingsang dong bangmah sit lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama biakna piakna in thuciamna biakpiakna ahi a, ut thu-a biakpiakna ahi zongin ahih leh, amah in a biakpiakna a piak ni-in kine ding a, a om lai teng a zing ciangin kine ding hi;
ahih hangin a nithum ni-in biakpiakna sa a om lai teng mei tawh kihal ding hi.

A ni thum ni-in thunuam-a ama biakpiakna sa khatpeuh peuh a kinek leh, tua biakpiakna a piapa kisang lo ding a, tua pen ama’ aa-in zong kiciamteh lo ding hi; tua in a kihhuai hi ding a, a nepa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
“A nin na khatpeuh peuh tawh a kisawh kha sa kine lo ding hi; mei tawh kihal ding hi; a siang mi khempeuh in a sa ne thei ding uh a,
ahih hangin ama tungah nitna om napi-in thunuam-a Topa tungah biakpiakna sa a nepa ama mite lak panin kihawlkhia ding hi.

Mi khat in a nin na khat, mihing’ nitna hita leh ganhing nin khat hita leh a kihhuai a nin khatpeuh peuh hita leh lawng a, tua khit ciangin thunuam-a Topa tungah biakpiakna sa a nek leh, ama mite lak panin tua mipa kihawlkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin a thau na ne kei ding uh hi.
A mawk sih ganhing thau leh gamsate in a balgawp ganhing thaute na dangin kizang thei ding a, ahih hangin bangbang hita leh na ne kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ganhing thau a ne mi peuhmah ama mite lak panin kihawlkhia ding hi.
Tua tham loin note in na ten’na uh mun khatpeuh peuh ah vasa namte’ aa hita leh ganhingte’ aa hita leh a sisan peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi.
Sisan khatpeuh peuh a ne mi peuhmah ama mite lak panin kihawlkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Topa tungah thunuam-a ama biakpiakna a piapa in Topa kiangah ama biakna paipih ding hi; thunuam-a ama biakpiakna panin
amah in meihal biakna Topa tungah a khut-in paipih ding hi; Topa’ mai-ah veii-a biak nadingin a iik a kiveii theih nadingin amah in athau a iik tawh paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in biakna tau tungah a thau hal ding a, ahih hangin a iik pen Aaron leh a suante ading hi ding hi.
Thunuam-a biakpiakna panin biakna-in siampipa tungah a taklam phei na pia ding uh hi;
Aaron’ suante sung panin thunuam-a biakna sisan leh athau a piapa in a taklam phei ngah ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiveii a iik leh a kipia a phei pen keimah in Israel mite tung, thunuam-a, amau’ biakpiakna sung panin lakhia-in, Israel mite tung panin a tawntungin a ngah dingun siampi Aaron leh a suante tungah ka pia khin zo hi.
Hih in, Topa’ siampi nasem dingin amaute a kipiak ni-in, Topa tungah meihal biakna sung panin amau tungah a kipia, Aaron leh a suante’ tanh ahi hi;
Israel mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingin amaute sathau a kinilh ni-in Topa in hih thu pia hi; tua in a khang tawntungun amau’ ngeina kip ahi hi,” a ci hi.

37-38 Hih in, amau biaknate Topa tungah a piak nadingun amah in Israel mite Sinai gam lakah a thu piak ni-in Topa in Sinai Mual tungah Moses a thupiak, meihal biakna, an tawh biakna, khialhna hanga biakna, mawhna hanga biakna, ki-apna leh thunuam-a biakna ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron leh amah tawh a om a tapate, a puante, a nilh sathau, khialhna hanga biakna a bawngtal, a tuutal nihte leh silngo sawhloh anlum lawh la in;
kikhopna buk kongah Israel mihonte khempeuh khawm in,” a ci hi.
Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses in hih hi; kikhopna buk kongah mihonte kikhawm hi.
Moses in mihonte kiangah, “Hih in Topa in hih dinga a thupiak na ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Aaron leh a tapate paipihin tui tawh amaute a sil hi.
Amah in a puantungsilh amah silhsak a, a kawnggak tawh gakin, a puantualpi silh sak a, a siampi puan silh sakin, siampi puan’ khau, hoih taka a kigan tawh gak a, tua tawh ama tungah khih hi.
Amah in ama tungah a awmdal bulhin, a awmdal sungah Urim leh Thummim koih hi.
Amah in ama lu tungah a dialpi koihin, a dialpi tung a mai lamah, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amah in kham peek, a siangtho kumpi lukhu koih hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk leh a sunga om khempeuh nuhin tuate a ap hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah tuate kimkhat sagih vei thehin, biakna tau leh a nazat khempeuh leh kuang leh a ngaknate, ap dingin sathau nuh hi.
Amah in nilh sathau kimkhat Aaron’ lu tungah sung a, ap dingin amah sathau nilh hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, Moses in Aaron’ tapate paipihin, puantungsilhte silh sakin, kawnggakte tawh amaute gakin, amau’ tungah lukhute khih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal paipih hi; Aaron leh a tapate in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal’ lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Kilemna bawl nadingin Moses in goin, a si la-in a kiim-a biakna tau kite a khutme tawh nuhin, biakna tau siangtho sakin, biakna tau bulah a site sung khia-in, ap hi.
Amah in a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh leh a sintuamte leh a kal nihte a thau tawh la-in, Moses in biakna tau tungah tuate hal hi.
Ahih hangin, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin a bawngtal leh a vun, a sa leh a ek, amah in giahphual pua lamah mei tawh hal hi.
