Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna tuutal pia hi; Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Moses in goin, biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh hi.
Tuutal a kisem nen ciangin, Moses in a lu leh a ki-at nente leh a thau hal hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, a sungkuate leh a khete tui tawh a kisawp khit ciangin, Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in Moses in biakna tau tungah tuutal buppi hal hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tuutal dang, kipsakna tuutal pia hi; Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau khut nga uh hi.
Moses in goin a si tawmkhat la-in Aaron’ taklam bilteep leh a taklam khutpi leh a taklam khepi nuh hi.
Aaron tapate hong kipaipihin, Moses in amau’ taklam bil teepte leh amau’ taklam khutpite leh amau’ taklam khepite a si tawmkhat nuh hi; Moses in biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a thau, a mei thau leh a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh leh a sintuamte, a kal nihte leh a thau, leh a taklam phei la hi;
Topa mai-ah a om silngo sawhloh anlum lawh sung panin amah in silngo sawhloh moh khat leh sathau sawh anlum moh khat leh moh pheng khat la-in, a thau tung leh a taklam phei tungah tuate koih hi.
Amah in hihte khempeuh Aaron’ khut sung leh ama tapate’ khut sungah koihin, veii-a biakna-in Topa mai-ah tuate veii hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in amaute’ khut sung panin tuate la-in, Topa tungah meihal biakpiakna, a gim namtui, kipsakna biakna-in biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tawh tuate hal hi.
Moses in a iik la-in veii a, biakna-in Topa mai-ah veii hi; Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin tua in kipsakna tuutal panin Moses tanh ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau kimkhat leh biakna tau tunga om a si la-in, Aaron leh ama puante tung, leh ama tapate tung leh ama tapate puante tungah zong theh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in Aaron leh ama puante leh ama tapate leh ama tapate’ puante amah tawh ap khawm hi.

Moses in Aaron leh a tapate’ kiangah, “Keimah in thu pia-in, ‘Aaron leh a tapate in ne ding uh hi,’ ka cih mah bangin, kikhopna buk kongah a sa huan un la, tua lai munah tua sa leh kipsakna biakna lawh sungah a om anlum ne un;
a sa leh anlum a om laite mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
Note hong kikipsak nading ni sagih bei ding ahih manin, note hong kikipsakna ni a cin’ mateng, kikhopna buk kong pua-ah ni sagih sung na paikhia kei ding uh hi.
Tu ni-a a kibawl bangin, note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin Topa in thupia khin hi.

Kikhopna buk kongah ni sagih sung sun leh zan na om ding uh a, Topa’ hong sawlte na hih ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh note na si ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang dingin keima tungah thu hong kipia hi,” a ci hi.
Aaron leh a tapate in Topa in Moses tung tawnin a thupiaknate khempeuh hih uh hi.
A ni giat ni-in Moses in Aaron leh a tapate leh Israel upate sam hi;
amah in Aaron kiangah, “Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawng pano khat leh meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat, a nih tuakin a sitbang lo, la in la, Topa’ mai-ah tuate pia in.
Israel mite kiangah, ‘Khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel apa khat, leh meihal biak nadingin bawngno khat leh tuuno khat, a nih tuakin kum khat pha-in a sitbang lo,

leh thunuam-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah piak dingin bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat leh, sathau tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna la in; bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in note tungah Topa hong kilang ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Amaute in kikhopna buk mai-ah Moses thupiak teng hong paipih uh hi; mihonpite khempeuh a nai-ah hong pai-in Topa mai-ah ding uh hi.
Moses in, “Note hih dinga Topa’ hong thupiak ahi hi; Topa’ minthan’na note tungah hong kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Topa thupiaksa bangin biakna tau nai-ah pai-in khialhna hanga biakna leh meihal biakna pia in la, nangma ading leh mite’ adingin kilemna bawl in; mite’ biakna paipih in la, amaute adingin kilemna bawlsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron in biakna tau naihin ama’ aa mahmah ding ahi khialhna hanga biakna bawngno go hi.
Aaron’ tapate in ama tungah a sisan pia uh a, amah in a sisan sungah a khutme diahin biakna tau kite nuh a, biakna tau bulah a sisan sung khia hi;
ahih hangin, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin khialhna hanga biakna panin a thau leh a kalte leh a sintuamte biakna tau tungah amah in hal hi.
A sa leh a vunte amah in giahphual pua lamah mei tawh hal hi.
Amah in meihal biakna go hi; Aaron’ tapate in ama tungah a si pia uh a, amah in biakna tau tung kimkotah theh hi.
Amaute in meihal biakna ama tungah a nen nenin a lutang tawh pia uh hi; amah in biakna tau tungah tuate hal hi.
Amah in a sungkuate leh a khete sawp a, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tawh tuate halkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a masa a, khialhna hanga biakna mah bangin amah in mite’ biakna pia-in, mite’ ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel la-in go a, khialhna hanga biakna dingin pia hi.
Amah in meihal biakna paipihin ngeina kip omsa bangin pia hi.
Amah in zingsang meihal biakna banah an tawh biakna paipihin, tua sung panin a khut dim la-in, biakna tau tungah hal hi.
Moses’ thupiak bangin amah in mite adingin thunuam-a biakna bawngtal leh tuutal zong go hi; Aaron’ tapate in ama kiangah a sisan paipih uh a, amah in biakna tau tung kimkotah theh a,
bawngtal leh tuutal thau, leh a mei thau, leh a gilpi tuam, leh a kalte, leh a sintuamte
leh a thau, amaute in a iikte tungah koihin, amah in biakna tau tungah a thau hal-in,
ahih hangin Aaron in a iikte leh a taklam pheite Topa’ mai-ah veii-a biakna in veii hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron in mite’ lamah a khutte lamto-in amaute thupha pia hi; tua ciangin khialhna hanga biakna leh meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna a piakna panin amah hong pai suk hi.
Moses leh Aaron kikhopna buk sungah pai uh hi; amaute hong paikhiat ciangun amaute in mite thupha pia-in, mi khempeuh tungah Topa’ minthan’na kilang hi.
Topa mai panin mei hong piang khia-a meihal biakna leh biakna tau tunga om sathau kang hi; mi khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin, amaute awng uh a, lei maingatin puksuk uh hi.

Tu-in Aaron’ tapate Nadab leh Abihu in amau’ paknamtui beel tuak la-in, tua sungah mei koih uh a, a tungah paknamtui koihin, amah in amaute’ tungah tua banga thu a piak ngei loh a siangtho mei Topa’ mai-ah pia uh hi.
Topa’ omna mun panin mei hong pai khia-in amaute kang a, Topa mai-ah a si uh hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron’ kiangah, “Topa in ‘Ka kiang nai-a a omte kiangah keimah a siangthoin ka kilak ding a, mite khempeuh mai-ah keimah hong kiminthangsak ding hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Aaron pau loin om hi.
Moses in Aaron’ pa’ sanggampa Uzziel tapate Mishael leh Elzafan sam a, amaute kiangah, “Hong pai un la, biakinn mai panin giahphual pua lamah na sanggamte uh puakhia un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in hong nai-in, Moses’ cihsa bangin giahphual pua lamah amau’ puantungsilh mah uh tawh amaute puakhia uh hi.

Moses in Aaron leh a tapate Eleazar leh Ithamar kiangah, “Na lu uh a, na sam uh phiahsak kei un la, na puante uh balkeek kei un, na hih uh leh note si-in, mihonte khempeuh tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung ding hi; ahih hangin na sanggamte uh, Israel innkuan buppi pen, Topa’ tawhkuangsa mei katna hangin thuum thei ding uh hi.
Kikhopna buk kong panin a pua lamah paikhia kei un, na pai uh leh na si ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ nilh sathau note tungah om hi,” a ci hi. Moses’ gen bangin amaute gamta uh hi.
Topa in Aaron kiangah,

“Nang hita leh na tapate hita leh kikhopna bukah na pai uh ciangin leenggahzu hita leh kham theih zu hita leh dawn kei un, na dawn uh leh na si ding uh hi; tua in na suan na khakte tungah khang tawntungin ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
Note in a siangtho leh a mawkmawk, leh a nin leh a siang a khen ding na hi uh hi;
Topa in Moses’ tung tawnin amaute tunga a gensa thukhamte khempeuh note in Israel mite a hilh ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Moses in Aaron leh a om lai a tapate Eleazar leh Ithamar kiangah, “Topa tungah meihal biakna sung panin a val lai ahi an tawh biakna la un la, tua in a siangthopen ahih manin silngo sawhlohin biakna tau gei-ah ne un;
tua in Topa tungah meihal biaknate lak panin nang leh na tapate’ kaih ding ahih manin a siangtho mun khatah na ne ding uh hi; tua bang ding mahin kei tungah thu hong kipia hi.

Ahih hangin a kiveii a iik leh a kipia a pheite pen nang leh na tapate leh na tanute in a siangtho mun khatpeuhah na ne ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen Israel mite in thunuam-a a biakpiakna panun nang leh na tapate’ kaih dinga hong kipia ahi hi.

Topa in a thupiaksa bangin kipia a phei leh a kiveii a iikte ahih leh Topa’ mai-ah veii-a biakna-in veii dingin amaute in meihal biakna sathau tawh hong paipih ding uh a, tua in nang leh na tapate in a tawntungin na kaih ding uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Moses in khialhna hanga biakna keel tawh kisai lim takin kan a, en un, na kihal mawk hi. Aaron’ tapate a om lai Eleazar leh Ithamar tungah amah heh a,
“Note in mihonte’ adingin Topa mai-ah kilemna bawlin, amau’ mawhna a pua dingin note tungah hong kipiasa a siangtho sa pen khialhna hang a biakna hi napi, bang hangin biakinn ah ne lo na hi uh hiam?
En un, biakinn sungah a sisan kipaipih lo hi. Ka thupiaksa bangin note in biakinn sungah na nek ding uh a kilawm ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Aaron in Moses kiangah, “En in, tu ni-in amaute in Topa mai-ah amau’ khialhna hanga biakna leh amau’ meihal biakna pia khin zo uh hi; tua bang hi napi hih bang nate kei tungah hong tung veve hi. Khialhna hanga biakna tu ni-in a ne hi leng, Topa’ muhna ah san’ huai ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Moses in tua thu a zak ciangin a lungkim hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron’ tungah,
“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen un: Hihte in leitunga om ganhing khempeuh lak panin na nek theih ding uh a nungta ganhing ahi hi.
Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin eknel haite lak pan hita leh khecin kate lak pan hita leh, note in hihte na ne kei ding uh hi; Kalaoh in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
Sakikh ganhing in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
Bilpi in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
Vok pen a khecin a kat hangin eknel hai lo ahih ciangin note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
Note in tuate’ sa na ne kei ding uh a, a site zong na lawng kei ding uh hi; tuate in note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Tua sunga omte sung panin hihte khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi. Tuipi sung hita leh gun sung hita leh tui sungah a om phe leh lip a neite peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tuipi sung, gun sunga om phe leh lip a nei lo, tui sunga a hontat ganhingte leh tui sunga a nungta ganhingte pen note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Tuate pen note adingin a kihhuai hi ding hi; note in tuate’ sa na ne kei ding uh a, a sisate zong na kih ding uh ahi hi.
Tui sunga a omte sung panin phe leh lip a nei lo peuhmah note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Vasate lak panin note in na kih ding uh, a kine lo ding, a kihhuaite in: muvanlai, mupi, luimu,
mu-meika, musan nam khempeuh,
va-ak nam khempeuh,
kalaoh-vasa, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh,
keising tuimu, gun vakang,
gam vatawt, tui vatawt, musane,
gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh, huihtun leh bak ahi hi.
“Khe li tawh a pai, kha a nei ganhing khempeuhte note’ adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ahi zongin khe li tawh a pai kha a nei ganhingte khempeuh lak panin leitungah a tuan nadingun a khepek uh tawh kizom ngaltak tawn a neite na ne thei ding uh hi.
Tuate lak panin na nek theih dingte un: kauphe kitom nam khempeuh, kauphe zol nam khempeuh, khuangbai nam khempeuh, leh kauphe kisau nam khempeuh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin khe li nei-in kha a nei ganhing dangte khempeuh note’ adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Hite tawh note a nin na suak ding uh hi; a sisa a lawng peuhmahte nitak mateng a nin hi ding a,
a sisa themkhat a pua peuhmah in a puan sawpin, nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A khecin a ka ahih hangin eknel a hai lo ganhing peuhmah note adingin a nin ahi hi; tuate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Khe li tawh a pai ganhingte khempeuh lak panin amau’ khebom tawh a paite khempeuh note adingin a nin ahi hi; tuate a sisa a lawng peuhmahte nitak mateng a nin hi ding a,
a sisa a puapa in a puan sawpin, nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi; tuate note’ adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Leitunga a vak a pai thei ganhingte lak panin note’ adingin a ninte in: savokphual, zusa, innhikpi nam khempeuh,
tawlbawkpi, tang, tangteuh, sehnel gam tangteuh leh thankik ahi hi.
A hon tat ganhing khempeuhte’ lak panin hihte in note’ adingin a nin ahi hi; tuate a sih ciangin a lawng peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.

Tuate a sisa khatpeuh peuh a tukna nate, sing nazat, puan, savun ippi leh na khatpeuh peuh a, kizang beel khatpeuh peuh hita leh a nin hi ding hi; tua na pen tui sungah kidiah ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi; tua khit ciangin siang ding hi.
Tuate khatpeuh peuh leibeel khatpeuh peuh sungah a kiat leh, tua sunga om khempeuh a nin hi ding a, note in tua beel na sukham ding uh hi.
Tua lei beel sungah a om a kine thei ding an tungah tua bang tui a tuk leh a nin hi ding hi; tua bang beel sunga om dawn theih ding peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Tuate a sisa themkhat a tukna peuhmah a nin hi ding hi; meibung hita leh belpei hita leh kisuzan ding hi; tuate a nin ahi hi; note’ adingin a nin hi ding hi.
Ahi zongin tuinak leh tuibeem ahih leh siang ding hi; ahih hangin a sisate a lawng peuhmah nin ding hi.
Tuate a sisa themkhat a kivawh ding khaici tungah a tuk leh, tua khaici a siang hi;
ahih hangin khaici tui kidiah a, tuate a sisa themkhat tua khaici tungah a tuk leh note’ adingin tua khaici a nin ahi hi.
“Note’ nek theih ding ganhing khatpeuh peuh a sih leh, a sisa a lawngpa pen nitak mateng a nin hi ding a,
a sisa a ne pa in ama puante sawpin nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi; a sisa a puapa in zong ama puante sawpin nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
“Leitungah a hontat ganhing peuhmah a kihhuai ahi hi; tuate kine lo ding hi.
A awmtal peuhmah leh khe li-a a pai peuhmah, ahih kei leh khe tampi a nei, leitungah a pai a hontat ganhing khempeuh, note in na ne kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate in a kihhuai ahi hi.
A hontat ganhing khatpeuh peuh tawh nomau mah a kihhuai-in na kibawl tawm kei ding uh hi; tuate tawh nomau na kinin tawmsak kei ding uh hi; na kinit tawmsak uh leh a nin na suak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi; tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap un la, kei siangtho ka hih manin note zong siangtho un. Leitunga bokvak a, a hontat ganhing khatpeuh peuh tawh note na kinin tawmsak kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ Pasian a hi dingin Izipt gam panin note hong paikhiatpihpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi; tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

46-47 Hih in a nin leh a siang a nungta ganhing nek theih ding leh a nungta ganhing nek theih loh ding khen nadingin ganhing leh vasa, tui sunga a pai a nungta ganhing khempeuh leh leitungah a hontat ganhing khempeuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Nupi khat gai-in ta pasal a neih leh ni sagih sung tua nu nin ding hi; a nin neih huna mah bangin amah a nin ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in a naungek vun dawn ki-at ding hi.

Tua ciangin nupi in ama sisan sian’sak ding a kipsakna hangin ni sawmthum leh nithum sung om lai ding hi; amah in a kisian’suahna ni a cin’ mateng a siangtho na khatpeuh peuh lawng loin, biakinn sungah zong tum lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in ta numei a neih leh, ama nin neih huna mah bangin nipi kal nih sung a nin hi ding hi; ama sisan sian’sak ding a kipsakna hangin ni sawmguk leh ni guk sung om lai ding hi.

“Amah a kisian’ suahna hun a cin’ ciangin, tapa’ ading hita leh tanu’ ading hita leh, tua nu in kikhopna buk konga siampipa kiangah meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno khat, leh khialhna hanga biak nadingin kawl vakhuno khat ahi a, vakhu khat ahi zongin pia ding a,

siampipa in Topa mai-ah pia in, ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; tua ciangin ama si luan’na panin tua nu a siang hi ding hi. Hih in ta pasal hita leh ta numei hita leh a nei nu’ adingin ngeina ahi hi.

Tua nu in tuuno a piak zawh kei leh vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhu no nih ahi zongin paipih ding a, khat in meihal biak nading hi a, adang khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading ahi hi; siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding a, tua nu siang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,

“Mi khat in ama pumpi vun tungah a bawk ahi a, a meima ahi a, a mel tuampian ahi zongin a neih a, tua pen ama pumpi vun tungah phak natna a suah leh, tuapa pen siampi Aaron kiang ahi a, ama tapate siampi khatpeuh peuh kiangah ahi zongin kipaipih ding a,

siampipa in ama pumpi vun tunga natna mun vel ding hi; a natna munah a om a multe kaang-in ama vun sangin a natna thuk tumzaw-in a kimuh leh, tua in phak natna ahi hi; siampipa in a vel khit ciangin amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama pumpi vun sungah a natna mun kaang napi-in, a vun sangin a thuk lozaw bangin omin, tua sungah a multe kaang loin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cinapa khumcip ding hi;
siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel ding a, a natna noptuamin a natna in a vun sung lawh lo hi ci-in a muh leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung mah khumcip lai ding hi;

siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel kik dinga, a natna mun mual-in a vun sung a lawh kei leh, siang hi, ci-in siampipa in gen ding hi; tua pen a meima mawkmawk lel ahi hi; amah in a puante sawpin a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a sian’ nadingin siampipa kiangah a kilah khit ciangin a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa mai-ah kilak kik ding hi;
siampipa in vel ding a, a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa in amah in nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in phak natna ahi hi.
“Mi khat in meima a neih ciangin siampipa kiangah kipaipih ding hi;
siampipa in vel ding a, a vun sungah a bawk kaang omin tua in a multe kangsakin a bawk sungah ma thak a om leh,
tua in ama pumpi vun sungah a om luisa phak natna hi a, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; amah a nin ahih manin khumcip lo ding hi.
Siampipa’ muh theihna ciangah tua natna in a vun phukhamin tua natna in a veipa’ vun khempeuh a lutang panin a khe dongin a lawh khit leh,
siampipa in vel ding a, a natna in ama pumpi khempeuh a lawh khit leh siampipa in tua natna tawh kisai-in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi; a pumpi-in kaang khin hi, amah siang hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungah ma thak a kilat ciangin amah a nin hi ding hi,
Siampipa in a ma thak velin, amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a ma thak in phak natna ahih manin a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a ma thak pen kikhel kikin a kaang a suah leh, siampipa kiangah pai ding a,
siampipa in amah velin a natna pen a kaang a suah leh, siampipa in natna veipa a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi; amah a siang ahi hi.
“Mi khatpeuh’ pumpi vun sungah a damsa meimatum khat om a,
a meimatum munah a bawk kaang ahi a, a sankang mun ahi zongin a om leh, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi; ~
siampipa in vel ding a, tua pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a multe a kang a suah leh, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in phak natna hi a, meimatum sung tawnin hong phukhia ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua tunga a multe kaang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mual-in a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi;
tua in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in phak natna ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a kilawh kei leh meimatum pawn ahi hi; siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Tua ahih kei leh, pumpi in a vun tungah meikangma khat nei-in tua meikangma a thak mun pen a sankang ahi a, a kaang ahi zongin hong suah leh,

siampipa in vel ding hi; tua mun-a om a multe kang-in a vun sangin a natna a thuk zawk leh, tua in phak natna ahi hi; tua pen meikangma tawnin hong phukhia hi a, siampipa in amah in nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in phak natna ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua mun a multe kaang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mual-in a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi;
siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel ding hi; tua in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in phak natna ahi hi.

Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a vun sung lawh loin mual-in a om leh, tua in meikangma pan-a bawk hi a, siampipa in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in meikangma pawn ahi hi.
“Pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin a lutang tung ahih kei leh a kha-ah natna khatpeuh a neih ciangin,

siampipa in tua natna vel ding hi; tua natna pen a vun sangin thukzaw-in a kimuh a, a sunga a multe eng-in a mal a neu leh, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua in cithak ahi, lu-phak ahih kei leh kha-phak natna ahi hi.
Siampipa in cithak natna velin, a vun sangin thukzaw lo bangin kimu in tua sungah mul vom a om kei leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cithak natna tawh tuapa khumcip ding a,
a ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a natna vel ding hi; a cithak kilawh loin, a sungah mul eng om loin, a cithak pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a kimuh leh,
tua ciangin amah leh amah a mul kikiat dinga, ahih hangin a cithak san kiat lo ding hi; siampipa in adang ni sagih sung mah cithak natna tawh tuapa khum ding hi;

a ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a cithak vel ding a, a cithak in a vun sung lawh loin, a vun sangin a thukzaw loin a kimuh leh, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi; amah in ama puante sawp ding a, a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a kisian’sak khit ciangin a cithak in a vun sung a lawh leh,
siampipa in vel ding a, a cithak in a vun sung a lawh leh, siampipa in mul eng a zon’ ding kisam lo hi; amah a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin ama mai-ah, cithak noptuam zo hi, ci-in mu a, a sungah mul vom po-in, a cithak a dam leh, amah a siang ahi hi; siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin a pumpi vun tungah a mel tuampian a kang mun a neih leh,
siampipa in vel ding a, a pumpi vun tunga om a tuampian munte pen a kang milmial ahih leh, tua in vun a phukhia meima ahi hi; amah a siang hi.
“Mi khat a sam pulh a, a lu a tol hangin amah a siang ahi hi.
Mi khat a sam a taltang leh a paang panin a pulh leh, amah a tal kolh hi a, ahih hangin amah a siang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a lu tol tung hita leh a tal kolh tung hita leh, tua tungah a sankang natna a om leh, tua in a lu tol tung ahih kei leh a tal kolh tunga a suakkhia phak natna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amah vel ding a, a bawk natna pen a lu tol tung hita leh a tal kolh tung hita leh, tua tungah pumpi vun tunga phak om tawh kibangin a sankang ahih leh,
amah in miphak hi a, a nin ahi hi; siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in a gen kul hi; a lu tangah ama natna om ahi hi.
“Tua natna a nei miphakpa in puan keekte silhin a sam phiahsak ding a, amah in a muk humin, ‘Nin, nin,’ ci-in kiko ding hi.
Amah in a natna a neih lai teng a nin hi ding hi; amah a nin ahi hi; giahphual pua lam mun khatah amah guak teeng ding hi.
“Samul puan hita leh saiha dial puan hita leh, puan tungah phak natna a om ciang,
tua saiha dial puan, samul puante, a tung leh a pheite tung hita leh, savun leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh tungah a om ciangin,

tua natna in a hing meel-in ahi a, a san meel-in ahi zongin puan tungah a kilat ciang, puan a tung a phei tung hita leh savun leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh tungah a om ciangin tua in phak natna hi a, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in a natna vel ding a, tua natna a ban’na na pen ni sagih sung koihcip ding hi;

tua ciangin amah in a ni sagih ni-in a natna vel ding hi. A natna pen puan tungah kizelhin puan a tung a phei-ah hita leh, savun leh savun a kizatna na khatpeuh peuh tungah a om leh, tua natna in a lauhuai phak natna ahi hi; tua in a nin ahi hi.

Amah in a puan hal ding hi; tua natna pen puan a tung a phei-ah hita leh, samul puan saiha dial puan hita leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh tungah a om leh hal ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in a lauhuai phak natna ahi hi; tua pen mei sungah kihal ding hi.
“Siampipa in velin, a natna pen puan tung, a tung a phei-ah hita leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh tungah a kizelh kei leh,
tua ciangin siampipa in tua natna a ban’na na pen amaute in a sawp nading uh thupia ding a, amah in adang ni sagih sung mah tua na koihcip ding hi;

siampipa in tua natna a ban’na na pen a kisawp khit ciangin vel ding hi. Tua natna a ban’na mun a meel a kikhel kei leh, a natna a kizelh loh hangin tua in a nin ahi hi; tua natna pen a sung lamah ahi a, a pua lamah ahi zongin a ban’ leh mei sungah tua puan na hal ding hi.

“Ahih hangin siampipa in vel a, a kisawp khit ciangin a natna a mualh leh, amah in a puan tung pan hita leh a savun tung pan hita leh a puan a tung a phei tung pan hita leh natna a ban’na mun balkhia ding hi;
tua ciangin a puan tung hita leh puan a tung a phei tungah hita leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh tungah a kilat kik leh, tua in a kizelh ahi hi; natna a ban’na na pen mei tawh na hal ding hi.

Ahih hangin a puan hita leh puan a tung a phei hita leh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh peuh a kisawp khit ciangin tua natna a paikhiatna na pen, a nih veina kisawp kikin, a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih in samul puan hita leh saiha dial puan hita leh puan a tung hita leh a phei hita leh, savun tawh a kibawl na khempeuh tungah a om phak natna tawh kisai-in siang hiam nin hiam ci-in khen nading ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih in, amah a kisian’sak ni-in mi phakpa’ zuih ding ngeina hi ding hi. Siampipa kiangah amah kipaipih ding hi;
giahphual pua lamah siampipa pai khia-in vel ding hi. Tua ciangin a phak natna pen a phakpa tung pan a dam leh,
a kisiangsak ding mipa’ adingin a hing vasa siang nih leh taamtaak sing leh a ausan puan leh puknah a la dingin siampipa in amaute sawl ding hi;
amaute in tuiluang tungah leibeel khat sungah a vasa khat a gawh nading uh siampipa in thu pia ding hi.
Amah in a hing lai vasa pen taamtaak sing leh a ausan puan leh puknah tawh la khawmin, tuate leh a hing lai vasa pen tui luang tunga kithat vasa’ si sungah diah ding hi;
amah in phak natna panin a kisiangsak dingpa tungah sagih vei theh ding hi; tua ciangin amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding a, a hing vasa pen gam lakah khah ding hi.

A kisiangsak ding mipa in a puante sawpin, a mul khempeuh met khia-in, tui sungah amahmah kisilin, amah in a siang hi ding hi; tua khit ciangin amah giahphual ah hong ciah ding a, ahih hangin ama puanbuk pua lamah ni sagih sung om ding hi.

A ni sagih ni-in amah in a sam khempeuh met ding hi; a khamul leh a mitkhu mul, a mul khempeuh met khia ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in a puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi silin, amah a siang hi ding hi.

“A ni giat ni-in amah in a sitbang lo tuuno apa nih, leh a sitbang lo kum khat a pha tuuno anu khat, leh an tawh biakna ahi sathau tawh a kibawl annel seu sehsawm suah sehthum leh sathau biingta khat la ding hi.
Amah a siangsak siampipa in a kisiangsak ding mipa leh hih nate kikhopna buk kong-a Topa mai-ah koih ding hi.
Siampipa in tuuno apa khat la-in sathau biingta khat tawh mawhna hanga biakna-in pia-in veii-a biakna-in Topa mai-ah tuate veii ding hi;

amaute in siangtho mun sunga khialhna hanga biakna leh meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah amah in tuuno go ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna mah bangin siampipa’ aa ahi hi; tua in a siangthopen ahi hi.
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in amah in tua si pen a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bil teep, a taklam khutpi, leh a taklam khepi nuh ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in sathau biingta panin kimkhat la-in amahmah’ veilam khut sungah sungin,
a veilam khut sunga om sathau sungah a taklam khutme diahin, a khutme tawh a sathau kimkhatte Topa mai-ah sagih vei theh ding hi.
Ama khut sungah a om lai sathau kimkhatte pen siampipa in a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bil teep, a taklam khutpi, leh a taklam khepi nuhin, mawhna hanga biakna si tungah koih ding hi;
siampipa in a khut sunga sathau om lai teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ lu nilh ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in ama adingin Topa mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
Ama nitna panin a kisiangthosak ding mipa adingin kilemna bawl nadingin siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in meihal biakna go ding hi;
siampipa in meihal biakna leh an tawh biaknate biakna tau tungah pia ding hi. Tua bangin siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding a, amah a siang hi ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah zawngin tua zah a piak zawh kei leh, ama adinga kilemna bawl nadingin a kiveii ding mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuno apa khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel seu sehsawm suah sehkhat leh sathau biingta khat pia ding hi;
vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhu no nih ahi zongin, a piak zawh bangbang pia ding hi; khat in khialhna hanga biak nading hi a, a khat in meihal biak nading ahi hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in Topa mai, kikhopna buk kong, siampipa kiangah ama kisian’thosak nadingin tuate paipih ding hi;
siampipa in mawhna hanga tuuno, leh a sathau biingta khat la-in, siampipa in veii-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah tuate veii ding hi.
Amah in mawhna hanga biakna tuuno go ding hi; siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in, a kisiangthosak ding mipa, taklam bil teep, a taklam khutpi, leh a veilam khepi nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in amahmah’ veilam khut sungah a sathau kimkhat sung ding hi;
a veilam khut sunga om sathau tawmkhat a taklam khutme tawh Topa mai-ah sagih vei theh ding hi;
siampipa in ama khut sunga a om sathau tawmkhat a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bil teep, taklam khutpi, leh a taklam khepite mawhna hanga biakna si a kikoihna munah va nuh ding hi;
siampipa in a khut sunga a om lai sathau teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ ading Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawl nadingin a lu nilhsak ding hi.
Amah in vakhu hita leh kawl vakhu no hita leh, a piak zawh bangbang pia-in,
khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading, a khat pen meihal biak nadingin an-a biakna tawh piakhawm ding hi; siampipa in a kisiangthosakpa adingin Topa mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
Hih in phak natna a vei, a kisian’ thosak nadingin biakna a pia zo lopa’ adingin ngeina ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Note adinga kong piak Kanaan gamah na om ciangun note’ leitang-a inn khat sungah phak natna kong tun’sak ciangin,
inn neipa pai-in siampipa kiangah, ‘Ka inn sungah natna nam khat a om ding tawh kibang,’ ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin, inn sunga om na khempeuh a nin hi, a kicih khak loh nadingin a natna vel dingin siampipa a pai ma-in amaute in tua inn a na hawmsak nading uh thu pia ding hi; tua khit ciangin inn vel dingin siampipa pai ding hi.
Amah in a natna vel ding hi; a natna pen tua inn kawm tungah omin a hing meel ahih kei leh a san meel na pua-in tua natna kawm maitang sangin a thuk zawk tuak leh,
inn sung panin inn kongah siampipa paikhia ding a, ni sagih sung inn khakcip ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in siampipa hong pai kikin, en ding hi; tua inn kawm tungah a natna a kizelh leh,
natna a ban’na suang lakhia-in khuapi pua lam a nin mun khatah a paih nadingun siampipa in thu pia ding hi;
amah in a inn sung kimkot kiat sakin, amaute in a kiat khiat a kizutna themte khuapi pua lam a nin mun khatah bua ding uh hi;
tua ciangin amaute in suang dang la-in tua suangte’ omna munah koihin, amah in zutna dang la-in inn zut ding hi.
“Amah in a suangte lakhia-in a inn kiatin a zut khit ciangin tua inn sungah a natna hong suah kik leh,
siampipa pai-in en ding hi; inn sungah a natna a kizelh leh, tua in inn sunga om a lauhuai phak natna ahi hi; tua in a nin ahi hi.
Amah in tua inn, a suang a sing leh inn a kizutnate khempeuh phel ding hi; amah in khuapi pua lam a nin mun khatah tuate puakhia ding hi.
Tua tham loin tua inn a kikhakcip sung teng a sungah a lut mipa a nitak dong a nin hi ding hi;
tua inn sunga a lum mipa in ama puante sawp ding hi; tua inn sunga an ne mipa in ama puante sawp ding hi.
“Ahih hangin siampipa hong pai-in a vel a, a inn a kizut khit ciangin inn sungah natna a kizelh kei leh, tua ciangin siampipa in a natna a dam ahih manin inn siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Tua inn sian’ thosak nadingin amah in vasa neu nih, taamtaak sing leh a ausan khau leh puknah tawh la khawmin,
tui luang tungah leibeel sungah a vasa khat go ding a,
taamtaak sing leh puknah leh a ausan khau pen a vasa hing tawh la khawmin, tuate pen a kigo vasa’ si leh tui luang sungah diahin, tua inn sagih vei theh ding hi.
Tua bangin amah in vasa’ si tawh, tui luang tawh, a hing vasa tawh, taamtaak sing leh puknah leh a ausan puan tawh a inn siangsak ding hi;
amah in vasa hing pen khuapi pua lam gam lakah khahkhia ding hi; tua bangin amah in tua inn adingin kilemna bawlsak ding a, tua inn a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih in phak natna khatpeuh peuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi: cithak tawh kisai,
puan tung hita leh inn sung hita leh a om phak natna tawh kisai,
a bawk hita leh meima hita leh a tuampian mun tawh kisai-in,
bang hunin nin a, bang hunin siang hiam ci-a lah nading ahi hi. Hih in phak natna tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Pasal khatpeuh a na tui a paikhiat ciangin tua a paikhia a na tui pen a nin ahi hi.
Amah a ninsak a na paikhia tawh kisai-in ngeina hih bang ahi hi: a na tui a paipai a, a khawl zongin, ama sungah nitna mah hi veve hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa’ lupna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi; ama tutna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa’ tutnasa na khatpeuh peuh tungah a tu mi peuhmah in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa’ pumpi a lawng mi peuhmah in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa in a siang mipa tungah cil a siat leh, tuapa in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa a tutna tutphat khatpeuh peuh in a nin hi ding hi.
Ama nuai-ah a om na khatpeuh peuh a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi; tua bang na a tawm mipa in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa in tui sungah a khut sil lopi-in a lawn’ mi peuhpeuh in ama puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A na tui a paikhia mipa in a lawn’ lei tawh kibawl um-le-beelte kisukham ding hi; sing tawh kibawl kuang-le-keute ahih leh tui sungah kisawp ding hi.

“A na tui a paikhia mipa a na tui paikhiatna hangin a kisian’sak ciangin, ama kisian’sak nadingin amah in ni sagih dong sim to-in a puante sawp ding hi; amah in tui luang sungah a pumpi silin, a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhu no nih la-in, Topa’ mai kikhopna buk kongah pai-in, siampipa tungah tuate pia ding hi;
siampipa in tuate, khat khialhna hanga biak nading leh adang khat meihal biak nadingin pia ding hi; a na tui a paikhia mipa adingin siampipa in Topa mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in a na tui a teh leh, amah in a pumpi khempeuh tui sungah sil ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A tungah a na tui a tukna puan leh savun peuhmah tui tawh kisawp ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal khat in numei khat tawh a lupkhawm khit ciangin, amaute gel tui sungah kisil ding uh a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding uh hi.
“Numei khat in nin a neih ciangin, ni sagih sung a ninin om ding a, a mah a lawng mi peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Amah a nit hun sunga a lupna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi; amah a tutna peuhpeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puan sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ama tutna a lawng peuhmah in ama puante sawpin, tui sungah amahmah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi;
ama tutna ahi lupna hita leh na khatpeuh peuh hita leh, mi khat in a lawn’ ciangin a nitak mateng amah a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal khatpeuh mah tua nu tawh lumin, tua nu’ nitna ama tungah a om leh, ni sagih sung tuapa a nin hi ding hi; tuapa’ lupna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi.

“Numei khat in ama nin hun hilo napi-in ni tampi sung a si suak ahi a, ama nit hun sung khengin nin nei-in ahi zongin a om leh, a nin neih ni sung khempeuh amah a nin-in om ding hi; ama nit hun sung mah bangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
Ama nin neih hun sung tenga a lupna khempeuh a nit sunga ama zat lupna tawh kibang ding hi; amah in a nin ahih mah bangin a tutna khempeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Hih nate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding a, a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisil ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua nu a nin a kisian’sak leh, amah in ni sagih dong sim to-in tua khit ciangin amah a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in tua nu in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhu no nih la-in, kikhopna buk kong, siampipa kiangah tuate paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna dingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin adang khat pia ding hi; siampipa in a siang lo ama nin hangin Topa mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
“Amau’ laizanga om ka biakbuk nitsakna hangin amau’ nitna sungah amaute si kha ding uh ahih ciangin, tua bangin note in Israel mite amau’ nitna panin khenin na kem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih in a na tui a paikhia mipa ahih kei leh a na tui tehin, tua tawh mi nin a suakpa adingin ngeina ahi hi;
nin a neinu ading zong ahi hi; tua-in, pasal hita leh numei hita leh a na tui paikhia mi, leh a nin numei tawh a lum mipa’ ading ngeina ahi hi.
Aaron’ tapa nihte in Topa mai-ah ngeina lopi-in mei tawh va nai uh a, a sih khit uh ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah thu gen hi;

Topa in Moses kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sung lam a siangtho munah hong pai ngitnget nawn loh nadingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in; hong pai leh amah si ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilang ding hi.
Ahih hangin siangtho munah hih bangin Aaron hong pai ding hi: khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtal no khat leh meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi.

Amah in a siangtho saihadial puantungsilh silhin, a pum tungah saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi; hihte in a siangtho puante ahi uh hi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil ding a, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
Amah in Israel mihonte tung panin khialhna hanga biak nadingin keeltal nih leh meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat la ding hi.
“Aaron in amahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah leh innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in keeltal nih la-in, Topa’ mai kikhopna buk kongah tuate koih ding hi;
Aaron in tua keel nihte tungah ai sanin, khat pen Topa’ ading, adang khat pen Azazel ading ahi hi.
Aaron in Topa’ adingin ai a pha keel paipihin, khialhna hanga biakna-in pia ding hi;
ahih hangin Azazel adingin ai a pha keel pen gam lakah Azazel kiangah a kipuak theih nadingin kilemna bawl nading a hing-in Topa’ mai-ah kipaipih ding hi.
“Aaron in amahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah leh a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl ding hi; amah in amahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal go ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakna tau panin mei-am a dim paknamtui beel khat leh a kisunen paknamtui khut nih dim khat la ding hi; amah in dalna puan sungah paipihin
teci pan’na tungah a om hehpihna tokhom pen paknamtui khu in a tuam theih nading Topa’ mai-ah a om mei tungah a paknamtui koih ding hi, tua hi kei leh amah si ding hi;
amah in bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, a khutme tawh hehpihna tokhom amai lam tungah thehin, hehpihna tokhom mai-ah a khutme tawh a si sagih vei theh ding hi.

“Tua ciangin amah in mite ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel go-in, dalna puan sungah a si paipih ding a, bawngtal si a theh mah bangin a si thehin, hehpihna tokhom tung leh hehpihna tokhom mai-ah theh ding hi;

amah in tua bangin Israel mite’ nitna hang, leh amau’ thu palsatnate hang amau’ khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho mun adingin kilemna bawl ding hi; amah in amau’ nitna sungah amau tawh a omkhawm kikhopna buk adingin tua mah banga bawl ding hi.

Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama ading leh a innkuanpihte ading leh Israel mi honte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl khit hong paikhiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah om lo ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mai-ah a om biakna tau-ah amah va pai-in, biakna tau sian’ suahna bawl ding a, bawngtal’ si tawmkhat leh keel’ si la-in, biakna tau kimkot a, a kite nuh ding hi.
Amah in a khutme tawh a si tawmkhat biakna tau tungah sagih vei thehin, siangsakin, Israel mite’ nit sakna panin siangtho sak ding hi.
“Amah in siangtho mun, leh kikhopna buk leh biakna tau sian’ suahna a bawl khit ciangin, amah in keel hing pen paipih ding hi;

Aaron in keel hing’ lu tungah a khut tegel nga-in, Israel mite’ mawhna, amau’ thupalsatna, amau’ khialhnate khempeuh, keel tungah pulak ding hi; amah in keellu tungah tuate suan-in, a paikhiatpih dingin a kithawisa mipa khut tawh gam lakah sawlkhia ding hi.
Keel in amau mawhnate khempeuh pua-in gam daihna-ah pai ding hi; amah in gam lakah a keel khah ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna bukah Aaron hong pai-in, siangtho munah a tum huna a silh saihadial puante suahin, tua lai-ah a puante nusia ding hi;
amah in a siangtho mun khatah a pumpi tui sungah silin, a puante silh ding a, hong paikhia-in, ama meihal biakna leh mite’ meihal biakna pia-in, ama ading leh mite’ adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna sathau hal ding hi.
Azazel’ kiangah keel a pai sakpa in a puante sawpin a pumpi tui sungah silin, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah amah hong ciah thei ding hi.

Siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin hong kipaipih si a kilakna khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal leh khialhna hanga biakna keel pen giahphual pua lamah kipuakhia ding hi; amau vun leh a sa leh a ekte mei tawh kihal ding hi.
Tuate a halpa in ama puante sawpin tui sungah a pumpi silin, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.

“Hih in, a kha sagihna, tua kha a ni sawm ni-in note’ adingin a tawntungin thukham hi ding a, tual sung mi hita leh note lakah a hong peem khual mi hita leh, nomau mah kigawt tawmin, na na sem kei ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni-in note sian’sak nadingin note’ ading kilemna kibawl ding hi; na khialhna khempeuh panun Topa’ mai-ah na siang ding uh hi.
Tua in note’ adingin a thupi tawlngakna sabbath hi a, nomau mah na kigawt ding uh hi; tua in a tawntunga thukham ahi hi.
A pa’ tanga siampi dingin sathau kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi;
amah in biakinn sian’ suahna bawlin, kikhopna buk leh biakna tau sian’ suah ding a, siampite leh mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl ding hi.

Hih in, Israel mite’ adingin amau’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin kum khatin khat vei kilemna a kibawlsak theih nadingin note’ adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses a gamta hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron leh ama tapate leh Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in. Hih in Topa’ thupiaksa na ahi hi.
Israel mi khatpeuh in bawngtal ahi a, tuuno ahi a, keel ahi zongin giahphual ah go a, tua ahi kei leh giahphual pua-ah a go ahi zongin,
Topa’ biakbuk mai Topa tungah letsongin piak dingin kikhopna buk kongah a paipih kei leh, tua mipa thu palsat hi ding hi; amah in sisan luangsak hi; ama mite lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi.

Hih in, gam lakah Israel mite in a gawh uh amau’ biakpiaknate hong paipih theih nading, kikhopna buk kongkhak a, siampipa kiang, Topa’ tungah amaute in tuate hong paipih theih nading, leh thunuam-a biakpiakna in Topa a hong gawh theih nading deihna ahi hi;
siampipa in kikhopna buk kong-a Topa’ biakna tau tungah a si thehin, Topa’ tungah a gim namtui dingin a thau hal ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keel milimte adingin amau’ biakpiaknate go nawn lo ding uh hi. Hih in amau’ khang tawntungin amaute tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
“Nangmah in amaute tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: Israel mite sung pan hita leh, amaute lakah a peem khual mite sung panin meihal biakna ahi a biakpiakna ahi zongin a pia mipa in,
Topa tungah piak dingin kikhopna buk kongah a paipih kei leh, ama mipihte kiang panin tua mipa kihawlkhia ding hi.

“Israel mite sung pan hita leh, amau’ lakah a peem mi khualte sung pan hita leh mi khat in sisan khatpeuh peuh a nek leh, sisan a ne mipa ka maisiat ding a, ama mite lak panin amah ka khen khia ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a pumpi nuntakna in sisan sungah a om hi; note ading kilemna bawl nadingin note adingin biakna tau tungah tua sisan ka pia zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh sisan in nuntakna ahih manin kilemna a piangsak na ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khin hi: Note lakah kuamah in sisan ne lo ding hi; note lakah hong peem khualmi khatpeuh in zong sisan ne lo ding hi.

Israel mite khatpeuh hita leh, amaute lakah a peem khualmi khatpeuh hita leh in zong, sa betna-ah, a kine thei ding gamsa khatpeuh hita leh vasa hita leh a manpa in a sisan bua khia-in leivui tawh vuk ding hi.

“Bang hang hiam cih leh ganhingte khempeuh’ nuntakna in a sisan ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khin zo hi: Ganhing khatpeuh peuh’ sisan na ne kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ganhing khempeuh nuntakna in a sisan ahi hi; sisan a ne mi peuhmah a mipihte kiang panin kihawlkhia ding hi.

A mawk sih hita leh gamsate in a balgawp hita leh a ne mi peuhmah, tual sung mi hita leh, peemta hita leh, amah in a puante sawpin, amahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi; tua ciangin amah siang ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tuate sawp loin ahi zongin kisil loin ahi zongin a om leh amah in a ama mawhna pua ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

Note na ten’na uh Izipt gamah amaute a gamtat bangin note na gamta kei ding uh a, note kong paipihna Kanaan gamah amaute a gamtat bangin zong note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Note in amau’ tatziate na zui kei ding uh hi.
Note in keima biakna ngeina kipte semin ka thukhamte lenin tuate na zui ding uh hi. Keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte leh ka biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh hi; tuate a zui mi-in nungta ding hi. Keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uh hi. Keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Na nu mawhpihna tawh na pa tungah maizumna na tun’ kei ding hi; amah in na nu ahi hi, amah na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ zi na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua in na pa’ maizum nading ahi hi.
Nangmah in na sanggamnu, na pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh na nu’ tanu, inn-a suak hita leh gam-a suak hita leh na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na tapa’ tanu ahih kei leh na tanu’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ maizumna in nangma maizumna mah ahi hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ zi tanu, na pa’ tanu in na sanggam nu ahih ciangin na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ sanggamnu na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu in na pa tawh a kinai beh numei ahi hi.
Nangmah in na nu’ sanggamnu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in na nu tawh a kinai beh numei ahi hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ sanggampa tungah mindaina na tun’ kei ding hi; tua in ama zi na naih kei ding hi cih nopna hi; tua nu in nangma innlak nu ahi hi.
Nangmah in na monu na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu in na tapa’ zi ahi hi; na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na sanggampa’ zi na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua in na sanggampa’ maizum nading ahi hi.

Nangmah in na luppih nupi khat’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding a, nangmah in nupi’ tapa’ tanu hita leh tua nupi tanu’ tanu hita leh, luppih dingin na la kei ding hi; amaute in nangmah tawh a kinai beh numei ahi uh hi; tua in gitlohna ahi hi.
Nangmah in a sanggamnu hing suan dingin numei khat zi-in na la kei ding hi; a sanggamnu hing lai pi-in amah na luppih kei ding hi.
“Nangmah in numei khat nin nei-a a nit hun sungin luppih dingin na naih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na vengpa’ zi tawh na lumkhawm kei ding a, tua nu tawh na kininsak kei ding hi.
Nangmah in Molek tungah mei halna tawh biakpiak nadingin na tate khatpeuh peuh napia kei ding a, tua bangin Pasian’ min na daisak kei ding hi; keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Nangmah in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal khat tawh na lumkhawm kei ding hi; tua in a kihhuai ahi hi.
Nangmah in ganhing khatpeuh tawh mawhin tua tawh na kininsak kei ding a, numei khatpeuh in zong ganhing khatpeuh tawh a mawh dingin kipia lo ding hi; tua in ngeina hilo hi.
“Hih nate khatpeuh tawh note kininsak kei un: bang hang hiam cih leh note’ mai-a ka paihkhiat ding minamte in hihte khempeuh tawh amau kininsak uh hi;
leitang a nin suak ahih ciangin keimah in a leitang mawhna daan pia-in, leitang in ama tunga teeng mite luakhia hi.
Ahih hangin, tual sung mi hita leh note lakah hong peem khualmi hita leh note in keima thukhamte leh keima biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh a, hih a kihhuai nate khat beek na hih kei ding uh hi.
(bang hang hiam cih leh note’ ma-a a om gam mite in hih kihhuainate khempeuh hih uh a, tua ahih manin leitang a nin suak hi);
tua bang hi kei leh leitang in note ma-a a om minamte a luakkhiat bangin note in amah na nitsak uh ciangin note hong luakhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih kihhuainate khatpeuh a hih ding peuhmah, tua bang mite pen amau’ mite lak panin kihawlkhia ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note ma-a a kizang hih a kihhuai ngeinate khatpeuh peuh na gamtat ngei loh nading uh leh tuate tawh nomau na kinitsak ngei loh nadingun kong thuhilh zui un: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mi honte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa note’ Pasian keimah in ka siangtho hi.
Note a kuamah peuh in na nu leh na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka sabbath-te na tang ding uh hi; keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Milimte lamah kihei kei un la, note in a kisung tawm pasiante nomau adingin bawl kei un: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in Topa tungah thunuam-a biak piakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan’ theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.
Tua pen na piak ni mah uh ahih kei leh a zing ciangin kine ding hi; a ni thum ni ciang dong a om lai peuhmah mei tawh kihal ding hi.
A ni thum ni-in a kinek peuhmah leh, tua in a kihhuai ahi hi; kisang lo ding hi;
tua a ne mi peuhmah in ama mawhna pua ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa’ na a siangtho ninsak hi; tua mipa ama mite sung panin kihawlkhia ding hi.
“Na leitang tung panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lo uh a nawl dongin an na la kei ding uh a, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sang zong na khawm kei ding uh hi.

Note in na leenggui lo uh hawk mai loin, a kia leenggahte zong na leenggui lo panun na tawm kei ding uh hi; note in mi zawngte leh peemtate adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note na guta kei ding uh hi; khat leh khat na kikhem kei ding uh a, khat leh khat tungah thuzuau na kigen kei ding uh hi.
Note in a man lopi-in keima min tawh na kiciam kei ding uh a, tua bangin na Pasian uh’ min na daisak kei ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in na vengte uh na nengniam kei ding uh a, a na na sut kei ding uh hi. A kicial nasempa’ thaman pen a zingsang dong zan tawntung na kemcip kei ding uh hi.
Note in bil ngongte phuisam loin mittawte mai-ah puk theih nading na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zaktak ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in thukhenna ah thuman lo na hih kei ding uh hi; note in mizawngte langgen loin, a liante thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte thu na khen ding uh hi.
Note in na mihingte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na vengpa uh a sih nadingin na langpang kei ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh mudah loin, na vengte uh tawh na thu kituah lohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uh hi.
Note in nomau’ mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na vengte na it ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.

“Note in ka thukhamte na zui ding uh hi. Note in na ganhingte uh a namdang tawh ta na neisak kei ding uh hi; note in na lo uhah khaici nam nih na pawi kei ding uh hi; khau nam nih a kigan puan zong note tungah kibaang lo ding hi.

“Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nai loin amah suahtakna a kipia nai lo nu, pasal khat in a lup khoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu suakta lo hi;
ahih hangin tua pa in amahmah adingin mawhna hanga biak nadingin tuutal khat, kikhopna buk kong, Topa kiangah hong paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in tuapa a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh Topa mai-ah ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; amah a gamtatnasa a khialhna kimaisak ding hi.
“Note tua gamah tungin an dingin kung nam khempeuh na suan uh ciangin, note in amau’ gahte a kikham-in na seh ding uh hi; note adingin kum thum sung tua gah a kikham hi ding a, kine lo ding hi.
A kum lina ciangin amau’ gah khempeuh siangtho-in, Topa tungah phatna biakna hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kum ngana ciangin tuate in note adingin hong gah semsem nadingin tuate gah na ne thei ding uh hi: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in sa khatpeuh peuh a sunga sisan tawh na ne khawm kei ding uh hi. Note in mai lam thu genkholhna ahih kei leh ai saanna na sem kei ding uh hi.
Note in na baa samte uh met loin na khamul mongte uh zong na tan kei ding uh hi.
Note in a site’ hangin na ci tung uh liamsak loin note tungah ciamtehna khatpeuh peuh na sun kei ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Na tanu uh biakinn sunga paktat dinga piakna tawh siasak kei un; tua bang hi leh pasian dangte biakna sungah na tung ding uh a, gam sung khempeuh, mawhna tawh a kidim suak kha ding hi.
Note in ka sabbath-te tangin ka biakinn na zahtak ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Vankahte leh ai saante lamah kihei kei un; amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in sam kangte mai-ah na kun ding uh a, puteekpa’ maitang zahtak-in note in na Pasian uh na kihta ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, note in ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.

Note lakah a hong peem khual mite tual sung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amah na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note in Izipt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in thukhenna, asau tehna, agik tehna, atam tehnate ah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.
Note in tawi khaina maan, tawisuang maan, seu maan, bung maan, na nei ding uh hi: keimah in Izipt gam panin a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Note in ka thukhamte khempeuh leh ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in tuate na kem ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khatpeuh peuh hita leh Israel sunga a peem khual mite hita leh, a tate khatpeuh peuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat ding hi; gam sung mite in suang tawh amah deenglum ding uh hi.
Keimah mah in tua mipa ka maisiat ding a, ama mite lak panin ka hawlkhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a tate Molek tungah pia-in, ka biakinn ninsakin, ka min siangtho daisak hi.
Amah in Molek tungah a tate khat a piak ciangin gam sung mite in tuapa kimuhmawh bawlin amah a thah kei uh leh,
keimah in tua mipa leh ama innkuanpihte maisiatin, amah leh Molek biakna ah amah a zuite khempeuh amau’ mite lak panin ka hawlkhia ding hi.
“Mi khat vankahna leh ai saanna lamah kihei-in tuate thu a dot leh, keimah in tua mipa ka maisiat ding a, ama mite lak panin amah ka hawlkhia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap un la, siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Ka thukhamte zui un la, tuate sem un; note hong siangthosak Topa in keimah ka hi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi; amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna ah amahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
“Pasal khat in ama vengpa’ zi tawh a mawh leh, tua a khialpa leh a khialnu kithat khawm ding hi.
A pa’ zi tawh a lumkhawm mipa in a pa a mindaisak suak hi; amau tegel kithat ding hi, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat a monu tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kithat ding hi; amaute si kinai lua mi tawh khialhna bawl uh hi; amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahi hi; amaute kithat ding hi, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in zi la-in a zi’ nu tawh zong a lak thuah leh, tua in gitlohna ahi hi; note lakah gitlohna a om loh nadingin tuapa leh a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi.
Pasal khat in ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh, amah kithat ding hi; note in a ganhing na that ding uh hi.
Numei khat in ganhing khat naih-in tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei leh a ganhing na that ding uh hi; amaute kithat ding hi, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.

“Pasal khat in ama sanggamnu, a pa’ tanu ahih kei leh a nu’ tanu la-in, tua nu tawh mawhin, tua nu in tuapa tawh a mawh leh, tua in a zumhuai hi a, amau’ mipihte’ omna panin amaute kihawlkhia ding hi; tuapa in ama sanggamnu tawh mawh khin hi, tuapa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
Pasal khat in nin nei numei khat tawh lumkhawmin, tua nu tawh a mawh leh, amau tegel in sian’tho nading ngeina palsat uh ahih manin, amau’ mipihte lak panin kihawlkhia ding hi.
Note in na nu’ sanggamnu ahih kei leh na pa’ sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in a nai behte tawh mawhna ahi hi; amaute in amau’ mawhna pua ding hi.
Pasal khat in a pa’ sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in a pa’ sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi; amaute in amau khialhna thuak ding uh hi; amaute ta nei loin si ding uh hi.
Pasal khat in a sanggampa’ zi a lak leh, tua in nitna ahi hi; amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi; amaute in ta nei lo ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukham khempeuh leh ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in, tuate na sem ding uh hi; tua in note na ten’ nading uh kong paipih nading leitang in note hong luakkhiat loh nading ahi hi.
Note’ mai-ah keimah in ka paihkhiat ding minamte’ ngeinate na zui kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in hih nate khempeuh gamta uh ahih ciangin amaute ka kih hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in note tungah, ‘Note in amau leitang na luah ding uh hi; bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitang, na neih dingun note’ tungah kong pia ding hi,’ kong ci khin zo hi. Keimah in mite kiang panin note a hong khenkhia Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

Tua ciangin note in a siang ganhing leh a nin ganhing, a nin vasa leh a siang khentelna na bawl ding uh hi; note in nin hi ci-in na seh dingun keimah in ka tuam koihsa ahi ganhing hita leh vasa hita leh leitunga a pai thei khatpeuh peuh tawh hita leh note a kihhuai-in na kibawl kei ding uh hi.
Note in keima adingin na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ahi keimah in ka siangtho a, note in keima’ aa na hih theih nadingun mite kiang panin note kong tuamkoih zo hi.
“Pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan mi kithat ding hi; suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi; amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron’ tapa siampite tungah thu gen in la, amaute lak panin kuamah in ama beh nai pen ahi, a nu, a pa, a tapa, a tanu, a sanggampa,

ahih kei leh nungak ahi a sanggamnu (tua nu in pasal nei nai lo ahih manin amah tawh a kinai ahi hi; tua nu’ hangin amah kininsak thei ding hi) longal ama mite lakah misite’ hangin kininsak lo ding hi.
Amah in pasal neisa numei khatpeuh hangin ama mite lakah va kininsakin, tua bangin kidaisak lo ding hi.
Amaute in a lu uh mettol loin, amau’ khamul nawlhui zong kiat loin, a ci tung uh liamsak lo ding uh hi.

Amaute in amau’ Pasian adingin siangtho ding uh a, amau’ Pasian min daisak lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ Pasian anlum ahi, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna pia uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute siangtho ding uh hi.
Amaute in numei paktat ahih kei leh a kininsaksa numei ten’pih lo ding uh hi; a pasal in a maksa numei zong ten’pih lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in ama Pasian adingin siangtho hi.
Amah in note’ Pasian’ anlum pia ahih manin note in amah na ap ding uh hi; amah in note’ adingin siangtho ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ahi keimah, note hong siangtho sakpa, ka siangtho hi.
Siampi khatpeuh peuh’ tanu in paktatna tawh amah leh amah a kidaisak leh, ama pa a daisak ahi hi; tua nu, mei tawh kihal lum ding hi.
“Ama sanggamte lakah a lianpen, a lu tungah nilh sathau a kisun’napa leh a puante silh dingin a ki-ap khin siampipa in a samte phiahsak loin, a puante zong balkek lo ding hi;
amah in a nu leh a pa luang nangawn ahi zongin si luang khatpeuh peuh kiangah pai loin, amahmah zong kininsak lo ding hi;
biakinn panin zong pai khia loin, ama Pasian’ biakinn zong daisak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama Pasian’ aa ahi ki-apna nilh sathau in ama tungah om hi; keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Amah in a zi dingin nungak la ding hi.
Meigong numei, a kimasa numei, a kininsaksa numei, numei paktat, amah in hih bangte ten’pih lo ding hi; ahih hangin amah in ama mite lak panin nungak khat zi-in la ding hi;
tua in ama mite lakah a tate a daisak loh nading ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a siangthosakpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi, ci in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses tungah,
“Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in: Na suan leh khakte sung panin a khang a khangin poina a nei mi in ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin hong neh thei lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh poina a nei, mittaw, khelbai, mai hem leh khut-leh-khe sau lua,
khut hoih lo, khe hoih lo,
elkul leh mi cingtak lo, mit hoih lo leh cithak a vei, meima nei leh ciltang kitam mi in hong naih lo ding hi;

siampi Aaron’ suan leh khakte sung panin poina a nei mi khatpeuh in Topa ading meihal biakna a pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi; amah in poina nei ahih manin, ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi.
Amah in ama Pasian’ anlum, a siangtho pen leh a siangtho nate ne thei ding hi;

ahih hangin amah in poina nei ahih manin, ka biakinnte a daisak loh nadingin dalna puan gei ahi a biakna tau nai-ah ahi zongin hong pai lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a siangthosakpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron leh a tapate leh Israel mite khempeuh tungah a gen hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron leh a tapate in keima min siangtho a daisak loh nadingun amaute in keima tungah a hong ap uh ahi, Israel mite’ na a siangthote panin a kikep nadingun gen in; keimah in Topa ka hi hi.

Amaute kiangah, ‘Na suan leh khakte uh sung panin a khang a khangin khatpeuh in a nit lai takin Israel mite in Topa tungah a ap a siangtho nate a naih leh, keima omna panin tuapa kihawlkhia ding hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.

Aaron’ gui sung panin meima leh a na tui a paikhia mi peuhmah in amah a sian’tho mateng a siangtho nate ne thei lo ding hi. Misi lawn’na hita leh a na tui a tehpa lawn’na hita leh a nin na khatpeuh peuh a lawngpa,
amah a nit theih nadingin a bokvak ganhing khat hita leh nitna a ngah theih nading mi khat hita leh a lawngpa, ama nitna in bangbang hita leh—
tua bang na a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding a, amah in tui sungah a pumpi a sil kei leh a siangtho nate ne lo ding hi.
Ni a tum ciangin amah siang ding hi: tua khit ciangin amah in a siangtho nate ne thei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangte pen ama nek ding mah ahi hi.
A mawk sihte hita leh gamsate in a balgawpte hita leh amah in ne-in tua tawh amah kininsak lo ding hi`: keimah in Topa ka hi hi,’ ci in.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ka thuhilhna zui ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh amaute in tua thu a daisak uh ciangin khialhna thuakin sihpih ding uh hi: amaute a siangthosakpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi.
“A pua lam mi in a siangtho na ne lo ding hi. Siampipa’ innah a om peemta ahi a kicial nasemte ahi zongin a siangtho na ne lo ding hi;
ahih hangin siampi khat in ama adingin sum tawh sila khat a lei leh, tua a sila in ne thei ding hi; ama inn sunga a suak mite in ama an ne thei ding uh hi.
Siampipa’ tanu khat in a pualam mi khat tawh a kiten’ leh tua nu in a siangtho biakna nate ne thei lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin siampipa’ tanu pen meigong ahi a, a kima ahi zongin, ta nei loin, a nungak lai mah bangin a pa’ innah a ciahkik leh, tua nu in a pa’ an ne thei ding hi; ahi zongin a pualam mi kuamah in tua an ne thei lo ding hi.
Mi khat in theih lohna hangin a siangtho na khat a nek leh, tua a na man zah sehnga suah sehkhat behlapin, siampipa tungah a siangtho na pia ding hi.
Israel mite in Topa’ tungah a piak ahi, amaute’ na siangthote pen siampite in ninsak lo ding uh a,
tua bangin amau’ na a siangthote nekna tawh mawhna leh khialhna amaute pua sak lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in amaute a siangthosak Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Aaron leh a tapate leh Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite sung panin ahi zongin Israel sungah a peem mite lak pan ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in biakna a piak ciangin, thuciamna a tun’sakna hita leh meihal biakna-in Topa tungah a kipia ut thu-a biakna hita leh,
hong kisan’ theih nadingin bawngtal hita leh tuu hita leh keel hita leh, a sitbang lo apa khat na pia ding uh hi.
Note in a sitbang khatpeuh peuh na pia kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hong kisang zo lo ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh in bawnghon panin ahi zongin a tuu leh keel hon panin ahi zongin thuciamna tun’sak nading hita leh ut thu-a biakna-in hita leh Topa tungah thunuam-a biakna a piak ciangin, a kisan’ theih nadingin a ganhing a cidam hi ding hi; ama tungah sitban’na om lo ding hi.

Ganhing a mittaw, a gamtang theilo, ahem, meima nai a nei, cithak ahih kei leh meima a neite pen, note in Topa tungah pia loin, Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah tuate na zang kei ding uh hi.
Bawngtal hita leh tuuno hita leh a na khatpeuh a saulua ahih kei leh a tom luate pen note in ut thu-a biakna-in na pia thei ding uh hi; ahih hangin thuciamna biak nadingin kisang zo lo hi.
A ciltangte a sanim, a kisukham, a kikeek ahih kei leh a ki-at ganhing khatpeuh peuh, note in Topa tungah pia loin, na gam sung uhah biakna-in na zang kei ding uh hi;
gamdang mite khatpeuh peuh tung pana kingah tua ci bang ganhingte zong na Pasian uh’ adingin note in na pia kei ding uh hi. Amaute sitbang a, hem ahih manin tuate hong kisang zo lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Bawng ahih kei leh tuu ahih kei leh keel khat a suah ciangin a pi tawh ni sagih sung omkhawm ding hi; a ni giat ni-a kipanin tua ganno pen Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in kisang thei ding hi.
A pi pen bawng hita leh tuu hita leh, note in a pi leh a no ni khat sungin na gokhawm kei ding uh hi.
Note in Topa tungah lungdam koh biakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan’ theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.
A tua ni mahin kine ding a, note in a zingsang dong siit na nei kei ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiaknate zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Note in keima min siangtho na daisak kei ding uh hi; Israel mite lakah kei hong kisiangthosak ding hi; keimah in note a hong siangthosak Topa,
note’ Pasian ahi dingin Izipt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpihpa ka hi hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in a siangtho biak kikhopnate hi ci-a na gen ding uh a kiseh Topa’ pawi ahi a kiseh keima pawite in hihte ahi hi.

Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi; ahih hangin a ni sagih ni in a thupi tawlngakna sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna ahi hi; note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi; tua in note’ ten’na khempeuh ah Topa’ adingin sabbath ahi hi.
“Hihte in amaute adingin a kiseh hunin note in na gen ding uh ahi Topa’ pawi a kisehte a siangtho biak kikhopnate ahi hi.
A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm-le-li ni ni takin Topa’ Paisan Pawi ahi hi.
Tua kha mah a ni sawm-le-nga ni in Topa tungah silngo sawhloh anlum pawi ahi hi; ni sagih sung note in silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi.
A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi; note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi;
Ahih hangin note in Topa tungah meihal biakna ni sagih sung na pia ding uh hi; a ni sagih ni in a siangtho kikhopna khat ahi hi; note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak leitangah note tungin an na lak uh ciangin, note in na anpal lakte uh lom khat siampipa kiangah na paipih ding uh hi;
note hong kisan’theih nadingin amah in Topa mai-ah anlom veii ding hi; a zing ciang sabbath khit ciangin siampipa in tua anlom veii ding hi.
Note in anlom na veii ni-un, Topa tungah meihal biakna-in a sitbang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat na pia ding uh hi.

Tua tawh a kipia khawm ding an tawh biakna in sathau tawh a kibawl annel seu seh sawmsuah seh nih hi ding a, a gim namtui dingin Topa tungah meihal biakna-in kipia ding hi; tua tawh a kipiakhawm ding leenggahzu tawh biakna in leenggahzu thawl khat hi ding hi.

Note in na Pasian uh biakna na paipih ma, hih ni matengin anlum hita leh a ki-em an hita leh a sial hita leh na ne kei ding uh hi; tua in note’ khang tawntungin na ten’na khempeuh uhah thukham khat hi tawntung hi.
“Note in a zing ciang sabbath khit ciang, veii-a biakna anlom na paipih ni uh a, kipan ni na sim to ding uh hi; nipi kal sagih bit hi ding hi;
a sabbath sagihna khit a zing ciang dong ni sawmnga na sim ding uh hi; tua ciangin note in an thak ahi an tawh biakna Topa tungah na paipih ding uh hi.
Note in na ten’na uh panin veii dingin seu seh sawmsuah seh nih a kibawl anlum lum nih nong paipih ding uh hi; tuate in annel kibawl, silngo sawh a, ki-em, Topa tungah anpal a, a kipia hi ding hi.

Note in anlum tawh a sitbang lo kum khat a pha tuuno sagih, leh bawngtalno khat, leh tuutal nih na pia ding uh hi; tuate Topa tungah a gim namtui mei tawh kihal biak nadingin an tawh biakna leh leenggahzu tawh biaknate tawh Topa tungah meihal biakna hi ding hi.
Note in khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat leh thunuam-a biakpiakna-in kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nih na pia ding uh hi.
Siampipa in Topa mai-ah veii-a biakna-in anpal anlum leh tuuno nih tawh tuate veii ding hi; tuate in siampipa adingin Topa mai-ah a siangtho hi ding hi.

Note in tua ni mahin genthangna na bawl ding uh hi; note in a siangtho kikhop khat na nei ding uh hi; note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi; tua in note ten’na khempeuh ah na khang tawntungun thukham khat hi tawntung hi.

“Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lo nawl dongun la loin, na an lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh hi; note in mizawngte leh khualmi adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: A kha sagihna, tua kha a ni masa ni-in note in thupi tawlngakna ni khat, peengkul tumna tawh a kibawl phawkna, a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi.
Note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi; Note in Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih a kha sagihna ni sawm ni in kilemna ni ahi hi; tua in note’ adingin a siangtho kikhopna hun hi ding a, note kigawt tawmin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in Topa note Pasian’ mai-ah note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kilemna bawl ni ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in amahmah a kigawt tawm lo peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kihawlkhia ding hi.
Tua ni-in na khatpeuh peuh a sem mi peuhmah keimah in ama mite lak panin ka susia ding hi.
Note in na na sem kei ding uh hi; tua in na khang tawntungun na ten’na khempeuh uhah thukham khat hi tawntung ding hi.

Tua in note adingin thupi tawlngakna sabbath khat hi ding a, nomau mah na kigawt tawm ding uh hi; tua kha ni kua ni a nitak akipan, a nitak panin a nitak kik dong note in na sabbath uh na tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm-le-nga ni akipan ni sagih sung in Topa ading buk pawi ahi hi.
A ni masa ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat hi ding hi; note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.

Ni sagih sung note in Topa tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi; a ni giat ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi; tua in a thupi kikhopna khat ahi hi; note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.

“Hihte in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna, biakpiakna leh leenggahzu tawh biaknate, amau’ ni ciatin piak dingin a siangtho kikhopna hunin na gen ding uh, Topa’ pawi a kisehte ahi hi;
note in Topa tungah na piak uh Topa’ Sabbath-te, note’ letsongte, thuciamna na biaknate khempeuh uh leh ut thu-a na biaknate khempeuh uh banah piak ding ahi hi.

“Note in leitanga piangte na kaihkhop khit uh, kha sagihna a ni sawm-le-nga ni akipan ni sagih sung Topa’ pawi na bawl ding uh hi; a ni masa ni in a thupi tawlngakna khat hi a, a ni giat ni zong a thupi tawlngakna khat mah hi ding hi.
Note in a ni masa ni-in singkung hoih gahte, nisuh hiangte, a teh tam singhiang paipite, leh lui-a gialhekte na la ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah ni sagih sung note na lungdam ding uh hi.
Note in tua pen kum simin ni sagih sung pawi-in na nei ding uh hi; tua in note’ khang tawntungin thukham khat hi tawntung ding hi; note in kha sagihna sungah na bawl ding uh hi.
Note in ni sagih sung buk sungah na teeng ding uh hi; Israelte lakah tualsung mi khempeuh buk sungah teeng ding hi;
tua pen keimah in Izipt gam panin amaute ka paikhiapih lai-in Israel mite buk sungah ka teen’sakna thu note suan leh khakte in a theih nading ahi hi; keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Moses in Israel mite tungah Topa’ pawi a kisehte a gen hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Meivak khat a tawntungin a kivak suak theih nadingin meivak adingin oliv gah a kisuzante panin sathau siangtho nang kiangah hong paipih nading uh Israel mite thu pia in.

Kikhopna buk sung, tecipan’na dalna puan pua lamah, Aaron in nitak-a kipanin zingsang dongin Topa mai-ah a tawntungin tua meivak a ngeina bangin koih ding hi; tua in na khang khangun thukham khat hi tawntung ding hi.
Amah in kham citak meivak khuam tungah meivakte a ngeina bangin Topa mai-ah om sak tawntung ding hi.
“Nangmah in annel la in la, tua panin moh sawm-le-nih bawlin em in; moh khat ciangin annel seu seh sawmsuah seh nih hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak sabuai tungah tuate gual nih-in na koih ding a, gual khatah guk om ding hi.
Phawkna-in Topa tungah mei tawh biakna-in piak dingin anlum tawh a paikhawm theih nadingin nangmah in a gual nihte-ah paknamtui siangtho na koih ding hi.
Sabbath ni simin Aaron in a tawntunga thuciamna-in Israel mite tangin Topa mai-ah a ngeina bangin koih tawntung ding hi.

Tua in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna sung panin amah in a tawntunga a ngah ding a siangtho pen ama kaih ahih manin, Aaron leh ama suante ading hi a, amaute in a siangtho mun khatah ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Israel mite khat’ tapa, a pa Izipt mi ahi khat, Israel mite lakah paikhia hi; Israel numei’ tapa leh Israel mi khat giahphual ah kitawng uh a,
Israel numei’ tapa in Min Siangtho gensia-in samsia hi. Amaute in Moses kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Ama nu’ min in Shelomith hi a, Dan minam, Dibri’ tanu ahi hi.
Topa’ deihna amaute tungah a kigen mateng amaute in tua mipa khumcip uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“A samsia mipa pen giahphual pua lamah paipih in; ama samsiat a za mi khempeuh ama lu tungah amau’ khut nga sak in la, mihonte khempeuh amah deng sak in.
Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ama Pasian a samsia mi peuhmah in ama khialhna thuak ding hi.
Topa’ min a gensia mipa kithat ding hi; mihonte khempeuh in amah deng ding uh hi; peemta hita leh tualsung mi hita leh, Min Siangtho a gensiat ciangin kithat ding hi.
Mi a thatpa kithat ding hi.
Ganhing a thatpa in a ganhing mah-in loh ding hi.
Mi khat in a vengte khat a poisak leh, ama hih bangin ama tung mahah kithuk kik ding a,
guh kitan tang ding guh kitan, mittang tang ding mittang, ha tang ding ha kihih ding hi; amah in mi khat a poisak bangin amah kipoisak ding hi.
Ganhing a thatpa in loh ding hi; mi a thatpa kithat ding hi.
Note in peemta leh tualsung mi adingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite tungah thu gen hi; amaute in a samsia mipa giahphual pua lamah paipih uh a, suang tawh a deng uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite in hih uh hi.
Topa in Sinai Mual tungah Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah na tun’ uh ciangin, leitang in Topa adingin sabbatth tang ding hi.
Kum guk sung note in na lo uh na pawi ding uh hi; kum guk sung note in na leenggui lo uh hah-in a gahte na kaikhawm ding uh hi;
ahih hangin a kum sagihna ah, leitang ading a thupi tawlngakna sabbath, Topa ading sabbath om ding hi; note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uh hi.
A li pote note in na kaikhawm kei ding uh hi; a kipuah lo leenggui gahte note in na kaikhawm kei ding uh hi; leitang’ adingin a thupi tawlngakna kum hi ding hi.
Leitang sabbath kum-a piang tawmte in note ading, note leh na sila pasal leh numeite ading leh a kicial na nasemte uh ading leh note tawh a teeng a peem mi ading an hong sik ding hi;
a piang khempeuhte in na bawngte uh ading leh na leitang uhah a om ganhingte an ding ahi hi.
“Kum nipi sagih hun in note adingin kum sawm-li-le-kua ahih theih nadingin note in kum nipi sagih, kum sagih mun sagih vei na simto ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin note in kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in nakpi-in peengkul na tum ding uh hi; kilemna ni-in note in na gam khempeuh uhah peengkul aw na gingkhia sak ding uh hi.

Note in a kum sawmngana siangtho sakin, gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuhte tungah suahtakna na genthang ding uh hi; note in nomau neihsa ciatah pai kikin note in nomau innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note adingin jubili hi ding hi.
Tua a kum sawmngana in note adingin jubili hi ding hi; tua kum sungin note in lo pawi loin, a li pote zong la loin, a kihah lo leengguite panin zong leenggah na khawm kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua in jubili ahi hi; tua in note adingin siangtho ding hi; note in lo pan-a piangsate na ne ding uh hi.
“Hih Jubili kum sungin note khempeuh in nomau neihsa ciat na ngah kik ding uh hi.
Note in na vengte tungah na zuak uh ahi zongin na vengte kiang panun na lei uh ahi zongin note khat leh khat na kikhem kei ding uh hi.
Jubili khit ciangin a kum pha zah tawh kituakin note in na vengte uh kiang panin lei-in, a an piang ding kum zah tawh kituakin amau in note tungah hong zuak ding uh hi.
A kum a tam leh a man na khangsak ding uh hi; a kum a tawm leh a man na kiamsak ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh no tungah hong zuak pen a tuk tung ding zah ahi hi.
Note khat leh khat kikhem loin na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte hihin, ka biakna ngeina kipte zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; tua hi leh note lungmuang takin gam sungah na teeng ding uh hi.
Leitang in gah gahin, note in na kham takun ne-in, tua sungah lungmuang takin na teeng ding uh hi.
Note in, ‘Lo lah pawi loin an lah la kei lehang, a kum sagihna ah bang ne ding i hi hiam?’ na cih uh leh
keimah in a kum gukna ah note tungah thupha kong pia ding a, kum thum sung ading gah hong gah ding hi.
