Tu-in tua kuam sungah Amalek mite leh Kanaan mite teeng uh ahih manin, San Tuipi paina lampi tawnin zing ciangin gamlakah pai un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Hih a gilo mihonte in bang tanvei kei hong phunsan ding ahi uh hiam? Amaute in kei hong phunsanna uh ahi Israel mite’ phunna ka za khin hi.
Amaute tungah hih bangin gen in. Topa in, ‘Keimah in a nungta ka hih mah bangin zakna ah na gente uh no tungah ka hong hih ding hi:
na luang hawmte uh hih gamlakah lum ding hi; note khempeuh, kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah, kei hong phunsante,
Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb leh Nun’ tapa Joshua sim loh, note teengsak dingin ka kiciamna leitangah khat beek na tung kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin galte in man ding na cih uh na tate uh, keimah in ka tumpih ding a, note in na thusim loh uh leitang amaute in mu ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note ahih leh, na luang hawmte uh hih gamlakah lum ding hi.
Na luang hawmte uh a nunung pen gamlakah a kisial mateng, gamlakah kum sawmli sung na tate uh tuucing hi ding uh a, note’ ginat lohna thuak ding uh hi.
Na gam vaan sung uh ni phazah tawh kizui-in, ni sawmli, ni khat ciangin kum khat, note in na mawhna uh kum sawmli sung na thuak ding uh a, keima lungkim lohna na thei ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.

Topa ahi keimah in thu ka gen hi; keimah langpangin a kikaikhawm hih a gilo mi honte khempeuh tungah hih thu ka hih taktak ding hi: hih gamlakah amaute bei mang ding uh a, amaute si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in gam vaan dingin a sawl mite hong ciahkikin a gam thu a sia lamin gen ahih manin mi honte amah a phunsan sak,
a gam thu a sia lam a, a gen tua mite, Topa’ mai-ah gimna in si sak hi.
Ahih hangin gam vaan dingin a pai mite lak panin Nun’ tapa Joshua leh Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb-te hing lai uh hi.
Moses in Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih thute gen a, nakpi-in mite thuum uh hi.
Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, gamlak mual dawnah pai to-in, “Thei un, hih lai-ah i om hi. Topa’ ciamnasa munah i paito ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh i khial khin hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Bang hangin tu-in Topa’ thupiakna palsat na hi uh hiam, tangtung lo ding hilo ahi hiam?
Na galte uh mai-ah note hong kisat puk kha ding ahih ciangin kuanto kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh note lakah Topa om lo hi.
Amalek mite leh Kanaan mite na mai uhah om ahih ciangin namsau tawh note na puk ding uh hi; Topa zuihna panin nungkik na hih uh ciangin note tawh Topa om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang hita leh Moses hita leh giahphual panin dingkhia lo napi-in gamlak mual dawnah kuantoh ding amaute in ngaihsun veve uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual tung gamah a teeng Amalek mite leh Kanaan mite hong paisuk uh a, amaute zoin Hormah ciang dong na ngawn ah amaute delh uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in. Note kong piak leitangah a teeng dingin note tungin,

bawnghon pan hita leh tuuhon pan hita leh thuciamna tun’sak nadingin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna ahi a, biak piakna ahi zongin na piak ciang uh hita leh, Topa tungah a gim namtui bawl nadingin ut thu-a biakna hita leh, a kiseh pawi hunte-ah hita leh na piak uh ciangin,
biakna a paipih mipa in annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehkhat sathau bung khat sehli suah sehkhat tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna Topa tungah pia ding hi;
tuuno khat tawh piak khawm dingin meihal biakna ahih kei leh biak piakna tawh, tui-buah dingin leenggahzu bung khat sehli suah sehkhat na bawl ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh tuutal khat tawh piak khawm dingin annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehnih sathau bung khat sehthum suah sehkhat tawh a kibawl an tawh biak nading na bawl ding hi;
Topa’ tungah a gim namtui-in tuibuah dingin leenggahzu bung khat sehsawm suah sehkhat na pia ding hi.
Meihal biak nading ahi a, thuciamna tun’sakna-in biakpiak nading ahi a, Topa’ tungah thunuam-a biak nading ahi zongin bawngtal na bawl uh ciangin,
mi khat in a bawngtal tawh annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum sathau bung lang tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna pia ding a,
Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna-in tuibuah dingin leenggahzu bung lang na pia ding hi.
“Bawngtal ahi a tuutal ahi zongin, tuuno a pa ahi a keelno a pa tawh ahi zongin piak khawm dingin tua bangin kihih ding hi.
Na bawl ganhing khempeuh a pha zahzah tua bangin na bawl kim ding hi.
Topa tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna a piakna uhah tual sung mi khempeuh in hih nate tu-a bangin hih ding uh hi.

Note kiangah khualmi khat hong peem ahi a, na khang tawntungun note lakah mi khatpeuh hong om leh ahi zongin, amah in Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna a piak nop leh, note’ hih mah bangin hih ding hi.
Mi honpi’ adingin ngeina khat om ding hi; note leh note lakah hong peem mi’ adingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. Topa’ mai-ah note leh peemta mite na kibang ding uh hi.
Note leh note lakah hong peem mi’ adingin a kibang thu khat, ngeina kip khat om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in. Note kong paipihna gamah tungin
tua gama piang ante na nek uh ciangin Topa tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Na an-ham uh a masa pen sung panin biakna in moh khat na pia ding uh hi; an cilna pana biakna-in na pia ding uh hi.
Na khang tawntungun na an-ham uh a masa pen Topa’ tungah biakna ah na pia ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin note khialin, Topa in Moses tungah a gensa hih thupiaknate khempeuh,
Topa in a thupiak-a kipanin na khang tawntungun, Moses tung tawnin Topa in note hong thupiaknate khempeuh na zuih kei uh leh,

theih lohna hangin mi honte’ phawk lohin a kikhial ahih leh, mi honte khempeuh in Topa tungah a gim namtui, meihal biakna dingin bawngtal no khat, ngeina kip om bangin an tawh biakna leh a tuibuah tawh, leh khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat pia ding hi.

Siampipa in Israel mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna bawlsak ding a, amaute kimaisak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in tatkhialhna hi a, amaute in tua amau’ tatkhialhna hangin Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal amau’ biakna leh khialhna hanga amau’ biakna uh Topa’ mai-ah hong paipih khin uh hi.
Tua tatkhialhna in amaute khempeuh huamkha ahih manin Israel mihonte khempeuh leh amau lakah a peem khualmi zong kimaisak ding hi.
“Theih lohna hangin mi khat a khialh leh, khialna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha keel a nu khat pia ding hi.
Mi khat in theih lohna hangin a khialh ciangin, ama ading kilemna bawlsak nadingin siampipa in tua a khial mipa’ adingin Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawl sak ding hi; amah kimaisak ding hi.
Theih lohna hangin na khatpeuh peuh a hih, Israel mi lakah a om tual sung mipa leh amaute lakah a peem khual mipa’ adingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tual sung mi hita leh peemta hita leh, na khatpeuh peuh a hih teitei mipa in Topa a simmawh hi a, ama mite kiang panin tua mipa kikhenkhia ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ thu simmawhin, a thupiakna siasak ahih manin, tua mipa kikhenkhia siang ding hi; ama mawhna ama tung mahmah om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel mite gamlakah a om sungun, sabbath ni-in sing a tom mi khat mu uh hi.
Sing a tom laitak a mu mite in Aaron leh Moses, leh mihonte khempeuh kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Amah bang kicih ding cih tel takin kigen lo ahih manin amaute in khumcip uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Tua mipa kithat ding hi; mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah suang tawh amah deng ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mi honte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah amah paipih uh a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin suang tawh amah deng lum uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah gen in la, a khang tawntungun a puan mongte uhah a teep bawlin, a puan mong-a a teep tungah khau dum khat a khih dingun sawl in;

tua in, note in ut luatna tawh na zuih theih zel uh ahi nomau’ lungsim leh nomau’ mittang deihna zui loin, note in na et ding uh puanmongteep leh Topa’ thupiakte khempeuh phawkin na sep ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiakte khempeuhte phawkin na sem ding uh a, na Pasian uh tungah na siangtho ding uh hi.
Keimah in, note’ Pasian a hi dingin Izipt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Levi mite sung pan Levi’ tapa Kohath, Kohath’ tapa Izhar, Izhar’ tapa Korah leh Reuben mite sung Reuben’ tapa Eliab, Eliab’ tapa Dathan leh Abiram leh Peleth’ tapa On,
hih mite in pawl kai uh hi; Israel mite sung panin mi’ theihkim, mihon sung panin a kiteel, mihonte a makai mi zanih leh sawmnga tawh Moses’ mai-ah ding uh hi;

Moses leh Aaron langpangin amaute kikaikhawm uh a, amaute kiangah, “Khengval lua uh teh! Mihon khempeuhte a milip-in siangtho uh a, amaute lakah Topa om hi; bang hangin Topa’ mi honpite’ tungah nomau kiliansak tawm na hi uh hiam?” ci uh hi.
Moses in tua thu a zak ciangin boksuk hi;
amah in Korah leh a pawlte khempeuh kiangah, “Zing ciangin Topa in a siangtho ahi mi, ama’ aa ahi mi hong lakin, ama kiangah pai sak ding hi; amah in a teel ding mipa ama kiangah pai sak ding hi.
Hih bangin gamta un: Korah leh a pawlte khempeuh in paknamtui beel la un;
zing ciangin Topa’ mai-ah tua beelte’ sungah mei koihin, mei tungah paknamtui koih un; tua ciangin Topa’ teel mi in a siangtho hong hi ding hi. Levi’ tapate aw, khengval lua uh teh!” a ci hi.
Moses in Korah kiangah, “No Levi mite aw, tu-in za un;
Israel mite’ Pasian in ama kiangah hong paipih ding, Topa’ biakbuk sungah nasep sem ding, mi honte’ na sem dingin amau’ mai-ah a ding dingin Israel mi honte kiang panin hong khenkhiatna leh
nang leh na sanggamte ahi Levi’ mite ama kiangah hong paipihna, hawmthawh lai na hi hiam? Siampi nasepna zong deih lai na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nang leh na pawlte khempeuh hih lai-ah na kikaihkhopna uh in Topa langpan’na ahi hi; note in na phunsan uh Aaron pen bang mi hi mawk ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Moses in Eliab’ tapa Dathan leh Abiramte sam sak hi; amaute in, “Kong pai kei ding uh hi.
Kote tungah nangmah ulian-in kibawl tawmin, gamlakah kote hong that dingin bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gam panin nong paikhiatpihna thu hawmthawh lai na hi hiam?

Tua tham loin nangmah in bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gamah kote hong paipih loin, lote leh leenggui lote zong nong luah sak kei hi. Hih mite’ mit khel khia ding na hi hiam? Kong pai kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses heh mahmah a, Topa kiangah, “Amau’ biakna thupi ngaihsut kei in. Amaute tung panin la khat zong la loin, amaute khat zong ka siasak kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Korah’ kiangah, “Nang leh na pawlte, nang leh amaute, Aaron tawh zing ciangin Topa’ mai-ah hong om un;

note in na milip-un na paknamtui beel ciat uh la-in, a sungah paknamtui koih un la, Topa’ mai-ah na paknamtui beel ciat uh, paknamtui beel zanih leh sawmnga paipih un; Aaron leh nangmah in zong na paknamtui beel tuak uh paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a milip-un a paknamtui beel ciat uh la a, tuate sungah mei koihin a tungah paknamtui koih uh a, kikhopna buk kongah Moses leh Aaron tawh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Korah in amaute’ lang khat, kikhopna buk kongah mihonte khempeuh khawm hi. Topa’ minthan’na mihon khempeuhte tungah kilang hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Amaute tomno sungin ka beisak theih nadingin hih mihonte lak panin kihem un,” a ci hi.
Amaute boksuk uh a, “Pasian, mi khempeuhte tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian aw, mi khat khial ding a, mihon khempeuhte tungah nang heh ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
”Mihonte tungah hih bangin gen in, Korah, Dathan leh Abiramte’ omna kiim panin paikhia un, ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses ding-in Dathan leh Abiram kiangah pai hi; Israel upate in amah zui hi.

Amah in mihonte kiangah, “Amaute’ khialhna khempeuh tawh note hong kiphiat khia kha ding ahih manin, hih migilote’ puanbuk panin paikhia un la, amau’ na khat beek lawng kha kei un, hong thuum ing,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Korah, Dathan leh Abiramte’ omna kiim panin, amau paikhia uh hi; Dathan leh Abiramte a zite uh leh a tapate uh leh a taneute uh tawh hong pusuakin a puanbuk kong uhah ding khawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in, “Hih na khempeuh a sem dingin Topa in kei hong sawlin, tua pen keima ut thu a hih lohna, hih thu tawh na thei ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh a sih ngei bang danin hih mite si a, tua ahih kei leh mi khempeuh in a tuah ngeite a tuah leh, Topa in kei hong sawl loh ahi hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in a thak khat hong piangsakin, leitang a kam ka-in amaute’ neih khempeuh tawh hih mite valh tumin, a hing tangun Leinuai-ah a tumsuk uh leh, hih mite Topa a simmawhna thu na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute a gen khiat phetin amau’ nuai-ah lei kiphel kham hi;
leitang in a kam ka-in, Korah tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh leh a innkuanpihte uh leh a neihsa khempeuh uh valh tum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute leh a neihsa khempeuh uh a hing tangun Leinuai-ah tumsuk uh hi; leitang in amaute khup nelh a, mi honpite laizang panin amaute bei uh hi.
Amaute’ kikona hangin a kiim uh a, a om Israel khempeuh tai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Leitang in hong valh tum kha in teh!” ci uh hi.
Topa kiang panin mei hong paikhia a, paknamtui a pia mi zanih leh sawmngate kangtum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar in meikuang sung panin paknamtui beelte a lak khiat ding gen in; tua ciangin a gamlapi-in mei thehthang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate,

amau’ nuntakna a beina dongin a khial hih mite’ paknamtui beelte siangtho hi; tua ahih ciangin biakna tau sitna kuangdai dingin seek un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa mai-ah tuate pia uh hi; tua ahih ciangin tua nate siangtho hi. Israel mite tungah tua bangin hih nate in lim khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampi Eleazar in mei tawh a kang tum mite’ piak paknamtui sumngo beelte la-in biakna tau sitna-in seek hi—

Topa in Moses tung tawnin Eleazar tungah a gen bangin Korah leh a pawlte tawh a kibang kha lo dingin, siampi ahi lo, Aaron, suan leh khakte ahi lo mi peuhmah in Topa’ mai-ah paknamtui hal dingin a pai loh nading, Israel mite tungah phawksakna khat ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a zing ciangin Israel mi hon khempeuh in Moses leh Aaron phunsan uh a, “Topa mite na that uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Moses leh Aaron langpangin mihonte a kikhop uh ciangin, kikhopna buk lamah amaute kihei uh hi, en in: meii in tuam a, Topa minthan’na kilang hi.
Kikhopna buk mai lamah Moses leh Aaron pai a,
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Tomno sungin amaute ka siatsak theih nadingin hih mihonte laizang panin paikhia un,” a ci hi. Amaute boksuk uh hi.

Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Na paknamtui beel la-in, biakna tau pan-a mei a sungah koih in la, a tungah paknamtui koihin, mihonte lakah paipih mengmeng in la, amaute’ adingin kilemna bawlsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa kiang panin hehna hong paikhia khin a, gimna kipan khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses’ gen bangin Aaron in la-in mihonte lakah tai hi, en in: mite lakah gimna kipan khin hi; amah in paknamtui koihin mite’ adingin kilemna bawlsak hi.
A si leh a hing-te kikalah amah ding a, gimna veng hi.
Tu-in Korah’ tungtangah a site sim loh, hih gimna tawh a si mi tulsawm leh tulli leh za sagih ahi hi.
Gimna a ven’ ciangin kikhopna buk kong Moses kiangah Aaron ciahkik hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah thu gen in la, amaute tung panin, beh khat ciangin ciangkhut khat, a beh tawh kizui-in a makaite khempeuh tung panin ciangkhut sawm-le-nih la in. A ciangkhut tungah amau min ciat gelh in la,
Levi ciangkhut tungah Aaron’ min gelh in. Bang hang hiam cih leh beh lutang khatah ciangkhut khat hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna buk sung teci pan’na mai, nang tawh i kituahna munah tuate na koih ding hi.
Keimah in ka teel mipa, ciangkhut hong sel ding hi; amaute in nang hong phunsanna, Israel mite’ phunna tua bangin kei kiang panin ka beisak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Moses in Israel mite tungah gen hi; a makaite khempeuh in a beh tawh kizui-in makai khat ciangin khat pai, ciangkhut sawm leh nih ama tungah pia uh hi; Aaron’ ciangkhut pen amaute’ ciangkhut lakah om hi.
Moses in teci pan’na puanbuk sung Topa’ mai-ah ciangkhutte koih hi.
A zing ciangin teci pan’na puanbuk sungah Moses pai hi, en in: Levi-te beh ading Aaron’ ciangkhut selin nguum khia a, paakin, almond min gah a gah hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Topa’ mai panin Israel mite khempeuh kiangah ciangkhut khempeuh pai khiatpih hi; amaute in en uh a, a ciangkhut ciat uh la uh hi.

Topa in Moses kiangah, “Amaute si kha ding ahih manin, amaute in kei hong phunsanna na bei sak theih nadingin a lehdo mite adingin lim ahi dingin teci pan’na mai-ah Aaron’ ciangkhut koih kik in,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin Moses in hih hi; Topa in amah a sawl bangin, amah in zong hih hi.
Israel mite in Moses kiangah, “En in, kote a si ka hi ta uh a, a mawkna ka hi ta uh hi; kote khempeuh a mawkna ka hi ta uh hi.
A nai-ah a pai, Topa’ biakbuk nai-ah a pai peuhmah si ding hi. Kote khempeuh ka bei nading uh hi ta ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Aaron kiangah, “Nang leh na tapate leh na behte biakinn tawh kisai-in mawhna nang tawh pua khawm ding uh hi; nang leh na tapate in na siampi nasepna tawh kisai-in mawhna nang tawh na pua khawm ding uh hi.
Amaute in nang hong pawlin, teci pan’na puanbuk mai-ah nang leh na tapate na om lai takun note’ na hong sep theih nadingin na pate’ nam ahi Levi minam na sanggamte zong paipih in.
Amaute in note hong huhin puanbuk nasep khempeuh sem ding uh hi; ahih hangin note leh amaute si kha ding na hih ciangun biakinn nazatte leh biakna tau kiangah pai lo ding uh hi.
Amaute in note hong pawlin, kikhopna buk vaan-in puanbuk nasep khempeuh sem ding uh hi; note kiangah mi dang kuamah hong pai lo ding hi.
Israel mite tungah hehna a a om nawn loh nadingin biakinn nasep leh biakna tau nasep note in na sem ding uh hi.
En un, Israel mite kiang panin na sanggam uh Levi mite ka la khin hi; amaute pen kikhopna buk nasep a sem dingin Topa tungah a kipia, note tungah letsong ahi hi.

Nang leh na tapate in biakna tau tawh kisai nate leh dalna puan sunga om nate khempeuhah na siampi nasep uh na sem ding uh hi; na siampi nasep uh letsongin kong piak hi a, a nai-ah hong pai midang peuhmah kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Aaron kiangah, “En in, kei tungah hong kipia biakna a kikoih khempeuh, Israel mite in a ap nate khempeuh nang kong pia hi; nangma tanh ding leh na suan na khakte’ kaih ahi tawntung dingin note tungah kong pia hi.

Hih in mei tawh hal dingte lak panin a kisiit, a siangtho pen nangma nate ahi hi; amaute in kei tungah hong piak amau’ biaknate khempeuh, an tawh amau’ biaknate khempeuh leh khialhna hanga amau’ biaknate khempeuh leh mawhna hanga amau’ biaknate khempeuh pen nang leh na suan na khakte adingin a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
A siangtho pen mun khatah na ne ding uh hi; pasal peuhmah in ne thei ding hi; note’ adingin a siangtho ahi hi.

Amau’ letsong biakna, Israel mite in veii-a biaknate khempeuh uh zong nomau aa ahi hi; nang leh na tapate leh na tanute kaih tawntung dingin tuate kong pia hi; na inn sunga om a siangtho mi peuhpeuh in ne thei ding hi.
Sathau a limci pen khempeuh, leh leenggahzu leh an a limci pen khempeuh, Topa tungah amau piak an palte, note tungah kong pia hi.
Amaute in Topa tungah a piak uh, amau’ leitangah a min masa gah khempeuh nomau’ aa hi ding hi; na inn sunga om a siangtho mi peuhpeuh in ne thei ding hi.
Israelte sungah a ki-ap na peuhmah nomau aa hi ding hi.

Mihing leh ganhing khempeuh sung panin naubu a hong, amaute in Topa tungah a piakte khempeuh uh, mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh, nomau aa hi ding hi; ahi zongin mihing tacil na tankhia ding uh a, ganhing tacil zong na tankhia ding uh hi.
Tuate a kitatna man (kha khat a phak ciangin tuate na tankhia ding uh hi) gerah sawmnih a pha biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in ngun shekel nga-in na seh ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin bawng tacil, ahih kei leh tuu tacil, ahi kei leh keel tacilte na tan kei ding uh hi; tuate siangtho hi. Biakna tau tungah tuate’ si na theh ding uh a, Topa tungah gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna-in tuate’ thau na hal ding uh hi;
ahih hangin a kiveii sa-iik leh a taklam phei nomau aa ahih mah bangin, tuate’ sate nomau aa hi ding hi.

Israel mite in Topa tungah a piak a siangtho biaknate khempeuh, nang leh na tapate leh na tanute tungah kaih tawntung dingin kong pia hi; tua in nang leh na suan na khakte adingin Topa mai-ah a tawntung a, ci tawh thuciamna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Aaron kiangah, “Nang in amau’ gam sungah gamhluah na nei kei ding a, amaute lakah tanh zong na nei kei ding hi; keimah in Israel mite lakah nangma tanh leh nangma luah ka hi hi.
“Kikhopna buk sungah amaute’ nasepna, amau’ nasep thaman dingin Israel sunga sehsawm suah sehkhat khempeuh, Levi mite tungah gamh-in ka pia hi.
Amaute in khialhna thuakin si kha ding uh ahih manin tu-a kipan kikhopna buk kiangah Israel mite pai lo ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin Levi mite in kikhopna buk nasep sem ding uh a, amaute in a mawhna uh pua ding uh hi; tua in amau’ khang tawntungin tawntung ngeina hi ding hi; amaute in Israel mite lakah luah nei lo ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in biakna-in Topa tungah a piak uh Israel mite’ sehsawm suah sehkhat pen Levi mite tungah luah dingin ka pia khin hi; tua ahih ciangin Israel mite lakah amaute in luah a neih loh ding uh ka gensa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Levi mite kiangah hih bangin na gen lai ding hi: “Note luah dingin amaute’ tung panin kong piak ahi sehsawm suah sehkhat Israel mite tung panin na lak uh ciangin, tua sung panin Topa tungah biakna, sehsawm suah sehkhat sung pan sehsawm suah sehkhat na pia sawn ding uh hi.
Tua na biaknate uh, ancilna pana an leh leenggah sukna pana kipia mah bangin note aa-in kiciamteh ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tung panin na ngah uh sehsawm suah sehkhat khempeuh tung panin Topa tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi; tua sung panin siampi Aaron’ tungah Topa a kibiakna na pia ding uh hi.
Note tungah hong kipia letsong lakah a limci pen, a siangtho pen paipihin Topa adingin biakna khempeuh na pia ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Tuate sung panin a limci pen teng na piak khit uh ciangin, a om lai teng Levi mite’ adingin ancilna pana piangte leh leenggah sukna pana piangte a kipia mah bangin kiciamteh ding hi;
mun khatpeuh peuh ah na ne thei ding uh hi, nang leh na innkuanpihte in na ne thei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in kikhopna buk sungah note’ nasepna thaman ahi hi.

Tua sung panin a limci pen na piak nak uh leh tua thu hangin mawhsakna na thuak kei ding uh hi. Israel mite’ na a siangthote na nin sak kei ding uh hi, na ninsak uh leh na si ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
u-in Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,

“Hih in Topa’ thupiak thukham leh ngeina ahi hi: Poina a nei lo, sit ban’na a om lo, a tungah nasepna kol a kivawh ngei nai lo, bawngla a san khat nangma kiangah hong paipih nadingun Israel mite kiangah gen un.
Siampi Eleazar kiangah na pia ding uh a, giahphual pua lamah kipaipihin ama mai-ah kigo ding hi;
siampi Eleazar in a khutme tawh a si tawm khat la-in, kikhopna buk mai lamah a si sagih vei theh ding hi.
Ama muhna ah a bawngla kihal ding hi; a vun, a sa, leh a si, a ek tawh kihal ding hi;
siampipa in taamtaak sing leh puknah leh a ausan khaute la-in bawngla a kihalna sungah tuate khul ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in ama puante sawpin tui sungah kipumsil ding a, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong pai ding hi; a nitak mateng siampipa a nin hi ding hi.
Bawngla a hal mipa-in ama puante sawpin tui sungah kipumsil ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.

Mi a siang khat in bawngla vute khawmin, giahphual pua lam a siang mun khatah tuate koih ding hi; khialhna maisak nading, nitna sian’sak nading tui-ah zat dingin Israel mi honpite adingin tuate kikem ding hi.
Bawngla vute a khawm mipa in ama puante sawpin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Hih in Israel mite leh amaute lakah a peem khualmi tungah tawntung ngeina hi ding hi.
“A si mi khatpeuh’ pumpi a lawngpa ni sagih sung a nin hi ding hi;

a ni thum ni leh a ni sagih ni-in amahmah tui tawh kisiangsakin, tua khit ciangin a siang hi ding hi; ahih hangin a ni thum ni leh a ni sagih ni-in amahmah a kisian’sak kei leh, amah a siang suak thei lo ding hi.

A sisa mi khatpeuh’ pumpi, mi si a lawng mi in amahmah a kisian’sak tawm kei leh amah in Topa’ biakbuk a ninsak hi a, Israel sung panin tua mi kikhen khia ding hi; nitna hangin ama tungah tui kibuak lo ahih manin amah a nin hi ding hi; ama nitna ama tungah om lai hi.
“Hih in, mi khat puanbuk sungah a sih ciangin ngeina ahi hi; puanbuk sungah a pai mi peuhmah leh puanbuk sungah a om mi peuhmah ni sagih sung a nin hi ding hi.
A kisin cip lo a kihong beel peuhmah a nin ahi hi.
Namsau tawh gamlakah a kithat mi ahi a, misi pumpi ahi a, mi guh ahi a, han ahi zongin a lawng mi peuhmah ni sagih sung a nin hi ding hi.
Amaute in a nin mipa adingin a kihal khialhna hanga biakna vute la-in beel sung khatah tui luang lai tawh hel ding uh hi;

tua ciangin a siang mi khat in puknah la-in a tui sungah diah ding a, puanbuk tung leh a nazatte khempeuh tung leh tua lai-ah a om mi khempeuh tung leh guh ahi a, a kithat mi ahi a, misi ahi a, han ahi zongin a lawng mipa tungah theh ding hi;

a ni thum ni leh a ni sagih ni-in a siang mipa in a nin mipa tungah theh ding hi; tua bangin a ni sagih ni-in amah in mi nin pa siangsakin, amah in a puante sawpin tui sungah kipumsil ding a, a nitak ciangin amah siang ding hi.

“Ahih hangin a nin hi napi-in amah a kisiangsak lo mipa in Topa’ biakinn ninsak ahih manin mi honpi panin tua mipa kikhen khia ding hi; nitna hangin ama tungah tui kibuak lo ahih manin amah a nin ahi hi.
Tua in amaute adingin tawntung ngeina khat hi ding hi. Nitna hangin tui a theh mipa in ama puante sawp ding hi; nitna hanga a kizang tui a lawng mipa a nitak mateng nin ding hi.
A nin mipa in a lawn’ peuhpeuh nin ding hi; tua a lawng peuhpeuh a nitak mateng nin ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel mite, a mihon buppi, a kha masa sungin Zin gamlak tung uh a, mite Kadesh munah om uh hi; tua lai-ah Miriam si a, tua lai mahah kivui hi.
Tu-in mihonte ading tui om lo hi; tua ahih manin Moses leh Aaron’ langah amaute kihawmin kituah uh hi.
Mite Moses tawh kiseelin, “Topa mai-ah ka sanggamte uh a sih lai-in a si hi zaw ta le ung!
Bang hangin hih lai-ah kote leh ka ganhingte uh a si dingin Topa’ mihonte hih gam lakah hong paipih na hi hiam?

Bang hangin hih mun sia-ah hong paipih dingin Izipt panin kote hong paito sak na hi hiam? An ahi a, thei ahi a, leenggui ahi a, mang kawlsing ahi zongin a omna mun hi lo hi; dawn ding tui zong om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte omna panin kikhopna buk kongah Moses leh Aaron pai-in bok uh hi. Topa’ minthan’na amaute tungah kilang a,
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Ciangkhut la-in, nang leh na sanggampa Aaron in mihonte khawm un la, suangpi in amau’ muh-in tui a piak ding sawl un; tua bangin suangpi panin amau ading tui na pia ding hi; tua bangin mihonte tung leh amau’ ganhingte tungah tui na pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thupiak bangin Topa mai panin ciangkhut la hi.
Moses leh Aaron in suangpi mai-ah mihonte kaikhawmin, amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in za un, a lehdo mite aw; hih suangpi panin note ading tui hong phulkhiasak ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Moses in a khut laam toin a ciangkhut tawh suangpi nih vei sat hi; tui tampi phulkhia-in mihonte leh amau’ ganhingte in dawn uh hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah, “Israel mite mai-ah kei hong um lo hong siangthosak lo na hih uh ciangin amaute ka piaksa leitangah hih mihonte na tun’pih kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte pen, Israel mite Topa tawh a kiseelna, amaute lakah amahmah a siangtho a, a kilahna mun, Meribah tui phual-a thu piang ahi hi.
Moses in Kadesh panin Edom kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawl a, “Na sanggam ahi Israelte in hih bangin ci hi: Kote’ tuah khak kamsiatna khempeuh na thei hi.
Ka pu ka pate uh Izipt ah na paisukin Izipt ah sau veipi ka teeng uh hi; Izipt mite in kote leh ka pu ka pate uh hong gim bawl hi;
Topa tungah ka kiko uh ciangin amah in ka aw uh hong za a, vantung mi khat hong sawlin, Izipt panin hong pai khiatpih hi; tu-in nangma gam nawl Kadesh khuapi ah ka om uh hi.

Tu-in kote na gam hong kantan sak in. Lo ahi a, leenggui lo ahi zong nawk loin, tuikhuk panin zong tui ka dawn kei ding uh hi; Kumpipa’ Lamlian dungah ka pai ding uh a, na gamsung ka khen’ matengun tak lam ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin ka pial kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Edom mite in ama kiangah, “Nong nawk kei ding uh hi, nong nawk uh leh note lang pangin namsau tawh kong kuan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Israel mite in, lamlian lam tawnin ka pai to ding uh hi; kote leh ka ganhingte un na tui uh ka dawn uh leh, a man kong pia ding uh hi; khe tawh pai-in hong nawk sak un, a dang kong ngen kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Edom mite in, “Nong nawk kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Amaute’ lang khatah galkap tampi tawh Edom mite kuan hi.
Israel, amau gam a nawk sak ding tua bangin Edom mite in nial uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amau kiang panin Israel mite paikhia uh hi.
Kadesh panin amaute pai uh a, Israel mite, a mihon buppi-in Hor Mual tung uh hi.
Edom gamgi Hor Mual ah Topa in Moses leh Aaron tungah,
“Ama mite kiangah Aaron kigawm ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Meribah tui-ah note in ka thupiak lehdo na hih manun, Israel mite tungah ka piak leitangah amah tum lo ding hi.
Aaron leh ama tapa Eleazar sam in la, Hor Mual ah amaute paipih in;
ama tung panin Aaron puante suahkhia in la, a tapa Eleazar silh sak in; ama mite kiangah Aaron kigawm ding a, tua lai-ah si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa thupiak bangin Moses gamta hi; mihonte khempeuh’ muhin Hor Mual tungah amaute paito uh hi.
Moses in Aaron puante suahkhiatsak a, a tapa Eleazar silh sak hi; tua mual dawnah Aaron si hi. Tua ciangin mual tung panin Moses leh Eleazar paisuk uh hi.
Mi honte khempeuh in Aaron si hi ci-in a muh uh ciangin, Aaron hangin Israel innkuan khempeuh ni sawmthum sung kap uh hi.
Kanaan mi ahi Negeb gama teeng Arad gam kumpipa in Atharim lam tawnin Israel hong paina thu a zak ciangin, amah in Israel doin, amaute kimkhat sal-in man hi.
Israelte in Topa tungah kiciamna khat bawl uh a, “Ka khut sung uhah hih mite nong piak nak leh kote in amau’ khuapite ka susia mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in Israelte’ aw ngai-in Kanaan mite pia hi; amaute in amau leh a khuapite uh susia mang hi; tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Hormah kici hi.
Amaute Hor Mual panin ding khia-in, Edom gam kiim-ah pai dingin San Tuipi lamah, pai uh hi; lam kalah mite lungkia uh hi.

Mite in Pasian leh Moses gensia uh a, “Bang hangin gam lakah a si dingin Izipt panin kote hong pai khiatpih to na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh an leh tui om lo hi, bangmah a man lo hih an ka kih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in mite lakah gul gu-phate khah a, tuate in mite tu-in Israel mi tampi si hi.

Moses kiangah mite hong pai-in, “Topa leh nang hong gensia-in kam pau ka hih manun ka khial uh hi; kote kiang panin gulte a lak khiat nadingin Topa tungah thuum in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite’ adingin Moses in thuumsak hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Gul gu-pha khat bawl in la, khuam khat tungah khai in; gul in a tuk mi peuhmah in tua gul a muh ciangin hing ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in sumngo gul khat bawl a, khuam khat tungah khai hi; gul in mi khatpeuh a tuk leh amah in sumngo gul enin hing pah hi.
Israel mite ding khia uh a, Oboth munah giahphual sat uh hi.
Amaute Oboth panin ding khia uh a, nisuahna lam, Moab gal gamlak, Iyeabarim munah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua lai panin amaute ding khia uh a, Zered Kuam ah giahphual sat uh hi.

Tua lai panin amaute ding khia uh a, Amor mite’ gamgi pana hong kikhung suk gamlak a, om Arnon gun gal khatah giahphual sat uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Arnon gun pen Moab leh Amor mite kikalah gamgi ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa’ Gal Laibu sungah, “Sufah gama Vuahep khua, leh Arnon gun kuamte,
leh Ar khua ciang a ban suk a, Moab gamgi lamah a paisuk kuam,” kici hi.
Tua lai panin Be-er munah pai uh hi; tua pen Topa in Moses kiangah, “Mite kaikhawmin, amaute tui ka pia ding hi,” a cihna tuikhuk ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in hih la sa uh hi: “Tuikhuk aw, Phul in!—La sak un!
kumpi ciangkhut leh amau ciangkhutte tawh mite’ uliante in a tawh, kumpi tate in a tawh tuikhuk,” a ci uh hi. Gamlak panin amaute Mattanah mun-ah pai uh a,
Mattanah panin Nahaliel, Nahaliel panin Bamoth,
Bamoth panin sehnel gam a kimuh suk theihna Pisgah mual kiang nai, Moab gam sunga kuam khatah tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte in Amor kumpipa Sihon kiangah kamtaite sawl a,

“Na gam hong kantan sak in; lo ahi a, leenggui lo ahi zongin ka pial kei ding uh hi; tuikhuk tui ka dawn kei ding uh hi; na gam ka khen khit mateng uh Kumpipa’ Lamlian tawnin ka pai ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Sihon in ama gam Israelte kantan sak lo hi. Amah in a mite khempeuh kaikhawmin, Israelte do dingin gam lakah pai-in Jahaz mun tung a, Israelte a do hi.
Israelte in namsau tawh amah leh a mite tampi thatin, Arnon gun panin Jabbok lui, Ammon mite kiang dong a gam lak sak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jazer pen Ammon mite’ gamgi ahi hi.
Israelte in hih khuapite khempeuh la-in, Heshbon gam sunga Amor mite’ khuapite khempeuh leh khua neute khempeuh ah teeng uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Heshbon pen, ni danga Moab kumpipa simin a khut sung panin Arnon gun ciang dong a gam khempeuh a lak sak, Amor mite’ kumpipa Sihon’ khuapi ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin la a sa pawlte in, “Heshbon ah hong pai un, lam kik un, Sihon khuapi kip sak un.
Heshbon panin mei piang khia hi, Sihon khuapi panin meikuang piang khia hi. Moabte’ kumpi Ar, Arnon mual sang a ukte kang tum hi.
O Moab! gimna na ngah hi, O Khemosh mite! na mangthang uh hi, Amah in a tapate gal tai-in, a tanute gal matin, Amor kumpipa Sihon adingin hong bawl hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amau’ suan leh khakte Heshbon panin Dibon ciang dong si uh a, mei in Medeba ciang dong a bat mateng ka siasak uh hi,” ci-in sa uh hi.
Tua ciangin Amor mite’ gam sungah Israelte teeng hi.
Moses in Jazer khua thu a kansim ding a sawl hi; amaute in a khua neute la-in tua lai-a om Amor mite suan uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kihei-in Bashan lamah paito uh hi; Bashan kumpipa Og leh a mite khempeuh Edrei-ah amaute do dingin kuan uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “Amah kihta kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah leh a mite khempeuh leh a leitang, nangma khut sungah kong pia khin hi; Heshbon ah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon na bawl bangin amah na bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khat beek a nungta a om lo dingin amaute in amah leh a tapate leh a mite khempeuh that uh hi; amaute in ama gam tang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Jerikho gei Jordan gal khat Moab gam leizangah giahphual sat uh hi.
Israelte in Amor mite tungah a bawlna khempeuh Zippor’ tapa Balak in mu hi.
Amaute tam mahmah uh ahih manin Moab mite in tua mite kihta uh hi; Israel mite kihtakna tawh Moab mite a kidim hi.

Moab mite in Midian upate kiangah, “Bawngtal in gamlak lopate a liah bangin hih mihonte in i kiim-a om khempeuh liak tum mang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Zippor’ tapa Balak, tua hun lai taka Moab kumpipa in

Amau mite’ gam, Gun gei Pethor ah a om Beor tapa Balaam kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “En in, Izipt panin mihon khat hong paikhia hi; amaute in lei maitang teng dim khin uh a, keima gal khatah amaute om uh hi.

Tu-in hong pai in la, amaute hat lua uh ahih manin hih mite hong samsiat sak in; tua hi leh amaute zoin hih gam panin ka hawl khia zo kha ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thupha na piak mi in thupha ngahin na samsiat mi in siatna a ngah ka thei hi,” a ci sak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moab upate leh Midian upate aisaan man ding tawh kuan khia uh hi; Balaam kiangah amaute pai uh a, Balak’ thu ama kiangah sung uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu zan hih lai-ah giak un, Topa in kei tungah hong gen bangin note tungah thu kong puak kik ding hi,” a ci hi; tua ahih ciangin Moab uliante Balaam tawh om hi.
Balaam kiangah Pasian hong pai-in, “Nang tawh a om hih mite kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in Pasian kiangah, “Zippor’ tapa Balak, Moab kumpipa in kei kiangah hong sawlin,
‘En in, Izipt panin mihon khat hong paikhia a, lei maitang teng dim uh hi; tu-in hong pai in la amaute doin ka hawl khia zo kha ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Pasian in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute na zui kei ding hi; tua mite thupha kipia ahih manin na samsia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Balaam tho-in Balak’ uliante kiangah, “Na gam uhah ciah un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in note kong zuih ding hong phal lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moab uliante ding-in Balak kiangah pai uh a, “Balaam in kote hong zui nuam lo hi,” ci uh hi.
Balak in amaute sangin a tamzaw leh a zahtak-huai zaw uliante khat vei sawl kik hi.
Amaute Balaam kiangah pai uh a, ama kiangah, “Zippor’ tapa Balak in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah nong pai nading bangmah kikol-awk sak kei in;
bang hang hiam cih leh min phatna lianpi nang kong pia ding a, kei tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi; hong pai in la, hih mite hong samsiat sak in,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.

Ahih hangin Balaam in dawngin Balak’ nasemte kiangah, “Balak in kham leh ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hita leh zong, Topa ka Pasian’ thu piakna banah a tawmzaw hita leh a tamzaw hita leh bangmah ka hih thei kei hi.
Tu-in kong thuum hi, Topa in kei tungah bang hong ci lai ding hiam cih ka theih nadingin tu zan zong hih lai-ah giak un,” a ci hi.
Balaam kiangah zanin Pasian hong pai-in, “Nangmah sam dingin mite hong pai ahih leh, tho in la, amaute zui in; ahih hangin nang kong sawl teng bek na hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Balaam tho-in a la tutphah vawh a, Moab uliante zui hi.
Ahih hangin amah pai ahih manin Pasian’ hehna so hi; amah langpang dingin Topa’ vantungmi in lampi ah na pang hi. Tu-in a la tungah amah tuang a, a nasemte nih in zong a zui uh hi.
A la in Topa’ vantungmi a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawi-in lampi ah a ding mu hi; lampi panin lam pialin gam lakah pai hi; Balaam in lampi ah a paikik nadingin a la sat hi.
Tua ciangin leenggui lo kikal, a pang tuakah phung a omna lam kawcik ah Topa’ vantungmi na ding hi.
La in Topa’ vantungmi a muh ciangin phung phu a, Balaam’ khe phung tawh nengcip hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a la sat kik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi na ma pai-in, tak lam ahi a, vei lam ahi zongin kihei theih nading a om lohna mun kawcik khatah na ding leuleu hi.
La in Topa’ vantungmi a muh ciangin Balaam nuai-ah lumsuk hi; Balaam heh mahmah a, a ciangkhut tawh la sat hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in la pau theisak a, la in Balaam kiangah, “Thum vei dong nong sat nadingin nang bang hong cih ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in la kiangah, “Nang in kei nong mawlpihna hang ahi hi. Ka khutah namsau tawi leng ka ut hi; tua hi leh nang kong that khin ding hi,” a ci hi.
La in Balaam kiangah, “Na khan’ tawnin tu ni ciang dong na tuan’na na la hilo ka hi hiam? Hih bangin nang hong hih ngei ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nong hih ngei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Balaam’ mitte hon’sak a, a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawh Topa’ vantungmi lampi ah a ding mu hi; a lu kunin boksuk hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na la thum vei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna ah lungkim lo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuankhia hi;
la in kei hong mu-in thum vei dong hong pel hi. Kei hong pel kei leh, tu mahmahin nang hong that khinin amah ka hingsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Balaam in Topa’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kei hong pangin lampi ah na din’ lam thei lo ka hih manin ka khial hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khualzinna hoih sa lo na hih leh ka ciahkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in Balaam kiangah, “Mite zui in; ahih hangin nang kong sawl teng bek na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Balaam in Balak’ uliante zui suak hi.
Balaam’ hong paina thu Balak in a zak ciangin, Arnon gun gamgi-a a kizatna gei-a om Moab khuapi, gampi ciangah amah dawn dingin paikhia hi.
Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Nang hong sam ding hong sawl hilo ka hi hiam? Bang hangin hong pai lo na hi hiam? Nang hong liansak lah ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “En in, na kiang hong tung ing! Na khatpeuh ka gen theih nading vangliatna khatpeuh nei ka hi hiam? Pasian in ka kam sungah hong guan’ thu bek ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak zui a, Kiriath-huzoth khua ah tung uh hi.
Balak in bawngtalte leh tuute tawh biakna pia-in Balaam leh amah tawh a om uliante kiangah a puak hi.
A zing ciangin Balak in Balaam samin Bamoth-baal munah paipih to hi; tua lai panin amah in Israel mi a madawk pente gal muh thei hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kei adingin biakna tau sagih hong bawlsak in la, kei adingin bawngtal sagih leh tuutal sagih hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Balaam’ gen bangin Balak in hih hi; Balak leh Balaam in biakna tau simah bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat ciat pia uh hi.

Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Na meihal biakna kiangah na ding in, kei ka va pai ding hi; kei hong dawn dingin Topa hong pai kha ding hi; amah in kei hong lah khempeuh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a sang mualpawn khatah amah pai hi.’
Pasian in Balaam na dawn hi; Balaam in ama kiangah, “Biakna tau sagih ka bawl khin a, baikna tau simah bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat ciat ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Balaam’ kamah thu guang a, “Balak kiangah ciahkik in la, hih bangin na gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ama kiangah a ciahkik ciangin amah leh Moab uliante khempeuh a meihal biakna gei-ah na ding uh hi.

Balaam in a thugen ding teng genin, “Aram panin Balak in kei hong paipih hi, nisuahna mualte panin Moab kumpipa in hong paipih hi; ‘Hong pai in, Jakob mite hong samsiat sak in, hong pai in, Israel mite mawhsak in! hong ci hi.
Pasian’ samsiat loh mite bangci samsiat ding ka hi hiam? Topa’ mawhsak loh mite bangci mawhsak ding ka hi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh mualte’ dawn panin amaute ka mu hi, mual neute panin amaute ka en hi; en in, a tang teen, mite minamte lakah a kihel lote!

Kua in Leivui banga a tam Jakob mite a mal sim zo ding a, Israel sehli suah sehkhat a mal sim zo ding ahi hiam? Mi thumanpa’ sihna bangin hong si sak in la, ka mailam thu ama’ aa bang hi sak in!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Kei bang hong cih na hi hiam? Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam hi, en in, bangmah na hih kei a, amaute thupha na pia zawsop hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Topa in ka gen dingin ka kam sungah hong guan thu, don lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin Balak in ama kiangah, “Amaute na muh theih nading mun dangah kei hong zui in; amaute a madawk teng bek na mu ding a, a vekpi-in na mu kei ding hi; tua ciangin tua lai panin amaute nong samsiat sak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Zofim gamlak, Pisgah mual dawnah amah paipihin, biakna tau sagih bawl a, biakna tau simah bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat ciat a pia hi.
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hua lamah Topa tawh ka va kituah kalun na meihal biakna gei hih lai-ah na ding in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Balaam na dawn a, ama kam sungah thu guangin, “Balak kiangah ciahkik in la, hih bangin thu na gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ama kiangah a pai ciangin a meihal biakna gei-ah amah na ding a, Moab uliante tawh na om uh hi. Balak in ama kiangah, “Topa in bang hong gen ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in a thugen ding teng genin, “Balak aw, tho in la, za in; Zippor’ tapa aw, ka thu ngai in:
A zuau dingin Pasian in mihing hi lo hi, a kisik dingin mihing’ tapa hi lo hi. Amah in ci khin hi, amah in hih lo ding ahi hiam? Amah in gen khin hi, amah in tangtungsak lo ding ahi hiam?
En in, thupha piak ding thu ka ngah hi; amah in thupha pia khin hi, keimah in ka khelkik thei kei hi.
Amah in Jakob mite sungah mawhna mu lo hi; amah in Israel mite sungah zong gamtat siatna mu lo hi. Topa amau’ Pasian in amaute tawh om a, kumpipa phatna awging amaute’ lakah om hi.
Pasian in Izipt panin amaute paikhiatpih hi; amaute in gamsial tha bang hatna nei uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob mite a kibum nading om lo a, Israel mite lang khatah aisaanna ding om lo hi; tu-in Jakob suan Israel mite thu tawh kisai-in, ‘Pasian in bang hih hiam!’ kici ding hi.
En un, hua mite! Humpinelkaipi bangin tho toin, humpinelkaipa bangin kaang to hi; a an a nek mateng, a matte’ si a dawn mateng, lumsuk lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute samsia peuhmah kei in la, thupha zong pia peuhmah kei in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “‘Topa’ cih khempeuh keimah in ka hih ding hi,’ hong ci hilo ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Tu-in hong pai in, mun dangah kong paipih ding hi; tua lai panin amaute nong samsiat sakna ding Pasian in hong lungkimpih kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Balak in sehnel gam a kimuh sukna Peor mual dawnah Balaam paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kei adingin biakna tau sagih hong bawlsak in la, bawngtal sagih leh tuutal sagih hih lai-ah hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Balaam’ cih bangin Balak in hih a, biakna tau simah bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat ciat pia hi.
Israel thupha piak ding in Topa lungkimsak ahihna Balaam in a muh ciangin, a hun danga bangin kihilna lim mu dingin pai lo a, a maitang gamlak lam ngat hi.
Balaam khua dak a, a nam-namin Israelte giahphual sat a mu hi. Pasian’ Kha ama tungah hong tung a,
amah in a thugen ding teng genin, “Beor’ tapa Balaam’ thugen, a mit in khua a mu thei mipa’ thugen,
Pasian’ thute a za, Vanglianpa’ mangmuhna a mu, mang mu napi-in a mit in khua a mu thei mipa’ thugen in:
Jakob mite aw, na puanbukte uh bangzahin hoih ahi hiam, Israel mite aw, na giahphual uh bangzahin hoih ahi hiah?
Saupi a kiphah kuamte tawh kibang a, gun gei-a om huante tawh kibang hi, Topa in a suan aloes paknamtui kungte tawh kibang a, tui gei-a om taamtaak kungte tawh kibang hi.
A phelkhaite panin tui luang ding a, a khaici in tui tampite ngahin, a kumpipa uh, Agag sangin sangzaw ding a, ama kumpigam kiliansak ding hi.

Pasian in Izipt panin amaute paikhiatpih a, amaute in gamsial tha bang hatna nei uh hi. Amaute in a gal uh ahi minamte ne tum ding uh a, amaute’ guh suzan gawp ding uh a, a thaltang uh tawh amaute kap let ding uh hi.

Amaute bok hi, humpinelkaipa bangin lumsuk uh hi, humpinelkaipi bangin lumsuk uh hi; kua in amaute phong ngam ding ahi hiam? Note thupha hong piate in thupha ngah hen la, note hong samsiate in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.

Balaam’ tungah Balak heh mahmah a, amah in a khut leh a khut a tuum hi; Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam hi, en in, nang in amaute thum vei tak thupha na pia khin zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na omna munah tai in; ‘Nang kong min liansak taktak ding hi,’ ka hong ci hi; ahih hangin na minliat nading panin Topa in nang hong khaktan hi,” a ci hi.
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Kei kiangah nong sawl na kamtaite kiangah

‘Balak in kham leh ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hita leh zong, Topa’ thu banah keima thu-in a pha bawl ding ahi a, a sia bawl ding ahi zongin, ka hih thei kei hi; Topa’ gente bek keimah in ka gen ding hi,’ ci-in gen hilo ka hi hiam?
Tu-in, en in, ka mite kiangah ka pai ding hi; hong pai in, nidang ciangin hih mite in na mite tungah a bawl dingte kong thei sak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen ding teng genin, “Beor’ tapa Balaam’ thugen, a mit in khua a mu thei mipa’ thugen,
Pasian’ thute a za, Sang Penpa’ thutheihna a thei, Vanglianpa’ mangmuhna a mu, mang mu napi-in a mit in khua a mu thei mipa’ thugen in:

Amah ka mu hi, ahih hangin tu hun hi lo hi; amah ka en hi, ahih hangin a hun nai nai lo hi: Jakob sung pan aksi khat hong suakkhia ding a, Israel sung pan kumpi ciangkhut khat hong piang ding hi; tua in Moab’ taltang sat kham ding a, Sheth’ suante khempeuh sugawp ding hi.
Israel hang takin a om sungin, Edomte kisuankhia ding hi, A galte ahi Sheir zong, kisuankhia ding hi.
Jakob tawh ukna na kisem ding a, khuapi sunga a suaktate kisusia ding!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Amalek enin, ama thu gen ding teng genin, “Amalek in minamte lakah a masa pen hi a, ahih hangin a tawpna ah siatna a tuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Ken mite enin, ama thugen ding teng genin, “Na omna mun kho a, suangpi sungah na bu kibawl hi;
Ahih hangin Kain bei ding hi. Ashur in galmatin nang bang tan vei hong nei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen ding teng genin, “Ala, Pasian in hihte ahih ciangin kua nungta zo ding ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin Kittim panin teembawte hong pai-in Ashur leh Eber gimsak ding hi; amah in zong siatna tuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam ding-in ama gamah ciahkik hi; Balak zong a ciah hi.
Shittim ah Israel mite a om lai takin mite in Moab tanute tawh paktat ding kipan uh hi.
Hih mite in amau’ pasian biak piakna ah mite sam uh a, mite in ne-in, amau’ pasiante’ mai-ah kun uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Peor-a Baal tawh Israel mite va kizom tawm hi. Israel tungah Topa heh mahmah hi;
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Israel mite tung panin Topa’ hehna a kihtakhuai a kipelh theih nadingin mite’ ukpite khempeuh man in la, Topa mai-ah suntangin amaute khai in,” a ci hi.
Moses in Israel thukhente kiangah, “Note khempeuh in Peor-a Baal tawh a va kizom tawm na mite khempeuh uh na that ciat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
En in, kikhopna buk kongah amaute kapin a om laitak, Moses’ muhna leh Israel mihon buppi’ muhna ah Israel mite khat hong pai-in Midian numei khat ama innkuanpihte kiangah hong ciahpih hi.
Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar, Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in a muh ciangin ding-in mihonte nusia a, a khutah teipi khat tawi-in
Israel mipa inndei sungah zui a, Israel mipa leh a numei, a numei’ pumpi pailetin a nihin sun khawm hi. Tua bangin Israel mite sung panin gimna dai hi.
Ahih zongin tua gimna tawh a si mite tul sawmnih leh tulli ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar, Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in Israel mite tungah ka hehna damsak kik hi; keima pammaihsak bangin amah in pammaih sa a, tua ahih ciangin pammaih ka sakna tawh Israel mite ka beisak kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, ‘En in, ka thuciam ahi nopsakna amah ka pia hi;

ama tung leh ama khit-a a suan leh khakte tungah tawntung siampi hihna thuciamna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama Pasian’ ading amah in pammaih sak sak a, Israel mite ading kilemna bawl sak hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Midian numei tawh a kithat khawm, Israel mi a kithatpa’ min in Simeon mite sung panin a beh lutang Salu’ tapa Zimri ahi hi.
Midian numei a kithatnu’ min in Midian innkuan sungah a beh lutang ahi Zur’ tanu Kozbi ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
”Midian mite gimsak gawp in la, amaute vat gawp in;

bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a khel pilna uh tawh note hong gimsak gawp uh a, Peor tawh kisai thu leh Peor hangin gimna ni-in a kithat, amau’ sanggamnu, Midian uliante tanu Kozbi thu-ah note hong khem uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua gimna khit ciangin Topa in Moses tung leh siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar tungah
“Israel mi honte khempeuh kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah, a beh beh-in, Israel sung panin galdo dingin a kuan khia thei ding khempeuh sim in,” a ci hi.
Moses leh siampi Eleazar in Jerikho nai, Jordan kiang, Moab leizangah amaute tungah thu gen a,
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, “Kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah peuhmah mi sim un,” a ci hi. Izipt gam panin a paikhia Israel mite in:
Israel’ tacil Reuben ahi hi; Reuben’ tapate in: Honak pan Hanok behte ahi uh hi; Pallu pan Pallu behte ahi uh hi;
Hezron pan Hezron behte ahi uh hi; Karmi pan Karmi behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Reubente beh ahi uh hi; amau mi tul sawmli leh tulthum leh za sagih leh sawmthum pha hi.
Pallu’ tapate in: Eliab ahi hi.

Eliab’ tapate in: Nemuel, Dathan, leh Abiram ahi uh hi. Hih Dathan leh Abiramte in, mihonte lak panin pawl a kai, amaute in Topa’ thu a seel lai-in Korah tawh kipawlin Moses leh Aaron’ thu a seelte ahi uh hi,
mei in mihing zanih leh sawmnga a kat tum lai-in lei in a kam ka-in Korah tawh amaute valh tum a, amau pawl teng si uh hi; amaute pen hilhkholhna a suak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Korah’ tapate si lo uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Simeon minamte in: Nemuel pan Nemuel behte ahi uh hi; Jamin pan Jamin behte ahi uh hi; Jakhin pan Jakhin behte ahi uh hi;
Zerah pan Zerah behte ahi uh hi; Shawl pan Shawl behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Simeon minam hi uh a, tul sawmnih leh tulnih leh za nih ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Gad minamte in: Zefon pan Zefon behte ahi hi; Haggi pan Haggi behte ahi uh hi; Shuni pan Shuni behte ahi uh hi;
Ozni pan Ozni behte ahi uh hi; Eri pan Eri behte ahi uh hi;
Arod pan Arod behte ahi uh hi; Areli pan Areli behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau mi phazah tawh kizui-in Gad minamte hi a, tul sawmli leh zanga ahi hi.
Judah’ tapate in Er leh Onan ahi hi; Kanaan gamah Er leh Onan si uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Judah minamte in: Shelah pan Shelah behte ahi uh hi; Perez pan Perez behte ahi uh hi; Zerah pan Zerah behte ahi uh hi.
Perez mite; Hezron pan Hezron behte ahi uh hi; Hamul pan Hamul behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau mi phazah tawh kizui-in Judah’ minamte hi a, tul sawmsagih leh tulguk leh zanga ahi uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Issakhar minamte in: Tola pan Tola behte ahi uh hi; Puvah pan Puvah behte ahi uh hi;
Jashub pan Jashub behte ahi uh hi; Shimron an Shimron behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau mi phazah tawh kizui-in Issakhar minamte hi a, tul sawmguk leh tulli leh zathum ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Zebulun minamte in: Sered pan Sered behte ahi uh hi; Elon pan Elon behte ahi uh hi; Jahle-el pan Jahle-le behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau mi phazah tawh kizui-in Zebulun minamte hi a, tul sawmguk leh zanga ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Josef minamte in: Manasseh leh Efraim ahi uh hi.
Manasseh minamte in: Makhir pan Makhir behte ahi uh hi; Makhir in Gilead’ pa ahi hi; Gilead pan Gilead behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Gilead’ tapate ahi uh hi: Iezer pan Iezer behte ahi uh hi; Helek pan Helek behte ahi uh hi;
Asriel pan Asriel behte ahi uh hi; Shekhem pan Shekhem behte ahi uh hi;
Shemida pan Shemida behte ahi uh hi; Hefer pan Hefer behte ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Hefer’ tapa Zelofehad in tapa nei lo a, ahih hangin tanu nei hi: Zelofehad’ tanute’ minte in Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah leh Tirzah ahi hi.
Hihte in Manasseh minamte ahi hi; amau mi a phazah in tul sawmnga leh tulnih leh za sagih ahi hi.
Hihte in amau’ behbehin Efraim minamte ahi uh hi; Shuthelah pan Shuthelah behte ahi uh hi; Bekher pan Bekher behte ahi uh hi; Tahan pan Tahan behte ahi uh hi.
Hih in Shuthelah minamte ahi uh hi: Eran pan Eran behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau mi phazah tawh kizui-in Efraim minamte hi a, tul sawmthum leh tulnih leh za nga ahi hi. Hihte in amau’ behbehin Josef minamte ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Benjamin minamte in: Bela pan Bela behte ahi uh hi; Ashbel pan Ashbel behte ahi uh hi; Ahiram pan Ahiram behte ahi uh hi;
Shefufam pan Shefufam behte ahi uh hi; Hufam pan Hufam behte ahi uh hi.
Bela’ tapate in Ard leh Na-aman ahi uh hi: Ard pan Ard behte ahi uh hi; Na-aman pan Na-aman behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau’ behbehin Benjamin minamte ahi hi; amah mi a phazah in tul sawmli leh tulnga leh za guk ahi hi.
Hihte in amau’ behbehin Dan minamte ahi hi: Shuham pan Shuham behte ahi uh hi. Hihte in amau’ behbehin Dan minamte ahi uh hi.
Amau mi a phazah tawh kizui-in Shuham minamte khempeuh in tul sawmguk leh tulli leh zali ahi hi.
Amau’ beh behin Asher minamte in: Imnah pan Imnah behte ahi uh hi; Ishvi pan Ishvi behte ahi uh hi; Beriah pan Beriah behte ahi uh hi.
Beriah minamte in: Heber pan Heber behte ahi uh hi; Malkhiel pan Malkhiel behte ahi uh hi.
Asher’ tanu’ min in Serah ahi hi.
Hihte in amau mi a phazah tawh kizui-in Asher minamte hi a, tul sawmnga leh tulthum leh zali ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Naftali minamte in: Jahze-el pan Jahze-el behte ahi uh hi; Guni pan Guni behte ahi uh hi;
Jezer pan Jezer behte ahi uh hi; Shillem pan Shillem behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau’ beh beh-in Naftali minamte ahi hi, amau mi a phazah in tul sawmli leh tul nga leh zali ahi hi.
Hih in Israel mi a phazah hi a, tul zaguk leh tulkhat leh za sagih leh sawmthum ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Min a phazah tawh kizui-in hih mite tungah luah dingin leitang kihawm ding hi.
Minam a tamte tungah gamh a tam na pia ding a, minam tawmte tungah gamh a tawm na pia ding hi; minam khempeuh a mi phazah tawh kizui-in gamh kipia ding hi.
Ahih hangin leitang pen aisaanna tawh kihawm ding hi; amau’ beh min tawh kizui-in amaute in luah ding uh hi.
Aisaanna tawh kizui-in a tam a tawmte a gamh uh kihawmsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in amau’ behbeh-in a kisim Levi minamte ahi uh hi: Gershon pan Gershon behte ahi uh hi; Kohath pan Kohath behte ahi uh hi; Merari pan Merari behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Levi minamte ahi uh hi: Libni behte, Hebron behte, Mahli behte, Mushi behte leh Korah behte ahi uh hi. Kohath in Amram’ pa ahi hi.
Amram’ zi a min in Levi sung pan Izipt gamah a suak ahi Levi’ tanu Jokhebed ahi hi; tua nu in Amram tawh Aaron leh Moses leh a sanggamnu uh Miriam nei hi.
Aaron in ta Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar nei hi.
Ahih hangin Nabad leh Abihu pen amaute in Topa mai-ah mei siangtho lo a piak lai-un si uh hi.

Pasal peuhmah kha khat pan a tungsiah, amau sung pan a kisimte in tul sawmnih leh tulthum ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite lakah amaute gamh kipia lo ahih manin Israel mite lakah amaute kisim khawm lo hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Israel mite a sim Moses leh siampi Eleazer mah in a sim mite in hihte ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sinai gam lakah Israel mite a sim Moses leh siampi Aaron in a simte lakah hihte khat zong kihel lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amaute thu a genna ah, “Amaute gam lakah si ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb leh Nun’ tapa Joshua lo buang amaute khat beek om nawn lo hi.

Tua ciangin Josef tapa sung panin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, Makhir’ tapa Gilead, Gilead’ tapa Hefer, Hefer’ tapa Zelofehad, Zelofehad’ tanute a nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Ama tanute’ minte in: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah, leh Tirzah ahi hi.
Amaute, Moses mai leh siampi Eleazer mai leh makaite mai leh mihonte khempeuh mai, kikhopna buk kongah ding uh a,
“Ka pa uh gam lakah a si hi; Korah tawh kipawlin Topa’ langah a kikaikhawm tawm mihonte lakah amah kihel lo hi; ahih hangin ama khialhna hangin si hi; amah in tapa nei lo hi.
Amah in tapa a neih loh man bekin bang hangin a beh sung panin ka pa uh min mangthang ding ahi hiam? Ka pa uh’ sanggamte lakah kote neihsa hong pia un,” a ci uh hi.
Moses inTopa mai-ah amau’ thu gen hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Zelofehad’ tanute’ a thugen man hi; amau pa’ sanggamte lakah gamh neihsa amaute tungah na pia ding a, amau’ pa gamh amaute tungah na tung sak ding hi.
Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Pasal khat si-in, tapa a neih kei leh, a tanu ama gamh na luah sak ding uh hi.
Amah in tanu a neih kei leh, ama gamh a sanggam pasalte tungah na tung sak ding uh hi.
Amah in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama pa’ sanggam pasalte tungah na pia ding uh hi.

Ama pa in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama innkuan tawh a kinai ama behpa’ tungah na pia ding a, amah in tang ding hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin hih in Israel mite tungah thukham leh ngeina kip hi ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Hih Abarim mual tungah paito in la, Israel mite tungah ka piak leitang en in.
Na muh khit ciangin na sanggampa Aaron mah bangin nang zong na mite kiangah hong kigawm ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh
mi honpite a kitot lai-un tui phual-ah keimah sian’thosak ding hunin Zin gam lakah keima thu nong lehpan’ hi,” a ci hi. (Hihte in Zin gamlak, Kadesh gam Meribath tui-a thu piangte ahi hi.)
Moses in Topa kiangah,

16-17 “Topa’ mihonte a cing nei lo tuute a bat loh nadingin amaute’ mai-ah pai khia-in amaute mai-ah a tum ding, amaute paikhiatpihin amaute a ciahpih ding, mihonte a uk dingin, Topa, mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian ahi nangmah in mi khat seh in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Nun’ tapa Joshua, siamna a nei mipa la in la, ama tungah na khut nga in;
siampi Eleazar leh mihon khempeuh mai-ah amah na ding sak ding a, amaute’ muhna ah amah za na pia ding hi.
Israel mihon khempeuh in ama thu a man’ theih nadingin thuneihna pawl khat amah na guan ding hi.

Siampi Eleazar’ mai-ah amah ding ding a, amah in Topa mai-ah Urim thukhenna tawh thu dotsak ding hi; amah leh amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh, mihon buppi, ama thu tawh pusuak ding uh a, ama thu mah tawh sungtum ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses gamta hi; amah in Joshua la-in siampi Eleazar leh mihon buppi mai-ah dingsak a,
amah in ama tungah a khutte nga-in, Topa in Moses’ tungah a gen bangin amah za pia hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite thu pia in la, amaute tungah, ‘Keimah biakna, mei tawh kihal keimah hong kibiakna an, a gim namtui keima aa, a hunin kei tungah nong piak ding uh phawk un,’ ci-in gen in.
Amaute tung a, hih in Topa tungah na piak ding uh mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi; a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno nih, tatsat loin biak piakna-in ni simin na pia ding uh hi.
Tuuno khat zingsangin na pia ding uh a, tuuno khat pen nitakin na pia ding uh hi;
an tawh biakna-in a kisatzan sathau thawl khat sehli suah sehkhat tawh a kibawl annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehkhat zong na pia ding uh hi.
Tua in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, a gim namtui dingin Sinai Mual ah a kikipsak, a kitatsat lo meihal biakna ahi hi.
Leenggahzu tawh a biakna pen tuuno khat ciangin thawl khat sehli suah sehkhat hi ding hi; Topa’ tungah leenggahzucil tawh biakna pen siangtho munah na sung ding uh hi.
A tuuno khat nitakin na pia ding uh hi; zingsang a, an tawh biakna leh a leenggahzu tawh biakna mah bangin, mei tawh kihal biakna, Topa tungah a gim namtui-in na pia ding uh hi.
“Sabbath ni-in a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno nih leh an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel seu khat sehsawm suah sehnih leh a leenggahzu tawh biakna hi ding hi:
hih in, tatsat loin meihal biakna leh a leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah sabbath simin meihal biakna ahi hi.
“Kha simin a ni masa ni-in Topa tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi: bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat; a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi;

bawngtal khat ciangin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel seu sehsawm suah sehthum zong hi ding hi; a tuutal khat ciangin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel sehsawm suah sehnih hi ding hi;
tuuno khat adingin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel sehsawm suah sehkhat ciat hi ding hi; a gim namtui meihal biakna, Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ding ahi hi.

Leenggahzu tawh a biaknate in, bawngtal khat ciangin leenggahzu thawl lang, tuutal khat ciangin leenggahzu thawl khat sehthum suah sehkhat tuuno khat ciangin leenggahzu thawl khat sehli suah sehkhat hi ding hi; hih in kum khat sunga om kha simin meihal biakna ahi hi.
Topa tungah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi; tua pen a kitatsat loin meihal biakna leh a leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah kipia ding hi.
“Kha masa a nisawm leh nili ni in Topa’ Paisan Pawi ni ahi hi.
Tua kha a ni sawm leh ni nga ni in pawi ni ahi hi; ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum kine ding hi.
A ni masa ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat om ding hi: leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,
mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna Topa tungah na pia ding uh hi: bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi; tuate a sit bang lo a hih ding thei ta un;
sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi; bawngtal khat ciangin seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum, leh tuutal khat ciangin seu khat sehsawm suah sehnih na pia ding uh hi;
tuuno sagihte khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehkhat mah na pia ding uh hi;
note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
Meihal biak nading ahi zingsanga meihal biakna banah tatsat lo-a biakna-in hihte na pia ding uh hi.

Tua mah bangin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna ahi, Topa tungah a gim namtui, ni sagih sung ni simin na pia ding uh hi; tua pen a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah kipia ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi; leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
“Na nipi-kal pawi hunun Topa tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi; leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,
meihal biakna, Topa tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uh hi: bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi;
sathau tawh a kibawl ahi an tawh a biak nadingin zong, bawngtal khat ciangin seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum, tuutal khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehnih,
tuuno sagihte khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehkhat na pia ding uh hi;
note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin keel a pa khat zong na pia ding uh hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biaknate banah tuate leh leenggahzu tawh a biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tuate a sit bang lo a hih ding thei ta un.
“A kha sagihna a ni masa ni-in kikhopna siangtho khat na nei ding uh hi; leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note in peengkul na tum ni ding uh hi a,
meihal biakna, Topa tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uh hi: bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi;
bawngtal tawh piak dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh a biaknate seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum, tuutal tawh sehsawm suah sehnih,
leh tuuno sagihte khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehkhat hi ding hi;
note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi;

a khasim meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna, leh a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna, leh tuate ading ngeina a om bangin a gim namtui, Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah hi ding hi.
“Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, nomau na kigawt tawm ding uh hi; na na sem kei ding uh a,
Topa tungah a gim namtui meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi: bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi; tuate in note’ muhna ah a sit bang lo hi ding hi;
sathau tawh a kibawl annel tawh a biaknate in, bawngtal tawh piak dingin seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum, a tuutal tawh sehsawm suah sehnih,
tuuno sagihte khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehkhat hi ding hi:
kilem nadingin khialhna hanga biakna leh a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A kha sagihna ni sawm leh ni nga ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi; leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, Topa adingin ni sagih sung pawi na kham ding uh hi;
meihal biakna, Topa tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, bawngtalno sawm-le-thum, tuutal nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li na pia ding uh hi; tuate a sit bang lo hi ding hi:
sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh a biaknate in, bawngtal sawm-le-thumte khat ciangin seu khat sehsawm suah sehthum, tuutal nihte khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehnih,
leh tuuno sawm-le-lite khat ciangin sehsawm suah sehkhat hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni nih ni-in bawngtalno sawm-le-nih, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, leh tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni thum ni-in bawngtal sawm-le-khat, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, leh tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni li ni-in bawngtal sawm, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, leh tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh a biakna, leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni nga ni-in bawngtal kua, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni guk ni-in bawngtal giat, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, leh tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh a biakna, leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni sagih ni-in bawngtal sagih, tuutal nih, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-li,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte, leh tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate zong hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh a biakna, leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni giat ni-in a zahtakhuai kikhopna na nei ding uh hi; leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi,
meihal biakna, mei tawh kihal biakna, Topa tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uh hi: bawngtal khat, tuutal khat, a sit bang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih,
leh ngeina kip om bangin bawngtal, tuutal, leh tuunote a phazah tawh kizui-in piak khawm dingin an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate hi ding hi;
a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.

“Na thuciam biak piakna uh leh ut thu-a na biak piaknate uh banah na meihal biaknate, leh an tawh na biaknate, leh leenggahzu tawh na biaknate, leh thunuam-a na biak nadingun a kiseh na pawi hunte uhah hihte Topa’ tungah na pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin Moses in Israel mite tungah a thu a kimin a gen hi.
Moses in Israel minam lutangte tungah, “Hih in Topa’ thupiak ahi hi.

Mi khat in Topa tungah thuciamna a ciam ciang ahi a, amah in a zuih dingin kiciamna a bawl ciang ahi zongin, amah ciampel lo ding hi; ama kam sung panin a gingkhiate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gamta ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh, numei khat in Topa tungah thuciamna bawlin, a pa’ inn sungah nungakin a om sungin kamciamna tawh amah kikhih tawm a,
amah in a zuih dingin thuciamna leh kamciamnate a pa in za napi-in ama tungah bangmah a cih kei leh, ama thuciamna khempeuh kip ding a, amah kikhih tawmna kamciamna khempeuh kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin a pa in a zak ni-in a lungkim lohna tua nu’ tungah a gen leh, tua nu’ thuciamna, amah a kikhih tawmna kamciamnate khat zong kip lo ding hi; a pa in nial ahih manin Topa in tua nu a maisak ding hi.
Tua numei, pasalkhat tawh kiteng a, amah a kikhih tawmna thuciamna ahi a, ngaihsun lopi-in a kam paunate ahi zongin
a pasal in za a, a zak ni-in tua nu’ tungah bangmah a cih kei leh tua numei’ thuciamna kip ding a, amah a kikhih tawmna a kamciam kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin, a pasal in tua thu a zak ni-in a lungkim lohna a gen leh, amah a kikhih tawmna ahi numei’ tunga om kamciamna leh ngaihsun lopi-in a kam paunate amah in phiatsak ding hi; Topa in tua nu maisak ding hi.
Ahih hangin meigong numei’ thuciamna ahi a, a kima numei’ aa ahi zongin, amah a kikhih tawmna peuhmah ama tungah kip ding hi.
Amah in pasal’ inn sungah thuciam ahi a, kiciamna khat tawh kam ciamin amah a kikhih tawmna ahi zongin,
a pasal in za a, tua nu’ tungah bangmah ci loin, a nial kei leh, ama thuciamna khempeuh kip ding a, amah a kikhih tawmna kamciamna khempeuh zong kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin a pasal in tua thute a zak ni-in a phiatsak leh, ama thuciamna tawh kisai-in a kam pana a gingkhia peuhmah ahi a, amahmah a kamciamna tawh kisaite ahi zongin kip lo ding hi: a pasal in tuate phiatsak ahih manin Topa in tua nu maisak ding hi.
Thuciamna khatpeuh ahi a, amah a kigawt tawm nadingin a kikhihna kamciam khatpeuh ahi zongin, a pasal in kipsak thei, a pasal in phiatsak thei hi.

Ahih hangin a pasal in tua ni-a kipanin tua nu’ tungah bangmah a cih kei leh, amah in tua nu’ tunga om a thuciam khempeuh hita leh a kamciam khempeuh hita leh a kipsak ahi hi; amah in tuate a zak ni-in ama tungah bangmah ci lo ahih manin tuate a kipsak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tuate a zak khit ciangin a nung phiat leh, amah in tua nu’ mawhna pua ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in, pasal leh a zi, leh a pa inn sungah nungakin a om lai takin a pa leh a tanu kikalah a om, Topa in Moses a thupiak ngeinate ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite’ phu Midiante tungah la in; tua khit ciangin na mite kiangah nang hong kigawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in mite kiangah, “Midian tungah Topa’ phulakna a sem ding, Midiante a do dingin note lak panin mi pawl khat galhiam guan un.
Israel minamte nam khat panin tul khat ciat gal sungah na kuansak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel tul tampi sung pan minam khatah tul khat, tulsawm leh tulnih galdo dingin galhiam kiguan hi.
Moses in amaute’ minam khat panin tul khat ciat leh biakinn nate leh pataukoh nadingin peengkulte siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas kengsakin gal sungah kuansak khawm hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Midiante do uh a, pasal khempeuh that uh hi.
Amaute in midangte leh Midian kumpite a thatna uhah Midian kumpi ngate Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur leh Reba that uh hi; amaute in Beor’ tapa Balaam zong namsau tawh that uh hi.
Israel mite in Midian nupite leh a tate uh man uh hi; amaute in a bawngte, a tuuhonte khempeuh leh a na khempeuh uh laksak uh hi.
Amau’ ten’na a khuapite khempeuh uh leh a giahphual khempeuhte uh mei tawh halsak uh a,
a matsa khempeuh uh, mihing ganhing ciahpih khin uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jerikho nai, Jordan kiang, Moab leizang a, a giahphual uh Moses leh siampi Eleazar leh Israel mihonte kiangah a galmatte uh leh a na matte uh tun’pih uh hi.
Moses leh siampi Eleazar leh mihon makaite khempeuh giahphual pua-ah a dawn dingin paikhia uh hi.
Galdona panin a hong ciah mi tul tampi a ukte leh mi za tampi a uk galkap uliante tungah Moses heh hi.
Moses in amaute tungah, “Numei khempeuh hing khawi na hi uh hiam?
En un, hihte in Balaam’ lamlahna tawh Peor ah Topa tungah Israel mite zuautat sak hi, tua ahih manin Topa’ mihonpite lakah gimna hong tung hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, naupangte lakah pasal peuhmah that un la, lupkhopna tawh pasal a theisa numei peuhmah that un.
Ahih hangin lupkhopna tawh pasal a thei nai lo nungaknote khempeuh note adingin kem un.
Giahphual pua-ah ni sagih sung om un; note lakah mi khatpeuh peuh a thatte leh a kithatsa a lawng peuhmahte in, ni thum ni leh ni sagih ni-in note leh na galmatte uh na kisian’ suah ding uh hi.
Puan khempeuh, savun tawh a kibawl na khempeuh, keel mul tawh a kibawl na khempeuh, leh sing tawh a kibawl na khempeuh na sian’suah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi Eleazar in galdona ah a kuan galkapte tungah: “Topa in Moses a thupiak thukham ngeina in hih ahi hi:
kham, ngun, sumngo, sik, dal, leh haknaw,
mei a do zo peuhmahte bek mei-ah na hal ding uh a, a siang hi ding hi. Ahi zongin nitna sian’suahna tui tawh kisian’suah lai ding hi; mei a do zo lo peuhmahte, tui-ah na sawp ding uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in na puante uh na sawp ding uh a, note na siangtho ding uh hi; tua khit ciangin giahphual ah nong ciah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Nang leh siampi Eleazar leh mihonte’ beh lutangte in gal sunga a kiman mihing leh ganhingte sim un;
galdo dingin a kuankhia galhangte leh mihonte khempeuh tungah gal sunga a kimante khennih suahin a kikimin hawm sak in.
Galdo dingin a kuankhia galkapte’ tung panin mite, bawngtalte, late, leh tuuhonte za nga ciangin Topa’ siah dingin khat ciat la in;
a lang a ngah sung panun la in la, Topa tungah biakna-in siampi Eleazar tungah pia in.
A lang Israel mite in a ngah sung panin mite, bawngtalte, late, tuuhonte, ganhing khempeuh, sawmnga ciangin khat ciat la in la, Topa biakbuk a kem Levi mite tungah pia in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Moses leh siampi Eleazar in hih uh hi.
Tu-in galkapte in a lak gal sunga a mat uh a om lai a kihawm dingte in: tuu tul zaguk leh tul sawmsagih leh tulnga,
bawng tul sawmsagih leh tulnih,
la tul sawmguk leh tul khat,
leh lupkhopna tawh pasal a thei nailo numei a vekpi-in mi tul sawmthum leh tulnih ahi hi.
A lang ahi, gal sunga a kuankhia mite’ ngah in tuu tul za thum leh tul sawmthum leh tul sagih leh za nga hi a,
Topa’ tuu-siah pen tuu za guk leh sawmsagih leh nga ahi hi.
Bawngte tul sawmthum leh tulguk hi a, tua sung panin Topa’ siah sawmsagih leh nih ahi hi.
Late tul sawmthum leh za nga hi a, tua sung panin Topa’ siah sawmguk leh khat ahi hi.
Mi tul sawm leh tulguk hi a, tua sung panin Topa’ siah mi sawmthum leh nih ahi hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, Moses in siampi Eleazar tungah Topa biak nading siah pia hi.
Galdo dingin a kuankhia mite tung panin Moses in a khenkhiat, Israelte in a lang a ngah—
mihonte in a lang a ngah teng tuu tul za thum leh tul sawmthum leh tul sagih leh za nga,
bawng tul sawmthum leh tulguk,
la tul sawmthum leh za nga,
mi tul sawm leh tul guk ahi hi—
Moses in Israelte in a ngah a lang sung panin mihing leh ganhing sawmnga ciangin khat ciat la-in, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, Topa’ biakbuk a kem Levi mite’ tungah pia hi.
Tua ciangin galkap tul tampite tunga uliante ahi, tul tampi a ukte leh za tampi a ukte, Moses kiangah hong pai uh a,
Moses kiangah, “Kote’ ukna nuai-a a om galkapte, na nasem kote in ka sim khin uh a, kote kiang panin mi khat zong a peelhem om lo hi.

Kote in Topa mai-ah ko adingin kilemna bawl nadingin Topa biakna kham tawh a kibawl nate, banbuhte leh taute, min gelhna zungbuhte, bilbahte, leh khite ka muh ciat uh kong tun’ pih zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses leh siampi Eleazar in amaute tung panin na-a a kibawl khamte sang uh hi.
Tul tampi a ukte leh za tampi a ukte’ tung panin a kingah, Topa tungah biakna-in a piak uh khamte khempeuh in shekel tul sawm leh guk leh za sagih leh sawmnga pha hi.
(Gal sunga a kuan mite in amau ading ciat la uh hi).
Moses leh siampi Eleazar in tul tampi leh za tampite a uk mite tung panin khamte sang a, Israel mite adingin Topa mai-ah phawk tawntungna-in kikhopna buk sungah paipih hi.
Tu-in Reuben minamte leh Gad minamte in ganhing hon tampi nei uh hi; amaute in Jazer gam leh Gilead gam mu uh a, en in: a gam in gan gam ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte pai-in Moses leh siampi Eleazar leh mihon makaite kiangah,
“Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo, leh Beon,
Topa in Israel mihonte’ mai-ah a suksiat gamte in gan gam hi a; na nasem kote in gam ka nei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
“Note muhna ah maipha ka ngah uh leh, na nasemte in a neih dingin hih gam hong pia un; Jordan kantanin kote hong paipih kei un,” amaute in a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte tungah, “Note hih lai takah tu-tu in, na sanggamte uh gal sungah kuan ding ahi hiam?
Topa in amaute a piakna gamah a pai nading uhah Israel mite bang hangin lungkiasak ding na hi uh hiam?
Na pu na pate uh Kadesh-barnea panin gam vel dingin ka sawl lai-in zong tu-a mah a bang uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute Eshkol Kuamah paito-in tua gam a muh uh ciangin, Topa in amaute a piakna gamah a pai nading uhah Israel mite lung kiasak uh hi.
Tua ni-in Topa’ hehna so a, amah kiciamin,

‘Amaute in kei hong zui taktak lo uh ahih manin Izipt gam pan a paikhia mite kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah khat beek in Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakob tungah piak dinga ka ciamsa gam mu lo ding uh hi;
Kenaz mi Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb leh Nun’ tapa Joshua in Topa zui taktak uh ahih manin a mu ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.
Israel mite tungah Topa’ hehna so a, Topa’ muhna ah siatna a gamta tua khang mi khempeuh a bei mateng kum sawmli sung gam lakah amaute vak kawikawi sak hi.
