En un, Israel mite tungah Topa’ heh luatna a khangsak to lai dingin, khialhna’ tate, na pu na pate uh’ tangin hong khang na hi uh hiam!
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah zuihna panin note na pial uh leh amah in gam lakah amaute nusia kik ding hi; note pen hih mi khempeuh a susia na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ama kiang nai-ah hong pai-in, “Hih lai-ah ka tuute uh adingin tuu-khawkte bawlin, ka zi ka tate uh adingin khua ka sat ding uh a,

ahih hangin kote in hiam tawi-in amau’ munah Israel mite ka tun’pih mateng uh amau mai-ah a pai dingin ka kiging ding uh hi; tua kikal sungin hih gam sungah a teeng mite kiang pan kihut nadingin ka zi ka tate uh khuapi muanhuai sungah a na om ding uh kisam hi.
Israel mite in amau’ luah ding ciat a luah khit matengun ka inn uhah ka ciah kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Jordan gal khat leh tua ban siah-ah amaute tawh ka luah khawm kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jordan hih lam gal nisuahna lam ko’ luah hong suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute kiangah, “Note, tu-a bangin gamta-in, galdo dingin Topa mai-ah a pai dingin hiam la-in,
Topa in a mai panin a galte a hawlkhiat matengin hiam a tawi note khempeuh in ama mai-ah Jordan kantanin,
Topa mai-ah leitang a kilak matengin na om uh leh; note ciahkikin Topa leh Israel nasep ding uh panin na peng ding uh hi; hih leitang in Topa mai-ah note neihsa hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin note tua bangin na gamtat kei uh leh, en un, Topa’ tungah a khial khin na hi uh hi; na khialhna un note hong sulzuih ding thei tel ta un.
Na zi na tate uh adingin khuapite sat un la, na tuute uh adingin tuu-khawkte bawl un; na ciamsa bangun gamta un,” a ci hi.
Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa’ thupiak bangin na nasemte ka gamta ding uh hi.
Ka tate uh, ka zite uh, ka tuuhonte uh leh ka ganhing khempeuhte uh Gilead gam khuapite ah na om ding uh hi;
ka topa in na thupiak bangin na nasemte, galdo ding a, hiam tawi khempeuh, galdo dingin Topa mai-ah galkah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute’ thu tawh kisai-in siampi Eleazar tung leh Nun’ tapa Joshua tung leh Israel minam beh lutang khempeuh tungah thu pia hi.

Moses in amaute tungah, “Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte ahi, Topa mai-ah galdo dingin hiam a tawi khempeuh in note tawh Jordan kantanin note mai-ah tua gam a kizawh leh, Gilead gam a neih dingun amaute tungah na pia ding uh hi;
ahih hangin hiam tawi-in note tawh hong galkah kei uh leh zong, amaute in Kanaan gam sungah note lakah ngah a nei veve ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte in dawng uh a, “Na nasemte tungah Topa in a gensa bangin kote ka gamta ding uh hi.
Hiam tawi-in Topa mai-ah Kanaan gam sungah ka pai ding uh a, kote’ luah ahi ka neihsa uh Jordan gal khatah kote’ aa mahin na kip ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Moses in Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte leh Josef tapa Manasseh minam a langte tungah, Amor kumpi Sihon’ gam leh Bashan kumpi ahi Og’ gam, a leitang leh a khuapite a gam sung tawh, a gam sunga leitang tunga om khuapi khempeuh pia hi.
Gad minamte in khuapi muanhuai Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atoroth-shofan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Bethnimrah, Bethharan-te satin tuute adingin tuu-khawkte bawl uh hi.
Reuben minamte in Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, leh Baalmeon (a minte khel ding), leh Sibmah khuapite sat uh hi; amau’ satsa khuapite a min thak phuak uh hi.
Manasseh tapa ahi Makhirte beh, Gilead ah pai-in va la uh a, tua sunga om Amor mite suankhia uh hi.
Moses in Manasseh tapa Makhir-te beh tungah Gilead pia-in, tua lai-ah amaute teeng uh hi.
Manasseh minam sung panin Jair pai-in amau’ khua neute va la a, tuate Havvothjair phuak hi.
Nobah pai-in Kenath leh a khua neute va la a, ama min tamin Nobah phuak hi.
Hihte in Moses leh Aaron’ makaihna tawh Izipt gam panin a honin a paikhiat lai-un Israel mite’ giahphualte ahi hi.
Moses in Topa’ thupiakna tawh phual khat khit phual khat amau’ kipatna munte gelh hi; hihte in amau’ kipatna mun tawh kizui-in a giahphualte ahi hi.
A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni-in Remeses panin amaute ding khia uh hi; Paisan ni khat a zing ciangin Izipt mite khempeuh’ muhna ah gualzawhna tawh Israel mite paikhia uh a,
Topa in amaute lakah a thah lup tacil khempeuh Izipt mite in a vui laitak uh ahi hi; amau’ pasiante tungah zong Topa in thukhenna bawl hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Remeses panin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Sukkoth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sukkoth panin amaute ding khia uh a, gam monga om Etham ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Etham panin amaute ding khia uh a, Baalzefon nisuahna lama om Pihahiroth lamah kihei kik uh hi; amaute in Migdol mai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hahiroth mai panin amaute ding khia uh a, tuipi laizang kantanin gam lakah pai-in Etham gam lakah ni thum lam pai uh a, Marah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Marah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Elim tung uh hi; Elim ah cik tuikhuk sawm-le-nih leh nisuh kung sawmsagih om a, amaute in tua lai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Elim panin amaute ding khia uh a, San tuipi gei-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
San tuipi panin amaute ding khia uh a, Sin gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sin gamlak panin amaute ding khia uh a, Dofkah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dofkah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Alush ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Alush panin amaute ding khia uh a, mite’ dawn ding tui a om lohna Refidim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Refidim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Sinai gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sinai gamlak panin amaute ding khia uh a, Kibrothhattaavah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kibrothhattaavah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Hazeroth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hazeroth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rithmah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rithmah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rimmonperez ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rimmonperez panin amaute ding khia uh a, Libnah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Libnath panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rissah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rissah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Kehelathah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kehelathah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Shefer Mual ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Shefer Mual panin amaute ding khia uh a, Haradah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Haradah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Makheloth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Makheloth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Tahath ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tahath panin amaute ding khia uh a, Terah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Terah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Mithkah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Mithkah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Heshmonah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Heshmonah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Moseroth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Moseroth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Ben-ejaakan ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ben-ejaakan panin amaute ding khia uh a, Horhaggidgad ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Horhaggidgad panin amaute ding khia uh a, Jotbathah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Jotbathah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Abronah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Abronah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Ezion-geber ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ezion-geber panin amaute ding khia uh a, (Kadesh ahi) Zin gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kadesh panin amaute ding khia uh a, Edom gam mong Hor Mual-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Israel mite Izipt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kum sawmli-na a kha ngana a ni masa ni-in Topa’ thupiakna tawh Hor Mual tungah siampi Aaron paito-in tua lai-ah a si hi.
Hor Mual-ah Aaron a sihin kum za leh kum sawmnih leh kumthum a pha hi.
Kanaan gam sung Negeb gamah a teeng Kanaan mi Arad kumpipa in Israel mite’ hong paina thu za hi.
Hor Mual panin amaute ding khia uh a, Zalmonah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Zalmonah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Punon ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ponun panin amaute ding khia uh a, Oboth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Oboth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Moab gam sung ahi Iyeabarim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Iyim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Dibongad ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dibongad panin amaute ding khia uh a, Almondiblathaim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Almondiblathaim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Nebo tun’ ma Abarim mualte-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Abarim mualte panin amaute ding khia uh a, Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah giahphual sat uh hi;
Jordan kiang Bethjeshimoth panin Moab leizang sunga a om Abelshittim dongah amaute in giahphual sat uh hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in; Jerikho kantanin Kanaan gam na tun’ uh ciangin

note mai panin tua gama teeng mi khempeuh na hawlkhia ding uh a, amau’ suang milimte khempeuh susia-in, a kisung amau’ milimte khempeuh na susia ding uh a, mual tunga a biaknate khempeuh uh na sumang ding uh hi;
na neih dingun note tungah leitang hong pia khin ka hih manin note in leitang luahin tua tungah na teeng ding uh hi.

Note in na minam uh tawh kizui-in aisaanna tawh leitang na luah ding uh hi; minam tamte tungah luahna a tam na pia ding a, minam tawmte tungah luahna a tawm na pia ding hi; mi khatpeuh ading ai a phatna peuhpeuh ama’ aa hi ding hi; na pate uh nam tawh kizui-in na luah ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin note’ mai panin tua gam sunga teeng mite na hawlkhiat kei uh leh, na om sak laite uh note tungah na mittang uhah hong do, na pang uhah a hong sun lingte hong hi ding uh a, na ten’na gam uhah note hong gimsak ding uh hi.
Amaute tunga hih dinga ka ngaihsut bangin note tungah kong hih ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite thu pia in la, amaute tungah, Kanaan gamah na lut uh ciangin (hih in note’ luah dingin note hong kipia ding, Kanaan leitang a vekpi-in),
na leitaw lam pang uh in Zin gamlak panin Edom pang teng hi ding a, leitaw lam na gamgi uh nisuahna lamah Ci Tuipi mong pan kipan ding hi;
na gamgi uh Akrabbin mual leitaw lamah kawi-in Zin dong banin, Kadeshbarnea leitaw lamah pai ding hi; tua ciangin Hazaraddar lamah pai suakin Azmon dongah pai ding hi;
gamgi in Azmon panin Izipt Lui lamah kawi-in Tuipi ah tawp ding hi.
“Nitumna gamgi dingin Tuipi Lian leh a gei dung teng na nei ding uh hi; hih in nitumna lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Hih in leilu lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi: Tuipi Lian panin Hor Mual dongah lam na ciamteh ding uh hi;
Hor Mual panin Hamath tumna ciang dong na ciamteh ding uh a, gamgi in Zeadad dong ban ding hi;
tua ciangin Zifron dongah gamgi kikhung ding a, a mong in Hazarenan ah tawp ding hi; hih in leilu lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Nisuahna lam na gamgi uh Hazarenan panin Shefam dong na ciamteh ding uh hi;
gamgi in Shefam panin Ain nisuahna lam Riblah dongah paisuk ding hi; gamgi paisuk lai-in nisuahna lamah Khinnereth tuipi liangko dong ban ding hi;
Jordan dongah gamgi paisuk ding a, a mong in Ci Tuipi ah tawp ding hi. Hih in a kimkot-a gamgi a nei na leitang uh hi ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Moses in Israel mite thu pia-in, “Hih in minam kua leh minam langte tungah piak dingin Topa in a thupiak aisaana tawh na luah ding uh leitang ahi hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Reuben minamte a behbeh leh Gad minamte a behbehin amau’ luahna ngah khin zo uh a, Manasseh minam a langte in zong ngah khin zo hi;
minam nihte leh minam langte in nisuahna lam Jerikho nai Jordan gal khatah amau’ luahna ngah khin zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hihte in luah dingin note’ tungah gam a hawm ding mite’ min ahi hi; siampi Eleazar leh Nun’ tapa Joshua ahi uh hi.
Luah dingin gam a hawm dingin minam simah makai khat na la ding hi.
Hihte in tua mite’ min ahi hi; Judah minam sung panin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb ahi hi.
Simeon minam panin Ammihud’ tapa Shemuel ahi hi.
Benjamin minam panin Khislon’ tapa Elidad ahi hi.
Dan minam sung panin makai khat, Jogli’ tapa Bukki ahi hi.
Josef tapate sung pan: Manasseh minam sung panin makai khat, Efod’ tapa Hanniel ahi hi.
Efraim minam sung panin makai khat, Shiftan’ tapa Kemuel ahi hi.
Zebulun minam sung panin makai khat, Parnak’ tapa Elizafan ahi hi.
Issakhar minam sung panin makai khat, Azzan’ tapa Paltiel ahi hi.
Asher minam sung panin makai khat, Shelom’ tapa Ahihud ahi hi.
Naftali minam sung panin makai khat, Ammihud’ tapa Pedahel ahi hi.
Hihte in Kanaan gamah Israel mite adingin gamh a hawm dingin Topa in a thupiak mite ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Amaute in amau’ neih a luah uh sung panin ten’ nadingin Levi mite tungah khuapi a piak nadingun Israel mite thu pia in: khuapi kiim-a lonona gamte Levi mite tungah na pia ding hi.
Khuapite in amau’ ten’ nading hi ding a, a lonona gamte in amau bawngte leh a inn ganhingte leh a ganhing khempeuh’ ading ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak ding uh khuapi lonona gamte in khuapi kulh panin a kimkot tong tul ciang bang ding hi.

Khuapi pualam na teh ding a, nisuahna lam pang tong tulnih, leitaw lam pang tong tulnih, nitumna lam pang tong tulnih, leilu lam pang tong tulnih hi ding a, a laizangah khuapi om ding hi; hih in amau’ khuapite’ lonona taang gam dingin a neih ding uh ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapite in bukna khuapi gukte hi ding a, mi thatte tua lai-ah na taisak ding uh a, tuate banah khuapi sawmli leh nih na pia ding uh hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapi khempeuh in sawmli leh giat hi-in, a lonona gamte tawh hi ding hi.

Israel mite’ neihsa sung panin na piak ding khuapite in, minam tamte tung panin tam la-in, minam tawmte tung panin tawm na la ding hi; amau’ luah gamh tawh a kizui-in Levi mite tungah a khuapite uh pia ciat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Jordan kantanin Kanaan gamah na tun uh ciangin,
sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a that kha mi thatte a va tai theih nadingin note adingin bukna khuapi dingin khuapite na teel ding uh hi.
Thu kikhen dingin mi honpi mai-ah a din’ ma-in mi thatte a sih loh nadingin khuapite in phulapa’ kiang panin note’ adingin bukna hi ding hi.
Na piak uh khuapite in note’ bukna khuapi gukte hi ding hi.
Bukna khuapi dingin Jordan gal khatah khuapi thum, Kanaan gamah khuapi thum na pia ding uh hi.
Sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a that khate a tai theih nadingin hih khuapi gukte in Israel mite leh khual mite leh note lakah a peemte’ adingin bukna hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin amah in na-a kizang sik khat tawh amah satin amah a sih leh, amah in mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
Amah in, mi a sih theih nading mah ahi a khut sunga om suang khat tawh a suk a, a sih leh, amah mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh, amah in, mi a sih theih nading ahi a khut sunga om sing a kibawl hiam khat tawh amah a sat a, a sih leh, amah mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
A kinaipih pen khat in a phu la-in mi thatpa that ding hi; amah a tuah ciangin that ding hi.
Amah in muhdahna tawh sunin, ahih kei leh bukin a khawh a, a sih leh,
tua ahih kei leh galbawlna tawh a khut-in tumin a sih leh, tua a tumpa kithat ding hi; amah mi that ahi hi; a phulapa in a tuah ciangin tua mi thatpa that ding hi.
“Ahih hangin gal bawl lopi-in thakhatin amah sunin, ahih kei leh buk lopi-in na khatpeuh tawh amah khawh-in,
ahih kei leh, amah pen ama gal hilo, ama siatna ding a zong hilo napi-in, mi a sih theih nading suang khat zangin, a muh lopi-in amah in deng kha a, a sih leh,
mi thatpa leh a phulapa kikalah hih ngeina kipte tawh kizui-in mihonpi in khen ding hi;

a phulapa’ khut sung panin mihonpi in mi thatpa honkhia-in, mihonpi in amah a va taina, bukna khuapi ah amah puakkik ding a, sathau siangtho a kinilh siampi lianpa a sih matengin tua sungah a teeng ding hi.
Ahih hangin hun khatpeuh peuhah amah a taina bukna khuapi gamgi kheng in a pai a,
a phulapa in ama bukna khuapi daihual pua lamah amah mu-in, a phulapa in mi thatpa a thah leh, tua a thatpa mawh lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh siampi lianpa a sih matengin tua mipa a bukna khuapi sungah a om ding ahi hi; ahih hangin siampi lianpa a sih khit ciangin mi thatpa a neihsa leitangah ciahkik thei ding hi.
“Hihte in na ten’na khempeuh uhah na khang tawntungun thukham leh ngeina hi ding hi.
Khatpeuh in mi khat a thah leh, tecite’ genna siksanin mi thatpa kithat ding hi; ahih hangin teci khat bek’ teci pan’na siksanin kuamah kithat lo ding hi.
Tua tham loin, sihna thuak dingin a mawh mipa’ nuntakna tatna sum na sang kei ding uh hi; amah kithat ding hi.
Siampi lianpa a sih ma-in bukna khuapi ah a taisa mipa a gamah a ciahkik theih nadingin ama nuntakna tat nading sum na sang kei ding uh hi.

Na ten’na leitang uh na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi thahna in leitang ninsak a, a that mipa a kithah kei buang leh, tua mi kithahna leitang sian’sak nading thu dang om thei lo hi.
A laizangah keimah ka ten’na, note ten’na leitang na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa keimah in Israel mite laizangah ka teeng hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Josef tapate beh Manasseh, Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, Makhir’ tapa Gilead ahi Gilead’ tapate beh lutangte in hong naih-in Moses leh Israel mi beh lutang ahi makaite’ mai-ah thu gen uh a,

amaute in, “Israel mite tungah aisaanna tawh luah dingin leitang piak ding Topa in ka topa thu hong pia hi; ka sanggam uh Zelofehad’ luahnate a tanute tungah piak dingin Topa in ka topa thu hong pia hi.

Ahih hangin Israel sungah minam dangte’ tapate khatpeuh peuh tawh amaute kiteng leh a pate uh’ luahna panin amau aa teng kilakhia-in a manawh minamte tungah tua luahna kipia beh ding hi; tua ahih ciangin ko’ ngahsa luahna panin a kikhen khia ding ahi hi.
Israel mite’ jubili hong tun ciangin, amau’ aate pen a manawh minamte’ tungah kapia beh ding hi; ka pa uh namte’ luahna panin amau’ aa kikhenkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Topa genna tawh kizui-in Israel mite thu pia a, “Josef suan minamte’ genna man hi.
Hih in Zelofehad’ tanute tawh kisai-in Topa thupiak ahi hi; Amaute in hoih a sak pente uh tawh kiteng hen; ahih hangin amau’ behte bek ten’pih thei ding uh hi.
Israel mite’ gamhte minam khat pan namdang khatah paikhia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mi khempeuh a minam ciat uh tawh kip ding uh hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in a pate’ uh gamh a luah theih nadingun, Israel mite’ sung panin minam khat peuhpeuh ah gamh a nei tanu khempeuh in a pate’ nam sung khatpeuh peuh’ zi hi ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin minam khat pan a dangah gamh paikhia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite sung panin minam khempeuh amau’ gamh ciat tawh kip ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Zelofehad’ tanute gamta uh hi;
Bang hang hiam cih leh Zelofehad’ tanu Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milkah leh Noahte, a pate uh sanggamte’ tapate tawh kiteng uh hi.
Josef’ ta Manasseh’ tapate innkuan sungah amaute in pasal nei uh a, a pate nam innkuan sungah amau’ gamh luahte kip hi.
Hihte in Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Israel mite tungah Moses tung tawnin Topa in a piak thupiaknate leh ngeina kipte ahi hi.
Hihte in, Jordan gal khat gamlak, Suf gal khat Arabah gam sung, Paran leh Tolef, Laban, Hazeroth leh Dizahab kikalah Moses in Israelte khempeuh tungah a gen thute ahi hi.
Tua mun pen Horeb panin Seir Mual tawnin Kadeshbarnea lamah ni sawm leh ni khat paina ahi hi.

3-4 Heshbon gamah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon, leh Ashtaroth leh Edrei gamah a teeng Bashan kumpipa Og a zawh khit ciangin, a kum sawmlina kha sawm leh kha khatna a ni masa ni-in, amaute tungah thupiakna-in Topa in ama tungah a piak bang bangin Moses in Israel mite tungah gen hi.
Moab gam Jordan gal khatah Moses in hih thu gentel a,
”Horeb gam sungah Topa i Pasian in eite kiangah, ‘Hih mual-ah sau vei na om khin zo uh hi;

kihei-in na khualzin uh kipan un la, Amor mite’ gam mualtung gam leh Arabah kiim, mualtung gam, lei niamna gam, Negeb gam khempeuh, leh Kanaan mite’ gam tuipi gei leh Lebanon, gun golpi ahi Eufrates gun dongin pai un.
En un, note mai-ah leitang ka koih zo hi; pai un la, Topa in na pate uh Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob tung leh amau nunga a suan leh a khakte uh tungah piak dingin a ciam leitang luah un,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua hun lai takin note kiangah, ‘Kei guak bek in note kong en zo kei ding hi;
Topa na Pasian un note tampi hong khang sak zo hi, en un, note in tu hunin vantung aksite zah-in tampi na pha uh hi.
Topa, na pate uh Pasian in tu-a zah tul-in note hong khangsak hen la, note tungah hong ciamsa bangin thupha hong pia ta hen!
Kei guak in note’ thu kineihnate sian’sakna ding tavuan lianpi bangci puak zawh ding ka hi hiam?
Na minam uh tawh a kizui-in a pil, thu thei, thu phawksa mi teel un la, note’ lutang-in amaute ka koih ding hi,’ kong ci hi.
Note in, ‘Nangma hong gen thu in kote hih dingin hoih hi,’ ci-in nong dawng uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na minam lutang uh ahi, a pil thu phawksa mite ka la a, note tungah lutang-in a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawm ukte leh uliante na minam khempeuh sung uhah ka koih hi.
Tua hun lai takin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za un la, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om mi khualpa tawh ahi zongin thu a man takin khen un.

Thukhenna ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi; a neu leh a liante a kibangin na ngai ding uh hi; mihing maitang na zahtak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna in Pasian’ aa ahi hi; note adingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Note hih ding na khempeuh tua hunin note kiangah thu kong pia hi.

“Tua ciangin Horeb panin i ding khia a, Topa i Pasian in hong thupiak bangin Amor mite’ gam mualtung gam zuatna lam kalah note’ muhsa a lian a lipkhaphuai keugawgam i nawk hi; tua ciangin Kadesh-barnea i tung hi.
Tua ciangin note’ kiangah, ‘Topa i Pasian in eite hong piak Amor mite’ gam mualtung gam na tung uh hi.
En un, Topa na Pasian un note mai-ah leitang koih zo hi; Topa, na pate uh Pasian in note tungah hong gensa bangin pai un la, luah un; lau kei un la, lungkia kei un,’ kong ci hi.
Tua ciangin na vekpi-un ka kiangah nong pai uh a, ‘Eite adingin gam va enin, i paitoh nading lampi leh i zuat ding khuapite hong gen kik thei ding eite’ mai-ah mi sawl ni,’ nong ci uh hi.
Tua thu hoih tuak ka sa a, minam khatah khat, note mi sawm-le-nih kong teel hi;
amaute kithawi-in mualtung gamah paito uh a, Eshkol kuamah pai-in va en uh hi.

Amaute in tua gam singgah pawlkhat a khut-un hong tawi-in i kiangah hong tun’pih suk uh a, amaute in eite kiangah thu hong zasak kikin, ‘Topa i Pasian in eite hong piak gam in leitang hoih ahi hi,’ hong ci uh hi.
“Ahi zongin note paito nuam loin, Topa na Pasian uh hong thupiak na nial uh hi;
na puanbukte uh sungah na phun uh a, ‘Topa in eite hong mudah ahih manin eite susia ding, Amor mite’ khut sungah hong pia dingin Izipt gam panin eite hong paikhiatpih hi.

Koi lai-ah paito ding i hi hiam? I sanggamte in i lungsim hong siasak khin uh a, “A mite in ei sangin lian zaw-in sangzaw uh hi; a khuapite lianin van banin ki-uum hi; tua tham loin Anak mite tua munah i mu hi,” hong ci uh hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin note kiangah, ‘Lau kei un la, amaute kihta kei un.

30-31 Izipt gam sungah note mit muhah a hih bangin leh mi khat in a tapa a puak bangin hih mun na tun’ matengun lam tawntungah Topa na Pasian un note hong puak na muhsa uh gamlaka mah bangin, note mai-ah a pai Topa na Pasian un note’ adingin hong dosak ding hi,’ kong ci hi.

32-33 Ahi zongin hih bang thu om hi napi-in, note in na puanbuk lamna mun ding uh hong lak ding leh na pai nading lampi uh hong lak dingin zan-in mei, sun-in meii tawh note mai lampi-ah a pai Topa na Pasian uh na um kei uh hi.
“Topa in note’ gen thu hong za a, heh in, nasia takin kiciam a,

35-36 Hih a gilo khang mite khat beek in, na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam gamhoih mu lo ding a, Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb bek in mu ding hi; amah in tua gam mu ding hi, amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa zui ahih manin amah leh a tate tungah ama totsa leitang ka pia ding hi!” a ci hi.
Note’ hangin kei tungah zong Topa heh a, ‘Nang zong tua gamah na lut kha kei ding hi;
Nun’ tapa Joshua, nangma mai-ah a dingpa lut ding hi; amah hanthawn in, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Israel mite mapi-in tua gam luahsak ding hi.

Tua tham loin galte’ mimat suak ding hi na cih uh na taneute uh leh, tu hun lai taka asia leh apha a khen thei nai lo na tate uh, tua gamah pai ding a, amaute tungah tua gam ka pia ding a, amaute in tua gam luah ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note ahih leh, kihei un la, San Tuipi lam manawh-in gamlakah pai un,’ hong ci hi.

“Tua ciangin note in kei nong dawng uh a, ‘Topa tungah ka khial khin uh hi; Topa i Pasian in hong thupiak bang teek teekin paito-in i do ding hi,’ nong ci uh hi. Na milip-un na galhiam uh tawh na kithawi uh a, mualtung gamah paitoh ding na baih ngaihsut uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Amaute kiangah gen in: Note lakah kei om lo ka hih manin kuanto kei un la, do kei un; tua bangin kuanto le uh cin na galte uh na lel ding uh hi,’ ci in, hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong gen a, note in na ngai nuam kei uh hi; Topa’ thupiakna na nial uh a, mualtung gamah na kuanto hamtang uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua mualtung gamah a teeng Amor mite hong kuanin, Seir gam Hormah ciang dongah khuai bangin hong delhin hong zo uh hi.
Note hong ciahkikin Topa mai-ah na kap uh hi; ahih hangin Topa in na aw uh hong ngai loin, a bil zong hong ngat lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua thu hangin ni tampi sung Kadesh munah na om uh hi.
“Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah hong gen bangin, eite kihei-in San Tuipi lam manawh-in gamlakah i pai hi; ni tampi sung Seir Mual tungah i pai kawikawi hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah,
‘Hih mual kiimah sauvei khop na pai khin ta uh hi; leilu lamah kihei un.
Mite hih bangin thupia in: Seir gamah a teeng Esau’ suan leh khak, na behte uh’ gam sung a nawk ding na hi uh hi; amaute in note hong kihta ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kidawm un;

amaute tawh kisel kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ leitang khat zong no kong pia peuhmah kei ding hi, Esau’ neih dingin ama tungah Seir Mual pia khin ka hih manin khe a ta khop zah zong no kong pia kei ding hi.
Na nek ding uh an amaute tung panin sum tawh na lei ding uh hi; na dawn ding uh amau’ tui zong sum tawh na lei ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh khut tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong pia hi; hih a zai gamlakah na paina uh amah in hong thei hi; hih kum sawmli sung Topa na Pasian uh no tawh hong om hi; bangmah na kisam kei uh hi, ci-in gen in,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Seir gamah a teeng Esau’ suan i behte, leh Elath leh Ezion-geber khua pan hong kipan Arabah lampi panin i paikhia suak hi. “Tua ciangin eite kihei-in Moab gamlak lamah i pai hi.

Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Amau leitang na neih dingun note tungah hong pia lo ding ka hih manin Moab mite simsak kei un la, amaute tawh gal-in kido kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh a neih dingun Lot’ suan leh khakte tungah Ar khua ka pia zo hi,’ hong ci hi.
(Anak mite zah-in a tun a sang, a lian, a tam Emim mite tua lai-ah teeng ngei hi;
Anak mite mah bangin amaute zong Refaim mite kici a, ahih hangin Moab mite in Emim ci uh hi.

Hor mite zong Seir-ah nidangin teeng ngei a, ahih hangin, Topa in amaute tungah a piak amau leitang tungah Israel mite in ahih mah bangin, Esau’ suan leh khakte in amaute suankhia-in amaute susia a, amau’ munah teeng uh hi.)
Tu-in ding un la Zered lui kantan un,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Zered lui i kantan hi.

Amaute tungah Topa a kiciam mah bangin galsim mi ahi tua khang mite khempeuh gam sungah a sih khit dong ahi, Kadesh-barnea i nusiat-a kipan Zered lui i kantan dong kikal kum sawmthum leh kum giat ahi hi.
Amaute a bei khit mateng gamlakah amaute a susia dingin Topa langpang takpi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin mihingte lak panin galsim mite bei-in a sih khit ciangin,
Topa in kei kiangah,
‘Tu ni-in Ar khua san takah Moab gamgi kantan ding na hi uh hi;

Ammon mite leitang khat zong na neih dingun hong pia lo ding ka hih manin, Ammon mite’ gamgi na nai uh ciangin amaute gimsak kei un la, amaute tawh kido kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh a neih dingun Lot’ suan leh khakte tungah ka pia ding hi.

20-21 (Tua pen Refaim gamgi ci-in zong kithei ngei hi; Refaim mite tua lai-ah teeng ngei a, ahih hangin Ammon mite in amaute pen, Anak mite bangin lianin a tam a tun a sang mite ahi Zamzummim mite ci uh hi; ahih hangin Topa in amaute mai-ah tua mite susia hi; amaute in tua mite suankhia uh a, amau’ mun-ah teeng uh hi;
amah in Seir-ah a teeng Esau suan leh khakte adingin amaute mai-ah Hor mite a suksiat mah bangin, amaute in tua mite suankhia-in tuni dongin amau’ mun-ah teeng uh hi.
Gaza ciang dong khua neute-ah a teeng Avvim mite ahih leh Kaftor pana hong pai Kaftor mite in susia in amau’ munah teeng uh hi.)

‘Ding-in, na khualzin kipan in la, Arnon kuam kantan in; en in, Heshbon kumpipa, Amor mi Sihon leh ama leitang na khut sungah kong pia zo hi; amah suankhiat ding kipan in la, gal sungah amah tawh kido in.
Nomau’ thu za-in note hangin liing-in a gim ding ahi, vantung nuai khempeuh a, om mite tungah note hong kikihtakna leh note hanga launa ka tun’sak ding tu ni-in ka kipan ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Kedemoth gamlak panin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon kiangah kilemna thu genin kamtai ka sawl a,
‘Na gam sung hong nawksak in; lampi bekah ka pai ding a, taklam ahi a, veilam-ah ahi zongin ka pial kei ding hi.
Ka nek ding an sum tawh lei dingin nong zuak ding a, ka dawn ding tui sum tawh lei dingin nong pia ding hi; khe tawh hong nawksak bek in,
Jordan kantanin Topa ka Pasian un kote hong piak leitangah ka tun matengun Seir-a a teeng Esau’ suante leh Ar-a a teeng Moab mite in kei hong paisak mah bangun hong paisak in,’ ka ci hi.

Ahih hangin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon in eite hong paisak lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu huna mah bangin na khut sung uhah amah hong piak theih nadingin Topa a Pasian un a lungsim khauh sakin, amah paupeng sak hi.
Topa in kei kiangah, ‘En in, Sihon leh a leitang nang tungah piak kong kipan khin zo hi; a leitang na luah theih nadingin suankhiat ding kipan in,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Sihon leh a mite khempeuh eite do dingin Jahaz-ah hong pai uh hi.
Topa i Pasian in amah hong pia hi; amah leh a tapate leh a mi khempeuh i zo hi.
Tua hunin a khuapi khempeuh i la a, a khuapi khempeuh, papi, nupi leh naupangte i susia maimang hi; bangmah i siit kei hi;
i laksa a khuapi sunga van kinusiate tawh a ganhingte uh eima adingin i la bek hi.
Arnon kuam mong a, a om Aroer leh tua kuam sunga om khuapi Gilead ciang dongah eite adingin khuapi a hat lua khat beek om lo hi; Topa i Pasian in a vekpi-in eite khut sungah hong pia hi.
Ammon mite’ leitang ahi, Jabbok gun pang khempeuh leh mualtung gam khuapite leh Topa i Pasian in hong khamna munte bek i va neh kei hi.
“Tua ciangin eite kihei-in Bashan lamah i paito hi; Bashan kumpipa Og leh ama mite khempeuh Edrei-ah eite do dingin hong kuankhia hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Amah kihta kei in, bang hang hiam cih leh amah leh a mite khempeuh leh a leitang nangma khut sungah kong pia khin zo hi; Heshbon ah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon na bawl bangin ama tungah na bawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa i Pasian in eite khut sungah Bashan kumpipa Og leh a mite khempeuh zong hong pia hi; ama adingin mi khat beek a suakta nawn lo dingin i vatmai hi.
Tua hunin a khuapite khempeuh i la hi—amau kiang pan i lak loh khuapi khat zong om lo hi—Bashan gama Og kumpi gam sung, Argob gambup, khuapi sawmgukte ahi hi.
Kulhpi a, ki-uum lo khuaneu tampite sim loh, hih khuapite khempeuh kulh sangpi, kongpi leh sikzawlte tawh muanhuai tak-a a kibawl ahi hi.
Heshbon kumpipa Sihon i bawl bangin amaute i susia mang a, khuapi khempeuh, papi, nupi leh naupangte i susia hi.
Ahih hangin a ganhing khempeuh leh khuapi sunga van kinusiate i la hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua hun lai takin, gam, Jordan gal khat a, om Amor kumpi nihte’ khut sung pan, Arnon kuam panin Hermon Mual dong
(Sidon mite in Hermon pen Sirion ci a, Amor mite in Senir ci uh hi),
mualzang khuapite khempeuh leh Gilead khempeuh leh Bashon khempeuh, Salekah leh Edrei dong, Bashan a, om Og kumpi gam khuapite i la hi.

(Bang hang hiam cih leh Bashan kumpipa Og bek Refaim gam sung panin a om lai ahi hi; en in, ama lupna a han in suang han ahi hi; Ammon mite’ khuapi Rabbah ah tua han om lai hilo ahi hiam? Tong gual-in, a sauna tongkua hi a, a zaina tongli ahi hi.)
“Tua huna hih leitang i luah ciangin, Reuben mite leh Gad mite tungah Arnon kuam mong-a om Aroer pan leh Gilead mualtung gam kimkhat a khuapite tawh ka pia hi.
Gilead gam a om lai teng leh Argob gam khempeuh ahi, Og kumpi gam, Bashan gam khempeuh, Manasseh minam kimkhatte tungah ka pia hi. (Bashan gam buppi pen Refaim leitang kici hi.
Manasseh mi Jair in Bashan kici Argob gam khempeuh, Geshur mite leh Ma-akath mite’ gamgi dong la a, tua sunga khua neu minte ama min tam sakin tuni donga a kip Havvoth-jair phuak hi.)
Makhir tungah Gilead ka pia a,
Reuben mite leh Gad mite tungah Gilead panin Arnon kuam dong, gamgi dingin a kuam laita, Ammon mite’ gamgi ahi Jabbok gun dong tawh ka pia hi;
Arabah gam zong, a gamgi dingin Jordan tawh, Khinnereth panin nisuahna lam-a om Pisgah mual pang nuai-a Ci Tuipi ahi Arabah tuipi ciang dong amaute ka pia hi.
“Tua hunin note thu kong pia a, ‘Topa na Pasian un na neih dingun hih leitang hong pia zo hi; na galhang mite khempeuh uh galhiam tawh kithawi-in Israel mi na sanggamte uh mai-ah va kuan ding hi.
Ahih hangin na zite, na ta neute leh na ganhingte uh (ganhing tampi na neih uh ka thei hi) note kong piaksa khuapite ah om ding uh a,

Topa in note hong piak bangin na sanggamte uh tungah lungsim tawlngakna pia-in, Topa na Pasian uh Jordan gal khatah amaute a piak leitang amaute in zong a luah matengun na om ding uh hi; tua ciangin note kong piaksa ahi na neihsa ciat uhah note khempeuh na ciah ding uh hi,’ kong ci hi.
Tua hun lai takin Joshua thu ka pia a, ‘Topa na Pasian in hih kumpi nihte tungah a bawlte khempeuh na mit in mu khin hi; na nawk kumpi gam khempeuh tungah zong Topa in tua mah bangin hih ding hi.
Amaute na kihta kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang adinga hong do sakpa in Topa na Pasian ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Tua hunin keimah in Topa tungah ka thuum a,

‘Topa Pasian aw, na liatna leh na thahatnate na nasempa tungah lah ding a hong kipan pan bek na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh vantung hita leh leitung hita leh nangma’ aa bangin tua bang nasep leh a vanglian gamtatna a hih thei bang pasian om ahi hiam?
Kei hong paisak in la, Jordan gal khat-a om gam hoih, tua mualtung gam hoih leh Labanon hong musak in, ci-in kong thuum hi,’ ka ci hi.
Ahih hangin note’ hangin kei tungah Topa heh a, ka thu hong ngai lo hi: Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Pha zo hi, hih thu kei kiangah hong gen nawn kei in.

Pisgah mual dawnah paito in la, nitumna lam, leilu lam, leitaw lam leh nisuahna lamah na mit sang hah to in la, na mit tawh gal-et in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in hih Jordan na kantan kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin Joshua thu pia in la, hanthawnin thakhauhsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite mai-ah amah pai ding a, nangmah in na muh ding leitang amaute luah sak ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Bethpeor gal-a kuam sungah i taam lai hi.
“Tu-in, Israelte aw, note nungta-in Topa, na pate uh Pasian in note hong piak leitangah va pai-in na luah theih nadingun note kong hilh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte don un la, zui un.
Topa na Pasian un hong piak ahi keima hong thugente na zuih theih nadingun no kong thupiakte behlap loin, zong na khiam kei ding uh hi.
Na mit un Baalpeor ah Topa’ hihna mu khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note lak panin Peor-a Baal a zui mi khempeuh susia hi;
ahih hangin Topa na Pasian uh a lenkipte khempeuh tu ni-in na hing lai uh hi.
En un, note in luah dingin na lutna gam sungah na zuih dingun Topa ka Pasian in kei hong thupiak bangin thukhamte leh ngeina kipte kong hilh khin zo hi.

Tuate zui un la, sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thukhamte khempeuh a zak uh ciangin, ‘Hih minam liante in a pil thu thei mi taktak hi,’ a ci ding uh mite’ muhna ah hih thu nomau pilna leh nomau thu theihna hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in Topa i sap hun simin eite kiangah i Pasian hong nai zahin pasian a nei minam lian koi-ah om ahi hiam?
Tu ni-in note kong hilh hih thute bangin thukham leh ngeina kip man a nei minam lian koi-ah om ahi hiam?

9-10 “Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia kha ding ahih manin lim takin ngaihsunin hoih takin kikem un; Horeb a, Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah na din’ ni-un Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak lai teng uh amaute in kei hong kihtak nading leh amaute in a tate uh a hilh sawn theih nadingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theih nadingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh leh na tate’ tate uh tungah kithei sak un.
Mei in mual kang-in van laizang dong banto-in, khuamial leh meii leh khuaziing in a tuamcip lai takin note a nai-ah hong pai-in mual bul-ah na ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mei sung panin Topa in note kiangah thu hong gen hi; note in awging na za uh a, ahih hangin bangmah na mu kei uh hi; awging bek om hi.
Thupiakna sawmte ahi note’ hih dinga hong thupiak ama thuciamna note tungah hong gen hi; amah in suangpeek nih tungah tuate gelh hi.
Note in na luah ding uh gam sungah na zuih theih nadingun, thukhamte leh ngeina kipte note kong hilh nading tua hun lai takin Topa in kei thu hong pia hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note hoih takin kidawm un. Horeb ah mei sung panin Topa in note tungah thu hong gen ni-in bangmah mu lo na hih uh manin,
note adingin lim khatpeuh peuh, pasal tawh a kibang hita leh numei tawh a kibang hita leh,
leitunga om ganhing khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang hita leh, huih laka leeng kha a nei vasa khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang hita leh,

leitungah a bokvak khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang hita leh, lei nuai-ah a om tui sunga ngasa khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang hita leh, a kiseek milim bawlna tawh a sia-in na gamtat khak loh nadingun kidawm un.

Note in na mit uh tawh vantung lam en to-in, ni leh kha leh aksite, vantung na khempeuh na muh uh ciangin, vantung nuai khempeuh a, mite tungah Topa na Pasian un a piak nate lamah kihei-in tuate bia-in a na na sep khak ding uh kidawm un.
Ahih hangin Topa in tu ni-a bangin sik meikhuk, Izipt panin ama neih mi dingin note hong la-in hong paikhiatpih khin hi.
Tua tham loin note hangin kei tungah Topa heh a, keimah in Jordan kantan loin Topa na Pasian un note’ gamh dingin hong piak leitang hoih ah ka lut lohna dingin kiciam hi.
Hih gamah kei ka si ding a, Jordan khengin ka pai thei kei ding hi: ahih hangin note in kantanin, tua gam hoih na luah ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un note tawh hong bawl thuciamna mangngilhin, Topa na Pasian un note’ hih dinga hong kham lim khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang a kiseek milim na bawl khak loh nadingun kidawm un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un hong kangtum thei mei tawh kibang a, a haza Pasian ahi hi.

“Note in tu leh ta nei-in gam sungah mi khangham na suah uh ciangin, na khatpeuh peuh tawh a kibang lim-in a kiseek milim bawlna leh Topa na Pasian uh muhna ah a sia bawlna tawh amah a hehsak dingin na siat gamtat uh leh,

Jordan gal khat luah dingin na paina leitang uhah na siat maimang baih nadingun note langkhatah teci pang dingin tu ni-in van leh lei ka sam hi; tua leitang tungah note sauvei na hing kei ding uh a, na sia maimang ding uh hi.
Topa in mite lakah note hong thehthang ding a, Topa in note hong hawlna minamte lakah mi tawmcik bek na om lai ding uh hi.
Note in tua lai munah mite’ khut in a bawl, khua mu thei lo, khua za thei lo, a ne thei lo, a nam thei lo sing leh suang pasiante’ na na sem ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua lai panin Topa na Pasian uh na zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na zon’ uh leh amah na mu ding uh hi.
Note in gimna thuakin, mai lam hunah hih nate khempeuh no tungah hong tun’ ciangin, Topa na Pasian uh lamah kihei-in ama thu na mang ding uh hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un hehpihna a nei Pasian ahi hi; amah in note hong tamasak lo ding hi, hong susia lo ding hi, na pate uh tawh a thuciamna mangngilh lo ding hi.
“Pasian in leitungah mi a pian’sak ni-a kipan, no pian’ ma-a hun beisa thu tu-in kan un la, van mong khat pan mong khat kikal thu zong kan un, hih bang na lian piang ngei-in a kiza ngei peuhmah hiam?
Note in Pasian’ aw za khin napi-in na hin’ lai uh bangin meikuang sung panin pasian’ pauna aw mi khatpeuh peuh in za ngei ahi hiam?

Tua ahih kei leh, Topa na Pasian un Izipt gam sungah note adingin na muhna uhah a bawlte khempeuh tawh kibangin, ze-etna, lim, nalamgdang, gal, a vanglian leh a thahatna leh launa lianpi tawh pasian khat sung pan minam khat a va lak ding hanciam ngam ngei ahi hiam?
Topa in Pasian hi, ci-in na theih nadingun note tungah hih thu hong kilak hi; amah sungah kuamah dang om lo hi.
Amah in note hong khal theih nadingin vantung panin ama aw note hong za sak hi; a mei lianpi note leitungah hong mu sak a, mei sung panin ama kam na za uh hi.
Amah in na pate uh itin, amau suan leh khakte hong tel a, amahmah in ama vanglian tawh Izipt panin note hong paikhiatpih a,

note sangin a tamzaw leh a vanglian zawte’ gamah hong paipihin, note’ luah dingin amau’ leitang hong piak nadingin note mai-ah amaute hong hawlkhiat sak ahih manin tu ni-in hih bangin na om thei uh hi;
tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hita leh nuai-a om leitung hita leh ah Topa in Pasian a hihna thu tu ni-in na thei un la, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note leh note khit-a na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, Topa na Pasian un a tawntung a, hong piak gam sungah na khan’ uh na sausak theih nadingun tu ni-a note kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte leh a thupiaknate na zui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

41-42 Tua ciangin, a beisa hunah amah tawh kilangneihna a om lo, tum lopi-in a vengpa a that, mi that kha-pa va tai-in hih khuapite khatpeuh peuhah tai-na tawh a suahtak theih nadingin Moses in nisuahna lam Jordan gal khatah khuapi thum tuam koih hi:
Reuben mite adingin mualzang gamlakah Bezer khua, Gad mite’ adingin Gilead gam sung Ramoth khua leh Manasseh mite’ adingin Bashan gam sung Golan khua ahi hi.
Hih in Israel mite tungah Moses in a piak thu ahi hi.

45-46 hihte in, Izipt gam panin a paikhiat-un Moses leh Israel mite in a zawh Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor mite’ kumpipa Sihon’ gam sung, Jordan gal, Bethpeor tawh a kigalsai kuam sungah, Izipt panin Israel mite a paikhiat lai-in Moses in amaute tungah a gen tecipan’nate, thukhamte leh ngeina kipte ahi hi.

47-49 Amaute in, Arnon kuam mong-a a om Aroer panin Sirion Mual (Hernon a cihna) dong, Jordan nisuahna lam-a om Arabah gam khempeuh, Pisgal mual pang nuai Arabah Tuipi dong tawh, ama leitang leh Bashan kumpipa Og leitang, Jordan gal khat, nisuahna lamah a teeng Amor kumpi nihte’ leitang luah uh hi.
Moses in Israelte khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Israelte aw, tu ni-a note zak-in kong gen thukhamte leh ngeina kipte za un la, note in thei-in lim takin zuih ding na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
Topa i Pasian in Horeb ah eite tawh thuciamna khat bawl hi.
Topa in i pute i pate bek tawh hih thuciamna a bawl hi loin, tu ni-a ahing eite khempeuh tawh zong a bawl ahi hi.

4-5 Note tungah Topa’ thu a gen dingin Topa leh note kikalah ka din’ hun lai takin, mei sung panin tua mual-ah Topa in kimai tuahin note hong hopih hi; mei hangin note lau na hih manun mual tungah na paito kei uh hi. Amah in:
“Keimah in salsuahna, Izipt leitang panin nang a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian ka hi hi.
“Keimah longal pasian dang na nei kei ding hi.
“A kiseek milim hita leh, tunga vantunga om hita leh, nuai-a leitunga om hita leh, lei nuai-a om tui sungah hita leh a om na khatpeuh peuh a sun khatpeuh peuh nang adingin na bawl kei ding hi;

amaute mai-ah kun loin, amau’na na sem kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah Topa na Pasian in a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte tungah a pate’ mawhna a tate tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,
ahih hangin kei hong it-in ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hi hi.
“Topa na Pasian’ min na zangkhai zat kei ding hi: bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama min a zangkhai zat mi a mawh lo hi, ci lo ding hi.
“Topa na Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na siangthosak dingin sabbath ni tang in.
Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh na hih ding hi;

ahih hangin a ni sagih ni in Topa na Pasian’ sabbath ni ahi hi; tua ni-in nangmah bangin na nasem pasal leh na nasem numeite a tawlngak theih nadingin, nang, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasem nute, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khatpeuh peuh leh na huang sung om zinte in na khatpeuh peuh sem lo ding uh hi.

Izipt gamah nasem na hihna leh tua lai panin Topa na Pasian in a vangliatna khut leh a thahatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna na phawk ding hi; tua ahih ciangin sabbath ni na tan’ ding Topa na Pasian in thu hong pia hi.
“Topa na Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan’ sau-in na nopsak theih nadingin Topa na Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa zahtak in.
“‘Mi na that kei ding hi.
“‘Nu-le-pa mawhna zong na bawl kei ding hi.
“‘Na na gu kei ding hi.
“‘Na vengte lang khatah zong a man loin teci na pang kei ding hi.
“‘Na vengte’ zi zong na deihgawh kei ding hi; na vengte’ inn, a lo, a nasempa, a nasemnu, a bawngtal, a la, ahih kei leh na vengte’ na khatpeuh peuh na deih kei ding hi,’ ci hi.

“Topa in, mei, meii leh a mial mahmah sung panin awging lianpi tawh mual tunga no a kikhawm khempeuh tungah hih thute hong gen hi; amah in bangmah genthuah lo hi. Amah in suangpeek nih tungah tuate gelhin, tua suangpeekte kei tungah hong pia hi.
Mei in mual a kat lai takin khuamial sung panin awging na zak uh ciangin na minam lutang khempeuh uh leh na upate uh kei kiangah nong pai uh hi;
note in, ‘En in, Topa i Pasian in eite tungah a minthan’na leh a liatna hong lak khin a, mei sung panin ama awging i za khin hi; Pasian in mi hopih napi, mi a hing lai veve-in tu ni-in i mu hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin tu-in eite si ding i hi hiam? Hih mei lianpi in eite hong kangtum ding hi; Topa i Pasian’ awging za lai lehang eite i si ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a si thei mihing khempeuh sung panin eite’ zak bangin mei sung panin a nungta Pasian a paukhiatna awging za-in, a nungta lai kua om ahi hiam?
A nai-ah va pai in la, Topa i Pasian in a gen ding khempeuh va za in; Topa i Pasian in nang tungah hong gen ding teng ko tungah hong gen in; kote in hong mangin ka sem ding uh hi,’ nong ci uh hi.
“Kei kiangah nong gen uh ciangin Topa in na thu uh a za hi; Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih mite in nang kiangah hong gen uh thute ka za khin hi; a gen khempeuh uh a manin gen uh hi.
Amaute leh a suan a khakte uh a nopsak tawntung theih nadingin keimah zahtak ding leh ka thupiak khempeuh zuih ding hih bang ngaihsutna nei tawntung le-uh ka deih ahi hi.
Pai in la, amaute kiangah, ‘Na puanbuk uhah ciah un,’’ ci in.

Ahih hangin nang, kei kiang hih lai-ah om in, amaute’ neih dingin ka piak leitangah amaute in a zuih theih nadingun amaute na hilh ding thupiakna leh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte khempeuh nang tungah kong gen ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian un note hong thupiak bangin na gamtat ding uh na kingaihsun ding uh hi; ama thu panin taklam hita leh vei lamah hita leh na pial kei ding uh hi.
Note nungta-in, nuamsa-in, na tan’ ding uh leitangah sawtpi na nuntak nadingun Topa na Pasian un note hong thupiakna lampi khempeuh na tawn ding uh hi.

1-2 “Tu-in, luah dinga na paina gam uhah na zuih dingun, note leh na tapate uh leh na suan leh khakte un Topa note’ Pasian’ thukhamte leh a thupiakte na zuihna uh tawh amah na zahtak theih nadingun, Topa na Pasian un na nuntak tawntung uh na zuih dingun kei a hong hilh sawnsakte in hih thupiakna, thukhamte leh ngeina kipte ahi hi; tua in na khan’ uh a sau theih nading ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israelte aw, note nuamsa-in, Topa, na pate uh Pasian in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin bawngnawi leh khuaizu’ a luan’na gamah tampi pha-in na khan’ theih nadingun hih thute za un la, na zuih nadingun ngaihsun un.
“Israelte aw, za un; Topa i Pasian in Topa khat bek ahi hi;
Topa note’ Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uh hi.
Tu ni-a no kong piak hih thute in na lungsim uhah om ding hi;
na tate uh tungah lim takin na hilh ding uh a, na inn sung uhah na tut ciang, lampi-ah na pai ciang, na lup ciang leh na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.
Na khut tung uhah lim dingin tuate na hen ding uh a, na mitte uh kikalah tuate in talsuante bang hi ding hi.
Na inn kongkhak khuam tung uh leh na kongpi uh tungah tuate na gelh ding uh hi.
“Topa na Pasian un note piak dingin na pate uh Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob tungah a ciam, note’ phuh loh a lian a hoih khuapite,
note’ khol loh na hoih khempeuh tawh a kidim innte, note’ bawl loh tuibem, note’ suan loh leengguite leh oliv kungte a omna leitangah hong paipihin, note in ne-in na kham uh ciangin,
salsuahna Izipt leitang panin hong paikhiatpih Topa na mangngilh khak loh nading uh kidawm un.
Topa na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; ama na bek na sem ding uh a, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.
Note kiim-a om mite’ pasiante ahi pasian dangte’ nung na zui kei ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh note lakah a om Topa na Pasian uh in a aam Pasian ahi hi; tua bang hi kei leh note tungah Topa na Pasian uh hong hehin lei maitang panin note hong susia ding hi.
“Massah ah amah na ze-et uh bangin Topa na Pasian uh na ze-et nawn kei ding uh hi.
Amah in note hong thupiaksa ahi Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate, a tecipan’nate leh a thukhamte lim takin na kem ding uh hi.

18-19 Topa’ hong ciamsa bangin note mai panin na langte khempeuh uh nawh khiatna tawh na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin Topa in a ciamsa leitang hoih note in na luah theih nading uh leh note na nopsak theih nadingun Topa’ muhna ah a man leh a hoih nate na sem ding uh hi.
“Hong tung ding hunah na tapate un, ‘Topa Pasian in note hong thupiaksa tecipan’na leh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte in bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot ciangin,
na tapate uh kiangah, ‘Eite in Izipt gam sunga Faro’ silate i hi hi; Topa in Izipt panin a vangliatna tawh hong paikhiatpih hi;
Topa in eite’ muhna ah a lian a nasia lim leh na lamdangte Izipt mite leh Faro leh a uliante khempeuh tungah lak hi;
amah in i pu i pate tungah piak dinga a ciam leitangah hong paipihin eite hong piak theih nadingin tua lai panin eite hong paikhiatpih hi.
Tu hun-a bangin i nuntak theih nadingin amah in eite’ hoih tawntung nading deihna ah Topa i Pasian zahtakin hih thukhamte khempeuh i zuih ding Topa in thu hong pia hi.
Amah in eite hong thupiak bangin Topa i Pasian mai-ah hih thupiakna khempeuh lim takin zui lehang eite’ adingin thumanna hi ding hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.

“Topa na Pasian un luah dinga na tumna uh leitangah hong paipihin, note’ mai-ah Hit mite, Girgash mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite, no sangin lianzaw-in a thahat zaw minamte note mai panin siang khia sakin,

Topa na Pasian un note tungah amaute hong pia-in, note in amaute na zawh uh ciangin, note in amaute na susia mang ding uh hi; amaute tawh thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh a, amaute tungah hehpihna na lak kei ding uh hi.
Amaute tawh kiteeng loin, na tanute uh amau tapate pia loin, a tanute uh na tapate’ adingun na la kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh pasian dangte na sem dingin keimah zuihna panin na tapate uh amaute in heikhia ding uh hi. Tua ciangin no tungah Topa’ hehna hong so-in note hong susia pak ding hi.
Note in amau tungah hih bangin na gamta ding uh hi: a biakna taute uh phelsakin, a khuampite uh deeng zanin, amau’ Asherah milimte phuk sakin, a kiseek a milimte uh mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh note in Topa note’ Pasian tungah a siangtho mi na hi uh hi; lei maitang-a om mite khempeuh sung panin a neih manpha ama mi ahi dingin Topa na Pasian un note hong teel zo hi.
Topa in note hong itin hong teelna in midangte sangin na tam zawkna hang uh hi lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh lakah a tawmpen na hi uh hi;
Topa in salsuahna Izipt kumpipa Faro khut sung panin note hong tankhia-in a vangliatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna in Topa in note hong itin, na pate uh tunga a kiciam thuciam a zuihna hang ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian uh Pasian hi a, amah itin a thupiakna a zuite tungah khang tul khat dongin thuciamna leh itna kip lenin a thuman Pasian,
amah a mudah mite a maitang uhah suksiatna tawh a thukpahpa ahihna thei un; amah a mudah mi tungah zekai loin a maitang mah ah thuk ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu ni-a no kong thupiak ahi thupiakna, thukhamte leh ngeina kipte lim tak-a na zuih ding uh ngaihsun un.
“Note in hih ngeina kipte za-in, kemin tuate na zuihna hangun, Topa na Pasian un na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam thuciamna leh itna kip note tungah hong tung sak ding hi;

amah in note hong itin, thupha hong pia-in, tampi hong phasak ding hi; amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciamna gam sungah note’ suan leh khakte leh na gam sung panun a piangte, na an uh leh na leenggahtui uh leh na sathau uh, leh na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuu-le-keelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.
Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piak zaw ding hi; note lak hita leh na ganhingte lak uh hita leh a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing om lo ding hi.

Topa in note tung panin natna khempeuh lakhia ding hi; note in na theihsa uh ahi Izipt gam-a natna siate note tungah khat zong hong tung lo ding a, ahih hangin no hong mudahte khempeuh tungah tuate tung sak ding hi.
Topa na Pasian un no tungah hong piak mi khempeuh na beisak ding uh a, amaute na khasiat kei ding uh hi; note’ adingin thangzak hi ding ahih manin amau’ pasiante’ na zong na sem kei ding uh hi.
“Na lungsim uhah, ‘Hih minamte ei sangin tamzaw hi; amaute bangci suankhiat theih ding i hi hiam?’ na cih khak uh leh,
amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi, Topa na Pasian un Faro leh Izipt mite khempeuh tungah ahih,

na mitte un a muhsa a lian ze-etnate, limte, nalamdangte, a vangliatna leh Topa na Pasian un hong paikhiatpihna a thahatna phawk ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian un na kihtak uh mi khempeuh tungah tua bangin hih ding hi.
Tua tham loin, a om lai mite leh no kiang panin a bu mite a siat khit dong matengin Topa na Pasian un amaute lakah khuaipi nam tunpi khah ding hi.
Note in amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a lian a kihtakhuai ahi Pasian, Topa na Pasian uh note tawh a om hi.
Topa na Pasian un note mai-ah hih minamte tawm tawmin siang khiasak ding hi; note adingin gamsate hong tam khan’ lua kha ding ahih manin amaute thakhat thu-in na beisak kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa na Pasian un note tungah amaute hong pia ding a, amaute a bei matengin kibuaisak ding hi.

Amah in note khut sungah amaute’ kumpite hong pia ding a, note in vantung nuai panin amaute’ min na maimang sak ding uh hi; amaute na susia khin mang ding uh a, note lang khatah mi khat beek hong pang zo lo ding hi.

A kiseek amau pasian milimte mei tawh na hal ding uh hi; tua nate ah na awk khak loh nadingun amaute tunga a om kham leh ngun, deihgawh loin, note adingin na la kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in Topa na Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.

Note’ inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uh hi; note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate in a kisamsia na ahi hi.

“Note nungta-in tampi na phak theih nading uh leh na pate uh tungah piak dinga Topa a kiciamsa leitangah va pai-in na neih theih nadingun tu ni-a note kong thupiak ahi thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.

A thupiakte na zui uh hiam na zui kei uh hiam cih a theih nadingin note hong niamkhiatin na lungsim uhah bang om hiam cih a theih nadingin Topa na Pasian un gamlakah hih kum sawmli sung note hong paipihna lampi khempeuh na ciamteh ding uh hi.

Mite in an bek tawh nungta loin Topa’ kam sung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsak nadingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkial sak a, note hita leh na pu na pate uh hita leh in a theih ngei loh uh manna tawh hong vaak hi.
Hih kum sawmli sung note tunga om na puan uh sia loin, na khe uh zong bawk lo hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatin a tapa a khal bangin Topa na Pasian un note hong khalna thu na lungsim uhah thei un.
Tua ahih ciangin ama lampi zuihna leh amah zahtakna tawh Topa na Pasian’ thupiaknate na zui ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa note’ Pasian in’ mual leh guamah a luang luituite a omna, ciktui leh tuikhuk a omna leitang,
mangbuh leh mangbuhham, leenggui leh thei kung leh mang kawlsing a omna leitang, oliv kungte leh khuaizu a omna leitang,
bangmah kisam loin, cil bawl loin an na nek nading uh leitang, a suangte sik a hihna leitang, mualte sung panin sumsan na tawh theihna uh leitang ahi gam hoih ah note hong paipih hi.
Note in ne-in na gil uh vah ding a, note tungah gam hoih hong piakna hangin Topa na Pasian uh na phat ding uh hi.
“Tu ni-a no tungah kong thupiak ahi ama thupiaknate leh a ngeina kipte leh a thukhamte zuih lohna tawh Topa na Pasian uh mangngilh kha ding na hih manun kidawm un:
tua hi kei leh, an ne-in na kham uh ciang, inn hoihte lamin tuate sungah na teen’ uh ciang,
na bawnghonte’ leh na tuuhonte uh tampi a phak ciang leh na kham leh na ngunte uh tampi pha-in, na neih khempeuh uh tampi a phak ciangin,
na lungsim uh lianin, salsuahna Izipt gam panin no hong paikhiatpih,
a lian a lauhuai gamlakah gul gunei leh mom-ai lak leh tui om lohna lei keu-ah hong paipihpa, meisuang tawh a kibang suangpi panin tui hong piapa,

a tawpna ah a hoih-in na gamtat theih nading uh deihna-in note hong niamkhiatin hong ze-et theih nadingin na pu na pate un a theih loh manna tawh gamlakah hong vaak ahi Topa na Pasian uh na mangngilh kha ding uh hi.
Na lungsim uhah, ‘Ka vangliatna uh leh ka thahatna un hih hauhna hong ngahsak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manun kingaihsun un.
Tu ni-a mah bangin na pu na pate uh tunga a kiciamna a kipsak theih nadingin, na hauh nadingun vangliatna hong piapa in amah ahih manin Topa na Pasian uh na phawk ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian uh mangngilhin pasian dangte nung zui-in tuate’ na semin na biak uh leh, na sia taktak ding uh hi, ci-in tu ni-in lim takin kong hilh khol hi.
Topa note’ Pasian aw ngai lo ahih manun, Topa in note mai-ah a siatsak minamte bangin note na sia ding uh hi.

1-2 “Israelte aw, za un; note sangin tamzaw-in a thahat zaw minamte, lianin van banin kulhpi a kiciangto khuapite, na theihsa uh mi ahi a pum a lian a tun sang Anak mite, ‘Anak mite, kua in do zo ding ahi hiam?’ a kicih na zak ngei mite uh a suankhia dingin tu ni-in Jordan a kantan’ ding na hi uh hi:

Tua ahih ciangin, a kangtum thei mei bangin note mai-ah a paipa in Topa na Pasian uh ahihna tu ni-in thei un; amah in note mai-ah amaute susia-in, amaute zo ding hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin amaute hawlkhia-in manlangin na siamang sak ding uh hi.

“Topa na Pasian un na mai panun amaute a nawhkhiat khit ciangin, na lungsim uhah ‘Hih leitang a luah dingin Topa in hong paipihna in komau thumanna hang ahi hi,’ ci kei un; Topa in na mai uhah amaute a hawlkhiatna in hih minamte’ gitlohna hang ahi hi.

Na thumanna hang uh ahi a, na lungsim manna hang uh tawh ahi zongin amau’ leitang luah ding na hi kei uh hi; Topa na Pasian un na mai panun amaute a hawlkhiatna in hih minamte’ gitlohna hang leh Topa in na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob tungah a thuciamna kammal a kipsak theih nading ahi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note diktatna hangin Topa na Pasian un na tan’ dingun hih leitang hoih note tungah hong pia ahih lohna thei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note in lungsim khauh mi na hi uh hi.
Topa na Pasian uh gamlakah phin-in na hehsakna uh phawk un la, mangngilh kei un; Izipt gam panin na paikhiat ni uh a, kipan hih lai na tun’ dongun Topa langpan’ in, na lehdo uh hi.
Horeb mual nangawn ah a heh nadingin Topa na phin uh a, note tungah Topa heh a, amah in note hong susia dektak hi.
Topa in note tawh a bawl thuciamna suang ahi suangpeekte sang dingin mual tungah ka paitoh lai-in, mual tungah sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung ka om hi; an ne lo, tui dawn loin ka om hi.
Pasian khutme tawh a kigelh suangpeek nihte kei tungah Topa in hong pia hi; kikhop ni-in mei sung pana note tungah Topa in hong gensa kammal khempeuh tua suangpeekte tungah om hi.
Sun sawmli leh zan sawmli a cin’ ni-in kiciamna suangpeekte ahi suangpeek nihte Topa in kei hong pia hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Tho in, hih lai panin paisuk mengmeng in: bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt panin na paikhiatpih mite a sia-in gamta khin uh hi; amaute ka thupiakna panin kihei khia pak uh hi; amau adingin a kisung milim khat bawl khin uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua tham loin Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Hih mite ka mu khin hi, en in, a lungsim khauh mite ahi hi;
amaute susia-in vantung nuai panin amaute’ min ka phiat theih nadingin kei guak hong omsak in; amaute sangin a vanglian zaw a tamzaw minam-in nang kong bawl ding hi,’ hong ci lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kihei-in mual tung panin kong paisuk a, mei in mual kang-in kuang hi; kiciamna suangpeek nihte ka khut nihte sungah om hi.
Tua ciangin ka khuadak a, en in, Topa na Pasian tung uhah na khial khin uh hi; a kisung bawngno milim note’ adingin na bawl uh hi; Topa in note hong thupiakna panin na kiheikhia pak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin suangpeek nihte la-in ka khut nihte’ sung panin lawnin note’ mit muh ah ka sukham hi.

Tua ciangin a masa-a bangin sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung Topa mai-ah kunin ka om hi; ama heh nadingin phinin Topa muhna ah a sia gamtatna tawh note’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin an ne lo, tui dawn loin ka om hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah Topa’ hehna leh a lungkim het lohna, note susia dingin a kithawina hangin ka lau hi. Ahih hangin tua hunin zong Topa in kei’ thu hong ngai hi.
Aaron tungah Topa heh mahmah a, amah susia dingin kithawi hi; tua hun mah-in Aaron ading zong thu ka ngen hi.
Tua ciangin note’ khialhna na, na bawlsa uh bawngno, mei tawh halin sukhamin, leivui bangin a neel dongin ka gawizan hi; tua ciangin mualtung pan-a hong luangsuk lui sungah a vuite ka lawn hi.
“Taberah leh Massah leh Kibrothhattaavah munte ah zong Topa phin-in na heh sak uh hi.
Topa in Kadesh-barnea panin note hong sawlin, ‘Paito un la, note kong piaksa leitang luah un,’ hong cih lai-in Topa na Pasian uh hong thupiakna lehdo-in, amah um loin, ama aw na ngai kei uh hi.
Note kong theih ni-a kipan Topa na lehdo uh hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Topa in note ka susia ding ci ahih manin hih sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung Topa mai-ah kunin ka om hi.
Topa tungah thu ka ngen a, ‘Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in na liatna tawh na tatkhiatsa, a vangliatna tawh Izipt panin na paikhiatpih ahi na mite leh na luahte susia kei in.
Na nasemte Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob phawk in: hih mihingte’ lungsim khauhna hita leh a gitlohna uh hita leh a khialhna uh hita taleh thusim kei in,

tua bang hi kei leh kote nong paikhiatpihna gam mite in, “Topa in amaute tungah a ciamsa leitangah amaute paipih zo loin, amah in amaute mudah ahih manin, gamlakah amaute that dingin paikhiatpih hi,” ci kha ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen na vangliatna leh na thahatna tawh na paikhiatpih na mihingte leh na luahte ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Tua hun lai takin Topa in kei kiangah, ‘A masa-a bangin suangpeek nih seekin, mual tungah ka kiangah hong pai in la, sing singkuang khat bawl in.
A masa-a suangpeek na sukkhapte tunga thute tua suangpeekte tungah ka gelh ding a, singkuang sungah tuate na koih ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin singkha sing tawh singkuang khat bawlin, a masa-a bangin suangpeek nih ka seek a, ka khut sungah a peek nihte tawi-in mual tungah ka pai to hi.

Kikhop ni-in mei sung panin mual tungah Topa in note tungah hong gensa thute ahi thupiakna sawmte, a masa-in a kigelh bangin tua suangpeekte tungah amah in gelh hi; tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah tua suangpeekte hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin kihei-in mual tung panin ka paisuk a, ka bawlsa singkuang sungah tua suangpeekte ka koih hi; Topa in kei hong thupiak bangin suangpeekte tua sungah tu-in a om hi.
(Be-eroth Ben-ejaakan panin Moserah ah Israel mite zin uh hi. Tua lai-ah Aaron si a, tua lai mah ah kivui hi; ama tangin a tapa Eleazar in siampi na sem hi.
Tua lai panin Gudgodah ah pai uh a, Gudgodah panin lui tuite a omna gam Jotbathah ah pai uh hi.
Tua hun lai takin Topa in, tu ni dongin ama na a sem ding leh ama min tawh thupha a pia dingin Topa mai-ah ding-in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua dingin Levi minam tuam koih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte uh bangin Levi mite in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh hi. Topa na Pasian un amau kiangah a gen bangin Topa in amau luah ahi hi.)
“A masa-a bangin sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung mual tungah ka om a, Topa in tua hunin zong ka thu hong ngai hi; Topa in note hong susia nuam lo hi.
Topa in kei tungah, ‘Amaute tungah piak dingin a pate uh tungah ka kiciam leitangah pai-in a luah theih nadingun ding in la, na khualzin uh zomin mite mai-ah pai in,’ hong ci hi.
“Israelte aw, tu-in, Topa na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh Topa note’ Pasian’ na sep ding,
leh nomau’ hoih nadingin tu ni-a kong thupiak ahi thupiaknate leh Topa’ thukhamte zuih ding cih sim loh, Topa na Pasian un no tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?
En un, vantung leh vantung a sangpente leh leitung leh a sunga om khempeuh in Topa note’ Pasian’ aa ahi hi;
tua hi napi-in Topa in itna tawh ama lungsim na pu na pate uh tungah koihin, tu ni-a mah bangin midangte khempeuh sangin nomau’ suan leh khakte hong teel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thu mang un la, lung khauh nawn kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un a lian, a vanglian a kihtak huai Pasian, angvan nei loin, sumgolh a la lo, pasiante’ Pasian, topate’ Topa ahi hi.
Amah in pa nei lote leh meigong numeite adingin thutang semin, mi peemte itin an leh puan a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi peemte it un; bang hang hiam cih leh note in Izipt gamah mi peemte na hi uh hi.
Topa note’ Pasian na zahtak ding uh hi; ama na semin amah beelin, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.
Amah in nomau’ phat ahi hi: na mitte un a muhsa ahi hih a lian a kihtak huai a lamdang nate note adingin hong bawlsakpa in na Pasian uh ahi hi.
Na pu na pate uh mihing sawmsagih Izipt ah paisuk uh hi; tu-in Topa na Pasian un vantung aksi zah-in note hong tamsak hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian uh itin, ama hong thuhilhna, a thukhamte, a ngeina kipte, a thupiaknate na zui tawntung ding uh hi.
Tu ni-in ngaihsun un (a thei nai lo, a mu nai lo na tate uh tungah a gen hilo ka hih ciangin) Topa note’ Pasian’ hong thuhilhna, ama liatna, a vangliatna leh a thahatna,
Izipt kumpipa Faro leh a leitang tung khempeuhah a hih Izipt gam sunga ama limte leh a sepnate;
Izipt galkapte, a sakolte leh a leengte tungah a hihte; note hong delh laitakin San Tuipi tui tawh amaute tuumsakin, tu ni dongin Topa in amaute a suksiatna;
hih mun na tun’ ma sung tengun gamlakah amah in note tungah hong hihte;

Reuben’ tapa Eliab’ tapa Dathan leh Abiramte tungah a hihte; leitang in a kam ka-in, Israelte khempeuh’ lakah a innkuanpite, a puanbukte leh amau a zuite khempeuh tawh amaute a nawmvalhna ngaihsun un;
bang hang hiam cih leh a hihsa Topa’ nasepna a liante khempeuh na mite un mu khin hi.

8-9 “Tua ahih ciangin note thahatin, note va pai-in na luah ding uh leitangah va pai-in na luah theih nading uh leh, Topa in na pu na pate uh leh a suan leh khakte uh piak dingin a kiciam, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gamah sau vei na nuntak theih nadingun tu ni-a kong thupiak ahi thupiakna khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh luah dinga na lutna ding uh leitang in note’ hong paikhiatna, anteh ciin’na huang banga khaici vawhin na khe tawh tui na buahna uh Izipt leitang tawh kibang lo hi;
note va pai-in na luah ding uh leitang in, vantung panin guahtui a ngah mual leh guam a omna leitang,
Topa na Pasian un a kep leitang ahi hi; kum kipat-a kipan kum bei dongin Topa note Pasian’ mitte in tua leitang en tawntung hi.
“Topa na Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama’ na na sep nadingun tu ni-a no kong thupiak ahi ama thupiaknate na zuih uh leh,
na an leh na leenggahzu leh na sathau uh na kaihkhop theih dingun amah in guah masa leh guah nunung, a hunin na leitang uh adingin guah hong zusak ding hi.
Amah in na ganhingte uh adingin na gam sung uhah lopa hong posak ding a, note in zong ne-in na gil uh vah ding hi.
Na lungsim uh hong kikhemin, note kihei-in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak khak loh nadingun kingaihsun un,
tua hi kei leh no tungah Topa hong heh-in guah zu loin, leitang in gah piangsak loin, Topa in no hong piak leitang hoih ah manlangin na siat pak theih nadingun amah in vantungte khakcip kha ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin hih ka kammalte na lungsim uhah ciamtehin na ngaihsun ding uh hi; na khut tung uhah lim dingin na khih ding uh a, tuate in na mitte kikal uhah talsuan hi ding hi.
Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na inn sung uhah na tut laitak, lampi ah na pai laitak, leh na lup ciang leh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uh hi.

20-21 Vantungte in leitung’ tungah a om lai teng, amaute tungah piak dingin Topa in na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciam gam sungah note leh na tate uh khan’ a sau theih nadingin na inn kongkhak khuam leh na kongpite uh tungah tuate na gelh ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh itin, ama lampi khempeuh zui-in, amah beelin, nomau zuih dingin kong thupiak hih thupiakna khempeuh zuih ding na kingaihsut uh leh,
Topa in na mai uhah a om hih minamte khempeuh hawlkhia ding a, note sangin lianzaw-in a thahat zaw minamte na suankhia ding uh hi.
Na khe un a sikna mun khempeuh nomau’ aa hi ding hi; na gamgi un gamlak panin Lebanon ciang dong leh Gun, Eufrates gun, panin nitumna tuipi dong hi ding hi.
Na lang uhah kuamah pang zo lo ding hi; note tungah hong ciam bangin Topa na Pasian un na tot ding uh gam khempeuh tungah note hong kizahtakna leh note hong kihtakna tungsak ding hi.
“En un, tu ni-in na mai uhah thupha khat leh hamsia khat ka koih hi:
tu ni-a no kong thupiak ahi Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate na zuih uh leh thupha hi a,
Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate mang loin, na theih nai loh uh pasian dangte’ nung zui dingin tu ni-a no kong thupiak lampi panin na kihei khiat uh leh hamsia ahi hi.
Luah dingin na lutna leitang uhah Topa na Pasian un hong paipih ciangin Gerizim Mual tungah thupha koihin, Ebal Mual tungah hamsia na koih ding uh hi.
Tuate in Jordan gal, lampi panin nitumna lam, ni a tum sukna lam, Moreh tawsaw gei-a Gilgal gal khat, Arabah ah a teeng Kanaan mite’ gam sungah om hilo ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang luah dingin a pai dingin Jordan a kantan ding na hi uh hi; tua leitang luahin a sungah na teen’ uh ciangin,
tu ni-a note kong piak thukhamte leh ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih ding uh lim takin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
“Hite in, leitangah na nuntak lai teng uh Topa, na pu na pate’ Pasian in neih dingin no hong piaksa gam sungah lim takin na zuih ding uh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte ahi hi.
Na suankhiat ding uh minamte in amau’ pasiante’ na sepna uh mualsangte tung leh mualneute tung leh singniim nuai, mun khempeuh na susia taktak ding uh hi;

amaute’ biakna taute phel khia-in, a khuampite deeng zanin, amaute’ Asherah milimte mei tawh na hal ding uh hi; a kiseek amau’ pasiante’ limte na phukpai ding uh a, tua mun panin amau’ min na maimangsak ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa na Pasian uh tungah tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koih nadingin teelin, ama om nadinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uh hi;

tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh leh na biak piaknate uh, note in na piak uh na sehsawm suah sehkhat uh leh na piakte, thuciamna biak piakna, ut thu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uh hi;
Topa na Pasian uh a omna tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note leh na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uh hi.
Tu hun ciangin mi khempeuh in ama hoihsak bangin a gamtat ngei ciat bangin na gamta nawn kei ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note hong piak tawlngakna leh luahna ah na tung nai kei uh hi.

Ahih hangin Jordan gal khatah pai-in, Topa na Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitangah teengin, nuam taka na nuntak theih nadingun na kiim uh a, na langte khempeuh uh kiang panin tawlngakna hong piak ciangin,

Topa na Pasian un ama min a teen’ nading muna a teelna munah note kong sawl khempeuh na paipih ding uh hi; na meihal biaknate uh leh na biak piaknate uh, note in na piakna sehsawm suah sehkhat uh leh na piakte uh leh Topa tungah na ciam uh na thuciam piaknate uh na paipih ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah note leh na tapate leh na tanute, na nasem pasalte uh leh na nasem numeite uh, leh note neih bangin tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin a nei lo na khua sunga om Levi mite tawh lungdam khawm un.
Na tuahna mun peuh uhah na meihal biaknate uh na piak loh nadingun kingaihsun un;
na minamte uh sung panin Topa in a teelna mun khatah na meihal biaknate uh pia-in, note kong thupiakte khempeuh tua lai munah na hih ding uh hi.

“Ahi zongin, Topa na Pasian un note tungah hong piak thupha tawh kizui-in na khuapite khatpeuh peuh uh sungah sa na deih zahzah uh go-in na ne thei ding uh hi; sanang leh sakhitalte a kinek mah bangin mi a nin leh a siangte in na ne thei ding uh hi.
A si na ne kei bek ding uh hi; tui bangin leitungah na buakhia ding uh hi.

Na an uh sehsawm suah sehkhat ahi a, na leenggahzu uh ahi a, na sathau uh ahi zongin, na bawnghon leh na tuuhonte uh sung pan tacilte ahi zongin, na kiciam uh ahi na thuciamna biak piakna khatpeuh peuh uh ahi zongin, ut-thu-a na piaknate uh ahi zongin, nomau piak ahi piaknate ahi zongin na khuapite uh sungah na ne thei kei ding uh hi;

Topa na Pasian un a teelna munah note leh na tapa leh na tanu, na nasem pasal leh na nasem numei, na khuapi sunga om Levi mite in Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah na ne ding uh hi; na hihna khempeuh uhah Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah na lungdam ding uh hi.
Na gam sung uhah na teen’ lai teng uh Levi mite na mangngilh loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
“No tungah hong ciamsa bangin Topa na Pasian un na gamgi uh hong sotsak ciangin, sa duh na hih manun, ‘Sa ka ne ding uh hi,’ na cih uh leh, na duh zahzah uh sa na ne thei ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian un ama min koih nadingin a teelna mun in note kiang panin a gamla lua ahih leh, note kong thupiaksa bangin Topa in no hong piaksa na bawnghon uh pan ahi a, na tuuhon uh pan ahi zongin khatpeuh peuh na go thei ding uh hi; na duh zahzah uh na khua sung uhah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Sanang ahi a, sakhital ahi zongin a kinek mah bangin na ne thei ding uh hi; mi a nin leh mi a siangte in a kibangin na ne thei ding uh hi.
A si na nek loh ding uh thei tel un; bang hang hiam cih leh sisan in nuntakna hi a, nuntakna pen sa tawh na ne khawm kei ding uh hi.
Sisan na ne kei ding uh hi; tui bangin leitungah na buakhia ding uh hi.
Topa muhna ah a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note leh note khit ciangin na tate uh a nopsak theih nadingin sisan na ne kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin na bat uh a siangtho nate leh na thuciamna na piaknate uh note in la-in Topa in a teelna munah na paipih ding uh a,

Topa na Pasian uh biakna tau tungah na meihal biakna, a sa leh a si na pia ding uh hi; na biak piakna uh site Topa note’ Pasian’ biakna tau tungah kibuakhia ding a, ahih hangin a sa na ne thei ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian uh muhna ah a hoih leh a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note leh note khit cianga na tate uh a nopsak theih nadingin note kong thupiak hih kammalte khempeuh na kin ding uh lim takin ngaihsun un.
“Topa na Pasian un na mai panun na suankhiat ding uh minamte beimang sakin, amaute suankhia-in amau’ leitangah na teen’ uh ciangin,

na mai uhah amaute a kisuksiat khit ciangin amaute zui dingin na awk khak loh nading uh leh, ‘Kei zong amau’ hih bangin ka hih theih nadingin hih minamte in a pasiante’ na bangci sep ahi hiam?’ ci-in a pasiante’ thu na kan loh nadingun kingaihsun un.

Topa na Pasian uh tungah tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a muhdah a kihhuai nam khempeuh amaute in a pasiante uh adingin hih uh hi; a pasiante uh adingin a tapate leh a tanute nangawn uh mei sungah hal uh hi.
“Note kong thupiak khempeuh na hih ding uh na lim ngaihsut ding uh hi; na behlap kei ding uh a, zong na khiam kei ding uh hi.
“Note lakah kamsang khat ahi a, mang man khat ahi zongin hong khangin, lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong lak a,
ama hong gen lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong tungin, na theih ngei loh uh, ‘Adang pasiante nung zui-in amaute na sem ni,’ hong cih leh,

tua kamsangpa ahi a, mang manpa thu ahi zongin na ngai kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa note’ Pasian na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na it uh hiam cih a kitheihna dingin, Topa na Pasian un no hong ze-etna ahi hi.
Topa na Pasian uh nung zui-in, amah na zahtak ding uh a, a thupiaknate zui-in a aw na ngai ding uh a, ama na semin amah na beel ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin tua kamsangpa ahi a, mang manpa ahi zongin kithat ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un na pai nading uh a, a hong thupiak na nusiat theih nading uh, leh Izipt leitang panin hong paikhiatpih in, salsuahna panin hong tankhia Topa na Pasian uh lang pangin na lehdo nading uh thu hong hilh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin note lak panin siatna na siangkhiasak ding uh hi.

6-7 “Na nu’ tapa ahih kei leh na pa’ tapa na sanggampa ahi a, na tanu ahih kei leh na tapa in ahi a, na ang sunga om na zi ahi a, nangmah banga na ngaihsut na lawm it in ahi zongin nang hong zol simin, lei mong khat pan mong khat dong kikal-ah, nang kiang pan a nai ahi a, a gamla ahi zongin, nang hita leh na pu na pate hita leh in a theih ngei loh, na kiim-a om mite’ pasiante, ‘Va pai-in pasian dangte’ na va sem ni,’ hong cih leh
ama cih mang loin, a thu ngai loin, amah hehpih loin, amah khahkhong loin, amah na iim kei ding hi;
nangmah in amah na that ding hi; amah that dingin nangmah a masapen na hi ding a, tua khit ciangin midangte khempeuh in hong zui ding uh hi.
Salsuahna ahi Izipt gam panin a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh kiang panin note hong paikhiatpih ding ngaihsun ahih manin suang tawh amah na deng lum ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte khempeuh in za-in, lau ding uh a, hih banga gitlohna note lakah bawl kik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.
“Topa na Pasian un teen’ nadinga hong piak na khuapite khatpeuh peuh uh sungah,
mi gina lo pawlkhat note lakah hong pai-in, ‘Pai-in pasian dangte’ na va sem ni,’ ci-in na theih ngei lohte uh lamah khuapi sung a teeng mite a paikhiatpihna na zak uh leh,
note in a thu na kan ding uh a, zong-in lim takin na dong ding uh hi; en un, note lakah tua banga a kihhuai-in gamtatna thu a om mah ahih takpi leh,
tua khua sunga mite namsau tawh na that ding uh a, khua sunga om khempeuh leh a ganhingte, namsau tawh na susia mang ding uh hi.

Note in van kinusiate khempeuh khua laizang mun awng-ah khawmin, Topa na Pasian uh tungah khuapi leh van kinusiate khempeuh meihal biakna buppi-in mei tawh na hal ding uh hi; tua khuapi in asia hi tawntung ding a, kilam kik nawn lo ding hi.

17-18 Tu ni-a note kong thupiak ahi ama thupiaknate khempeuh zui-in Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah a manin gamtatna tawh Topa na Pasian uh aw na ngaih uh leh, na pu na pate uh tungah a ciamsa bangin, a kihtak huai ama hehna panin Topa hong kihei-in note tungah migitna hong lakin, note tungah hehpihna hong nei-in, note tampi tak hong phak sak theih nadingin a ki-apsa na khat beek zong na kem kei ding uh hi.
Note in Topa na Pasian uh mite na hi uh hi; mi site hangin note ki-at keh loin, na sam uh zong na mettol kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note in Topa na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mite na hi uh a, leitung maitang-a om mite khempeuh sung panin ama neih mi dingin Topa in note hong teel ahi hi.
“A kihhuai na khatpeuh peuh na ne kei ding uh hi.
Hihte in na nek theih ding uh ganhingte ahi hi: bawng, tuu, keel,
sakhital, sanang, sim-sakhi, sathak, saza, zo-sakhi, leh gamtuu ahi hi.
Ganhingte lak panin a khecin kikhenin a khecin nih-in a ka, eknel a hai ganhing peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
