a nu leh a pa sangin nang hong thupi ngaihsut zaw a, ‘Amaute ka thupisim kei hi,’ a ci pa ahi hi; amah in a sanggamte paai khia-in, a tate don lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in na thu mangin, na thuciamna zui uh hi.
Amaute in na ngeina kipte Jakob suante hilhin, na thukhamte Israel hilh ding uh hi; amaute in na mai-ah paknamtui hong koihin, na biakna tau tungah meihal biakna bup hong koih ding uh hi.
Topa aw, ama’ nate tungah thupha pia in la, a khut tawh a nasepnate saang in; a galte’ kawng su-tan in la, a din’ kik nawn loh nadingun amah a mudahte sugawp in,” a ci hi.
Benjamin thu genin, “Topa in a it mipa, ama kiangah nuam takin om hi; amah in sun tawntung kemin, a liang kikal-ah ama omna bawlsak hi,” a ci hi.
Josef thu genin, “Topa in ama leitang tunga om vantung letsong hoih pente, leh nuai-a om a thuknate tawh,
ni hanga gah a hoihpente, leh kha hanga piang a hoihpente tawh,
taanglai mualte tunga piang a hoihpente, leh tawntung mualte’ hauhna tawh,
leitung leh a tunga om letsong hoihpente, leh sawlbawk lakah a teengpa’ maipha tawh thupha pia hen. Hihte, Josef tungah tung hen la, a sanggamte lakah ulian ahi mipa’ lutungah tung hen.

A tacil bawngtal in minliatna nei a, a kite in gamsial kite ahi hi; amah in tuate tawh mite nawt ding a, lei mongdong ah amaute khempeuh phul ding hi; Efraim tul sawmte in tua bang hi a, Manasseh tul tampite in zong tua bang mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Zebulun thu genin, “Zebulun aw, na paikhiatna ah lungdam in; Issakhar aw, na puanbukte sungah lungdam in.

Amaute in a mual uhah mite sam ding uh a, amaute in tua lai-ah biak piakna mante pia ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tuipi tamna, leh sehnel sunga na manpha kiseelte ngah uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gad thu genin, “Gad a lian-in a bawlpa in thupha ngah hen! Gad in humpinelkai bangin buk a, amah in a baan, leh a luzang balkham hi.

Amah in lei hoihpenna mun ama adingin teel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a ukpa’ tanh kikoihcing sak hi; mi makaite’ ngahte mah amah zong kingahsak a, amah in Israel tawh Topa’ thupiakna leh thuman khennate a sem hi,” a ci hi.
Dan thu genin, “Dan in Bashan panin a diangkhia humpinelkai no ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Naftali thu genin, “O Naftali, maipha tawh nuam a sa, Topa’ thupha tawh a kidim, bual tui leh leitaw lam a neipa,” a ci hi.
Asher thu genin, “Asher in tapa dangte sangin thupha ngahzaw hen; a sanggamte’ pahtak hi hen la, a gam sungah oliv thau kidim ta hen.
Na khuapite, sik leh sumngo tawh kidal ding a, na nuntak lai teng na thahatna tua bang hi ding hi, a ci hi.
“Israel aw, nangmah huh dingin vantungah a tuang, a liatna tawh vanpi-ah a om, Pasian tawh a kibang kuamah dang om lo hi.
Tawntung Pasian in nangma omna hi a, nangmah huh dingin tawntung baante a om hi. Amah in na mai-ah galte nawhkhia-in, Susia un, ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lungmuanna sungah Israel bek teeng hi, Jakob’ suante bek, an leh leenggahzu gamah om hi; hi taktak hi, a vantungte in daitui hong khiatsuk hi.

Israel aw, mi nuamsa na hi hi. Nang hong kihuhna lum, leh na gualzawhna namsau ahi Topa in nang banga, a hotkhiat mi kua om ahi hiam? Na galte in hong mai-etin na kiangah hong pai ding uh a, amau’ pumpi na tuancil ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses zanglei panin Jerikho gal Nebo Mual, Pisgah dawnah Moses paito hi. Tua ciangin Topa in gam khempeuh, Gilead gam Dan ciang dong,
Naftali gam khempeuh, Efraim leh Manasseh gam, Judah gam khempeuh Ni-tumna Tuipi dong,
Negeb gam, leh Zanglei zong, tua pen nisuh kung khuapi Jerikho kuam ahi, Zoar ciang dong, amah lak hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Hih gam in, Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakob tungah kiciamin, ‘Na suan leh khakte uh tungah ka pia ding hi,’ ka cih leitang ahi hi. Na mit tawh nang kong musak khin a, ahih hangin tua lai-ah nang na pai kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa thugenna bangin Topa’ nasem Moses pen Moab gamah si a,
Bethpeor gal khat, Moab gam kuamah amah kiphum hi; ahih hangin tuhun dongin amah a kiphumna mun kuamah in thei lo hi.
Moses a sih-in kum za leh kum sawmnih pha hi; a mit mang lo a, a tha ngeina zong kiam lo hi.
Israel mite Moab zanglei-ah ni sawmthum sung Moses hangin kap uh hi; tua khit ciangin Moses hangin kahna leh thuumna veng hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in, ama tungah a khut nga khin ahih manin Nun’ tapa Joshua in lungsim pilna tawh kidim hi; tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in ama thu mangin, Topa in Moses a thupiakna bangin gamta uh hi.
Israel sungah Moses bangin Topa in maitang kimu-in a theih kamsang dang kuamah om lo hi.
Izipt gam sungah Faro leh a nasemte leh a gam khempeuh ah a hih dingin Topa in ama tungah a piak limte leh na lamdangte khempeuh,
leh Israelte khempeuh muhna ah Moses in a hih a lian vangliatna leh a lauhuai hihnate khempeuh a nei, amah tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi.
Topa’ nasem Moses a sih khit ciangin Topa in Moses’ nasem ahi Nun’ tapa Joshua kiangah,
“Ka nasempa Moses si ta hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in ding in la, nang leh hih mite khempeuh, hih Jordan kantanin Israel mite tungah ka piak gam sungah pai un.
Moses tungah ka ciam bangin na khe in a totna mun khempeuh nang tungah kong pia ding hi.
Gamlak leh hih Lebanon panin gun lianpi ahi Eufrates gun dong, ni tumna lam-a Tuipi lian lam, Hit mite’ leitang khempeuh nangma gam hi ding hi.
Na nuntak sung tawntung kuamah in na mai hong khak zo lo ding hi; Moses tawh ka om mah bangin nang tawh zong kong om ding hi; nang kong tamasak kei ding a, kong nusia kei ding hi.
Thahat in la hang in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute piak dingin a pate uh tungah ka ciam leitang hih mite na luahsak ding hi.

Thahat-in hang in la, ka nasempa Moses in nang hong piak thukhamte khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat ding lim takin ngaihsun in; na paina peuhah hoih takin na lamzan’ theihna dingin tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin pial kei in.

Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga a kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theihna dingin sun leh zanin na lungngaingai ding hi; tua hi leh na lampi mavang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
Thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Thahat in la hang in; lau kei in la, lungkia kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina peuhpeuhah Topa na Pasian nang tawh hong om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite’ uliante thu pia-in,

“Giahphual-ah pai un la, mite thu pia-in, ‘Na lam-an ding uh kiging khol un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un na neih dingun note hong piak leitangah pai-in a luah dingin ni thum sungin hih Jordan a galkah ding na hi uh hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte tungah,
“Topa’ nasem Moses in note thu hong piakna kammal, ‘Topa na Pasian un note tawlngakna mun hong pia-in, hih leitang note hong pia ding hi,’ a cihna thu phawk un.

Moses in Jordan gal khata note hong piak leitangah na zite, na taneute, leh na ganhingte uh a na om ding uh hi; ahih hangin note lakah galhang mi khempeuh in hiam tawi-in Jordan kantanin na sanggamte uh mai-ah pai-in,

note hong piak bangin Topa in na sanggamte uh tungah tawlngakna pia-in, Topa na Pasian un amaute a piak leitang amaute in zong a luah mateng na huh ding uh hi; tua ciangin note’ neih leitangah ciah kikin, Topa’ nasem Moses in Jordan gal ni suahna lamah note hong piak leitang na luah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Joshua dawngin, “Kote nong thupiak khempeuh ka hih ding uh a, nong sawlna peuhpeuhah ka pai ding uh hi.
Na khempeuhah Moses’ thu ka man’ uh mah bangin nangma thu zong kong mang ding uh hi. Moses a ompih mah bangin Topa na Pasian in nang hong ompih ta hen!
Na thupiakna leh na thute, na thupiak peuhpeuh hong langpangin a mang lo mipa kithat ding hi. Thahat in la hang in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Nun tapa Joshua in Shittim panin thukanin mi nih sawl sim a, “Pai-in gam va en un la, a diakdiakin Jerikho khua hong en un,” a ci hi. Amaute pai uh a, Rahab min nei a paktat numei khat’ innah tungin giak uh hi.
Jerikho kumpipa tungah, “En in, gamsung en dingin Israel mi pawlkhat tu nitakin hih lai-ah hong tung zo hi,” ci-in kigen hi.

Tua ciangin Jerikho kumpipa in Rahab kiangah mi sawlin, “Na inn sunga hong tum, na kianga hong tung mite hong pai khiatpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh gam khempeuh a en dingin amaute hong pai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin tua numei in mi nihte la-in na seel khin hi; tua ciangin amah in, “Hi mah hi, ka kiangah mi hong pai uh hi; ahih hangin amaute koi pan hong pai hiam cih ka thei kei hi;
kulh kongpi a kikhak ding khuamial ciangin tua mite paikhia uh hi; tua mite koi-ah pai uh hiam ka thei kei hi; manlangin amaute delh un; na pha kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in innkhum zangah tua mite paipih to-in innkhum zangah a koih ngei bangin a koihsa anthul kungte lakah amaute seel khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite in Jordan lamah ngahmun dong delh uh hi; a delhte a paikhiat phetin kulh kongpi kikhak hi.
Amaute a lup ma-in innkhumzang amaute kiangah amah paito a,
tua mite kiangah, “Topa in note tungah hih leitang hong piak khitna ka thei a, note hong kikihtakna kote tungah hong tungin, hih gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuh note mai-ah lunggim uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt panin nong paikhiat lai-un Topa in note mai-ah San Tuipi tui a kan’sakna, leh Jordan gal khata om na suksiat mang uh Amor mite’ kumpi nihte ahi Sihon leh Og tungah na bawlna uh ka za khin uh hi.

Tua thu ka zak phetun lungsim kitam zanin, ka lungsim uh bei a, note’ hangin mite’ lungsimah han’na bei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un tunga om vantung leh nuai-a om leitungah Pasian ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note tungah kong dik gamtat bangin note in zong ko’ innkuan-ah nong dik gamtat nading uh Topa min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam un la, a man taktak lim khat kei hong pia-in,
ka nu leh ka pa, ka sanggamnute, ka sanggampate, leh amaute tawh a kizomte khempeuh hong hon un la, sihna panin kote hong suakta sak un,” a ci hi.

Mite in ama tungah, “Nang’ tangin kote ka si ngam uh hi. Hih ko thu na genkhiat kei nak leh Topa in kote tungah hih leitang hong piak ciangin nang tungah dikna leh thumanna tawh kong gamta ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kongvangneu panin khau khat tawh amaute khaisuk hi, bang hang hiam cih leh khuapi kulh sunglam pangah ama inn kilam a, khuapi kulh sungah amah teeng hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Mual tungah pai un, hong delhte tawh na kituak kha ding uh hi; hong delhte hong ciahkik mateng nithum sung tua lai-ah bu un; tua khit ciangin na pai nading uh ah na pai thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in ama kiangah, “Kote nong kiciam sak thuciamna thu tawh kisai-in ka paubaang kei ding uh hi.

En in, hih leitangah kong pai uh ciangin kote nong khai sukna hih kongvangneu-ah hih khauhual san na khih ding hi; na inn sungah na nu leh na pa, na sanggampate leh na pa innkuanpihte khempeuh na khawm ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh na inn kong panin kongzing lampi-ah a paikhiat leh ama sihna in ama khialhna hang hi ding hi, kote ka siang ding uh hi; ahih hangin inn sungah nang tawh a om mi khatpeuh a kisukkhak leh, ama sihna in kote’ khialhna hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin hih ko thute na gen khiat leh, kote nong kiciam sak thuciamna tawh kisai-in kote ka siang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Na thugen bangun hi ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute sawl khia a, amaute paikhia uh hi; amah in a khauhual san a kongvangneu-ah khih hi.
Amaute paikhia-in, mual tungah pai uh a, a delhte a ciahkik mateng nithum sung om uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a delhte in lam dung khempeuh zongin bangmah mu lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin mualtung panin mi nihte paisuk kik uh a, galkahin Nun tapa Joshua kiangah tung uh hi; amau tunga thupiang khempeuh ama tungah gen uh hi.
Amaute in Joshua kiangah, “Topa in leitang khempeuh eite khut sungah hong pia taktak hi; tua tham loin tua gam-a teeng mite khempeuh eite hangin lungmang uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zingsang tungin Joshua tho-in Israel mite khempeuh tawh Shittim panin ding khia uh hi; amaute Jordan gun tung uh a, a galkah ma-un tua munah giak uh hi.
Nithum a cin’ni ciangin giahphualah uliante pai uh a,
mite thu pia-in, “Topa na Pasian uh thuciamna singkuang Levi mi siampite in a puak na muh uh ciangin na omna mun panun ding khia-in na zui ding uh hi,

hih lamah pai ngei lo na hih manun na pai nading uh lampi tu-a bangin na thei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note leh tua thuciamna singkuang kikalah mun awng, tong tulnih bang kihalna om ding hi; a gei-ah pai kei-un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Nomau mah kisiangsak tawm un; bang hang hiam cih leh zing ciangin note lakah Topa in nalamdangte hong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in siampite kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang la un la, mite mai-ah paisuak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in thuciamna singkuang la uh a, mite mai-ah pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Moses tawh ka omkhawm bangin nang tawh kong omkhawm nading thu amaute in a theih nadingun Israel mite khempeuh muhna-ah tu ni-in nang liatsak ding ka kipan ding hi.
Thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite thu na pia ding a, ‘Jordan tuite gei na tun’ uh ciangin Jordan sungah taang loin na ding ding uh hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Israel mite kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai un la, Topa na Pasian uh thute za un,” a ci hi.

Joshua in, “A nungta Pasian note lakah a omna hih thu tawh na thei ding uh hi, amah in pel loin note mai panin Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Hiv mite, Perez mite, Girgash mite, Amor mite, leh Jebus mite hawlkhia ding hi.
En un, leitung buppi’ Topa’ thuciamna singkuang note mai Jordan lamah pai ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel minamte sung panin nam khat pan mi khat, mi sawm-le-nih la un.

Leitung buppi’ Topa ahi Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite’ khete in Jordan tui a siik ciangin Jordan tuite luang nawn lo ding a, a tung lam panin hong luangsuk tuite lom khatin khawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite mai-ah thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite tawh Jordah galkah dingin a puanbuk uh panin mite ding khia-in,
thuciamna singkuang a puate Jordan tung a, thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite’ khe tui-ah a kidiah ciangin (anlak hun sung khempeuh Jordan a piau khempeuh ah let hi),

a sak lam panin hong luangsuk tuite khawlin khangto a, a gamlapi, Zerethan gei-a khuapi Adam-ah a lomin kikhol a, Ci Tuipi a kici Arabah tuipi-ah a luang sukte kikhen tat siang hi; tua ciangin Jerikho galah mite galkah uh hi.
Israelte khempeuh leikeu tungah a galkah sung, minam bup in Jordan a khen’ khit mateng, Topa thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite Jordan gun laizang leikeu tungah ding uh hi.
Minam khempeuh Jordan a galkah khit uh ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah,
“Nam khat pan mi khat, mite lak panin mi sawm-le-nih la in la,
amaute thu pia-in, ‘Siampite’ khe a din’na mun mahmah, Jordan gun laizang panin suangtum sawm-le-nih la un la, a galah pua-in tu nitak-a na giahna uh munah koih un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in nam khat panin mi khat, ama sehsa mi sawm-le-nihte Israel mite lak panin sam hi;
Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Topa na Pasian uh thuciamna singkuang mai-ah Jordan laizangah pai un la, note in Israel minam pha zah tawh kizui-in suangtum khat ciat la-in na liangko tung uh ah pua un;
hong tung ding hunah na tate un, ‘Hih suangtumte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot ciangin note lakah lim khat hi ding hi.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah Jordan tuite kikhentan hi; Jordan a galkah ciangin Jordan tuite kikhentan hi, na ci ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin hih suangtumte in Israel mite tungah a tawntunga phawkna hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Joshua’ thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh a, Topa in Joshua a thupiak bangin Israel minam a phazah tawh kizui-in Jordan laizang panin suangtum sawm-le-nih la uh hi; amaute in a giahna uh munah tuate pua uh a, tua lai munah koih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite’ khe a din’nasa mun, Jordan laizangah tua suang sawm-le-nihte phut hi; tu ni dongin tuate tua mun mahah om lai hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in Joshua a thupiak bangin mite tungah a gen dingin Topa in Joshua a thupiakte khempeuh a vekpi-in a kiman’ khit matengin Jordan laizangah thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite ding uh hi. Mite nawhsa-in galkah uh hi;
mite khempeuh a galkah khit uh ciangin Topa thuciamna singkuang leh siampite, mite mai-ah na ma pai uh hi.
Moses in amaute a sawlsa bangin Israel mite mai-ah hiam tawi-in Reuben minamte leh Gad minamte leh Manasseh minam a langte na ma pai uh hi;
mi tul sawmli bang gal do dingin hiam tawi-in a baihsa-in Jerikho zanglei lamah Topa mai-ah pai uh hi.
Tua ni-in Israelte khempeuh muhna-ah Topa in Joshua liansak hi; amaute in Moses lamdang sa-in a om uh mah bangin, a nuntak sung tawntung amah lamdang sa-in om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah,
“Teci pan’na singkuang a pua siampite Jordan panin hong paikhiat nading thu pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in siampite thu pia a, “Jordan panin hong paikhia un,” a ci hi.

Topa thuciamna singkuang a pua siampite Jordan laizang panin hong paikhia-in, siampite khe leikeu tungah hong om toh ciangin, a ngeina bangin amau mun-ah Jordan tuite hong luang kikin a piau khempeuh tuum hi.
Kha masa a nisawm ni-in Jordan panin mite paikhia uh a, Jerikho nisuahna lam gamgi Gilgal-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Jordan panin a lak khiat uh tua suangtum sawm-le-nihte Joshua in Gilgal-ah phut hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Hong tung ding hunah na tate un a pate uh kiangah, ‘Hih suangte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin,
“Israelte in leikeu tung tawnin hih Jordan kantan hi,’ ci-in na tate uh na theisak ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in i kantan khit matengin Topa na Pasian un a keusak San Tuipi tungah a bawl bangin, note in na kantan khit matengun Topa na Pasian un Jordan tuite note adingin keusak hi;
Topa’ khut vanglian hi, ci-in leitung mi khempeuh in a theih nading ahi hi; Topa na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung theih nading uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Nitumna lam Jordan gal khat-a om Amor mite’ kumpite khempeuh leh tuipi gei-a om Kanaan mite’ kumpite khempeuh in, Israel mite in a kantan khit mateng amaute adingin Jordan tuite Topa in a kan’sakna thu a zak uh ciangin lungmang uh a, Israel mite hangin a lungsim uh a bei hi.
Tua hun lai takin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Meisuang tem bawl in la Israel mite a nihveina vun at kik in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in meisuang tem bawl a, Gibeath-ha-araloth mun-ah Israel mite a vun a at hi.
Joshua in amaute vun a atna a thu in: Izipt panin hong paikhia pasal galhang mite khempeuh, Izipt panin hong paikhiat khit uh ciangin lamkal gamlakah si khin uh hi.
Hong paikhia mite khempeuh vun a ki-at khit hangin Izipt panin hong paikhiat khit uh gamlak lamkal-a suak mite khempeuh a vun uh ki-at nai lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa thu a ngaih lohna hangin Izipt panin a hong paikhia minam bup, galhang mite a sih khit dong kum sawmli sung gamlakah Israel mite lam pai uh hi; Topa in eite tungah hong piak dingin i pu i pate tungah a ciamsa bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitang amaute a muhsak loh nading thu amaute tungah Topa kiciam hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in vun a at mite pen, amaute tangin amah in a pian’sak amau tate ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh lampi-ah amaute a vun ki-at nai lo ahih manin vun at nai loh ahi uh hi.
Minam bup vun ki-atna a man khit ciangin giahphual amau mun ciat ah a dam mateng om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Tu ni-in note tung panin Izipt gamah sal suakin na minsiatna uh ka zial khia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen tu ni dongin Gilgal kici hi.
Israel mite Gilgal-a giahphual ah a om sungun tua kha a ni sawm-le-li ni nitakin Jerikho zanglei ah Paisan pawi bawl uh hi.
Paisan pawi khit a zingciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gam-a piang silngo sawhloh moh leh ankan ne uh hi.
Tua gam-a piang a nek ni uh a zing ciangin manna bei ta hi; Israel mite in manna nei nawn lo uh a, ahih hangin tua kumin Kanaan leitang-a piangte a ne uh hi.

Jerikho khua kiangah Joshua a tun’ ciangin a mitte sangsak in khuadak a, en in, a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawh mi khat a mai-ah na ding hi; ama kiangah Joshua pai-in, “Ko pawl na hi hiam, ahih kei leh ka langte pawl na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Hi lo hi; Topa’ galkapte a ukpa-in tu-in kong pai hi,” a ci hi. Joshua lei-ah bok sukin bia a, ama kiangah, “Ka Topa in a nasempa bang hong sawl nuam ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ galkapte a ukpa in Joshua kiangah, “Na khe panin na khedapte suah in; bang hang hiam cih leh na din’na mun in a siangtho leitang ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin Joshua gamta hi.
Tu-in Israel mite hangin a sunglam leh a pualam panin Jerikho kikhak cip hi; kuamah pusuak lo hi, kuamah sungtum lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Thei in, na khut sungah a kumpipa leh a mi thahatte tawh Jerikho kong pia khin hi.
Khuapi kimkotah galkap mi khempeuh khatvei na pai ding uh hi. Tua bangin niguk sung na pai ding uh hi.
Siampi sagih in thuciamna singkuang mai-ah tuutal ki peengkul sagih tawi ding uh hi; a ni sagih ni-in khuapi kimkotah sagihvei na pai ding uh a, siampite in peengkul tum ding uh hi.

Amaute in tuutal ki sauveipi a gin’sak uh ciangin, peengkul aw na zak phetun nakpi takin mi khempeuh awng ding uh hi; khuapi kulh cim mai ding a, mi khempeuh amau mai ciatah tang takin paisuak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Nun tapa Joshua in siampite samin amaute kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang la un la, tua Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah siampi sagihte tuutal ki peengkul sagih tawisak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mite kiangah, “Mai nawtin pai un; khuapi kimkotah pai un la, Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah hiamtawi mite paisak un,” a ci hi.
Joshua in mite a thupiak bangin Topa mai-ah a pai tuutal ki peengkul a tawi siampi sagihte mai nawtin pai-in peengkul tum uh a, Topa thuciamna singkuang in amaute zui hi.
Tua ciangin peengkul a tum siampite mai-ah hiamtawi mite pai uh a, peengkulte a kitum suak hun lai takin thuciamna singkuang nungah a nungdalte pai uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joshua in mite thu pia-in, “Awng un, ci-a kong sawl hun matengin note awng loin, na aw uh zong na kizasak kei ding uh a, na kam panun aw khatbeek ging khia lo ding hi; awng un, kong cih ciangin na awng bek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Topa thuciamna singkuang khuapi kimkotah khatvei paisak hi; amaute giahphual-ah hong ciahin giahphualah a zan giak uh hi.
Tua ciangin zingsangin Joshua thobaih a, siampite in Topa thuciamna singkuang la uh hi.

Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah a pai tuutal ki peengkul sagih a tawi siampi sagihte paisuakin peengkulte tum suak uh hi; amaute mai-ah hiamtawite pai-in, peengkulte a kitum suak hun lai takin Topa thuciamna singkuang nungah a nungdalte pai uh hi.
A ninih ni-in khuapi kimkotah khatvei pai uh a, giahphualah ciahkik uh hi. Tua bangin niguk sung hih uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in khuavak tungin tho baih uh a, tua mah bangin khuapi kimkotah sagihvei pai uh hi; tua ni bekin khuapi kimkotah amaute sagihvei pai uh hi.
A sagihveina-ah, siampite in peengkul a tum ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Awng un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in khuapi note hong pia zo hi.

Khuapi leh a sunga omte khempeuh suksiat dingin Topa tungah kipia ding hi; amah in i sawl kamtaite na seel ahih manin numei paktat Rahab leh ama inn sungah amah tawh a om khawmte khempeuh bek hing ding hi.

Ahih hangin suksiat dingin a kiseh nate panin nomau mah na kikem ding uh hi, tua hi kei leh tuate na suksiat ding uh ciangin a kisusia ding nate khat peuhpeuh iplahin la kha-in Israelte’ giahphual siat nading na khat suaksakin haksatna na tun’ kha ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin ngun leh kham, sumngo leh sik tawh kibawl nazatte Topa adingin siangtho hi; Topa’ sumkoihna-ah tuate tung ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite awng a, peengkulte kitum hi. Mite in peengkul aw a zak phetun nakpi takin awng uh a, kulhpi cim mai-in, mi khempeuh amau mai ciatah tang takin khuapi sungah pai uh a, khuapi la uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi sunga om khempeuh numei leh pasal, a moi a ham, bawngtalte, tuute, leh late khempeuh namsau tawh that mang khin uh a, khuapi Topa tungah ap uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in tua gam thu a va kansim mi nihte kiangah, “Numei paktat nu’ inn-ah va pai un la, tua lai panin a numei leh amah tawh a kizom khempeuh ama tungah na ciamsa bangun hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin thu kansim tangvalte va tum uh a, Rahab, leh a nu leh a pa leh a sanggamte leh amah tawh a kizom khempeuh pai khiatpih uh hi; amaute in tua nu’ tanau teng khempeuh paipih uh a, Israelte’ giahphual pua lamah koih uh hi.
Amaute in khuapi leh a sunga om khempeuh mei tawh hal uh hi; ngun leh kham, leh sumngo leh sik tawh a kibawl nazatte bek Topa’ inn-a sumkoihna-ah koih uh hi.

Ahih hangin numei paktat Rahab, leh a pa innkuanpite, leh tua nu tawh a kizomte khempeuh Joshua in hingkhawi hi; Jerikho thu kansim dingin Joshua in a sawl kamtaite tua nu in na seel ahih manin tu ni dongin Israel mite lakah a suan-le-khakte teeng uh hi.

Tua hun lai takin Joshua in amaute tungah thuciamna khat koih a, “Mi khat kipanin hih Jerikho khuapi a lamkikpa in Topa mai-ah samsiatna thuak ta hen. A tacil luang khaamin tua khuapi bulpi phut ding a, A tapa neu pen luang khaamin a kulh kongpite phut ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua tawh Topa om hi; gam khempeuhah ama min a thang hi.

Ahih hangin Israel mite in a ki-ap nate tawh kisai-in zuautat uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Judah minam Zerah tapa Zabdi, a tapa Karmi, a tapa Akhan in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la hi; tua ciangin Israel mite tungah Topa heh mahmah hi.
Joshua in Jerikho panin Beth-el nisuahna lam, Beth-aven gei-a om Ai khua-ah mi sawl a, amaute kiangah, “Paito un la a gam va ensim un,” a ci hi. Tua mite paito-in Ai khua va ensim uh hi.

Amaute Joshua kiangah hong ciah kikin ama kiangah, “Mi khempeuh kuanto sak kei in la mi tulnih ahi a, tulthum ahi zongin kuanto sak in Ai simsak in; amaute mi tawmno khat ahih manin tua lai-ah mi khempeuh gimto sak kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite lak panin tulthum bang tua lai-ah kuanto uh hi. Ai mite mai-ah amaute tai uh a,
Ai mite in amaute mi sawmthum-le-guk khawng thatin, a kulh kongpi mai Shebarim ciang dong delh uh a, tuahsukna mun-ah amaute that uh hi. Hih thu hangin Israel mite’ han’na bei-in, lau mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in dahna lim-in ama puante balkeekin nitak mateng Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah, amah leh Israel upate boksuk uh hi; amaute in a lu tung uh ah leivui koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Ala, Topa Pasian, kote hong susia ding Amor mite khut sungah hong pia dingin bang hangin hih mite Jordan gal khatah hong paipih peuhmah na hi hiam? Jordan gal khatah teen’ ding a lungkim hi hoh ta le ung!
Topa aw, Israelte in a galte uh mai-ah a nungkik uh ciangin bang gen thei ding ka hi hiam!

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kanaan mite leh hih gam-a teeng mi khempeuh in hih thu za ding uh a, kote hong umcihin leitung panin kote hong phiatkhia mang ding uh hi; tua ciangin a lian nangma min bang cih ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Tho in, bang hangin tua bangin lei-ah bok na hi hiam?
Israel khial khin hi; amaute in ka thupiak thuciamna palsat khin uh hi; amaute in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la uh hi; amaute in gu-in zuauthu gen uh a, amau van lakah tua nate koih uh hi.

Tua thu hangin Israel mite in a galte uh nang zo lo uh hi; amaute suksiat ding mi, na suak khin uh ahih manin a galte uh mai-ah nungkikin, tai uh hi. Note lak panin a ki-ap nate na suksiat kei uh leh nang tawh kong omkhawm nawn kei ding hi.

Tho in, mite sian’suah in la, ‘Zing cianga dingin note’ kisian’ suah tawm un; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian Topa in, “Israel aw, note lakah a ki-ap nate om hi; note lak panin a ki-ap nate na lak khiat matengun na galte uh na nang zo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin na minam nam-un note hong kipaipih ding hi; Topa in a lak minam a beh behin hong pai ding hi; Topa in a lak a beh a innkuan innkuanin hong pai ding hi; Topa in a lak innkuan a mi mi-in hong pai ding hi.

Tua ciangin a ki-ap nate tawh a kila khawm mipa leh a neih khempeuh, mei-in kihal ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa’ thuciamna palsat hi, Israel sungah a zumhuai na a sem ahi hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Joshua tho baihin, a nam namin Israelte hong paipih a, Judah minam kila hi;
tua ciangin amah in Judah behte hong paipih a, Zerahte beh kila hi; amah in Zerahte bek a mi mi-in hong paipih a, Zabdi kila hi;
tua ciangin amah in ama innkuanpihte a mi mi-in hong paipih a, Judah minam Zerah tapa Zabdi, a tapa Karmi, a tapa Akhan kila hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Akhan kiangah, “Ka tapa aw, Israel Topa Pasian min thangsak in la, amah phat in; tu-in na gamtatnasa kei tungah hong gen in; kei tungah hong iim kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Akhan in Joshua dawngin, “A tak takin, Israel Topa Pasian tungah ka khial khin a, hih in keima gamtatna ahi hi;

Shinar panin vankila lakah puan hoih khat, leh ngun shekel zanih a gik, leh shekel sawmnga a gik kham tawn khat ka muh ciangin, tuate ka iplah a, ka la hi; en in, tuate ka puanbuk sung lei lakah a ngunte a nuai-ah omin kiseel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in kamtaite sawl a, amaute a puanbuk-ah va tai uh hi; en in, a puanbuk sungah a ngun nuainung-in a na kiseel hi.
Amaute in puanbuk panin tuate lakhia-in Joshua leh Israel mite khempeuh kiangah paipih uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in Topa mai-ah koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua leh amah tawh a om Israelte khempeuh in Zerah tapa Akhan, leh a ngun leh a puan leh a kham tawn, leh a tanute leh a tapate, leh a bawngtalte leh a late leh a tuute, leh a puanbuk, leh a neih khempeuh la uh hi; amaute in Akhor Kuam ciangah tuate paipih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Bang hangin ko tungah gimna hong tun’na hi hiam? Tu ni-in Topa in nang tungah gimna hong tun’ hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israelte khempeuh in suang tawh amah deng uh hi; amaute in mei tawh amaute hal uh a, suang tawh amaute deng lum uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tu ni donga a om suang honpi Akhan tungah ciang uh hi; tua ciangin Topa’ heh luatna dai hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu dongin tua mun in Akhor Kuam, kici hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, ‘Lau kei in la lungkia kei in; galkap khempeuh nang kiangah la in la, tho-in Ai-ah paito un; thei in, nangma khut sungah Ai kumpipa leh a mite, a khuapi, leh a leitang kong pia khin zo hi;

Jerikho leh a kumpipa tungah na bawl bangin Ai leh a kumpipa tungah na bawl ding hi; a van kinusiate leh a ganhingte bek note adingin na la ding uh hi; a khuapi nungah a khuapi sim dingin na buksim ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua leh galkap khempeuh Ai-ah paito dingin kipan uh hi; Joshua in a tha kicing mi thahat tul sawmthum teel a, zan-in tua mite sawlkhia hi.
Amah in amaute thu pia a, “En un, tua khuapi sim dingin a nungah na buksim ding uh hi; khuapi panin gamlapi-ah na pai kei ding uh hi; ahih hangin a kigingsa-in na om ding uh hi;
tua ciangin keimah leh kei tawh a om mite khempeuh in khuapi kong naih ding uh hi. A masa-a bangin kote do dingin hong kuankhiat uh ciangin amaute mai-ah kote ka na tai ding uh hi;

khuapi panin amaute ka kaih khiat khit uh matengin kote nungah amaute hong pai ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘A masa-a bangin eite mai-ah amaute tai uh hi,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute kiang panin ko ka tai ding uh hi;
tua ciangin na buk simna panun note na kipan ding uh a, khuapi na la ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note khut sungah hong pia ding hi.
Khuapi na lak khit uh ciangin Topa’ hong sawlsa bangin hihin mei tawh khuapi na hal ding uh hi; thei un, note thu kong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in amaute sawlkhia hi; a buksim nading uh munah amaute pai-in, Ai nitumna lam, Beth-el leh Ai kikalah pang uh hi; ahih hangin tua zan-in mite lakah Joshua om hi.
Zingsangin Joshua tho baihin mite sam a, mite mai-ah Israel upate tawh Ai-ah paito uh hi.
Amah tawh a om galkap khempeuh paito uh a, khuapi mai naihin Ai leilu lam pangah phualsat uh a, Ai leh amaute kikalah luihawm khat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mi tulnga bang paipihin, khuapi nitumna lam Beth-el leh Ai kikalah a buksim dingin koih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galkapte, khuapi leilu lamah a phualpi leh khuapi nitumna lamah a nungdalte, koih uh hi. Ahih hangin tua zanin Joshua kuam sungah om hi.

Ai kumpipa in hih a muh ciangin amah leh tua khuapi mi ahi a mite khempeuh, Israelte a do dingin manlangin kithawi-in Arabah lam paisukna-ah zing tungin paikhia uh hi; ahih hangin khuapi nungah amah a buksim a om lam thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua leh Israelte khempeuh in amau mai-ah kilelsak khem uh a, gamlak lamah tai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khuapi sunga om mi khempeuhte amau delh dingin kikaikhawm uh a, Joshua a delh uh ciangin khuapi panin amaute a kihem khia ahi hi.
Ai leh Beth-el khua sungah Israelte a delh lo pasal khat beek om lo in; khuapi kong hon’sa-in nusia-in Israelte delh uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Na khut sunga om teipi Ai lamah zan in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah tua khua kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in a khut sunga om teipi khuapi lamah zan hi.
Tua ciangin a omna panun a bukte ding khia pah uh a, amah in a khut zan khit phetin amaute tai-in khuapi sungah lut uh a, a khuapi la uh hi; amaute manlangin a khuapi hal uh hi.

Ai mite in a nung et kik uh ciangin, en in, khuapi meikhu van-ah a kahto hi; hih lam hita leh hua lam hita leh-ah tai thei lo uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh gamlak lamah tai-in a kilelsak khemte in amau a delhte lamah hong kihei-in leh delh kik uh hi.
A buksimte in khuapi a lak khitna leh khuapi meikhu a kah tohna Joshua leh Israelte khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin, amaute kihei kikin Ai khua mite vat gawp uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ai khua mite a do dingin khuapi panin Israel dangte hong kuankhia uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Israelte kikalah amaute om uh a, pawlkhat hih lamah pawlkhat hua lamah om hi; a nungta a suakta khat zong a om lo dongin Israelte in amaute vatmai uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in Ai kumpipa hing mat uh a, Joshua kiangah paipih uh hi.

Amaute in a delhna gamlakah Ai khua mi khempeuh Israelte in thatin, amaute khempeuh namsau tawh a bei dongin a thah uh a man khit uh ciangin, Israelte khempeuh Ai-ah paikik uh a, namsau tawh vatgawp uh hi.
Tua ni-in a si, Ai mi khempeuh numei leh pasal a vekpi-in tulsawm leh tulnih ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ai khua mi khempeuh a suksiat mang khit matengin amah in teipi a zanna a khut dokkik lo hi.
Amah in Joshua a thupiak, Topa’ thugenna bangin Israelte in ganhing leh khuapi sunga van kinusiate bek la uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Ai hal a, tu ni donga a om mah bangin nin kholnapi khatin piangsak den hi.

Tua ciangin amah in nitak mateng sing khat tungah Ai kumpipa khai hi; ni a tum ciangin Joshua in thu pia a, amaute in sing tung panin a luang la sukin, khuapi kulh kongpi lutna-ah paai uh a, a tungah suangtum lompi ciang uh a, tu ni dongin tua suangcian om lai hi.

30-31 Tua ciangin Joshua in, Moses thukham laibu sungah, “a kiseek lo suangte tawh a kibawl biakna tau, kuamah in a tungah sik nazat a liik loh,” ci-in a kigelh mah bangin, Topa nasem Moses in Israel mite a thupiakna bangin, Topa, Israelte’ Pasian adingin Ebal Mual tungah biakna tau khat bawl uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in tua tungah Topa adingin meihal biaknate pia-in, thunuam-a biakna gante go uh hi.
Tua lai mun, Israel mite omna-ah, Moses in a gelhsa a thukhamte tua suangte tungah amah in gelh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Israel mite thupha a piak masak theih nadingun Topa nasem Moses in a thupiaksa bangin Israel mite khempeuh peemta hita leh tualsuak hita leh, a upate leh a uliante leh a thukhente uh tawh, Topa thuciamna singkuang a pua Levi siampite mai, thuciamna singkuang langkhat, Gerizim Mual mai lamah mi a lang, Ebal Mual mai lamah mi a lang ding uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in thukham laibu sunga a kigelh bang bangin thukham kammal khempeuh, thupha leh samsiatnate a sim hi.
Moses in a thupiak kammalte khempeuh Israel mi honpite, leh numeite, leh naupangte, leh amau lakah a teeng peemtate mai-ah Joshua in a sim loh khat zong om lo hi.

Jordan gal khat-a om mualtung gam leh lei niamna gam Lebanon lam Tuipi Lian dung khempeuhah a om kumpite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin,
Joshua leh Israel a do dingin lungsim kikhatin kikhawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin Gibeon khua-a teeng mite in Jerikho leh Ai tungah Joshua hihnasa thu a zak uh ciangin,
amaute zuauthu tawh gamta uh a, lam-an bawlin, a late uh tungah a paatsa ip leh a paatsa leenggahzu um leh a kikeek leh a kiphopte guangin,
a khe uh ah a paatsa, a kiphop khedapte bulhin, a paatsa puante tawh pai uh hi; a ante khempeuh uh keu-in ap hi.
Amaute Gilgal-a giahphual-a Joshua kiangah pai uh a, amah leh Israel mite tungah, “A gamlapi gam panin kong pai uh hi; tua ahih ciangin kote tawh thuciamna khat hong bawl un,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite in tua Hiv mite kiangah, “Kote nai-ah a teeng mite na hi kha thei ding uh hi; tua hi leh note tawh thuciamna hong bangci bawl theih ding ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci uh hi.
Amaute in Joshua kiangah, “Kote in nangma nasemte ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Kuate na hi uh hiam? Koi lai panin hong pai na hi uh hiam?”a ci hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Topa na Pasian uh min hangin a gamla mahmah gam panin na nasemte kong pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama thu, leh Izipt gam sungah a hihte khempeuh,
leh Jordan gal khatah a om Amor kumpi nihte ahi, Ashtarothah a teeng Heshbon kumpi Sihon leh Bashan kumpi Og tungah a hihte khempeuh a kigenna ka za khin uh hi.

Ka upate uh leh ka gamsung uh a, teeng mite khempeuh in kote kiangah, ‘Na khualzin nadingun lam-an bawl un la, amaute dawntuah dingin pai-in amaute kiangah, “Kote in na nasemte ka hi uh hi; tu-in hong pai un la, kote tawh thuciamna hong bawl un,” va ci un,’ hong ci uh hi.
Hih lai-ah ka anlum uh om hi; no kiangah pai dingin kong din’ khiat ni uh’ khualzin lam-an dingin ka inn panun ka guan lai takun lum lai hi, ahih hangin tu-in, en un, keu-in ap hi;
hih leenggahzu umte ka thun lai takun a thak ahi hi, tu-in en un, puak gawp hi; hih ka puante uh leh ka khedapte uh khual gamlapi zinna-in paat gawp hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in amau’ an ciam kha uh a, Topa tung panin lamlahna dong lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute tawh kilemna bawlin, amaute a hin’sak nading thuciamna bawl uh hi; tua ciangin mi honte’ makaite amau’ tungah kiciam uh hi.
Amaute tawh thuciamna a bawl khit uh ni thum a cin’ ciangin, amaute a vengte ahihna leh amaute nai-ah a teengte ahihna thu za uh hi.
Israel mite ding khia uh a, a ni thum ni-in amau khuapite ban uh hi. Tu-in amau’ khuapite in Gibeon, Khefirah, Be-eroth, leh Kiriath-jearim ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Topa, Israelte Pasian min tawh mihonte’ makaite kiciam zo ahih manin Israel mite in amaute that lo uh hi. Tua ciangin makaite tungah mihon khempeuh phun uh hi.
Ahih hangin makaite khempeuh in mihon khempeuh tungah, “Topa, Israel Pasian min tawh amaute tungah i kiciam zo a, tu-in amaute i su thei kei ding hi.
Amaute tungah i kiciam thuciamna hangin eite tungah hehna hong tung kha ding ahih manin hih bangin gamta-in amaute i hing sak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin makaite in amaute kiangah, “Amaute hing sak un,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin makaite gen mah bangin mihon khempeuh adingin amaute in singsuite leh tuitawite a suak uh hi.
Joshua in amaute samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kote nai hih lai-ah a teeng hi napi-in, ‘Note kiang panin gamla mahmah ung,’ cihna tawh kote hong khem na hi uh hiam?
Tu-in note hong kisamsia a, note pawlkhat a tawntungin sila, ka Pasian inn adingin singsuite leh tuitawite na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amaute in Joshua dawngin, “Bang hang hiam cih leh gam khempeuh nang tungah a hong piak nading Topa na Pasian in a nasempa Moses a thupiakna leh na mai panin gam sunga teeng mi khempeuh suksiat taktak nading thu na nasemte kiangah hong kigen hi; tua ahih ciangin note hangin ka nuntakna uh nakpi takin ka lung himawh uh a, hih bangin ka gamta uh hi.
Tu-in, en in, kote in nangma khut sungah ka om uh hi; hoih na sak bang leh kote tungah bawl dingin nangma muhna-ah man na sak bangin hong bawl in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute tungah tua bangin bawl a, Israel mite khut sung panin amaute honkhia hi; amaute in that lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin Joshua in mihonte leh Topa biakna tau adingin ama deihna mun ahi, tu ni donga a sep dingun tua ni-in singsuite leh tuitawite a suaksak hi.

Joshua in Ai a lakna zia, leh Jerikho leh a kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin Ai leh a kumpipa tungah a bawlna, leh Gibeon khua sunga teeng mite in Israel tawh kilemna a bawlna leh amaute lakah a omna thu Jerusalem kumpipa Adonizedek in a zak ciangin,
nakpi takin a lau hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Gibeon in kumpi khuate khat mah bangin khua lian khat hi a, Ai khua sangin zong lian zaw-in a mite khempeuh zong mi thahat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Adonizedek in Hebron kumpipa Hoham kiang, Jarmuth kumpipa Piram kiang, Lakhish kumpipa Jafia kiang, leh Eglon kumpipa Debir kiangah kamtai sawlin,
“Kei kiangah hong pai un, hong huh un la, Gibeon vat gawp ni; bang hang hiam cih leh Joshua leh Israel mite tawh kilemna bawl khin uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Amor kumpi ngate, Jerusalem kumpi, Hebron kumpi, Jarmuth kumpi, Lakhish kumpi, leh Eglon kumpite in a galkapte khempeuh uh gawmin a galkapte khempeuh uh tawh paito-in Gibeon lang khatah phual satin do uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gibeon mite Gilgal-a giahphual-a Joshua kiangah kamtai sawl-in, “Na nasemte hong nusia kei in; manlang takin ko kiangah hong paito-in, kote hong hon in la, hong huh in; bang hang hiam cih leh mualtung gam-a teeng Amor kumpite khempeuh kote lang pangin kikhawm uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilgal panin amah leh galhang mite khempeuh leh a thahat mi khempeuh tawh Joshua paito hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Amaute na khut sungah hong pia khin ka hih manin amaute kihta kei in; amaute khat beek in nang hong nang zo lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilgal panin zan tawntungin paito-in Joshua in thakhat thu-in amaute sim gawp hi.
Topa in Israelte mai-ah amaute am gawp sakin, amaute in Gibeon-ah amaute tampi tak that uh a, Bethhoron paitohna lampi-ah amaute delhin, Azekah leh Makkedah ciang dong amaute vatgawp uh hi.

Israelte mai-ah amaute a tai laitak, Bethhoron paitohna-ah a paisuk lai takun, Topa in vantung panin gialpi lianpite Azekah khua ciang dong, amaute tungah lawnsuk a, amaute si uh hi; Israel mite in namsau tawh a thah sangin tua gialpi hanga a si mi tam zaw hi.
Tua ciangin, Topa in Israel mite tungah Amor mite a piak ni-in Joshua in Topa tungah thu gen hi; amah in Israelte’ muhna-ah, “Ni aw, Gibeon ah, nang kha aw, Aijalon kuam ah ding cip in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin minamte in a galte phu a lak khit mateng ni ding cipin kha khawl hi. Hih in Ja-shar’ Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Van kim lai-ah ni khawlin ni khat bup ding bang tumsuk pak lo hi.
Tua hun ma hita leh tua hun khit hita leh Topa in mi khat’ thu a ngaih tua ni bang ni dang om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israel mite adingin dosak hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israelte khempeuh tawh Gilgal-a giahphual-ah ciahkik hi.
Hih kumpi ngate tai-in Makkedah leihawm sungah bu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua kiangah, “Kumpi ngate Mekkedah leihawm sungah a bu kimu khin hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Suangtum lianpite leihawm gong lik nelh un la, a cing dingin a gei-ah mi koih un;

ahih hangin note tua lai-ah om kei un, na galte uh delhin a nungdalte bawh un la, a khuapi sung uh ah amaute lutsak kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note khut sungah amaute hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Joshua leh Israel mite in amaute a bei siang dongin tampi tak a thah khit ciang, leh a suakta lai mite amau’ khuapi muanhuai sungah a tum khit uh ciangin,
Makkedah giahphual Joshua kiangah mi khempeuh ci damin ciahkik uh hi; Israel mite khat peuh a paupih ngam kuamah om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Leihawm gong hong un la, leihawm panin tua kumpi ngate kei kiangah hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua mah bangin hih uh a, leihawm panin tua kumpi ngate, Jerusalem kumpi, Hebron kumpi, Jarmuth kumpi, Lakhish kumpi, leh Eglon kumpite, ama kiangah paipih uh hi.

Amaute in Joshua kiangah tua kumpi ngate a pai khiatpih uh ciangin, Joshua in Israel mi khempeuh samin, amah tawh a kuan khawm galkap mangte kiangah, “A nai-ah hong pai un la, hih kumpite ngawngah na khe uh nga un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute a nai-ah hong pai-in, a khe uh amaute ngawng tungah nga uh hi.
Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un la, lungkia kei un; thakhauh un la, hang un; bang hang hiam cih leh note' do na gal khempeuhte uh tungah Topa in hih bangin bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Joshua in amaute satin si sak a, singkung nga tungah amaute khai hi. Amaute in nitak dong sing tungah khai uh hi;

ahih hangin ni a tum hun ciangin Joshua in thu pia a, amaute in sing tung panin la khia sukin, amaute a buknasa leihawm sungah lawnsuk uh a, tu ni mahmahin a om lai ahi suangtum lianpite leihawm gongah koih uh hi.

Tua ni-in Joshua in Makkedah khua la a, namsau tawh tua khua leh a kumpipa vatgawp hi; a sunga om mi khempeuh susia mangin, kuamah siit lo hi; Jerikho kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin Makkedah kumpipa tungah a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israelte khempeuh tawh Makkedah panin Libnah-ah paisuak uh a, Libnah khua sim uh hi;

Topa in tua khua leh a kumpipa zong Israel mite’ khut sungah pia hi; amah in namsau tawh tua khua leh a sunga om mi khempeuh vatgawp hi; tua khua sungah kuamah siit lo hi; Jerikho kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin a kumpipa tungah bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israelte khempeuh tawh Libnah panin Lakhish-ah paisuak uh a, tua khua umcihin sim uh hi;
Topa in Israel mite khut sungah Lakhish pia a, amah in a ni nih ni-in la-in, Libnah a bawl bangin tua khua leh a sunga om mi khempeuh namsau tawh vatgawp hi.
Tua ciangin Lakhish a huh dingin Gezer kumpipa Horam hong kuanto hi; amaute khat zong a om nawn lo dongin Joshua in amah leh a mite vatgawp hi.
Tua ciangin Lakhish panin Eglon-ah amah tawh a om Israelte khempeuh tawh Joshua paisuak uh hi;
tua ni mahin tua khua la uh a, namsau tawh vatgawp uh hi; Lakhish a hih mah bangin tua khua sunga om mi khempeuh tua ni-in amah in susia mang hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, Israelte khempeuh tawh Eglon panin Hebron-ah paito hi; amaute in tua khua simin,
la-in, namsau tawh tua khua leh a kumpi leh a kiima khuapite, leh a sunga om khempeuh vatgawp hi; Eglon tungah a bawl bangin amah in kuamah siit lo a, tua khua leh a sunga om khempeuh susia mang hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, Israelte khempeuh tawh Debir-ah kihei kikin tua khua sim hi;

amah in a kumpipa leh a khuapite khempeuh tawh tua khua la hi; namsau tawh amaute in vatgawp uh a, a sunga om mi khempeuh amaute in susia mang uh hi; amah in kuamah siit lo hi; amah in Hebron leh Libnah leh a kumpipa tungah a bawlsa bangin Debir leh a kumpipa tungah bawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in gam khempeuh, mualtung gam leh Negeb gam leh lei niamna mun leh mual pangsuk, leh a kumpite khempeuh zo hi; amah in kuamah siit lo a, Israelte Topa Pasian’ thu piaksa bangin husang khempeuh susia mang hi.
Joshua in amaute Kadesh-barnea panin Gaza ciang dong, leh Goshen gam khempeuh Gibeon ciang dong zo gawp hi.
Israelte’ Topa Pasian in Israelte adingin dosak ahih manin Joshua in hih kumpite khempeuh leh amau leitang hun khat sungin la khin hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh tawh Gilgal-a giahphual-ah ciahkik hi.
Hazor kumpipa Jabin in hih thu a zak ciangin, amah in Madon kumpipa Jobab, leh Shimron kumpipa, leh Akshaf kumpipa,
leh saklam mualtung, leh Khinneroth leitaw lam-a om Arabah sung, leh lei niamna mun, leh nitumna lamah Nafothdor sunga om kumpite,
nisuahna leh nitumna lam-a om Kanaan mite, Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, leh mualtung gam-a om Jebus mite, leh Mispah gam Hermon nuai-a Hiv mite tungah thu puak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tampi a pha a galkap honpite tawh a tam mahmah sakolte leh leengte tawh, tuipi gei-a om sehnel bangin tampi tak hong kuan khia uh hi.
Hih kumpite khempeuh in amau galkapte gawmin Israel mite tawh a kido dingin hong pai-in Merom tuite-ah giahphual sat khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Zing ciang tu bang hunin amaute khempeuh a kithatsa-in Israel mite tungah pia ding ka hih manin amaute kihta kei in; a sakolte uh a zagui na sattat ding a, a leengte uh mei tawh na hal ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in a galkapte khempeuh tawh thakhat thu-in Merom tuite gei amaute kiangah pai-in va sim uh hi.

Topa in Israelte khut sungah amaute pia a, amaute in vat gawpin a Lian Sidon leh Misrefothmaim ciang dong, leh nisuahna lamah Mizpah kuam ciang dong delh uh hi; amaute kuamah a om nawn lo dongin vatgawp uh hi.
Topa’ sawl bangin Joshua in amaute hih hi; amau’ sakolte uh a zagui sattat sakin mei tawh a leengte uh halsak hi.
Tua hun lai takin Joshua kihei kikin Hazor la a, namsau tawh a kumpipa vat hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hazor khua in tua kumpi gam khempeuh lutang hi ngei hi.
Amaute in tua sunga om khempeuh namsau tawh hihin amaute susia mang hi; husang khat zong om nawn lo a, amah in mei tawh Hazor khua hal hi.
Topa’ nasem Moses in a thu piaksa bangin Joshua in tua kumpite’ khuapite, leh a kumpite khempeuh la-in namsau tawh amaute vatin amaute susia mang hi.
Ahih hangin Hazor khua longal mualtunga om khuapite khat zong Israel mite in hal lo uh hi; Joshua in tua khua hal hi.
Israel mite in tua khuapite sunga van kinusiate leh ganhingte amau’ galzawh van dingin la uh hi; ahih hangin amaute a suksiat khit matengun namsau tawh vatgawp uh a, husang khat beek nusia lo uh hi.
Topa in ama nasem Moses a thu piak bangin Moses in zong Joshua thu pia a, Joshua zong tua mah bangin gamta hi; Topa in Moses a thu piaksate khempeuh a hih loh om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in gam khempeuh, mualtung gam leh Negeb gam leh Goshen gam khempeuh leh lei niamna gam leh Arabah leh Israelte mualtung gam leh a lei niamna gamte,
Seir lamah a kikhung to Halak Mual panin Hermon Mual nuai Lebanon kuam a om Baalgad ciang dong la hi. Amah in amau’ kumpite khempeuh la-in amaute vatgawpin that hi.
Hih kumpite khempeuh tawh sauveipi sung Joshua kido hi.
Gibeon khua-a teeng Hiv mite longal Israel mite tawh kilemna a bawl khuapi khat zong om lo hi; amaute in tuate khempeuh simin a lak uh ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Moses a thupiakna bangin amaute a kisuksiat mang nading leh hehpihna ngah loin a kibeisak theih nadingin Israelte a do nadingin a lungsim uh khauhsak ding Topa’ bawl ahi hi.

Tua hun lai takin Joshua hong pai-in mualtung gam, Hebron, Debir, Anab, leh Judah mualtung gam khempeuh, leh Israel mualtung gam khempeuh panin Anak mite nawh khia siang hi; Joshua in a khuapite uh tawh amaute susia mang khawm hi.
Israel mite’ leitangah Anak mite khat zong om nawn lo hi; Gaza, Gath, leh Ashdod sung bekah pawlkhat om lai hi.

Topa in Moses tungah a gensa bangin Joshua in leitang khempeuh la hi; tua ciangin Joshua in amau minam tawh kizui-in a ngah ding bangin Israel mite tungah gamh-in pia hi. Tua-a kipan galdona panin tua gam tawlnga hi.
Tu-in nisuahna lam Jordan galkhat, Arnon kuam panin nisuahna lam Arabah khempeuh tawh Hermon Mual ciang dong Israel mite in a leitang uh laksakin a zawh mite’ gam kumpite in:

2-3 Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor kumpi, Arnon kuam gei-a a om Aroer pan, leh Gilead gam laizang panin phel lang ahi Ammon mite gamgi Jabbok gun ciang dong, leh Arabah panin, nisuahna lamah Khinneroth Tuipi, leh Bethjeshimoth lamah Pisgah mual pang bul leitaw lama om Ci Tuipi ahi Arabah tuipi ciang dong a uk Sihon;

4-5 leh Bashan kumpi, Refaim panin a suaktate lakah khat, Ashtaroth leh Edrei-ah teengin, Hermon Mual leh Salekah leh Bashan khempeuh panin Geshur mite leh Ma-aketh mite gamgi ciang, leh Gilead lang khat panin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ gamgi ciang dong a uk, Og ahi hi.
Topa’ nasem Moses leh Israel mite in amaute zo uh hi; tua ciangin Topa’ nasem Moses in Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte tungah a neih dingun amau’ leitang a pia hi.

Hihte in, Joshua leh Israel mite in a zawh Jordan nitumna lam pang, Lebanon kuam sung Baalgad panin Seir lamah a kikhung to Jakah Mual kikala om tua gam kumpite ahi hi (Joshua in mualtung gam, lei niamna gam, Arabah gam, mual pang suk, gamlak, leh Negeb gam sunga om Hit mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite, leitangte Israel minamte tungah amau' ngah ding tawh kizui-in a neih dingun pia hi);
Jerikho kumpi, khat; Beth-el gei-a om Ai kumpi, khat;
Jerusalem kumpi, khat; Hebron kumpi, khat;
Jarmuth kumpi, khat; Lakhish kumpi, khat;
Eglon kumpi, khat; Gezer kumpi, khat;
Debir kumpi, khat; Geder kumpi, khat;
Hormah kumpi, khat; Arad kumpi, khat;
Libnah kumpi, khat; Adullam kumpi, khat;
Makkedah kumpi, khat; Beth-el kumpi, khat;
Tappuah kumpi, khat; Hefer kumpi, khat;
Afek kumpi, khat; Lasharon kumpi, khat;
Madon kumpi, khat; Hazor kumpi, khat;
Shimronmeron kumpi, khat; Akshaf kumpi, khat;
Taanak kumpi, khat; Megiddo kumpi, khat;
Kadesh kumpi, khat; Karmel gam sunga Jokneam kumpi, khat;
Nafathdor sunga Dor kumpi, khat; Galile sunga Goi-im kumpi, khat;
Tirzah kumpi, khat: a vekpi-in kumpi sawmthum-le-khat ahi hi.
Tu-in Joshua teekin a kum tampi pha hi; Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang teekin na kum tampi pha a, ahi zongin leitang lak ding tampi tak om lai hi.
A om lai leitang in: Fillistia gam sung khempeuh, leh Geshur gam khempeuh
(Kanaan mite gam ci-a a kiciamteh, leilu lam Ekron gamgi lam, Izipt nisuahna lam-a om Shihor gun pan; Fillitia gam Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath, leh Ekron gamte a uk mi nga om hi), leh Avvim gam,
leitaw lamah, Kanaan mite leitang khempeuh, leh Sidon mite gam ahi Mearah gam Amor mite' gamgi ahi Afek ciang,
leh Gebal mite’ leitang, leh Lebanon khempeuh, ni-a suahna lamah Hermon Mual nuai-a Baalgad panin Hamath tumna ciang,

Lebanon leh Mishrefoth-maim kikal-a teeng Sidon mite khempeuh ahi hi. Kei mahmah in Israel mite mai panin amaute ka hawlkhia ding hi; nang kong thupiaksa bangin Israel mite tungah a luah dingin leitang hawm in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in minam kua leh Manasseh minam a langte tungah luah dingin hih leitang hawm in,” a ci hi.
Reuben mite leh Gad mite in Manasseh minam a lang dang khatte tawh Topa’ nasem Moses in amaute a piak mah bangin, nisuahna lam Jordan gal khatah Moses in amaute a piak gamh ngah khawm uh hi;
Arnon kuam mong-a om Aroer pan, leh kuam laizang-a om khuapi, leh Dibon ciang dong Medeba mualzang khempeuh;
leh Ammon mite gamgi ciang dong Heshbon ah a uk Amor kumpi Sihon’ khuapi khempeuh;
leh Gilead, leh Geshur mite leh Ma-akath mite gam, leh Hermon Mual khempeuh, leh Salekah dong Bashan gam khempeuh;
Ashtaroth leh Edrei- ah a uk Bashan gam sunga Og kumpi gam khempeuh (Refaim-a a suaktate lakah amah bek om hi); Moses in hihte zo-in hawlkhia hi.
Ahi zongin Israel mite in Geshur mite ahi a, Ma-akath mite ahi zongin hawlkhia lo uh hi; tu ni dongin Geshur mite leh Ma-akath mite Israelte lakah teeng uh hi.
Levi minamte tung bekah Moses in gamh pia lo hi; ama kiangah a cih mah bangin Israelte’ Topa Pasian tungah a kipia mei tawh kihal biaknate in amau’ gamh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Reuben minam tungah amau’ beh tawh kizui-in gamh pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gam in Arnon kuam gei-a a om Aroer pan, leh kuam laizang-a om khuapi, leh Medeba kianga mualzang khempeuh,
Heshbon tawh, leh mualzang tunga om a khuapite khempeuh; Dibon, leh Bamothbaal, leh Bethba-almeon,
leh Jahaz, leh Kedemoth, leh Mefa-ah,
leh Kiriathaim, leh Sibmah, leh tua kuam mualtunga om Zereth-shahar,
leh Bethpeor, leh Pisgah pang suk, leh Bethjeshimoth,

tua in, mualzang khuapite khempeuh, leh Heshbon-ah a uk, Moses in Midian makaite Evi leh Rekem leh Zur leh Hur leh Reba, tua gam-a teeng Sihon’ uliante, tawh a zawh khop ahi Amor kumpi Sihon’ kumpi gam khempeuh ahi hi.
Beor’ tapa, aisanpa Balaam zong, Israel mite in a dang a thahte lakah namsau tawh that khawm uh hi.
Reuben mite gamgi in Jordan ahi hi. Hih in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in a khuapite leh a khuaneute tawh Reuben mite’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Gad minamte tungah zong amau’ beh tawh kizui-in gamh pia hi.
Amau’ gam in Jazer, leh Gilead khuapite khempeuh, leh Rabbah nisuahna lamah a om Aroer ciang dong Ammon mite leitang kimkhat,
leh Heshbon panin Ramathmizpeh leh Betonim ciang, leh Mahanaim panin Debir gam ciang dong,

leh Bethharam kuam sungah Bethnimrah, Sukkoth, leh Zafon, Jordan gal khat nisuahna lam, Khinnereth Tuipi a niamna lam mong ciang, Jordan gamgi-in a nei, Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ kumpi gam om lai teng ahi hi.
Hih in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in a khuapite leh a khuaneute tawh Gad mite’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Manasseh minam a langte tungah gamh pia hi; amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Manasseh minam a langte tungah kipia hi.
Amau’ gam in Mahanasim pan kipanin Bashan gamsung khempeuh, Bashan kumpipa Og’ kumpi gamsung khempeuh, leh Bashan gam sunga om Jair khuapi sawmgukte,
leh Gilead a lang, leh Ashtaroth, leh Edrei, Bashan gam-a Og’ kumpi gam khempeuh ahi hi; hihte amau' innkuan tawh kizui-in Makhir mi a langte adingin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir mite tungah kipia hi.
Hihte in Jerikho nisuahna lam Jordan gal khat; Moab zanglei-ah Moses in a hawm gamhte ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Levi minamte tungah Moses in gamh pia lo hi; Israelte’ Topa Pasian in amaute kiangah a cih mah bangin amah in amau’ gamh ahi hi.
Hihte in, siampi Eleazar, leh Nun tapa Joshua, leh Israel minam sung pan beh lutangte in amaute tungah a piak Kanaan gam sungah Israel mite’ ngah gamhte ahi hi.
Minam kua leh alangte’ adingin Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amau’ gamhte aisanna tawh kipia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in Jordan gal khatah minam nih leh a langte tungah gamh pia khin zo hi; ahih hangin amaute lakah Levi mite tungah bangmah pia lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Josef mite minam nih-in kikhen a, Manasseh leh Efraim minamte ahi uh hi; tua gam sungah Levi mite tungah tanh kipia lo a, ahih hangin amau teen’ nading khuapite leh a ganhingte leh a nate uh adingin a lonona gamte bek tawh kipia hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi; amaute in leitang hawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah minamte Gilgal-a Joshua kiangah pai uh a, amaute’ sung panin Kenaz mi Jefunneh tapa Kaleb in ama kiangah, “Topa in Kadesh-barnea-ah Pasian’ mi Moses tungah nang leh kei’ thu tawh kisai a gente na thei hi.
A gamsung thu kansim dingin Topa’ nasem Moses in Kadesh-barnea panin kei hong sawl lai-in kum sawmli ka pha hi; ka lungsim-a om bangin ama kiangah thu ka tun’ kik hi.
Ahih hangin kei tawh hong paito khawm ka sanggamte in mite lungkiasak uh hi; ahi zongin keimah in lungsim tak tawh Topa ka Pasian ka zui hi.
Tua ni-in Moses kiciamin, ‘Nangmah in Topa ka Pasian lungsim tak tawh zui na hih manin na khe in a totsa leitang in nang leh na tate’ adingin gamh hi tawntung ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tu-in, en in, a cihsa bangin Topa in, Israel mite gamlakah a pai sung, Topa in hih thu Moses tungah a gen-a kipan hih kum sawmli-le-nga sung kei hong nungta sak hi; tu-in, en in, tu ni-in kei kum sawmgiat-le-nga ka pha hi.
Moses in hong sawl hun lai mah bangin tu ni-in kei ka thahat lai hi; galdo nading, leh kuan khiatna leh ciahkik nadingin ka thatang in tua hun lai-a ka thatang mah bang lai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in tua ni-a Topa’ gen hih mualtung gam kei hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh Anak mite a muanhuai mahmah khuapite sungah a omna thu tua ni-in na za hi: Topa in kei hong ompih hi, Topa' cih bangin amaute ka hawlkhia zo kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amah thupha pia hi; Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah gamh-in Hebron pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Topa, Israelte’ Pasian, lungsim tak tawh zui ahih manin tu ni dongin Hebron in Kenaz mi Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb’ gamh suak hi.
Hih Hebron min in a ni dangin Kiriath-arba ahi hi; Arba in Anak mite lakah mi lian pen khat ahi hi. Tua ciangin tua gam in galdona panin tawlnga hi.
Amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah mite’ ngah in leitaw lamah Edom gamgi ciang, leitaw lam a gamla penna mun-ah Zin gamlak ciang ban hi.
Leitaw lam a gamgi in Ci Tuipi mong, leitaw lam a sun tuidawk panin kipan hi;
leitaw lam Akrabbim kahtohna-ah paikhia-in, Zin dong ban a, Kadesh-barnea leitaw lamah Hezron dung tawnin Addar ciang dong paito-in, Karka lamah kihei a,
Azmon ciang dong pai-in Izipt lui-ah suakkhia a, tuipi-ah a mong bei hi. Hih in amau’ leitaw lam gamgi hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin nisuahna lam gamgi in Jordan tun’na ciang dong Ci Tuipi ahi hi. Leilu lam pang gamgi in Jordan tun’na tuipi dawk panin kipan hi;
a gamgi in Bethhoglah lamah paito a, Beth-arabah leilu lam pangah paisuak hi; tua ciangin a gamgi in Reuben’ tapa Bohan’ Suangpi dongah paito hi;

tua ciangin Akhor Kuam panin Debir-ah gamgi paito a, leilu lam manawhin, tua kuam leitaw lam pangah a om, Adummim kahtohna gal khatah a om Gilgal lamah kihei hi; tua ciangin gamgi in Enshemesh tuite dungah pai-in Enrogel-ah tawp hi;

tua ciangin Jebus mi (Jerusalem a cihna) liangko leitaw lam Hinnom' tapa kuam-ah gamgi paito hi; tua ciangin Refaim kuam leilu lam mong, nitumna lam Hinnom Kuam gal khatah a kikhung mual dawn-ah gamgi paito hi;
tua ciangin mual dawn panin Neftoah Tuite lui-ah gamgi kikhung a, tua panin Efron Mual khuapite-ah pai hi; tua ciangin Baalah (Kiriath-jearim a cihna) lamah gamgi kawi kual hi;
tua ciangin Baalah nitumna lam Seir Mual-ah gamgi kual a, tua panin paisuakin Jearim Mual (Khesalon a cihna) liangko leilu lamah pai-in, Bethshemesh-ah paisuk a, Timnah kiangah paisuak hi;
Ekron leilu lam mual liangko-ah gamgi paikhia a, tua ciangin Shikkeron-ah gamgi kawi kualin, Baalah Mual-ah paisuak a, Jabne-el-ah leng khia hi; tua ciang tuipi-ah gamgi tawp hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna gamgi in Tuipi Lian a dung teng ahi hi. Hih in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah mite kiim-ah gamgi ahi hi.
Topa in Joshua tungah a thupiak bangin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah amah in Judah mite lakah tanh khat Kiriath-arba, Hebron a cihna, (Arba in Anak’ pa hi) pia hi.
Tua lai panin Kaleb in Anak’ tapa thumte Sheshai leh Ahiman leh Talmai, Anak suan-le-khakte hawl khia hi.
Tua lai panin Debir sunga teeng mite a sim dingin amah paito hi; Debir pen a ni dangin Kiriath-sefer ahi hi.
Kaleb in, “Kiriath-sefer vat gawpin a la zo mi tungah ka tanu Aksah a zi dingin ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb’ sanggampa Kenaz’ tapa Othniel in la hi; amah in a zi dingin a tanu Aksah pia hi.
Tua nu ama kiangah a pai ciangin ama pa’ tung panin lo khat a nget ding hah gen hi; a la tung panin tua nu a kum ciangin, Kaleb in tua nu kiangah, “Bang ut na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Letsong khat hong pia in; Negeb gamah kei hong koih na hih buangin cik tuikhukte zong hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kaleb in tua nu tungah cik tui tungnungte leh cik tui nuainungte a pia hi.
Hih in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah minamte’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Leitaw lam mong ciik, Edom gamgi lamah Negeb gam Judah minamte’ neih khuapite in Kabze-el, Eler, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Zif, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazorhadattah, Kerioth-hezron (Hazor a cihna),
Amam, Shema, Meladah,
Hazargaddah, Heshmon, Bethpelet,
Hazarshual, Be-ersheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Khesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah, Sansannah,
Leboath, Shilhim, Ain, leh Rimmon; a vekpi-in khuapi sawmnih-le-kua, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin lei niamna lamah Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zanoah, Engannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Sha-araim, Adithaim, Gederah, Gederothaim: khuapi sawm-le-li, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Zenan, Hada-shah, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpeh, Jokhe-el,
Lakhish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahman, Khitlish,
Gederoth, Bethdagon, Na-amah, leh Makkedah; khuapi sawm-le-guk, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Libnah, Ethar, Ashan,
Iftah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Akzib, leh Mareshah: khuapi kua, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Ekron, a khuapite leh a khua neute tawh ahi hi;
Ekron panin tuipi dong, Ashdod lam pang-a omte khempeuh a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Ashdod, a khuapite leh a khua neute tawh ahi hi; Gaza, a khuapite leh a khua neute tawh ahi hi; Izipt lui leh tuipi lian a gei ciang dong tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mualtung gamah, Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah, Kiriath-sannath (Debir a cihna),
Anab, Eshtemoh, Anim,
Goshen, Holon, leh Giloh: khuapi sawm-le-khat, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Bethtappuah, Afekah,
Humtah, Kiriath-arba (Hebron a cihna), leh Zior: khuapi kua, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Maon, Karmel, Zif, Juttah,
Jezre-el, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kain, Gibeah, leh Timnah: khuapi sawm, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Ma-arath, Beth-anoth, leh Eltekon: khuapi guk, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Kiriathbaal (Kiriath-jearim a cihna), leh Rabbah: khuapi nih, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Sehnel gamah, Beth-arabah, Middin, Sekakah,
Nibshan, Ci Khuapi, leh En-gedi: khuapi guk, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Judah mite in Jerusalem-a teeng Jebus mite hawlkhia zo lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Jebus mite in Judah mite tawh Jerusalem-ah teeng khawm uh hi.
Josef suan-le-khakte’ tanh in Jerikho tuite’ nisuahna lam, Jerikho kiang Jordan panin sehnel gamah pai a, Jerikho panin mualtung gamte tawnin Beth-el ah paito hi;
tua ciangin Beth-el panin Luz-ah pai-in, Arkhi mite gam Ataroth nawk hi;
tua ciangin nitumna lam Jaflet mite gam lam Bethhoron a niam lam gam ciang dongah paisuk hi, tua ciangin Gezer-ah pai-in tuipi-ah tawp hi.
Josef suan Manasseh, leh Efraim mite in amau’ gamhluah ngah uh hi.
Amau' behbehin Efraim mite’ gam in anuai-a bang ahi hi: nisuahna lamah amau’ gamh gamgi in Ataroth-addar, Bethhoron tungnung ciang ahi hi;
tua panin tuipi ciangah gamgi pai hi; leilu lamah Mikmethath ahi hi; tua ciangin nisuahna lam gamgi Ta-anathshiloh lamah kual pai-in, nisuahna lam a gal khatah pai-in Janoah tung hi;
tua ciangin Janoah panin Ataroth leh Na-arah-ah paisuk a, Jerikho ban-in Jordan-ah tawp hi.
Tappuah panin nitumna lam Kanah lui-ah gamgi pai-in, tuipi-ah tawp hi. Tua in amau’ behbehin Efraim mite’ gamhluah hi a,
Manasseh mite’ gamluah sung panin Efraim mite’ adingin a kikhen khia khuapite, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in Gezer sunga teeng Kanaan mite hawl khia lo uh hi: tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Kanaan mite in Efraim mite lakah teeng a, ahih hangin aana nasep a sem dingin sal suak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Josef tacil ahih manin Manasseh minam tungah tanh kipia hi. Manasseh minam sung pan tacil, Gilead’ pa Makhir tungah Gilead gam leh Bashan gam kipia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah galhang mi ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Manasseh minam a om laite, Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shekhem, Hefer, leh Shemida-te tungah a behbehin piakna kibawl hi; hihte pen Josef tapa Manasseh’ ta pasal suan-le-khakte a behbeh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, a tapa Gilead, a tapa Hefer, a tapa Zefehad in tapa nei loin tanu bek nei hi; a tanute’ min in: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah, leh Tirzah ahi hi.

Amaute siampi Eleazar leh Nun tapa Joshua leh makaite mai-ah pai uh a, “Ka sanggamte uh tawh gamh hong piakna dingin Topa in Moses thu pia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa' thupiakna bangin amau’ pate’ sanggamte tawh amah in gamh pia khawm hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jordan gal khatah Gilead leh Bashante simloh Manasseh tungah tanh sawm kia hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Manasseh’ tanute in a tapate tawh gamh ngah khawm uh hi. A om lai Manasseh mite tungah Gilead leitang kipia hi.
Manassehte’ gam in Asher panin Shekhem nisuahna lamah a om Mikmethath dong ban hi; tua ciangin Entappuah mite’ leitaw lamah gamgi pai hi.
Tappuah leitang in Manasseh’ aa ahi hi; ahih hangin Manasseh gamgi-a om Tappuah khuapi in Efraim tapate’ aa ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Kanah lui-ah gamgi paisuk hi. Manasseh khuapite lak panin lui leitaw lam-a om hih lai-a khuapite pen Efraim’ aa ahi hi. Tua ciangin lui leilu lam pangah Manasseh gamgi paisuakin tuipi-ah tawp hi;
tua gam leitaw lam in Efraim’ aa hi-in, a leilu lam in Manasseh’ aa hi a, tuipi in a gamgi ahi hi; leilu lamah Asher banin nisuahna lamah Issakhar ban hi.

Issakhar leh Asher gam sungah zong Manasseh in Bethshean leh a khua neute, Ibleam leh a khua neute, Dor-a teengte leh a khua neute, Endor-a teengte leh a khua neute, Ta-anak-a teengte leh a khua neute, leh Megiddo-a teengte leh a khua neute nei hi; a thumna in Nafath ahi hi.
Ahi zongin Manasseh’ tapate in hih khuapite luah zo lo uh hi; Kanaan mite tua gamah teeng teitei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite tampi pha-in a hat uh ciangin amaute in Kanaan mite nasemin koih uh a, hawl khia mang khin lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin Josef minam in Joshua kiangah thu genin, “Topa in kote thupha hong pia khin a, kote in mi tampi hi napi-in bang hangin ngah khat leh tanh khat bek gamh-in hong pia na hi hiam?" a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Note mi tampi pha a, Efraim mualtung gam in note’ adingin neu lua ahih ciangin Perez leh Refaim gam tulakah pai un la, nomau’ ading gam vat tawm un,” a ci hi.
Josef minam in, “Kote' adingin mualtung gam kicing hi; ahi zongin zang gam-a teeng Kanaan mite khempeuh, Bethshean leh a khua neute, leh Jezre-el Kuam sunga omte in sik leeng nei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Josef suan Efraim leh Manasseh mite tungah, “Note mi tampi pha-in na vanglian uh hi; tanh khat kia na nei kei ding uh hi;

mualtung gam in note’ aa hi ding a, tulak ahih hangin note in hah siangin a gamgi mong dong na luah ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sik leeng nei-in, amaute a thahat hangin Kanaan mite na hawlkhia zo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihon buppi Shiloh-ah kikhawm uh a, tua lai-ah kikhopna buk lam uh hi; amaute mai-ah gam zawhsa-in om hi.
Israel mite lakah gamh a kipia nai lo minam sagih om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Israel mite kiangah, “Topa, na pu na pate uh Pasian in note hong piaksa leitangah pai-in na luah ding uh bang tanvei zekai ding na hi uh hiam?

Minam khat panin mi thum ciat hong pia un la, amaute va kuankhia-in vaksuk vakto-in, amaute’ luah dinga ngaihsutna tawh a leitang omziate hong gelhin, tua ciangin kei kiangah hong ciah dingun amaute ka sawl ding hi.
Amaute in seh sagihin khenin, leitaw lam ama gam mah-ah Judah om suakin, Josef innkuante leilu lam amau’ gamah om ding hi.
Note in leitang khen sagihin hong ciamteh un la, na ciamtehna uh hih mun kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh hi; tua ciangin keimah in Topa i Pasian’ mai-ah note adingin aai ka saan ding hi.

Levi mite in note lakah tanh nei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ siampi nasepna in amau’ luah ahi hi; Gad leh Reuben leh Manasseh minam a langte in Topa’ nasem Moses in amaute tungah a piak ahi, Jordan Nisuahna lam gal khatah amau’ gamh ngah khin zo uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite kuan uh hi; leitang a ciamtehna a gelh nadingun Joshua in a pai mite thu pia a, “Vaksuk vakto-in leitang ciamtehna hong gelh un la, kei kiangah hong pai kik un; tua ciangin Shiloh mun Topa mai-ah note adingin aai ka saan ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mite kuanin gam sungah paisuk paito-in khen sagih suahin tua gam a khua khua-in a ciamtehna uh laibu khat sungah khum uh hi; tua ciangin Shiloh giahphual-a Joshua kiangah amaute hong pai uh hi;
Joshua in amaute’ adingin Topa mai Shiloh-ah aai saan sak hi; tua ciangin Joshua in amau’ tanh ding ciat Israelte tungah leitang pia hi.
A behbeh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte’ ading aisaan hun hong tunga amau’ tungah a kipia gam in Judah minam leh Josef minamte kikalah hong kia hi.
Leilu lamah amau’ gamgi in Jordan panin kipan hi; tua ciangin Jerikho leilu lam liangko-ah paito-in, tua panin mualtung gam nawkin nitumna lamah pai hi; tua ciangin Beth-aven gam lakah tawp hi.
Tua lai panin gamgi in Luz lam manawhin leitaw lam nawtin Luz (Beth-el a kici) liangko-ah pai hi, tua ciangin Bethhoron Nuainung leitaw lam-a om mualtunga Ataroth-addar khua-ah paisuk hi.

Tua ciangin gamgi mun dang manawhin pai a, Bethhoron galkhat, leitaw lam-a om mual panin nitumna lam pang leitaw lamah kihei a, Judah minamte’ aa ahi Kiriathbaal (Kiriath-jearim a cihna) ah tawp hi. Hih in a nitumna lam pang piangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Kiriath-jearim mong panin leitaw lam pang kipan hi; tua lai panin Efron lam, Neftoah Tuite-ah gamgi pai hi;
tua ciangin Refaim kuam leilu lam monga a om, Hinnom’ tapa’ kuam a kimuhna mual a gamgi-ah pai hi; tua ciangin Jebus mite gam liangko leitaw lam, Hinnom Kuam-ah paisukin, Enrogel-ah paisuk suak hi;
tua ciangin leilu lam manawhin kawi-in, Enshemesh-ah paisuak a, tua lai panin Adummim kahtohna galkhat, Geliloth-ah pai hi; tua ciangin Reuben’ tapa Bohan’ Suangpi-ah paisuk hi,
tua ciangin Beth-arabah gam liangko leilu lamah paisuakin Arabah-ah paisuk hi;
tua ciangin Bethhoglah gam liangko leilu lamah gamgi paisuak hi; tua ciangin Jordan mong leitaw lam, Ci Tuipi dawk leilu lamah gamgi tawp hi; hih in leitaw lam gamgi ahi hi.
Jordan in nisuahna lam pang a gamgi piangsak hi. Hih in a beh zui-in a kimkotah a gamgi a gamgi-in Benjamin minam’ luah ahi hi.
Tu-in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte’ khuapite in Jerikho, Bethhogal, Emekkeziz,
Beth-arabah, Zemaraim, Beth-el,
Avvim, Parah, Ofrah,
Khefarammoni, Ofni, Geba—khuapi sawm-le-nih, a khua neute tawh ahi hi:
Gibeon, Ramah, Be-eroth,
Mizpeh, Khefirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpe-el, Taralah,
Zela, Haelef, Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna), Gibeah, leh Kiriath-jearim—khuapi sawm-le-li, a khua neute tawh ahi hi. Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minam’ luah ahi hi.
Aisaan nihna Simeon ading, a beh zui-in Simeon minam ading hong tung hi; amau’ gamh in Judah minamte’ gamh sungah om hi.
Ama ngah gamh dingte in Be-ersheba, Sheba, Moladah,
Hazarshual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Bethmarka-both, Hazarsusah,
Bethlebaoth, leh Sharuhen—khuapi sawm-le-thum, a khua neute tawh ahi hi;
Ain, Rimmon, Ether, leh Ashan—khuapi li, a khua neute tawh ahi hi;
Negeb gam Ramah-a om Baalathbe-er ciang dong hih khuapite’ kim-a om khua neute khempeuh tawh ahi hi. Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Simeon minam’ luah ahi hi.
Simeon minam’ luah in Judah minam’ gamsung khenkhat hong suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Judah minam’ ngah in amau' adingin lian lua a, amau’ luah sung panin Simeon minam in gamh ngah uh hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun adingin aisaan thumna hong tung hi. Amau’ luah gam in Sarid ciang dong ban hi;
tua ciangin a gamgi nitumna lamah paito-in Mareal-ah paisuak a, Dabbesheth va su a, tua ciangin Jokneam nisuahna lam-a om lui ban hi;
Sarid panin nisuahna lam mundang ni a suahna lamah pai-in Khisloth-tabor gamgi-ah tung hi;
tua panin Daberath-ah pai-in, tua ciangin Jafia ciang pai hi; tua lai panin nisuahna lam ni a suahna lam Gathhefer, Ethkazin lamah paisuak a, tua ciangin Rimmon-ah pai lai-in Neah lamah kawi hi;
tua ciangin leilu lam pan, Hannathon lamah gamgi kihei a, Iftahel kuam-ah tawp hi;
tua banah Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah, leh Bethlehem—khuapi sawm-le-nih, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun minam’ luah ahi hi—hih khuapite a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minam adingin aisaan lina Issakhar adingin hong tung hi.
A gam in Jezre-el, Khesulloth, Shunem,
Hafaraim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebes,
Remeth, En-gannim, Enhaddah, Bethpazzez huam hi;
a gamgi in zong Tabor, Shahazumah, leh Bethshemesh ban a, a gamgi in Jordan-ah tawp hi—khuapi sawm-le-guk, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minam’ luah ahi hi—a khuapite a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Asher minam’ adingin aisaan ngana hong tung hi.
A gam in Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akshaf,
Allammelek, Amad, leh Mishal huam hi; nitumna lamah Karmel leh Shihorlibnath ban a,
tua ciangin nisuahna lamah kihei-in Bethdagon-ah pai a, leilu lam Beth-emek leh Ne-i-el lamah Zebulun leh Iftahel kuam ban hi; tua ciangin leilu lam Kabul,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kanah, a Lian Sidon ciang dong paito lai hi;
tua ciangin Ramah-ah gamgi kihei a, kulh a nei Tai-ar khuapi tung hi; tua ciangin Hosah-ah gamgi kihei a, tuipi-ah tawp hi; Mahalab, Akzib,
Ummah, Afek, leh Rehob—khuapi sawmnih-leh-nih, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Asher minam' luah ahi hi—hih khuapite a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minam’ adingin aisaan gukna Naftali minamte adingin hong tung hi.
A gamgi in Helef, Za-anannim-a om tawsaw, leh Adaminekeb, leh Jabne-el panin Lakkum ciang dong pai hi; tua ciangin Jordan-ah tawp hi;
tua ciangin nitumna lam Aznothtabor-ah gamgi kihei a, tua lai panin Hukkok-ah pai-in, leitaw lamah Zebulun ban a, nitumna lamah Asher banin, nisuahna lam panin Jordan ban hi.
Kulh a nei khuapite in Ziddim, Zer, Hamnath, Rakkath, Khinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, Enhazor,
Iron, Migdalel, Horem, Beth-anath, leh Bethshemesh—khuapi sawm-le-kua, a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minam’ luah ahi hi—khuapite a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Dan minam adingin aisaan sagihna hong tung hi.
A luah gamte in Zorah, Eshtaol, Irshemesh,
Sha-alabbin, Aiialon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Beneberak, Gathrimmon,
leh Joppa galkhat-a om Mejarkon leh Rakkon a gamte tawh huam hi.

Dan mite in amau’ gam a taan ciangun Dan mite kuan to-in Leshem sim uh a, amaute in manin namsau tawh a thah khit uh ciangin tua gam luahin a sungah teeng uh a, amau’ pupi’ min tamin Leshem pen Dan ci-in phuak uh hi.
Hih in a beh tawh kizui-in Dan minam’ luah ahi hi—hih khuapite a khua neute tawh ahi hi.
Israel mite in gamh-in tua leitangte a hawm khit uh ciangin amaute lakah Nun tapa Joshua tungah gamh pia uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh ama nget khuapi, Efraim mualtung gam-a om Timnathserah pia uh hi; amah in tua khuapi lam kikin a sungah teeng hi.

Hihte in siampi Eleazar leh Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel minam beh lutangte in kikhopna buk kong, Topa mai Shiloh-ah aisaanna tawh a hawm khiat uh luahnate ahi hi. Tua bangin amaute in leitang hawmna zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah,

2-3 “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in, ‘Sawm lopi-in ahi a, theih lohna hangin ahi zongin mi khat a that kha-pa a tai theih nadingin Moses tung tawnin nang tungah kong gen bukna khuapite tel in: phulapa kiang panin note adingin tuate in bukna hi ding hi.

Hih khuapite khat peuhpeuhah amah tai-in khuapi kongpi tumna-ah ding ding a, tua khuapi upate kiangah a thu gentel ding hi; tua ciangin amaute in khuapi sungah amah paipihin amah mun khat pia ding a, amaute tawh amah om ding hi.

Tua ciangin phulapa in amah a delh leh, tuapa tungah mi thatpa pia lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in theih lohna hangin a vengpa thatin, a beisa hun sungah ama tungah galneihna bangmah nei lo hi.

Thukhenna thuak dingin mihonte mai-ah a din’ mateng, tua hun lai takin siampi lianpa a sih hun mateng, tua khuapi sungah amah om ding hi; tua khit ciangin a thatpa ama khua ama inn hong tai khiatna khua-ah paikik thei ding hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Naftali mualtung gam sunga om Galile gam sung panin Kedesh khua, Efraim mualtung gam sungah Shekhem khua, leh Judah mualtung gam sungah Kiriatharba (Hebron a cihna) khuate tuam koih uh hi.

Jerikho nisuahna Jordan galkhatah Reuben minam sung panin mualtung zang gam lak-a om Bezer khua, Gad minam sung panin Gilead gam sunga om Ramoth khua, leh Manasseh minam sung panin Bashan gam sunga Golan khuate seh uh hi.

Hihte in Israel mi khempeuh leh amaute lakah a peem khualmi adingin, sawm lopi-in mi khat a that kha-pa in mihonte mai-ah a din’ ma-in phulapa khutah a sih loh nadingin a tai theih nadinga a kiseh khuapite ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar leh Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel minam beh lutangte kiangah Levi beh lutangte hong pai uh hi;
amaute in Kanaan gamsung Shiloh munah, “Teen’ nadingin khuapi leh ka ganhingte uh adingin a lononate tawh kote hong kipiak ding Moses tung tawnin Topa in thu pia zo hi,” amaute kiangah ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh Israel mite in amau’ luah nang panin Levi mite tungah anuai-a khuapite leh lonona gamte pia uh hi.
