Samuel a teek ciangin amah in Israelte tungah thukhenin a tapate koih hi.
A ta upa’ min Joel hi a, a nihna’ min in Abijah ahi hi; amaute in Be-ersheba ah thukhente ahi uh hi;
Ahih hangin a tapate amah bangin gamta lo uh a, meetna lamah kihei uh hi; amaute in sumgolh la-in thuman heikhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel upate kikhawmin Ramah-a Samuel kiangah pai uh a,
ama kiangah, “En in, nang na teek ta a, na tapate in nangma khekhap hong zui lo uh hi; tu-in, minam dangte khempeuh mah bangin kote hong uk dingin kote’ adingin kumpi khat seh in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in,” a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkim lo sak hi. Samuel in Topa kiangah thungen hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nang hong nial hi lo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uh hi.

Izipt panin amaute ka paikhiatpih-a kipan tu ni dongin amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte’ na semin, kei tungah hong bawlnate khempeuh mah bangin amaute in nang tungah zong hong bawl ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute’ thu ngai in; amaute limtakin hilh kholin, amaute tungah a uk ding kumpipa’ hih zia ding lak bek in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama tung panin kumpi khat a ngen mite kiangah Topa’ thugen khempeuh gen hi.
Amah in, “Note hong uk ding kumpipa hih zia dingte in: amah in na tapate uh la-in a leengte-ah na semin a sakol nasem ding, leh a leengte mai-ah a tai dingin seh ding hi;
tua ciangin amah in ama adingin a tul-a uk leh a sawmnga-a ukte, leh pawlkhatte a lo kho-in a an a la ding, leh a gal sung nazatte leh a leeng nate a bawl dingin seh ding hi.
Amah in na tanute uh paknamtui bawl ding leh anhuan ding leh an em dingin la ding hi.
Amah in na lote uh leh na leenggui lote uh leh na oliv lote uh sung panin a limci pen teng la-in ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi.
Amah in na an uh leh na leenggui lo uh seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat la-in ama uliante leh ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi.
Amah in na nasem pasalte leh nasem numeite leh na bawng leh na late uh a gina pen teng la-in ama na a sem dingin koih ding hi.
Amah in na tuuhonte uh seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat la ding a, note in ama sila na hi ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin note’ ading na teelsa uh na kumpipa uh hangin note na kiko ding uh hi; ahih hangin tua ni ciangin Topa in note hong dawng lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mite in Samuel’ thu ngai nuam lo uh hi; amaute in, “Hi lo! kote tungah kumpi khat ka nei ding uh hi;
kote zong minam dangte khempeuh mah bangin, ka kumpipa un kote hong ukin kote mai-ah pai-in ka galte uh hong dosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Samuel in mite thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin Topa kiangah tua thute genkik hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute’ thu ngai in la; amaute adingin kumpi khat koih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un,” a ci hi.
Benjaminte sung panin Afiah’ tapa Bekorath, a tapa Zeror, a tapa Abiel, a tapa Kish min nei, Benjaminte mihau khat om hi;
amah in tangval a mel hoih, a min Saul ahi tapa khat nei hi. Israel mite lakah amah sangin a mel hoihzaw khat zong om lo hi; mite khat peuhpeuh sangin a liangko tung siah-in amah sangzaw hi.
Tu-in Saul’ pa Kish’ late mang hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kish in a tapa Saul kiangah, “Nasemte khat sam in la, ding-in pai in la, late va zong in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Efraim mual, mualtung gam leh Shalisha gam teng nawkin zong uh a, ahih hangin amaute in mu lo uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Sha-alim gam teng zong uh a, ahih hangin tua gamah na om lo hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Benjamin gam teng zong uh a, ahih hangin mu lo uh hi.
Zuf gam a tun’ uh ciangin Saul in amah tawh a om a nasempa kiangah, “Hong pai in, ciahkik ni; tua hi kei leh ka pa in late ngaihsun nawn loin eite hong lunghimawh kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama kiangah, “En in, hih khuapi sungah Pasian’ mi khat om a, amah in a kizahtak mi khat ahi hi; ama gen khempeuh a manin tangtung hi. Tua lai-ah pai ni; eite’ khualzin khiatna thu amah in hong gen thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a nasempa kiangah, “Ahih hangin pai lehang, mipa bang puak ding i hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh i van sunga i anlum bei ta a, Pasian’ mipa kiangah i puak ding letsong om lo hi. Bang nei i hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nasempa in Saul dawng kikin, “Hih lai-ah ngun shekel seh-li-suah-seh khat ka nei hi, i vai hong gen nadingin Pasian’ mipa kiangah ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

(Tua ma lai-in Israelte sungah mi khat in Pasian kiangah thu dong dingin a pai ciangin amah in, “Hong pai in, thu-mu-pa kiangah pai ni,” a ci hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuhun-a kamsang i cihte tua ma-in thu-mu-pa kici hi).
Tua ciangin Saul in a nasempa kiangah, “Pha hi; hong pai in, pai ni,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ mipa a omna khuapi-ah amaute pai uh hi.
Amaute khuapi omna mual tungah a paitoh laitakun amaute in khuapi panin tuitawi dingin hong paikhia nungaknote tuak uh a, amaute kiangah, “Thu-mu-pa hih lai-ah a om hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in dawngin, “Amah om hi; en un, note mai diakah om hi. Kinawh un; khuapi sungah tu mahmahin hong pai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite in tuni-in mual tunga biakna-ah biakna pia uh hi.

Khuapi sung na lut phetun mual tunga biakna-ah an ne dingin a pai ma-in amah na mu ding uh hi; amah in biakpiakna thupha pia ding ahih manin ama pai mateng mite in an ne lo ding uh hi; tua khit ciangin a kisam mite in ne uh hi. Tu-in paito un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah na tuak pah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute khuapi-ah paito uh hi. Amaute khuapi sungah a lut lai takin Samuel mual tunga biakna lamah a pai dingin amau’ lamah a hong paikhia mu uh hi.
Tu-in Saul hong pai ni a zan ni-in Samuel tungah Topa in lak khin hi:

“Zing ciang tu bang hunin Benjamin gam sung panin nang kiangah mi khat kong sawl ding a, nangmah in ka mi Israel tungah ulian dingin amah sathau na nilh ding hi. Amah in Filistiate khut sung panin ka mite honkhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ kikona kei kiang hong tung khin ahih manin ka mite’ gimna ka mu khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel in Saul a muh ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang kiangah kong gen mipa hih lai-ah om! Amah in ka mite tungah a uk dingpa ahi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in kulh kongpi-ah Samuel va naihin, “Hong gen in, thu-mu-pa’ inn koi lai hiam?” a ci hi.

Samuel in Saul dawngin, “Keimah in thu-mu-pa ka hi hi; mual tunga biakna-ah kei mai-ah paito in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in tu ni-in kei tawh an na ne ding a, zingsang ciangin nang hong ciah sakin na lungsim-a om khempeuh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi.

Tu ma ni thum lai-a a mang na late ahih leh, kimu khinta ahih manin tuate na lungsim ah ngaihsun nawn kei in. Israelte sungah deih theihte khempeuh kua tungah om ahi hiam? Nang leh na pa’ innkuante khempeuh tungah om hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Saul in dawngin, “Keimah in Israel minamte sung panin a tawmpen Benjaminte hilo ka hi hiam? Keima innkuan in Benjamin minam innkuan khempeuh sung panin a niampen hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin hih bangin kei tungah hong pau na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul leh a nasempa sam-in inndei sungah paipih a, mihing sawmthum bang a pha a kisam mite lak tutna bul-ah mun khat pia hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in anhuanpa kiangah, “Nang kiangah kong piak, ‘Na tuam koih in,’ kong cih pawl hong paipih in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin anhuanpa in a khe leh a kawngsa la-in Saul mai-ah lui hi; tua ciangin Samuel in, “Thei in, a kisiit pen nang mai-ah hong kilui hi. Ne in; bang hang hiam cih leh leenglate tawh na nek theih nadingin a kiseh hun a cin’ mateng nang adingin hong kisiitsak hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Saul in Samuel tawh an nekhawm hi.
Amaute mual tunga biakna panin khuapi sungah a paisuk uh ciangin innkhumzang-ah Saul adingin lupna khat na kiphah a, a ihmu dingin amah lumsuk hi.
Khua a vak ciangin Samuel in innkhumzang-a Saul samin, “Na pai nading ah kong sawl theih nadingin tho in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul tho-in, amah leh Samuel, khuapi kongzing ah pai uh hi.

Amaute khuapi nawl-ah a paisuk kawm-un Samuel in Saul kiangah, “I mai-ah nasempa a paisuak nading gen in la, amah a paisuak khit ciangin nang tungah Pasian’ thute kong theihsak theih nadingin tawlkhat hih lai-ah nang khawl in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in sathau thawl khat la-in ama lutungah buak a, tua ciangin amah namin, “Topa in ama mi Israelte tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khin hilo ahi hiam? Nangmah in Topa’ mite ukin a kiim-a om amau’ galte’ khut sung panin amaute na honkhia ding hi. Hih in nang tungah, Topa in ama luahte tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khitna lim hi ding hi.

Tu ni-in kei kiang panin na paikhiat ciangin Benjaminte’ gam Rachel’ han kiang Zelzah-ah mihing nih na tuak ding a, amaute in nang kiangah, ‘Pai-a na zon’ late kimu khin a, tu-in na pa in late ngaihsun nawn loin nangmah hong lunghimawh a, “Ka tapa bang cih ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua lai panin pai lai-in Tabor tawsaw lak na tung ding hi; tua lai panin Bethel-a Pasian kiangah a paito, keelno thum a pua mi khat, anlum thum a pua adang khat, leh leenggahzu savun thawl khat a pua, mi thum in nang hong dawn ding uh hi.
Amaute in nang hong hopihin nangmah in amau tung panin na san’ ding anlum nih nang tungah hong pia ding uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin Filistia khuacingte a omna Gibeath-elohim na tung ding hi: tua lai mun khuapi sung na tun’ ciangin amaute mai-ah, harp lasakna, khuangneu, tamngai, leh laiza lasakna tawh mailam thu genkholin mual tunga biakna panin hong paisuk kamsang honkhat na tuak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ Kha khauh takin nang tungah hong tung ding a, amaute tawh mailam thu genkholin mi tuamdang khatin na kikheel ding hi.
Hih limte nang tungah hong tun’ ciangin na tuah peuhpeuh na hih ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tawh Pasian hong om hi.

Tua ciangin keima mai Gilgal ah na paisuk ding hi; en in, meihal biaknate leh thunuam-a biaknate a pia dingin nang kiangah kong pai ding hi. Nang kiangah kei hong pai-in na hih ding teng kong lah mateng, ni sagih sung na ngak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel nusia dingin a nung hei ciangin Pasian in ama tungah lungsim dang khat pia hi; tua ni-in hih limte khempeuh piang hi.
Amaute Gibeah ah a tun’ uh ciangin, en in, kamsang honkhat in amah na dawn hi; tua ciangin Pasian’ Kha ama tungah khauh takin hong tung a, amah in amaute lakah mailam thu genkhol hi.

Amah in kamsangte tawh mailam thu a genkholhna amah a theisa mi khempeuhte in a muh uh ciangin, mite khat leh khat in “Kish’ tapa tungah bang tung ahi hiam? Saul zong kamsang suak ahi hiam?” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua lai-a mite khat in dongin, “Kua’ tate ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Saul zong kamsang suak ahi hiam?” cihna paunak khat a kipatna hong suak hi.
Amah in mailam thu genkholh a man ciangin inn-ah pai hi.

Saul’ pano in amah leh a nasempa kiangah, “Koi-ah pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Late a zong dingin ka pai uh hi; late kimu zo lo ding ci-in ka theih uh ciangin Samuel kiangah ka pai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ pano in, “Kong thum hi, Samuel in nang kiangah hong gen teng kei tungah hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in a pano kiangah, “Late a kimuh khitna ko kiangah teltakin hong gen hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Samuel in a gen kumpi suah nading thu tawh kisai ama tungah bangmah gen lo hi.
Tu-in Samuel in Mizpah-a Topa kiangah mite khawm hi;

amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Izipt panin Israelte ka paikhiatpih a, Iziptte’ khut sung leh note hong nengniam kumpi gamte khempeuh’ khut sung panin note kong honkhia hi,’ ci hi.

Ahih hangin note in na tuahsiatnate uh leh na lungkhamnate uh khempeuh panin note a hong honkhia na Pasian uh tu ni-in na nial uh hi; note in, ‘Hi lo! kote tungah kumpi khat koih in,’ na ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na minam nam uh leh a tul tulin Topa’ mai-ah kilak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel minamte khempeuh a nai-ah hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Benjamin minam kila hi.

Amah in Benjamin minamte a behbehin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Matri innkuan kila hi; a tawpna-ah amah in Matri innkuan a mi mi-in hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Kish’ tapa Saul kila hi. Ahih hangin amaute in amah a zon’ uh ciangin amah kimu lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa kiangah dong kik uh a, “Tua mipa hih lai-ah hong pai hiam?” ci uh a, Topa in, “En un, amahmah van kawmlakah bu hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tai-in tua lai mun panin amah hong paipih uh hi; mite lakah amah a din’ ciangin mi khat peuhpeuh sangin a liangko tung siah-in amah sangzaw hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in mi khempeuh tungah, “Topa in a teelsa mipa na mu uh hiam? Mi khempeuh lakah amah tawh a kibang khat zong om lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh awngin, “Kumpipa khan’ sau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in kumpipa thuneihna leh a nasepte mite kiangah gen hi; amah in tuate laibu khat sungah gelhin Topa mai-ah koih hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in mi khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah ciahsak hi.
Saul zong Gibeah-a ama inn-ah ciah a, Pasian in amau’ lungsim a lawn’sak mi thahatte zong amah tawh pai hi.

Ahih hangin bangmah man lo mi pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in eite bang hong ci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puak lo uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cih lo hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mi Nahash paito-in Jabesh Gilead umcih hi; Jabesh mite in Nahash kiangah, “Ko tawh kilemna hong bawl in, nangma’ na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mi Nahash in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu khat tawh note tawh kilemna ka bawl ding hi, keimah in note’ taklam mittang khempeuh khel khia-in Israelte khempeuh tungah mindaina kong omsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jabesh upate in ama kiangah, “Israelte gam sung khempeuh ah kamtaite ka sawl theih nadingun ni sagih sung a hun hong sot in, Tua ciangin kote hong honkhia ding kuamah a om kei leh nang tungah kote kong kipia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Saul’ khua Gibeah-ah kamtaite a tun’ uh ciangin amaute in mite’ kiangah a thu gen uh hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh a gingin kapkhia uh hi.

Tu-in Saul a bawngtalte nung zui-in lo panin hong ciah hi; tua ciangin Saul in, “Amaute a kah nadingin bang in mite na sak ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jabesh mite’ thute ama kiangah gen uh hi.
Amah in hih thute a zak ciangin Saul tungah Pasian’ Kha khauh takin hong tung a, ama hehna nakpi takin so hi.

Amah in bawngleeng kap khat la a, tuate sem nenin kamtaite sawlin Israel gam khempeuhah khakin, “Saul leh Samuel’ nung zui-in a kuankhia lo peuhmah a bawngtalte tungah hih bangin kihih ding hi,” ci-in gen hi. Tua ciangin mite tungah Topa kihtakna hong tung a, mihing khat bangin amaute hong kuankhia uh hi.
Amah in Bezek-ah amaute a kaihkhop ciangin Israel mite tul zathum pha a, Judah mite tul sawmthum pha hi.

Amaute in a hong pai kamtaite kiangah, “Jabesh Gilead-te tungah hih bangin gen un, ‘Zing ciang, ni a sat hunin, note in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,’ ci un,” a ci uh hi. Kamtaite hong tungin Jabesh mite kiangah a gen uh ciangin amaute lungdam uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jabesh mite in, “Zing ciangin nang tungah kote kong kipia ding uh a, nangmah in hoih na sak bang bangin kote tungah nong hih ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

A zing ciangin Saul in mite pawl thumin koih hi; tua ciangin amaute giahphual laizangah zingsang tungin hong pai uh a, sun nisat dong Ammonte vat tuk uh hi; a suakta mite kithehthang uh a, amaute mi nih nangawn a om khopna om nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin mite in Samuel kiangah, “Saul in eite hong uk ding hiam?’ a cite kua ahi hiam? Amaute i thah theih nadingin a mite hong paipih in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Saul in, “Tu ni-in mi khat zong kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in Topa in Israelte sungah hotkhiatna na sem hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in mite khempeuh kiangah, “Hong pai un, Gilgal-ah pai-in kumpi dingin Saul kipsak pha kik ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh Gilgal-ah pai uh a, tua lai mun Topa mai Gilgal-ah Saul kumpi-in koih uh hi. Amaute in tua lai Topa mai-ah thunuam-a biakna pia uh a, Saul leh Israel mite khempeuh tua lai-ah nakpi takin lungdam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Israelte khempeuh tungah, “En un, note in keima kiangah nong genna uh na aw khempeuh uh ka ngai a, note tungah kumpi khat ka koih khin hi.
Tu-in en un, note makaipa in kumpipa ahi hi; keimah teekin ka sam kaang ta hi; en un, note tawh ka tapate om hi; ka neu lai-a kipan tu ni dong note’ makai ka hi hi.

Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh Topa mai leh a sathau nilhpa’ mai-ah kei langah teci hong pang un. Kua bawngtal ka la hiam? Ahih kei leh kua la ka la hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua tung panin sumgolh la ka hi hiam? Kei’ langah teci hong pang un, keimah in kong dinkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nangmah in kote nong khem kei a, zong nong nengniam kei a, mi khatpeuh tung panin zong bangmah na la kei hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in kei tungah bangmah na muh lohna thu uh Topa in note’ lang khatah teci hi a, ama sathau nilhpa zong tu ni-in teci ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Amah in teci ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Moses leh Aaron teelin Izipt gam panin na pu na pate uh a paikhiatpih Topa in teci ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note leh na pu na pate uh adingin Topa in hotkhiatna a sepna thu khempeuh Topa mai note tungah hong gen in kong mawhsak theih nadingin ding lai dih un.
Izipt-ah Jakob pai-in Iziptte in amaute a nenniam uh ciangin Topa tungah na pate uh kiko a, na pate uh Izipt panin paikhiatpihin hih lai mun-ah amaute a teengsak ahi Moses leh Aaron’ Topa in puak hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in Topa a Pasian uh mangngilh uh hi; tua ciangin amah in Hazor kumpipa Jabin’ galkap mangpa Sisera tung leh Filistiate tung leh Moab kumpipa tungah amaute zuak hi; hih mite in amaute do uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa tungah amaute kiko uh a, ‘Kote ka khial khin uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa nusia-in Baalte leh Ashtaroth’ na ka sem uh hi; ahih hangin tu-in ka galte uh khut sung panin kote hong honkhia in, nangma’ na kong sem ding uh hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jerubbaal leh Barak, leh Jefthah, leh Samuel hong sawl a, na kiim khempeuh uh-a na galte uh khut sung panin note hong honkhia hi; note lungmuang takin na om uh hi.

Tua ciangin note a do dingin Ammon kumpipa Nahash hong kuanna na muh uh ciangin, Topa na Pasian uh na kumpi uh hi napi-in note in kei kiangah, ‘Hi lo hi, kumpi khat in kote hong uk ding hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Tu-in note’ teelsa, note’ nget kumpipa en un; en un, Topa in note tungah kumpi khat koih khin hi.
Note in Topa zahtakin ama’ na sem a, ama aw ngai-in Topa’ thupiakna na lehdo kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa leh Topa na Pasian uh na zuih uh leh thu hong nuam ding hi;
ahih hangin note in Topa’ aw ngai loin Topa’ thupiakna na lehdo uh leh Topa in note leh na kumpipa uh hong langpan’ ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in taang loin ding un la, note’ mit mai-ah Topa in ahih ding hih na lian en un.

Tu ni in mangbuh lak laitak hilo ahi hiam? Amah in vanging leh guah hong puak theih nadingin Topa tungah thu ka ngen ding hi; note adingin kumpi khat na ngetna uh hangin Topa muhna-ah na gamtatnasa uh na gitlohna uh a liatna thu thei-in na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in Topa tungah thungen a, Topa in tua ni-in vanging sakin guah zusak hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh in Topa leh Samuel nakpi takin zahtak uh hi.

Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in Samuel kiangah, “Kote ka sih loh nadingun na nasemte’ adingin Topa tungah thungen in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka khialhnasate uh banah kote adingin kumpi khat ngenin hih siatna ka behlap lailai uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Lau kei un; hih siatnate khempeuh na gamta khin uh hi; ahi zongin Topa zuihna panin pial kei un la, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa’ na sem un;
meetna hong pia thei lote ahi a, hong hon thei lo a mawkna nate lamah ahi zongin pial kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate in a mawkna ahi hi.
Topa in ama min a khualna-in ama mite paaikhia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama mi-in note hong bawl nadingin Topa lungkim sak hi.
Tua tham loin kei zong, note adingin Topa tungah thunget lohna tawh ka na khial het kei ding hi; keimah in a hoih a man lampite note kong hilh ding hi.
Topa zahtak bek un la, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.
Ahih hangin note na gamtat siat lai uh leh, note leh na kumpipa uh, na nih un, hong kiphiat khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin Saul kum sawmthum pha hi; amah in kum sawmnih leh nih sung Israelte uk hi.

Saul in Israelte mihing tulthum teel hi; tulnihte Mikmash leh Beth-el mualtung gamah Saul tawh om a, tulkhatte Benjaminte’ gamsung Gibeah-ah a tapa Jonathan tawh om uh hi; midang a om laite amau’ inn a puanbuk ciat uh-ah amah in ciahsak hi.
Jonathan in Geba-ah a om Filistia khuacingte zo hi; Filistiate in tua thu za uh hi. Tua ciangin Saul in gam khempeuh ah peengkul tum a, “Hebru mi khempeuh zasak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Filistia khuacingte a zawhna leh Filistiate adingin Israelte a huathuai ahihna zong Israelte khempeuh in za uh hi. Gilgal-ah Saul a pawm dingin mite kisamkhia hi.

Tua ciangin Israelte tawh a kido dingin Filistiate kikhawmin, leeng tul sawmthum, sakol galkap tulguk leh galkapte tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin tampi pha uh hi; amaute hong paito-in Beth-aven nisuahna lam Mikmash-ah phual sat uh hi.

Israel mite in amaute haksatna sungah a om lam uh a kimuh uh ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh galte in amaute neh mahmah uh hi), mite suanghawm sung, leihawmte sung, suangte sung, hante sung leh tuikhukte sungah bu uh a,
ahih kei leh Jordan ngahmun kantanin Gad leh Gilead gamah galkah uh hi. Saul ahih leh Gilgal-ah om lai a, amah tawh a om mi khempeuh zong lau-in liing uh hi.
Amah in Samuel’ seh hun, ni sagih sung ngak hi; ahih hangin Gilgal-ah Samuel hong pai lo a, ama kiang panin mite kithehthang hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, “Meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna hih lai kei kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna pia hi.
Meihal biakna a piak a man khit phetin en in, Samuel hong pai hi; amah a dawn ding leh a hopih dingin Saul paikhia hi.
Samuel in, “Bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in, “Kei kiang panin mite kithehthangin, a ni kiseh sungin nang lah hong tung lo a, Mikmash-ah Filsitiate a kikhopna ka muh ciangin,

keimah in, ‘Tu-in Filistiate keimah hong hih dingin Gilgal-ah hong paisuk ding a, keimah in Topa’ maipha ka ngen nai kei hi,’ ka ci hi; tua ahih ciangin keimahmah kisawl tawmin meihal biakna ka pia hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Na hai gamtat hi; amah in nang hong thupiak ahi Topa na Pasian’ hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in Topa in Israelte tungah kumpi dingin nang leh na suan na khakte a kipsak suak ding ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizom suak lo ding hi; Topa in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi, Topa in nang hong thupiak zui lo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin Topa in amah seh khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel ding-in Gilgal panin Benjaminte gam sung Gibeah-ah paito hi. Tua ciangin Saul in mihing zaguk bang, amah tawh a om mite sim hi.
Saul, leh a tapa Jonathan, leh amau tawh a om mite Benjaminte’ gam sung Geba-ah om hi; ahih hangin Filistiate in Mikmash-ah phual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate giahphual panin galsimte pawl thumin hong kuankhia uh hi; pawlkhatte Shual gam Ofrah lamah kihei-in,
pawlkhatte Bethhoron lamah kihei a, pawlkhatte gamlak lam Zeboim kuam a kimuh sukna gamgi lamah kihei uh hi.
Tu-in Israelte’ gam sung khempeuhah sikseek khat zong kimu lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistiate in, “Hebru mite in amau adingin namsau ahi a, teipi ahi zongin seek kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi;
ahih hangin a lo khawhna tu, a tu-zum, a hei, ahih kei leh a phiaukawi a seek hiam dingin Israelte khempeuh Filistiate kiangah paisuk uh hi;
lo khawhna tu leh tu-zum seek hiamna thaman in shekel seh-thum-suah-seh-nih hi a, hei seek hiam thaman leh ciangkhut-a sik phuh thaman in shekel khat seh-thum-suah-seh-khat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gal kido ni-in Saul leh Jonathan tawh a om mite khat peuhpeuh’ khut sungah namsau ahi a, teipi ahi zongin om lo hi; ahih hangin Saul leh a tapa Jonathan in nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite in Mikmash paina Ciangka a cing dingin mi sawl uh hi.
Ni khat ni-in Saul’ tapa Jonathan in ama galhiam a pua tangvalpa kiangah, “Hong pai in, gal khat-a Filistia khuacingte kiangah pai ni,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in a pa kiangah gen lo hi.
Saul pen Migron-a om mang-kawlsing nuai-a Gebeah nawl-ah om hi; amah tawh a om mite zaguk bang pha a,
Shiloh-ah Topa’ siampi Eli’ tapa Finehas, a tapa Ikabod, a sanggampa Ahitub’ tapa Ahijah in siampi-puan silh hi. Mite in Jonathan a paikhiat khit lam thei lo uh hi.

Filistia khuacingte’ omna-ah pai dingin Jonathan in a ngimna ciangka a pang khatah suangdawk khat omin a pang lang khatah zong suangdawk khat mah om hi; a khat’ min in Bozez hi a, a lang khat min in Seneh ahi hi.
Suangdawk khat in Mikmash mai leilu lamah dawkin a khat in Geba mai leitaw lamah dawk hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in ama galhiam a pua tangvalpa kiangah, “Hong pai in, vun ki-at lo hih khuacingte kiangah pai ni; Topa in eite adingin hong hih kha ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hong hotkhiat nadingin a tam a tawm in Topa nawngkai sak lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a galhiam puapa in ama kiangah, “Na lungsim in a sawm khempeuh hih in; en in, nang tawh ka om a, nang lungsim mah bangin kei lungsim zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “En in, hua mite kiangah galkah-in amaute kiangah i va kilak ding hi.
Amaute in, ‘Note kiangah kong pai mateng uh hong ngak un,’ hong cih leh i omna mun-ah taang loin i ding ding a, amaute kiangah i paito kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, ‘Ko kiangah hong paito un,’ hong cih uh leh eite i paito ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in eite khut sungah amaute hong pia khin hi. Hih in eite adingin lim hong hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia khuacingte kiangah amau tegel va kilak uh hi; Filistiate in, “En un, a bukna uh leivang panin Hebru mite hong pusuakkhia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Khuacing mite in Jonathan leh a galhiam puapa na hopih uh a, “Ko kiangah hong paito un, na khat kong lak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan in a galhiam puapa kiangah, “Ka nung hong zuito in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israelte khut sungah amaute pia khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan a khut leh a khe tawh kahto-in a galhiam puapa a nungah pai hi. Amaute Jonathan mai-ah puk uh a, a galhiam puapa in ama nungah amaute that hi;
Jonathan leh a galhiam puapa in a hih tua mi thah masak tungin lo eka khat dung zui-in, lo kaihna kuak dung tawn lang tan sungah mihing sawmnih bang pha hi.
Tua ciangin giahphual sung, gam sung, leh mite lakah apkhapna om hi; khuacingte leh galsimte nangawn liing uh hi; ziin liing hi; buaina lianpi mahmah khat hong suak hi.
Benjaminte’ gam sunga Gibeah-a Saul’ galvilte in en uh hi; en in, alang alangah mihonte kikhin maimai hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in amah tawh a omkhawm mite kiangah, “Mi sim un la, eite kiang panin kua paikhia hiam thei un,” a ci hi. Amaute in mi a sim khit uh ciangin, en in, Jonathan leh a galhiam puapa om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Ahijah kiangah, “Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang hih lai-ah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua hun lai takin Pasian thuciamna singkuang Israel mite tawh pai hi.
Saul in siampipa a hopih lai takin Filistiate’ giahphuala buaina hong lian semsem hi; tua ciangin Saul in siampipa kiangah, “Tua thuciamna singkuang lawng nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh kikhawmin gal phualah pai uh hi; en in, a galte khempeuh’ namsau in amau’ lawmte mah hih ciat a, kitawhnawina lianpi khat na om hi.
Tu-in tua hun ma-in Filistiate tawh omkhawm khinin giahphual-ah amaute tawh a pai khinsa Hebru mite nangawn Saul leh Jonathan tawh a om khawm Israelte tawh a kipawl dingin kihei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin, Filistiate a taina thu Efraim mual tung gam-a a bu Israel mite khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin amaute in zong gal phualah nakpi takin amaute nung delh uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israelte tua ni-in honkhia hi; gal kidona in Beth-aven kheng hi.

Israel mite tua ni-in lungkham uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in mite tungah kiciamna khat koih a, “Tu nitak mateng leh ka galte ka thuk matengin an a nepa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite khat beek in an ciam lo uh hi.
Mi khempeuh tulak tung uh hi; lei lakah khuaizu om hi.
Mite tulak a lut uh ciangin, en in, a khuaizu taak a, ahih hangin kuamah in a kam sungah a khut tun’ lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite in tua kiciamna kihta uh hi.

Ahih hangin a pa in kiciamna tawh mite a thuhilhna Jonathan in za lo hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut sunga om a ciangkhut dawn dawk sakin khuaibu sungah diah a, a kam-ah a khut tun’ hi; tua ciangin a tha hatkik hi.
Tua ciangin mite khat in, “Na pa in kiciamna khat tawh nakpi takin mite thuhilh a, ‘Tu ni-in an a ne mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Mite gim mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “Ka pa in gamsung nawngkaisak hi; hih khuaizu tawmno khat ka ciapna hangin ka tha a hatkikna mu un.
Mite in tu ni-in a ut ut-un amau muhsa galte’ an kinusiate ne leh bangzah takin hoihzaw ding ahi hiam; bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in Filistiate tam kithat lo hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua ni-in Mikmash panin Aijalon ciang dong Filistiate sattuk uh hi. Tua ciangin mite gim mahmah uh hi;
van kinusiate tungah mite va leengin, tuu leh bawngtal leh bawngnote a tuahtuah munah that uh hi; tua ciangin mite in tuate a si tawh ne uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Saul kiangah gen uh a, “En in, a si tawh nekna hangin Topa tungah mite khial uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na zuau gamtat khin uh hi; suangtum lian khat kei kiang hih lai-ah hong khuk dih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Mite lakah note pai un la, amaute kiangah, ‘Mi khempeuh in a bawngtal ahi a, a tuu ahi zongin hih lai-ah hong paipih hen la, ne un; a si tawh nekna hangin Topa tungah khial kei un,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh in tua zanin a bawngtal uh hong paipihin tua mun-ah go uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Topa ading biakna tau khat lam hi; tua in Topa adingin a lam masak biakna tau ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Filistiate kiangah zanin paisukin zingsang khuavak mateng amaute va sugawp ni; amaute mi khat zong siit kei ni,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hoih na sak peuhpeuh hih in,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin siampipa in, “Hih lai-ah Pasian kiang nai-ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Pasian kiangah thu dong a, “Filistiate’ kiangah ka paisuk ding hiam? Israelte’ khut sungah amaute na pia ding hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tua ni-in amah in dawng lo hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Mi a makaite khempeuh aw, hih lai-ah hong pai un; hih mawhna tu ni-in hong pian’na thei un la mu un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte a honkhia Topa a nuntak mah bangin, ka tapa Jonathan tungah tua mawhna a om leh zong, amah a si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin mite lak panin amah a dawng mi khat zong om lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israelte khempeuh tungah, “Note lang khatah na om ding uh a, kei leh ka tapa Jonathan a lang khatah ka om ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mite in Saul kiangah, “Hoih na sak bangin hih in,’ a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, “Israelte’ Pasian Topa aw, bang hangin tuni-in na nasempa hong dawng lo na hi hiam? Hih mawhna kei tungah a hi a, ka tapa Jonathan’ tungah ahi zongin a om leh, Israelte’ Pasian, Topa aw, Urim hong pia in; ahih hangin hih mawhna na mi Israelte tungah om ahih leh Thummim hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan leh Saul kila a, ahih hangin mite suakta hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Kei leh ka tapa Jonathan kikal-ah ai saan un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan kila hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in Jonathan kiangah, “Na gamtatnasa hong gen in,” a ci hi. Jonathan in ama kiangah gen a, “Ka khut sunga om ciangkhut dawn tawh khuaizu tawm khat ka ciam hi; hih lai-ah ka om hi, kei ka si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Nang na sih taktak kei taakleh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen, Jonathan aw,” ci-in a kiciam hi.

Tua ciangin mite in Saul kiangah, “Israelte sungah hih gualzawhna lian a piangsak Jonathan si ding ahi hiam? Hi dek peuhmah lo ding! Topa a nuntak mah bangin, a lu tunga sam khat zong lei lakah kia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Pasian tawh tu ni-in tua thu piangsak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in Jonathan tankhia uh a, amah si lo hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate a delhna panin Saul paito hi; Filistiate amau’ mun-ah ciah uh hi.

Saul in Israelte tungah kumpi nasep a lak khit ciangin mun khempeuh-a ama galte khempeuh, Moab, Ammonte, Edom, Zobah kumpite, leh Filistiate a do hi; a kiheina peuhpeuh-ah amah in amaute a sia lam vive-in koih hi.
Amah in hang takin hih-in Amalekte vatgawp a, amaute a sugawp mite’ khut sung panin Israelte honkhia hi.
Tu-in Saul’ tapate in Jonathan, Ishvi, leh Malkhishua ahi hi; hihte in a tanu nihte’ min ahi hi: a tacil min in Merab hi a, a nauzaw’ min in Mikhal ahi hi;
tua ciangin Saul’ zi min in Ahinoam hi a, Ahima-az’ tanu ahi hi. A galkap mangpa’ min in Abner hi a, Saul’ pano Ner’ tapa ahi hi;
Saul’ pa Kish leh Abner’ pa Ner in Abiel’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Saul’ nuntak sung khempeuh Filistiate tawh nakpi tak-a kidona om hi; Saul in mi thahat khat peuhpeuh ahi a, mi hang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a muh ciangin tua mipa amah tawh kipawl sak hi.
Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Topa in ama mi Israelte tungah kumpi dingin nang sathau a nilh dingin kei hong sawl hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ kammalte ngai in.
Mi honte’ Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Amaute Izipt panin hong paikhiat lai-in amaute in lampi-ah Israelte a nialna uh hangin Amalek mite daan ka tat ding hi.

Tu-in pai-in Amalek mite vatgawp un la, amaute’ neih khempeuh susia mang khin un; amaute siit loin, numei leh pasal, naupang leh nawine laite, bawngte leh tuu, kalaoh leh la, that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in mite sam a, Telaim-ah khe galkap mi tulzanih leh Judah mi tulsawm kaikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin Amalek khuapi-ah Saul hong pai-in kuam sungah pang sim hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in Ken mite kiangah, “Pai un, kihemkhia un, Amalekte lak panin paikhia suk un, tua hi kei leh note amaute tawh kong susia khawm kha ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt panin amaute hong paikhiat lai-in Israel mite khempeuh tungah migitna na lak uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Amalekte lak panin Kente kihemkhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Havilah panin Izipt nisuahna lam-a om Shur ciang dong Amalekte zo hi.
Amah in Amalekte kumpipa Agag a hingin man a, mi khempeuh namsau tawh thatmang hi.

Ahih hangin Saul leh mite in Agag, leh a hoih pen tuute leh bawngtalte leh gannote, leh tuunote leh a hoih khempeuh khawi uh a, tuate thatmang lo uh hi; a kisimmawh bangmah a man lo khempeuh amaute in thatmang uh hi.
Topa’ thu Samuel tungah hong tung hi;
“Kumpi-in Saul ka koih ka kisik hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in keimah zuihna panin kihei kik a, ka thupiaknate sem lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel heh hi; zan tawntung Topa’ tungah kiko hi;

Tua ciangin Saul dawn dingin zingsangin Samuel tho baih hi; tua ciangin Samuel kiangah, “Karmel-ah Saul hong pai hi, en in, amah in ama adingin phawkna mual khat phutin, kihei-in paisuak a, Gilgal-ah paisuk hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiangah Samuel hong pai a, Saul in ama kiangah, “Topa’ thupha na tungah hong tung hen; Topa’ thupiakna ka sem khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Tua ahih leh ka bil-a tuu hamna leh ka zak bawngtalte’ hamna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Saul in, “Amaute in Amalekte kiang panin tuate hong paipih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian tungah biakna piak nadingin a limcipen tuute leh bawngtalte mite in siit uh hi; a dangte ka thatmang khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Khawl in! Topa in tu zan-a kei kiangah hong gen thu nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Nang na kineu ngaihsut hun a om hangin, tu-in nang in Israel minamte’ lutang hilo na hi hiam? Topa in Israelte tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilh hi.
Topa in nasem dingin nang hong sawl a, ‘Pai in, mawhnei Amalekte va susia mang in la, amaute a bei mang mateng va do in,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Topa’ aw ngai lo na hi hiam? Bang hang in van kinusiate bawhin Topa muhna-ah a sia gamta na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Samuel kiangah, “Keimah in Topa’ aw ka ngai a, Topa in hong sawl nasepna-ah pai khinin, Amalek kumpipa Agag kong ciahpih khin a, Amalekte ka susiamang khin hi.
Ahih hangin mite in a kinusiate, tuute leh bawngtalte, suksiat dinga a ki-ap na hoih pente Gilgal-ah Topa na Pasian piak dingin la uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, “ Topa in meihal biaknate leh biakpiaknate, Topa’ thu man’ ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thuman’ ding hoihzaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thungaih ding hoihzaw hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh lehdona in aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna in mawhna leh milim biakna mah bang hi. Nangmah in Topa’ thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna panin nang hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Samuel kiangah, “Ka khial khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in mite kihta-in amau’ aw ngai ka hih manin Topa’ thupiakna leh nangma thute ka palsat khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, tu-in kong thum hi, ka khialhna hong maisak in la, Topa ka biak theih nadingin kei tawh hong kileh kik in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Nang tawh kong kileh kik kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa’ thu na nial khin a, Topa in nang Israelte tungah kumpi hihna panin hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
A paikhia dingin Samuel a kihei lai takin Saul in a puantualpi mong-in len a, a puan kikeek hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in ama kiangah, “Topa in Israelte kumpi gam nang tung panin tu ni-in bal khia-in nang sangin a hoihzaw na vengpa tungah pia khin hi.
Israelte’ minthan’na in zong zuau gen lo ding a, zong kisik lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a kisik dingin amah in mi hi lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka khial khin hi; ahi zongin tu-in keima mi upate mai leh Israelte mai-ah kei hong pahtawi in la, Topa na Pasian ka biak theih nadingin kei tawh hong kileh kik in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul nung zui-in Samuel kileh kik hi; Saul in Topa bia hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Amalekte’ kumpi Agag hih lai ka kiangah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Agag launa liin’na tawh ama kiangah hong pai hi. Agag in, “Sih ding lungkhamna hong tung taktak ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Na namsau in numeite ta bei-in a bawl mah bangin na nu zong numeite lakah ta bei hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Topa mai Gilgal-ah Agag semnen hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel Ramah-ah pai hi; Gibeah-a a inn-ah Saul zong ciahto hi.
Samuel in ama sih ni dong Saul mu kik lo hi; ahih hangin Saul hangin Samuel dah hi. Israelte tungah kumpi-in Saul a koih manin Topa kisik hi.

Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Israelte tungah kumpi hihna panin amah ka nolh khitna mu napi-in Saul’ hangin bang tan vei dah ding na hi hiam? Na sathau biing-ah sathau thun in la, pai in; Bethlehem mi Jessi kiangah kong sawl ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama tapate lak panin keima ading kumpi khat ka la khin hi,” a ci hi.

Samuel in, “Bangci pai theih ding ka hi hiam? Saul in za leh, amah in kei hong that ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Bawngla khat paipih in la, Topa tungah biakna pia dingin kong pai hi,’ ci in.
Biakpiakna-ah Jessi samin na hih ding na tungah kong lak ding hi; nang tungah a min kong genpa sathau nong nilhsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ thupiak bangin Samuel gamta-in Bethlehem ah pai hi. Tua khuapi upate a liingsa-in amah dawn dingin hong pai uh a, “Thu hoih a, hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, ‘Thu hoih hi; Topa tungah biakna pia dingin kong pai hi; note ki-ap un la, biakpiakna-ah kei tawh hong pai un,” a ci hi. Amah in Jessi leh a tapate ap-in, biakpiakna-ah amaute sam hi.
Amaute hong tun’ ciangin amah in Jessi’ tapa Eliab enin, “Topa’ sathau nilhpa ama mai-ah om taktak hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hita leh a tun’ san’na hita leh en kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi; mihingte in a pua lama kilangte en a, ahih hangin Topa in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in a tapa Abinadab samin Samuel mai-ah amah paisak hi. Amah in, “Topa in hihpa zong teel lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in Shammah paisak hi. Amah in, “Topa in hihpa zong teel lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in a tapa sagihte Samuel mai-ah paisak hi. Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Topa in hih mite teel lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Na tapate khempeuh hih lai-ah om kim ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “A nautum pen om lai hi; ahih hangin en in, amah in tuute cing hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Amah samsak in la, hong paipih in; bang hang hiam cih leh hihlai-ah amah hong tun’ mateng eite an ne-in i tu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jessi in amah samsakin amah hong tumpih hi. Amah in cidam mel pua-in, a mitte hoih a, a mel hoih hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ding in, amah sathau nilh in; bang hang hiam cih leh hihpa in amah ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in a sathau biing sunga sathau la-in a sanggamte laizangah amah sathau nilh hi. Tua ni a kipanin Topa’ Kha khauh takin David tungah hong tung hi. Tua ciangin Samuel ding-in Ramah ah ciah hi.
Tu-in Saul tung panin Topa’ Kha paikhia a, Topa kiang panin kha gilo in amah gimsak hi.
Saul’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Tu-in en in, Pasian kiang panin kha gilo in nang hong gimsak hi.

Tu-in na mai-a om nasemte in laiza lasakna a tum siam mi khat a zon’ nadingin ka topa un na nasemte thu pia in; Pasian kiang panin kha gilo na tungah hong tun’ ciangin amah in tua hong tum ding a, tua ciangin na ci hong dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a nasemte kiangah, “Lim takin a tum thei khat kei adingin hong zong un la, ka kiangah amah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tangvalte khat in dawngin, “En un, Bethlehem mi Jessi’ tapa, a tum siam, a thahat, a gal hang mi, thugen a siam, a mel hoih khat ka mu hi; Topa in amah tawh omkhawm hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in Jessi kiangah kamtaite sawl a, “Na tapa David, tuute tawh a ompa, kei kiangah hong sawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in anlum, leh leenggahzu savun thawl khat leh keelno khat a pua la khat la-in, Saul kiangah tuate a tapa David puaksak hi.
Saul kiangah David hong tung a, ama nasepna-ah lut hi. Saul in nakpi takin amah it a, amah in a galhiam pua-pa suak hi.
Saul in Jessi kiangah mi sawlin, “Keima nasepna-ah David hong omsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh keima muhna-ah amah in maipha mu hi,” ci sak hi.
Pasian kiang pan-a kha gilo Saul tungah a om peuhmah ciangin David in laiza la-in a khut tawh tum hi; tua ahih ciangin Saul thak suakin a cidam a, ama kiang panin khagilo kihemkhia hi.
Tu-in Filistiate in galdo dingin a galkapte khawm uh hi; Judahte gam Sokoh ah amaute kikhawm uh a, Sokoh leh Azekah kikal Efesdammim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul leh Israel mite kikhawmin Elah kuam-ah giahphual sat uh a, Filistiate do dingin kikhung uh hi.
Filistiate a gal khat mual tungah ding uh a, Israelte a gal khat mual tungah ding-in, amaute’ kikalah guam khat om hi.
Filistiate giahphual panin Gath khuami Goliath a kici a makai, a tun’ pi kua val a sang mi khat hong paikhia hi.
Amah in a lu tungah sumngo siklukhu nei-in, sikpuan tawh amah kithawi a, a puan gihna in sumngo shekel tulnga ahi hi.
Amah in a khete tungah sumngo ngaltuam nei a, a liangkote kikalah sumngo teikhawh kikhai hi.
A teibul in siam lawngpi cia bang hi a, a teipak in sik shekel zaguk gik hi; ama mai-ah a lum puapa pai hi.

Amah ding-in Israel uliante otsanin, “Galdo dingin bang hangin hong kuankhia na hi uh hiam? Keimah in Filistia mi hi-in, note in Saul’ nasemte hilo na hi uh hiam? Note’ adingin mi khat teel un la, tua mipa kei kiangah hong paisuk sak un.
Amah in kei hong doin hong thah zawh leh kote in na nasemte ka hi ding uh hi; ahih hangin keimah in amah zoin ka thah leh note in komau’ nasem hi-in ka na uh na sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua Fislistia mipa in, “Tu ni-in Israel uliante kong to hi; i kido theih nadingin mi khat hong pia un,” ci thuah lai hi.
Saul leh Israelte khempeuh in Filistia mipa’ kammalte a zak uh ciangin amaute lungkia-in nakpi takin lau uh hi.
Tu-in David in Judah gam Bethlehem khua-a om Efrathah mi, tapa giat a nei, Jessi min neipa’ tapa ahi hi. Saul hun lai-in tua mipa teek zo-in kum tampi pha ta hi.
Jessi’ tapa a upen thumte in galdona-ah Saul zui khin uh hi; gal sungah a pai a tapa thumte’ min in a ta upa Eliab, leh ama zom-ah Abinadab, leh a thumna in Shammah ahi hi.
David in a nautum pen ahi hi; a upapen thumte in Saul zui uh a,
ahih hangin Bethlehem-a a pa’ tuute a vak dingin Saul kiang panin David kileh kawikawi hi.
Ni sawmli sung zing leh nitakin Filistiapa hong pai-in hong ding hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in a tapa David kiangah, “Hih ankan seu khat leh hih anlum lum sawm na ute puak dingin guang in la, na ute kiang giahphual ah manlangin va puak in;
a tul a ukpa kiangah zong hih sathaukhal sawmte puak in. Na ute’ om dan va mu in la, amau omzia a kitheihna lim pawlkhat hong ciahpih in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Filistiate tawh kido-in Saul leh amaute, leh Israel mite khempeuh Elah kuam-ah om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jessi in amah a thupiak bangin zingsangin David tho baihin, a keem ding mi khat tawh a tuute nusia a, a ante pua-in pai hi; mihonte galphual ah pai-in galdo kikona a ot lai takun amah giahphual va tung hi.
Israelte leh Filistiate, galkap leh galkap a kido dingin kinaih uh hi.
David in van cingpa khut sungah a nate nusia-in galkapte kiangah va tai a, pai-in a ute va hopih hi.
Amaute tawh a kiho lai takin, en in, Gath khuami Filistiate, a makaipi Goliath min nei-pa, Filistia uliante lak panin hong paikhia-in a masa-a mah bangin kam hong pau hi. David in ama kampau za hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in tua mipa a muh uh ciangin ama kiang panin taikhia uh a, lau mahmah uh hi.

Israel mite khat leh khat kiho-in, “Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei hiam? Israelte a to dingin hong paito takpi hi; amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in hauhna tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa’ innkuante Israelte sungah aana nasep leh siah khempeuh maang sak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

David in ama kianga ding mite kiangah, “Hih Filistiapa that-in Israelte tung panin hih mindaina a beisakpa adingin bang kihih ding ahi hiam? Amah in a nungta Pasian’ galkapte a to dingin hih dawibia Filistiapa in kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Mite in a kibang mahin amah dawng uh a, “Amah a that mipa tungah tua bangin kihih ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tu-in amah in mite kiangah thu a gen ciangin ama u a upapen Eliab in za hi; David tungah Eliab heh mahmah a, amah in, “Bang hangin hong paisuk na hi hiam? Tua tuu tawm khatte gamlakah kua tawh nusia na hi hiam? Na kihai-muan’na leh na lungsim gitlohna ka thei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal kidona mu dingin nong paisuk hi,” a ci hi.
David in, “Bang hih ka hi hiam? Kam bek hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiang panin midang khat kiangah kihei-in a kibang mahin thu dong hi; mite in a masa-a mah bangin amah dawng kik uh hi.
David’ kampaute a kizak ciangin amaute in Saul’ kiangah gen kik uh hi; Saul in amah sam sak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Ama hangin kuama lungkia sak kei in; na nasempa pai-in hih Filistiapa tawh ka va kido ding hi,” a ci hi.

Saul in David kiangah, “Amah tawh kido dingin hih Filistiapa’ lang khatah na kuan zo kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in tangval na hi pan a, amah in a tangval-a kipan galkap mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David in Saul kiangah, “Na nasempa in a pa’ tuute a kem zel hi; humpinelkai ahi a, vom ahi zongin hong pai-in tuute lak panin tuuno a mat ciangin,
a nungah delhin vat gawpin a kam sung panin tuuno ka honkhia hi; keimah hih dingin amah hong ding leh keimah in a khamul-in manin vat gawpin ka that hi.
Na nasempa in humpinelkai leh vomte that khin ngei hi; amah in a nungta Pasian' galkapte ninsak ahih manin dawibia hih Filistiapa in tuate khat tawh kibang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Humpinelkai khecin leh vom khecin panin kei hong honkhia Topa in hih Filistiapa khut sung panin kei hong honkhia ding hi,” ci thuah lai hi. Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Pai in, Topa in nang hong ompih ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in a galvante David silhsak hi, amah in a lu tungah sumngo lukhu khusakin, sikpuan silhsak hi.

Tua ciangin David in a galdalnate tungah a namsau khih a, amah kingeinaseh lo ahih manin lam pai dingin a kithawi leh pai thei lo hi. Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Hihte tawh ka pai thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka kingeinaseh kei hi,” a ci hi. David in tuate suahkhia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a khut-ah a ciangkhut la-in, lui panin suangmai tang nga tengin a tuucin’ thung-ip, a ip sungah tuate koih hi; a khut sungah a suanglotna tawi a, Filistiapa nai-ah amah pai hi.
Tua ciangin a mai-ah a lum puapa tawh Filistiapa hong paisukin David hong naih hi.
Filistiapa khuadakin David a muh ciangin amah in simmawh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a tangval pan, a cidam tuak, a mel hoih khat hi lel hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiapa in David kiangah, “Ciangkang tawh kei kiangah nong pai nadingin kei in ui ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Filistiapa in ama pasiante tawh David samsia hi.
Filistiapa in David kiangah, “Ka kiangah hong pai in, huih lak vasate leh gamlak gamsate tungah na sa ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Filistiapa kiangah, “Namsau leh teipi leh teikhawh tawh kei kiangah nang nong kuan hi; ahih hangin kei in Israel galkapte’ Pasian, mihonte’ Topa, nangmah in na to mipa’ min tawh nang kiangah kong kuan hi.

Tu ni-in Topa in ka khut sungah nang hong pia ding a, keimah in nang hong sattukin na lu ka tankhia ding hi; tua ciangin tu ni-in huih lak vasate leh leitung ganhingte tungah Filistia mi a site’ luanghawmte ka pia ding hi; Israelte sungah Pasian khat a om lam leitung mi khempeuh in a theih nading,

leh Topa in namsau leh teipi tawh a hotkhiat lohna thu hih a kikhawm khempeuh in a theih nading ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh galdona in Topa aa hi a, amah in kote khut sungah note hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
David tawh kituah dingin Filistiapa ding-in hong pai a, hong naih ciangin David zong Filistiapa tawh kituah dingin manlangin gal mai-ah delh hi.
Tua ciangin David in a khut-in a thung-ip sawkin suangtang khat la a, lawnin Filistiapa’ taltang kha hi; a taltang ah a suang tum a, lei lakah amah maipuk hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in suanglotna khat leh suang khat tawh Filistiapa zo a, Filistiapa kha-in that hi; David khut sungah namsau om lo hi.
Tua ciangin David tai-in Filistiapa tungah ding a, a namsau la-in a paai panin dok a, amah thatin tua tawh a lu tankhia hi. Filistiate in a makaipa uh a sihna a theih uh ciangin amaute tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israelte leh Judah mite awngin ding uh a, Gath leh Ekron kulh kongpi ciang dong Filistiate delh uh ahih manin Sha-araim panin Gath leh Ekron ciang dong Filistia mi a liamte lampi-ah puk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate a delhna panun Israelte hong ciahkik uh a, amaute in amau’ giahphual luhsak uh hi.
David in Filistiapa’ lutang la-in Jerusalem ah paipih hi; ahih hangin amah in a gal kidalna ama puanbuk-ah koih hi.

Filistiapa do-in David a kuan khitna Saul in a muh ciangin galkap mangpa Abner kiangah, “Abner aw, hih tangvalpa kua tapa ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Abner in, “Na nuntakna a hin’ mah bangin, Kumpipa aw, ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tangvalpa kua tapa ahi hiam kan in,” a ci hi.
Filistiapa a thahna panin David hong ciah ciangin Abner in amah samin a khut sunga Filistiapa’ lutang tawh Saul mai-ah amah paipih hi.
Saul in ama kiangah, “Tangval aw, kua tapa na hi hiam?” a ci hi. David in dawng in, “Bethlehem khuami na nasempa Jessi’ tapa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
David leh Saul a kiho khit a kipanin Saul’ tapa Jonathan in David it mahmah a, Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin it hi.
Saul in tua ni-a kipanin ama kiangah David omsak a, a pa’ inn-ah ciah sak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in David tawh thuciamna khat bawl hi.
Jonathan in ama tunga om a puantualpi suah-in David pia a, a gal kidalna, leh a namsau nangawn leh a thal leh a kawnggak zong pia hi.
David kuankhia a, Saul in a sawlna mun peuhpeuhah a maa tun’ hi; tua ahih ciangin Saul in galkapte a uk dingin amah koih hi. Hih in mite khempeuh’ muhna leh Saul’ nasemte’ muhna-ah zong hoih kisa hi.

Filistiapa a thahna panin David ciahin, amaute in inn lam a zuat uh ciangin, Israel khuapite khempeuh sung panin Kumpi Saul dawn dingin khuangtum leh lungdamna lasakna leh lasaknate tawh lasa leh lam kawmin numeite hong kuankhia uh hi.
Amaute in lungdamna bawlin omin numeite khat leh khat in, “Saul in a tulin that, David in a tulsawmin that,” kici uh hi.

Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkim losak hi; amah in, “Amaute in David tungah a tulsawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong lo uh hi; kumpi min puak cih sim loh bang nei nawn ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ni a kipanin Saul in David encik hi.

A zing ciangin Pasian kiang panin khagilo in Saul hong bawhin, ni simin David in a hih ngei bangin laiza lasakna a tum lai takin ama inn sung tengah kamsan’na nei hi. Saul in a khut sungah a teipi tawi hi;
Saul in a teipi-in David nihvei khawh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, “Kawm tawh David ka khawhcip ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin David in a nihvei mahin pelh thei hi.
Saul in David kihta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah ompih a, ahih hangin Saul kiang panin amah kihemkhia khin ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in ama omna panin amah la khia-in mihing tulkhat a uk-in koih hi; mite makai-in amah kuankhia-in hong ciah hi.
David in a sepna khempeuh ah a maa tun’ hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah ompih hi.
Amah in matut zawhna lianpi a neih lam Saul in a muh ciangin amah lamdang sa-in om hi.
Ahih hangin Israelte khempeuh leh Judahte khempeuh in David it uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute makaihin amah kuankhia-in hong ciah hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah ka tanu uzaw Merab om hi; nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi; kei adingin hang peuh in la, Topa’ gal do in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in, “Keima khut sungah amah si loin, Filistiate khut sungah si hen,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
David in Saul kiangah, “Keimah in kumpipa’ makpa ka hih nadingin kei in kua hi a, Israelte sungah ka tanaute, ka pa’ innkuante in kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Saul’ tanu Merab David tungah a kipiak ding lai takin Meholah mi Adriel tungah a zi dingin kipia hi.
Tu-in Saul’ tanu Mikhal in David ngai hi; amaute in Saul kiangah gen uh a, tua thu in Saul lungdam sak hi.

Saul in, “Ama adingin amah in thangzak ahih theih nading leh Filistiate khut in amah a langpan’ theih nadingin ama tungah amah pia ning,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in David kiangah a nihveina genin, “Nang in tu-in ka makpa na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Saul in a nasemte thupia a, “David kiangah thu tuam genpih un la, ‘En in, nang tungah kumpipa lungkim a, ama nasemte khempeuh in nang hong it hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in kumpipa’ makpa suak in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Saul’ nasemte in David’ kiangah hih thute gen uh hi. David in, “Keimah in mizawng hi-in a zahtakhuai lo ka hihna mu napi-in kumpipa’ makpa suah ding a thuneu sa na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin David in gen hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “David kiangah hih bangin na gen ding uh hi, ‘Kumpipa in a galte a thukkik theih nadingin Filistiate’ vundawn zakhat cih simloh kumpipa in moman deih lo hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tu-in Saul in Filistiate’ khut tawh David sih sak ding ngaihsun hi.
Ama nasemte in David kiangah hih thute a gen ciangin kumpipa’ makpa ahih ding David lungkim sak hi. A hun a bei ma-in,

David ding-in ama mite tawh pai a, Filistiate mi zanih that hi; tua ciangin amah kumpipa’ makpa a suah theih nadingin kumpipa tungah a cingin a kipia amaute’ vundawnte David in hong paipih hi. Saul in a tanu Mikhal ama zi dingin pia hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in David a ompihna leh a tanu Mikhal in David a itna thu Saul in a muh ciangin,
Saul in David kihta semsem hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in David’ gal hi tawntung hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante galdo dingin hong kuankhia uh a, amaute hong kuankhiat simin Saul’ nasem dangte khempeuh sangin David in a maa tunzaw hi; tua ahih ciangin nakpi takin ama min kisang ngaihsut semsem hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in David thah ding a ngaihsutna thu a tapa Jonathan leh a nasemte khempeuh kiangah gen hi. Ahih hangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan in David diksa mahmah hi.
Jonathan in David kiangah, “Ka pa Saul in nang thah hong sawm hi; tua ahih ciangin zingsang ciangin kidawm in la, mun simtham khatah omin bu in,
kei paikhia-in nangma omna phual nai-ah ka pa kiangah ka ding ding a, nangma thu ka pa kiangah ka gen ding hi; ama tung panin phawk ka neih leh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jonathan in a pa Saul kiangah David thu a hoihin genin ama kiangah, “Kumpipa a nasempa David tungah khial kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tungah amah hong khial lo hi; ama nasepnate nang tungah nasep hoih ahi hi;

amah in a nuntakna pia ngamin Filistiapa that a, Topa in Israelte khempeuh adingin gualzawhna lianpi piangsak hi. Nangmah in hih thu na mu a, na lung a dam hi; tua ahih ciangin bang hangin thu om lopi-in David thahna tawh a mawh baang lo mipa tungah khial ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Saul in Jonathan’ thu mang hi; Saul kiciam a, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin amah kithat lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in David samin, Jonathan in ama tungah hih thute khempeuh lak hi. Jonathan in Saul kiangah David paipih a, a ni dang-a bangin ama sepna ngei-ah sem hi.
Tua ciangin gal hong omkik hi; David kuankhia-in Filistiate tawh kido a, amaute tampi tak that a, ama mai-ah amaute tai uh hi.
Tua ciangin a khut sungah a teipi tawi-in a inn sungah a tut lai takin Topa kiang panin kha gilo Saul tungah hong tung hi; David in a laiza lasakna tum hi.
Saul in a teipi-in kawm tawh David khawhcip dingin khawh hi; ahih hangin amah in Saul pelh a, amah in kawm tungah a teipi khawh hi. Tua ciangin David tai-in suakta hi.

A zingsang ciangin amah a thah theih nadingin tua zanin Saul in amah a vil dingin David’ inn-ah mi sawl hi. Mikhal in ama kiangah, “Tu zanin na nuntakna na suahtak kei leh, zing ciangin nang hong kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mikhal in kongvangneu-ah David khiasuk hi; amah taikhia-in suakta hi.
Mikhal in milim khat la-in lupna tungah koih a, keelmul lukham khat a lu-ah koihin puan silhsak hi.
Saul in David a man dingin mi a paisak ciangin amah in, “Amah a ci na hi,” na ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in David en dingin mi sawl a, “Amah ka thah theih nadingin a lupna tawh kei kiangah amah hong pua to un,” a ci hi.
A mi sawlte hong tun’ ciangin, en in, keel mul lukham a lu san-ah omin lupna tungah a milim na om hi.

Saul in Mikhal kiangah, “Bang hangin tua bangin kei hongkhem a, amah a suahtak nadingin ka galpa khah na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Mikhal in Saul dawngin, “Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Hong paisak in; bang hangin nang hong that ding ka hi hiam?’ hong ci hi,’ a ci hi.
Tu-in David tai-in suakta a, Ramah ah Samuel kiangah pai-in, ama tungah Saul’ hihna teng gen hi. Tua ciangin amah leh Samuel pai-in Naioth-ah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiangah, “En in, Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah David om hi,” kici hi.

Tua ciangin David a man dingin Saul in mi sawl hi; amaute in kamsang honte mailam thu genin omin amaute a makai-in Samuel a ding a muh uh ciangin, Saul’ sawltakte tungah Pasian’ kha hong tung a, amaute in zong mailam thu gen uh hi.

Hih thu Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin, amah in midang sawl leuleu a, amaute in zong mailam thu mah genin om uh hi. Tua ciangin Saul in mi a thumveina sawl a, amaute in zong mailam thu genin om veve uh hi.

Tua ciangin amahmah Rammah ah pai a, Seku-a om tuikhuk lianpi tung hi; amah in, “Samuel leh David koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci-in dong hi. Mi khat in, “En in, Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai panin Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah amah pai hi; ama tungah zong Pasian’ Kha hong tung a, Ramah khua sung Naioth veeng a tun’ mateng a lam pai kawmin amah in mailam thu gen hi.
Amah in zong a puante suahkhia-in, Samuel’ mai-ah zong mailam thu genin, tua sun tawntung leh tua zan tawntung a guaktangin om hi. Tua huna kipanin, “Saul zong kamsang suak khin ahi hiam?” kici hi.

Tua ciangin Ramah khua sung Naioth veeng panin David tai-in, Jonathan kiangah hong tungin ama mai-ah, “Bang hih ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna bang ahi hiam? Amah in kei thah dingin hong zon’ nadingin na pa mai-ah ka khialhna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Tua bang hi het lo ding! Na si kei ding hi. En in, ka pa in kei kiangah gen loin a lian hita leh a neu hita leh bangmah hih lo hi; bang hangin ka pa in kei tungah hih thu hong iim ding ahi hiam? Tua bang hilo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin David in dawngin, “Nang nong pahtak lam na pa in tel takin thei hi; tua ahih manin amah in, ‘Amah dah kha ding ahih manin hih thu Jonathan theisak kei ning,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin a taktakin, Topa nungta-in nang na nuntak mah bangin kei ka sih nading themkhat bek in sam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Na gen peuhpeuh nang adingin kong hih sak ding hi,” a ci hi.

David in Jonathan kiangah, “En in, zingciang in kha det ni hi a, kumpipa tawh sabuai-ah pel loin ka tut ding ahi hi; ahih hangin a ni thum ni nitak dongin lo sungah ka buk theih nadingin kei hong paisak in.

Na pa in kei hong kan leh, ‘David in ama khuapi Bethlehem-ah a va taipak dingin kei kiangah limtakin hong kingen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau innkuan khempeuh adingin kumsim biakpiakna tua lai-ah om hi,’ na ci ding hi.
Amah in, ‘Pha hi!’ a cih leh na nasempa adingin hoih ding hi; ahih hangin amah a heh leh amah in siatna a ngaihsutna thei in.

Tua ahih ciangin thuman itna tawh na nasempa hong bawl in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tawh a siangtho thuciamna-ah na nasempa na tun’pih hi. Ahih hangin kei sungah mawhna a om leh, nangmah mah in kei hong that in, bang hangin na pa kiangah kei hong paipih ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “Nang tungah tua bang hi het kei hen! Ka pa in nang tungah siatna hong tun’sak ding a ngaihsutna thei leng nang kiangah hong gen lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Jonathan kiangah, “Na pa in nang hong ngawh dawn’ leh kua in kei kiangah hong gen ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jonathan in David kiangah, “Hong pai in, lo sungah pai ni,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute gel lo sungah pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in teci hi ta hen! Zingciang tu bang hun ahi a, a ni thum ni-in ahi zongin, ka pa’ ngaihsutna tawng ka kankhiat khit ciangin, en in, David tungah amah a lungsim a hoih leh, nang kiangah mi hong sawlin hong pulak lo ding ka hi hiam?

Ahih hangin nang tungah siatna bawl nadingin ka pa a lungkim sak leh, a muanhuaina-ah nang na pai theih nadingin nang kiangah a thu kong pulak kei a, nang kong sawlkhiat kei taak leh, Topa in keimah Jonathan hong dawm kei ta hen. Amah in ka pa tawh a om mah bangin Topa in nang tawh hong om ta hen.
Kei ka nuntak lai leh ka sih loh nadingin Topa’ thuman itna kei tungah hong lak in;
keima innkuan panin na thumanna dokkik ngei kei in. Leitung maitang panin David’ galte khempeuh Topa in a phiatkhiat ciangin,
David innkuan panin Jonathan’ min phiatkhia kei in. Topa in David’ galte tungah phu la ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in amah a itna David tungah kiciam pha kik hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama pumpi a it zahin amah in David it hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in ama kiangah, “Zing ciang in kha det ni ahi hi; na tutna awng ding ahih manin nang hong kiphawk ding hi.
A ni thum ni-in nakpi takin nang hong kiphawk kan zawlai ding hi; tua ciangin a thu a kikup ciangin na bukna mun-ah pai in la, suangcian hua lam pangah om in.
Tua ciangin muitum bangin tua lam pangah thaltang thum ka lawn ding hi.

En in, naupang khat sawlin ama kiangah, ‘Pai in, thaltangte va zong in,’ ka ci ding hi. Naupang kiangah, ‘En in, nang ma kiang hih lamah thaltangte om hi, tawm in,’ ka cih leh nang a hong pai ding na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin nang adingin lungmuanhuai-in launa om lo hi.
Ahih hangin tangvalpa kiangah, ‘En in, thaltangte nangma khen’ah om hi.’ ka cih leh, nang pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nang hong sawlkhia hi.
Nang leh kei in i gen thu tawh kisai-in ahih leh, en in, nang leh kei kikalah teci in, Topa om tawntung hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David lo sungah bu hi; kha det ni hong tun’ ciangin an ne dingin kumpipa tu hi.
A ni danga bangin kawm gei-a tutna tung, ama tutna-ah kumpipa tu hi; a kigalsai-in Jonathan tu-in, Saul’ pangah Abner tu a, ahih hangin David’ mun awng hi.
Ahi zongin Saul in tua ni-in bangmah gen lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ama tungah thu khatpeuh piang hi; amah siang lo hi, siang lo taktak hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a ni nih ni, kha det ni khit a zingsang ciangin David’ mun awng lai hi. Tua ciangin Saul in a tapa Jonathan kiangah, “Bang hangin Jessi’ tapa zanni hita leh, tuni hita leh an nekna-ah hong pai lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jonathan in Saul dawngin, “Bethlehem ah a pai dingin lim takin kei tungah David hong kingen hi,

amah in, ‘Kei hong ciahsak in; ka innkuante un khuapi sungah biakpiakna bawl uh a, ka sanggampa in tua lai-ah ka om ding thu hong pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nong hehpihna-in hong paisakin ka sanggamte hong musak in,’ hong ci hi. Hih thu hangin kumpipa sabuai-ah amah hong pai lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan tungah Saul heh mahmah a, amah in ama kiangah, “A kihei khial a lehdo numei’ tapa aw, nangma maizum nading leh na nu’ mindai nadingin Jessi’ tapa na pawlpihna thu a thei lo hong sa na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah Jessi’ tapa a nuntak lai teng nang na hi a, na kumpi za ahi zongin kip lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin mi sawl in la, kei kiangah amah hong paipih in, amah a si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in a pa Saul dawngin, “Bang hangin amah kithat ding ahi hiam? Amah in bang hih ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Saul in amah a vat kha dingin ama lamah a teipi lawn hi; tua ahih ciangin a pa in David that ding a ngaihsutna Jonathan in thei tel hi.
Tua ciangin heh mahmahna tawh sabuai panin Jonathan ding-in tua pawi a ni nih ni-in an ne lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a pa in amah minsiasak ahih manin David hangin amah dah hi.
A zingsang ciangin David tawh a kiciamna lo-ah Jonathan pai-in, amah tawh naupangno khat pai hi.
Amah in a naupang kiangah, “Tai in la ka thaltang lotte va tawm in,” a ci hi. Naupang a tai laitakin ama khen’ah thaltang khat lawn hi.
Jonathan’ thaltang lot a tukna mun-ah naupang a tun’ ciangin Jonathan in naupang samin, “Nang khen’ hua lamah thaltang om hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in naupang samin, “Manlang in, hong kinawh in, tua lai-ah om kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jonathan’ naupangpa in a thaltangte khawmin a topa kiangah pai hi.
Ahih hangin naupang in bangmah thei lo hi; Jonathan leh David bek in a thu thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in a hiamte a naupangpa kiangah pia-in, ama kiangah, “Pai in la, khuapi sungah pua in,” a ci hi.

Naupang a paikhiat khit phetin suangcian pang panin David ding-in lei-ah maipuk a, thumvei kun hi; Jonathan sangin David nakpi takin dahzaw a, amau khat leh khat kinamin, khitui luangin khat leh khat kikah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Ei tegel Topa’ min tawh kiciamin, ‘Kei leh nang kikal, leh keima suan-le-khakte leh nangma suan-le-khakte kikalah a tawntungin Topa om ding hi,’ i cih mah bangin nuam takin pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah ding-in paikhia hi; Jonathan zong khuapi sungah ciah hi.

Tua ciangin David Nob khua-a siampipa Ahimelek kiangah pai hi; Ahimelek a liingsa-in David dawn dingin hong pai a, ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nang guak hong hi a, kuamah tawh hong pai lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

David in siampi Ahimelek kiangah, “Kumpipa in na khat hong sawl a, kei kiangah, ‘Nang kong sawlna leh nang kong hilh thute khat zong kuamah theisak kei in,’ hong ci hi. Tua mun tua mun-ah tangvalte tawh kiciamna khat ka bawl zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang bang na nei hiam? Anlum lum nga ahih kei leh hih lai-a a om peuhpeuh hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Siampipa in David dawngin, “Tu takin anlum mawkmawk ka nei kei hi; ahih hangin anlum siangtho om hi; tangvalte numei panin a kikep nak uh leh,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in siampipa dawngin, “A taktakin ci lehang, hih bangin ka paikhiat uh ciangin numeite kiang panin kote ka kikem tawntung uh hi; khualzin mawkmawk ciang nangawnin zong tangvalte siangtho hi; tu ni-in amaute bangzahin siangtho zawkan ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampipa in anlum siangtho amah pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh anlum dang om loin, a kilak khiat ni-in anlum a lum lai tawh a kilaih pah ding, Topa mai panin a kilakhia Ompihna Anlum bek om hi.
Tu-in Topa mai-ah a kikhawlsak, Saul’ nasemte mi khat tua ni-in om hi; ama min in Doeg hi a, Saul’ gancing makaipipa, Edom mi ahi hi.

Tua ciangin David in Ahimelek kiangah, “Teipi ahi a, namsau ahi zongin hih lai-ah nei lo na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ nasep in nawhtat ding kul ahih manin ka namsau ahi a, ka hiamte ahi zongin kong la man kei hi,” a ci hi.

Siampipa in, “Elah kuam-ah na thah Filistia mi Goliath’ namsau, en in, puan tawh kitunin hih lai-ah siampi puan nungah om hi; tua na deih leh la in; bang hang hiam cih leh a dang om lo a, tua bek hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi. David in, “Tua sanga hoihzaw a dang om lo hi; kei hong pia in,” a ci hi.
David ding-in tua ni-in Saul kiang panin tai a, Gath kumpipa Akhish kiangah pai hi.

Akhish nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih David in a gam kumpipa hilo ahi hiam? Amaute khat leh khat in ama thu la-in sa-in lam uh a, ‘Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that,’ ci hilo ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
David in hih thute a lungsimah ciamteh a, Gath kumpipa Akhish kihta mahmah hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute’ mai-ah a gamtat kheelin, amaute’ muhna-ah a hai-in kibawl a, kulh kongkhakte tung kuigawpin, a khamul tungah a cilphuan kai suk sak hi.
Tua ciangin Akhish in a nasemte kiangah, “En un, hih mipa a hai lam na mu uh hi; tua ahih ciangin bang hangin kei kiangah amah hong paipih na hi uh hiam?
Ka omna-ah mihai a gamta dingin hih mipa nong paipih nadingun mihai kisam thuah lai ka hi hiam? Hih mipa ka inn sungah hong pai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
David tua lai panin kihemkhia-in Adullam leihawm-ah tai hi; a sanggamte leh a pa’ innkuante khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin ama kiang tua lai mun-ah paisuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin a lungkham mi khempeuh, leh leiba a nei mi khempeuh, leh a lungkim lo mite khempeuh ama kiangah kikhawm uh hi; amah in amaute tungah a ukpa a suak hi. Tua lai-ah amah tawh mihing zali bang om hi.

David tua lai mun panin Moab gam Mizpeh-ah pai hi; amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah, “Pasian in kei adingin hong sepsak ding ka theih hun matengin ka nu leh ka pa na kiangah hong omsak in, ci-in kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah amaute nusia a, munmuanhuaina sungah David a om sung teng amah tawh omkhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Gad in David kiangah, “Munmuanhuaina sungah om nawn kei in; kihem in la, Judah gamah pai in.” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David kihemkhia-in Hereth tulak-ah pai hi.
Tu-in David leh amah tawh a om mite a kimuhna Saul in za hi. A khut sungah a teipi tawi-in, a nasemte khempeuh a kimkotah ding-in Gibeah khua a sangna mun makeng kung nuai-ah Saul tu hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a kimkot-a a ding a nasemte kiangah, “Tu-in za un, no Benjaminte aw; Jessi’ tapa in note khempeuh lote leh leenggui lote hong pia-in, note khempeuh a tul a uk, a za a uk-in hong koih dingin um a,

note khempeuh in kei hong sawmsim na hi uh hiam? Tu ni-a bangin hong pangsim dingin ka tapa in Jessi’ tapa tawh thukimna a bawl ciangin kuamah in kei kiangah hong pulak loin, ka tapa in keimah a do dingin ka nasempa a hanthotna-ah note kuamah dah loin, kei kiangah zong nong pulak kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ nasemte kiangah a ding, Edom mi Doeg in dawngin, “Ahitub’ tapa Ahimelek kiang Nob khua-ah Jessi’ tapa a pai ka mu a,
amah in ama adingin Topa thu dot sakin, an-le-tui pia a, Filistia mi Goliath’ namsau ama tungah pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ahitub’ tapa siampi Ahimelek leh a pa’ innkuante ahi Nob-a om siampi khempeuh a sam dingin mi sawl hi; kumpipa kiangah amaute khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Ahitub’ tapa aw, tu-in za in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Hih lai-ah om ing, topa aw,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in ama kiangah, “Tu ni-a bangin hong pangsimin kei do dingin hong thawh theih nadingin bang hangin nang leh Jessi’ tapa in kei hong sawmsim a, ama tungah an leh namsau pia-in, ama adingin Pasian kiangah thu dotsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ahimelek in kumpipa dawngin, “Na nasemte khempeuh lak panin kumpipa’ makpa leh nangmah hong cingte a ukpa ahi David bangin kua thumanin, na inn sungah kua kipahtawi ahi hiam?

Ama adingin Pasian thu ka dotsak a masa pen in tu ni ahi hiam? Hilo! Kumpipa in a nasempa ahi a, ka pa’ innkuante khempeuh ahi zongin ngawh kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasempa in a tam hita leh a tawm hita leh hih thu khempeuh bangmah thei lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Ahimelek aw, nang leh na pa’ innkuante na si taktak ding uh hi.” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in ama kiim-ah a ding a cingte kiangah, “Kihei un la, Topa’ siampite that un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute zong David tawh pang khawm uh hi; amaute in ama tai lam thei napi-in kei kiangah hong pulak lo uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin kumpipa’ nasemte in Topa’ siampite tung a tu dingin a khut uh taangkhiasak lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Doeg kiangah, “Kihei in la siampite hih in,” a ci hi. Edom mi Doeg kihei-in siampite hih a, tua ni-in saiha dial siampi puan a silh mihing sawmgiat leh nga that hi.
Amah in siampite’ khuapi Nob khua sunga om nuntakna a nei khempeuh namsau tawh hih hi, numei leh pasal, naupang leh nawine, bawngtalte, late leh tuute, namsau tawh that khin hi.
Ahih hangin Ahitub’ tapa Ahimelek’ tapate khat Abiathar a kici khat suakta-in David kiangah a tai hi.
Saul in Topa siampite a thah khitna thu Abiathar in David kiangah gen hi.
David in Abiathar kiangah, “Tua ni-in Doeg tua lai-ah om ahih ciangin Saul kiangah gen taktak ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Na pa’ innkuanpih mite khempeuh’ sihna ka piangsak hi.
Kei tawh hong om in, lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh kei that dingin hong zongte in nang zong thah dingin hong zong hi; kei tawh nang in lungmuanna sunga om na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in amaute in David kiangah, “En in, Filistiate in Keilah sim uh a, a ancilnate uh luh uh hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Topa thu dongin, “Pai-in Filistiate ka sim ding hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in David kiangah, “Pai-in Filistiate sim in la, Keilah honkhia in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David mite in ama kiangah, “En in, Judah gam hih mun-ah eite i lau hi; Filistia galkapte do-in Keilah ah pai lehang bangzahin lauzaw ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in Topa thu dong kik hi. Topa in amah dawngin, “Ding in, Keilah-ah paisuk in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah Fislistiate kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David leh a mite Keilah ah paisuk uh a, Filistiate tawh kido-in amau’ ganhingte ciahpihin amaute tampi tak that uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in Keilah-a teng mite honkhia hi.
Ahimelek’ tapa Abiathar David kiang Keilah ah a tai lai-in amah in siampipuan khat kengin paisuk hi.

Keilah ah David a tun’ khitna thu tu-in Saul kiangah kigen hi. Saul in, “Pasian in ka khut sungah amah hong pia khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kulh kongpi leh a kalhna zawl a nei khua sungah lutna tawh amahmah kikhaknelh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in galdo ding, Keilah ah a paisuk ding, David leh a mite a umcih dingin mi khempeuh sam hi.
Saul in ama tungah a sia a sawmna David in thei hi; amah in siampi Abiathar kiangah, “Hih lai-ah siampipuan hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Israelte’ Pasian, Topa aw, keima hangin khuapi susia dingin Saul in Keilah ah pai a sawmna thu na nasempa in za khin taktak hi.

Keilah mite in ama tungah kei hong ap ding hiam? Na nasempa’ zak bangin Saul hong paisuk ding hiam? Israelte’ Pasian, Topa aw, kong thum hi, na nasempa tungah hong gen in,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Amah hong paisuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Keilah mite in kei leh ka mite Saul tungah hong ap ding hiam?’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Amaute in note hong ap ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi zaguk bang a pha, David leh a mite ding-in Keilah panin kihemkhia uh a, amaute a pai theihna peuhpeuh uhah pai uh hi. Keilah panin David a suahtakna thu Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in a vai a khawl phot hi.
Zif gamlak mual tung gam sung, gamlak munmuanhuaina-ah David om hi. Saul in ni simin amah zong a, ahih hangin Pasian in ama tungah David pia lo hi.
Amah a that dingin Saul kuankhia khin ahih manin David lau hi, Zif gamlak Horesh munah David om hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan ding-in David kiang Horesh ah pai a, Pasian in hong huh ding hi, ci-in amah hanthawn hi.

Amah in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa Saul in nang hong su-kha lo ding hi; nangmah in Israelte tungah kumpi na hi ding a, keimah in nangma zom ka hi ding hi; ka pa Saul in zong hih thu thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nih in Topa mai-ah thuciamna bawl uh hi; Horesh ah David om lai-in, Jonathan a inn-ah ciah hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiang Gibeah ah Zif mite paito uh a, “Jeshimon leitaw lam, Hakhilah mual tung, Horesh-a munmuanhuai sung kote lakah David bu hilo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong paisuk in, kumpipa aw, amah na mat nopna thu thei ka hih manun hong paisuk in; kote’ hih ding ahih leh kumpipa tungah amah kong ap ding uh ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Topa in note thupha hong pia ta hen; bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei tungah hehpihna nong nei uh hi.
Pai un, va kician sak lai un; ama bukna mun thei-in va mu un la, tua lai-ah kua in mu hiam hong thei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah ngiansiam mahmah hi, ci-in kei tungah hong kigen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah a bukna mun ahi a kiselsimna mun khempeuh hong ciamteh un la, thu a kitel tak tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. Tua ciangin note tawh kei kong pai ding hi; gam sungah amah a om lai nak leh, Judah gam sung khempeuh zon’ ding ahi zongin a tul lak panin amah ka zongkhia teitei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute ding-in, Zif-ah pai dingin Saul mai-ah na mapai uh hi. Tu-in David leh a mite Jeshimon leitaw lam Arabah gamsung Maon gamlakah om uh hi.

Saul leh a mite amah zong dingin kuan uh hi. Hih thu David kiangah kigen hi; tua ahih ciangin Moan gamlaka om suangpi-ah amah paisuk hi. Saul in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in Maon gamlakah David delh hi.
A mual pang khatah Saul pai a, David leh a mite a mual pang lang khatah pai uh hi; Saul leh a mite in David leh a mite man dingin hong um ahih manin Saul pelh dingin David a nawhtat lai takin,
Saul kiangah kamtai khat hong tung a, “Hong kinawh in la hong ciah in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistiate in gam sung hong sim hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David a delhna panin Saul kileh kik a, Filistiate a do-in pai hi; tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Suahtakna Suangpi kici hi.
Tua lai panin David paito-in En-gedi munmuanhuai-ah om hi.
