Filistiate a delhna panin Saul a ciah ciangin, ama kiangah, “En in, En-gedi gamlakah David om hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Israelte khempeuh sung pan a kiteel mihing tulthum la-in Sathak Suangpi mai-ah David leh a mite zong dingin pai hi.
Lam gei-a tuu-khawk a omna ah pai hi; tua gei-ah leihawm khat om a, awng hawh dingin tua sungah Saul pai hi. Tu-in David leh a mite leihawm tawngnung sungah na tu uh hi.

Tua ciangin David mite in ama kiangah, “Topa in nang kiangah, ‘En in, na khut sungah na galpa kong pia ding a, hoih na sak bangin ama tungah na hih ding hi,’ hong cih ni tu ni hita hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin David ding-in Saul’ puantualpi mong at khiat simsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in Saul’ puanmong at khia ahih manin David a lungsim in su hi.

Amah in a mite kiangah, “Amah in Topa’ sathau nilhpa hi ci-in thei napi-in, ama tungah ka khut ka ngak ding, Topa’ sathau nilhpa ahi ka topa tungah hih bang ka hih ding Topa in hong kham hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in hih thute tawh a mite zol a, amaute Saul hihsak lo hi. Tua ciangin Saul ding khia-in leihawm nusia a, a paina lampi ah pai hi.
Tua khit ciangin David zong leihawm sung panin paikhia-in Saul nung sap a, “Ka to kumpipa!” a ci hi. Saul in a nung a et ciangin, David in lei-ah a mai kunin zahtakna bawl hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin, ‘En in, David in na siat nading zong hi,’ a ci mite’ thu um na hi hiam?

En in, Topa in tu ni-in leihawm sung ka khut sungah nang hong piakna nangmah mah in tu ni-in na thei khin hi; mi pawlkhat in nang that dingin kei hong sawl a, ahih hangin nang kong hih kei hi. Keimah in, ‘Ka topa tungah ka khut ka nga kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa’ sathau nilhpa ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.

En in, ka pa aw, ka khut sunga na puantualpi mong en in; kei tungah khialhna ahi a, kumpi dona ahi zongin a om lohna, na puantualpi mong at khia napi-in nang kong thah lohna thu tawh thei-in na mu ding hi. Kei thah dingin nong zon’ hangin nang tungah ka khial kei hi.
Topa in kei leh nang kikalah thu khen hen. Kei’ tunga nong khialhnate Topa in kei taangin nang tungah hong thuk hen; ahih hangin keima khut in nang hong hih lo ding hi.
Taang-ate’ paunak in, ‘A gilote’ sung panin gitlohna hong piang,’ a cih mah bang ahi hi. Ahih hangin keima khut in nang hong hih lo ding hi.
Israel kumpipa kua do-a kuankhia ahi hiam? Kua delh na hi hiam? Ui si maw! Uili maw!
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in thukhen hong hi-in, kei leh nang kikalah thukhenna hong pia hen la, hih thu thei-in ka thu-ah hong pang hen la, na khutsung panin kei hong honkhia hen,” a ci hi.
David in hih thute Saul kiangah a gen a man khit ciangin, Saul in, “Ka tapa David, hih in nang’ aw ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Saul kap hi.
Amah in David kiangah, “Nang in kei sangin na thumanzaw hi; keimah in nang tungah a sia kong piak lai takin nang in kei tungah a pha nong pia hi.
Topa in na khut sungah kei hong koih lai takin nang in kei nong thah lohna-ah kei nong limbawlna tu ni-in na laktel hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khat in a galpa mu leh amah in a suakta-in amah paikhia sak ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu ni-in kei tungah nong bawlna hangin Topa in a hoih tawh nang thaman hong pia hen.
Tu-in, en in, nangmah in kumpi na hih taktak ding ka thei a, Israel kumpi gam nangma khut sungah a kip ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keima nung-a ka suan-le-khakte beisak loin, ka pa’ innkuan panin ka min na phiat loh nadingin Topa tawh kei tungah hong kiciam in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul tungah David kiciam hi. Tua ciangin Saul inn-ah ciah hi; ahih hangin David leh a mite munmuanhuai-ah paito uh hi.
Tu-in Samuel si hi; Israelte kikhawmin ama hangin kap uh a, amaute in Ramah-a om ama innah amah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin David ding-in Paran gamlakah paisuk hi.
Karmel mual-ah nasep a nei mi khat Maon khua-ah om hi. Tua-pa hau mahmah hi; amah in tuu tulthum leh keel tulkhat nei hi. Amah in Karmel ah a tuumul met hi.

Tu-in tua mipa’ min in Nabal hi a, a zi’ min in Abigail ahi hi, Tua numei in tei leh melhoih a thuah khat hi a, ahih hangin a pasal pen a ki-uk zolo mi leh a gamtat sia khat ahi hi; amah in Kaleb mi ahi hi.
Nabal in a tuumul a metna David in gamlakah za hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in tangval sawm sawl hi; David in tangvalte kiangah, “Karmel ah paito-in Nabal kiangah pai un la, keima min tawh amah hopih un.
Hih bangin amah na hopih ding uh hi: ‘Nang tungah nopna om ta hen, na innkuan tungah nopna om ta hen, na neih khempeuh tungah nopna om ta hen,
Ganmul mette na neihna ka za hi; tu-in na tuucingte kote tawh omin amaute tungah siatna ka bawl kei uh a, Karmel ah a om sung teng uh amaute in bangmah man’suah lo uh hi.

Na tangvalte uh dong in, amaute in nang kiangah hong gen ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin na mai-ah ka tangvalte maipha musak in; bang hang hiam cih leh pawi ni-in kong pai uh hi. Na khut sungah na neih peuhpeuh na nasemte leh na tapa David tungah pia in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
David tangvalte hong tun’ ciangin amaute in hih thu khempeuh David minin Nabal kiangah gen uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in ngak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Nabal in David’ nasemte dawngin, “David kua ahi hiam? Jessi’ tapa kua ahi hiam? Tu lai-in a tote kiang panin a taikhia nasem tampi om hi.
Ka anlum leh ka tui leh ka ganmul mette’ adingin ka gawh ka sate la-in koi lai pan-a hong pai cih ka theih loh mite tungah pia ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David’ tangvalte kihei a, ciah kikin hih thu khempeuh ama kiangah gen uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh in na namsau uh kuah ciat un!” a ci hi. Amaute khempeuh in a namsau uh kuah uh hi; David in zong a namsau kuah hi; mihing zali bang David nungah paito uh a, mihing zanihte van tawh om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Nabal nasem tangvalte khat in Nabal’ zi Abigail kiangah genin, “En in, ka topa uh a hopih dingin gamlak panin David in a kamtaite hong sawlkhia hi; amah in amaute na tai hi.
Ahi zongin kote tungah tua mite hoih mahmahin kote in siatna ka thuak kei uh a, amaute tawh ka pai lai teng uh gamlakah ka om sungun bangmah ka man’suah kei uh hi;
tuute kemin amaute tawh ka om sung khempeuh uh kote adingin sun leh zanin amaute in kulhpi ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih thu thei in la, na hih ding ngaihsun in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka topa leh a innkuan khempeuh tungah siatna tun’sak ding kingaihsun a, amah a khan’sia ahih manin kuamah in hopih thei lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin, anlum lum zanih, leh leenggahzu savun thawl nih, leh a semsa tuu nga, leh ankan lawh nga, leh leenggahkeu bawk zakhat, leh thei moh zanih la-in late tungah tuate guang hi.
Tua nu in a tangvalte kiangah, “Keima mai-ah na paisuak un; en un, note nungah kei kong pai hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in a pasal Nabal hilh lo hi.
Amah la tungah tuangin mual liah-ah a paisuk lai takin, en in, David leh a mite ama lamah hong paisuk uh hi; amah in amaute dawn hi.
Tu-in David in, “Ama neihsa khempeuh khat zong a mang lo dingin hih mipa neih khempeuh gamlakah a mawkna-in ka cing hi; amah in hih thuhoihte a sia tawh kei tungah hong thuk hi.
Zingsang ciangin ama neihsa khempeuh lakah pasal khat zong ka siit tak leh Pasian in keimah David hong dawm kei ta hen,” na ci khin hi.
Abigail in David a muh ciangin kinawh a, la tung panin tuakin David mai-ah maipuk a, lei lakah kun hi.
Ama khe phungah pukin, “Kei tung bekah, ka topa aw, mawhna om ta hen; na kiangah na nasemnu thu hong gensak in la, na nasemnu thugente hong ngai in ci-in kong thum hi.

Ka topa in hih a khan’sia mipa Nabal ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amin mah bangin amah zong ahi hi; Nabal in ama min hi a, haina in amah vukcip hi; ahih hangin na nasemnu keimah in nangma hong sawl na tangvalte ka mu kha kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, ka topa aw, Topa nungta-in, nangma nuntakna a hin’mah bangin mithah nading pan leh nangma khut tawh thuhkikna na hih loh nadingin Topa in nang hong kho ahih manin, tu-in na galte leh nangma tungah siat nading a zongte in Nabal bang ta hen.
Tu-in na nasemnu keimah in nangmah ka hong puak hih letsong nangma nung hong zui tangvalte hong piasak in.

Na nasemnu khialhna hong maisak in ci-in kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa’ galte do na hih manin Topa in na innkuan kipsak paisuak ding hi; na nuntak lai teng nang sungah siatna kimu lo ding hi.
Nangmah delhin hong that dingin mite hong thawh leh, nangmah in Topa na Pasian kepna sung a hing mite lakah na om ding hi; amah in suang lotna kuang pan lotkhiat bangin na galte lawnkhia ding hi.
Topa in nangmah tawh kisai thu a hoih a gente khempeuh tawh kizui-in hong hihin, Israelte tungah ulian-in nang hong koih khit ciangin,

thu om lopi-in mi thahna ahi a, nangmah mah in phulakna hangin ahi zongin, dah nading thu ahi a, lungsim nat nading thu ahi zongin na nei kei ding hi. Topa in lim takin nang hong bawl ciangin na nasemnu hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Abigail kiangah, “Tu ni-in keimah dawn dingin nang a hong sawl Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah ta hen!
Tu ni-in mithahna leh keima khut tawh phulak nading panin keimah hong kem nangma ngaihsutna in thupha ngah ta hen!

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong gimsak nading panin hong kho Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in a nungta taktak ahih mah bangin, nang hong kinawhin keimah dawn dingin hong pai lo hi lecin, zingsang ciangin Nabal sung pan pasal khat zong om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama tung panin amah a puakte sang hi; amah in tua nu kiangah, “Lung nuamin na inn-ah ciah to ta in; thei in, na thu ka ngai a, nong thuumna kong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tung hi; en in, kumpipa’ pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zu kham mahmah hi; tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmah lo hi.
Zingsang ciang, Nabal’ zukhamna a ven’ ciangin a zi in ama kiangah hih thute gen a, thakhatin a lungtang si-in amah suangtum bang hi.
Tua khit ni sawm bang ciangin Topa in Nabal vat hi; tua ciangin amah si ta hi.

Nabal a sihna thu David in a zak ciangin amah in, “Nabal’ khut tung panin ka ngah zahkona hong thuk sakin, siatna panin a nasempa a lenkik Topa in thupha ngah ta hen; Topa in Nabal’ gamtat siatna ama lu tung mah ah tung kiksak hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin David in mi sawlin ama zi dingin Abigail helsak hi.
David’ nasemte Karmel-a Abigail kiang a tun’ uh ciangin amaute in tua nu kiangah, “David in amah zi dingin a la dingin kote nang kiangah hong sawl hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah ding-in lei-ah a mai kun a, “En un, na nasemnu in ka topa’ nasemte’ khe a silsak ding nasem ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin ding-in la tungah tuang a, ama nasem numei nga in amah keem hi; David kamtaite nung zui-in pai a, tua ciangin ama zi suak hi.
David in Jezre-el khuami Ahinoam zong la hi; amau tegel ama zi suak uh hi.
Saul in ama tanu Mikhal, David’ zi pen, Gallim khuami Laish tapa Paltiel tungah na pia khin hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiang Gibeah ah Zif mite hong pai uh a, “Jeshimon nisuahna lam Hakhilah mual tungah David bu hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul ding-in Zif gamlakah David zong dingin Israel mi a kiteel mihing tulthum tawh Zif gamlakah paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Jeshimon nisuahna lampi gei-a om Hakhilah mual tungah giahphual sat hi. Ahih hangin David gamlakah om lai hi; amah delhin gamlakah Saul a hong paina thu a theih ciangin,
David in thukan simte sawl a, Saul hong pai taktak ahihna thei hi.

Tua ciangin David ding-in Saul in giahphual a satna mun-ah pai hi; David in Saul a galkap mangpa, Ner’ tapa Abner tawh a lupna mun mu hi; Saul giahphual laizangah lum a, ama kimkotah galkapte in phual sat uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Hit mi Ahimelek leh Zeru-iah’ tapa, Joab’ sanggampa Abishai kiangah, “Saul’ giahphual ah kei tawh kua hong paisuk ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Abishai in, “Kei nang tawh kong paisuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David leh Abishai zanin galkapte kiangah pai uh hi; giahphual sungah Saul na ihmu a, a lukhung lei lakah a teipi na kiphut hi; Abner leh galkapte ama kimkotah na lum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abishai in David kiangah, “Pasian in na galpa tu ni-in na khut sungah hong pia hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in teipi-in lei tawh khatvei bek hong khawhcip sak in, nihvei khawh ding kisam lo hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David in Abishai kiangah, “Ama tungah siatna bawl kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ sathau nilhpa a su peuhpeuh mawhna pan peng ding sa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
David in, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin Topa in amah vat ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong a sih hun hong tung ding hi; tua ahih kei leh gal kikapna sungah amah paisukin si ding hi.
Topa sathau nilhpa tungah ka khut ka ngak ding Topa in kei hong kham hi; ahih hangin tu-in a lukhung-a a om a teipi leh a tuithawl la-in pai ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David in Saul lukhung-a om teipi leh tuithawl la hi; tua ciangin amaute paikhia uh hi. Kuamah in mu lo hi, zong thei lo hi; kuamah khanglo lo hi, amaute khempeuh ihmu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amaute ihmut suak mahmah sak hi.
Tua ciangin David a pang khatah pai-in, amaute kikalah saupi a kihalin mual dawn-a gamla-ah ding hi;
David in galkapte leh Ner’ tapa Abner samin, “Abner aw, hong dawng lo ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Abner in dawngin, “Kumpipa a sam kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

David in Abner kiangah, “Pasal hilo na hi hiam? Israelte sungah nang tawh a kibang kua om ahi hiam? Tua ahih leh bang hangin na to kumpipa vil lo na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa na topa susia dingin mi khat hong pai hi.

Hih banga na gamtatna hoih lo hi. Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin a si dingin na kilawm hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ sathau nilhpa na topa na vil kei hi. Tu-in a lukhunga a om kumpipa’ teipi leh tuithawl koi-ah om ahi hiam thei in,” a ci hi.
Saul in David’ aw khen thei a, “Ka tapa David, hih in nangmah aw ahi hiam?” a ci hi. David in, “Ka topa, kumpipa aw, keima aw ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Bang hangin ka topa in a nasempa delh ahi hiam? Bang gamta khial ka hi hiam? Ka tungah bang mawhna om ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka to kumpipa in a nasempa’ thu za in. Keimah do dingin nang hong toksuahpa in Topa ahih leh amah in biakna hong sang ta hen; ahih hangin mihing ahih leh amaute in Topa mai-ah samsiatna ngah ta hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘Pai in, pasian dangte’ na sem in,’ ci-in Topa’ gamh ka ngah loh nadingin tuni-in kei hong hawlkhia uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ omna panin gamdang leitangah kei hong si sak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh mual tungah vaka a bengpa bangin Israelte kumpipa keimah that dingin nong kuankhia hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Ka gamta khial hi; hong ciahkik in; ka tapa David aw; bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in kei hong suaktasak na hih manin nang tungah siatna kong bawl nawn kei ding hi; en in, ka hai gamtat a, nakpi takin ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in dawngin, “Hih lai-ah na teipi om hi, kumpipa! Tangvalte khat hong paisak in la, hong la sak in.

Topa in mi khempeuh a thumanna leh a thutakna hangin thaman pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tuni-in ka khut sungah nang hong pia a, keimah in Topa’ sathau nilhpa hih dingin ka khutte ka tangkhiasak kei hi.
En in, tu ni-in nangmah kong suahtaksak mah bangin Topa in zong kei hong suaktasak hen la, haksatna khempeuh panin kei hong honkhia ta hen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Thupha ngah ta in, ka tapa David! Nangmah in na tampi na sem ding a, tuate na zo ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David ama lampi-ah pai-in, Saul ama omna mun ah ciah hi.

David in a lungsim sungah, “Saul’ khut tawh ni khat ni ciangin ka si ding hi; kei adingin Filistiate gamah ka tai ding sangin a hoihzaw om lo hi; tua ciangin Saul in Israel gamgi huam sungah kei hong zon’ niloh lungkia ta ding a, keimah in ama khut sung panin ka suakta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David ding-in, amah leh amah tawh a om mihing zagukte, Gath kumpipa, Maok’ tapa Akhish kiangah pai hi.
Tua ciangin David, amah leh a mite a innkuanpih ciat tawh, David zong a zi nihte, Jezre-el khuami Ahinoam leh Nabal’ zi meigongnu, Karmel khuami Abigail tawh, Gath-a Akhish kiangah va teeng hi.
Gath ah David tai hi, ci-in Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in David zong nawn lo hi.

Tua ciangin David in Akhish kiangah, “Nangma maipha nong muhsak zawh leh, ka ten’ theih nadingin gam sung khuate khatah kei ading mun hong pia in; bang hangin na nasempa nang tawh kumpi khuapi sungah teengkhawm ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Akhish in tua ni-in ama tungah Ziklag pia hi; tua ahih manin tu ni dongin Judah kumpite’ aa ahi hi.
Filistiate gam sungah David a ten’ hun sung in kum khat leh kha li ahi hi.
Tu-in David leh a mite paito-in, Geshur mite, Girzi mite, leh Amalek mite va sim uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite in Izipt gam lam Shur ciang dongah tang lai-a kipanin a teeng mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in tua gam vat gawp a, numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin hingkhawi loin, ahih hangin tuute, bawngtalte, late, kalaohte, leh puante la-in Akhish kiangah hong ciahkik hi.
Akhish in, “Tu ni-in kua va sim na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, David in, “Judah mite’ Negeb gam,” ahih kei leh, “Jerahme-el mite’ Negeb gam,” ahih kei leh, “Ken mite’ Negeb gam,” a ci hi.

David in, “Amaute in kote’ thu genin, David in tua bangin hih hi,’ ci ding uh ahih ciangin,” ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin Gath ah thu a puak ding numei ahi a, pasal ahih zongin hingkhawi lo hi. Filistiate gam sungah a ten’ sung teng tua bang gamtatna in ama ngeina ahi hi.
Akhish in David muangin, “Ama mipih Israelte in a muhdah theih nadingin a mahmah kibawl khin hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in ka nasem hi tawntung ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Tua hunin Filistiate in Israelte do dingin a galkapte khawm uh hi. Akhish in David kiangah, “Nang leh na mite in kei tawh galkapte lakah a kuan khawm ding na hih lam thei in,” a ci hi.

David in Akhish kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi, na nasempa in bang hih thei hiam cih na thei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Akhish in David kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi, khan’ tawntungin keimah hong cing dingin nang kong koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Samuel si a, Israelte khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah ah vui uh hi. Saul in vankahte leh aisante a gamsung panin beisak hi.
Filistiate kikhawm uh a, hong pai-in Shunem ah giahphual sat uh hi; Saul in Israelte khempeuh khawm a, amaute in Gilboa-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Saul in Filistia galkapte a muh ciangin lau a, a lungsim nakpi takin liing hi.
Saul in Topa thu a dot ciangin, Topa in mang tawh hita leh, Urim tawh hita leh, kamsangte tawh hita leh dawng lo hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama kiangah pai-in ama tung pan thu ka dot theih nadingin vankah thei numei khat kei adingin hong zon’sak un,” a ci hi. A nasemte in ama kiangah, ‘En in, Edor-ah vankah thei khat om hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a mel seelin puan dang silh a, amah leh mi nih pai hi; amaute zanin numei kiangah pai uh hi. Amah in, “Kei adingin a sisate’ kha kiang pan thu hong dotsak in la, nang kiang a min kong gen peuhpeuh kei adingin hong sap tohsak in,” a ci hi.

Numei in ama kiangah, “Saul’ hihsa thu, gam sung panin vankahte leh aisante a suksiatna na thei taktak hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keima sih nading a piangsak dingin kei adingin thangzak hong koih na hi hiam? ”a ci hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungah Topa min tawh Saul kiciam a, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin hih thu hangin nang tungah dantahna hong tung lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Kua hong sapsak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in “Samuel hong sapsak in,” a ci hi.
Numei in Samuel a muh ciangin a gingin a kiko khia hi; tua ciangin numei in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam? nang in Saul na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang na mu hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin numei in Saul kiangah, “Lei sung panin pasian khat hong paikhia to ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Ama mel bang ci hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in, “Puteek khat hong paito hi; amah in puantualpi silh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Saul in tua pen Samuel hi ci-in thei a, lei-ah a mai kunin zahtakna bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin keimah sap tohna tawh hong nawngkaisak na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in dawngin, “Nakpi takin ka lungkham hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistiate in kei hong do a, kei kiang panin Pasian kihei khia-in kamsangte tawh ahi a, mang tawh ahi zongin hong dawng nawn lo hi; tua ahih ciangin ka gamtat ding hong gen dingin nang kong sam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Topa nang kiang panin kihei khia-in na gal suak khin ahih ciangin bang hangin kei thu hong dong lai na hi hiam?
Topa in kei tung tawnin hong gensa bangin nang tungah hong hih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na khut sung panin kumpigam bal khia-in na vengpa David tungah pia khin hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa’ thu ngai loin, Amalek tungah ama heh mahmahna tawh kizui-in hih lo na hih manin Topa in nang tungah tu ni-in hihte hong tungsak hi.

Tua tham loin Topa in Israel mite zong nang tawh Filistiate khut sungah hong piakhawm ding hi; zing ciangin nang leh na tapate in zong kei kiang nong zuan ding uh hi; Topa in Israel galkapte zong Filistia-te’ khut sungah pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel thugente hangin lau lua-in lei lakah Saul tawn puk pah hi; tua ciangin amah in sun tawntung leh zan tawntung bangmah ne lo ahih manin ama sungah thahatna om lo hi.

Tua ciangin Saul’ kiangah numei hong pai-in amah a lau mahmahna amuh ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah, “En in, na nasemnu in na thu hong ngai zo hi; ka luang khamin kei tungah nong gen bangin ka gamta zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nang zong na nasemnu thu ngai-in na mai-ah anlum tawmkhat hong luisak in: na pai nading ah na pai ciangin na hat nadingin ne in,” a ci hi.

Amah in nial a, “Ka ne kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tua numei tawh kopin a nasemte in ci teitei uh hi; tua ciangin amau cih bangin mang hi. Tua ahih ciangin lei lak panin amah tho-in lupna tungah tu hi.
Tu-in numei in a inn ah bawngno thau khat nei a, amah in manlang takin go-in, tua ciangin annel la a, annel meekin silngo sawhloh anlum em a,
Saul leh a nasemte mai-ah lui hi; amaute in ne uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute ding-in tua zanin paikhia uh hi.
Tu-in Filistiate in a galkap khempeuh uh Afek-ah khawm uh hi; Jezre-el gam sunga om tuikhuk gei-ah Israelte in giahphual sat uh hi.
Filistia uliante a zaza a tultulin a pai laitakin David leh a mite zong Akhish tawh a nungah pai uh a,

Filistia galkap a ukte in, “Hih Hebru mite in hih lai-ah bang hih ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Akhish in Filistia galkap a ukte kiangah, “Ni tampi, kum tampi kei tawh a om khin, Israel kumpipa Saul’ nasempa in hih David hi a, kei kiangah hong tai-a kipanin tu ni dongin ama sungah mawhna ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Filistia galkap a ukte ama tungah heh uh hi; Filistia galkap a ukte in ama kiangah, “Amah na koihna mun ah a ciahkik theih nadingin hih mipa sawlkik in; gal kidona sungah eite lang hong suak kha ding ahih manin galdona sungah eite tawh amah hong kuansuk lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mipa in a topa tawh kilemna bangci bawl ding ahi hiam? Hih lai-a om mite’ lutang tawh hi ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Amaute khat leh khat in la-in sa-in lam uh a, ‘Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that,’ a cihpa uh David hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David samin ama kiangah, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, nang na thuman a, hih vai-ah nang in kei tawh kuan khia-in nong paina hangin ka lungdam hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei kiangah nong pai-a kipan tu ni dong nang sungah khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahih hangin uliante in nang hong thukim lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ciahkik in; Filistia uliante na lungkim loh sak khak loh nadingin lungkim takin ciah in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Akhish kiangah, “Ahih hangin, keimah in bang hih ka hi hiam? Ka to kumpipa’ galte pai-in ka do theih loh nadingin nangma nasepna ah kong tum ni-a kipan tu hun dong na nasempa sungah bang mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David dawngin, “Nang in keima muhna ah Pasian’ vantungmi khat mah bangin paubaang lo na hihna ka thei hi; ahi zongin Filistia galkap a ukte in, “Amah in gal phual ah eite tawh hong kuanto lo ding hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tawh a hong pai na topa’ nasemte tawh zingsangin tho baih un la, khua a vak phetin kihemkhia un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia gamah a ciahkik dingin David a mite tawh zingsang tungin dingkhia uh a, Filistiate ahih leh Jezre-el khua ah paito uh hi.
Tu-in David leh a mite a ni thum ni-in Ziklag hong tun’ uh ciangin, Amelekte in Negeb leh Ziklag na sim khin uh hi. Amaute in Ziklag zo-in mei tawh na hal uh a,
numei khempeuh leh tua khua sunga om teng a neu a lian-in man uh hi; amaute in khat zong that lo uh a, ahih hangin pua khia-in paipih uh hi.
David leh a mite khuapi a tun’ uh ciangin a khuapi mei tawh kihalin, a zite leh a tanute leh a tapate uh sal-in a kimat khitna mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin David leh amah tawh a om mite in a aw uh gingsakin a tha bei dongun kap uh hi.
David’ zi nihte, Jezre-el khuami Ahinoam leh Karmel khuami Nabal zi meigongnu Abigailte zong sal-in kiman hi.

David nakpi takin lungkham hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh a tanute a tapate uh hangin a lungsim uh na lua ahih manin suang tawh amah den’ ding gen uh hi. Ahih hangin David in amahmah Topa a Pasian sungah kithakhauhsak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Ahimelek’ tapa siampi Abithar kiangah, “Siampi puan hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abiathar in David kiangah siampi puan paipih hi.

Tua ciangin David in Topa thu dong a, “Hih mihonte ka delh ding hiam? Amaute ka pha ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Delh in; bang hang hiam cih leh na pha taktak ding a, na mite na honkhia zo taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David leh amah tawh a om mihing zagukte kuankhia uh a, Besor lui-ah tungin, tua lai-ah a kinusia mi pawlkhat om uh hi.
Ahih hangin David, amah leh mi zalite a delhin paisuak uh hi; Besor lui a galkah dingin a gim lua mi zanih kinusia uh hi.
Amaute in Izipt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uh hi; amaute in anlum pia uh a, amah in ne hi, amaute in tui dawn ding pia uh hi,

amaute in thei moh khat leh leenggahkeu bawk nih zong pia uh hi. Amah in a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi; bang hang hiam cih leh anlum ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum leh zan thum ne lo dawn loin om hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Keimah in Amalekte khat’ nasem, Izipt tangval khat ka hi hi; tu ma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi.
Kote in Khereth mite’ Negeb gam leh Judahte’ gamsung leh Kaleb mite’ Negeb gam ka sim uh hi; mei tawh Ziklag ka hal uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Hih mite kiangah nong paipih suk ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nangmah in kei nong thah loh nading ahi a, ka topa’ khut sungah nong ap kik loh nading ahi zongin Pasian tawh kei tungah hong kiciam in, tua ciangin hih mihonte kiangah nang kong paipih suk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a paipih suk ciangin, en in, Filistiate gam leh Judah gam panin a lak uh na tampite hangin amaute gam sung khempeuh ah kithehthangin an ne, tui dawn, laamin om uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in a zing ciang phalvak-a kipan nitak dong amaute vatgawp hi; kalaoh tungah tuangin a tai tangval zalite sim loh amaute khat zong suakta lo hi.
David in Amalekte’ laksa khempeuh ngah kik hi; David in a zi nihte honkhia hi.
A neu a lian, tanute tapate, nate ahi a, a kila khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a kisam khat zong om lo hi; David in a vekpi-in ciahpih kik hi.
David in tuu honte leh bawng honte khempeuh zong man hi; mite in tua ganhingte ama mai-ah hawl uh a, “Hih in David’ na lakte ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin, David zui dingin a gim lua, Besor lui-ah a kinusia mihing zanihte kiangah David pai hi; David leh amah tawh a om mite a dawn dingin amaute hong kuankhia uh hi; mite kiangah David a nai ciangin amah in amaute hopih hi.

Tua ciangin David tawh a pai mite lak panin a gilo leh mi ginalote khempeuh in, “Amaute in eite tawh hong paisuak lo uh ahih manin, mite in a zi leh a tate uh la-in a paikhiatpih uh cih sim loh, eite’ ngah kik nate khat zong amaute i pia kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin David in, “Ka sanggamte aw, Topa in eite hong piaksa nate tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi; amah in eite hong kemin eite do ding a hong pai mihonte i khut sungah hong pia khin hi.
Hih thu-ah kua in no’ thu hong ngai ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh gal sunga a kuan mipa’ tanh zah mah, van a ngak mipa in tang ding hi; amaute in a kibangin tang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ni-a kipanin tu ni dongin amah in Israelte adingin thukham leh biakna ngeina kipin bawl hi.
David in Ziklag a tun’ ciangin Judah upa a lawmte kiangah a na lakte pawlkhat khakin, “Topa’ galte’ na a kila sung panin hih lai-ah note ading letsong a om hi,” a ci hi;
tua nate pen, Beth-el, Negeb sunga om Ramoth, Jattir,
Aroer, Sifmoth, Eshtemoa,
Karmel, Jerahmeel khuapite, Ken khuapite,
Hormah, Borashan, Athak,
Hebron sunga omte, David leh a mite a pai ngeina mun khempeuhte’ ading ahi hi.
Tu-in Filistiate in Israelte do uh hi; Filistiate mai-ah Israel mite tai uh a, Gilboa Mual tungah thah-in tuk uh hi.
Filistiate in Saul leh a tapate pha uh hi; Filistiate in Saul’ tapate Jonathan leh Abinadab leh Malkhishua that uh hi.
Gal in Saul nakpi takin neh a, thal tawite in amah mu hi; thal tawite in nakpi takin amah liamsak hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a galhiam puapa kiangah, “Hih dawibia mite hong pai-in kei hong dawt letin hong mawlpih kha ding ahih manin na namsau dok in la, tua tawh hong dawt let in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a galhiam puapa in hih nuam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in ama namsau la-in tua tungah puk hi.
A galhiam puapa in Saul a sihna a muh ciangin amah zong a namsau tungah pukin, amah tawh si khawm hi.
Tua bangin Saul’ leh a tapa thumte leh a galhiam puapa, leh a mi khempeuh, a ni kikhatin si khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin kuam gal khat leh Jordan gal khat-a om Israel mite in Israel mite tai-in Saul leh a tapate a sih khitna thu a zak uh ciangin amaute in a khuapite uh nusia-in tai uh hi; tua ciangin Filistiate hong pai-in tuate sungah teeng uh hi.
A zing ciangin a kithat mite’ na la dingin Filistiate hong pai ciangin Saul leh a tapa thumte Gilboa Mual tungah a si mu uh hi.
Amaute in a lu tan khia-in, a galhiam hawkkhia uh a, a milimte uh leh mite kiangah hih thuhoih a puak dingin Filistia gam sung khempeuh kamtaite sawl uh hi.
Amaute in ama galhiam Ashtaroth biakinn sungah koih uh hi; amaute in ama luang Bethshan kulh-ah suang uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jabeshgilead ah a teng mite in Saul tungah Filistiate hihna a zak uh ciangin,
a hang mi khempeuh ding-in zan tawntung pai uh a, Bethshan kulh tung panin Saul’ luang leh a tapate’ luangte va la uh hi; tua ciangin amaute Jabesh ah hong tungin tua lai-ah hal uh hi.
Amaute in a guhte la-in Jabesh khua sunga makeng kung nuai-ah vui uh a, ni sagih sung an tang uh hi.
Saul a sih khit, Amelekte thahna panin David a ciahkik ciangin Ziklag-ah David ni nih om hi;
a ni thum ni-in, en in, a puan kikeekin a lu tungah lei omin Saul’ giahphual panin mi khat hong pai hi. David kiangah amah hong tun’ ciangin lei lakah pukin zahtakna bawl hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Israel giahphual panin kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

David in ama kiangah, “Bang ci bang ahi hiam? Hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Galphual panin mite tai-a, mi tampi zong pukin si uh hi; Saul leh a tapa Jonathan zong si hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah a gen tangvalpa kiangah, “Saul leh a tapa Jonathan a sihna bangci theih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah a gen tangvalpa in, “Gilboa Mual ah ka om kha hi; tua lai mun-ah Saul a teipi tungah kingam hi; en in, leengte leh sakol tuangte in amah pha dek mahmah ta uh hi.
Amah in a nung lam a et ciangin kei hong mu-in hong sam hi. Keimah in ka dawng a, ‘Hih lai-ah om ing,’ ka ci hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Kua na hi hiam?’ hong ci hi. Keimah in amah ka dawng a, ‘Keimah in Amelek mi ka hi hi,’ ka ci hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Ka pangah ding in la, kei hong that in; bang hang hiam cih leh gimna ka thuak a, ahi zongin ka naang lai hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ama pangah dingin amah ka that hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a tuk khit ciangin nungta lo taktak ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi; tua ciangin a lu tungah a om kumpi lukhu leh a baan tungah a om a banbulh kong la a, tuate hih lai ka topa kiangah kong paipih hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama puante lenin balkeek hi; amah tawh a om mite khempeuh in tua mah bangin hih uh hi.
tua ahih ciangin Saul leh a tapa Jonathan, Topa’ mite leh Israel mite hangin amaute thumin kap uh a, nitak dong an tang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal sungah amaute si uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah a gen tangvalpa kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Keimah in Amalek mi peemta khat’ tapa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Topa’ sathau nilhpa susia dingin na khut na hihkhiat ding na lau loh a bangci ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in tangvalte khat samin, “Pai in, amah hihlum in,” a ci hi. Amah in amah sat a, amah si hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung ta hen; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma kam in nang lang khatah teci pangin, ‘Topa’ sathau nilhpa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul leh a tapa Jonathan’ hangin hih kahla tawh David kap a,
amah in Judah mite tungah hih kahla a kihilh nading thu pia hi; en un, hih in Jashar Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Amah in:
“Israel aw, na minthan’na, na mualsangte tungah kithat! A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk!
Gath khua sungah gen kei in, Ashkelon kongzing ah genthang kei in; Filistia numeite lungdam kha ding, dawibia numeite nuamin diang kha ding.
“No Gilboa mualte aw, Daitui ahi a, guah ahi zongin na tung uh ah omsak kei un, tui thukpi kilok zong omsak kei un! Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglianpa’ lum nin hi, Saul’ lum, sathau kinuh lo hi.
“A kithat mite’ sisan pan, A vanglianpa’ thal pan, Jonathan’ thal hong kileh kik lo a, Saul’ namsau hong guak kik lo hi.
“Saul leh Jonathan, ki-it a, it huai uh! A sih a hin’-in amaute kikhen lo uh; muvanlai sangin zaptelzaw uh, humpinelkal sangin thahatzaw uh hi.
“No Israel numeite aw, Saul’ hangin kap un, puansan neel takin a silhte aw, na puan tung uh ah kizepna kham a suangte aw,
“A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk, galphual sungah! “Jonathan aw, na mualsangte tungah nang hong kithat hi.
Nangma hangin ka lungkham hi, ka sanggam Jonathan; kei tungah nong nop mahmah hi; kei nong itna lamdang a, numei itna sangin lianzaw hi.
“A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk, galhiamte bangci-in sia!” a ci hi.

Hih hun khit ciangin David in Topa thu dong a, “Judah khuapi khat peuhpeuhah ka paito ding hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in ama kiangah, “Paito in,” a ci hi. David in, “Koi pen-ah paito ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hebron ah,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David tua lai-ah paito a, ama zi nihte, Jezre-el khuami Ahinoam leh Karmel khuami Nabal’ zi meigongnu Abigailte zong pai uh hi.
David in amah tawh a om a mite khempeuh, mi khempeuh a innkuanpih ciat tawh paipih to hi; Hebron khua-ah amaute teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite hong pai-in amaute in tua lai mun-ah Judah kumpi-in David sathau nilh uh hi. Amaute in David kiangah, “Saul a vuite in Jabeshgilead mite hi,” ci-in a gen uh ciangin
Jabeshgilead mite kiangah David in kamtaite sawlin amaute kiangah, “Note in na topa uh Saul tungah hih thumanna lakin amah vui na hih manun Topa in note thupha hong pia ta hen!
Tu-in Topa in itna kip leh thumanna note tungah hong lak ta hen! Note hih bangin gamta na hih manun note tungah thuhoih kong bawl ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note kithakhauhsakin hang un; bang hang hiam cih leh na topa uh Saul si a, Judah mite in amau’ tungah kumpi-in kei sathau hong nilh khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Ner’ tapa Abner, Saul’ galkap mangpa in Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth la-in Mahanaim ah paipih hi;
amah in Gilead, Ashur mite, Jezre-el, Efraim, Benjamin leh Israelte khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah bawl hi.
Israelte tungah uk dingin a kipatin Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth kum sawmli pha a, amah in kum nih sung uk hi. Ahih hangin Judah minamte in David nung zui uh hi.
Judah minamte tungah kumpi-in Hebron khua-ah David a om hun in kum sagih leh kha guk sung ahi hi.
Ner’ tapa Abner leh Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth’ nasemte Mahanaim panin Gibeon ah paikhia uh hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa Joab leh David’ nasemte paikhia-in Gibeon bual-ah amaute dawntuah uh hi; amaute bual lang khatah, adang khatte a bual lang khatah tu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in Joab kiangah, “Tangvalte ding sakin eite mai-ah kimawl sak ni,” a ci hi. Joab in, “Amaute dingsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ding-in galkah uh a, Benjamin leh Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth adingin sawm-le-nih, leh David nasemte sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a lang ciat uh lutang lenin, a namsau tawh a langpa’ pang dawt ciat uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute tukkhawm uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Gibeon ah a om tua mun pen Helkathhazzurim kici hi.
Tua ni-in gal kidona nasia mahmah hi; Abner leh Israel mite David nasemte mai-ah kizo hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa thumte, Joab, Abishai, leh Asahel, tua lai-ah om uh hi. Asahel pen Siria sakhi lee bangin a khe manlang hi.
Asahel in Abner delh a, amah a delh lai takin Abner a zuihna-ah tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin kihei lo hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in a nung enin, “Asahel aw, nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Keimah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Abner in ama kiangah, “Na tak lamah ahi a, na vei lamah ahi zongin kihei in la, tangvalte khatpeuh manin a nate sut in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah a zuihna panin Asahel pial lo hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Asahel kiangah, “Keimah zuihna panin pial in; bang hangin nang lei-ah hong vatgawp ding ka hi hiam?” Tua ciangin na sanggampa Joab mai-ah ka maitang bangci lak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci kik hi.

Ahih hangin amah in lam pial nuam lo hi; tua ahih ciangin Abner in a teipi tong lam-in a gil khawh a, a nungah a teipi leeng suak hi; tua ciangin amah tukin a omna-ah si hi. Asahel tuk-a a sihna mun-ah a pai mi khempeuh tang loin ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Joab leh Abishai in Abner delh ding kipan uh hi; ni a tum lai takin Gibeon gamlak paina lampi-a om Gi-ah mai-ah a kikhung Ammah mual tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner nungah Benjaminte kikaikhawm uh a, amaute pawl khat suakin mual dawn khatah pang uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Joab samin, “Mite hih bangin kithat that lai ding ahi hiam?” A tawpna-ah a haksat zawk nading thei lo na hi hiam? A sanggamte uh a delhna panin na mite a kihei nadingin na thu piak ding bang tan sawt ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in, “Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin, hong pau lo hi lecin, a sanggamte uh delhna panin zingsang mateng mite khawl lo taktak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab in peengkul tum hi; mi khempeuh khawl a, Israelte delh nawn loin, amaute in do nawn lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner leh a mite Arabah kantanin tua zan tawntung pai uh hi; amaute in Jordan kantan uh a, sun ma sung teng pai-in Mahanaim tung uh hi.
Abner a delhna panin Joab ciahkik hi; amah in mi khempeuh a kaikhop khit ciangin Asahel sim lohin David’ nasemte mi sawm-le-kua in kisam hi.
Ahih hangin David’ nasemte in Abner’ aa ahi Benjaminte mihing zathum leh sawmguk that uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Asahel la-in Bethlehem ah a om ama pa’ han-ah amah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin Joab leh a mite zan tawntung pai uh a, Hebron ah khua vak hi.
Saul’ innkuan leh David’ innkuante kikalah sau veipi gal kidona om hi; David thahat semsemin, Saul’ innkuan thanem semsem hi.
Hebron ah David’ tapate suak hi; a tacil in Jezre-el khuami Ahinoam tawh a neih Ammon ahi hi;
a ta nihna in Karmel khuami Nabal’ zi meigongnu Abigail tawh a neih Khileab ahi hi; a thumna in Geshur kumpipa Talmai’ tanu Ma-akah’ tapa Absalom ahi hi.
A lina in Haggith’ tapa Adonijah ahi hi; a ngana in Abital’ tapa Shefatiah ahi hi.
A gukna in David’ zi Eglah ta Ithream ahi hi. Hihte Hebron khua-ah David’ sungpan hong suak hi.
Saul’ innkuan leh David innkuante a kido sungin Saul’ innkuan sungah Abner amahmah kihatsak tawm hi.
Tu-in Saul in Ai-ah’ tanu Rizpah min nei zineu khat nei hi; Ishbosheth in Abner’ kiangah, “Bang hangin ka pa’ zineu luppih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ishbosheth’ thugennate hangin Abner heh mahmah a, “Keimah in Judah mite’ adingin ui bang lel ka hi hiam? Keimah in na pa Saul’ innkuante, a sanggam pasalte, leh a lawmte tungah tu ni dongin thumanna ka lak lai a, David’ khut sungah note kong pia nai kei hi; ahi zongin tu ni-in nang in numei khat tawh kisai-in mawhna nong pia hi.

9-10 Saul’ innkuan panin kumpigam khinin, Dan panin Be-ersheba dong Israel leh Judahte tungah David kumpi tokhom phuh ding Topa in ama tungah a ciamsa thu David’ adingin ka tun’ sak kei taak leh Pasian in keimah Abner hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Ishbosheth in kam khatin zong Abner dawng ngam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Abner kihta hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Hebron-a David kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Leitang in kua aa ahi hiam? kei tawh thuciamna hong bawl in, en in, Israelte khempeuh nang kiangah paipih dingin keimah kong pang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Pha hi; nang tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi; ahih hangin nang tung pan na khat ka kisam hi; tua in, kei tawh kimu dingin nong pai ciangin Saul’ tanu Mikhal nong paipih masak kei leh ka mai na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Filistiate vun dawn zakhat tawh ka leisa ka zi Mikhal hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ishbosheth in mi sawlin ama pasal, Laish tapa Paltiel kiang panin amah la hi.
Ahih hangin a pasal in amah zui-in, Bahurim paina lam tawntung ama nungah kap hi. Tua ciangin Abner in ama kiangah, “Pai in, ciahkik in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in Israel upate tawh thu kikumin, “A beisa tawlkhat sung teng note tungah kumpi dingin David na zong uh hi.

Tu-in taksuak sak un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in David tungah kamciamin, ‘Ka nasempa David’ khut tawh Filistiate’ khut sung pan leh amau’ galte khempeuh’ khut sung panin ka mi Israelte ka honkhia ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Abner in Benjamin mite tungah zong thu gen hi; tua ciangin Israelte leh Benjamin mi khempeuh in tua bangin hih ding hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsutna uh Hebron-a David kiangah a gen dingin Abner pai hi.
Hebron-a David kiangah mihing sawmnih tawh Abner a pai ciangin, Abner leh amah tawh a om mite’ adingin David in pawi khat kham hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in David kiangah, “Amaute in nang tawh thuciamna a bawl theih nading leh na deih bangin amaute khempeuh tungah na uk theih nadingin keimah dingin ka to kumpipa kiangah Israelte khempeuh ka kaikhawm ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in Abner sawlkhia hi; amah lung nuamin pai hi.

Tua khit phetin a galsimna panun David’ nasemte Joab tawh hong tung uh a, amaute in na tampi hong ciahpih uh hi. A hih hangin Hebron khua sung David kiangah Abner na om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh David in amah sawlkhia khin a, amah lung nuamin pai khin zo hi.
Joab leh amah tawh a om galkap khempeuh hong tun’ ciangin Joab kiangah, “Kumpipa kiangah Ner’ tapa Abner pai a, amah in amah paisak khinin, lungnuam takin amah paikhia khin hi,” ci-in gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Joab pai-in, “Bang hih na hi hiam? En in, nang kiangah Abner hong pai hi; nang in amah sawlkhia-in amah a paikhiat khitna bang hang ahi hiam?
Nang hong khem ding, leh na pusuahna leh na sungtumna a thei ding, leh na hih khempeuh a thei dingin Ner’ tapa Abner hong paina na thei hi,” a ci hi.
David’ omna panin Joab a paikhiat ciangin, amah in Abner’ nungah kamtaite sawl a, amaute in Sirah tuibeem panin amah hong paipih kik uh hi; ahih hangin David in tua thu thei lo hi.
Hebron-ah Abner hong kik ciangin, Joab in amah tawh a kituam hopih dingin kulh kongpi pam-ah paikhiatpih a, a sanggampa Asahel’ phu lakna-in amah in a gil sunin, tua ciangin si hi.
Tua khit, David in tua thu a zak ciangin, amah in, “Ner’ tapa Abner’ mawhna hangin Topa mai-ah keimah leh ka kumpigam in a tawntungin mawh baang lo hi.

Ama sisan Joab lutung leh ama innkuante khempeuh tungah tu ta hen; Joab’ innkuante nin paikhia a nei mi ahi a, a phak mi ahi a, ciangkhut tawi mi ahi a, namsau tawh a kithat mi ahi a, an nek ding a nei lo mi tawh ahi zongin kilawi ngei kei hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab leh a sanggampa Abishai in Abner that uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Gibeon-a gal kidona-ah a sanggampa uh Asahel thahsak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Joab leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh kiangah, “Na puan uh balkeekin puanham silh un la, Abner’ mai-ah kap un,” a ci hi. Kumpipa David in hankuang zui hi.
Amaute in Hebron ah Abner vui uh hi; tua ciangin Abner han-ah kumpipa a kap hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh zong a kap uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner hangin kumpipa in kah la-in, “Mihaipa a sih bangin Abner si ding ahi hiam?
Na khutte kihen lo hi, na khete kol kibulh lo hi; migilopa mai-ah mi khat a tuk bangin nang na tuk khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama hangin kap kik uh hi.

Tua ciangin ni a om lai-in an ne dingin David a zol dingin mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi; ahih hangin David kiciamin, “Ni a tum matengin an ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka ciap taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in tua thu thei uh a, tua in amaute lungdam sak hi; kumpipa sep khempeuh in mi khempeuh lungdam sak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ner’ tapa Abner thah ding kumpipa deihna ahih loh lam tua ni-in mi khempeuh leh Israelte khempeuh in thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Tu ni-in Israelte sungah ulian ahi milian khat a tukna theilo na hi uh hiam?
Sathau kinilh kumpipa hi napi-in tu ni-in ka thaneem hi; hih Zeruiah’ tapate kei adingin haksa lua hi. Gamtat siapa a gitlohna bangin Topa in thuk ta hen!” a ci hi.
Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth in Abner Hebron ah a sihna thu a zak ciangin a tha kiam a, Israelte khempeuh lungkia hi.

Saul’ tapa in galsim pawlte a makai mi nih nei hi; khat pa’ min in Baanah hi-in, adang khat pa’ min in Rekhab hi a, Be-eroth khua pan Benjamin mi Rimmon’ tapate ahi uh hi (bang hang hiam cih leh Be-eroth zong Benjamin’ aa-in kisim hi;
Be-eroth mite Gittaim-ah tai uh a, tu ni dongin tua lai-ah peemta-in om uh hi).

Saul’ tapa Jonathan in a khete a bai tapa khat nei hi. Jezre-el panin Saul leh Jonathan’ thu hong tun’in amah kum nga pha hi; amah a cingnu in amah la-in taipih hi; tua nu a nawh taina lamin naupang kia-in a bai suak hi. Ama min in Mefibosheth ahi hi.
Tu-in Be-eroth mi Rimmon’ tapate Rekhab leh Baanah dingkhia uh a, sun nisat hun pawlin Ishbosheth’ inn-ah a sun tawlngak lai takin hong tung uh hi.
En in, inn kongcingnu mangbuh a su khin hi a, a lusuk suakin ihmu hi; tua ahih ciangin Rekhab leh a sanggampa Baanah sim lut uh hi.

Amaute inn sungah a tun’ uh ciangin a lupna dei sung a lupna tungah amah lumin a om lai takin amaute in amah satin that uh a, a lu tan uh hi. Amaute in ama lu la-in Arabah lam tawnin zan tawntung pai uh a,

Ishbosheth’ lutang Hebron-a David kiang tun’pih uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah, thah dingin nang a hong zong, na gal Saul tapa Ishbosheth’ lutang om hi; Topa in tu ni-in Saul leh a suan-le-khak tungah ka to kumpipa adingin hong thuksak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin David in Be-eroth mi Rommon’ tapate Rekhab leh a sanggampa Baanah dawngin, “Haksatna khempeuh panin ka nuntakna hong tankhia Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin,
mi khat in kei kiangah, ‘En in, Saul si hi,’ ci-in hong gen ciangin, amah thuhoih puakin kingaihsun a, ama thupuak thaman ka piakna-in amah manin Ziklag-ah ka that hi.
Migilote in a thuman mi khat ama inn sung a lupna tungah a thah ciangin note’ tungah ama phu hong la-in, leitung panin note hong susia zawkan ding hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in a tangvalte thu pia a, tangvalte in amaute thatin a khutte leh a khete sattan uh a, Hebron-a bual gei-ah amaute khai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Ishbosheth’ lutang la-in Hebron-a Abner’ han-ah vui uh hi.
Tu ciangin Israel minamte khempeuh Hebron-a David kiangah hong pai-in, “En in, kote in nangma guh leh nangma sa ka hi uh hi.

A beisa hunte ah, Saul in kote tungah kumpi ahih lai takin Israelte paikhiatpih in, a tumpihpa in nangmah na hi hi; Topa in nangma kiangah, ‘Nang in keima mi Israelte a cingpa hi-in, Israelte tungah ulian na hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi.” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh Hebron-a kumpipa kiangah hong pai uh hi; Kumpipa David in amaute tawh Topa mai Hebron ah thuciamna khat bawl a, amaute in Israelte tungah kumpi-in David sathau nilh uh hi.
Gam uk dingin a kipatin David kum sawmthum pha a, amah in kum sawmli sung uk hi.
Heron panin kum sagih leh kha guk sung Judah uk hi; Jerusalem panin kum sawmthum-le-thum sung Israelte khempeuh leh Judah uk hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa leh a mite tua gam-a teeng Jebus mite do dingin Jerusalem ah pai uh a, amaute in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai zo kei ding hi; mittawte leh khebaite nangawn in nang hong nang zo ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi- “Hih lai-ah David hong pai zo peuhmah lo ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi zongin David in David’ khuapi ahi Zion mun muanhuai la hi.

Tua ciangin David in tua ni-in, “Jebus mite a vatgawp ding peuhmah, David in a muhdah zahin a muhdah mi peuhmah in khebaite leh mittawte a sim dingin tuizawl-ah pai ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Mittawte leh khebaite Topa’ inn sungah lut lo ding hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin mun muanhuai sungah David teengin David khuapi ci-in phuak hi. Tua ciangin David in Millo panin biakinn lam-ah khuapi lam hi.
David lian semsem hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian Pasian, Topa in amah ompih hi.
Tua ciangin Tai-ar kumpipa Hiram in kamtaite leh taamtak singte, leh David adingin inn khat a lamsak khutsiamte leh lei-le-suang innlam siamte zong puak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Israelte tungah kumpi-in Topa in amah a kipsak khitna leh Israel mite’ hangin ama kumpigam a liatsakna kiphawktel hi.
Hebron panin hong tun’ khit ciangin David in Jerusalem ah zineute leh zite la thuah lai hi; David’ tanute leh tapate piang thuah lai hi.
Jerusalem ah ama sung panin a suakte’ min in: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada, leh Elifelet ahi hi.

Israelte tungah kumpi-in David sathau a kinilh khitna thu Filistiate in a zak uh ciangin David a man dingin Filistiate khempeuh kuanto uh hi; ahih hangin David in tua thu za-in mun muanhuai ah paisuk hi.
Tu-in Filistiate hong pai-in Refaim kuam sung dim khin uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Topa thu dongin, “Filistiate do-in ka kuanto ding hiam? Keima khut sungah amaute na hong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in David kiangah, “Kuanto in, bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah Filistiate kong pia taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Baalperazim-ah David hong pai-in David in tua lai-ah amaute zo hi; tua ciangin amah in, “Tuikhang in a phulkhap bangin Topa in ka mai-ah ka galte phukham hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua munin Baalperazim ci-in kiphuak hi.
Filistiate in tua lai-ah a milimte uh nusia uh a, David leh a mite in tuate puakhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate hong kuanto kik lai-in Refaim kuam sung dim khin uh hi.
David in Topa thu a dot ciangin, amah in, “Na kuanto kei ding hi; amaute’ nung lamah kual pai in la, lungli kungte gal panin amaute hih in.
Lungli kungte’ khungah lam paina kheging na zak ciangin na tha saan in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia galkapte a vatgawp dingin na mai-ah Topa pai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Topa’ thupiak bangin hih a, Geba panin Gezer ciang dong Filistiate vatgawp hi.
David in Israelte a kiteelkhia mi khempeuh, mi tul sawmthum, khawm kik hi.
Tua ciangin David ding-in kherubte tungah a tu, Vanglianpen Topa’ min tawh a kisam Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang tua mun panin a paipih to dingin amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tawh Baale-judah ah pai hi.

Amaute’ in leeng thak khat tungah Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang pua uh a, mual tunga om Abinadab’ inn panin paikhiatpih uh hi; Abinadab’ tapate Uzzah leh Ahio in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang tawh leeng thak hawl uh hi; thuciamna singkuang mai-ah Ahio pai hi.

Tua ciangin David leh Israel mite khempeuh in Topa mai-ah a tha neih zah-un la sa-in, laiza khausai lasaknate, harp khausai lasaknate, khuangneute, kuangtuahte leh daltuahte tumin lungdamin laam uh hi.
Amaute in Nakon’ ancilna mun a tun’ uh ciangin Uzzah in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang lamah a khut zanin len kha hi; bang hang hiam cih leh bawngtalte muktu hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ hehna Uzzah tungah hong so hi; amah in thuciamna singkuang lamah a khut zan ahih manin Pasian in tua lai-ah amah vatlum hi; Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang gei-ah amah si hi.
Topa in Uzzah dan pia ahih manin David heh hi; tu ni dongin tua mun Perez-uzzah kici hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in David in Topa kihta hi; amah in, “Topa’ thuciamna singkuang bangci-in ka kiangah hong tung thei ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang David khuapi sungah a paipih ding David ut lo hi; David in Gath khuami Obededom’ inn-ah paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang Gath khuami Obededom’ inn sungah kha thum sung om hi; Topa in Obededom leh a innkuan khempeuh thupha pia hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David kiangah, “Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang hangin Topa in Obededom’ innkuan leh ama neih khempeuh thupha pia hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin David pai-in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang Obededom’ inn panin David khuapi-ah lungdamna tawh paipih to hi;
Topa thuciamna singkuang a puate kal guk a suan khit ciangin amah in bawngtal khat leh bawngno thau khat biakna-in pia hi.
Tua ciangin a tha neih khempeuh tawh Topa mai-ah David laam hi; David in saihadial siampi puan khat silh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David leh Israel mi khempeuh in otna leh saki tumna awging tawh Topa’ thuciamna singkuang paipih to uh hi.
Topa’ thuciamna singkuang David khuapi sung hong tun’ lai takin kongvangneu panin Saul’ tanu Mikhal khuadak a, Topa mai-ah Kumpi David diangin a laam mu hi; tua nu in a lungsim-ah amah simmawh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang hong tumpih uh a, David in ama adingin a lamsak puakbuk sung ama mun dingah koih uh hi; tua ciangin David in Topa’ mai-ah meihal biaknate leh thunuam-a biaknate pia hi.
David in meihal biaknate leh thunuam-a biaknate a piak khit ciangin amah in Vanglianpen Topa’ min tawh mite thupha pia a,
Israel mihon buppi, mi khempeuh, numeite leh pasalte tungah anlum pheng khat, sa baak khat, leh leenggahkeu pheeng khat pia ciat hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh a inn ciat uh ah ciah uh hi.

Tua ciangin a innkuan thupha pia dingin David ciah hi. Ahih hangin David dawn dingin Saul’ tanu Mikhal hong paikhia a, “Tu ni-in Israel kumpipa, mi mawkmawkte khat maizum lo a, a guak om bangin, a nasemte, numeite’ muhna-ah a guak tangin omin, amahmah bangci kipahtawi ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Mikhal kiangah, “Topa’ mi Israelte tungah ulian dingin a hong koih dingin na pa leh a innkuan khempeuhte tungah kei a hong teel Topa mai ahi hi – keimah in Topa mai-ah lungdamna ka bawl ding hi.
Hih sangin a simmawhhuai zaw-in ka kibawl lai ding a, nangma mit-ah a gina lo ka hi ding hi; ahih hangin nangma gen numeite in keimah hong pahtawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi,
Tua ciangin Saul’ tanu Mikhal in a sih ni dongin ta nei lo hi.
Tu-in kumpipa ama inn sungah teengin Topa in a kim-a ama galte khempeuh panin tawlngakna a piak khit ciangin,
kumpipa in kamsang Nathan kiangah, “Tu-in thei in, keimah in taamtaak inn hoih sungah ka om a, ahih hangin Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang puanbuk sungah om lai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in kumpipa kiangah, “Pai in, na lungsim-a om khempeuh hih in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nang tawh om hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan kiangah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Pai in la, ka nasempa David kiangah gen in, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ten’ nading inn khat hong lamsak ding na hi hiam?
Israel mite Izipt panin ka paikhiatpih toh ni-a kipan tu ni dongin inn sungah ka om nai kei a, puanbuk sungah omin ka pai kawikawi hi.

Israel mite khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuh, ka mi Israelte a cing dingin ka thupiak thukhente khat peuhpeuh tungah, “Bang hangin taamtaak inn hoih hong lamsak lo na hi hiam?” cihna tawh kam khat beek gen ka hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka nasempa David kiangah hih bangin na gen ding hi, ‘Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ka mi Israelte tungah ulian dingin lonona mun, tuute na zuihna panin nang kong la hi;
na paina peuhpeuhah nang tawh kong om a, na mai panin na galte khempeuh ka khaktan hi; leitung miliante’ min khat mah bangin nang adingin min lian khat kong bawlsak ding hi.
Keimah in ka mi Israelte adingin mun khat ka seh ding a, amaute in amau’ mun-ah teengin a kinawngkaisak nawn loh nadingin amaute ka phut ding hi; nidang bangin mi ngongtatte in,

ka mi Israelte tungah thukhente ka koih khit zawh, amaute gimsak nawn lo ding hi; na galte khempeuh panin nang tungah tawlngakna kong pia ding hi. Tua tham loin Topa in nang adingin innkuan khat hong bawlsak ding nang tungah Topa in gen hi.
Na ni cingin na pate tawh na lup ciangin, nangma sung panin hong suak khia ding na tapa nangma nungah ka khangsak ding a, keimah in ama kumpigam ka kipsak ding hi.
Amah in keima min dingin inn khat lam ding a, keimah in ama kumpigam tokhom a tawntungin ka kipsak ding hi.
Keimah in ama pa ka hi ding a, amah in keima tapa hi ding hi. Amah in mawhna a bawl ciangin, keimah in mite’ ciangduai tawh, mi’ tapate satna tawh amah ka thuhilh ding hi;
ahih hangin nangma ma-a ka hep khiat Saul tung panin ka lak bangin ama tung panin ka itna kip ka la khia kei ding hi.
Na inn leh na kumpigam keima mai-ah a kip tawntungin kibawl ding hi; na kumpi tokhom kip tawntung ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute khempeuh tawh a kizui, leh hih mangmuhna khempeuh tawh a kizui-in Nathan in David kiangah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David tumin Topa mai-ah tu a, “Topa Pasian aw, tu ciang dong hih bangin kei nong kep nadingin keimah in kua hi a, ka innkuan in bang hi lel ahi hiam?

Hih in nangma mit-ah na neuno khat hi lai hi, Topa Pasian aw; a hong tung ding sau veipi sung na nasempa’ innsung thu ding zong na gen khin a, mai lam khangte zong kei nong lak khin hi, O Topa Pasian!
David in nang tungah bang hong gen thuah nawn ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in na nasempa na thei hi, O Topa Pasian!
Nangma thuciamna hang leh na lungsim tawh kizui-in na nasempa na theihsak nadingin hih liatna khempeuh na piangsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nang na lian takpi hi, Topa Pasian aw; ka bil-un ka zakna uh tawh kizui-in nang tawh a kibang kuamah om lo a, nang sim loh Pasian dang om lo hi.

Ama mite’ mai-ah minam khat leh a pasiante hawlkhiatna tawh ama adingin min bawlin, amaute’ adingin alian a lauhuai nate hih sakin, ama mi dingin a tankhia dingin Pasian a paina na mi Israelte, leitung minam dang kua tawh kibang ahi hiam?
Nangmah in nangma mi ahi tawntung dingin na mi Israelte nangma adingin na kipsak hi; Topa aw, nangmah in amaute’ Pasian na suak hi.
Topa Pasian aw, tu-in na nasempa leh ama innkuan tawh kizomin na gensa thu a tawntung dingin kipsak in la, nangma gensa bangin hih in;
tua ciangin, ‘Mi honte’ Topa in Israelte tungah Pasian hi,’ ci-in nangma min kiliansak tawntung ding a, nangma mai-ah na nasempa David’ innkuan kikipsak ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte’ Pasian, mi honte’ Topa nangmah in, ‘Nangma ading innkuan khat kong bawlsak ding hi,’ ci-in na nasempa tungah pulakna na bawl khin hi; tua ahih ciangin na nasempa in nang tungah hih thungetna hong ngen ngam hi.
Tu-in Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in Pasian na hi a, na thute a muanhuai manin, na nasempa tungah hih nahoih na ciam khin hi;

tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangma mai-ah a om tawntung suak theih nadingin na nasempa’ innkuan thupha piak ding hong lungkim in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in na gen khin a, nangma thupha tawh na nasempa’ innkuan thupha kipia tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu teng khit ciangin David in Filistiate zo-in amaute nuaisiah a, David in Fislistiate’ khut sung panin Methegammah khua la hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Moab mite zo a, amaute khauzang khat tawh tehin, lei lakah amaute lumsak hi; amah in thah dingin gual nih leh khah dingin gual khat dim teh hi. Tua ciangin Moab mite in David’ nasemte suakin siah puak uh hi.
Zobah kumpipa Rehob’ tapa Hadadezer in Eufrates gun kiim gamte ngah kik nuamin hong kuan ahih manin David in amah do-in zo hi.
David in ama tung panin sakol galkap tulkhat leh zasagih, leh khe galkap tul sawmnih la hi; David in leengkai sakol khempeuh a zagui atsat a, ahih hangin leeng zakhat ading a kicingin siit hi.
Damaska gam-a Siria mite Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer a huh dingin hong kuan ciangin David in Siria mite tulsawmnih leh tulnih that hi.
Tua ciangin David in Damaskas gam Aram ah khuacingte koih hi; Siria mite David’ nasem suak uh a, siah puak uh hi. Topa in David a paina peuhpeuh ah gualzawhna pia hi.
Tua ciangin David in Hadadezer’ nasemte in a puak uh kham kibawl lumte la-in Jerusalem ah paipih hi.
Hadadezer’ khuapite Betah leh Berothai panin Kumpi David in sumngo tampi tak la hi.
Hamath kumpipa To-i in Hadadezer’ galkap buppi David in a zawhna thu a zak ciangin,

Amah in Hadadezer do-in a zawhna hangin amah va hopihin a lungdampih dingin To-i in Kumpi David kiangah a tapa Joram sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hadadezer in To-i tawh gal-in kido ngei zel hi. Joram in ngun, kham, leh sumngo tawh a kibawl nate keng hi;

11-12 Kumpi David in hihte zong, a nuaisiah minamte khempeuh Edom, Moab, Ammon mite, Filistiate, Amalek, leh Zobah kumpipa Rehob’ tapa Hadadezer’ van nusiatte sung panin a ap ngun leh kham tawh Topa tungah ap khawm hi.
David in minthan’na ngah hi. A ciah ciangin amah in Ci Kuam-ah Edom mite tulsawm leh tulgiat that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Edom ah khuacingte koih hi; Edom gamsung khempeuh ah amah in khuacingte koih a, Edom mi khempeuh David’ nasemte suak uh hi. Topa in David a paina peuhpeuh ah gualzawhna pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israelte khempeuh uk hi; David in a mite khempeuh tungah thutang leh thuman zang hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in galkapte uk hi; Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat in thuciamtehpa hi;
Ahitub’ tapa Zadok leh Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek in siampi ahi uh hi; Seraiah in lai-atpa ahi hi;
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in Khereth mite leh Peleth mite uk hi; David tapate in gam uk uliante ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Jonathan hangin ama tungah migitna ka lah theih nading Saul’ innkuan sungah mi khatpeuh a om lai hiam?” a ci hi.

Tu-in Saul innkuan sungah Ziba min nei nasempa khat om a, amaute in David kiangah amah sam uh hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Ziba na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Na nasempa keimah in Ziba ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Pasian’ migitna ama tungah ka lah theih nading Saul innkuan ah mi khat beek om lai lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Jonathan tapa khat om lai hi; amah a khete bai hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Amah koi-ah om hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Lodebar-a Ammiel’ tapa Makhir’ inn-ah amah om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in sawlin Lodebar-a Ammiel’ tapa Makhir’ inn panin amah la sak hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan, a ta Mefibosheth David kiangah hong pai a, mai pukin zahtakna bawl hi. Tua ciangin David in, “Mefibosheth!” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “En in, na nasempa,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na pa Jonathan’ hangin nangma tungah migitna kong lak ding a, na pu Saul’ leitang khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia kik ding hi; tua ciangin nangmah in ka sabuai-ah an na ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in zahtakna bawlin, “A sisa ui bang kei lel, nong hici bawl nadingin na nasempa in bang ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Saul’ nasempa Ziba samin ama kiangah, “Saul leh a innkuan tawh a kizom khempeuh na topa’ tupa’ tungah ka pia khin hi.

Nang leh na tapate leh na nasemte in ama adingin lo na kho ding uh a, na topa’ tupa in an nek ding a neih theih nadingin a piangte a tun’pih ding uh hi; ahih hangin na topa’ tupa Mefibosheth in keima sabuai-ah ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. Tu-in Ziba in tapa sawm-le-nga nasem sawmnih nei hi.

Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in a thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in na nasempa in hih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khat bangin Mefibosheth in David’ sabuai-ah an ne hi.
Mefibosheth in Mika min nei tapa tangval khat nei hi. Ziba’ inn-ah a teeng khempeuh Mefibosheth’ nasemte suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mefibosheth Jerusalem ah teeng hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kumpipa’ sabuai-ah an ne tawntung hi. Tu-in amah a khe a langnih-in a bai hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Ammon mite’ kumpipa si a, a tapa Hanun in ama tangin uk hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Keima tungah a pa thuman takin hong gamtat bangin Nahash’ tapa Hanun’ tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa’ hangin amah a hehnem dingin a nasemte sawl hi. David nasemte Ammon mite’ gamah va tung uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mite’ uliante in a topa uh Hanun kiangah “David in nangma kiangah hehnemte hong sawl manin na pa a pahtawi hi, ci-in ngaihsun na hi hiam? David in a nasemte khuapi sung a en ding, thu kansim ding, leh a lawnthal dingin hong sawl hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hanun in David’ nasemte manin a khamul uh a lang ciat kiat khiatsak a, a puan uh a laizang, a kawng ciangah at khiatsakin amaute sawlkhia hi.

David kiangah tua thu a kigen ciangin amaute dawn dingin amah in mi sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a mite nakpi takin maizum uh hi. Kumpipa in, “Na khamul uh a khan’ mateng Jerikho ah om un la, tua ciangin hong ciah un,” a ci hi.

Ammon mite in amaute David’ huat mi a suah khitna uh a muh uh ciangin Ammon mite in mi sawlin Bethrehob-a Siria mite, leh Zobah-a Siria mite, khe galkap tul sawmnih, leh Ma-akah kumpipa, mi tulkhat tawh, Tob mite mi tulsawm leh tulnih cial uh hi.
David in hih thu a zak ciangin amah in Joab leh a thahat mihon khempeuh sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite hong kuankhia-in kulh kongpi lutna-ah gal sim dingin pang uh hi; Zobah leh Rehob-a Siria mite, Top mite, leh Ma-akahte, gamlakah amau pawl ciatin om uh hi.
Joab in a mai leh a nungah amah do dingin gal in a pan’na a muh ciangin, amah in Israelte a kitengkhia mi pawlkhat teel a, Siria mite do dingin pang sak hi;
ama mi a om lai teng a sanggampa Abishai’ ukna sungah koih a, Ammon mite’ lang khatah amaute pangsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Siria mite kei adingin a hat luat leh kei nong huh ding hi; ahih hangin Ammon mite nang adingin a hat luat leh kei hong pai-in nang kong huh ding hi.
Kihangsak in, i mite ading leh i Pasian’ khuapite adingin kipasalsak ni; Topa in hoih a sak bangin hong hih ta hen” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab leh amah tawh a om mite in Siria mite a do dingin naih uh hi; tua ciangin ama mai-ah amaute tai uh hi.
Ammon mite in Siria mite a tai a muh ciangin amaute zong Abishai mai-ah tai-in khuapi sungah lut uh hi. Tua ciangin Ammon mite a dona panin Joab ciah-in Jerusalem ah tung hi.
Israelte in amaute a zawhna thu Siria mite in a muh uh ciangin amau mahmah kikaikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hadadezer in mi sawlin Eufrates galkhat-a Siria mite paikhiatpih hi; Hadadezer’ galkap mangpa Shobak makai-in amaute Helam-ah tung uh hi.
Hih thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in Israelte khempeuh kaikhawm a, Jordan kantanin Helam tung hi. David do dingin Siria mite na pangin amah tawh kido uh hi.
Israelte mai-ah Siria mite tai uh hi; David in leeng za sagih a hawl, Siria mite’ leh sakol tuang mi tulsawmli thatin, amau’ galkap mangpa Shobak liamsakin, tua lai-ah amah si hi.

Hadadezer’ nasem ahi kumpite khempeuh in Israelte in amaute a zawhna thu a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Israelte tawh kilemna bawl uh a, amaute’ khutnuai mi suak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Ammon mite a huh lai ding uh Siria mite lau ta uh hi.

Galdo dingin kumpite a kuankhiat hun tua kum phalbi sungin David in Joab, leh amah tawh a om a nasemte, leh Israelte khempeuh sawl hi; amaute in Ammon mite sugawpin Rabbah umcih uh hi. Ahih hangin David Jerusalem ah om hi.
Khatvei nitak lamin a lupna panin David tho-in kumpi innkhumzangah a pai leh innkhumzang panin amah in numei khat a kisil galmuh kha hi a numei mel hoih mahmah hi.
David in mi sawlin numei’ thu kan sak hi. Mi khat in, “Hih in Hit mi Uriah’ zi, Eliam’ tanu Bathsheba hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in kamtaite sawlin tua nu la hi; tua nu ama kiangah hong pai a, amah in tua nu tawh lum hi. (Tua nu in a nitna panin kisian’suah hi.) Tua ciangin ama inn-ah ciah hi.
Tua ciangin numei gai hi; amah in mi sawlin David kiangah, “Nau ka paai hi,” ci-in gen hi.
Tua ciangin David in Joab kiangah thu puak a, “Hit mi Uriah ka kiangah hong sawl in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joab in David kiangah Uriah sawl hi.
Ama kiangah Uriah a tun’ ciangin David in Joab bangci om a, mite bangci uh a, gal dona bangci mavan’ hiam cih dong hi.
Tua ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciahsuk in la, na khete sil in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn panin Uriah paikhia a, kumpipa’ kiang panin letsong khat in amah zui hi.
Ahih hangin Uriah a topa’ nasemte khempeuh tawh kumpipa’ inn kongkhak gei-ah lum a, ama inn-ah ciah suk lo hi.
“Uriah a inn-ah ciah suk lo hi,” ci-in amaute in David kiangah a gen uh ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Khualzin-a hong tung hilo na hi hiam? Bang hangin na inn-ah ciahsuk lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Uriah in David kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang leh Israel leh Judah buk sungah om uh hi; ka topa Joab leh ka topa’ nasemte gam lakah giak uh hi; keimah in an ne tui dawn ding leh ka zi tawh a lum dingin ka inn-ah ciahsuk ding ka hi hiam? Nangmah hingin, na nuntakna a hin’ mah bangin, hih bang ka gamta kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Hih lai-ah tu ni zong om in la, zing ciangin nang kong paikhia sak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Uriah tua ni leh a zing ciang Jerusalem ah om hi.

David in amah samin, amah in ama omna-ah an leh zu ne a, tua ahih manin amah zukhamsak hi; a nitak ciangin a lupna tungah a lum dingin a topa’ nasemte tawh paikhia a, ahih hangin ama inn-ah ciahsuk tuan lo hi.
Zingsang ciangin David in Joab kiangah lai khat gelh a, Uriah khut tungah a lai khak hi.
A lai sungah, “Galdo a haksatna pen madawkah Uriah koih in la, amah ki-vat tukin a sih theih nadingin ama kiang panin nungkik un,” ci-in gelh hi.
Joab in khuapi a umcih ciangin mi a hangte om hi ci-in a theihna munah Uriah seh hi.
Khuapi mite hong kuan khia-in Joab tawh kido uh hi; mite lakah David’ nasemte pawlkhat puk hi. Hit mi Uriah zong kithat hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in mi sawlin gal kidona thu khempeuh David kiangah gen hi;
amah in kamtaipa thuhilhin, “Gal kidona thu khempeuh kumpipa kiangah na gen khit ciangin,
kumpipa a heh suakin amah in nangma kiangah, ‘A sim dingin khuapi-ah tua zahin a nai-in pai na hi uh hiam? Kulh tung panin hong kap ding uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Jerubbesheth’ tapa Abimelek kua in that hiam? Numei khat in angawina suangpeek tungnung kulh tung pan ama tungah khiat sukin Thebez-ah amah si hilo ahi hiam? Bang hangin tua zahin kulh nai-ah pai na hi hiam?’ hong cih leh, nangmah in, ‘Hit mi na nasempa Uriah zong si hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kamtaipa pai a, hong tungin a gen dinga Joab in a sawl thu khempeuh David kiangah gen hi.
Kamtaipa in David kiangah, “Mite in kote hong zo thawhin gam lakah kote do dingin hong kuankhia uh hi; ahih hangin kote in kulh kongpi lutna dongah amaute ka not kik uh hi.
Tua ciangin thal tawite in kulh tung panin na nasemte kap uh hi; kumpipa’ nasem pawlkhat si hi; Hit mi na nasempa Uriah zong si hi,” a ci hi.

David in kamtaipa kiangah, “Joab kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Hih thu hangin nangmah kilungkhamsak kei in, bang hang hiam cih leh namsau in koi lai panin hong vat ding cih a kimatheih lo mah ahi hi; khuapi na simna khauhsak in la, lawnthal in,” na ci ding hi. Amah hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
Uriah’ zi in a pasal Uriah a sihna thu a zak ciangin a pasal hangin kap hi.
A kahna a ven’ ciangin David in mi sawlin ama inn-ah tua nu la sak a, tua nu in ama zi suak in, amah tawh tapa khat nei hi. Ahih hangin David gamtatna tua thu in Topa lungkim lo sak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in David kiangah kamsang Nathan sawl hi. Amah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Khuapi khat sungah mi nih om a, khat hau-in a khat zawng hi.
A haupa in tuuhon leh bawnghon tampi nei hi;

ahih hangin a zawngpa in bangmah nei lo a, a leisa tuuno a nu khat nei hi. Amah in tua tuuno khoi a, amah leh a tate tawh khang khawm hi; ama an ne-in a hai panin dawn a, ama ang sungah lum hi, ama adingin tanu tawh kibang hi.

Tu-in mi haupa’ inn-ah zin khat hong tung a, amah in a tuuhon ahi a, a bawnghon pan ahi zongin ama kiangah a tung khualzinpa’ adingin a gawh ding la nuam loin mi zawngpa’ tuuno laksak a, ama kianga a tung mipa adingin gawhsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua mipa tungah David’ hehna nakpi takin so hi; amah in Nathan kiangah, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin hih banga a gamta mipa a sih ding kilawm hi;
amah hih bangin gamta a, amah in hehpihna nei lo ahih manin a tuuno a zah li-in loh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Nathan in David kiangah, “Nangmah in tua mipa na hi hi! Israelte Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Israelte tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilhin Saul’ khut sung panin nang kong honkhia hi;
keimah in na topa’ inn leh na topa’ zite na ang sungah kong pia a, Israel leh Judah mite nang kong pia hi; hihte tawmlua ahih leh tua zah mah kong piak beh ding hi.
Ama muhna-ah a sia gamta dingin bang hangin Topa’ thu simmawh na hi hiam? Nangmah in Hit mi Uriah namsau tawh vatin, ama’ zi nangma zi dingin na la a, Ammon mite namsau tawh amah na that khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangmah in kei hong simmawhin Hit mi Uriah’ zi nangma zi dingin la khin na hih manin na inn sungah namsau tawh kidona veng ngei lo ding hi,’ ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, keimah in nangma inn sung panin nangmah langah siatna ka khangsak ding hi, na zite na muh-in la-in na vengpa tungah ka pia ding a, amah in sun nitaang sungah na zite luppih ding hi
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in a simthamin na hih hi; ahih hangin keimah in Israelte khempeuh muh dingin suntangpi-in ka hih ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
David in Nathan kiangah, “Topa tungah ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “Topa in zong na khialhna koihkhia zo hi; nang na si kei ding hi.
Ahi zongin, hih bang gamtatna tawh Topa thusim peuhmah lo na hih manin nang sungpan hong piang naungek si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan a inn-ah ciah hi. Tua ciangin Uriah’ zi in David tawh a neih naungek Topa in vat a, a ci hong na hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in naungek adingin Pasian tungah thum hi; David in an tangin pai-in zan tawntung lei lakah lum hi.
Tua ciangin lei lak panin a phong dingin a inn sung upate ama kiangah ding uh hi; ahih hangin amah tho lo a, amaute tawh an zong ne lo hi.

A ni sagih ni-in naungek si hi. Ama kiangah, naungek si hi, ci-in a gen ding uh David’ nasemte lau uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘En un, naungek a hin’ lai-in amah i hopih a, amah in i thu hong ngai lo hi; tua ahih ciangin bangci-in ama kiangah naungek si, ci ngam ding i hi hiam? Amahmah kisusia kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin ama nasemte a kihuauna uh David in a muh ciangin naungek si hi, ci-in David in thei hi; tua ciangin David in a nasemte kiangah, “Naungek si ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amah si hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin David lei lak panin tho-in kisil a, sathau nilhin a puante khek hi; tua ciangin Topa’ inn-ah pai-in bia hi; tua ciangin ama inn-ah pai hi; an a nget ciangin amaute in a mai-ah lui uh a, amah in ne hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih banga na gamtatna a bangci ahi hiam? Naungek a hin’ lai-in an tangin na kap hi; ahih hangin naungek a sih ciangin tho-in an na ne hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Naungek a hin’ lai-in an tangin ka kap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, “Naungek a hin’ nadingin Topa in kei hong hehpih ding hiam hong hehpih lo ding hiam cih kua in thei ahi hiam?” ka ci hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in amah si hi; bang hangin an tang ding ka hi hiam? Amah la kik thei ding ka hi hiam? Ama kiangah kei ka pai ding a, ahih hangin kei kiangah amah hong kik lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in a zi Bathsheba hehnem a, ama kiangah pai-in amah tawh lum khawm hi; tua nu in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Solomon phuak hi. Topa in tua naupang it ahih manin,
kamsangpa Nathan tung tawnin thu puak hi; Topa’ itna hangin ama min Jedidiah a phuah ding gensak hi.
Tu-in Joab in Ammon khuapi Rabbah simin a khuapi tuikhuk la hi.
Joab in David kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Rabbah khuapi ka sim a, a khuapi tuikhuk ka la khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mi a om lai teng kaikhawm in la, khuapi langah phual satin khuapi la in; tua hi kei leh keimah in khuapi la-in keima min pua kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in mi khempeuh kaikhawmin Rabbah-ah pai a, tua khuapi do-in la hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amau’ kumpipa’ kumpilukhu a lu tung panin la hi; kumpilukhu a gihna in kham talen khat hi a, a sungah suangmanpha khat om hi; tua lukhu David’ lu tungah kikoih hi. Tua ciangin amah in khuapi sunga van kinusiate, tampi tak paikhiatpih hi.

Amah in a sunga om mite paikhiatpihin sing-atnate leh tuzumte leh heite tawh na a sem dingin koih a, leisek sekna-ah amaute nasem sak hi; tua bangin Ammon mite’ khuapi khempeuh ah hih hi. Tua ciangin David leh mi khempeuh Jerusalem ah ciah uh hi.
Tu-in David’ tapa Absalom in Tamar min nei sanggam numei mel hoih khat nei hi; tawlkhat khit ciangin David’ tapa Amnon in tua nu ngai hi.
Amnon gim mahmah ahih manin a sanggamnu Tamar’ hangin amahmah kicinasak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah nungak hi a, Ammon in tuanu ahih theih nading om theih tuak lo hi.
Ahih hangin Amnon in David’ sanggampa Shimeah’ tapa Jonadab min nei lawmpa khat nei hi; Jonadab in mi tei mahmah khat ahi hi:

Amah in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa’ tapa aw, bang hangin zingsang khat khit zingsang khat thakiam semsem na hi hiam? Kei kiangah hong gen lo ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amnon in ama kiangah, “Ka sanggampa Absalom’ sanggamnu Tamar ka ngai hi,” a ci hi.

Jonadab in ama kiangah, “Na lupna tungah lum in la, a cina kineih in; nangmah en dingin na pa hong pai ciangin ama kiangah, “Keimah in mu-in ama khut panin an ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisak in, an nek ding hong pia sak in la, ka muhna ah an hong bawlsak in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Amnon lumin a cina kineih hi; amah en dingin kumpipa a pai ciangin Amnon in kumpipa kiangah, “Ama khut panin ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong pai sakin mohpheng nih khawng na bawlsak nading kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in inn-a Tamar kiangah mi sawlin, “Na sanggampa Amnon’ inn-ah pai-in ama ading an bawl in,” ci sak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa Amnon lum-a a omna mun a inn-ah Tamar pai hi. Amah in annel lom la-in meek a, ama muhna-ah mohphengte bawlin em hi.

Tua ciangin amah in sikbeldai la-in ama mai-ah sungkhia a, ahih hangin amah in ne nuam lo hi. Tua ciangin Amnon in, “Kei kiang panin mi khempeuh sawlkhia in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama kiang panin mi khempeuh paikhia hi.
Tua ciangin Amnon in Tamar kiangah, “Na khut panin ka nek theih nadingin inndei sungah an hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tamar in a bawlsa mohphengte la-in inndei sung a sanggampa Amnon kiangah paipih hi.
Ahih hangin amah in nek dingin ama kiang nai-ah a paipih ciangin, amah in tua numei lenin ama kiangah, “Hong pai in, kei tawh hong lum in, ka sanggamnu aw,” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Hi lo hi, ka sanggam pa aw, kei hong thatang hih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte sungah tua bang kihih lo hi; hih bang hai luatna gamta kei in.
