Tua mah bangin David in, ‘Khazih, Topa hi,’ ci ahih ciangin bangci-in ama ta hi thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-a a dot ciangin,
kuamah in kamkhat beek dawng kik thei lo a, tua ni a kipanin kuamah in thu a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonpi leh a nungzuite thu a hilhinah,
“Farisaite leh laitheite in Moses’ tokhom tungah a tu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amau thukham khempeuh na zui un la, na tang un. Ahih hangin a gamtat uh bangin na ta kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amaute in a hilh bangun a gamta kei uh hi.
A gik mahmah, a puak hak van guangin, midangte’ liangko tungah a suat uh hangin, a khutme nangawn uh tawh khin nuam lo uh hi.
Amaute gamtatna khempeuh, mi mai-ah a kilat nadingin ahih uh hi. Amaute in a taubuh leh baanbuh liansak uh a, a puan mong teepkai a sausak uh hi.
Pawikhamna sungah tutna phabel leh kikhopna inn sungah tokhom a sangbel a deih uh a,
sumbukah zahtakna tawh hopih ahi zongin, ‘Rabbi aw,’ cihna ahi zongin a deih uh hi.
Note in, ‘Rabbi,’ hong cih ding na ut kei un, Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na to uh khat bek a om hi. Note khempeuh in unau pawlkhat na hi uh hi.
Leitungah kuamah, ‘Pa,’ na ci kei un, Vantungah a om na Pa uh khat bek a om hi.
‘Topa,’ hong cih ding na deih kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Khazih ahi, na Topa uh khat bek a om hi.
Note lakah a lianpen in, na nasem uh ahi ding hi.
Ama pumpi a kilamsang peuhmah in niamkhiatna a thuak ding hi. A kiniamkhiat peuhmah a kilamsang ding hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam kongkhak mi mai-ah na khak uh hi. No lah lut loin, a lut nuamte zong na kham uh hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, meigongte’ neihsa teng na nektumsak uh a, kineihna tawh saupipi thu na ngen uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin thukhenna lauhuaizaw na thuak ding uh hi.

“A simtat Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, mi khat na nungzui uh na suahsak nadingun, lei lam leh tui lam na pai kawikawi uh a, na ngeina uh hong zuite, note mah bangin, a nihvei khang dongin hel khua’ ta na suaksak uh hi.”

“Lamhilh mittawte aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ‘Biakna innpi tawh thu kiciam peuhmah in, a ciamna a pelh leh phamawh lo hi. Biakna innpi’ kham tawh a kiciam peuhmah in, leiba a nei hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mihai mittawte aw, koi lianpen ahi hiam? Kham in lianzaw ahi hiam? Tua kham a siangthosak biakna innpi lianzaw ahi hiam?
‘Biakna tau tawh a kiciam peuhmah in, a ciamna a pelh leh phamawh lo hi. Biakna tau tungah a om piakna tawh a kiciam peuhmah in leiba a nei hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mittawte aw, koi pen lianzaw ahi hiam? Biakna tau lianzaw ahi hiam? Tua biakna tau a siangthosak piakna lianzaw ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, biakna tau tawh a kiciamte in biakna tau a kipan, biakna tau tungah a om khempeuh tawh a kiciam hi.
Biakna innpi tawh a kiciamte in biakna innpi ahi zongin, innpi sungah a teengpa tawh ahi zongin a kiciam hi.
Vantung gam tawh a kiciamte in, Pasian’ tokhom tungah a tu mipa tawh a kiciam hi.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, leengmasel, anis leh, kummin, sehsawm suah sehkhat na piak uh hangin, thuman thukhenna, midangte hehpihna, gamtatna phate ahi Thukham sungah a lianpen thute na tang kei uh hi. Adangte sangin, hihte na tan’ ding uh a kilawm zaw hi.
Thuhilh mittawte aw, note in thovai om loh nadingin tui na khaih uh hangin, saipi na valh uh hi.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, note in hai leh dalkuangte a pualam na silsiang uh hangin, a sung lamah han’ sanna leh huaihamnate a dim hi.
Mittaw Farisaite aw, hai leh dalkuang pualam a sian’ nadingin a sunglam sil siang masa un.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, suangkangtui a kizut, han tawh kibang na hi uh hi. Tua hante a pualam a hoih uh hangin, a sungah misi guh leh kihhuaina khempeuh tawh a kidim hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong, na pualam uh mi mai-ah misiangtho bangin na om uh hi. Na sung lam uh simtatna leh gitlohna tawh na dim uh hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ kamsangte’ han na bawl uh a, miphate’ han na zeem uh hi.
Note in, ‘Ka pute ka pate’ khanglai-in om le-ung Pasian’ kamsangte thahna-ah ka kihel kei ding uh hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Tua bang na hih uh ciangin, note in Pasian’ kamsangte a that mite’ tate na hi uh a, no langkhatah teci na pang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, na pute na pate’ mawhna tehna seeng na dimsak un.
Mualtan’ suante aw, note in hel khua khiat ding thu tan’na bangci na suakta thei ding uh hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin, kamsangte, lungpilte, laitheite, na omna uhah kong sawl ding hi. Note in tuate kimkhat na that ding uh a, kimkhat singlamteh tungah na khai ding uh hi. Kimkhat na kikhopna inn sung uhah na sat ding uh a, khua khat pan khua khatah bawlsia-in na hawlkhia ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, mipha Abel’ si pan akipan biakna innpi leh biakna tau kikal a, na thah uh, Barakhiah’ tapa Zekhariah’ si dongin leitungah a kibuasa miphate’ si khempeuh in, note tungah hong tung ding uh hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih thu khempeuh in hih khang mite tungah a tung ding uh hi.”

“Pasian’ kamsangte that a, na omna ah hong kisawlte zong suangtum tawh a deeng Jerusalem khuapi aw, akpi in a nongeekte a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin, na tate tamveipi ka khawm nuam zo a, nang na ut kei hi.
En un, na inn uh mi omlo gam simthamin kinusia ding hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, ‘Pasian min tawh hong paipa in thupha ngah ta hen,’ na cih matengun, tu-a kipan kei nong mu kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in biakna innpi pan a paikhiat lai takin, a nungzuite in biakna innpi lak dingin a kiangah va nai uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Hihte khempeuh mu hilo na hi uh hiam? Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, a kiphelkhia loin suang khat tungah suang kiciang khat beek a om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, Oliv Mual tungah tu-a a om lai takin a nungzuite in a kiangah va pai sim uh a, “Tua thute in cikciang a hong piang ding hiam? Topa, nong kum ding ahi zongin, leitung bei ding ahi zongin, bang limin hong kihil ding cih hong hilh in,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin na kikem un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, mi tampi in, ‘Kei Khazih ka hi hi,’ ci-in keima min tawh hong pai-in mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.

Galdona thu leh galkap nading thu na za ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na lunghihmawh loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, tua thu khempeuh a piang ding uh hi. Ahih hangin, a beina a tung nai kei ding hi.
Mi nam khat leh nam khat, gam khat leh gam khat hong kido ding uh hi. Mun khat khatah kial hong tung ding a, ziin hong liing ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh in gimna kipat cilna ahi hi.”
“Tua ciangin amaute in note hong bawlsiat nadingun hong pia ding uh a, hong that ding uh hi. Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Tua lai takin mi tampi a puk ding uh a, khat leh khat a kiheek ding uh hi, khat leh khat a kimudah ding uh hi.
Kamsang zuautheite hong piang ding uh a, mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
Gitlohna thu tam ding ahih manin, mi tampite’ ki-itna uh a kiam ding hi.
A bei dongin a kipte in gupna a ngah ding uh hi.
Mi namkimte tungah teci a pan’ nadingin leitung khempeuhah Lungdamna Thu kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina a piang ding hi.”
“Tua ahih ciangin kamsangpa Daniel a hilh ngei bangin, a kisia thei kihhuaina in a siangtho munah ding-a a om note in na muh uh ciangin, (Lai Siangtho a sim theite in thei ta hen.)
Judah gamah a omte in mual tungah tai ta hen.
Innkhum tungah a omte in zong a inn sungah sum la dingin kumsuk kei hen.
Lo lai-ah a omte in zong puan la dingin ciahkik kei hen.
Tua lai takin naupai numeite leh naungeek nei numeite in gimna a thuak ding uh hi.
Na tai uh a hun ding in phalbi laitak leh, Nipi ni a, a hong tun’ loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, lei a pian’cil pan akipan tudongin a piang ngei lo, a nung ciang a piang nawn lo ding gimna lianpi tua lai takin a piang ding hi.
Tua nite a kitomsak kei leh kuamah suakta zo lo ding hi. Ahih hangin a teelsate adingin a kitomsak ding hi.
Tua lai takin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Hih lai-ah Khazih a om hi; hua lai-ah a om hi,’ hong cih leh um kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, zuauthu gen kamsangte leh Khazih zuautheite hong piang ding uh a, a teelsate nangawn a khem zawh leh a khem nadingun, lim leh nalamdang a liante hong lak ding uh hi.
En un, tua thu kong genkhol zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amaute in, ‘Khazih gam lakah a om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin pai kei un. ‘Inndei sungah a om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, khuaphialep in nisuahna lam pan phia a, nitumna lam dongin a taang mah bangin, Mihing Tapa hong kumna a piang ding hi.
Sapul omna peuhah musanete hong kikhawm ding uh hi.”
“Tua gimna ni khit ciangin thakhatin ni hong mial ding a; kha a hong taang nawn kei ding hi; aksite hong kia ding uh a, vanah a om vangliatnate a kiliing ding uh hi.
Tua lai takin van panin Mihing Tapa’ lim a kilang ding hi. Leitung minam khempeuh a kap ding uh a; vangliatna leh minthan’na tawh, Mihing Tapa in meii tungah tuanga hong kumsuk a mu ding uh hi.
Amah in peengkul nakpi-in tumsak ding a; ama vantungmite sawlin, amaute in a teelsa mite, lei kiu li pan, van mong khat pan mong khat dongin a kikhawmsak ding uh hi.”
“Theikung kiangah thugentehna na sin un. Theikung a hiang meeng a, a teh a no ciangin khuakhal a nai zo ta hi,’ ci-in na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin ka gensa khempeuh na muh uh ciangin, Mihing Tapa kongbiang dongin hong nai zo hi, ci-in na thei ta un.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih khang mite a beima-in, hih thu khempeuh hong piang ding uh hi.
Van leh lei a mangthang ding hi; ka thu ahih leh a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.”
“Tua ni leh tua hun kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantungmite in thei lo uh hi. Mihing Tapa in zong thei lo hi. Pa khat bek in a thei hi.
Noah khan’ lai bangin Mihing Tapa hong kum ciangin hong piang ding hi.
Tuiciin a tun’ ma-inah, Noah teembaw sungah a lut ni dongin mite in an ne, tui dawnin, kipi, kiteengsakin a om uh hi.
Tuiciin a tun’ ciangin mi khempeuh a suksiat mateng, bangmah ngaihsun loin a om uh bangin, Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin a om ding hi.
Tua tak ciangin, lo lai-ah a om mi nih in khat kila a, khat kinusia ding hi.
Angawi khawm numei nih in khat kila a, khat kinusia ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin ngak un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na Topa uh hong pai ding ni na thei kei uh hi.
Gutate hong pai ding hun inn neipa in theikhol leh, ama inn a suksiat loh nadingin a pang ding hi, ci-in na thei ta un.
Tua ahih ciangin note in zong kigingkhol un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na ngaihsut loh lai takun Mihing Tapa hong tung ding hi.”
“A topa in a hun a tun’ cianga a innkuanpihte annek tuidawn a hawmsak ding a koih, a diktat, a lungpil nasempa kua ahi hiam?
A topa hong ciah ciangin tua banga a om a muh nasempa in thupha a ngah ding hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, a topa in a sum khempeuh tua nasempa a uksak ding hi.
Ahi zongin nasem gilopa khat in, ‘Ka topa hong pai hak ding hi,’ ci-in a lungsim sungah ngaihsun a;
nasem dangte satgawp a, zukhamte tawh an ne, zu dawn khawm a,
khuadon lo leh a theih loh kalin a topa hong tung ding a;
tua nasempa vua-in misimtatte tawh a omkhawmsak ding hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.”
“Tua ahih ciangin Vantung Gam in zipipa dawn dingin, a meivak tawi kawma paikhia nungak sawm tawh kibang hi.
Tua nungak lakah nga a pil uh hi, nga pil lo uh hi.
A pil lo nungakte in meivak a tawi uh hangin namgimtui a pua kei uh hi.
A pilte ahih uh leh, meivak leh thawl sungah namgimtui a tawikhawm uh hi.
Zipipa a tun’ma kikalin tua nungakte a vekpi-un lusu-in a ihmu uh hi.
Zankim lai takin, ‘En un, zipipa hong pai zo hi. Dawn dingin hong paikhia un,’ ci-in a kiko ciangin;
tua nungakte tho-in a meivak ciat a bawl uh hi.
A pil lote in, ‘Ka meivak uh a mit zo hi. Na namgimtui uh hong hawm un,’ ci-in lungpilte kiangah a ngen uh hi.
A pilte in, ‘Kong piak uh leh, no ading leh ko ading namgimtui a kicing kei ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, namgimtui zuakte kiangah va pai un la, no ading va lei le-uhcin a hoihzaw ding hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Amaute in namgimtui lei dingin a va pai lai takun, zipipa hong tung a; a baihsa a om nungakte tawh mopina pawi sungah a lut khawm khit uh ciangin, kong a khak uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin, namgimtui lei dinga pai nungakte hong pai uh a, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw, kote zong kong hong hon’ in,’ ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Topa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note kong thei kei hi,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, a ni ahi zongin, a hun ahi zongin, thei lo na hih uh ciangin ngak ta un.”
“Tua thu in mi khat gam dangah pai ning a cih lai takin a nasemte sam a, sum a keemsakpa tawh kibang hi.
Tua mi in a lungpilna uh tawh kituakin khat talen nga, khat talen nih, khat talen khat a piak khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Talen nga a sangpa in a metbawl leh, adang amet talen nga a ngah hi.
Tua mah bangin talen nih sangpa in zong, adang amet talen nih mah a ngah hi.
Talen khat a sangpa in pai-in, lei a tawh khit ciangin a topa’ dangka a seel hi.
A sawtvei ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciah a, amaute sum ciamtehna lai a en hi.
Talen nga a sangpa in va nai a, adang talen nga paipihin, ‘Topa aw, talen nga nong pia hi. En in, adang talen nga amet ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Thuman, mi diktat nasempa aw, a pha hi. Nang thuneute tungah na diktat zo hi. Thu tampi nang kong uk sak ding hi. Na topa tawh lungdam khawm in,’ a ci hi.
Talen nih a sangpa in zong va nai a, ‘Topa aw, talen nih nong pia hi. En in, adang talen nih amet ka ngah zo hi,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Thuman, mi diktat nasempa aw, a pha hi. Nang thuneute tungah na diktat zo hi. Thu tampi nang kong uk sak ding hi. Na topa tawh lungdam khawm in,’ ci-in a gen hi.
Talen khat sangpa in zong va nai a, ‘Topa aw, nang mi haksa na hi a, na vawh lohna, na suan lohna munah na at hi; na pawi lohna munah na khopna ke’n ka theih ciangin,
kong kihta a, mun dangah pai-in na talen khat lei sungah ka seel hi. Tu-in na sum na la in,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Gilo, mi thadah nasempa aw, keimah in ka pawi lohna munah ka khawm hi, ci-in thei na hi hiam?
Ka dangka sumsinte pia leteh kong paikik ciangin, ka dangka teng leh amet ka ngahkhawm thei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, talen khat ama khut sung pan lakhia un la, talen nga keempa pia un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a neite khempeuh kipiak beh ding a, a hau ding hi. A nei lote kiang pan a neihsa nangawn kilakhia ding hi.
Na-a kimang lo nasempa khuamial pua lamah hawlkhia un,’ a ci hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.”
“Mihing Tapa in a minthan’na tawh, vantungmite tawh hong paikhop ciangin, minthan’na tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi.
A mai-ah mi namkim kikhawmsakin gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a tuam khen mah bangin, mi khempeuh a tuam tuakin hong kikhensak ding hi.
Tuute a ziatlam, keelte a veilam a koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin a ziatlamah a omte kiangah Kumpipa in, ‘Ka Pa kiangah hehpihna ngahte aw, leitung pian’cil akipan, note ading a kibawlkholsa Gamah hong pai un la hong luah un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ka gilkial lai takin nong vaak uh hi. Ka dangtak lai takin tui nong pia uh hi. Khualzin ka hih lai takin zin nong do uh hi.
Puan nei lo-a ka om lai takin puan nong silhsak uh hi. Cina-a ka om lai takin nong veh uh hi. Thong sungah ka om lai takin ka kiangah nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Miphate in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lai takin cika hong mu a, an hong pia ka hi uh hiam? Na dangtak lai takin cika hong mu a, na dawn ding tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Zin na hih lai takin cika hong mu a, zin hong do ka hi uh hiam? Puan na neih loh lai takin cika hong mu a, puan hong silhsak ka hi uh hiam?
Cina-a na om ahi zongin, thong sungah na om ahi zongin, cika hong mu a, na kiangah hong pai ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Kumpipa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note in ka sanggamte ahi hih mineupen khat tungah na bawl uh ciangin, kei tungah zong hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin, a veilamah a omte kiangah Kumpipa in, ‘Ciamsiatna a thuak mite aw, dawimangpa leh ama nungzuite ading a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah kei kiang panin paikhia un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ka gilkial lai takin nong vaak kei uh hi. Ka dangtak lai takin ka dawn ding tui nong pia kei uh hi.
Zin ka hih lai takin nong do kei uh hi. Puan nei loin ka om lai takin puan nong silhsak kei uh hi. Ka cinat laitak ahi zongin, thong sungah ka om laitak ahi zongin nong veh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

Amaute in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial laitak, na dangtak lai tak, khualzin na hih lai tak, puan na neih loh lai tak, na ci nat lai tak, thong sungah na om lai takin cika hong mu a, hong keem hong khoi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Kumpipa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih mite laka a neupen khat tungah na bawl loh uh ciangin, kei tungah zong hong bawl lo na hi uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua mite in tawntung gimna thuak dingin a paikhia ding uh hi. Miphate ahih uh leh, nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin a paikhia ding uh hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Zeisu in tua thu khempeuh a hilh khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah,
“Ni nih khit ciangin Paisan pawikhamna hong tung ding cih na thei uh hi. Tua lai takin Mihing Tapa in singlamteh tungah thah dingin kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin siampi liante leh upate in Kaiafas kici, siampi ukpa’ inn tualah kikhawm uh a,
Zeisu bangci kheembawlin, a mat khit uh ciangin thatlum thei ding ci-in a vaihawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin, “Mihonpi a gamlum khak ding a lau manunah pawikham laitak hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.
Bethani khua-ah miphak Simon’ inn sungah Zeisu a om lai takin,
numei khat in a manpha mahmah paknamtui suangngo thawl khat a kiangah paipih a, Topa sabuaiah a tut lai takin, a lu tungah a buak hi.
A nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin heh uh a, “Bang dingin a mawkna-in a kizangsak hiam?
Tua paknamtui man tampi-in zuakin mizawngte a kipia thei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in a theih ciangin, “Tua numei bang hangin bawlsia na hi uh hiam?
Amah in kei tungah thupha hong bawl zo hi. Mizawngte in no kiangah a om tawntung ding uh hi. Kei ka hih leh, no tawh omkhawm tawntung ding ka hi kei hi.
Hih paknamtui ka pum tungah a hong buakna in keima luang vui ding a hong bawl khol zo hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih Lungdamna Thuhilhna mun leitung khempeuhah hih numei a kiphawk nadingin ama hong bawlna thu kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin sawm-le-nihte laka Judas Iskariot in siampi liante kiangah va pai a,
“Kei in no khut sungah Zeisu kong piak leh, bangzahin nong guai ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, amau in dangka peek sawmthum ama ading a tawikhai uh hi.
Tua a kipan Judas in amaute khut sungah Topa a piak theih nading a zong hi.
Silngo om lo Khomun nek kipat ni-in, a nungzuite Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a, “Paisan pawi na nek theih nadingin koi lai tak hong bawlsak le-ung na deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Khua sungah hih bang mi khat kiangah pai un la, ‘Sia in, Ka hun a nai zo hi. Nangma innah ka nungzuite tawh Paisan pawi ka ne ding hi, ci-in hong vaikhak hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in Zeisu cih mah bangin ahih uh a, Paisan pawi nek nading a bawl khol uh hi.
Nitak ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite Sawm-le-nih tawh sabuai ah an ne-in a tukhawm hi.
An a nek lai takun Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note lakah khat in kei hong lehheek ding hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite dah mahmahin, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong tek uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Kei tawh kuang sungah an ka sawk khawmpihpa in kei hong lehheek ding hi.

Mihing Tapa in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh kholsa mah bangin a pai ding hi. Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa a lehheekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi. Tua mipa in a nu sung pan suak kei leh, amah ading a hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu a lehheekpa Judas in, “Topa, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Zeisu in, “Nang cih bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amau in an a nek lai takun Zeisu in khomun la a, hehpihna a phat khit ciangin khomun balnenin, “Hih khomun in ka pumpi ahi hi. La un la, ne un,” ci-in a nungzuite a pia hi.
Hai zong la a, hehpihna a phat khit ciangin amau pia a, “Note’n na vekpi-un dawn un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, hih in mi tampite’ mawhna kimaisak nading a kibuasa, thuciamna thak ka sisan ahi hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, leenggahtui ka Pa’ Gam sungah no tawh ka dawn thak ni matengin, tu-a kipan ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in la a sak khit uh ciangin, Oliv Mualah a paikhia uh hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, “Tuucingpa ka satlum a, tuu honpite a kithehthang ding uh hi,’ ci-a Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin note na vekpi-un kei hangin, tuzan ciangin na lungkia ding uh hi. Ahih hangin ka thawhkik khit ciangin note maiah Galile gamah ka pai ding hi,” a cih ciangin
32-33 Piter in, “Hih mi khempeuh in nang hangah a lungkia uh zongin keimah in ka lungkia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, tuzan ak a khuan ma-in thumvei kei na hong nial ding hi,” a ci hi.
Piter in, “Nang tawh ka si khawm zongin, nangmah kong nial ngei kei ding hi,” a ci kik hi. A nungzuite khempeuh in zong tua mah bangin a ci uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in amaute tawh Gethsemane kici mun khatah a tun’ uh ciangin, “Keimah hua lam pai a, thu ka nget lai takin, hih lai takah na tu un,” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a cih khit ciangin,
Piter leh Zebedi’ tate nih sam a, a lungdahna leh lungman’na a kipan hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Si dek takin ka dah hi. Hih san takah kei tawh ngak un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

Zeisu mai lamah tomkha pai-in boksukin, “Ka Pa aw, hih hai in kei tawh a kipelh zawh leh, hong kipelhsak in. Ahih hangin keima deihna bang hi kei hen. Nangma deihna bang hi ta hen,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
A nungzuite kiangah a pai kik leh, amaute ihmu a, om uh a muh ciangin, “Note in nai khat nangawn kei tawh ngakkhawm zo lo na hi uh hiam?
Kheemna tawh na kipelh theih nadingun thu ngen un la, ngak un. Lungsim a ut hangin pumpi a thazawng hi,” ci-in Piter kiangah a gen hi.
Nihveina va pai a, “Pa aw, hih hai kei dawn lohin kei tawh a kipelh theih kei leh, nangma deihna bangin hi ta hen,” ci-in thu a ngen kik hi.
A hong pai kik ciangin a nungzuite ihmu a, om uh a mu hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, a mit uh a kham hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amaute omsak a, khatvei va pai kikin a masa-a a nget bangin thumveina thu a ngen hi.
A nungzuite kiangah pai kik a, “Tu-in nuam takin ihmu un. En un, Mihing Tapa in migilote’ khut sungah hong lehheek ding a hun hong tung zo hi.
Tho un, pai ni. Kei hong lehheekpa hong nai zo hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in a gen lai takin a nungzui sawm-le-nihte khat ahi Judas hong pai a, siampi liante leh upate’n a sawl mi honpite in, namsau leh molhtumte tawi-in amau tawh hong tonkhawm uh hi.
Zeisu lehheekpa in, “Ka nappa in Zeisu ahi hi. Tua pa na man un,” ci-in amaute kiangah a lim a hilhkhol hi.
Topa kiangah thakhatin va pai a, “Topa aw, nang na cidam ta in,” ci-in a nam hi.
Zeisu in, “Lawm aw, bawl dinga na hong paina thu na bawl in,” a cih ciangin amaute hong pai uh a, Zeisu a mat khit uh ciangin a kai uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu a tonpihpa khat in a khut zan a, namsau a dawh khit ciangin siampi lian ukpa’ nasem khat a sat leh, a bil a satkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Na namsau a paai sungah siat kik in. Namsau tawite namsau-in a si ding hi.
Tu nangawnin ka Pa kiangah ngen leng vantungmi kuan sawm leh kuan nih sanga tamzaw ka kiangah hong sawl ding um lo na hi hiam?
Tua bang ahih leh, hih bang a piang ding hi, ci-a Lai Siangtho sungah a om bangci a tung ding hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, “Note in galgu mat bangin kei man dingin namsau leh molhtum tawi-in hong pai na hi uh hiam? Keimah in nisimin biakna innpi sungah tu a, thu ka hilh lai takin na hong man kei uh hi.
Hih thute khempeuh in Pasian’ kamsangte’ gelhsa Lai Siangtho hong tun’ nading ahi hi,” ci-in mihonpite kiangah a gen hi. Tua ciangin, a nungzuite khempeuh in Topa a taisan uh hi.
Zeisu a mante in upate leh laitheite’ kikhopna, siampi ukpa Kaiafas’ innah a paipih uh hi.
Piter in siampi ukpa’ inntual dongin gamla sim a kihalin Zeisu zui a, hih thu a tawpna a theih nadingin inntualah lut a, palikte tawh a tukhawm hi.
Siampi liante leh upate in Zeisu thah nadingin thuzuau teci a zong uh hi.
Thuzuau teci pangte tampi hong pai uh hangin amah thah theih nading teci a mu zo kei uh hi. A nung ciangin thuzuau teci nih hong pai uh a,
“Hihpa in, ‘Keimah in Pasian biakna innpi ka susia ding a, ni thum khit ciangin ka lam kik zo ding hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in teci a pang uh hi.
Siampi ukpa ding a, “Nang kam khat beek dawng kik lo na hi hiam? Hih mite in nangma lang khatah teci bangci-a pang uh hiam? ci-in Zeisu kiangah a cih leh,
Zeisu pau loin a om hi. Siampi ukpa in, “Nang, Pasian’ Tapa Khazih na hi hiam, na hi kei hiam kote kiangah nong gen nadingin a nungta tawntung Pasian min tawh ka hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Nang gen bangin ka hi hi. Tua tham loin, ke’n kong cih-inah, tunung ciangin Mihing Tapa in Vanglian Pa’ ziat lamah tu a, meii tungah hong tuangsuk note in na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua tak ciangin, Siampi ukpa in a puan balkeek a, “Hih mipa in Pasian tungah a pau khial zo hi. Adang bang teci deih lai i hi hiam? Pasian tungah ama paukhialhna thu na za zo uh hi.
Bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? a ci hi. Amau in, “Hih mipa thahlup dingin a kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua lai takin amau in Zeisu’ maitang cil tawh phih uh a, khut tumin a tum uh hi. Kimkhat in khutpeek-in a beeng uh hi.
“Khazih aw, nang kua in hong beeng hiam? ci-in kamsangte bangin hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Piter inntualah a tut lai takin numei khat a kiangah pai a, “Galile mi Zeisu tawh na kipawl hi,” a cih ciangin
Piter in, “Nang na cih pen ka thei kei hi,” ci-in mi khempeuh mai-ah a nial hi.
Tua nung ciangin Piter inn liimah a paikhiat khit ciangin numei adang khat in mu a, tua munah a om mite kiangah “Hihpa zong Nazareth mi Zeisu tawh a kipawl hi,” a cih ciangin
Piter in, “Tua pa ke’n ka thei kei hi,” ci-in kiciamin a nial hi.
Tua nung a sawt nai loin tua munah a dingte in Piter kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hua mite khat na hi takpi hi. Na pau in hong kitheisak hi,” a cih uh ciangin
Piter in, “Tua pa ke’n ka thei kei hi,” ci-in hamsia tawh a kiciam khit phetin ak a khuang pah hi.
Piter in, “Ak khuan’ ma-in nang in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” Zeisu in a cihna thu a phawk ciangin pusuak a, nakpi-in a kap hi.
A zingsang ciangin siampi liante leh upate khempeuh in Zeisu thah dingin a vaihawm uh a;
khau tawh a hen khit uh ciangin Pilat mangpa kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Tua lai takin a lehheekpa Judas in, Zeisu a sih nadingin thu a kikhen a theih ciangin kisikkik a, dangka sawmthum siampite leh upate kiangah va pia kik a;
“Ka khial zo hi, mawh nei lo’ si kong pia kha zo hi,” a ci hi. Amau in, “Kote in bang hong kuppih thei ding ka hi uh hiam? Hih thu nangma thu hi ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Judas in biakna innpi sungah dangka paai a, mun dangah a pai khit ciangin a awklum hi.
Siampite in dangka la uh a, “Si man sumpi kholna sungah koih ding kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
A vaihawm khit uh ciangin zinte vui nading beel seekpa’ lei khawk khat a lei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tudongin tua lei in ‘Si Lei’ a kici hi.
Pasian in kamsangpa Jeremiah tungah, “Israel mite in a man a tansa mipa man dangka sawmthum a la uh a,
Pasian in kei kiangah a hong cih mah bangin, beel seekpa’ leikhawk khat a lei uh hi,” a cihna tua lai takin a tangtung hi.
Zeisu in mangpa mai-ah a din’ ciangin mangpa in, “Nang, Judah Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, Zeisu in, “Na cih mah bangin ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi liante leh upate in amah a mawhsak uh ciangin, Zeisu in kamkhat beek a dawng kei hi.
Tua lai takin Pilat in, “Nang lang khatah hih zah tak teci pangte thu za lo na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,
Zeisu in kamkhat beek a dawn’ kik loh mangpa in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Pawikham ciangin mangpa in mihonpite deih bangin, thong sungah a kikhum mi khat a khah khiat nading ngeina khat a om hi.
Tua lai takin Barabbas kici misuam minthang khat thong sungah a kikhum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, mi a kikhop lai takun Pilat in, “Note in kua khah leng na ut uh hiam? Barabbas na ut uh hiam? Ahih kei leh, Khazih a kici Zeisu na ut uh hiam?” ci-in mite a dong hi.
Bang hanga hih bang dong ahi hiam i cih leh, amaute in Zeisu a een’ man-unah a piak uh a thei hi.

Pilat in thukhenna tokhom tungah a tut lai takin a zi in ama kiangah mi khat sawl a, “Tua miphapa tawh bangmah kikumin na hih kei in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, tuni-in ka mang sungah tua pa hangin gimna nakpi-in ka thuak hi,” ci-in kam a khak hi.
Barabbas ngen a, Zeisu a siatsak nadingun siampi liante leh upate in mihonpi a hansuah uh hi.
Tua ciangin mangpa in, “Tua mi tegel kua pen khah leng na ut uh hiam?” ci-in a dot kik ciangin, “Barabbas khah in,” a ci uh hi.
Pilat in, “Tua ahih leh, Khazih kici Zeisu bang ka ci hih ding hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, mihonpite in, “Tuapa singlamteh tungah si ta hen,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Pilat in, “Bang hang hiam? Amah in mawhna bang ta khial ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Singlamteh tungah sihna thuak ta hen,” ci-in mi khempeuh in nakpi-in a kiko semsem uh hi.

Pilat in kham zo lo tham loin mi’ gamlumna a khangto semsem a muh ciangin, tui la-in mihonpite maiah a khut silin, “Hih miphapa’ si tungah kei ka mawh kei hi. Hih thu note thu thu hi ta hen,” a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in, “Ama si in ko tung leh ka tu ka tate tungah om tawntung ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Pilat in amaute kiangah Barabbas khah a, Zeisu ahih leh, a satsak khit ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin a pia hi.
Tua lai takin mangpa’ galkapte in manginn tualah Zeisu paipih uh a, galkap khempeuh a kikhawmsak khit uh ciangin,
Zeisu puan suahkhia uh a, puansan khat a silhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin ling tawh kigan lukhu a khusak uh a, pumpeeng khat a tak lamah a tawisak khit uh ciangin, ama maiah khukdin’in, “Judah kumpipa aw, nang na ci dam ta hen!” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
Zeisu cil tawh phih uh a, pumpeeng la-in a lutang a sat uh hi.
Tua bangin Zeisu a khelbawl khit uh ciangin puansan suahkhia uh a ama puan a silhsak kik khit uh ciangin, singlamteh tungah thah dingin a paipih uh hi.
A paikhiat lai takun a min Simon kici, Sairin mi khat mu uh a, zawhthawh bawlin Zeisu singlamteh pua dingin a zuisak uh hi.
“Lutang guh’cih nopna Golgotha kici mun a tun’ uh ciangin,
zatui kha tawh kihel leenggahtui a dawn dingin Zeisu a piak uh hangin, a ciap ciangin a dawn nuam kei hi.
Zeisu singlamteh tungah a khai khit uh ciangin lai aisaanin a puante a hawm uh a,
tua san takah tu-in a en uh hi.
‘HIH PA IN JUDAHTE’ KUMPIPA ZEISU HI,’ ci-in a mawhsakna lai a lu tungah a suang uh hi.
Tua lai takin Topa tawh misuamte nih, a veilam khat, a ziatlam khat singlamteh tungah a khaikhawm uh hi.
Lampi-ah a pai mite in, “Biakna innpi susia a ni thum sunga a lam kik theipa aw, nangma pumpi na kigum in.
Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi leh, singlamteh tung pan hong kumkhia in,” ci-in a lu uh pei-in a zahko uh hi.
Tua mah bangin siampi liante, laitheite leh upate in,
“Hih mipa in midangte a gup theih hangin ama pumpi kigum zo lo hi. Israel Kumpipa ahih takpi leh, tu mahmahin singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk ta hen. Hong kum leh, ka um ding uh hi.
Amah in Pasian a muang hi. Pasian in amah a deih leh, tu mahmahin amah hong gum ta hen. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, amah in, ‘Pasian’ Tapa ka hi hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
Tua mah bangin singlamteh tungah Zeisu tawh kikhai khawm misuamte in zong a zahko uh hi.
Sun laitak nai sawm leh nai nih pan a kipan, nai thum dongin leitung khempeuhah khua mial hi.
Nai thum lai takin Zeisu in, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi. A khiatna in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang dingin kei hong paisan na hi hiam?” a cihnopna hi.
Tua munah a ding mi kimkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Amah in Elijah a sam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amaute khat in thakhatin va tai a, tui hupna la-in tuithuk sungah a diah khit ciangin, pumpeeng dawnah suangin Zeisu tawp dingin a pia hi.
Midangte in, “Om dih ni, Elijah in amah gum dingin hong pai ding, hong pai lo ding en dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in khatvei nakpi-in a kiko kik khit ciangin a si hi.
Tua lai takin Pasian biakna innpi’ dalna puan a tung lam pan a nuai lam dongin phel nih kisuah hi. Ziin liinga suangpite zong a kitam hi.
Hante kihong a, a sisa misiangthote’ luang tampi hong tho kik uh a,
a thawhkik khit ciangin han sung pan a paikhia uh a, khua siangtho-ah a lut uh a, mi tampi maiah kilang uh hi.
Zeisu a cing galkap mangpa akipan amah tawh a omkhawmte in ziin liing a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Hih pa in Pasian’ Tapa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Galile gam ah Zeisu a vak lai-a a nung a zui numei tampite in zong a gamla panin a gal et uh hi.
Tua numeite lakah Magdala khua Mari leh Jakob leh Josef nu Mari leh Zebedi’ tate’ nute zong a om uh hi.
Nitak ciangin Arimathea khuami Zeisu’ thu zui, a min Josef kici sum haupa khat,
Pilat kiangah va pai a, Zeisu’ luang a ngen hi. Pilat in, “A luang pia un,” a ci hi.
Josef in Zeisu’ luang la a, a siangtho saihadial puan tawh a tun khit ciangin;
suang kikhuak ama han thak sungah sial a, han kong vangah suangpeek lian khat lik a, a khak khit ciangin a pai hi.
Magdala khua Mari leh a dang Mari-te han kongah tu-in a om uh hi.
Kigin-ni khit a zing ciangin, siampi liante leh Farisaite in Pilat mangpa kiangah kikhawm uh a,
“Topa aw, tua mi khempa in, ‘Ni thum ni-in ka thokik ding hi,’ ci-in a nun’tak lai-in a cih tu-in ka phawk uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ama nungzuite in zanin pai uh a, a luang a gukkhiat khit uh ciangin, ‘Amah in sihna panin thokik zo hi,’ ci-in mite kiangah gen le-uh khialhna masa sangin khialhna nunung a lianzaw ding hi, ci-in lunghihmawhna thu om ahih ciangin, han ni thum sung a kicin’ nading thu hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Pilat in, “Note in micing pawlkhat na nei uh hi. Pai un la, na hih zawh zahun cingsak un,” a ci hi.
Tuate in micing pawlte tawh pai uh a, han khakna suang a ciamteh khit uh ciangin a cingte koihin han a bit tak-in a bawlsak uh hi.
Nipini khit ciangin, ni sagih lakah ni kipat ni, khua a vak pat lai takin Magdala khua Mari leh adang Mari-te in daihawh dingin a pai uh hi.
Tua lai takin lei nakpi-in a liing hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, Pasian’ vantungmi khat in vantung panin hong kumsuk a, han kong khakna suangpi a likkhiat khit ciangin a tungah a tu hi.
Ama meel in khuaphialep bang hi a, a puan zong vuuk bangin a paak hi.
Hancingte in zong vantungmi kihta-in liing uh a, misi tawh kibangin a sibup uh hi.
Vantungmi in, tua numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un; singlamteh tunga kithat, Zeisu na zon’ uh ke’n ka thei hi.
Hih lai takah om nawn lo hi. A hong hilhkholh bangin a thokik zo hi. Hong pai un la, Topa lupna hong en un.

Pai mengmeng un la, ‘Sihna pan thokik a, na mai uhah Galile gamah a pai ding hi. Tua san takah Topa na mu ding uh hi,’ ci-in a nungzuite kiangah na hilh un. Ke’n kong gen zo hi,” ci-in tua numeite a sawl hi.
Tua numeite in launa tawh, nuamna tawh han panin a nungzuite thu ko dingin a tai mengmeng uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in lampi-ah va dawn a, “Note na cidam ta un,” a cih ciangin numeite in va nai uh a, a khe lenin a bia uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Lau kei un, Pai un la, ka sanggamte kiangah, ‘Galile gamah na pai un. Tua san takah kei hong mu ding uh hi,’ a ci hi, ci-in va gen un,” a ci hi.
Tua numeite a pai lai takun hancingte kimkhat khua sungah lut uh a, thupiang khempeuh siampi liante a zasak uh hi.
Siampite leh upate kikhawm uh a, a vaihawm khit uh ciangin galkapte dangka tampi a pia uh a;
“Zan a, ka ihmut kal-un a nungzuite hong pai-in a luang hong gu uh hi,’ ci-in mite kiangah va gen un.
Hih thu mangpa in a theih leh, note hong mawhsak loh nading, mangpa a lungkim nadingin ka na genpih ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Galkapte in dangka sang uh a, thu a kihilh bangin a gen uh a; tua thu Judah mite lakah kizelin tudongin a um uh hi.
A nungzuite sawm-le-khat in Zeisu in a vaikhakna mualah a pai uh hi.
Topa tawh a kimuh uh ciangin a bia uh a, ahih hangin kimkhat in a um khial lai uh hi.
Zeisu in amau kiangah va pai a, “Vantungah ahi zongin, leitungah ahi zongin, vangliatna khempeuh kei hong kipia zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, note vak kawikawi un la; mi khempeuh nungzuite na suahsak khit uh ciangin, Pa’ min, Tapa’ min leh Kha Siangtho’ min tawh na baptaiz ta un.
Keimah in note kong piak thukham khempeuh a tan’ dingun na hilh ta un. Keimah in leitung a bei dongin note tawh ka omkhawm tawntung ding hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
A cil panin piang a, komau in za-in, ka mittang uh tawh mu-in, a tel takpi enin, ka khut uh tawh ka lawn’ khitsa uh nuntakna Thu tawh kipawl thute, note kiangah kong zasak uh hi.
Tua nuntakna hong kilang zo a, kote in zong ka mu zo uh a, Pa tawh omkhawm ngei-in, kote kiangah hong kilangsa tua nuntak tawntungna thu, note kiangah teci pangin kong hilh uh hi.
Ahi hi. Pa tawh, ama Tapa Zeisu Khazih tawh ka kihopih uh ahih ciangin, note in kote tawh na hong kihopih theih nadingun ko ka muh uh nate, ka zak uh nate, note kiangah ka hong lak uh hi.
Note lungdamna a kicin’ nadingin hih thute ka hong gelh uh hi.
Ama kiangah ko ka zak uh a, note kiangah kong hilh uh thu in: Pasian in khuavak hi a, ama sungah khuamial a om peuhmah kei hi.
“Eite in Pasian tawh i kiho thei hi,” i ci napi-in khuamial lakah i gamtat leh, thuman thutak zui loin zuauthu a zang mi i hi hi.
Amah in khuavak sungah a om mah bangin eite zong khuavak sungah i om leh, khat leh khat kihothei-in, a Tapa Zeisu’ si in eite mawhna khempeuh hong sawpsiang hi.
Eite in, “Ka mawhna a om kei hi,’ ci leng eimah mah kikheem i hi a, thuman thutak eite sungah a om kei hi.
I mawhnate pulakin thuum lehang, i mawhnate maisakin, i gitlohna khempeuh sawpsiang nadingin amah in thuman thutak tawh ahi zongin, dikna thu tawh ahi zongin a dim hi.
“Ka mawh kei hi,” i cih leh, amah thuzuau gen ahi ci-in i mawhsakna suak a, ama thu in zong eite sungah a om kei hi.
Ka ta neute aw, note in na mawh loh nadingun hih thute lai sungah kong gelh hi. Mi khat peuhmah in a mawh leh, midik Zeisu Khazih ahi, eite hong huhpa Pasian kiangah i nei hi.
Tua Topa in eite mawhna tham loin, leitung mi khempeuh’ mawhna maisak nading ahi hi.
Eite in amah bang i ci theih tel thei ding hiam na cih uh leh, ama thupiaknate i zuih leh, i thei ding hi.
“Tua Topa ka thei hi,” ci napi-in ama thupiaknate a zui lo mi in thuzuau genpa hi a, ama sungah thuman thutak a om kei hi.
Ama thu a ngai mi sungah Pasian’ itna in a kicing taktak hi. Ama sungah i om thu hih bangin i thei hi:
“Ama sungah ka om hi,” a ci mi in tua Zeisu’ gamtat bangin a gamta ding hi.
Ka itte aw, note kiangah thupiakna thak kong gelh kei hi. A kipat cil panin na neih lui uh kong pia hi. Tua thupiakna lui in a masa belin na zak uh thuhilhna ahi hi.

Khat vei thupiakna thak note kiangah kong gelh hi. Tua thupiakna in tua Topa sungah ahi zongin, note sungah ahi zongin thuman thutak ahi hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, khuamialna mangthang zo a, a maan khuavak a tan’ laitak ahi hi.
“Khuavak sungah ka om hi,” ci napi-in a u a nau a mudah mi in, tu dongin khuamial sungah a om lai hi.
A u a nau a it mi in khuavak sungah om a, ama tungah puk nading a om kei hi.
A u a nau a mudah mi in khuamial sungah om a, khuamial sungah zong lam pai-in a gamta hi. Khuamial in ama mit khua musak thei lo a, a paina mun a thei kei hi.
Ka ta neute aw, ama min hangin na mawhna uh a kimaisak ahih ciangin, note kiangah lai kong gelh hi.

Pate aw, a cil panin a om mi na thei uh ahih ciangin, note kiangah lai kong gelh hi. Tangvalte aw, note in a gilopa na zo uh ahih ciangin, note kiangah lai kong gelh hi. Naupang neute aw, note in Pa na thei uh ahih ciangin, note kiangah lai kong gelh hi.
Pate aw, a cil pan a om mi na theih manunah note kiangah lai kong gelh hi. Tangvalte aw, na thakhauh uh a, note sungah Pasian’ thu om a, a gilopa na zo uh ahih ciangin note kiangah lai kong gelh hi.
Leitung ahi zongin, leitungah a om nate ahi zongin na it kei un. Leitung a it mi sungah Pa itna a om kei hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, leitungah a om na khempeuh ahi, pumpi deihgawhna, mittang deihgawhna, kisaktheih mawknate in Pa tawh kipawl hi loin, leitung bek tawh kipawl ahi uh hi.
Leitung leh leitung deihgawhnate in a mangthang ding ahi uh hi. Pasian’ deihna bang a gamta mi ahih leh, a kip tawntung ding hi.

Ta neute aw, tu laitak hun in a nunung bel hun ahi hi. Khazih’ gal ahi Anti Khazih hong piang ding thu note in na za zo uh mah bangin, tu-in Anti Khazih tampi a om uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu hun in a nunung bel hun ahi hi cih i thei hi.

Tua mite in eite kiang pan a paikhiat uh hangin nidang lai-inah eite tawh a kipawl kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, eite tawh kipawl uh hi leh, eite tawh a omkhawm ding uh hi. Tua mite in eite tawh a kipawl loh thu a kilat nading eite kiang pan a paikhia uh hi.
Note in Siangtho Pa’ Kha Siangtho sathau nilhsa na hi uh a, na khempeuh na thei uh hi.

Note in thuman thutak na thei loh manun lai hong gelh ka hi kei hi. Note in thuman thutak na thei uh ahi zongin, thuzuau khat beek in thuman tawh kipawl lo ahi zongin na theih manunah lai kong gelh hi.
Zuauthu a gen mi kua ahi hiam? “Zeisu in Khazih ahi kei hi,” ci-in a nial mi ahi hi. Hih mi in Pa leh Tapa nial a, Anti Khazih ahi hi.
Ta a nial mi in Pa a nei kei hi. Ta a mang mi in Pa zong a nei hi.

Note na hih uh leh, a cil panin na zak uh thuhilhna note sungah na kipsak un. Note in a cil pan na theih uh thuhilhna in note sungah a om leh, note in Pa sungah ahi zongin, Tapa sungah ahi zongin na kip ding uh hi.
Eite a hong piak thuciamna in nuntak tawntungna kiciamna ahi hi.
Note hong kheem mite thu uh hih bangin kong gelh hi.

Note na hih uh leh, ama khut pan na ngah uh Kha Siangtho sathau nilhna in note sungah kipin a om a, kuamah in note thu hong hilh ding na kisam kei uh hi. Ama’ Kha Siangtho sathau nilhna in note na khempeuh hong hilh a, tua Kha Siangtho sathau nilhna in thuman thutak hi a, thuzuau hi lo ahih ciangin note hong hilh mah bangin ama sungah kipin na om un.
Ka ta neute aw, Tapa hong pai a, hong kilat ciangin eite in maizumna om loin, lungmuan’na tawh ama kiangah i om theih nadingin ama sungah kipin om un.
Amah in midik ahih note in na theih uh leh, dikna thu a sem mi khempeuh in zong ama pian’sak mi ahi uh hi, cih na thei uh hi.

Eite in Pasian’ tate cihna i ngah nadingin Pa in eite tungah bang zah itna hong pia hiam ci-in ngaihsun un. Eite in tate taktak i hi hi. Tua hangin leitungmite in amah a theih loh manunah eite zong hong thei kei uh hi.

Ka itte aw, tu-in Pasian’ tate i hi hi. A nung ciangin bang ci mi i hi ding a kilang nai kei hi. Ahih hangin amah hong kilat ciangin eite in amah tawh i kibang ding hi ci-in i thei hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ama pum a om bangin amah i mu ding hi.
Hih bang a lamen mi khempeuh in Topa a sian’tho bangin amau pumpi uh zong a kisiangthosak uh hi.
Mawhna ahih mi khempeuh in thukham a kan uh hi. Khialhna in thukham kanna ahi hi.
Topa in mawhna a pua dingin a hong kilang na thei uh hi. Ama sungah mawhna khialhna a om thei kei hi.
Ama sungah a om mi in mawhna ah a zongsang kei hi. Mawhna ahih zom mi in amah a mu ngei lo, amah a thei ngei lo ahi hi.
Ka ta neute aw, lam hong khialsak thei dingin kuamah kizolsak kei un. A diktat mi in Topa a dik mah bangin a dik hi.
Mawhna a bawl mi in Dawimangpa tawh a kipawl hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a cil panin Dawimangpa in mawhna a bawl zo hi. Dawimangpa’ bawl nate a siasak dingin Pasian’ Tapa hong kilang zo hi.
Pasian’ pian’sak mi in ama sungah Pasian’ khaici a om man-inah mawhna a bawl zom thei kei hi. Amah in Pasian’ pian’sak mi ahih maninah a mawh nuam kei hi.
Tua bangin Pasian’ tate leh Dawimangpa’ tate a kikhen uh hi. Dikin gamta lo mi ahi zongin, a u a nau a it lo mi ahi zongin Pasian tawh a kipawl lo mi ahi hi.
Note in a cil panin na zak uh thu in, Dawimangpa tawh a kipawl a nau a that Kain bang hi loin eite khat leh khat ki-it ding ci-in hong kigen hi.
Kain in bang hangin a nau a that hiam na cih uh leh, ama gamtatnate hoih lo a, a naupa’ gamtatnate a dik hi.
Ute naute aw, leitungmite in note hong muhdah uh leh, lamdangsa kei un.
Eite in ute naute khat leh khat ki-it i hih man-inah sihna panin nuntakna ah i galkah zo hi cih i thei hi. A it lo mi in sihna sungah a om lai hi.
A u a nau a mudah mi in mi that mi ahi hi. Mi that mi khat peuhmah sungah nuntak tawntungna a om kei hi ci-in na thei uh hi.
Khazih in eite tangding a nuntakna a paih maninah eite in itna i thei hi. Eite in zong ute naute tangding i nuntakna paih ding a kilawm hi.
Mi khat in leitung sumte nei-in a u a nau a zawngte a muh hangin hehpihna lungsim a neih kei leh, tua mi sungah Pasian itna bang ci om ahi hiam?
Ka ta neute aw, eite in kampau bek tawh ahi zongin, leii bek tawh ahi zongin ki-it loin, sepna bawlna tawh a mantak ki-it ni.
Tua bangin i hih leh, thuman tawh kipawlin i om kithei-in, eima lungsim kimawhsakna bangmah om loin, a mai-ah lungnopna thu i ngah ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, i lungsim in hong mawhsak leh, i lungsim sangin Pasian lian zaw a, amah in na khempeuh a thei hi.
Ka itte aw, eite lungsim in eite hong mawhsak kei leh, Pasian mai-ah launa a om kei ding hi.
A piak thupiaknate zui-in, amah a lungdamsak ding nate i bawl maninah i ngetna peuhmah ama kiang pan i ngah hi.
Ama thupiakna in a Tapa Zeisu Khazih’ min eite in umin, ama hong piaksa thu bangin khat leh khat ki-it nading ahi hi.
Ama thupiakna a zui mi in ama sungah kipin om a, amah in zong tua mi sungah a om hi. Tua tham loin, amah in eite sungah a om thu a hong piak Kha Siangtho hangin eite in i thei hi.
Ka itte aw, kha khempeuh um kei un. Khate in Pasian tawh kipawl hiam, kipawl lo hiam dongtelin, en un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, zuauthu a gen kamsang tampi leitungah a paikhia zo uh hi.
Pasian’ Kha Siangtho theih nadingin Zeisu Khazih mipum bangin hong pai zo hi ci-in a mang kha khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl hi.
Tua banga Zeisu a mang lo kha khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl lo hi. Hih kha in a hong tung ding ci-a na zaksa uh Anti Khazih’ kha ahi hi. Tua kha in leitungah tu nangawnin a om zo hi.
Ka ta neute aw, note in Pasian tawh kipawlin tua khate na zozo uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, note sungah a om mi in leitungmite sungah a om mi sangin a lianzaw hi.
Amaute in leitung tawh kipawl uh ahih maninah, leitung tawh kipawl mite bangin thu a gen uh a, leitungmite in amaute thu gen a ngai uh hi.

Eite i hih leh, Pasian tawh i kipawl hi. Pasian a thei mite in eite thu a thei uh hi. Pasian tawh a kipawl lo mi in eite thu a ngai thei kei uh hi. Tua bangin thuman thutak kha leh zuau kha eite in i thei thei hi.
Ka itte aw, eite khat leh khat ki-it ni. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, itna in Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi. A it thei mi khempeuh in Pasian’ pian’sak mi hi a, Pasian a thei hi.
A it thei lo mi in Pasian a thei kei hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian in itna ahi hi.
Eite in Tapa hangin i nuntak nadingin Pasian in ama Tapa khat bek leitungah hong sawlna ah Pasian’ itna eite sungah a kilang hi.
Eite in Pasian i itna hang hi lo hi, Pasian in eite hong it a, eite mawhna hong tat nadingin ama Tapa hong sawlna ah itna hong kilang hi.
Ka itte aw, Pasian in eite hih zahin hong it ahih leh, eite khat leh khat ki-it ding a kilawm hi.
Cikmah hunin kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Eite khat leh khat i ki-it leh, Pasian in eite sungah om a, ama itna eite sungah hong kicing hi.
Amah in ama Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih ciangin eite in ama sungah ahi zongin, amah in eite sungah ahi zongin a om thu i thei hi.
Pa in a Tapa leitungmite’ Gumpa a suah nadingin hong sawl thu kote in thei-in teci ka pang uh hi.
Zeisu in Pasian’ Tapa ahi ci-a mang mi khempeuh in Pasian sungah om a, Pasian zong tua mi sungah a om hi.
Pasian in eite hong itna thu eite in thei-in i um zo hi. Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sungah a om mi in Pasian sungah a om hi. Pasian in zong tua mi sungah a om hi.
Tua bangin eite in ki-itna tawh i dim maninah thukhen Ni ciangin lau lohna thu i ngah ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, eite in amah bangin leitungah i piang hi.
Itna in launa tawh kigawm thei lo hi. Launa in dantatna piangsak thei ahih ciangin, a kicing itna in launa a hawlkhia hi. A laupa in itna sungah a kicing nai kei hi.
Pasian in eite hong it masak maninah eite in amah i it hi.

Mi khat peuhmah in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi-in a u a nau a it kei leh, tua mi in thuzuau gen mi ahi hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a muh theih a u a nau a it kei leh, a muh theih loh Pasian bang ci a it zo ding hiam?
Pasian a it mi in a u a nau a it ding hi a cihna thupiakna kote in Khazih kiang pan ka ngah uh hi.
Zeisu in Khazih ahi ci-a a um mi in Pasian’ pian’sak mi ahi hi. Pa a it mi in Pa’ pian’sak mi zong a it ding hi.
Eite in Pasian itin a thupiaknate bangin i gamtat lai takin Pasian’ tate i it hi ci-in i thei hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ itna in ama thupiaknate zuihna ahi hi. Pasian’ thupiaknate zong a haksa lua ahi kei hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ pian’sak peuhpeuh in leitung a zo thei hi. Eite upna in leitung zawhna ahi hi.
Zeisu in Pasian’ Tapa ahi ci-in a um mi sim loh, leitung a zo kua mi ahi hiam?
Tui leh sisan tawh hong pai Topa in Zeisu Khazih ahi hi. Tui bek tawh hi loin, tui tawh ahi zongin, sisan tawh ahi zongin a hong pai hi.
Kha Siangtho in teci hong pang hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Kha Siangtho in thuman thutak ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, teci a pang thum ahi Kha Siangtho, tui leh sisan-te om a, tua thumte in pumkhat bek ahi uh hi.
Mite teci pan’na eite in i man’ leh, Pasian’ teci pan’na a lianzaw hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Paisan’ teci pan’na in a Tapa ading teci a pan’ zawhna thu ahi hi.

Pasian’ Tapa a um mi in ama sungah teci pan’na a ngah hi. Pasian a um lo mi in Pasian pen zuau gen mi hi cih a suaksak hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian in ama Tapa ading a teci pan’na thu, tua mi in a um kei hi.
Tua teci pan’na in, Pasian in eite nuntak tawntungna hong pia a, tua nuntakna in Tapa sungah a om hi.
Tapa a nei mi in nuntakna a nei hi, Pasian’ Tapa a nei lo mi in nuntakna a nei kei hi.
Pasian’ Tapa’ min a um note in nuntak tawntungna na ngahna thu uh na theih nadingun, hih thute kong gelh zo hi.
Ama mai-ah eite in i ngah lau loh nading thu in, ama deihna bangin na khempeuh thuumin i nget leh, a hong ngaih nading thu ahi hi.
Thu i ngetna khempeuh a hong ngai hi ci-a i theih leh, ama kiangah i nget khempeuh i ngah ding i thei hi.

Mi khatpeuh in a sanggampa in sihna thuak ding a kilawm lo mawhna a bawl a muh leh, thungen ta hen. Sihna a thuak ding a kilawm lo mawhna a bawl mite ading Pasian in nuntakna a pia ding hi. Sihna thuak ding a kilawm mawhna a om hi. Tua bang mawhna maisak nading thungen ding ka ci kei hi.
A dik lo na khempeuh in mawhna ahi hi. Ahih hangin sihna thuak dinga kilawm lo mawhna a om hi.
Pasian’ pian’sak mi khempeuh in mawhna ahih zom kei hi ci-in i thei hi. Pasian’ pian’sak mi in ama pumpi kem a, a gilo mi in tua mi a sukha thei kei hi.
Eite in Pasian’ tate i hi hi cih thu i thei hi, leitung khempeuh in a gilo mi’ khut sungah a om thu zong i thei hi.

Tua banah Pasian’ Tapa hong pai a, thuman thutak Topa i theih nadingin pilna eite a hong piak thu zong i thei hi. Tua tham loin, a Tapa Zeisu Khazih ahi tua thuman Topa sungah i om hi ci-in i thei hi. Hih Topa in Pasian taktak ahi hi; nuntak tawntungna zong ahi hi.
Ka ta neute aw, milimte na tang un.
1-2Upa in, eite sungah kipin eite tawh a omkhawm tawntung ding, thuman thutak hangin, kei-a kipan thuman thutak a thei mi khempeuh in a kiteel Tonu leh a tate ka hong it uh hi cih thu a zasak hi.
Pa Pasian kiang pan ahi zongin, Pa’ Tapa Zeisu Khazih kiang pan ahi zongin thuman thutak leh itna thu tawh hehpihna thupha, hehpihna leh nopna eite tungah a om ding uh hi.
Eite in Pa kiang pan thupiakna i ngah bangin, na tate kimkhat in thuman thutak lam zui-in a om uh ka muh ciangin ka lung a dam mahmah hi.
Tu-in Tonu aw, thupiakna thak hong gelh bang hi loin eite in a cil pan i neih pen mah hong gelhin, khat leh khat ki-it nadingin ka hong thuum hi.
Ama thupiaknate bangin i thuman’na in ki-itna ahi hi. Note in thupiakna tawh kituak a, na gamtat nadingun a cil panin no na zak uh mah bangin ama thupiakna in tua bang deihna ahi hi.
Zeisu Khazih in mi pum bangin ci-le-sa tawh hong pai hi ci-a sang lo mi kheem tampi, leitungah hong pai zo uh hi. Hih bang mi in mi kheem mi leh Anti Khazih ahi hi.
Note in na bawl uh nate mangthangsak loin, a kicing thaman na ngah nadingun na kikem un.
Khazih’ thuhilhna-ah kip loin a zui khial mi in Pasian a nei lo mi ahi hi. Khazih’ thuhilhna-ah a kip mi in Pa leh Tapa a nihin a neikhawm hi.
Mi khat in note kiangah hong pai a, hih thu a vom kei leh, amah note innah na tungsak kei un; “Thupha ngah in,” ci-in hopih kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, tua banga a hopih mi in tua mi gilo’ gamtatnate tawh a kipawl a suak hi.

No kiangah ka hong gelh nop thu tampi a om hangin lai tungah laitui tawh gelh ding ka deih kei hi. Note kiangah hong pai-in, khat leh khat lungdamna a kicin’ nadingin note tawh maitang kimu-a kihopih ding ka lamen hi.
A kiteel na naunu’ tate in nang hong hopih uh hi.
Upa in a man takin ka it Gaias kong zasak hi.
Ka it mi aw, na lungsim a nopsak mah bangin nangmah in na khempeuhah nopsakna leh cidamna na ngah nading thu ka ngen hi.
Nang in thuman thutak na zuih mah bangin na neihsa thuman thutak ah na cihtakna thu ute naute in hong pai a, teci hong pan’ uh ciangin ka nuam mahmah hi.
Ka tate in thuman thutak lam a zuih thu ka zak cianga ka nuamna sangin nuam zawkna a om kei hi.
Ka it mi aw, nangmah in ute naute tungah ahi zongin, zinte tungah ahi zongin na bawlna khempeuh, dikna tawh kipawlin a bawl na hi hi.
Tua mite in na itna thu pawlpi mai-ah teci a pang uh hi. Nangmah in Pasian’ deihna tawh kituakin tua mite amau lampi ah na khak leh, a pha a bawl na hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih leh, amaute in Topa’ min hangin Gentailte lakah huhna la loin a pai uh hi.
Tua hi a, eite in thuman thutak a huh mi i suah nadingin tua bang mite zin i do ding a kilawm hi.
Pawlpi kiangah vaikhakna lai gelhin ka pia zo hi. Ahih hangin a uk a lian a suak nuam Diotrefes in ka thu a mang kei hi.

Tua a hih ciangin ka hong pai ciangin amah in a bawlna thu ka phawksak kik ding hi. Amah in en’na, siatsak nopna kam tawh kote hong kosia tham loin, ute naute ama innah a tungsak nuam kei hi. A tungsak nuam mite zong khamin, pawlpi sung pan a hawlkhia hi.
Ka it mi aw, a sia lam zui kei in, a hoih lam zui in. A hoih a gamta mi in Pasian tawh kipawl hi. A hoih lo a a gamta mi in Pasian a mu nai kei hi.
Mi khempeuh in Demetrias ading teci a hi uh hi. Thuman thutak in zong ama teci a hi hi. Ahi hi, kote in zong tua mi lamah teci ka pang uh hi. Kote teci pan’na thu in a man hi ci-in na thei hi.
Ka gelh ding thu tampi a om hangin laikung leh laitui tawh gelh ding ka deih kei hi.
A sawt loin nang tawh kimu-in, khat leh khat kihopihin i kikup khop ding ka lamen hi.
Nangma tungah nopna om ta hen. Lawmte in nang hong hopih uh hi. Na kiangah a om lawmte a minin lo-in na hopihsak in.
Zeisu Khazih’ sila leh Jeim’ sanggampa keimah Juda in, Pa Pasian hangin itna ngahin, Zeisu Khazih adingin kikemin, sapna a ngah mite kiangah ka hong zasak hi.
Note tungah hehpihna, nopna leh itna khang semsem ta hen.

Ka itte aw, eite in i ngah khawm gupna thu tawh kizomin note kiangah ka hong gelh thu hahkat a, ka bawl lai takin, misiangthote kiangah khatvei bek a piaksa upna thu ading, lungsim khauhin na do nadingun hansuahin ka hong gelh hi.

Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, eite Pasian’ hehpihna thupha in kihhuai tat nopna suaksakin, eite hong uk khat bek ahi Topa Zeisu Khazih nialin, Pasian’ thu a deih lo mite in hih thutanna thuak dingin tanglai pek a, a kiciamtehsa mi kimkhat in note’ lakah hong lutsim uh hi.
Note in na khempeuh thakhatin na theih uh hangin note ka hong phawksak nop thu in: Topa in Izipt gam sung mi pawlkhat a gupkhiat khit ciangin, a nung nihveina ah a um lo mite a siasak hi.
Amau thu ngahna uh kem lo uh a, amau omna uh pan a paikhia vantungmite zong ni lian Ni-a thukhenna dongin khuamial sungah a tawntungin hencipin a khum hi.

Tua mah bangin Sodom leh Gomorrah khuapi akipan a kimkot ah a om khuapite zong tua mite bangin a kihhuai noptatna ah gamta-in, a man lo pumpi’ deihna lungsim zui uh ahih maninah, meikuang tawntung daan thuakin, thu hilhkholh nading lim ahihna uh a kilang hi.
Tua mah bangin tua mite in tua bangin a pumpi uh kihhuaisak a, ukna thu nial-in, vanmite a gensia uh hi.
Vantungmite a ukpa Mikhael nangawn in Dawimangpa tawh kidoin, Moses’ luang tawh kizomin a kinial lai takin, kisiatna bawl ngam loin, “Topa in nang hong taai hen,” a ci bek hi.
Tua mite in ahih uh leh, amau theih loh na peuhpeuh a kosia uh hi. A ngaihsun thei lo ganhingte bangin ngeina bangin a theihtheih nate uh hangin, amau pumpi uh a siasak uh hi.
Amaute in gimna a thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amaute in Kain’ lampi zui-in thaman ngah dingin Balaam’ mawhna a manlangin zui-in a delh uh a, Korah’ lehdona bangin a kisia uh hi.

Tua mite in note ki-itna pawite ah note tawh an a nekkhawm a dawn khawm lai takun, lau loin amaute kham tak kivakin pawi sungah a nin a kisawh tuucing ahi uh hi; tui om lo, huih in a leen’pih meii bang ahi zongin, pulhkhia-in a gah om lo nihvei si-in a bul pan a kibotkhia singkung bang ahi zongin;
amau zumna thu a phuansak tui kilok gilo bang ahi zongin, khuamial pha mahmah a tawntungin amaute ading a kikoih khol a, a om aksi leeng bang ahi zongin a suak uh hi.
Adam pan akipan khang sagihna mi Enok in kamsangpa thu a gen-inah, “Topa in mi khempeuh thukhenin,

Pasian’ thu a deih lo mi khempeuh in Pasian deih loh a bawlna uh na khempeuh akipan Pasian’ thu a deih loh uh mawhna a neite in, Topa tungah gensiatna kam khempeuh a kilangsak ding ahi zongin, Topa in a kisim zo lo misiangthote tawh hong paikhawm ding hi,” ci-in a genkhol hi.
Tua mite in phunin a mawhsak thei mi, amaute lunggulh deihgawhna bangin a gamta thei mi, a kam un kisaktheihna thu a gen thei mi, amau noptuamna ngaihsunin mi maitang a zahtak thei mi ahi uh hi.
Ka itte aw, note na hih uh leh, i Topa Zeisu Khazih’ sawltakte in a masa-in a genkholh thute na phawk un.
Amaute in, “A nunung bel hunin Pasian’ deihlohna tawh kipawl amau pumpi uh deihgawhnate bangin zui-in, a kosia thei mite hong kilang ding uh hi,” ci-in note kiangah hong gen zo uh hi.
Tua mite in Kha Siangtho nei lo uh a, pawlpi kikhenna a bawl thei mi, pumpi deihna bek a zui thei mite ahi uh hi.
Ka itte aw, note in na hih uh leh, a siangtho mahmah upna tungah na pumpi uh lamin, Kha Siangtho tawh thungenin,
nuntak tawntungna ngah nadingin i Topa Zeisu Khazih’ hehpihna na ngak lai takun, Pasian’ itna sungah na pumpi uh kemin om un.
A um khial kimkhat na hehpih un.
Mi kimkhat mei sung pan kaikhia-in na gum un. Mi kimkhat zong pumpi deihgawhna hangin nin tawh a kisawh a puante nangawn uh muhthadah huaisa-in, lauthawng kawmin na hehpih un.

24-25 Note na kipuk loh nadingun hong kemin, mawhna om loin, lungdam mahmahin note ama’ minthan’na mai-ah hong koih thei, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin eite’ Honpa Pasian khat bek tungah minthan’na, thupitna, vangliatna leh ukzawhnate tu-ma hun khempeuh, tu laitak leh a tawntungin om ta hen! Amen.
A sawt loin a piang ding nate ama silate tungah lah dingin Pasian in a piaksa Zeisu Khazih’ mangmuhna lai ahi hi. Tua Topa in ama vantungmi khat sawl a, ama silapa Johan kiangah hilh hi.
Tua Johan in ama muhna khempeuh tawh kizomin Pasian’ thu ahi zongin, Zeisu Khazih’ teci pan’na thu ahi zongin teci a pang hi.
Hih lai simin, hih hilhkholhna thu za-in, lai sungah a kigelh nate a ngai mite in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, a hun a nai zo hi.

Johan in Asia gamah a om pawlpi sagihte kiangah a zasak hi. Tu lai taka om, a om ngei, tu nung ciangin a hong pai lai ding pa’ kiang pan ahi zongin, ama tokhom mai-ah a om Kha Siangtho sagihte kiang pan ahi zongin, thuman teci pang ahi tham loin mi site lakah a suak masa bel hi a, leitung kumpite a ukpa ahi Zeisu Khazih kiang pan ahi zongin, hehpihna thupha leh nopna note tungah om ta hen. Eite hong it a, a sisan tawh eite mawhna pan hong phelkhia a,
ama Pa Pasian mai-ah eite kumpi za-ah ahi zongin, siampi za-ah ahi zongin hong koih Topa tungah minthan’na leh vangliatna om tawntung ta hen! Amen.

En un, Topa in meiite tawh hong kumsuk ding a, mittang khempeuh a, kipan amah a sun mite in amah hong mu ding uh hi. Leitung mipawl khempeuh in zong amah hangin a kap ding uh hi. Tua bang a man hi. Amen.
“Keimah in Alfa leh Omega ka hi,” ci-in tu lai taka om, a om ngei, tu nung ciangin hong pai ding mi ahi Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in a gen hi.

Zeisu sungah a om gimna-a kipan gam ahi zongin, thuakzawhna ahi zongin, note tawh a thuak khawm, note’ u ahi keimah Johan in Pasian’ thu leh Zeisu tawh kipawl teci pan’nate hangin Patmos kici tuikulh gamah ka om hi.
Topa’ ni-in Kha Siangtho sungah ka om lai takin ka nung lam pan peengkul aw bangin nakpi gingin,

“Nangmah in na muhte, lai sungah gelh in la, Efesa khua, Smurna khua, Pergamum khua, Thiatira khua, Sardis khua, Filadelfia khua, Laodikia khua-ah om pawlpi sagihte kiangah khak in,” ci-in hong genna kam ka za hi.
Kei kiangah hong gen aw a nei mi mu dingin kihei-in ka et ciangin, kham meivak khuam sagih ahi zongin,
tua meivak sagih laizang ah mihing tapa tawh kibang mi khat ahi zongin ka mu hi. Tua mi in a khe dongin puanza silhin, a awmah kham kawnggak gakin,
a lutang leh a sam in tuumul paak bangin ahi zongin, vuk paak bangin ahi zongin a ngo hi. A mittangte in meikuang bangin ahi uh a,
a khete in zong mei sunga kisiangthosaksa sumngo tak tawh kibang hi. A aw in zong tuipi lian aw tawh kibang hi.
A khut tak lamah aksi sagih a tawi hi. A kam sungpan a lang nih a hiam namsau a pusuak hi. A maitang meel in a tang pha mahmah ni tawh kibang hi.
Tua mi ka muh ciangin kei in a khe kiangah mi si bangin ka puk hi. Tua lai takin amah in a khut taklam ka tungah nga-in, “Lau kei in Keimah in a masa bel leh a nunung bel mi ka hi hi.
Nidang lai-in ka sih ngei hangin tu-in en in, a tawntungin ka nungta a,! sihna leh sihna gam konghon’na ka nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na muhsa nate ahi zongin, tu-a om nate ahi zongin, nung ciangin a piang ding nate ahi zongin gelhin koih in.
Ka khut taklamah na muh aksi sagihte-a kipan kham meivak sagihte’ thu thukna na gelh in. Aksi sagihte in pawlpi sagihte’ vantungmite ahi uh hi. Meivak sagihte in pawlpi sagihte ahi uh hi.
“Efesa khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘A khut taklamah aksi sagih tawi-in, kham meivak sagih laizangah a pai kawikawipa’ thupiakna in:

“Nangma gamtatna ahi zongin, na hahkatna leh na thuakzawhna ahi zongin, mi gilote na thuak zawh loh tham loin, amau sawltak hi lopi ‘Sawltak ka hi uh’ a ci mite dongtel entelin, a man lo mi ahih uh thu na muh ahi zongin,
nang in thuakzawhna nei-in ka min hangin zong, gim lo cim loin na thuak thu ahi zongin ka thei hi.
Ahih hangin nang tungah gen ding thu ka nei hi. Bang thu ahi hiam na cih leh, a masa bel a, na neih itna na paihkhiat thu ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin nang in bangci omna pan na kiam zawh thu na phawk kik khit ciangin na kisikkik in la, a cil-a na gamtat ngei na gamta kik in. Tua bang na hih kei leh, na kiangah ka hong pai ding a, na kisikkik kei leh, na meivakna a omna pan ka khin ding hi.
Nangma tungah a om phatnate in ka muhdah Nikolas pawlte’ gamtatnate kei’ muhdah mah bangin nangmah in zong na muhdahna ahi hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen. A zo mi keimah in Pasian Paradis gam sungah a om nuntakna gah a nek theihna thu ka pia ding hi.”
“Smurna khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘A masa bel leh a nunung bel ahi tham loin, nidang lai-inah sihna a thuak zo, tu-in a nungta mi’ thupiakna in:
“Nangmah in gimna na thuakna, na hau napi-in na zawnna-a kipan Judah mipawl hi lo napi-in ‘Judah mipawl ka hi uh, a kici Satan pawlte in hong kosiatna thute ka thei hi.

Nang in na thuak ding lai takte kihta kei in. Ze-etna na thuak nadingun note kimkhat Dawimangpa in thong sungah hong khia-in, note in nisawm sung gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Nangmah in sihna na thuak dongin thumanin om in. Tua hi leh, nuntakna kumpilukhu nang kong pia ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen. A zo mi nihvei sihna in a su kha kei ding hi.”
“Pergamum khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘Lang nih a hiam namsau a nei mi’ thupiakna in:

“Nangmah in Satan’ tokhom omna-ah na om thu ka thei hi. Ka min len cipin, Dawimangpa’ teen’na munah note lakah thahna a thuak ka teci, ka midik pa Antipas’ khan’ lai nangawnin keima upna thu na nial kei hi.

Ahih hangin nangma tungah gen ding neukha a om hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, milim mai-ah biakna sa nek ding ahi zongin, numei leh pasal tawh khialhna gamtat ding ahi zongin, Israel mipawlte mai-ah suih khak nading Barak a hilh Balaam’ thu hilhna a zui mi kimkhat nangma sungah a om hi.
Tua tham loin, Nikolas pawlte thuhilhna a zui mi kimkhat zong tua bangin a om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na kisikkik in. Tua bang ahih kei leh, nangma kiangah a manlangin kong pai ding a, ka kam sungpan a pusuak namsau tawh tua mite ka do ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen. A zo mi a kiseel maana ahi zongin, a ngah mi sim loh kuamah in a thei zawh loh min thak kigelhna suangpak ahi zongin ka pia ding hi.’”
“Thiatira khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘Meikuang bang mittang a nei, sumngo taktak bang khete a nei Pasian’ Tapa’ thupiakna in:
“Na gamtatna, na itna, na upna, na nasepnate, na thuakzawhnate ahi zongin, a nununga na gamtatnate in a masa na gamtatnate sangin a tamzawk thu ahi zongin ka thei hi.

Ahih hangin nang tungah gen ding thu ka nei hi. ‘Kamsang numei ka hi’ a ci Jezebel nang in na nial kei a, numei leh pasal khialhna gamtat nading ahi zongin, milim mai-ah biakna sa nek nading ahi zongin tua numei in ka silate hilhin a zol hi.
Tua numei a kisikkik nading hun ka hehpih zawh hangin, amah in a gitloh gamtatna a kisik nuam kei hi.
En in, amah a lupna tungah ka paai ding a, amah tawh a mawh mite in a gamtatna hoih lo uh a kisikkik kei uh leh, gimna lianpi ka tungsak ding hi.

Ama tate zong ka that ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin keimah in lungsung sinsung a zong kawikawi thei Topa ka hih thu, pawlpi khempeuh in a thei ding uh hi. Note khempeuh zong na gamtatna uh tawh kituakin ka hong thukkik ding hi.
Ahih hangin kong gensa thuhilhna a mang lo, Satan thu thukpi a kici nate a thei lo, a siam lo Thiatira khua-a a om lai mite kiangah kong geninah: no tungah adang van ka hong suan kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin note in na ngahsa khempeuh uh ka hong pai dongin kip takin len un.
Zo-in, keima deihnate a tawp dongin a zui mi, mipawlte tungah ukna aana ka pia ding a,
kei in ka Pa kiangpan thu ka ngah bangin beel seekte in beelte a suk khap zan bangin, amah in sik ciangkhut tawh a uk ding hi.
Zingsol zong amah ka pia ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen.’”

“Sardis khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘Pasian’ Kha Siangtho sagih leh aksi sagih a nei mi’ thupiakna in: “Nangma gamtatnate ahi zongin, na nungta hi ci-in minthan’na na ngah hangin a si na hih thu ka thei hi.
Nang in khanglo in la, a sidek tak a om lai-te hanthawn in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, nang gamtatna khat beek ka Pasian mai-ah a kicingin ka mu kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin bangci na san’, bangci na zak thu phawkkik in la, zui in, kisikkik in. Tua ahih ciangin ngakin na om kei leh, guta bangin ka hong pai ding a, na kiangah bang hunin ka hong tun’ ding na thei kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin nang in amau puanza a ninsak lo mi neukha Sardis khua-ah na nei hi. Tua mite in a kilawm ahih manunah puanpaak silhin kei tawh a paikhawm ding uh hi.
A zo mi in tua bang puanpaak a silh ding hi. Ama min zong nuntakna laibu pan ka su mang ngei kei ding hi. Ama min ka Pa mai-ah ahi zongin, ka Pa’ vantungmite mai-ah ahi zongin ka gum ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen.”’

“Filadelfia khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘A siangtho mi, a thuman mi, David’ konghon’na a nei mi, kuama khak theih loh dingin hongin, kuama hon’ theih loh dingin a khak thei mi’ thupiakna in:
En in, kuama khak zawh loh ding kong na mai-ah ka hong hi. Na gamtatnate ahi zongin, nang in tawmkha thahatna nei-in, ka thute zui-in, ka min nial loin, na om thu ahi zongin ka thei hi.
En in, ‘Judah mipawl khat ka hi uh,’ a ci zuau thu a gen mipawl ahi, Satan pawlte ahi mite kong pia a, amau in nang khe kiangah bia-in, nang kong it, ci-in amaute ka theisak ding hi.
Nangmah in kei thuakzawhna tawh kipawl thute na zui zo ahih ciangin, leitungah a om mite thu dong dingin leitung khempeuhah a tung ding ze-etna hun panin nang kong liah ding hi.
A manlangin ka hong pai ding hi. Na kumpilukhu kuamah in a lakkhiat loh nadingin, na neihsa na a kip takin len in.

A zo mi ka Pasian’ biakinnpi khuampi ka suaksak ding hi. Tunung ciangin tua mun panin pua lamah cikmah hunin a paikhia nawn kei ding hi. Tua mi tungah ka Pasian’ min ahi zongin, ka Pasian kiang vantung panin hong kumsuk ding Jerusalem khua thak ahi, ka Pasian’ khuapi min ahi zongin, keima min thak ahi zongin ka gelh ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen,”
“Laodikia khua-ah a om pawlpi’ vantungmi kiangah hih bangin gelh in. ‘Amen ahi mi, a dik a man teci a pang, Pasian’ piancilna kipatna bulpi ahi pa’ thupiakna in:
“Na gamtatnate ahi zongin, nang in vot lah vot lo, sa lah sa lo na hih thu ahi zongin ka thei hi. Vot hi taleh, ahih kei leh, sa hi taleh ka deih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nang ka kam sungpan ka hong siakhia ding hi.
Kei in ka hau hi, sumte nate nei-in sapna a om nawn kei hi na cih hangin pumpi lunggimna, hehpihhuaina, zawnna, mittawtna, puan neih lohna na thuak lamtak thei na hih ciangin,

nang in na hauh nadingin mei tawh kisiang saksa kham ahi zongin, puan nei loin omin na zumhuaina a kilat loh nadingin nangma silh ding puanpaak ahi zongin, mit khuamuh nadingin nuh ding mit-za ahi zongin kei kiang pan na lei nading kong hansuah hi.
Ka it khempeuhte a mawhna uh lakin ka hilh thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin lungsim citak-in kisikkik in.

En in, kei in kongkhak kiangah ding-in kiu-in ka om hi. Mi khatpeuh in ka aw za-in kong khak hong hon’ leh, tua mi kiangah ka tum khit ciangin amah tawh an ne khawm, tui dawn khawmin ka om ding hi. Amah in kei tawh an ne khawm tui dawn khawmin a om ding hi.
Keimah in ka zawh khit ciangin ka Pa tawh tokhom tungah ka tut khawm bangin, a zo mi in kei tawh ka tokhom tungah tut khawm theihna thu ka pia ding hi.
Kha Siangtho in pawlpite a thupiakna bil nei mi in ngai ta hen,’ ci-in thu hong pia hi.”

Tua thute khit ciangin ka et leh, vantungah kong vang khat kihongin a om ka mu hi. “Hong kahto in. A nung ciangin a piang ding nate ka hong lak ding hi,” ci-in a masa-a, kei kiangah hong gen peengkhul aw banga nakpi-a kiko aw ka zak ciangin,
thakhatin Kha Siangtho sungah ka om a, vantungah kikoih tokhom khat ahi zongin, tua tokhom tungah tu-a a om mi khat ahi zongin ka mu hi.
Tua mi a meel in jasper suangmanpha leh sardis suangmanpha meel tawh kibang hi. Tokhom kimkotah zong emerald suangmanpha meel tawh kibang sakhituihup a om hi.
Tokhom kimkotah tokhom adang sawmnih leh li, leh tua tokhomte tungah puanpaak silh, kham kumpilukhu a khu upa sawmnih leh li tu-in a om uh hi.
Tokhom sung pan khuaphialep tawh, a aw gin’na tawh, vangin’na tawh a pusuak uh hi. Tokhom mai-ah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho sagih ahi, meivak sagih kivakin a om uh hi.
Tokhom mai-ah kristal tawh kibang limlang tuipi bang a om hi. Tokhom laizang leh a kimkotah, a mai a nungah mittang dimin a nei ganhing li a om hi.

Khatna ganhing in humpinelkai tawh kibang hi, a nihna ganhing in bawngno tawh kibang hi, a thumna ganhing in mi maitang tawh kibang maitang a nei hi, lina ganhing in a leeng kawikawi muvanlai tawh kibang hi.

Tua ganhing lite khat in kha guk ciat a nei uh a, a khate uh a sung a pua, mittang tawh dimin, sun tawh zan tawh khawl loin: “A om ngei, a om laitak, a hong om ding Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in, Siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi,” ci-in kiko-in a om uh hi.
Tua ganhingte in tua bangin a tawntung nungta-in tokhom tungah tu-a a om minthan’na, pahtawina leh vangliatna leh hehpih phatnate a phat lai takun,
tokhom tungah tu-in a om mi mai-ah upa sawmnih leh lite in bokin, a tawntungin a nungta mi bia-in, tokhom mai-ah amaute kumpilukhu a khiatsuk khit uh ciangin:

“Kote’ Topa, kote’ Pasian aw, nang in na khempeuh na piangsak a, Nangma deihna hangin piangin a om uh ahih ciangin, tua minthan’na, pahtawina leh vangliatnate ngah dingin na kilawm hi.” ci-in a phat uh hi.
Tokhom tungah tu-in a om mi’ khut taklamah, ciamtehna sagih tawh kip taka kiciamteh a, a sung leh a pua a kigelhsa laibu khat ka mu hi.
Tua lai takin a thahat vantungmi khat in, “Tua laibu phen ding ahi zongin, ciamtehnate hong ding ahi zongin kua kilawm ahi hiam?” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko ka mu hi.
Vantungah ahi zongin, leitungah ahi zongin, leinuai-ah ahi zongin tua laibu a phen zo, a en zo kuamah a om kei hi.
Tua laibu phen-in en dingin a kilawm mi khat beek a kimuh zawh loh maninah nakpi-in ka kap hi.
Tua lai takin upa khat in, “Kap kei in. En in, David’ Zung, Judah pawl pan Humpinelkai in tua laibu leh ciamtehnate a hong thei dingin a zo zo hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin tokhom laizang, ganhingte laizang, upate laizangah leitung khempeuh ah a kisawl Pasian’ Kha Siangtho sagih ahi, ki sagih tawh, mittang sagih a nei, a kithatsa tawh kibang Tuuno ding-in a om ka mu hi.
Tua Tuuno in hong pai-in tokhom tungah tu-a om mi khut taklam pan laibu a la hi.
Tua lai takin gawsemte tawi tham loin, misiangthote’ thungetna ahi, paknamtui tawh a dim kham haite a tawi tek uh a, ganhing li tawh upa sawmnih leh lite in Tuuno mai-ah bokin:

“Nangmah in laibu la-in, ciamtehnate hong dingin na kilawm hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, thahna na thuak khit ciangin mi nam khempeuh, kam khempeuh, pawl khempeuh, gam khempeuhte sung panin, Pasian ading na sisan tawh lei-in,
Ko’ Pasian mai-ah kumpi za-ah ahi zongin, siampi za-ah ahi zongin na koih hi; tuate in leitung ukin a om ding uh hi,” ci-in la thak a sa uh hi.
Tua lai takin tokhom-a kipan ganhingte leh upate kimkotah vantungmi tampi ka mu a, amau aw zong ka za hi. Amau a kisim ciangin tultul, thenthen ahi uh hi.
Tua vantungmite in: “Thahna a thuak Tuuno in, vangliatna, hauhna, pilna, hatna, pahtawina leh phatna thuphate ngah dingin a kilawm hi,” ci-in nakpi-in kiko-in a phat uh hi.

Vantung, leitung, leinuai leh tui tungah a om a bawlsa ganhing khempeuhte akipan, tua vantung, leitung, lei nuai leh tui tungah a om na khempeuh in zong: “Tokhom tungah a tu mi leh Tuuno tungah, phatna, pahtawina, minthan’na leh vangliatnate a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin om ta hen,” ci-in a phat uh hi.
Ganhing lite in zong, ‘Amen,” a ci uh hi. Tua lai takin upate in bokin a bia uh hi.
Tuuno in ciamtehna sagih laka khat a hon’ ka mu hi. Tua lai takin ganhing lite-ah khat in vanging aw bang aw tawh, “Hong pai in,” hong cih ka za a,
ka et ciangin sakol kang khat ka mu hi! Tua sakol tung tuang mi in thal a tawi hi. Tua mi kumpilukhu khat a kipia hi. Amah in zong zoin ahi zongin, zawh nadingin ahi zongin a pusuak hi.
Tuuno in nihna ciamtehna a hon’ ciangin, nihna ganhing in, “Hong pai in,” hong cih ka za hi.

A san ahi sakol dang khat hong pusuak hi. Tua sakol tung tuang mi in leitung pan nopsakna lakkhiat theihna thu leh leitung mi khat leh khat kithahsak theihna thu a pia hi. Amah namsau saupi khat zong a kipia hi.
Tuuno in thumna ciamtehna a hon’ ciangin thumna ganhing in, “Hong pai in,” hong cih ka za a, ka et ciangin sakol vom khat ka mu hi! Tua sakol tung tuang mi in a khut sungah tawikhaina a tawi hi.
Tua lai takin, “Mangbuh pawta khatah hamu, tang pawta thumah hamu man hen. Sathau leh leenggahzute ahih leh, su kha kei in,” ci-in ganhing lite laizang pan mah bangin aw khat ka za hi.
Tuuno in lina ciamtehna a hon’ ciangin ganhing lina in, “Hong pai in,” hong cih ka za a, ka et ciangin sakol puang khat ka mu hi.

Tua sakol tung tuang mi’ min in Sihna hi a, Hel gam in amah tawh a tonkhawm hi. Leitung seh li suah seh khat namsau tawh, kialpi tawh, pulnatna tawh, leitung gam sahangte tawh thah theihna thu amaute a pia hi.
Tuuno in ngana ciamtehna a hon’ ciangin Pasian’ thu hang ahi zongin, a san’ uh teci pan’na hang ahi zongin, thahna a thuak mite’ khate biakna tau nuai-ah ka mu hi.
Amaute in zong, “A siangtho, a dik Vanglianpen Topa aw, leitungah a om mite, kote’ sihna sisan hangin thu khenin daantat loin bang tan vei sawtpi na om ding hiam?” ci-in nakpi a kiko uh hi.

Tua lai takin amau khempeuh, puanpaak khat ciat a piak khit ciangin, amaute tawh nasem khawm mite akipan amaute mah bangin thahna a thuak ding sanggamte in kicin’na a tun’ dongin tomkha a ngak lai nading thupiakna a ngah uh hi.
Tuuno in gukna ciamtehna hon’ khit ciangin ka en a, nakpi-in zin a liing hi. Ni in samul tawh kigan puan bangin vom-in a suak hi. Kha in zong sisan bangin a piang hi.
Huih in theikung nakpi-in a mut ciangin a min nai lo gahte a pulhkhiat bangin vantung aksite in leitungah a pulhkhia uh hi.
Van in laidal zial bangin kizial mang hi. Mualte leh tuikulhte khempeuh in a omna uh pan a kinkhia uh hi.
Leitung kumpi mangte leh vaihawm lian upate, galkap mangte, sumhaute, thahatte, silate, to nei lote khempeuh in suanghawm leh mual suangpi lakah a bu uh hi.
“Ko tungah hong cim in; tokhom tungah tu-in a om mi maitang pan ahi zongin, Tuuno’ hehna pan ahi zongin, hong liah in.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, tuate hehna a lianpi Ni hong tung zo hi. Kua in a thuak zo ding hiam?” ci-in mualte leh suangte kiangah a ci uh hi.

Tua nung ciangin vantungmi li in lei kiu li mong ah ding-in leitungah ahi zongin, tui tungah ahi zongin, singkung khatpeuh peuh tungah ahi zongin, huih nun’ loh nadingin leitung kiu lite len cipin a om uh ka mu hi.
Tua lai takin a nungta Pasian’ ciamtehna a tawi vantungmi khat in, nisuahna lam pan hong kahto ka mu hi. Tua mi in leitung leh tuipi gimna a bawl thei vantungmi lite kiangah,
“I Pasian’ silate a taltangah ka ciamteh khit matengin leitung ahi zongin, tuipi ahi zongin, singkungte ahi zongin, na gimsak kei un,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi.
Israel’ suan mipawlte khempeuh lak panin ciamtehna a ngah mi a kisim zong ka za a, sangkhat leh thenli leh tulli ahi hi. Tuate in:
Judah pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Reuben pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Gad pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih,
Asher pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Naftali pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Manaseeh pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih,
Simeon pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Levi pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Issakhar pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih,
Zebulun pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Josef pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, Benjamin pawl lak pan thenkhat leh tulnih, ahi uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin ka et leh, gam khempeuh, nam khempeuh, pawl khempeuh, kam khempeuh sung panin kuama sim zawh loh mihonpi in tokhom leh Tuuno mai-ah puanpak silhin, a khut uhah nisuh hiang tawi-in a ding uh ka mu hi.
Tua mite in: “Tokhom tungah a tu eite Pasian leh Tuuno tungah, Gupna thu a piang hi,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko uh hi.
Tua lai takin tokhom-a kipan upate leh ganhing lite kimkotah ding-in a om vantungmi khempeuh in tokhom mai-ah bokin Pasian bia-in:
“Amen! i Pasian tungah a tawntungin phatna leh minthan’na, pilna leh hehpih phatna, pahtawina, vangliatna leh hatnate om tawntung ta hen, Amen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua lai takin upa khat in kei kiangah, “Puanpaak silh hua mite kua mi hiam? Koi pan hong pai uh hiam?” ci-in hong dot ciangin keimah in,
“Topa aw, nang na thei hi,” ka ci kik a, tua upa in, “Tua mite in gimna lianpi sung pan hong pusuakkhia mi ahi uh hi. Amau puante zong Tuuno’ sisan tawh kisawp siang a, a kipaaksak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Pasian’ tokhom mai-ah omin ama biakinnpi sungah sun tawh zan tawh ama’ na a sem uh hi. Tokhom tungah tu-in a om mi in amau tungah a buk zal-in a lam ding hi.
Amaute in a nung ciangin bangmah hunin gilkial dangtak nawn lo ding uh hi. Cikmah hun ciangin zong ni sa-a kipan a sa khempeuh tawh a kisu kha nawn kei ding uh hi.
